headline: Ukraine - Africa: BAD irarondera umuriyaridi w'amadorari mu guhangana n'igabanuka ry'ibifungurwa
text: Ibanki nyafrika ijejwe iterambere (BAD/AfDB) yiteguriye kwegeranya umuriyaridi w'amadorari mu kiringo c'indwi imwe yo gushigikira igisata c'uburimyi muri Afrika no gukingira uwo mugabane igabanuka ry'ibifungurwa rivuye ku ntambara  Uburusiya bwateye muri Ukraine. Ibihugu vya Somalia, Benin, Misri na Sudani ni vyo bihugu biza kw'isonga bihanze amaso cane Uburusiya na Ukriane, ku bice birenga 70 kw'ijana vy'ingano ziva muri ivyo bihugu bibiri. Umukuru wa BAD Akinwumi Adesina agira ati: "BAD irabona iduga ry'ibiciro vy'ingano, ibigori n'isoya rishobora gutuma haduka ikibazo c'ibifungurwa n'igabanuka ry'ubutunzi." Iyo banki itanga amadeni ivuga ko igiye kugirisha inama abashikiranganji bajejwe uburimyi n'ubutunzi muri Afrika kugira bigire hamwe uwo mugambi. Biciye kuri ico kigega, BAD  ifise intumbero yo  kwongereza umwimbu w'ingano, umuceri n'isoya hakoreshejwe ubuhinga burinda ihindagurika ry'ibihe, harimwo kurima imbuto zirinda ubushuhe n'izuba. Imbuto y'ingano irinda uruzuba iza iriko irageragezwa muri Sudani na Ethiopia. Ufatiye ku bivugwa n'ikigo ca UNCTAD (United Nations on Trade and Development), n'imiburiburi ibihugu 25 vya Afrika bikura hanze ica gatatu c'ingano mu Burusiya na Ukraine. Mbere ibihugu 15 muri ivyo bivana ibirenga ica abiri c'ingano bikenera muri ivyo bihugu vya Ukraine n'Uburusiya.

headline: Abikorera ibyabo mu Rwanda bari mu rugo kubera Covid-19 ngo kubaho bigiye kubananira
text: Ingingo yo kubuza abantu kuva muhira yafashwe na leta y'u Rwanda nk'uburyo bwo kurwanya ikiza ca coronavirus ngo igiye guteza ibibazo vyo kubaho ku bikorera ivyabo. Bamwe mu banyagihugu bo mu Rwanda, cane cane bari batunzwe n'imyuga yo kwisumamwo ku munsi ku munsi, bavuga ko ingaruka zo kudashobora gucaruka zitanguye kubagerako. Akarorero ni Alain Mataki, umugabo atunze umuryango, asanzwe akora umwuga wo gusukura imishatsi i Remera mu muji wa Kigali. Yabwiye Florentine Kwizera ko n'aho akigerageza kwirwanako, abona ko bishobora kumugora hamwe atoshobora gusubira ku murimo inyuma y'iyi ndwi. Avuga ko impamvu ari uko amikoro yabona muri uwo mwuga ari ayamutunga buri munsi. Ushobora kwumva ico kiganiro aho hejuru.

headline: Burundi: Ibiciro vy'igitoro no kwiyunguruza 'biraduga ariko igitoro ntitukibona'
text: Amafaranga y'itike yo kwiyunguruzako mu gisagara ca Bujumbura mu buryo rusangi bwa bisi yaraye adugijwe, n'inyuma y'iduzwa ry'igiciro c'igitoro, ariko ubukene bwaco burabandanya. Kuva kuri uyu wagatatu, kwiyunguruza muri bisi hagati mu gisagara ca Bujumbura bisaba amafaranga 550, naho hagati  y'inkengera no mu gisagara ni kuva ku 600 gushika ku 1.000 Fbu, nk'uko itangazo ry'ubushikiranganji bw'ubudandaji n'ugutwara abantu n'ibintu ribivuga. Gushika bihinduke itike ryo kwiyunguruza muri bisi mu gisagara ca Bujumbura ryari ku mafaranga 450 n'ubwo abanguruza abantu bari basanzwe baramaze kwiduguriza kuva igiciro c'ibitoro kiduze mu mpera z'ukwezi kwa kane. Bubaye ubugira kabiri ico giciro kiduga kuva mu kwezi kwa mbere. Kigenda kirakurikirana n'iduga ry'igiciro c'igitoro naco kimaze kuduga kabiri kuva mu kwezi kwa mbere  ku rugero rwa hafi 30% muri rusangi. Ingaruka z'intambara muri Ukraine n'ikiza ca Covid biri mu bitangwa nk'imvo ry'iryo kena n'iryo duzwa. Niko vyasiguwe n'umushikiranganji ajejwe amasoko ntanganguvu umusi yatangaza ibiciro bishasha vy'ibitoro ku wa 28 ukwezi kwa kane guheze. Ubuheruka mu mpera z'ukwezi kwa kane guheze, igiciro c'igitoro cavuye ku mafaranga 2.700 kija ku 3.250 kuri essense, na 2.650 kuja ku 3.450 Fbu kuri mazutu. Gusa n'aho ivyo biciro biduga, mu gihugu na cane cane ku murwa mukuru w'ubutunzi Bujumbura, habandanya kwibonekeza ubukene bw'ibitoro. Umwe mu banyonga taxi y'imodoka mu gisagara ca Bujumbura yiriwe atondeye igitoro ku wa ku wa kabiri ati: "Barakidugije ariko ntakihari… erega ibi bintu tubibamazemwo amezi". N'ibiciro vyo kwiyunguruza  hagati y'uturere dutandukanye mu gihugu  navyo vyaradugijwe. Urugendo rwa Bujumbura-Cankuzo  mu buseruko bw'Uburundi  nirwo rusaba menshi kurusha izindi, itike ni 16.000 Fbu. Kuva umwaka utangura, igitoro cagumye kiboneka nabi mu Burundi na cane cane ku murwa mukuru w'ubutunzi Bujumbura, ingaruka zikaba zibonekeza cane mu kwunguruza abantu n'Ibintu. "Ni ukuri ubu abantu baranze kumenyera kugenda n'amaguru... kuko gutondera bisi n'uguta umwanya" nk'uko bivugwa n'umwe mu baba aho muri ico gisagara. "Bisi nazo zirirwa ku mirongo zitondeye igitoro". Ku mbuga hwaniro, abantu bererekana mu buryo butandukanye ingaruka z'ubukene bw'ama bisi, n'iduga ry'ibiciro vyo kwiyunguruza. BBC ntibazwa ibivuye ku zindi mbuga Umwe mu bagize ico bavuga kuri ivyo ati: "Mubayeho neza Nani!!umukate muracagura?ration ya 10.000?muri muba mbere peee!!" Intambara Uburusiya bwateye muri Ukraine ikomeje kugira ingaruka kw'isi yose  na cane cane mw'iduga ry'ibiciro vya gaze n'ibitoro. Uburusiya buza ubwa mbere kw'isi mu kwimbura no gushora gaze. Mu Burundi izo ngaruka zahuriranye n'ingingo yo kubuza taxi-velo, taxi-moto na tuk-tuk gushika mu bice vyo hagati mu gisagara ca Bujumbura. Benshi bavuga ko vyatumye ibintu vyunyuka kuko bwari uburyo bunyaruka kandi busaba amafaranga make n'ibitoro bike ugereranije na bisi. Ingingo yo kugabanya akarere k'igisagara izo ngendeshwa zikoreramwo mu gisagara ca Bujumbura yatanguye kuja mu ngiro mu kwezi kwa gatatu. Reta isigura ko ivyo vyuma vyatera amasanganya menshi. Mu gihe ibiciro ku miduga yunguruza abantu mu buryo rusangi bishingwa n'ubushikiranganii bw'ududandaji n'gutwara abantu n'ibintu, abatwara abantu mu buryo bwa taxi bo nta giciro-fatiro bafise, umwe umwe wese yiyumvikanira n'umukiriya. Umwe mu bagendesha taxi aho mu gisagara ca Bujumbura ati "urugendo rwa nyuma rugufi muri taxi sindagutwara utampaye ibihumbi bine". Aho mu mezi make aheze avuga ko hagendwa ku bihumbi bitatu canke bidashika. Mu buryo bwo gutwenza ariko bwerekana ingene ibintu vyifashe, umwe mu baba mu gisagara ca Bujummbura ati: "Hasigaye hari embouteillage [urutavanako] y'abagenda n'amaguru."

headline: Perezida Nkurunziza avuga ko u Burundi bugiye gutangura kwimba Coltan kuva 2020
text: Umukuru w'igihugu c'u Burundi Petero Nkurunziza amenyesha ko ubutare bwa Coltan n'ubutare buyiherekeza bwo muri Komine Marangara mu ntara ya Ngozi buzotangura kwimbwa mu mwaka uza wa 2020. Mw'ijambo yashikirije Abarundi abipfuriza umwaka mwiza w'2020, Perezida  Nkurunziza avuga ko igisata c'ubutare n'agataka cateye intambwe ishimishije cane, mu kwinjiza amahera y'amadolari y'Abanyamerika atari make. Mu Burundi haravugwa ubutare bw'ubwoko butandukanye, ariko iyimbwa ryabwo riracari ku girero turo cane. Muri iryo jambo, Perezida Nkurunziza avuga ko mu mwaka wa 2019, umwimbu wo mu gisata c'ubutare n'agataka wiyongereye ku bice 32 kw'ijana. Ati: "… mu gihe ico gisata cari cinjije amadorari y'Abanyamerika yababa imiriyoni 59 mu mwaka w'2018, mu mwaka w'2019 cinjije amadorari y'Abanyamerika yababa imiriyoni 78". Avuga ko hari ibikorwa bibandanya vyo kumenya urugero rw'ubutare bubarizwa kuri Waga, Nyabikere na Mukanda bizosozerwa mu mwaka wa 2020. Muri ubwo burere bwa Nyabikere mu ntara ya Karusi, Waga mu ntara ya Gitega, haravugwamwo ubutare bwa Nickel, bwiyongera kubwo muri Musongati mu ntara ya Rutana, nayo mu karere ka Mukanda mu ntara ya Gitega hakaba harangwamwo ubutare bwa Vanadium. Igisata c'ubutare kiri mu bisata leta ihagazeko kugira ngo ishobore kurangura Integuro y'umugambi  w iterambere ry'igihugu (Plan National de Développement du Burundi , PNDB)  mukiringo ca 2018-2027. Mu mwaka wa 2017, niho ikompanyi Rainbow Rare Earths yatangura kwimba Amabuye y'utubuyenge (Terres Rares) i Gakara muri komine Mutambu avugwa ko ariyo ya mbere yimbwe ku mugabane wa Afrika. Mu bice bitari bike vy'igihugu haravugwa ubwoko butari buke bw'ubutare nk'inzahabu, Nickel, coltan, cassiterite, tungstène, tantale  n'ubundi. N'aho ibikorwa vyo kubwimba bikiri ku rugero ruto, ico gisata c'ubutare kiri mu bisata vyinjiriza amafaranga mvamahanga gusumba mbere igisata c'ikawa n'icayi cari kimenyerewe, nk'uko umuvugizi w'ubushikiranganji bw'ubutare n'agataka aherutse kubibwira itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters.

headline: Ibihugu bikenye vya Afrika 'biriha incuro zirenga 30 ku giciro' c’imiti
text: Umuhinga mu vy'amagara y'abantu yabwiye ikiganiro Newsday ca BBC ko ibihugu vya Afrika kuva ku bikenye gushika ku biri hagati na hagati mu vy'ubutunzi biriha incuro zirenze kure cane imiti ataco imaze. Mu bihugu nka Zambiya, Sénégal, na Tuniziya, imiti ikunze kugurwa nka paracetamol ishobora kugurwa ku giciro kirenga incuro 30 ku giciro co mu bihugu vy'Ubwongereza na Amerika. Kalipso Chalkidou wo mu kigo citaho iterambere kw'isi (Centre for Global Development), avuga ko bisa n'uko amasoko y'imiti "atayabaho". Umupfasoni Chalkidou ajejwe imigambi mu vy'amagara y'abantu kw'isi muri iryo shirahamwe, yarafashije mu gutegura icegeranyo ku vyerekeye ingene imiti isanzwe igurishwa, cavuze ko ibihugu  bikenye n'ibiri hagati na hagati mu vy'ubutunzi, bigura imiti mike, bigatuma ata higanwa, amategeko canke imiti myiza bihaba. Ico cegeranyo kivuga ko ibihugu bitunze bifise ubushobozi bwo kugura imiti ku giciro gitoya kubera amahera y'igihugu n'amategeko agenga igurishwa ry'imiti. Hagati aho, ibihugu bikenye bishaka kugura imiti izimvye cane, hakugura imiti izimbutse igize ibice 85 kw'ijana vy'imiti igurishwa mu Bwongereza no muri Amerika. Ibihugu bikenye cane rwose, vyovyo nta ngorane bigira kuko abagiraneza babigurira imiti nk'imfashanyo, bikavuga ko imiti yavyo iri kw'isoko iguma ku giciro gito. Ibihugu bifise amikoro make canke biri hagati na hagati "bifise ubushobozi buke bw'uguharira ku giciro n'imiti ngirakamaro", kandi ugasanga barondera kurenzako, akenshi kubera amakori n'ibiturire. Avuga ko kubera ata mategeko ruhasha ariho, bituma imiti myiza idahuta kuboneka. Umupfasoni Chalkidou asigura ati: "Ata mategeko, abantu bapfa kugura imiti bibaza ngo irakora naho idakora". Ico cegeranyo gisaba ko hoba ugukorana gukomeye ku rwego rw'isi, integurp y'ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS, nayo igasubirwamwo, co kimwe n'integuro z'ibihugu bimwe bimwe, kugira ngo ibijanye n'igurishwa ry'imiti bikorwe neza.

headline: Kenya yahagaritse ibikorwa vy'utubare kubera coronavirus yabaye ndanse
text: Umukuru w'igihugu ca Kenya ahejeje kwongereza ikiringo co kudatembera mu masaha y'ijoro mu kindi kiringo c'iminsi 30 mu gihugu cose kubera ibitigiri vy'abandura umugera wa coronavirus bibandanya vyiyongera cane mu gihugu. Mw'ijambo yashikirije inyuma y'umubonano na ba buramatari b'intara, Perezida Uhuru Kenyatta yatangaje ingingo yo kwugara amazu y'ubunywero mu kiringo kitazwi guhera uyu munsi ku wa mbere isaha zitandatu z'ijoro. Yatangaje kandi ko kizira kikaziririzwa kudandaza inzoga mu mazu y'uburiro. Yavuze ko uwuzofatwa ariko aracuruza inzoga aho ariho hose bazoca bamwaka burundu uburenganzira bwo gusubira gucuruza. Hari haciye iminsi 21 leta itangaje ingingo zo gutezura, ariko ikaba yari yagabishije ko itazohigitanya gusubira gufata ingingo ruhasha mu gihe ibintu vyobandanya biba nabi. Perezida Kenyatta avuga ko atewe impungenge n'ingene uwo mugera ugenda wiyongera ku rugero ruteye ubwoba mu rwaruka avuga ko "inyifato yabo y'urwangara iriko irata igihugu mu kaga". Asaba abanyagihugu bose ba Kenya kwitaho amagara yabo bakifatira ingingo yo gukingira ubuzima bwabo bo nyene ubwabo kuko "leta idashobora gukwiza abapolisi ahantu hose". Ati: "Igihe kirageze kugira ngo buri wese arabe igisumba ikindi, nk'abavyeyi, nka benewacu na bashiki bacu, buri muntu akibaza ico ajejwe ku bamukikije n'abo ajejwe.  Ntidushobora kuronka umupolisi ku muhana umwe umwe wose. "Abakenya 280 baramaze kuhasiga ubuzima kandi n'abandi baracapfa. Ikibazo ni ukumenya gusa nimba ivyo biharuro hazogera igihe bikagabanuka canke nimba tugiye guhura n'ibiza. Ikigaragara ni uko turi mu ntambara n'umwansi ataboneka kandi ruburakigongwe". "Nimba umuntu yinjiye mw'iduka ryawe, nawe ukaba ufise ivyo udandaza aje kurondera, mu gihe adafise agapfukamunwa, mutegeke akambare!" Abamaze kwandura ico kiza karanda ca Covid-19 mu gihugu cose barenga 17.000, igitigiri kibandanya ciyongera umunsi ku munsi. Muri iyi minsi ibiri ikurikirana, habonetse ibitigiri binini vy'abanduye uwo mugera. Ejo ku wa Mungu, ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu muri ico gihugu bwatangaje ko abashika 960 ari bo banduye mu bantu 8,261 bapimwe mu kiringo c'amasaha 24 gusa. Kuri uyu wa mbere naho, ubwo bushikiranganji bwatangaje abashika 892 banduye mu bantu 8261 bapimwe mu kiringo c'amasaha 24.

headline: Nord Stream 1: Russia yugaye umuringoti munini ujana gaz i Buraya
text: Uburusiya bwahagaritse rwose kurungika gaz i Buraya  iciye mu muringoti munini, buvuga ko ukeneye gusanurwa. Kompanyi rutura y’Uburusiya ishinzwe amasoko ntanganguvu, Gazprom, yavuze ko guhagarika kurungika gaz iciye mu muringoti  Nord Stream 1  bizomara iminsi itatu. Uburusiya bwari busanzwe bumaze kugabanya cane gaz burungika i Buraya iciye muri uwo muringoti. Ariko burahakana ivyo bwagirizwa ko buriko burakoresha gaz busanzwe bugurisha nk’inzira yo guhana ibihugu vya Buraya kubera ibihano  vyabufatiye kuva aho butereye Ukraine. Umuringoti Nord Stream 1 ureha na 1.200km ugaca munsi y’ikiyaga ca Baltic kuva ku nkengera z’Uburusiya hafi ya St Petersburg gushika mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko bw’Ubudagi. Wuguruwe mu 2011, kandi ushobora kurungika metero kibe (m3 ) miriyoni 17 za gaz ku munsi kuva mu Burusiya gushika mu Budagi. Uwo muringoti wari wugawe mu kiringo c’iminsi 10 mu kwezi kwa Mukakaro (70)- naho nyene kubera ibikorwa vyo kuwusanura- muri iyi minsi wari wasubiye gukora kuri 20% y’ubushibozi bwawo  ku mvo Uburusiya buvuga ko ari ivyuma bidakora neza. Umukuru  w’urwego rugenzura uruhererkane [rw’inguvu]  mu Budagi yavuze ko igihugu  kizoshobora kuvyifatamwo neza- hamwe Uburusiya bwoca busubira kurungika iyo gaz mu minsi iza. Klaus Mueller yabwiye Reuters ati: “Ndazi ko tuzoshobora kuvyitwaramwo. “Nizeye ko Uburusiya buzosubira kurungika 20% ku wa gatandatu, ariko nta n’umwe yoshobora kuvyemeza.” Abategetsi ba Buraya bafise ubwoba ko Uburusiya bushobora kwongereza igihe co kutarungika gaz mu kugerageza gutuma ibiciro vya gaz biduga, mu gihe bisanzwe vyaraduze cane muri uyu mwaka uheze. Iryo duga rikabije rishobora gutuma ubuzima buzimba cane mu gihe c’imbeho nyinshi (hiver), ama reta aakaba yoca ategerezwa gusohora za miriyaridi z’amafaranga kugira  zunganire abanyagihugu. Ku wa kabiri, umushikiranganji w’Ubufaransa ajejwe kwijukira ayandi masoko ntanganguvu, Agnes Pannier-Runacher, yagirije Uburusiya “gukoresha gaz nk’ikigwanisho co mu ntambara”. Yavuze inyuma y’aho Gazprom ivugiye ko izohagarika kurungikira gaz kompanyi y’Ubufaransa Engie. Ariko umuvugizi wa prezida w’Uburusiya Vladmir Putin yiyamirije ivyo bagirizwa – ashimangira ko ibihano vy’ibihugu vya Buraya  arivyo vyateye izo ngorane mu gutuma ibikorwa remezo vy’Uburusiya vyononekera. Yashimitse avuga ko “ingirane z’ubuhinga” zatewe n’ibihano nico kintu conyene zibuza Uburusiya kurungika gaz iciye muri uwo muringoti, ariko ntasobanura izo ngorane izo arizo. Kimwe mu vyateye impari cane ni turbine yashitse mu Budagi ivuye gusanurwa muri Canada ariko Uburusiya buranka gusubira kuyakira, buvuga ko nayo yafashwe n’ibihano vy’abanyaburaya. Ubudagi ariko ivyo Ubudagi burabihakana. Muri uku kwezi, umukuru w’urwego rutwara ishirahamwe rya Buraya, Ursula von der Leyen, yemeye kugira uruhara mu masoko ntanganguvu, avugira mu kiganiro muri Slovenia ko amasoko ahasanzwe atagihuye n’ivyo bakeneye. Yavuze ati : “ Dukeneye isoko ry’umuyagankuba ritunganijwe ukundi rikora vy’ukuri kandi rituma dusubira kuja hagati na hagati”. Imbere y’intambara, Ubudagi bwari bwemeje miriyaridi 10 z’ama euro zo kwubka umuringoti Nord Stream 2, ugenda ubangabanganwa  n’uwo vyitiranwa- ariko buca buhagarika ibikorwa inyuma y’aho Uburusiya burungikiye ingabo muri Ukraine mu kwezi kwa Ruhuhuma(2). Ku ndwi iheze, BBC yerekanye ko Uburusiya bwariko buraturira gaz igereranywa ku gaciro ka miriyaridi 10 z’ama dorari  mu ruganda ruri hafi y’urubiba na Finlande.

headline: Afganistan: Abasirikare benshi bari banditswe bagahembawa batabaho - Uwahora ari umutegetsi
text: Uwahoze ari umushikiranganji ajejwe ikigega ca reta muri Afghanistan avuga ugutembagara kwa reta kwatewe n'abategetsi bamunzwe n'igiturire gushika aho bandika "abasirikare batabaho" kandi bagahembwa n'aba-Taliban. Khalid Payenda yabwiye BBC ko benshi mu basirikare 300.000 bari banditswe mu bitabo vya reta batabaho. Yavuze ko abakozi batabaho bongerwa ku rutonde ruzwi kugira aba jenerari bahembwe imishahara yari ibagenewe. Aba-Taliban baranyarukije cane gufata Afghanistan muri Myandagaro/Kanama (ukwezi kw'umunani), ubwo ingabo za Amerika zava muri ico gihugu inyuma y'imyaka 20 zari zihamaze. Payenda, yatanze imihoho (yeguye) hanyuma akava muri Afghanistan igihe  aba-Taliban bari ku murindi mununi wo kwigarurira igihugu, yavuze ko  inyandiko zerekana ko  ingabo za reta zarusha igitigiri iz'aba-Taliban ahanini zitari zo namba. Yabwiye Ed Butler wa BBC ati: "Ingene ibiharuro vy'amafaranga vyakorwa, warabaza umutegetsi muri iyo ntara abantu afise ingene bangana hanyuma ufatiye kuri ivyo ugaharura imishahara n'amafaranga y'ivyo kurya kandi igihe cose ibitigiri vyagirwa binini cane". Uwo yahoze ari umushikiranganji avuga ko ibitigiri bishobora kuba vyaragwijwe (byarakubweho) incuro zirenga zitandatu, kandi  haba harimwo "abatorotse n'abapfuye batigera bavanwa ku ntonde kuko bamwe mu bategetsi ba gisirikare bagumya amakarata yabo ya banki" hanyuma bagafata imishasha yabo. Kuva kera hagumye ibibazo ku bitgiri vy'ingabo za Afghanistan. Mu cegeranyo co 2016, umugenduzi mukuru adasanzwe wa Amerika ku mugambi wo gusanura  Afghanistan (Special Inspector General for Afghanistan Reconstruction, Sigar)  yavuze ko "yaba Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika canke Afghanistan  nta n'umwe azi uko igitigiri c'abasirikare n'abaporisi ba Afghanistan kingana, ingene abari ku kazi bangana, canke, ufatiye ngaho, ubushobozi bwabo bwo kuja ku rugamba". Mu cegeranyo ca vuba kurusha, Sigar yashikirije amakenga "akomeye kw'ibungwe riterwa n'ingaruka z'igiturire … n'amakenga ku bitigiri nyavyo vy'izo ngabo". Payenda yavuze ko n'abasirikare bahari vy'ukuri batahembwa ku gihe, mu gihe hari aba jenerari "batambikiza" - bagafata amafaranga bahembwa na reta, hanyuma bagahabwa amafaranga n'aba-Taliban kugira bahebe urugamba batarwanye. Avuga ati: "Abantu bumva ko ibintu bidashobora guhinduka. Uko niko inama nshingamateka ikora, uko niko reta ikora. Abantu bose bavuga ngo ivyo bihera ku nzego zo hejuru, bisigura ko n'abategetsi  bakuru bari babifisemwo uruhara". Avuga ko atibaza ko prezida Ashraf Ghani nawe "yari muri ivyo biturire vy'amafaranga". Avuga ku vyavugwa ko no mu bushikiranganji bw'ikigega ca reta naho hariyo ibiturire, Payenda yavuze ati: "Ndavyemera hamwe hamwe, ariko kuri co kibazo, nta na gato." Avuga ko ibihugu vy'i Buraya vyagize ''uruhara" muri bimwe mu vyagenze nabi muri Afghanistan, avuga ko igikorwa c'ingabo za Amerika na OTAN muri ico gihugu yabaye "amahirwe akomeye yatakaye".

headline: Tanzania igiye gusaba ideni kugira itereni ishike mu Burundi, Rwanda na Congo
text: Reta ya Tanzania igiye kurondera ideni ry'amafaranga  yo guheraheza ibarabara ry'indarayi (ry'itereni canke gariyamoshi)  riva ku mugwa mukuru w'ubutunzi w'ico gihugu, Dar es Salaam, rikazogihuguza n'ibihugu bibanyi vy'Uburundi, Urwanda na Repuburika ya Demokrasi ya Congo. Prezida wa Tanzania Samia Suluhu avuga ko hakenewe ayarenga miriyoni zitandatu z'amadorari y'abanyamerika (arenga miriyaridi 1200 mu mafaranga y'amarundi) kugira harangizwe igice c'iryo barabara ry'ibirometero 2.561 kizorishikana ku bihugu bibanyi. Ayo mafaranga ngo agiye kuguranwa mu basanzwe bafashanya na Tanzania mw'iterambere. Prezida Samia yabivuze ku wa kabiri mu birori vyo gushira umukono ku masezerano hagati ya Tanzania Railway Corporation  (TRC) na Yapi Merkez yo muri Turkia aho bumvikanye kwubaka  368km kuva Makutupora (akarere ka district Manyoni mu ntara ya Singida) gushika Tabora ku mafaranga angana na miriyaridi 1,908 z'amadorari. Umukuru wa Tanzania yavuze ko hadafashwe ideni umugambi ataco uzoba umaze kuko utazoba washikiriye amasoko wari ufitiye intego. Ku bw'umukuru w'igihugu ca Tanzania, iryo barabara ririko rirubakwa mu bice bitatu: Ico gice nyamukuru kingana na 1063km. Igisigaye ca 1342km  kizoshikana iryo barabara mu Burundi, mu Rwanda no muri Congo gikeneye ingurane kugira cubakwe. Ariko umukuru w'inama nshingamateka ya Tanzania, Job Ndugai, yaneguye amadeni  igihugu giherutse gufata ku bihugu canke amashirahamwe asanzwe afashanya n'iki gihugu mw'iterambere na cane avuga iriherutse gufatwa mu kigega mpuzamakungu FMI/IMF ringana na miriyoni 567,2 z'amadorari. Yanavuze ko muri kazoza igihugu kizohava gikubitwa camunara kubera umwenda waco uguma uduga ukunyurwa no gufata amadeni menshi. Ivyo umukuru w'inama nshingamateka ya Tanzania yabivuze aravye amafaranga reta y'igihugu ciwe isohora mu kwishura amadeni, ayo akaba ari hafi tririyoni 10 z'amadorari (canke miriyaridi 10.000) buri mwaka. Ahimiriza reta kwegeranya amafaranga menshi biciye mu makori, hanyuma amadeni  abe ayo gushira mu migambi y'iterambere. Ku butegetsi bwa prezida Samia, Tanzania imaze kuronka ingurane zitavuna cane  za miriyaridi z'amadorari, zimwe zikaba ata nyungu zizotangwako.

headline: Glencore yaciriwe ayarenga miriyoni $300 ku biturire yatanze muri Africa
text: Ishami ryo mu Bwongereza rya kompanyi y’igihangange mu bitoro no  kwimba ubutare canke amabuye y’agaciro, Glencore, ryategetswe kuriha  miriyoni zirenga amajana atatu z’ama dorari (miriyaridi zirenga 600 mu mafaranga y’Uburundi) kubera amafaranga ryapfumbatishije abategetsi bo muri Afrika kugira rironke ibitoro. Iyo kompnayi yahaye miriyoni 26 z’ama dorari, ibicishije ku bantu ituma n’abakozi bayo,  abategetsi bo mu bigo vy’ibitoro bitayunguruye muri Nigeria, Cameroun, na Cote d’Ivoire hagati ya 2011 na 2016. Abashikirizamanza bavuze ko abakozi ba Glencore Energy UK  n’abandi bantu yatuma bakoresheje indege z’abantu ku giti cabo (jet prives)  kugira bajane ayo mafaranga yo gutanga ibiturire. Glencore Energy UK mu kwezi kwa Ruheshi (kwa gatandatu) yemeye ivyaha indwi vy’ibiturire. Yeciriwe kuriha ihadabu rya miriyoni zirenga 205 z’ama dorari n’umucamanza Peter Fraser wo muri sentare ya Crown Court ya Southwark, uwo mucamanza  yongera yemeza ko Glencore inyagwa izindi zishika hafi 105 z’ama dorari nyene. Hamwe n’ivyo vyaha vyo gupfumbatisha, iyo kompanyi yemeye ivyaha yagirizwa vyo  kutabuza abakozi bayo gukoresha ipfumbatsisha (bribery) kugira baronke amasezerano (contrats)  y’ibitoro muri Guinee Equatoriale na Sudan y’Epfo. Glencore, yashinzwe mu 1974, n’imwe mu ma kompanyi akomeye cane kw’isi mu bicuruzwa kama (comodity trader) hamwe no mu kwimba ibitoro, ubutare n’amabuye y’agaciro. Amashami yayo akorera mu bihugu birenga 35, ariko ibiro vya Glencore i Londres bikorera cane cane mu bitoro, igisata cayo kimwe kikaba kijejwe Afrika y’uburengero. Ivyo  birego vyo gupfumbatisha bivuga ko ico iyo kompanyi  yashaka kwari uko  abategetsi “badakora neza ivyo bajejwe, canke kubahemba kuba babigenjeje uko, mu guha Glencore Energy UK  kandi itari ibikwiye ibitoro  bitayunguruye”. Mu 2018, ubushikiranganji bw’ubutungane bwa Amerika bwatanguje amatohoza ku bijanye n’ingene Glencore yubahiriza amategeko ya Amerika yerekeye amafaranga y’inkomoko mbi n’ibiturire ku kiringo co kuva mu 2007. Yari yerekeye ibikorwa vy’iyo kompanyi muri Nigeria, Repuburika ya Demokrasi ya Congo na Venezuela. Mu nyuma urwego rw’Ubwongereza rujejwe ivyaha vy’amanyanga bikomeye (Serious Fraud Office, SFO) narwo rwaciye rukurikira mu 2009, rutohoza kuri rimwe mu mashami ya Glencore ku “bishobora kuba ipfumbatisha”  muri Afrika. SFO imbere y’aho yari yavuze ko amatohoza yayo yari yashize ahagaragara “gupfumbatisha hamwe n’ibiturire bigamije inyungu”. Clare Montgomery, aserukira Glencore, yavuze ati: “Kompanyi iricuza yivuye inyuma ikibi catewe n’ivyo vyaha kandi iremera ko ikibi cakozwe, haba ku rugero rw’igihugu canke ku rugero rw’abanyagihugu muri ivyo bihugu vyo muri Afrika vyabayemwo, hamwe n’ico vyononeye abandi.” Umucamanza Fraser yavuze  igihe yariko arasoma urwo rubanza ko Glencore yakoze impinduka mu buryo yigenza ubu ikaba isa n’ikompanyi itandukanye n’iyo igihe ivyo vyaha vyakorwa”. Mu kwezi kwa Rusama (5) , iyo kompanyi yemeye umwumvikano w’amafaranga angana na miriyaridi 1.1 z’ama dorari muri Amerika  bivuye ku ngendo  yayo yo gupfumbatisha mu bihugu indwi mu kiringo c’imyaka 10. Ivyo vyari vyerekeye ibikorwa vy’ico gihangange muri Nigeria , RD Congo na Venezuela.

headline: Terres rares: umushakashatsi Steve de Cliff avuga ko reta y'u Burundi ikwiye gushumbushwa
text: Reta y'Uburundi isabwa gushiramwo inguvu zose kugira ngo ishobore kwiyungururira amabuye y'agaciro azwi kw'izina rya Terres rares kuko iyo agiye hanze igihugu cibwa. Ibi bivugwa n'umwigisha wa kaminuza akaba n'umushakashatsi mu bijanye n'amabuye y'agaciro Steve de Cliff Juru yakoze icigwa kuri ubu butare bucukurwa mu ntara ya Bujumbura. Muri ubwo bushakashatsi, Steve de Cliff avuga ko basanze terres rares ziriko zirimbwa muri komine Kabezi y'iyo ntara zifise ireme (teneur) ryababa 80%, mu gihe abazicukura bobo bahora babwira reta ko ryababa 54%. Haraciye igihe reta y'Uburundi itangaje ko yasanze ihomba cane mu mafaranga yateganya kwinjiza avuye mu mabuye y'agaciro acukurwa n'ibigo vyo hanze, cane cane ubwo butare bucukurwa mu ntara ya Bujumbura. Mu kwezi kwa kane uno mwaka, umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Uburundi Alain Guillaume Bunyoni yabwiye inama nshingamateka ko hari amakompanyi yo hanze yari amaze imyaka hafi ine acukura ubwo butare ariko ata n'ifaranga atanga mu kigega ca reta. Insiguro ayo makompanyi yatanga, nk'uko umushikiranganji Bunyoni yabisiguye, ngo ni uko mu butaka bimba ata mabuye y'agaciro ahagije basanzeyo nk'uko yari avyiteze, ko rero yakora ahomba. Bunyoni avuga ko yabonye ko harimwo ubusuma n'ububeshi amaze kubuza ko hari amabuye asubira gushorwa amasezerano yo gucukura adasubiwemo, ariko ko icatangaje ari uko mu nyuma imwe muri ayo makompanyi yaje kuvuga ko yari ifise amatoni y'amabuye yo gushora hanze. Mu gukora ubu bushakashatsi, Steve de Cliff Juru yabwiye BBC ko yari afise intumbero yo kuraba ireme (teneur) ry'ubu butare kugira ahinyuze, kuko ababucukura bahora babwira reta ko iyo bacukuye basanga ireme ry'ayo mabuye riri hasi cane ku buryo ata kintu bavanamwo. Ati: "Jewe nari namaze kuraba hanyuma ndavuga nti bishobora kuba biri mu ma 80% canke birenga. Babwira reta ko muri izi terres rares ata kintu bavanamwo, ariko twebwe twaraberetse ko burimwo bwinshi cane". "Ubu rero ni vyiza twarabibonye turabibereka… Aba bantu bategerezwa kwumva y'uko bakwiye gushumbusha reta y'Uburundi kuko yari yabizigiye ibaha ubutaka bwayo babucukure ku neza y'abarundi ariko bobo bagacukura bitwarira iwabo, bakabesha ku biciro". "Wahora ufata nk'ikintu twebwe tubona ko kigurwa nk'ibihumbi icenda vy'amadorari ku kilo, mugabo ukavuga ngo ni amadorari abiri". Asigura ico ari co Terres rares, de Cliff asigura ko iri ari izina rihabwa ubutare burimwo amabuye 17 y'agaciro kadasanzwe. Aya mabuye ni ayitwa scandium, yttrium, Lanthane, Cérium, Praséodyme, Néodyme, Prométhium, Samarium, Europium, Gadolinium, Terbium, Dysprosium, Holmium, Erbium, Thulium, Ytterbium, hamwe na Lutécium. De Cliff avuga ko igituma bazita terres rares bidasigura uko kw'isi zitahari, ariko ko ari kubera y'uko usanga utu tubuye tunyanyagije hirya no hino. Avuga ko ubutare bwazo i Burundi ataho buhuriye n'ubutare bwazo mu bindi bihugu, kuko "twebwe ng'aha iwacu, zimeze nka kurya kw'inzahabu". Ati: "Mu Burundi ugiye ugacukura ikibuye mu kuzimu uca usangamwo ubwo butare".

headline: Gushona ibirato: Constence Ndayishimiye avuga ko uyu mwuga ubu ari wo umutunze
text: Constance Ndayishimiye, Umurundikazi w'abana batandatu, yahisemwo gukora umwuga wo gushona ibirato mu bisanzwe ukunze gukorwa n'abagabo. Avuga yuko ubu ari wo umutunze... Aha aganira  na Cyriaque Muhawenayo.

headline: Leta y’u Burundi iragabisha abacuruza imyunyu idakwije ibisabwa
text: Umushikiranganji w'ubudandaji, amahinguriro n'ingenzi mu Burundi aragabisha ko mu gihugu hibonekeza imyunyu mibi itagira ivyunyunyu bikwiye canke birenze urugero. Mu gihe yari yakoranije abamenyeshamakuru n'abarwizatunga i Bujumbura ejo ku wa kabiri, umushikiranganji Jean-Marie Niyokindi yavuze ko iyo myunyu yinjira ivuye muri Tanzania. Avuga ko nyuma baca bayihindura ikitwa ko ikorerwa mu Burundi. Bwana Niyokindi avuga ko igiteye ubwoba ari uko iyo myunyu bita umusyano igurwa ku rugero runini cane n'abanyagihugu. Aragabisha ko urudandazwa rwayo rutemewe n'amatagegeko kuko ari imyunyu ifise ingaruka mbi ku magara y'abantu. Umunyu ukwije ibisabwa n'amategeko uba ufise icunyunyu bita iode ku rugero ruri hagati ya 30 na 60, ibipimo abanyagihugu benshi bitoroshe ko batahura. Bwana Niyokindi avuga ko umunyu usanzwe ukoreshwa mu Burundi uva ahanini muri Tanzania, uyu ngo usanzwe uzwi kandi wemejwe n'igisata kijejwe gucungera ibidandazwa muri ico gihugu. Iyi myunyu itemewe yinjizwa mu gihugu ifise amazina nka CHUMVI MAWE, CHUMVI SAFI, CHUMVI NZURI. Bwana Niyokindi avuga ko ishitse mu Burundi baca bayisya bakayitekera mu mifuko maze ikitwa ko ari imyunyu yakorewe mu Burundi (Made in Burundi). Imyunyu idakwije canke irengeje urugero rw'icunyunyu 'iode' itera indwara y'umwingo n'izindi. Avuga kandi ko abahinga mu vy'amagara y'abantu bemeza y'uko hampande y'umwingo, iyo myunyu itera izindi ndwara nk'ihahamuka, gukeha ubwenge, indwara zituma abana batagira ubwenge bukwiye, abagore bibungenze bakagira ibibazo n'izindi. Bwana Niyokindi aremera ko hari amakosa yakozwe nk'ukutubahiriza amategeko agenga amasoko yo mu karere ka Afrika y'Ubuseruko u Burundi busanzwe burimwo. Umushikiranganji Niyokindi agabisha abadandaza ko urudandazwa rw'iyo myunyu rutemewe, kandi ko leta idashobora kuvyihanganira.

headline: US: MacKenzie Scott yatanze imfashanyo ya miriyaridi $4.2 mu mezi ane
text: MacKenzie Scott, yahoze yubakanye n'uwatanguje kompanyi Amazon, Jeff Bezos, yatanze imiriyaridi 4.2 z'amadolari ya Amerika ku bubiko bw'imfungurwa (food banks) n'izindi mfashanyo zihuta mu kiringo c'amezi ane. Ku rubuga rwiwe, Scott yavuze ko ashaka gufasha abanye Amerika bari mu ngorane kubera ikiza coronavirus. Umupfasoni Scott agira uwa 18 mu bantu batunze cane kw'isi, ubutunzi bwiwe bukaba bwavuye ku miriyaridi 23.6 z'amadolari bushika kuri 60.7 uyu mwaka. Bwinshi mu butunzi bwiwe bwamuka kuri Bezos, umutunzi wa mbere kw'isi, akaba ari na we arongoye kompanyi Amazon. Kuri uyu wa kabiri, ku rubuga rwiwe yanditse ati: "Iki kiza cabaye ikintu kibi cane ku buzima bw'abanye Amerika bari basanzwe bamerewe nabi," yongerako ko yatoye amashirahamwe 380 yo guha imfashanyo mu gihe yipfuza gushika ku mashirahamwe 6.500. Ati: "Agahombo mu butunzi n'ingaruka mbi ku magara y'abantu vyarazahaje abapfasoni, abirabure hamwe n'abantu bakenye. Hagati aho, ubutunzi bwo bw'abagwizatunga bwariyongereye." Umupfasoni Scott yatanze umuriyaridi 1.7 ku mashirahamwe 116 mu kwezi kw'indwi, avuga ko ashaka gukubitira akagohe "amashirahamwe n'abategetsi guhindura ingendo." Ayo akaba ashikanye hafi imiriyaridi 6 z'amadolari atanze y'imfashanyo muri uyu mwaka. Iyo mfashanyo igenewe ahanini "abasanzwe bafasha abantu bageramiwe n'ibura ry'imfungurwa, abageramiwe n'ingingo z'amacakubiri afatiye ku rukoba, abafise urugero runini rw'ubukene hamwe n'abafise ubushobozi buke bwo kuronka imitahe." Mu mwaka uheze, yarashize umukono ku mugambi wa 'Giving Pledge', aho yiyemeje gutanga igice kinini c'ubutunzi bwiwe. 'The Giving Pledge' n'icemezo gifatwa n'abagwizatunga ku giti cabo n'imiryango yabo co ku gutanga igice kinini c'ubutunzi bwabo. Abahinga mu vyo gutanga imfashanyo barashimye amahera amaze gutanga n'uburyo yabicishijemwo. Umupfasoni Scott yakoranye n'umugwi w'abahanuzi mu kurondera amashirahamwe ibihumbi n'ibihumbi.

headline: Amerika yabujije igurishwa ry’ibihingurwa n'amakompanyi y'Ubushinwa ku mvo z’umutekano
text: Reta Zunze Ubmwe za Amerika yabujije kugurisha no kwinjiza ibikoresho vy’amakompanyi atanu y’Ubushinwa, harimwo Huawei na ZTE, ku mvo z’umutekano w’igihugu. Ayandi makompanyi ari kuri uru rutonde ni Hikvision, Dahua na Hytera ahingura ibikoresho vya ya ma camera yo gucungera (video surveillance) hamwe na ya maradio yo guhanahana amakuru. Ni bwo bwa mbere abategetsi ba Amerika bafashe ingingo nk’iyi ku mvo z’umutekano. Hikvision ivuga ko ibikoresho vyayo ata ngorane z’umutekano biteje kuri Amerika. Ivuga ko iyi ngingo ata “kintu na kimwe izofasha ku mutekano wa Amerika, ariko ko izokwonona vyinshi kandi ko izoba uruhombo ku badandaza bato bato, abategetsi bo hasi, abarongoye amashure ku nzego z’uturere hamwe n’abantu ku giti cabo muri Amerika, mu twigoro twabo two kwikingira, gukingira imihana yabo, udurandaza rwabo n’amatungo yabo”. Huawei n’ayandi makompanyi aherutse guhakana ko ata makuru ahereza reta y’Ubushinwa. Umurwi w’igihugu ujejwe guhanahana amakuru muri Amerika (Federal Communications Commission, FCC) uvuga ko abawugize bemeje nijoro ku wa gatanu ata n’umwe avuyemwo izo ngingo nshasha. Jessica Rosenworcel  arogoye uyo murwi avuga mw’itangazo ati: "FCC yariyemeje gukingira umutekano w’igihugu cacu mu gutuma ibikoresho vyo gutumatumanako bitizewe bitemererwa gukorera mu gihugu cacu. "Izi ngingo nshasha ni nkenerwa mu bikorwa vyacu bibandanya vyo gukingira Abanyamerika icoza gihungabanya umutekano wabo biciye mw’itumatumanako”. Kubera iyi ngingo itaraba ivya kahise, aya makompanyi ari ku rutonde arashobora kubandanya agurisha ibidandazwa vyayo vyari bisanzwe vyemewe kugurishwa muri Amerika. Ariko FCC ivuga ko iriko irarondera insiguro ku ngingo zizosubirwamwo muri kazoza ku bijanye n’ibikoresho vyari vyaramaze kwemererwa kwinjira canke kugurishwa, ibi bigasigura ko bishoboka y’uko impusha zisanzwe zihari zishobora kuzofutwa muri kazoza. Izi ngingo ni zo zanyuma ziherutse gufatwa na Amerika ku makompanyi y’Ubushinwa ku makenga y’uko yoba akora nka maneko, ubwoba bukaba bugenda bwiyongera muri ino myaka ya vuba kuri iki kibazo mu bategetsi ba Amerika. Ku butegetsi bwa Barack Obama, harafashwe ingingo zo kugabanya ibidandazwa vy’amakompanyi y’Ubushinwa vyinjira kw’isoko ya Amerika. Ku butegetsi bwa Donald Trump zariyongereye, zikaba zibandanya ku butegetsi bw’umukuru w’igihugu wa kino gihe, Joe Biden.

headline: Ihinguriro ry'inzoga mu Burundi Brarudi ivuga ko ibinyobwa ihingura bikwije ibisabwa
text: Ihinguriro ry'inzoga mu Burundi BRARUDI rimenyesha ko ibinyobwa vyose  rihingura rikongera rikadandaza bikwije ivya ngombwa bisabwa ku rwego mpuzamakungu. Brarudi ishikirije ivyo inyuma y'aho umushikiranganji w'ubudandaji, amahinguriro n'ingenzi amenyeshereje ko mu gihugu hari imyidogo ko ibinyobwa bihingurwa n'iryo shirahamwe vyatakaje akanovera. Hari haciye iminsi haboneka ubukene bw'inyobwa za Amstel ndende, hamwe na Amstel ngufi bita bock, Brarudi ikavuga ko vyatumwa n'abakiriya b'umurengera. Mu kiganiro yahaye abamenyeshamakuru ejo ku wa gatanu, umushikiranganji Jean-Marie Niyokindi, yavuze abihereza Primus, Amstel, Royal n'amafanta, vyose bihingurwa na Brarudi, "vyatakaje akanovera bagereranije n'imyaka iheze". Umushikiranganji Niyokindi  akebura iryo hinguriro "gukora ibinyobwa vyiza bitonona amagara y'abavyihereza", haba mu Burundi, mu karere canke no mu bindi gihugu". Asaba ikigo BBN kijejwe kugenzura akaranga k'ibidandazwa kwama kirikanuye kikagenzura ko ivyo binyobwa bihingurwa n'iryo hinguriro biri kw'isoko bikwije ibisabwa. Bwana Niyokindi kandi ko hari icegeranyo cakozwe n'abagenduzi bo muri ubwo bushikiranganji bwiwe cerekana ko hari ubukene bw'ibinyobwa bihingurwa n'iryo shirahamwe. Avuga ko ivyo bituma ibice 90% vy'ababidandaza ivyo binyobwa hagati mu gihugu bikika mu kiza bakaduza ibiciro uko bishakiye, baciye kubiri n'amategeko agenga urudandaza rwazo. Brarudi ngo ishira imbere akanovera Mw'itangazo ryasohowe n'iryo hinguriro inyuma y'ayo majambo yashikirijwe n'umushikiranganji Niyokindi, Brarudi yavuze ko irazwa ishinga n'akanovera k'ibinyobwa rihingura ku neza n'abakiriya baryo. Rirahumuriza kuri ayo makenga y'akanovera, rikavuga ko amashiramamwe HEINEKEN na Coca-Cola akorana naryo, yama akora ivyigwa kugira ngo arabe ko inzoga zihingurwa zikwije ibisabwa kandi ko n'ibikoresho vyayo bimeze neza. Ishirahamwe Brarudi rimaze imyaka irenga 60 rikora inzoga mu Burundi, rikavuga ko ari ryo rya mbere ritanga amakori menshi mu gihugu. Ubukenye bw'ibinyobwa vya Brarudi bumaze igihe, aho hari abibaza ko vyoba bitumwa n'ikena ry'amafaranga y'agaciro, ariko Brarudi yo ikavuga ko biva ku bavyihereza bongerekanye. Kuva Uburundi bwinjiye mu ngorane za politike mu mwaka wa 2015, ibihugu biteye imbere bimwe vyahagaritse imfashanyo vyahora biha ico gihugu, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwaco.

headline: Video: Mu munota umwe... ubuzima bwa Queen Elizabeth II
text: U﻿bwami bw'Ubwongereza bwabuze Umwamikazi, Elizabeth II, yari amaze imyaka 70 ku ngoma. U﻿bu ni ubuzima bwiwe kuva yimikwa gushika ku munsi wiwe wanyuma... mu munota umwe.

headline: Ivory Coast: umutumire wa televiziyo yateye uburakari mu kwerekana ingene yafata abagore ku nguvu
text: Televiziyo yo muri Côte d'Ivoire yasavye imbabazi inyuma y'ikiganiro c'umugabo avugwa ko yafata abagore ku nguvu, akaba yabonetse ariko yerekana ingene yabigenza akoresheje ikibumbano (mannequin). Umumenyeshamakuru yaritwengeye n'agahemo mu gihe yafasha uyu mugabo kuryamika ico kibumbano hasi. Inyuma y'aho, uyu mugabo yarasabwe gutanga impanuro ku bagore kugira ngo bashobore kwirinda gufatwa ku nguvu. Abantu bangana na 30.000 bateye igikumu ku rwandiko rusaba ko ico kiganiro gihagarikwa kuri iyo mboneshakure yigenga, Nouvelle Chaîne Ivoirienne (NCI). Umushikiranganji ajejwe ibibazo vy'abakenyezi Nassénéba Touré  ari mu bateye igikumu bakavuga ko ikiganiro cerekanywe ku wa mbere giteye kubiri n'utwigoro tw'ico gihugu two kurwanya ingeso yo gufata abagore ku nguvu. Umumenyeshamakuru, Yves de M'Bella, yarasavye imbabazi inyuma y'iki kiganiro cerekanywe mu masaha haba hari abantu benshi bakurikira televiziyo, ariko akaba yarahagaritswe vy'agateganyo. Uburongozi bw'ico kinyamakuru buvuga ko bwiyemeje kwubahiriza agateka ka zina muntu, cane cane akageta k'abakenyezi.

headline: Ibiteramo Koffi Olomide yategekanya muri Afrika y’Epfo vyahagaritswe
text: Ibiteramo bibiri vy'umuririmyi rurangiranwa Koffi Olomide vyahagaritswe kubera ivyo yagirizwa vy'ugufata ku nguvu abigeme akoresha mu muziki wiwe. Koffi Olomide akomoka muri Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Kongo aragirizwa ko yafashe ku nguvu umwe mu bigeme basanzwe bamufasha gutamba igihe yari afise imyaka 15. Olomide w'imyaka 62 y'amavuko, izina ryiwe ry'ukuri ni Antoine Agbepa Mumba yategekanya kugira igiteramo mu kigo ca Gallagher Convention Centre ha nze y'igisagara ca Johannesburg ku wa 28 z'uku kwa gatandatu. Inyuma y'aho, yategekanya gukora ikindi mu kigo ca Shimmy Beach Club kiri muri Cape Town haciye iminsi ibiri. Ariko ivyo bigo vyahagaritse ivyo biteramo inyuma y'isekeza ry'ukubirwanya ryakorewe ku mbuga hwaniro baciye ku rufunguruzo #StopKoffiOlomide kubera ivyo yagirizwa vy'ugufata ku nguvu. Charles Wilson arongoye ikigo Gallagher Convention Centre yanditse ati: "Muramenyeshejwe ko igiteramo ca Koffi Olomide ….kitakibaye". Nayo Shimmy Beach yamenyesheje ku munsi wa kabiri ku rubuga rwa Twitter ko yafashe ingingo yo guhagarika igiteramo ciwe mu ndwi iheze. Iyo ngingo yaranezereje abari batanguje kuri Twitter iryo sekeza ryo kubuza Koffi Olomide ivyo biteramo muri Afrika y'Epfo. Mu kwezi kwa gatatu, sentare y'Ubufaransa yaraciriye Koffi Olomide umunyororo ubangiriwe w'imyaka ibiri mu gihe atari yitavye urwo rubanza. Vyinshi kuri iyi nkuru soma ng'aha.

headline: Africa muri iyi ndwi mu mafoto: 22-28 ukwezi kw'icumi, 2021
text: Amwe mu mafoto meza  kurusha ayandi yo muri Afrika n'ahandi.

headline: Shakira agiye kurengutswa muri Espagne kubera kutariha amakori
text: Umunyamuziki w’igihangange, umunya-Colombia Shakira agiye kurengutswa mu butungane bwa Espagne yagirizwa gukwepa kuriha amakori yababa imiriyoni 14,5 z’ama euro. Sentare yo muri Barcelona yategetse ko uyu muririmvyi arengutswa ku vyaha bitandatu yagirizwa, n’aho ata tariki yamenyeshejwe. Abashikirizamanza ba Espagne bashaka ko uyu munyamuziki rurangirnwa  apfungwa imyaka umunani, yongere atozwe n’ihadabu ry’imiriyoni 23,8 z’ama euro mu gihe yokwagirwa n’icaha. Uyu muririmyi w’imyaka 45 abandanya ahakana ivyo yagirizwa. Mu kiganiro aheruka kugiriranira n’ikinyamakuru Elle co muri Espagne, yavuze ati:  "Ndizeye ko mfise ivyemezo bikwiye kugira ngo niregure kandi ko ubutungane buzonyeza”. Mw’itangazo ryabo, ababuranira Shakira bavuga ko bazokora ico bajejwe “mu kwerekana ivyemezo mu gihe nyaco”. Yabanje kwanka umwumvikano n’abashikirizamanza, ahitamwo kuja mu butungane. Uru rubanza ruhagaze ku kirego kijanye n’aho yabaye hagati ya 2012 na 2014, igihe abashikirizamanza bamwagirije ko yaba muri Espagne ariko akaba yandikishije ko yaba ahandi. Mu mategeko ya Espagne, abantu babaye mu gihugu amezi arenga atandatu bafatwa ko ari abantu bategerezwa kuriha amakori. Ariko Shakira avuga ko ataba muri Espagne. Mu kw’indwi, abashikirizamanza basohoye urwandiko rwavuga ko yari yaguze inzu muri Barcelona mu 2012, yahavuye iba iyo kubamwo we n’umukunzi wiwe ico gihe, umukinyi w’umupira w’amaguru wa Barcelona, Gerard Piqué. Abamuburanira bavuga ko gushika mu 2014 amatungo yiwe hafi yose yava mu ngendo yakora kw’isi kandi ko ibihe vyinshi yabimaze hanze ya Espane. Yabwiye ikinyamakuru Elle ati: "Abajejwe kwegeranya amakori muri Espagne babonye ko ndiko ndareshanya n’umunyagihugu wa Espagne baca batangura kumira amate. Biragaragara ko bashaka gukurikirana aya mahera uko vyogenda kwose”. Shakira yatangaje ko Espagne ari co gihugu arihiramwo amakori yiwe mu 2015. Avuga ko yari yarishe ikori ry’imiriyoni 17,2  z’ama euro kandi ko ata madeni yari asigaranye. Mu rundi rubanza mu 2019, sentare y’igihugu muri Espagne yatoje Piqué ihadabu ry’imiriyoni 2,1 z’ama euro kubera ukutariha amakori hagati ya 2008 na 2010. Mu ntango z’ukwa gatandatu uno mwaka, aba bantu niho batangaza ko bari bavanye inyuma y’imyaka 11. Piqué na Shakira bafitaniye abana babiri b’abahungu, uwa mbere afise imyaka icenda, uwa kabiri imyaka indwi. Mu kiganiro yagiranye na Elle niho yatangaza ubwa mbere ivyo gutandukana kwabo, aho yabwiye iki kinyamakuru ko yari “mu kibazo  gishobora kuba kiri mu bibazo bikomeye cane, ibihe bibi cane mu buzima bwanje”.

headline: BBC Abagore 100: Menya abagore 100 bari ku rutonde rw'umwaka wa 2020
text: BBC yerekanye urutonde rw'abagore 100 bakoze ibintu bikomeye kandi bafise ijunja bari hirya no hino kw'isi muri 2020. Uyu mwaka "BBC 100 Women" yerekana abafata iya mbere mu guhindura ibintu kandi bakora ibintu bidasanzwe muri ibi bihe vy'ibihuhusi vyinshi. Kuri uru rutonde harimwo Sanna Marin arongoye leta ihuriwemwo n'abagore gusa muri Finilande, Michelle Yeoh, yabaye inyenyeri mu mareresi mashasha ya  Avatar and Marvel, hamwe na Sarah Gilbert arongoye ibikorwa vy'ubushakashatsi kuri kaminuza ya Oxford mu kurondera urucanco rwa coronavirus, hamwe na Jane Fonda, umwe mu baharanira gukingira ikirere akongera akaba n'umukinyi w'amareresi. Hanyuma muri uno mwaka udasanzwe - mu gihe abagore batagira igitigiri kw'isi bitanze mu gufasha abandi - izina rimwe ku rutonde rwa "BBC 100 Women" ntiryashizwemwo nko gutanga icubahiro. Aba bagore 100 BBC ibahitamwo gute? Isekeza "BBC 100 Women" rifise umugwi w'abakozi bakora urutonde bafatiye ku mazina bakusanije bo nyene hamwe n'ayo bashikirijwe n'ibiganiro vya BBC World Service bitangaza mu ndimi zitandukanye. Twarondera abakandida  bakoze ibidasanzwe bikavugwa cane, canke batumye handikwa inkuru zikomeye mu mezi 12 aheze, co kimwe n'abatumye havuka inkuru zayazwe, bashitse ku kintu kidasanzwe canke bateye intege ikibano cabo naho vyoba bitaravuyemwo inkuru. Amazina yatororokanijwe yaciye yihwezwa hisunzwe insanganyamatsiko y'uno mwaka - abagore bagize ico bahindura - hanyuma arihwezwa hisunzwe guserukirwa kw'intara zose hamwe no kudahengamira uruhande na rumwe, imbere y'uko urutonde ntabanduka rutorwa. Ababifiseko ububasha: University of Melbourne, Kim SooHyeon , Quoc Dat, Rachata Sangkrod, Fee-Gloria Groenemeyer, Rakyan Bramasto, NCID,Thomas Laisne, Nandar, Kunjan Joshi, Shajan Sam,Shahbaz Shazi, AxKimia, Arash Ashourinia, UNHCR, Nancy Rached, Emily Almond Barr,  ICARDA, 89up, No Isolation, Anna Khodyreva, Bogdanowa Ekaterina, Anastasia Volkova by Sydney Morning Herald, University of Oxford / John Cairns, Arvid Eriksson, Jeronimo Zúñiga / Amazon Frontlines, Alejandra Lopez, Víctor Hugo Yañez Ramos, Rick Buchanan Photography, Eddie Hernandez Photography, Ant Eye Photography, Chris Collingridge, Abdelhamid Belahmidi, Kunmi Owopetu, Alien Prose Studio, Mastercard Foundation, Hannah Mentz, Fortress, Vice Media Group LLC, Francis Mweze from Sighted Design, Angelou Studio's, Zola Photo, David Gee, Will Kirk, Paloma Herbstein, Miguel Mendoza Photo Studio, Denise Else, Dioned Williams, Alcaldía Mayor de Bogotá, Global Network of Women Peacebuilders, Reece Williams with Artists in Presidents, Sebastian Lindstrom, Getty Images, Andrés Kerese, Gulnaz Zhuzbaeva, Claire Godley, The Australian Water Association, Wu Baojian, Laura Kotila Prime Minister's Office, O'Shea Tometi, María Esme del Río, Gio Solis, Laurent Serroussi, DCMS, Inti Gajardo, Morgan Miller, Helena Price Hambrecht,  Courtesy of John Russo, UN Women/Ploy Phutpheng. Vyahinyanyuwe na Amelia Butterly, Lara Owen, Lorin Bozkurt, Valeria Perasso, Stephanie Gabbatt, bitegurwa na Alison Trowsdale, Ana-Lucia Gonzalez, bitunganywa na Marta Marti Marques, Chloe Skillman nayo uwacafye ni Sean Willmott. "BBC 100 Women" ni iki? BBC 100 Women itangaza abagore 100 b'imboneza bo hirya no hino kw'isi buri mwaka. Dutegura amareresi mbarankuru, ibiganiro birebire hamwe n'ibiyago ku buzima bwabo, mu guha umwanya munini inkuru zishira imbere abagore. Kurikira BBC 100 Women kuri Instagram na Facebook  unagire ijambo mu kiyago.

headline: Agashimwe kitiriwe Komla Dumor mu 2020: BBC irondera umunyamakuru w'icitegererezo mu mwuga wo kumenyesha amakuru ku mugabane wa Afrika
text: BBC iriko irondera umumenyeshamakuru w'icitegerezo mu mwuga wo kumenyesha amakuru ku mugabane wa Afrika ibicishije ku gashimwe kitiriwe Komla Dumor Uwo muhisi yahoze akorera BBC mu gisata  c'amakuru bita World News, iri higanwa rikaba riba uko umwaka uheze,  iry'uno mwaka rikaba rigira 6. Abamenyeshamakuru bo ku mugabane wa Afrika baratumiwe guhiganirwa ako gashimwe, gafise intumbero yo kwerekana no guteza imbere abafise ingabire zidasanzwe bari kuri uyo mugabane. Uwuzogatsindira azomara amezi 3 ku biro bikuru vya BBC i London, aho azoronkera ubundi bumenyi hamwe n'ibijanye no kuba inararibonye mu mwuga. Italiki 16 z'ukwezi kwa 3 isaha zitanu n'iminuta 59 z'ijoro ku masaha mpuzamakungu,  niho kwakira amadosiye bizohagarara. Ako gashimwe kashizweho mu ntumbero yo kwibuka  Komla Dumor, umumenyeshamakuru adasanzwe yari afise amavuko mu  gihugu ca Ghana yavuga kw'iradiyo akongera akaba ashikiriza amakuru mu gisata ca BBC bita World News, yitavye imana giturumbuka afise imyaka 41 mu 2014. Uyu mwaka ibirori vyo gutanguza ako gashimwe bizotangurizwa  mu gisagara co muri Afrika y'epfo ca Johannesburg. Ako gashimwe kazohabwa umunyamakuru atuye   akongera akaba akorera muri Afrika, yerekana ubumenyi bujanye n'umwuga wo kumenyesha amakuru, mu kuvuga kw'iradiyo hamwe n'ubuhinga mu gushikiriza amakuru, yo  ku mugabane wa Afrika, harimwo kuba afise  ugushaka n'ubushobozi bwo kuba umuntu agomba  kumenyekana muri kazoza. Mugihe azomara i London, uwuzotsindira ako gashimwe azoronka akaryo ko gutembera ku mugabane wa Afrika gukora inkuru - hanyuma inkuru yiwe izovuga ku mugabane wa Afrika no kw'isi yose. 2015: Nancy Kacungira wo muri  Uganda 2016: Didi Akinyelure wo muri  Nigeria 2017: Amina Yuguda wo muri  Nigeria 2018: Waihiga Mwaura wo muri  Kenya 2019: Solomon Serwanjja wo muri Uganda Mu mwaka uheze uwatsindiye ako gashimwe, Solomon Serwanjja, yashikirije inkuru ari muri Kenya mu gisagara ca Nairobi, yerekeye abantu bagerageza kuzana akayaga keza mu  gisagara. Yavuze ati: ''Gutsindira ako gashimwe vyagize akamaro kuri jewe, haba ku bijanye n'umwuga mbere no ku giti canje. ''Gukorana na bagenzi banje batsindiye agashimwe kitiriwe Komla, gushobora guhindura iyandikwa ry' inkuru ku mugabane wa Afrika, nciye ku rubuga runini mu gushikiriza amakuru yo kuri uyo mugabane, nkoresheje inzira itanga iyindi shusho kuri uyo mugabane, kabaye agateka kadasanzwe." Serwanjja azoza mu birori vyo gutanguza iryo higanwa muri uyu mwaka w'i 2020 muri Johannesbourg kandi azoba ari mu baremresha ikiganiro c'igisata ca BBC bita Focus on Africa radio. Ico kiganiro kizokwihweza nimba muri  kazoza  ubutunzi bw'umugabane wa Afrika bushobora gukomeza butera imbere atahindagurika ry'ibihe rihabaye. Muri ivyo birori igisata ca BBC bita BBC News kizogendera amakaminuza yo muri Afrika y'epfo akomeye harimwo Kaminuza yo muri Mafiking bita North West University, Kaminuza  yitwa  University of Cape Town iri mu ntara y'uburengero, Kaminuza ya Pretoria hamwe na Kaminuza ya Johannesburg muri  Gauteng. Izo ngendo zifise intumbero yo kwereka abamenyeshamakuru ibikorwa vya Komla Dumor,  akababera icitegerezo gituma bashima kwihata kugira baze baronke agashimwe nk'ako. Umuyobozi w'igisata ca BBC bita World Service ariwe Jamie Angus, yagize ati: ''Ndanezerewe cane no kubona abamenyeshamakuru bose bagize uruhara mu gashimwe kitiriwe umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC Komla Dumor. "Kubera umwe wese abandanya ico Komala yadusigiye mu gushikiriza amakuru abantu besnhi yo kumugabane wa Afrika ukurikije ibihe uyu mugabane ugezemwo. "Buri mwaka, twama twiteze umumenyeshamakuru wundi atsindira ako gashimwe, kugira twumve ingene babona uyo mugabane twongere dusangire nabo uwizera n'ukudahengama biranga BBC - hamwe n'amabanga ngederwako afise uruhara rudasanzwe mu ntwaro rusangi."

headline: Imvo n'Imvano na Israël Mbonyi, umuririmbyi wa 'Gospel' wo mu Rwanda
text: Ndabahaye mwiriwe mwese abateze amatwi Imvo n'Imvano yo kuri uno wa gatandatu. Uno munsi muri studio zacu twakiriye umuririmvyi w'Umunyarwanda, Israël Mbonyi, aririmba indirimbo z'Imana, canke Gospel Music. Muti rero kuki mwahisemwo kutubwira ivy'uwo muririmvyi uno munsi? Israël Mbonyi ari mu baririmvyi bariko baramenyekana cane mu karere eka mbere no kw'isi, akaba amaze kuremesha ibiteramo mu Bwongereza, muri Canada, mu Bubirigi, mu Buholandi, muri Finland, mu Buhindi, muri Kenya, Uganda, Mozambique, Afrika y'epfo... Aho noba nibagiye ngirango araza kuhatubwira. Kiretse rero kutwiganira ku buzima bwiwe hamwe n'ingene yatanguye mu muziki, Israel yaje anitwaje igitari ciwe, akaba aza kuducishiriza mu gahogo aturirimbire live ngaha muri studio. Iki kiganiro mwagiteguriwe kandi mukagishikirizwa na Robert Patrick Misigaro.

headline: Kim Kardashian 'yituye ubutungane ngo yahukane na Kanye West'
text: Kim Kardashian yituye ubutungane kugira yahukane n'umuyamuziki Kanye West asanzwe aririmba mu mudiho wa rap, nk'uko bitangazwa n'ibinyamakuru vya Amerika. Aba bantu bari bamaze hafi imyaka indwi bubakanye bakaba bavyaranye abana bane. Iyi nkuru yatangajwe n'ikinyamakuru gikorera ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi TMZ gisanzwe gitangaza amakuru ku bihangange, inyuma y'amezi atari make hari ibihuha bivuga ko aba bantu batoba babanye neza. Amakuru ava mu binyamakuru vya Amerika avuga ko uyu mukenyezi rurangiranwa w'imyaka 40 yasavye ko we na Kanye West bompi bemererwa kurera abana.  Nta n'umwe aragira ico ashikirije. Aba bantu bari mu bantu bazwi cane kw'isi kandi bose bagiye bagira amahirwe mu bikorwa vyabo. Kim yatanguye kumenyekana mu 2007 nk'igihangange mu rukurikirane rw'ibiganiro yakoze kuri tereviziyo E! Television ku bijanye n'umuryango wiwe. Urukurikirane rw'ibiganiro rwiswe Keeping up with the Kardashians rwarabaye rurangiranwa kuva ico gihe, igice kigira 21 kikaba citeze kwerekanwa mu mwaka uza. Iki gihangange mu biganiro bica ku mboneshakure yaronse amahirwe yo gushika kure mu bisata bitandukanye, ikinyamakuru Forbes kikaba kibona ko yoba afise ubutunzi buharurwa muri miriyoni 780 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. Ku ruhande rwiwe, nk'umuntu azwi cane mu miziki yakunzwe cane kw'isi nka Gold Digger, Kanye West ni umwe mu bihangange mu muziki wo mu mudiho wa rap kuva imyaka 15 yose. Arazwi cane kandi no mu mideri. Baramaze imyaka itari mike bamenyanye imbere y'uko babana, West akaba yagiye kuboneka mu kiganiro ca Kim ku muryango wiwe mu 2010. Bavyaranye umukobwa w'imfura wabo, North, mu kwa gatandatu 2013. Mu mpera z'uwo mwaka, West yateguye ibirori bikomeye cane vyo kumusaba ko barongorana, vyabereye ku kibuga c'umurwi San Francisco Giants wa baseball yari yakotesheje imbere y'umuryango wa Kim n'amakamera, aho mbere yari yakodesheje umurwi w'abacuraranzi. Ubugeni bwabo babugiriye mu Butaliyano mu kwa gatanu 2014, ifoto yaberekanye basomana ku musi w'ubugeni ikaba ari yo yakunzwe cane ku rugero rutari bwigere rubaho ico gihe ku rubuga rwa Instagram. Umwaka wakurikiye Kardashian yavyaye umuhungu wabo wa mbere, Saint West, mu mwaka wakurikiye. Bongeye bavyara abandi bana babiri, Chicago na Psalm, babicishije ku wundi mugore (surrogate/mère de substitution) inyuma y'aho Kim agiriye ibibazo atewe n'imbanyi z'imbere y'aho. Kuva ico gihe, ntibasubiriye kuvugwa cane mu binyamakuru, cane cane igihe  Kardashian  yibiwe n'abantu bari bitwaje inkoho i Paris mu 2016. Mu mwaka uheze, West yaragerageje kurondera kwitoza mu matora  y'umukuru w'igihugu wa Amerika, ariko biranka. Mu gihe c'imyiyamamazo yiwe, uyu mu raperi yarashikiriza amajambo adatumbereye neza imbere y'abantu no ku mbuga ntangamakuru, ivyateye impungenge abantu batari bake biba ngombwa ko Kardashian agira ico avuze. Ico gihe, yavuze ko umugabo wiwe yari afise ikibazo co mu mutwe, ko yari "umuntu w'incabwenge ariko agoye", asaba abantu n'ibinyamakuru kumwumvira impuhwe kubera ivyo bibazo vyo mu mutwe. Ibihuha bivuga ko aba bantu bashaka kwahukana bimaze amezi atari make bizunguruka mu gihe bivugwa ko Kardashian yamaze no kurondera umushingwamanza azwi cane Laura Wasser. Mu kwa mbere, ikinyamakuru Page Six gitanga amakuru ajanye n'ubuzima bw'ibihangange cavuze ko urubanza rwari rwimirije, kikavuga ko West yari yimariye ikiringo cose c'imisi mikuru mw'iyororero ryiwe riri ahitwa  Wyoming  muri reta ya California aho uwo muryango usanzwe ukomoka.

headline: Anne Heche : Uwo mukinyi wa film  muri US ntiyitezwe kurokoka, bivugwa n'umuryango
text: Umukinyi wa film Anne Heche ntiyitezwe kurokoka, nk'uko bivugwa n'umuryango wiwe, inyuma y’isanganya  ryabaye mu ntango z’iyi ndwi aho imodoka yiwe yahiye igatokombera. Aracari muri koma (coma) kandi yarakomeretse bikomeye mu bwonko  ku buryo ata mwuka w'ubuzima (oxygene) ugishobora gushikayo, nk'uko babivuze. Bongeye bavuga bati: ‘Twashaka gushimira uwariwe wese ku masengesho n’ivyifuzo vy’uko Anne yokira tukanashimira abakozi bo kwa muganga n’abaforoma b'igitangaza.'’ Imodoka yiwe yagonze inzu y'igorofa zibiri i Los Angeles mu ndwi iheze. Igiporisi cavuze ku wa gatanu ko mu matohoza yaco ya mbere casanze mu maraso yiwe harimwo ibiyayuramutwe ariko hari hagikenewe ibindi bipimo kugira hamenyekane yindi yose yaronkeye kwa muganga. Igiporisi ca  Los Angeles cabariye itorokanirizo ry'amakuru PA ko iryo sanganya ririko rikorwako amatohoza nk’icaha co kugonga  catumwe n’ugutwara imodoka hari ivyo wafashe [vyotuma udatwara neza]. Uyo mugore w’imyaka mirongo 53 w’abana babiri yarakinye muri film zirimwo Donnie Brasco , Cedar Rapids na  1998 Psycho isubiwemwo Ayandi ma film yakinyemwo arimwo I Know What You Did Last Summer, Prozac Nation, Volcano and Six Days, Seven Nights. Yaratowe mu boronka agashimwe ko muri  Daytime Emmy Awards mu  1991 k’umukinyi akiri muto kurusha abandi ku kugene yakinye muri Another World. Ibindi bikorwa vyiwe kuri televisiyo birimwo  kuba muri muri Ally McBeal, Save Me, Aftermath, Hung, Chicago P.D. na  Men in Trees. Heche yarabonetse kandi muri Dancing with the Stars, igereranywa na   Strictly Come Dancing mu Bwongereza. Amakuru y’igisata kizimya imiriro  muri Los Angles avugako  imodoka ya Heche yatse umuriro mwinshi inyuma yo gutwarwa gushika ku metero zirenga  9 imbere muri iyo nzu, ivyatumye iyo nzu atawushobora kubandanya kuyibamwo. Ariko yitabwaho n’ikigo Grossman Burn Center ku bitaro West Hills kandi ariko ivyuma bifasha kubandanya ari muzima kugira hihwezwe niba ingingo z'umubiri wiwe zikimeze neza ku buryo zohabwa abazikeneye, nk'uko umuryango wiwe wabivuze mw'itangazo.

headline: Kidum yasohoye indirimbo ya Matata, yamye ashaka kuririmba kuva kera
text: Umuririmvyi w'Umurundi akorera muri Kenya, Jean Pierre Nimbona, azwi nka Kidum, yasohoye indirimbo y'umuhisi Jean Christophe Matata, indirimbo avuga ko ari yo yatumye ashaka gukora uwo mwuga. Iyo ndirimbo ni N'Inyagasambu Rirarema, yasohowe na Jean Christophe Matata mu ntango y'imyaka 1990. Iyo ndirimbo iri mu za kunzwe cane z'uwo munyamuzika w'Umurundi yaryamiye ukuboko kw'abagabo mu 2011 nyuma y'igiteramo muri Afrika y'epfo. Christophe Matata yari akunzwe cane cane mu bihugu vy'u Burundi n'u Rwanda, ariko kandi no mu karere eka mbere no mu mihingo ya Buraya na Canada. BBC yashatse kumenye igituma Kidum yahisemwo gusubiramwo iyo ndirimbo, kandi hari izindi nyinshi zakunzwe za Matata. Kidum yabwiye BBC ko yahuye na Matata ubwa mbere mu 1990, bahujwe n'umugenzi, bahurira ahantu yaba bita kwa Musoni, ku rubibe rwa Kinama na Kamenge mu buraruko bw'igisagara ca Bujumbura. Kidum yagize ati: "Yari ahejeje gusohora indirimbo Inyagasambu, Rastamani, Sinzokwibagira... zikunzwe cane mu Burundi. "Iyo ndirimbo yasohotse ndi umu 'jeune' ntanguye amashure yisumbuye. Yabaye imbarutso yo kunsunika cane ngo mbe umuririmvyi imbere y'abantu. "[N'inyagasambu Rirarema] niyo yabitanguje kuko ico gihe i Bujumbura vyari bishushe, hari 'ambiance' abantu bose bashaka kuba Matata". Kidum yabwiye BBC ko agihura na Matata ubwa mbere mu 1990, atamwitayeho cane kuko Kidum atari azwi, ataco yari bwakore mu muziki. Ariko mu 1999 amaze gusohora indirimbo 'Yaramenje' yakunzwe cane, Kidum yarabonanye na Matata i Nairobi ahitwa Green Corner, aho Kidum yavugiriza umuziki. Kidum yagize ati: "Ndamwibutsa ivyo mu 1990 aca avuga ati bwa bundi wabitanguye kuva kera! Nca ndamusaba ko nosubiramwo N'Inyagasambu Rirarema, ariko ico gihe ntavyo yemeye. Mu 2003 Kidum yarasubiye guhura na Matata mu Bubirigi, aho Kidumu yashika i Buraya ubwa mbere kuremeshayo ibiteramo. Naho nyene yaramusavye ko yomwemerera agasubiramwo iyo ndirimbo, Matata nawe agahitamwo iya Kidum yoba ashaka. Kidum agira ati: "Nagumye ndamusaba no gushika aho apfiriye mu 2011, iyo ndirimbo narayiririmvye ku maziko yiwe, niho nari mpagaze ku Mpanda, ndayiririmba." Mu vyabaye nko kugerageza, mu mwaka uheze wa 2018 Kidum yasohoye video ifatiwe muri studio ari kumwe n'abaririmvyi biwe, baririmba ikibiriraho ku cuma ca piano, indirimbo N'Inyagasambu Rirarema. Kidum ati: "Narayisohoye live mbona abantu barayikunze, nca ngira iciyumviro c'uko noyicisha muri 'production'. Ariko ntibirarangira kuko nshaka ko umungu wiwe [wa Matata] Armel aba ari 'umu star' muri video yayo izosohoka. Kidum mu rukurikirane rwiwe rwa mbere rwasohotse mu 1999, yarasubiyemwo indirimbo 'Safari' y'umuhisi Nikiza David, indirimbo nayo yakunzwe cane. Kidum avuga ko ivyo abikora nk'akaryo ko kugarukanira abankunzi b'umuziki umuntu baba barakunze, bagasubira kumwumva ariko mu bundi buryo. Abaririmvyi b'Abarundi batabarutse basize indirimbo zakunzwe ni benshi, kandi hari n'abandi baririmvyi nabo nyene bamaze gusubiramwo zimwe zimwe. Nka hamwe Kidum yosubiramwo indirimbo ya Canco Amisi, nta nkeka ko vyoryohera abatari bake mu bakunzi b'umuziki ndundi. Umviriza ngaha indirimbo N'Inyagasambu Rirarema isubiwemwo na Kidum

headline: Elton John yahagaritse igiteramo muri Nouvelle-Zélande kubera umusonga
text: Aboneka ko ababaye cane, Elton John vyabaye ngombwa ko ahagarika igiteramo ciwe muri Nouvelle-Zélande inyuma y'uko afashwe n'umusonga. Uyo munyamuziki w'imyaka 72 yaratakaje ijwi mu gihe yari aremesheje igiteramo ku kibuga ca  Auckland muri Nouvelle-Zélande ejo ku wa Mungu. Ari imbere y'insinzi ry'abantu yaritakambiye avuga ati: "Ijwi riranjanye kabisa. Sinshobora kuririmba. Reka ngende. Reka ngende! Ndababaye cane". Yuzuwe n'amarira, yunama ku nanga yiwe azunguza umutwe. Uyo muririmvyi w'umwongereza yarakomewe amashi menshi umwanya muremure cane, imbere y'uko agenda ashigikiwe n'abagenzi biwe. Imbere y'aho, yari yabwiye abari aho ko bari bamupimye bagasanga arafise indwara y'umusonga udasanzwe. Igiteramo c'ejo ku wa Mungu kiri mu biteramo vyinshi asanzwe ategura iyo aramutse agendera ico gihugu ca Nouvelle-Zélande. Ibimenyesto vy'uwo musonga wamubujije kunezereza abakunzi biwe bisa n'ivy'umuntu arwaye  akamangu, bikabamwo n'inkorora, n'ububabare mu gikiriza, akababara no mu muhogo akanameneka n'umutwe. Imbere y'uko agenda, Elton John yari yamaze kuririmba indirimbo zimwe zimwe zizwi cane nka "Candle in the Wind" na "All the Girls Love Alice" n'izindi. Yasavye imbabazi isinzi ryari ryaje kumusanganira. Yerekanye akababaro kiwe Aciye ku mbuga hwaniro yanditse ati: "Nararirimvye n'umutima wanje wose, gushika aho ijwi rinjana. Ndababaye cane. Naritanze uko nshoboye kwose". "Ndabashimiye cane ku rukundo rudasanzwe mwanyeretse mu giteramo co kuri uno mugoroba. Sinzokwigera ndavyibagira". Eka n'abakunzi biwe baramuhojeje baciye ku mbuga hwaniro. Mu 2018, yari yategekanijwe kuremesha ibiteramo bishika 300 mu kiringo c'imyaka itatu imbere y'uko ahagarika ibijanye n'ibiteramo". Uyo muririmvyi rurangiranwa yategerezwa kandi no kuremesha ibindi biteramo ejo ku wa kabiri no ku wa kane.

headline: DRC – Ishingurwa rya Tshala Muana ryahatswe kubamwo induru
text: Igikorwa co gusezera no gushingura umunyamuziki rutura wo muri Repubulika y’Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo cabandanije n'aho sentare yari yabanje gufata ingingo yo kugisivya ku busabe bw’umuryango. Umwe mu bavugizi b’umuryango yabwiye ibinyamakuru ko babandanije bavugana n’umushikirizamanza kugira ngo atange uruhusha ko ibikorwa vyo gushingura Tshala Muana bibandanya kuri uno wa gatanu. Umuryango wiwe w’amaraso, wari washatse guhagarika ishingurwa ryiwe, usa n’uwemeye ko integuro zibandanya uko zitegekanijwe kuri uno wa gatanu bifashijwemwo n'umutambukanyi wa Joseph Kabila. Urwandiko rwari rwasohowe na sentare kuri uno wa gatanu, rwategeka ibitaro kudatanga ikiziga. Ni  inyuma y’aho umuryango w’amaraso witwariye umukunzi wa Tshala Muana, Claude Mashala, ari na we yamufasha gusohora indirimbo, umwagiriza ko yihereranije igikorwa co kumushingura, atavyumvikanyeko n’umuryango w’amaraso. Ibintu vyagiye guhinduka ku munota wa nyuma aho umutambukanyi wa Joseph Kabila yahoze ari umukuru w’igihugu, Olive Lembe -azwi ko ari incuti ya hafi cane y’umuryango wa Tshala Muana -  avyinjiriyemwo agashobora kwumvisha uwo muryango ko wogenza buhoro. Inyuma y’imyaka itari mike abica bigacika mu muziki, Élisabeth Tshala Muana Muidikay, yari asanzwe azwi kw’izina rya Tshala Muana, yapfuye ku wa 10 z’uku kwezi nyene afise imyaka 64 y’amavuko. Afatwa nk’ “Umwamikazi wa Mutuashi”, umudiho w’umuziki n’intambo vyo mu ntara ya Kasai asanzwe avukamwo. Akunzwe kwitwa "Mamu National”, ni ukuvuga nyina w’igihugu.

headline: Kidum ati: 'Ingingo yo kutazosubira kuririmbira mu Burundi nayivuyeko'
text: Umuririmvyi rurangiranwa w'umurundi akorera muri Kenya, Jean Pierre Nimbona, azwi cane nka Kidum avuga ko ari mu kuja mu Burundi ubu vuba nyuma yo guhindura icemezo yari yafashe. Mu mpera z'umwaka uheze Kidum yasohoye ubutumwa bugaragaramwo umubabaro, aho yavuze ko atazosubira kuja kuririmbira mu Burundi no mu Rwanda. Iyo ngingo ntiyaguye neza benshi cane cane mu bakunzi b'umuziki wiwe, kuko bavuga ko bahomvye ibiteramo bari bamenyereye ko abategurira. Ariko ubu Kidum, mu bundi butumwa yashize ku mbuga hwaniro yavuze ko u Burundi ari umuvyeyi wiwe kandi ko atorota abuheba. Ubu rero yabwiye BBC Gahuzamiryango ko mu minsi iri imbere agire aje mu Burundi "mu rugendo rw'akakazi". BBC yabajije Kidum ikintu nyamukuru catumye afata ingingo ubwa mbere yo kudasubira kuririmbira mu Burundi no mu Rwanda. Uwo muririmvyi w'indirimbo yakunzwe cane "Yaramenje" yagize ati: "Kubera muri ivyo bihugu iyo ndahagiye benshi mu banyagihugu basanzwe baratwawe umutima n'ivya politike, babirimwo cane. "Bama bakora uko bashoboye kugira ngo ingendo zanje zerekeye ivy'imiziki bazihe intumbero y'ivya politike kandi babizi ko atari vyo ndimwo" Kidum yongeye ko ati: "Ni jewe gusa bama bashaka gukwegera mu vya politike, abandi bose babijamwo bakanivuga yuko babirimwo, bo ntibababona kiretse jewe." Uwo muririmvyi avuga ko ku bw'iyo mvo yahisemwo kuba "arakinjura" gato kugira yihe amahoro. Kidum avuga ko afashe ingingo yo gusubira mu Burundi kuko abona ko igihe cari kigeze. Yagize ati: "Ugukinjura kwanje kirya gihe ni uko hari habaye urukurikirane rw'ibintu kuri jewe kubera gusa nkora akazi kanje ko kuririmba. "Kuva muri 2016 mu kwezi kw'icenda nararwanijwe n'abantu banziza gusa ko nagiye i Bujumbura gukorayo concert, 2017 ngiye i Kigali abarundi bari mu batavuga rumwe na Bujumbura ntako batakoze ngo banyankanishe n'abajejwe intwaro muri ico gihugu c'u Rwanda. "Rero bigeze aho naciye mvuga nti uwufise umutwe muto awurinda uruguma. Kubera kwiyobagiza akazi kanje  mu kunyitiranya n'abo bahanganye mu vya politike naciye nkinjura." Kidum avuga rero ko ubu abona umwuka ari mwiza, akavuga ko hari hageze ko ahindura ingingo yafashe yo kudasubira mu Burundi. Yavuze kandi ko no mu Rwanda umwanya niwagera azojayo, akaba naho nyene ahafise abakunzi batari bake. Mu kwezi kw'icenda umwaka uheze, Kidum yategerezwa kuririmba mu giteramo Kigali Jazz Junction itariki 27/09/2019 ariko aca amenyeshwa n'abagiteguye ko atemerewe kuririmba. Ico gihe Kidum yabwiye BBC ko yabwiwe n'abateguye ico giteramo ko ubuyobozi bw'umji wa Kigali ari bwo bwababwirije kumukura ku rutonde rw'abaririmba, ariko ubwo buyobozi bwarabihakanye. Kidum yavuze ko yumvise bivugwa ko kubuzwa kuririmba vyoba vyari bifise imvo za politike, kubera umubano mubi uri hagati y'u Rwanda n'u Burundi. Buri ci vyari bimenyerewe ko Kidum aremesha ibiteramo mu Rwanda no mu Burundi, guhagarika kuja muri ivyo bihugu bikaba vyari vyababaje benshi mu bakunda umuziki wiwe. Kuba ahinduye icemezo akavuga ko agiye kuja mu Burundi, ni ingingo ishobora kugwa neza abakunda umuziki muri rusangi n'abakunda umuziki wiwe ku buryo bwihariye.

headline: Kerry Gladys Ntirampeba, uwuzoserukira u Burundi mw'ihiganwa rya slam
text: Uyu munyatugenegene w'Umurundikazi, azoserukira u Burundi mw'ihiganywa nyafrica ry'amazina avugwa mu ndirimbo canke slam. Yiganiye Marc Niyonkuru ingene yatanguye kugaragaza iyo mpano hamwe n'ico yipfuza gushikako.

headline: 'N'ubwiyorobetsi': Elton John yanebaguye Katolika ku kwanka guhezagira abashaka kwubakana basangiye igitsina
text: Umuririmvyi rurangiranwa wo mu Bwongereza Elton John yanebaguye Ekleziya Katolika ku ngingo yo kwanka guhezagira abashaka kwubakana basangiye igitsina ayagiriza 'ubwiyorobetsi'. Ivyo abivuze inyuma y'aho Vatikano isohoreye itangazo ryo kwibutsa isi yose ko Ekleziya Katolika idashobora 'kuraganisha abasangiye igitsina'. Urwego rujejwe inyigisho muri Ekleziya Katolika ruzwi nka CDF, ruvuga ko abihebeye Imana badashobora mu nzira iyo ari yo yose gutanga imihezagiro nk'iyo kubera "Imana idashobora guhezagira ibicumuro". Iyo nkuru yemejwe na Papa François, yigeze gusa n'uwutemeranya n'abafise ivyiyumviro bikarishe muri Ekleziya Katolika kuri ico kibazo c'abakundana basangiye igitsina. "Barafise uburenganzira bwo kuba mu muryango", uko ni ko Papa François yavuze mu gushigikira abakundana basangiye igitsina. Abayoboke b'urunani mpuzamakungu rw'abakundana basangiye igitsina LGBT barashavujwe n'iyo ngingo harimwo na Elton John. Neza na neza yavuze iki? Uwo muririmvyi rurangiranwa w'Ubwongereza yanditse ubutumwa ku rubuga rwa Twitter: "Bigenda gute ngo Vatican ntihezagire abantu bakundana basangiye igitsina bavuga ko ari igicumuro hanyuma ariko bakunguka amamiliyoni n'amamiliyoni y'amadolari mu mitahe bashize muri Rocketman, ireresi yigina umunezero nakuye mu kwubakana na David???". Mu mpera z'ubwo butumwa bwo kuri Twitter, uwo munyamuziki yarangije yandika : "Ubwiyorobetsi!" Ireresi ya The Rocketman yerekeye ubuzima bwa Elton John. Asigura ingene yateye imbere mu kuba rurangiranwa mu muziki ari na ho avuga ivyerekeye urukundo rwiwe n'abandi bagabo. Bivugwa ko iyo reresi yabaye iya mbere yerekanye umugabo akundana n'abagabo nka we. Kubera iki urwego rufata abantu bakundana basangiye igitsina nk'abanyavyaha bemeye gushira imitahe ku bushake muri iyo reresi? Abahagarariye uwo muririmvyi  mu Bwongereza ntibishuye ibibazo vya BBC, ariko ku musi wa mbere, umuvugizi wabo yabwiye Newsweek ko umutahe wa Vatican wavuzwe mu binyamakuru bikomeye harimwo na Financial Times. Yavuze ko, uretse ivyo, ata kindi kintu babivugako. Inkuru zerekeye iyo mitahe ziri mu matohoza yakozwe mu 2019 n'ikinyamakuru co mu Butaliyano ca Corriere Della Sera, kimwe mu binyamakuru bisomwa cane muri ico gihugu. Ico kinyamakuru canditse ko cagunduye inkuru zerekeye amwe mu mahera yatanzwe n'umunyamabanga wa reta ya Vaticano. Ibiro vy'umunyamabanga ajejwe imigenderanire ni kimwe mu bisata bifise inguvu nyinshi i Vaticano. Mu kiringo c'ibinjana vyinshi, ni vyo vyabazwa ibintu nka vyose. Uhereye ku vyerekeye Ekleziya gushika ku bibazo vy'imigenderanire iryo shengero rifitaniye n'amakungu. Muri ayo matohoza, ico kinyamakuru co mu Butaliyano cavuze ko "imiliyoni zirenga 4.7 z'amadolari zegeranijwe mu ntumbero yo gufasha mw'ikinwa ry'ireresi nka Men in Black hamwe n'iyo ubuzima bwa Elton John Rocketman." Ico kinyamakuru cavuze ko amahera y'abanyaBuraya -Euro-  imiliyoni imwe yashizwe muri iyo reresi nshasha. Ntibiramenyekana nimba Vaticano yoba ikurikirana ingene iyo mitahe itangwa. Amwe muri ayo mahera ava muri Peter Pence, igisata cegeranya imfashanyo itangwa n'abayoboke b'iryo shengero nk'uko vyandikwa n'ico kinyamakuru. Uko amahera yo mu kigega ca Peter Pence yakoreshejwe biracagirwako amatohoza na Vaticano ku kungene hatanzwe imitahe yo kugura amazu yo kugurisha mu gisagara ca Londres mu 2019. Mu 2020, ikinyamakuru ca The Financial Times canditse ko cashoboye kuronka impapuro zerekana ko Vaticano yashize amahera mw'itunganywa ry'ireresi ya Rocketman. Igihe gito inyuma y'aho iyo nkuru imenyekaniye,  Papa François yasavye ko haba impinduka mu biraba ikigega i Vaticano, anaka ubushikiranganji bujejwe imigenderanire ububasha bwo kugenzura amafaranga ya Ekleziya. Vaticano ibivugako iki? Vaticano ntiremeza ku mugaragaro ivyerekeye uwo mutahe washizwe mw'ireresi ya Rocketman. BBC yarasavye Vaticano kugira ico ibivuzeko, ariko nta nyishu iraronka gushika kuri ino saha turiko turandika iyi nkuru. Kubera ivyo, ntiharamenyekana ivyo Papa yoba azi ku bibazo vyerekeye amahera i Vaticano.

headline: Uyu mumenyeshamakuru iryinyo ryamukorokanye ariko arasoma amakuru
text: Burya uriko usoma amakuru ku mboneshakure ushobora gushikirwa n'ibintu bigoye kwitura - mu buhinga bw'ivyuma bikanka, canke ukaronka abashitsi utari witeguriye Ariko muri ino ndwi, Marichka Padalko asanzwe asoma amakuru ku mboneshakure ya Ukraine, yashikiwe n'ibintu mu Kirundi tuvuga ko ari ibisigabwenge, ikintu kitamenyerewe, aho rimwe mu menyo y'imbere ryamukorokana. Ariko rero, nk'umunyamwuga nyawe, afise uburambe, yaciye afata iryo ryinyo mu minwe, yigira uw'ejo arabandanya nk'uko umengo ntacabaye. Yanditse kuri Instagram ati: "Mvugishije ukuri, nibaza ko ivyambayeko atawabibonye". Yongeyeko ati: "Ariko twariyibagije ivyo abariko  baradukurikira boba bari babonye. Umupfasoni Padalko avuga ko yigeze kuja kwivuza iryinyo haciye imyaka hafi icumi inyuma y'aho umwana wiwe arikubiseko icuma. N'ubwo bitashotse bija kuri YouTube, uyu mupfasoni Padalko avuga ko yishimira ingene bamuteye intege Ati: "Ibihe ivyo ari vyo vyose, shira umutima mu nda" "Ni ah'ejo mu gatondo"

headline: BBC Gahuzamiryango yibutse Johnny Clegg yaryamiye ukuboko kw'abagabo kuwa kabiri
text: BBC Gahuzamiryango yibutse Johnny Clegg yaryamiye ukuboko kw'abagabo kuwa kabiri itariki 16/07/2019. Umviriza ibikuru bikuru vyaranze ubuzima bwiwe mw'ijwi rya Prudent Nsengiyumva.

headline: France: Joséphine Baker abaye umugore wa mbere w'umwirabure agiye gushirwa mu ntatemwa y'intwari
text: Umunyatugenegene w'umufaransa yavukiye muri Amerika Joséphine Baker agiye gushirwa mu kibanza c'intatemwa ca Panthéon i Paris, akazoba abaye umugore wa mbere w'umwirabure ahawe iki cubahiro. Reta ivuga ko Baker azoshirwa muri ico kibanza mu kw'icumi na rimwe. Panthéon ni ikibanza cahambwemwo Abafaransa babaye rurangiranwa, nk'umuhinga Marie Curie n'umwanditsi Victor Hugo. Baker azoba abaye umugore agize gatandatu, akaba n'umwiraburekazi wa mbere, azoba ashizwe muri ico kibanza c'intwari z'igihugu zababa 80. Baker yavukiye i St Louis muri reta ya Missouri mu 1906,  yagiye kuba rurangiranwa mu makungu mu myaka ya 1930 amaze gushika mu Bufaransa kubandanirizayo ibijanye n'utugenegene. Hanyuma kandi, ari muri wa murwi warwanije aba Nazi (bazwi nk'aba Resistants) arwanira Ubufaransa nk'igihugu camureze, mu gihe c'intambara ya kabiri y'isi yose, akaba yaranagize uruhara mu mihari yaharanira agateka ka muntu muri Amerika. Mu kumushira muri ico kibanza c'intatemwa ca Panthéon ni ukwerekana ko igihugu gikenguruka uruhara yagize mu tugenegene twiwe hamwe n'ubutwari yagize mu rugamba rwo kurwanya bikomeye aba Nazi b'abadagi mu gihe c'intambara. Mu gihe ikiziga ciwe kizoguma aho yahambwe i Monaco, azohabwa icubahiro ku wa 30 z'ukwa cumi na rimwe, aho azokwubakirwa icibutso gifise icapa ciwe, nk'uko umwe mu bana biwe, Claude Bouillon-Baker, yabibwiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru AFP. Perezida Emmanuel Macron w'Ubufaransa yemeje iyinjizwa rya Baker muri ico kibanza inyuma y'isekeza ryari rirongowe n'umuryango wiwe hamwe n'urwandiko rwateweko igikumu n'abantu hafi 38.000. Mu 2013, niho  umuryango wa Baker watangura gusaba ko yokwinjizwa muri ico kibanza, ariko umukuru w'igihugu wenyene niwe ashobora gutanga uburenganzira ku bategerezwa kucinjizwamwo. Mu gushimira umukuru w'igihugu, umushikiranganji wa reta Agnès Pannier-Runacher  avuga ko Baker yari "umugore akomeye yakunze Ubufaransa". Umwe mu bari muri iri sekeza, Jennifer Guesdon, avuga ko iyi ngingo gitumye Baker amenyekana, mu gihe "abantu bari ku rushi gusa ari bo bari bazi ko ari umuntu rurangiranwa kw'isi". Baker yatanguye kumenyekana cane mu biteramo yakunze gukora mu myaka ya 1920 na 1930 vyatumye abantu bamukunda cane kubera intambo ziwe yabaryohera. Ariko rero, ivyo yakoze mu gihe c'intambara vyatumye agira ijunja mu Bufaransa, bituma ahabwa ubwenegihugu bw'Ubufaransa amaze kwubaka urwiwe n'umugabo yakora mu mahinguriro, Jean Lion mu 1937. Baker yarakoresheje ubwamamare bwiwe mu kwegeranya amakuru ku bikorwa vy'ingabo z'abadagi yashikiriza, abicishije mu muziki. Mu buzima bwiwe bwose, Baker yari umwe mu bantu bakomeye cane barwanije ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba. Mu 1963, yarifatanije n'abandi mu myiyerekano yabaye i WAshington ari kumwe n'umukuru w'abaharanira uburenganzira bw'abirabure Martin Luther King Jr, igihe ashikiriza rya jambo ryabaye rurangiranwa hose "I Have a Dream" (mfise indoto/inzozi). Baker yasandavye mu 1975, ahabwa icubahiro ca gisirikare mu Bufaransa umusi wo kumushingura.

headline: Rehema Muthamia, umwongerezakazi akomoka muri Kenya yatsinze ihiganwa rya Miss England
text: Rehema Muthamia, umwongerezakazi akomoka muri Kenya ariko aravugwa cane mu Bwongereza inyuma y'aho atahukaniye intsinzi mw'ihiganwa rya Miss World England 2021, akaba agiye guserukira iki gihugu mw'ihiganwa Miss World 2021. Muthamia, aba ahitwa Mill Hill yatsinze abandi 42  bari kumwe muri iryo higanwa rya Miss England 2021, mu birori vyabereye mu gisagara ca Coventry, ku wa 27 z'ukwa munani. Muthamia azoba aserukiye ibendera ry'Ubwongereza mw'ihiganwa Miss world rizobera mu gisagara ca San Juan muri Puerto Rico, hazoba ari ku wa 16 z'ukwa cumin na kabiri. Muthamia yavukiye mu Bwongereza ku bavyeyi bompi b'abanya-Kenya, imyaka yo mu bwana bwiwe ayimara muri Kenya. Mu nyuma yahavuye asubira mu Bwongereza aho abana na inakuru wiwe mu karere ka Luton Bedfordshire. Muthamia avuga indimi zine, akaba atamba n'imiziki yo mu bwoko bwa salsa na bachata. Mu kwa kabiri uno mwaka, yatsinze  ihiganwa ryiswe Miss All African Colours England, ihiganwa ryatangujwe mu ntumbero yo gukomeza ubutandukane mw'ihiganwa rya Miss England. Iri higanwa rishasha ryatangujwe na Miss England, mu ntumbero yo kwifatanya na rya sekeza ryo kurwanira agateka k'abirabure ryatanguzwa muri Amerika, Black Lives Matter, mu buryo bwo kwishimira iragi rikomeye ry'umukenyezi mu Bwongereza.

headline: Trump yasinye ibwirizwa 'ribangamiye Twitter', yo yanyegeje ubutumwa bwiwe
text: Umukuru w'igihugu ca Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika Donald Trump yasohoye ibwirizwa rigabanya uburenganiza bumwe bumwe bw'ukudahangarwa buhabwa imbuga hwaniro. Iryo bwirizwa ritanga uburenganzira ku bagenzuzi bwo gufatira ingingo amakompanyi amwe amwe nka Facebook na Twitter kubera ukungene zigenzura ibica ku mbuga zazo. Igihe yariko atera umukono kuri iryo bwirizwa, Perezida Trump yagirije imbuga hwaniro ko zifise "ububasha kanaka zitategerezwa kugira". Inyuma gato yo gutangaza iryo bwiriza Twitter yacciye inyegeza ubutumwa Trump yari amaze gutangaza ku biriko bibera i Mineapolis. Hagati aho iryo bwirizwa rishobora guhura n'ibibazo bishingiye ku mategeko. Bwana Trump - asanzwe akoresha kenshi Twitter - amaze igihe yagiriza imbuga hwaniro ko ziburabuza canke zigerageza kuburizamwo amakuru amwe amwe benezo badashaka. Ku munsi wa gatatu, Bwana Trump yaragirije Twitter ko yivanga mu bijanye n'amatora. Ni inyuma y'aho ikoreye umwihwezo ku mwa tweet abiri yari ahejeje kwandika. Bwana Trump muri iki gitondo yanditse kuri Twitter avuga ku biriko bibera muri Minneapolis.Ubutumwa Twitter yaciye ibunyegeza, ivuga ko burimwo amajambo ateye kubiri n'amategeko ngenderwako ya Twitter abuza guhamagarira imigumuko. Ubwo butumwa ariko burashobora gusomwa n'umuntu abanje kubufyondako. Abahinga muvyo amategeko, bavuga ko inama nshingamateka ya Amerika canke abajejwe ubutungane bategerezwa kugira uruhara mu guhindura amategeko ajanye no gukingira izi mbuga. Iryo bwirizwa ritanga umuco kuri bimwe bimwe biri mw'itegeko, Communications Decency Act, rikingira imbuga nka Facebook, Twitter na YouTube  mu bihe bimwe bimwe. Mu ngingo ya 230 y'iryo tegeko, imbuga hwaniro ntizibazwa ivyandikwa n'abazikoresha, ariko ko "ku gatima keza" zishobora gukurako amajambo amwe amwe ateye isoni, yifatira mu gahanga abantu canke agumura. Iryo bwirizwa yateyeko igikumu, rihamagarira inama nshingamateka "gufuta canke guhindura ingingo ya 230" kandi rikavuga ko ubwo budahangarwa budakwiye gukora mu gihe izo mbuga ziramutse zihinduye ivyanditswe n'abazikoresha. Rivuga kandi ko ubwo budahangarwa budakwiye gukora iyo izo mbuga zihaye kuzibira bimwe mu bizicako, harimwo mbere n'ugufuta ama tweet y'abantu ku mvo zitandukanye n'amategeko ngenderwako y'urubuga ngurukanabumenyi. Bamwe babona ko izo mbuga hwaniro zishaka kwifata nk'ibinyamakuru aho kwifata nk'imbuga zihuza abantu. Mu bindi biri mw'iryo bwirizwa, rihamagarira urwego rujejwe guhanahana amakuru rwa Amerika kwerekana neza ingene izo mbuga zishobora kurengera akarimbi iyo zihaye gufuta ivyanditswe na bene kuzikoresha. Risaba kandi ko ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu vyosubira kuronswa  ubuhinga bwo kwakira imyidogo y'abanyagihugu mu gihe babonye ko izo mbuga hwaniro zabarenganije. Ukutumvikana hagati ya Bwana Trump n'imbuga hwaniro kumaze igihe, ibintu bikaba vyagiye gusubira kwunyuka ku wa kabiri w'iyi ndwi, aho ama tweets abiri akorewe umwihwezo na Twitter ku ncuro ya mbere. Vyamuteye ishavu, bituma ku munsi wa gatatu agabisha ko ashobora gufata ingingo yo "gukontorora cane" imbuga hwaniro.
