Urubuga rwa Twitter ruvuga ko iryo bwirizwa rifise intumbero za politike, rukorenga ko y'uko ingingo ya 230 "ikingira uburenganzira bw'Abanyamerika bw'ugushikiriza ivyiyumviro vyabo, kandi ko buri mu biranga intwaro rusangi". Eka na Google ariyo nyen'urubuga rwa YouTube, ivuga ko guhindura ingingo ya 230 ishoroa "guhungabanya ubutunzi bwa Amerika be n'uruhara ifise mu gutsimbataza uburenganzira bw'ugukoresha imbuga ngurukanabumenyi".

headline: Vladimir Putin: Imyaka 20 mu mafoto 20
text: Vladimir Putin ari mu gukwiza imyaka 20 ayoboye igihugu ciwe nk'umukuru w'igihugu hamwe n'umushikiranganji wa mbere, acengacengana na politike y'akarere n'isi hamwe n'imanza zikomeye z'amahiganwa y'inkino Bill Clinton yari umukuru w'igihugu igihe uyu mugabo yahoze akorera KGB yaba umukuru w'igihugu ku nshuro ya mbere itariki 31 z'ukwa cumi na kabiri 1999. Mu myaka 20 kuva ico gihe, haragiyeho abandi bakuru b'ibihugu 3 muri Amerika n'abashikiranganji ba mbere 5 mu Bwongereza. Kuva ku mishamirano yo ku rwego rw'isi n'amahano mu gihugu ciwe gushika ku ntsinzi z'inkino n'amasanamu ya propanganda, turaraba amafoto yaranze imyaka 20 y'ubutegetsi bwa Putin. Bwana Putin, yahoze ari umukozi w'urwego rw'iperereza, KGB, yari yagenywe kuba umushikiranganji wa mbere igihe Uburusiya bwatanguza intambara ya kabiri yo muri Chechenie mu kwa cumi 1999, mu kwishura ku bitero vy'ibisasu ku magorofa atuwe n'abantu hagapfa benshi. Intango y'ubutegetsi bwiwe yaranzwe n'ugushamirana mu bumanuko bw'Uburusiya. Abasirikare b'Uburusiya bugarije umurwa mukuru wa Chechenie, Grozny. Mu 2003, ONU yavuze ko Gorzny wari wo muji wasambuwe kurusha iyindi kw'isi mu mpera z'ukwo kwugarizwa. Uburusiya bwamaze imyaka buterwa n'abarwanyi, nk'igitero co mu 2004 kw'ishure rya Beslan aho abantu 330 bapfuye, bagizwe ahanini n'abana. Prezida Putin ntiyahagaritse imirwano icese muri Chechenie gushika mu 2009. Bwana Putin yemejwe nk'umukuru w'igihugu mu matora mu kwa gatatu 2000, kandi mu mezi make gusa yari kw'isonga mu bibazo bijanye no kwimenyekanisha. Amahano y'ubwato bugira munsi y'amazi bwa Kursk, yahitanye ababukoramwo bashika 118. Igihe Kursk bwarohama mu 2000, vyatwaye iminsi kugira Uburusiya bubimenyeshe imiryango kandi Prezida ntiyaciye atahuka ava mu karuhuko kuri Black Sea. Mu myaka cumi yiwe ya mbere ku butegetsi, Vladimir Putin muri rusangi yabanye neza n'abarongozi b'ibihugu vya Buraya na Amerika naho yagaya politike zabo mu makungu. Uburusiya bwakiriye inama y'ibihugu vya rutura G8 mu 2006, bwemanga ubunyamuryango bwabwo muri uwo mugwi. Hakurikijwe ibwirizwa shingiro ry'Uburusiya, Bwana Putin ntiyashobora kuguma ku butegetsi ikiringo ca gatatu, rero mu 2008 yaciye aba umushikiranganji wa mbere imyaka ine. Ni bake babona Prezida Dmitry Medvedev nk'umukuru w'igihugu abushitse kuko vyagaraga ko yari abaye agumirije ikibanza Putin. Igihe Georgia yarungika abasirikare gusubiza ibintu mu buryo mu ntara yari yiyonkoye ya Ossetia y'ubumanuko mu 2008, Uburusiya bwaciye butera Georgia. Iyo ntambara ngufi yo mu kwezi kwa munani yateye impungenge ibihugu vya Buraya, ariko ivyo Uburusiya bwakoze muri Ukraine mu 2014 ni vyo vyunyuye imigenderanire ya Bwana Putin n'Uburaya. Gufata no kwigarurira intara ya Crimea vyakozwe n'Uburusiya bukayikura kuri Ukraine vyatumye ishirahamwe rya Buraya na Amerika bifata ibihano binahagarika ubunyamuryango bw'Uburusiya muri G8. Haciye imyaka ine intambara yo muri Siriya itanguye, Uburusiya bwarayinjiyemwo gufasha incuti yabwo, Prezida Bashar al-Assad, mu gihe leta yiwe yagira itembe. Ingingo ya Bwana Putin yo kurungika indege z'Uburusiya hamwe n'ibiduga bitamenwa yahinduye ibintu cane ku rubuga. Nyuma y'intsinzi ya Donald Trump mu matora ya Prezida wa Amerika mu 2016, abajejwe iperereza muri Amerika bavuze ko Uburusiya bwayivanzemwo. Nayo mu 2018, Ubwongereza bwagiriza Uburusiya kuroga uwahoze ari umusirikare mu rwego rw'iperereza Sergei Skripal i Salisbury. Mu burongozi bwiwe umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburusiya yamye ashaka kugaragara neza kwiwe n'igihugu ciwe. Mu mafoto yiwe yagiye arasohora yamye agerageza kwiyerekana nk'umugabo w'igikenya. Yarakoze uko ashoboye ngo aheshe isura nziza inkino mu Burusiya mu kwakira inkino Olempike zo mu gihe c'imbeho mu 2014 hamwe n'igikombe c'isi c'umupira w'amaguru mu 2018. Inkino z'i Sochi zagenze neza ariko ingaruka zo gukoresha imiti yongera inguvu ziracibonekeza gushika n'ubu. Ikigo kijejwe kurwanya ikoreshwa ry'iyo miti kw'isi (World Anti-Doping Agency) cahaye igihano Uburusiya co guhagarikwa kuja mu mahiganwa imyaka ine. Icegeranyo co mu 2015 cavuze ko Uburusiya bwakoze ibisa n'ivyabereye ku rwego rwa leta, mu guha abononotsi basiganwa mu kwiruka imiti yongera inguvu. Kuno kwezi basanze harabaye "gukorakora" ku bimenyetso vyatanzwe muri laboratoire. Mu gihe inkino z'igikombe c'isi ca Fifa 2018 zagenze neza ku rwego mpuzamakungu, ibara ryo gukoresha imiti yongera inguvu ryatumye Uburusiya butazokwitaba inkino z'igikombe gikurikira, zizobera i Qatar mu 2022.

headline: Harvey Weinstein yahamwe n'icaha c'uguhohotera mu gusambanya umuntu
text: Harvey Weinstein yahamwe n'icaha co guhohotera umuntu mu kumusambanya, ica iba "iyindi ntambwe mu manga" kuri uyu mugabo yahoze ari rurangiranwa i Hollywood. Ni intsinzi kandi ku batanguje isekeza ryamenyekanye hose nka #MeToo rirwanya ihohoterwa rifatiye ku gitsina. Weinstein w'imyaka 67 yahamirijwe icaha mu muji wa New York ku rugero rwa gatatu rwo gusambanya ku nguvu hamwe no ku rugero rwa mbere mu guhohotera bifatiye ku gitsina. Ariko yejejwe ku caha gikomeye gusumvya, ico naco akaba ari icaha cokwitiranywa no kuba "umuhigi ahiga abo ahohotera bifatiye ku gitsina". Ashobora kuzopfungwa imyaka 25. Aracakurikiranwa mu muji wa Los Angeles ku caha co guhohotera abagore babiri mu 2013. Abagore bashika ku 80 nibo bamwagirije kubitwarako nabi mu buryo bwo gushaka kubasambanya badashaka, ibintu vyakozwe mu myaka myinshi iheze. Muri abo bamwagiriza harimwo abakinyi b'amareresi Gwyneth Paltrow, Uma Thurman na Salma Hayek. Uyu mutegetsi mu ruganda rw'amareresi yarigeze kuba akomeye cane anahingura ireresi zatsindiye udushimwe dukomeye nka Pulp Fiction, Good Will Hunting, The King's Speech na Shakespeare in Love.

headline: Wendy Kemunto: Umuziki umwibagiza amagorwa yabonye igihe afatwa ku nguvu n’abagabo babiri
text: Umuririmvyikazi w'umunya Kenya, Wendy Kemunto, yahisemwo kuririmba indirimbo yise "Huru" mu ntumbero yo guhimiriza abakenyezi kwubahuka gushengeza ababakoreye ivya mfura mbi. Ni inyuma y'aho afatiwe ku nguvu n'abagabo babiri umunsi yari aramutse ahimbaza ivuka ryiwe. Kubwa Kemunto, ingorane nyamukuru mu rugamba rwo kurwanya ingeso y'ugufata ku nguvu muri Afrika ari uko abantu badatahura ibijanye n'umwumvikano. Kemunto avuga ko abamufashe ku nguvu babanje kumuha ibiyayuramutwe, maze ata ubwenge muri iryo joro yari aramutse ahimbaza ivuka ryiwe mu mwaka wa 2018. Ati: "Maze gushika muri iyo nzu, ndibuka ko hari ikintu nanyoye, kuva ubwo sinasubiye kumenya ivyakurikiye, naciye nta ubwenge, naryamye ntazi iyo ndi". "Ndemeza ko bampaye ibiyayuramutwe, kaba akaryo kuri bo ko kunkorera ivya mfura mbi". Kemunto  avuga ko ivyo yakorewe vyamutumye abura amahoro, arihebura, bituma ahitamwo kwinumira mu mwanya muto. "Nico gituma nafashe ingingo yo kutavuga ivyambayeko canke kubandanya ndavyiyumvira, gushika haciye ikiringo c'ukwezi, ariho numva narengewe, mbabaye ku mutima no ku mubiri kubera amabi nakorewe". N'umwiheburo mwinshi, yafashe ingingo yo kubicisha ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi, atangura kumenyesha ivyamubayeko. Ati: "Abantu benshi vyarabakoze ku mutima, bamwe barampoza, ariko abandi nabo barantyekeza". Yahavuye afashwa n'abagiraneza, harimwo abakenyezi bahurikiye mw'ishirahamwe ry'abakenyezi b'abahinga mu mategeko FIDA, baramufasha kwitwarira abamukoreye ayo mabi. Urubanza rwagiye kurangira mu mwaka uheze abagirizwa bakubiswe intahe mu gahanga bacirirwa umunyororo w'imyaka 15. Yarumvise ko atunganirijwe ariko vyaramukomerekeje ku mutima. Ati: "Jewe nk'umuririmvyi, vyarangiriye ingaruka mbi mu mwuga wanje, kubera hari vyinshi  yagiye atakaza kubera uburemere bw'ivyari vyamubayeko". "Niho kugira ngo mfashe guhimiriza abandi, naririmvye ururirimbi nise 'Huru' (ndidegemvya), ncishamwo ubutumwa, nkaba nashatse kuvugira abakenyezi badafise aho bavugira, bacitse intege, bumva ko ata muntu n'umwe abemera, kuko si benshi bemera ivyambayeko". Avuga ko abakenyezi bakorewe ivya mfura mbi batoroherwa iyo bituye inyamiramabi, aho gufata umwanya bakiga ivyemezo kugira ngo zimenye ukuri, nk'uko vyagenze kuri we. Ati: "Akenshi n'aho utoba wamaze kwoga, ugaca ugenda ku gipolisi ubwo nyene uhejeje gukorerwa ivya mfurambi, igipolisi ntikigufata nk'uko categerezwa kugufata". "Usanga ivyo uvuga batabiha agaciro, bakakwagiriza ko ahubwo ari wewe uri mu makossa". Kemunto asaba ko uwakorewe amabi yofatwa mu mugongo, agahumurizwa kugira ngo ashobore gusubira mu buzima busanzwe inyuma y'amabi yakorewe. Asaba kandi ko hoba inyigisho kuva ku bato gushika kubakuze kugira ngo batahure ko ubwumvikane ari ikintu nyamukuru. "Ndizeye ko mu gihe twotangura kwigisha abana mu miryango no mu kibano, hoba akarusho kanini cane mu gihugu ku kungene dufata abakenyezi, n'ingene n'abagabo nabo nyene bofatwa kuko no muri bo harimwo abahura n'ayo mahano". "Iyo umukenyezi/umukobwa avuze ati 'oya', ni oya, avuze ati 'ego', ni ego".

headline: Imvo n'Imvano kuri films zikinirwa mu Burundi
text: Ndabaramukije nongera ndabaha n'ikaze muri iki kiganiro c'Imvo n'Imvano co kuri uyu wa gatandatu igenekerezo rya 19 ukwezi kwa gatandatu mu 2021. Muri iki kiganiro turabira hamwe ivyerekeye ama film, abandi bita cinema, akinirwa mu Burundi. Mu ntango y'uku kwezi, ku ncuro ya 12 ishirahamwe FESTICAB (Festival International du Cinéma et de l'Audiovisuel du Burundi) ryaratunganije ihiganwa ry'ama film mpuzamakungu na kavukire ryamaze imisi umunani. Filme zose zahiganywe zari 54, hakaba haranatanzwe n'ubushimwe butandukanye. Icibonekeje n'uko, n'aho hakiri ibibazo vyinshi, hariho ishaka ku barundi benshi na cane cane ku rwaruka ryo guhurumbira kwandika no gukina ama filime. Abasanzwe bakina amafilime barishize hamwe bagira n'ishirahamwe bahurikiyemwo bise COPRODAC (Collectif des Professionnels pour le Développement de l'Audiovisuel et du Cinéma). Cinema y'umurundi yamenyekanye cane no ku rwego mpuzamakungu ni Gito, yaronse ubushimwe bwinshi cane butandukanye no mu bihugu bitandukanye, ikaba yanditswe na Léonce Ngabo, isohoka mu 1992. Ubu Léonce Ngabo ariko arahumura, ariko hari abasore n'inkumi bashaka kumukorera mu ngata. Bazobishobora? Habura iki kugira Uburundi buje ku rwego rw'ibindi bihugu dusangiye akarere mu vyerekeye amafilime? Hokorwa iki kugira abakinyi b'amafilme bashike kure? Igihugu cohungukira iki? Ivyo ni vyo bibazo tugiye guca hirya no hino muri kino kiganiro. Muri kino kiganiro rero twari kuba hamwe na Batungwanayo Richard ajejwe igisata c'akaranga mu bushikiranganji bujejwe imigenderanire y'akarere ka Afrika y'ubuseruko (EAC), ariko ntiyitavye. Turi kumwe na Léonce Ngabo yashinze akaba ari na we anarongoye ishirahamwe FESTICAB, akaba ari umwanditsi n'umukinyi wa filime. Diane Kaneza arongoye ishirahamwe COPRODAC, akaba yananonosoye ivyigwa bijanye na cinema, akaba mbere ari na we yatahukanye agashimwe ka mbere k'ihiganwa rya mbere rya FESTICAB. Hanyuma kandi turi kumwe n'umwigeme Fanny Faxine Uwimana aheruka kuronka agashimwe k'umukinyi mwiza muri filime yiwe yise Urugendo. Muri studio za BBC i Nairobi mukaba mugiye kuba hamwe na Cyriaque Muhawenayo.

headline: Faustin Twagiramungu ariyama abamwiyitirira kuri Twitter
text: Uyu munsi umunyapolitiki w'Umunyarwanda, Faustin Twagiramungu, utuye mu Bubiligi, yaduhamagaye atubwira ko hari abafunguye konti ku rubuga nkoranyambaga rwa Twitter bamwiyitirira. Ngo muri zimwe mu nkuru ziyiriho harimo ivuga ko yamagana BBC Gahuzamiryango ngo kubera ko ari abahemu bateranya. Twagiramungu yatubwiye ko iyo nkuru ari ikinyoma kirimo gukwizwa n'abantu ataramenya. Bwana Twagiramungu yavuganye na Jacques Niyitegeka, atangira amusobanurira uko yabimenye. (Ushobora kumva ikiganiro bagiranye aho hejuru)

headline: Australia: Indirimbo z'inyoni zasumbije ibihangange mu muziki
text: Urukurikirane rw'umuziki (album) rugizwe n'amajwi y'inyoni zigeramiwe no kuzimangana zizwiragira muri Australia rwashizwe muri zitanu za mbere  ku rutonde rwa  Aria muri ico gihugu. Uru rukurikirane rwiswe Songs of Disappearance (twogereranya n'Indirimbo z'izimangana ) rwasumbije ibihangange nka Abba na The Weeknd - tutavuze abaririmvyi Michael Bublé na Mariah Carey bakunzwe cane mu ndirimbo za Noël/Christmas. Uru rukurikirane rwakozwe n'ikompanyi BirdLife Australia rurimwo indirimbo z'inyoni ziri mu bwoko 53 bugeramiwe no kuzimangana gusumba ubundi muri Australia. Mu kwegeranya aya majwi, vyafata amasaha atari make barindiriye mw'ishamba kugira ngo bashobore gufata akajwi kamwe gusa. David Stewart asanzwe afata amajwi y'ibikoko vyo mw'ishamba, yari amaze imyaka irenga 30 yose yegeranya amajwi y'ibikoko vyo mw'ishamba adakunze kwumvikana muri Australia. Amajwi y'inyoni yashoboye gufata niyo yakoreshejwe mu gutegura uru rukurikirane. Igihe rusohoka, hari ku wa 03 z'uku kwa cumi na kabiri, haciye haba isekeza ku mbuga hwaniro kugira ngo uru rukurikirane rushobore kugurishwa mu ndirimbo za Aria - kandi ryagenze neza. Songs of Disappearance rukoze amateka adasanzwe mu kuba urukurikirane rwa mbere rw'ubu bwoko rushizwe mu ndirimbo zitanu za mbere. Amafaranga azova mw'igurishwa ryarwo azoshirwa mu mugambi wo kubungabunga ibidukikije w'ikigo BirdLife Australia. Umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa wa BirdLife Australia, Paul Sullivan, yabwiye ikimenyeshamakuru The Music Network ati: "Uru rukurikirane ni ikintu kidasanzwe, rurimwo amajwi y'inyoni zishobora guhona mu gihe tutoja hamwe ngo tuzikingire". Yongera ko ati: "N'ubwo iri ari isekeza ryo kwinezereza, harimwo ibintu bikomeye mu vyo turiko turakora, kandi biratera intege kubona ingene abakunda inyoni bariko barereka amareta n'abikorera utwabo ingene abanya-Australia bitwararitse izi nyoni ngirakamaro". Ica gatandatu c'inyoni za Australia zirageramiwe no guhona, nk'uko biri mu cigwa cakozwe n'ishure kaminuza Charles Darwin University - ni ukuvuga ubwoko bw'inyoni 216 mu bwoko 1299. Iki cigwa, cakozwe n'abahinga mu bijanye n'inyoni barenga 300, cerekana ko ihindagurika ry'ibihe ririko riratuma ubwoko bwinshi bugenda buzimangana. Imiriro y'ivyaduka yo mu 2019 na 2020 yarasambuye aho zari zisanzwe ziba, BirdLife Australia ikavuga ko igitigiri c'ubwoko bw'inyoni zigeramiwe no guhona ciyongereye gushika ku rugero rwa 25%.

headline: Nta Mwuga Udakiza: BBC iganira n'umunyamideli Girumuco Téline Féerie
text: Nta Mwuga Udakiza ni ikiganiro BBC Gahuzamiryango yageneye urwaruka rwihangira imirimo mu bisanzwe itamenyerewe. Muri iki kiganiro, Cyriaque Muhawenayo aganira n'umunyamideli Girumuco Téline Féerie. Nta Mwuga Udakiza ni ikiganiro c'uruhererekane (Series) kizajya gihita kuri radio buri wa gatatu, no ku rubuga rwa BBC Gahuzamiryango. BBC Gahuzamiryango ihaye ikaze ibitekerezo vyanyu kuri iki kiganiro.

headline: Mireille Kamikazi, umushakashatsi arwanya indwara zandukira nk'igituntu
text: Mireille Kamikazi, Umurundikazi aba muri USA akora ubushakashatsi ku ndwara zandukira nka Sida, igituntu n'izindi... Aha yiganirira BBC ingene yashitse kuri urwo rwego.

headline: US: Umwishongozi Maya Angelou abaye umwiraburekazi wa mbere ashizwe kw'ifaranga
text: Igisata kijejwe ikigega ca Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika cakoze ibiceri biriko umwishongozi (poet) Maya Angelou - uyu akaba ari we mwiraburekazi wa mbere ashizwe ku kingorongoro c'isenti 25 ca Amerika, kizwi nk'ikuta (quarter). Angelou, umwishongozi akaba yarahanira agateka ka zina muntu, ni we yabaye umugore wa mbere w'umwirabure yanditse amazina y'ubuhizi yongera arayivuga mu birori vyo kwimika umukuru w'igihugu. Ibiceri vyategekanirijwe abandi bagore bakoze ibidasanzwe, nka kimwe mu mugambi wa Amerika wo gushira ku biceri abagore bagize ico bamara muri kahise wiswe American Women Quarters, AWQ. Iyi ngingo yarashimishije cane umunyamabanga wa mbere w'umugore muri ico gihugu ajejwe ikigega. Janet Yellen agira ati: "Igihe cose dusubiyemwo ifaranga ryacu, dufite amahirwe yo kugira ico tuvuga ku gihugu cacu - ico duha agaciro, ndetse n'uko twagiye dutera intambwe nk'umuryango". Angelou - umwanditsi akongera akaba n'uwaharanira agateka ka zina muntu - yasandavye mu 2014 afise imyaka 86. Yagiye kumenyekana cane igihe yandika kahise k'ubuzima bwiwe mu 1969, mu gitabo yise I Know Why the Caged Bird Sings (twogereranya na Ndazi igituma inyoni iboshe iririmba), aho yavuga ku buzima bwiwe akiri umwana mu karere ka Deep South. Yahawe impapuro z'umutsindo z'icubahiro zitari nke akaba yanditse ibitabo birenga 30 vyaguzwe cane. Mu 2010, yahawe umudari w'iteka wa Prezida, ( Presidential Medal of Freedom ) - agashimwe ka gisivire karengeye ubundi bwose muri Amerika  - yahawe na Barack Obama. Iki giceri gishasha cerekana Angelou yuguruye kandi aramvuye amaboko. Inyuma yiwe hari inyoni iguruka n'izuba riserutse, ibimenyetso vyiwe "nk'umwishongozi n'ingene yabayeho", nk'uko bivugwa n'igisata kijejwe ikigega ca Amerika. Uruhande rw'imbere rw'iki kingorongoro rwerekana igishusho ca George Washington, umukuru w'igihugu wa mbere wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Ikigo kijejwe gukora amafaranga (US Mint) gitegekanya gukora ibiceri bindi 20 vy'amakuta mu myaka ine iri imbere, bizokwerekana abandi bagore ba Amerika bagize uruhara rudasanzwe muri kahise k'igihugu. Muri kino gihe, imigambi yo gusubiriza Perezida Andrew Jackson ku noti y'amadorari 20 ikamusubiriza n'umwiraburekazi Harriet Tubman yarwanije ubucakara  - yanakijije abantu bari bagizwe abacakara abicishije mu ciswe Underground Railroad - iracariko iratunganywa. Si abagore benshi bagize uruhara muri kahise bagiye bashirwa kw'ifaranga rya Amerika.

headline: Andrew Forrest: Umutunzi ruhebwa agiye kuburanya ikigo Facebook
text: Umutunzi ruhebwa w'umunya Australia yashengeje ikigo Facebook yemeza ko cakoze icaha co kunanirwa gukinga ubutumwa butari ubw'ukuri bwo kwerekana ibidandazwa hakoreshejwe ifoto yiwe. Andrew Forrest avuga ko Facebook yarenze ku mategeko ahana gutunga amafranga adaca mu nzira z'ukuri mu gukwiragiza ifaranga rikorera ku mihora ya internet bita cryptocurrency. Yavuze ko bubaye ubwambere Facebook ishengejwe ku caha nk'ico kw'isi. Ikigo Meta gifise facebook ntaco cavuze ku majambo ya  Forrest ariko cashikirije ko ciyemeje gukura abo bantu ku mbuga zaco. Dr. Forrest asanzwe ari umuyobozi mukuru w'ikigo cimba ubutare Fortescue Metals, yemeza ko Facebook "yakoze icaha co gufata ibintu minenerwe" mu kutagwanya bikomeye ubutumwa butari ubw'ukuri, bwatanguye kwibonekeza mu ntango yo mu 2019. Abatanga ubutumwa bw'ubudandaji butaribwo kuri internet bakoresheje ifoto yiwe - n'ayandi y'abantu bazwi cane kw'isi - mu gukabura abashora imitahe babemerera kuronka ubutunzi. Naho ikigo facebook cabujije abakwiragiza ubutumwa nk'ubwo, hari bwinshi bukiboneka kuri uwo muhora. Dr Forrest yongeye avuga ko yandikiye ikete ryuguruye umuyobozi wa Facebook Mark Zuckerberg mu kwezi kwa 11 mu 2019, amusaba gufata izindi ngamba. Uyo mutunzi ruhebwa mu gisata c'ubutare yagize ku musi wa kane mu rwandiko yasohoye ati: ''Mfise amakenga y'abantu b'abanya Australia bariko barahendwa n'ababakabura ku butumwa buca ku mihora ngurukana-bumenyi''. Yongeye agira ati: ''Ndiko mvugira abanya Australia ariko biriko biba kw'isi yose''. Urwo rubanza ruzosasa muri sentare iri mu burengero bwa Australia italiki 28 z'ukwa 3. Nirwagenda neza ikigo Facebook gishobora kurihishwa amafranga canke gisabwe guhindura ingene kumenyekanisha ibintu bikorwa. Dr Forrest yarungitse n'urwandiko rw'ukuburanya muri Amerika muri Leta ya California, ahasanzwe hari ikigo gikuru ca Facebook. Ikinyamakuru The Australian cavuze ko muri urwo rwandiko rw'ukuburanya Facebook, yemeje ko "isanzwe izi inyungu ikura" muri uru rukurikirane rw'abatanga ubutumwa kuri internet butari ubw'ukuri kandi biteye kubiri n'amategeko. Kivuga bimwe mu biri mu nyandiko zo kuburanisha, ico kinyamakuru cavuze ko Forrest yashikirije ko umwe mu batakaje amafranga yabo muri Australia yavuze ko yatakaje amadollar ibihumbi 670, bitewe n'uko Facebook yateye intege abatanga ubutumwa butaribwo. Mu rwandiko yarungikiye ibinyamakuru, Facebook yavuze ko ubutumwa butari ubw'ukuri bwo kuri internet buteye kubiri n'amategeko yayo. Uwuserikiye Meta yagize ati: ''Dukoresha uburyo bwinshi mu guhagarika ubutumwa butaribwo bwo kuri internet, ntidukora gusa mu gutahura no guhagarika ubutumwa nk'ubwo, ahubwo turanabahagarika ku mihora yacu, tukabajana muri sentare mu gihe tuguma dukomeza amategeko yacu''.

headline: Uwutembereza Bulldog za Lady Lady Gaga yarashwe nazo ziribwa
text: Imbwa zibiri zo mu bwoko bwa bulldog zo mu Bufaransa za Lady Gaga zaribwe ku wa gatatu, inyuma y'aho umuntu yitwaje inkoho arasiye uwari asanzwe azitembereza i Hollywood muri Los Angles. Umugabo akekwa yarasishije  inkoho yo mu ntoki uwutembereza imbwa, w'izina rya Ryan Fischer nk'uko biri mu binyamakuru vyo muri Amerika, imbere y'uko atungwa n'ayo yameze n'izo mbwa. Uwarashwe yajanywe kwa muganga atawuzi uko amerewe, nk'uko igipolisi ca Los Angeles cabibwiye BBC. Lady Gaga yemeye agashimwe k'uwomugarukanira imbwa ziwe, Koji na Gustav. Bulldog igira gatatu, yitwa Miss Asia yarirutse mu nyuma itorwa n'abapolisi. Gaga, ubundi izina ryiwe ry'ukuri ari Stefani Germanottay, ubu ari i Roma akora  cinema nshasha ya Ridley Scott,Gucci. Uwumuserukira ku binyamakuru yavuze ko umuntu wese yoba afise inkuru y'ahoba hari izo bulldog yobimenyesha kuri email KojiandGustav@gmail.com ata ''bibazo bibajijwe". Igipolisi ca Los Angeles cemeje ko kiriko kirarondera umuntu ''ashobora kuba yikekwa'' yavuye aho vyabereye mu muduga wera mw'ibarabara rya North Sierra Bonita Avenue aja Hollywood Boulevard. Ntibizwi neza niba imbwa za Lady Gaga zari zigambiriwe vy'umwihariko muri ico gitero. Bulldog zo mu Bufaransa n'ubwoko buronderwa cane muri Amerika, ikibunda kimeze neza kikaba kigurwa  ama dolari 2000 ufatiye hagati na hagati. Gaga arazwi  kuba akingira cane imbwa ziwe zamuherekeje  mu birori vya  American Music Awards no mu giteramo ciwe ca Super Bowl mu 2017. Imwe muri zo, Miss Asia, mbere go iranafise urubuga ruzwi kuri Instagram.

headline: UK: Umuganga yankiwe gutanga amaraso 'kubera umugore wiwe ari umunyafrika'
text: Umuganga w'umunyakenya ari mu Bwongereza avuga ko hari itegeko "ridafise ishingiro" rimubuza gutanga amaraso kubera yubakanye n'umugore wiwe w'umunyakenya. Francis Gĩthae Murĩithi asaba ko aya mategeko ahinduka kugira ngo batere intege abirabure bumve ko nabo bashobora gutanga amaraso. Amategeko y'igisata kijejwe amagara y'abantu mu Bwongereza, NHS, avuga ko kizira ku bantu bubakanye canke baryamana n'umuntu yiketswe ko ashobora kuba yararyamanye n'abantu bo mu bihugu birwiriyemwo umugera wa SIDA, harimwo "ibihugu hafi vyose vya Afrika", ko batanga amaraso. Dr Murĩithi, asanzwe ari umuhinga  mu bijanye n'ivyo kuvyaza abagore hamwe n'indwara z'abagore mu karere ka East Midlands, avuga ko we n'umugore wiwe bamaranye imyaka indwi bubakanye kandi badaharikanye. Nk'umuganga, avuga ko yamye yipimisha kuva yubakanye n'umugore wiwe kandi ko ata mugera afise. Ariko avuga ko yabwiye y'uko ashobora gutanga amaraso mu gihe gusa umugore wiwe yopimwa umugera wa SIDA n'igisata kijejwe kwakira amaraso co nyene, canke naho bakabanza kumara ikiringo c'amezi atatu badakora amabanga mpuzabitsina. Avuga ko umugore wiwe yari amaze gupimwa n'abaganga b'igisata NHS igihe yari yibungenze, kandi ko atamugera bamusanzemwo, ariko igihe yashaka gutanga amaraso, yabwiwe ko ibi badashobora kubifatirako. Uyu Mukenya w'imyaka 38 ubu asanzwe aba mu karere ka Gamston, Nottinghamshire, afise amaraso adakunze kuboneka AB+, akavuga ati: "Iyi ni inzitizi idafise ishingiro ku gikorwa co gutanga amaraso". "Mu gihe wankira abantu nkanje, hanyuma ukabandanya kuvuga ngo Abanyafrika ntibitabira ibikorwa vyo gutanga amaraso, bizotuma Abanyafrika tugira isura mbi kandi ari amategeko atatworohereza". "Sinshaka kuboneka ko nteye uruhagarara, ariko integuro ya NHS yo gutanga amaraso ikeneye gusubirwamwo kugira ngo ishobore kwakira abantu benshi". "Ndashima ko bariko barayisubiramwo, kuko ni nkenerwa ko umuntu arabwa ku giti ciwe". Igisata NHS cama gitera akamo abirabure kugira ngo bashobore gutanga amaraso kuko hari amahirwe menshi y'uko usanga bafise amaraso y'ubwoko budakunze kuboneka. Kivuga ko kiriko kirihweza ikibazo ca Dr Murĩithi gifatiye ku bipimo vyakorewe umugore wiwe bagasanga nta mugera afise. Su Brailsford, umuhinga muri NHS, avuga ko  amategeko asigura ko abantu kanaka bashobora  canke badashobora gutanga amaraso yashizweho hisunzwe impanuro z'abahinga mu ntumbero yo gukingira bene kuyahabwa. Avuga ko bategura kwihweza neza aya mategeko imbere y'uko uyu mwaka urangira kugira go bashobore kwugururira imiryango abantu benshi nka  Dr Murĩithi kugira ngo bashobore gutanga amaraso ata ngorane.

headline: Covid: Iran yatanguye kugerageza urucanco rwayo
text: Ibinyamakuru vyo mu gihugu ca Iran bimenyesha ko ico gihugu catanguye kugerageza urucanco cihinguriye. Tayebeh Mokhber, umukobwa w'umutegetsi wo mu rwego rwo hejuru, Mohammad Mokhber, yabaye uwa mbere atewe urwo rucanco rwitwa Cov-IranBlessing ku musi wa kabiri. Ku mboneshakure ya reta, umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu Saeed Namaki yavuze ati:"Ubu n'ubutumwa ku banye Iran ko dufitiye icizeye umuti tuzotera abanyagihugu bacu, kandi ko no mu gihe hoba ikibazo, twese hamwe n'imiryango yacu tuzovyakira." Hagati aho, Mokhber yavuze ko ico gihugu gishobora guhingura incanco imiliyoni 1.5 zokoreshwa buri kwezi mu ndwi zike. Abanye Iran hafi 55.000 baramaze guhitanwa na coronavirus kuva ico kiza giteye - igitigiri kiri hejuru cane mu karere ko mu burasirazuba bwo hagati - mu gihe abarenga imiliyoni 1.2 banduye iyo ngwara. Abategetsi ba Iran bagumye bavuga ko ibihano vya Amerika ari intambamyi kuri ico gihugu mu kugura incanco za coronavirus, n'aho ivyo bihano bisanzwe bitaraba imiti n'ubutabazi. Igihugu ca Iran cariyandikishije mu mugambi wa Covax w'ishami rya Onu rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi WHO/OMS, ushinzwe gutanga incanco kw'isi yose.

headline: Amenyo yabo yarononekaye kubera ubutare bwa fluoride
text: Aba badamu bo mu ntara ya Arusha mu Tanzania bafise ingorane batewe n'ukwononekara kw'amenyo yabo kubera kunywa amazi arimwo ubutare bwinshi bwa fluoride.

headline: Coronavirus: Ni iki kiriko kiraba ku banyafrika mu Bushinwa?
text: Mu ntango z'indwi iheze, haradutse ibihuha bitagira ifatiro ko uturere tw'Abanyafrika  twabaye ikiririmbiro rishasha rya coronavirus mu gisagara ca Guangzhou mu Bushinwa. Haciye akanya gato, abajejwe amagara y'abantu baciye baca ku nzu ku nzu bapima abimukira b'Abanyafrika. Abapangishije amazu hamwe na bene amahoteri bamaze kwirukana Abanyafrika amajana n'amajana. Abenshi muri bo, harimwo n'abaserukira abandi, bashizwe ku nguvu mu bibanza vyateguwe gushirwamwo abiketswe ko banduye n'aho baba bapimwe bagasanga ntibanduye. Abaharurwa  mu majana muri kino gihe bari mu kangaratete mu gihe hari ubwoba ko ibisagara bimwe bimwe nka Guangzhou bishobora gusubira kwizizirwa n'ico kiza. Abaserukira ibihugu bitari bike vya Afrika mu Bushinwa  baramaze kwandikira umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire w'ico gihugu bamumenyesha akababaro kabo kuri "iryo nenwa n'ivangura". Ku wa gatandatu uheze, ibiro vy'ubuserukizi bw'u Bushinwa muri Zimbabwe bwarahakanye ivyo vyagirizwa igihugu ciwe mu butumwa bwaciye ku rubuga rwa twitter biti: "Ubushinwa bufata abantu bose mu gihugu, baba Abashinwa canke abanyamahanga, ku rugero rumwe". Igisagara ca Guangzhou  nico carimwo Abanyafrika benshi ku mugabane wa Aziya gushika mu mpera za 2000, ariko mu myaka itanu irangiye ibitigiri vy'abanyafrika baba muri ico gisagara vyagiye bigabanuka. Benshi bavuga ko bama bahura n'ibibazo vy'ivangura, bakimwa impapuro z'inzira, eka bakabuzwa no gukora ibikorwavy'ukwiyungunganya. Hari bamwe bavuga ko ubu vyabaye ngombwa ko baja mu kinyegero. Mu gihe u Bushinwa bwari buherutse gutangaza ko bwiganzuye umugera wa coronavirus, buvuga ko hari abasubiye kwibonekeza banduye. Hagati aho abenshi muri bo bavugwa ko ari Abashinwa batashe bavuye mu mahanga. Ejo ku wa Mungu, leta y'ico gihugu yamenyesheje ko hari bashasha bashika 108 bari banduye.

headline: Africa - Covid: AU yatanguye gutanga miriyoni 400 z'incanco
text: Ishirahamwe ry'ibihugu vya Afrika AU/UA  (African Union/Union Africaine) ryatanguye gutanga incanco zingana na miriyoni 400 ku bihugu birigize, nk'uko vyatangajwe n'umukuru wa Afrika y'Epfo, Cyril Ramaphosa. Ibihugu vyinshi kuri uyu wa kane niho vyari vyiteze kuronswa izo ncanco zizoja zirazanwa buri kwezi. Ihangiro rya UA n'ugutanga incanco miriyoni 25 buri kwezi gushika mu kwezi kwa mbere. Ibihugu bigize iryo shirahamwe vyumvikanye mu kwezi kwa gatatu gushira hamwe ububasha bwavyo bwo kugura no kuronderera hamwe aho bigurira. Vyaciye bihitamwo kugura urucanco rwa Johnson & Johnson,  intambwe yanyuma yo guhingura urwo rucanco ikaba ibera muri Africa y'Epfo. Prezida Cyril Ramaphosa yavuze ati: "Iyi ni intanbwe ikomeye cane mu nguvu Afrika iriko irashira mu kubungabunga amagara no kubaho neza kw'abantu bayo. "Ibi bizokwongereza ingoga mu kurwanya Covid-19 ku mugabane wa Afrika bibe n'umushinge w'uko Afrika yivyukiranya mu butunzi no mu mibereho." Urugero rw'abamaze kuronka incanco muri Afrika ruri inyuma cane ugereranije n'iyindi migabane y'isi. Umukuru wa Afrika y'Epfo n'abandi bategetsi ba Afrika bagirije ibihugu bitunze gusumba kwigungirako incanco. Izo ncanco miriyoni 400 zitezwe kuzoba zihagije kugira hakingirwe ica gatatu c'abantu baba ku mugabane wa Afrika gutyo Afrika icagatize  ihangiro ryo gucandaga nibura 60% vy'abayigize, nk'uko bivugwa na AU.

headline: Uburusiya burahakana ivyo bwagirizwa vyo kwiba ubuhinga bw’urucanco rwa Coronavirus
text: Uwuserukira Uburusiya mu Bwongereza ariyamiriza ibivugwa ko inzego zijejwe igendereza z'igihugu ciwe  zagerageje kwiba ubuhinga bwo guhingura urucanco rwa coronavirus. Mu kiganiro yagiranye n'umunyamakuru wa BBC, Andrew Marr,  Andrei Kelin yavuze ati: "Ivyo ntavyo nemera, ibi ni ibinyoma gusa". Ku wa kane, inzego zijejwe umutekano z'Ubwongereza zatangaje ko hari abariko bagerageza kwiba ubuhinga bw'ugukora urucanco, kandi ko "ata nkeka" ko "ari abakozi b'igisata c'igendereza c'Uburusiya". Bwana Kelin yaboneyeho n'akanya ko guhakana ibivugwa ko Uburusiya bwivanze muri politike y'Ubwongereza. Mu ntango z'ino ndwi, umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire w'u Bwongereza, Dominic Raab, yavuze ko ata nkeka ko Abarusiya barondeye kwivanga mu matora yo mu 2019 mu muri ico gihugu bakoresheje impapuro za magendo. Bwana Kelin yavuze ati: "Twebwe ntavyo twivangamwo. Nta kamaro twe tubibonamwo kuko kuri twebwe umugambwe uwo ari wo wose woba uri ku butegetsi, tuzokwama twihatira gukomeza imigenderanire gusumba uko imeze ubu". Ayo majambo ashikirijwe hasigaye iminsi mike ngo hasohoke  icegeranyo cagiriza Uburusiya ko civanze cane  mu biraba intwaro mu Bwongereza, kikaba gitegekanijwe gushikirizwa n'umurwi w'abashingamateka ujejwe igendereza n'umutekano. Ikigo c'igihugu kijejwe umutekano ku mbuga nyabwonko (NCSC) kivuga ko cizeye ku bice 95% ko umurwi w'abo barusiya, uzwi nka The Dukes canke Cozy Bear, uri mu bagize inzego z'igendereza z'Uburusiya. Abajijwe nimba ivyo ari vyo, Bwana Kelin ntiyashotse yishura, akavuga ahubwo ati: "Ivy'uyu murwi nabimenyeye mu binyamakuru vy'Ubwongereza". Ati: "Kuri ino si, gufata ibijanye n'ubusuma buca mu mashini nyabwonko ukavyagiriza igihugu ico ari co cose, ntibishoboka". Abandanya avuga ko Uburusiya ata "nyungu" bubona mu kurondera kumenya ibijanye n'ibiriko birakorwa mu mugambi wo gukora urucanco. Avuga ko uruganda rukora imiti mu Burusiya R-Pharm rumaze kugiriranira amasezerano yo gukorera hamwe n'urundi ruganda AstraZeneca mu gukora urucanco rwa coronavirus ruriko rurahingurwa muri kaminuza ya Oxford, mu gihe vyoboneka ko harimwo akarusho. Ku bindi yavuze, Bwana Kelin yavuze ko abayobozi b'Uburusiya bariko bihweza ibijanye n'amatora ya kamarampaka aherutse kuba muri iki gihugu, bakavuga ko babonye "ibitero vyinshi ku mbuga nyabwonko" bituruka ku butaka bw'Ubwongereza. Haraciye indwi zibiri Uburusiya bwemeje impinduka zikomeyemw'ibwirizwashingiro, zirimwo ingingo zibuza kwubakana hagati y'abahuje ibitsina, ndetse zigatuma Perezida Vladimir Putin ashobora kuguma ku butegetsi gushika mu 2036. Bwana Kelin yashimangiye ko Uburusiya "butagiriza u Bwongereza nk'igihugu" ko bwagize uruhara mu bitero vy'ubuhinga nyabwonko kandi ko  igihugu ciwe kitashatse kubigira birebire.

headline: Umugera wa Marburg ni iki, wokwirindwa gute?
text: Abantu babiri muri Ghana baramaze gupfa bahitanywe n’umugera wa Marburg – mu gihe 98 bashyizwe ukwabo – ivyatumye haduka ubwoba ko hashobora kwaduka ikiza gikomeye c’iyi ndwara yandukira cane, itera ubushuhe, kubabara imitsi, gucibwamwo, kudahwa hanyuma, akenshi, gupfa kubera gutakaza amaraso menshi. Umugera wegeranye cane n’uwa Ebola, nk’uko ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y’abantu ribivuga, Marburg watanguye kwibonekeza igihe abantu 31 bawanduriye hanyuma indwi bagapfa mu biza vyakurikiranye mu 1967 muri: Iki kiza basanze cazananye mu nkende zinjijwe mu gihugu zivuye muri Uganda. Ariko kuva ico gihe, uwu mugera wagiye uca no mu bindi bikoko. Hanyuma mu bantu, wandukira uciye ku bantu bamaze ibihe binini mu masenga (ubuvumo mu Kinyarwanda) no mu binogo bicukurwamwo ubutare bisanzwe bituwemwo n’ubuhungarema (uducurama mu Kinyarwanda). Ni bwo bwa mbere ibonetse muri Ghana – ariko hari ibindi bihugu vya Afrika umugera wigeze kubonekamwo, harimwo: Mu 2005 uwu mugera warateye ikiza cahitanye abantu barenga 300. Ariko i Bulaya, umuntu umwe ni we wenyene amaze gupfa mu myaka 40 iheze  - hamwe n’uwundi muri Amerika, yari avuye mu masenga yo muri Uganda. Vyavuye muri OMS/ WHO Uwu mugera utangura bukwi na bukwi (giturumbuka); Haciye imisi itatu, akenshi haca hakurikira: OMS ivuga iti: "Kuri uru rugero, abantu babona umuntu yanduye umengo ni ‘umuzimu’, amaso agacokera, isura igahinduka, agacika inkokora cane”. Abantu benshi baca batangura kuva amaraso mu bice  bitandukanye vy’umubiri, bakavamwo bagasandaba haciye imisi icenda kuva batanguye kurwara, kubera gutakaza amaraso menshi no kudadarara. Ugereranije, uwu mugera wica inusu y’abawanduye, nk’uko OMS ibivuga, ariko aho vyari bikomeye cane wahitanye gushika ku 88% vy’abanduye. Agahungarema ko mu Misiri karya ivyamwa akenshi niko kabitse uwu mugera. Inkende zo muri Afrika n’ingurube nazo nyene zirashobora kugendana uwu mugera. Mu bantu, ukwirakwira uciye mu mazimazi y’uruhu no kwisasira ivyandujwe uwu mugera. Eka mbere n’iyo boba bamaze gukira, amaraso yabo canke intanga, nk’akarorero, bishobora kwanduza abandi inyuma y’amezi atari make. Nta rucanco rwihariye canke imiti yihariye biraboneka. Ariko ibintu bitari bike biva mu maraso, imiti hamwe n’ubuvuzi bwo kwongerereza inguvu umubiri (immunothérapie), biriko birakorwa, nk’uko OMS ibivuga. Hanyuma kandi n’abaganga barashobora kugabanya ubukari mu guha abarwayi ibintu vyinshi vyo kunywa no gusubiriza amaraso yatakaye. Gavi, ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu riteza imbere incanco, rivuga ko abantu muri Afrika bokwirinda kurya canke gukorakora inyama zo mw’ishamba. Abantu kandi bokwirinda gukorakora ingurube mu turere twadutsemwo ico kiza, nk’uko OMS ibivuga. Abantu bigeze kwandura uwu mugera, mu mibonano mpuzabitsina yabo bokoresha udukingirizo mu kiringo c’umwaka kuva batanguye kubona ibimenyetso canke gushika intanga zabo zipimwe incuro zibiri zikaboneka ko ata mugera zigifise. Hanyuma abahamba abantu bishwe n’uwu mugera bokwirinda gukorakora ikiziga.

headline: OMS isaba kwinjira muri Tigray 'vyihuta' gukiza ubuzima
text: A﻿bategetsi bo mw'ishami rya Onu rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi OMS/WHO  bavuga ko gushika mu buraruko bwa Ethiopia bikenewe vyihuta kugira bakize ubuzima bw'imiliyoni n'imiliyoni z'abantu batakigira ikintu na kimwe. I﻿ngwara z'ivyaduka nk'agasama na kolera ziravugwa mu turere twa Amhara na Afar, aho amashirahamwe atabara yabujijwe guhonyozayo ikirenge. M﻿uri Tigray, aho atawugerayo aciye mu kirere canke mw'ibarabara haraciye indwi umunani, OMS ntishobora kumenya ubwoko bw'ingwara bwadutseyo. A﻿riko abategetsi bavuga ko igikorwa co gucandaga ibibondo cahagaze kandi ko imiti imwe imwe nkenerwa yaheze. Amavuriro make adashika no kuri imwe kw'icumi ni yo agikora. H﻿ari kandi ubu, ubukene bw'ibifungurwa n'igitoro, aho hagereranywa ko ibice 89% vy'abanye Tigray badafise ivyo bafungura. abana na bo 29% bakaba bagwaye ingwara y'imirire mibi. M﻿uri Tigray, Amhara na Afar, Onu igereranya ko abantu imiliyoni 13 bakeneye imfashanyo. M﻿u ntango z'uku kwezi, uwurongoye ishirahamwe OMS, Dr Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus. aturuka mu ntara ya Tigray, yavuze ko "hasigaye akantu gato hakaba jenoside". K﻿u musi wa gatanu, abategetsi ba OMS n'aho batagarutse kuri ivyo, ariko bavuze ko gushika mu karere ka Tigray ari ikintu cihutirwa cane. Ibiganiro vy'amahoro hagati ya reta ya Ethioipia n'abategetsi ba Tigray vyaratanguye muri Afrika y'epfo muri iyi ndwi, ariko ntibirashika aho birekurira abatanga imfashanyo  kuja muri ako karere.

headline: Africa-Covid: OMS iragabisha ku bihugu biriko biratezura gucungera ico kiza
text: Ishirahamwe ryitaho amagara kw'isi OMS/WHO risaba kwiyubara cane mu gihe ibihugu  vyinshi vyo muri Afrika biriko biratezura ingingo zo kugenzura indwara ya Covid hamwe n'izo gushira ukwa bonyene abayanduye canke abinjiye bava hanze. Umuyobozi w'igisata ca Afrika muri OMS, Matshidiso Moeti,  yavugiye mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru ku buhinga bwa none ku wa kane ati: "N'ikibazo giteye impungene kubona hafi ica kabiri c'ibihugu vyose vyo muri Afrika vyahagaritse  kurondera abo bose baba bahuye n'abanduye Covid. "Ivyo hamwe no gukora ibipimo nyavyo, nivyo bigize umushinge wo guhangana vy'ukuri n'ikiza ico ari co cose". OMS ivuga ko vy'umwihariko biteye "impungenge ku mugabane ugifise gushika ubu urugero rwa mbere ruri hasi kw'isi rw'abamaze kuronka urucanco [rwa Covid]". OMS ivuga kandi ko kubera gusugerezwa n'ibibazo vyo kwugurura kugira ubutunzi busubire gukora,  ibihugu biriko biragabanya inguvu zo gucungera hamwe n'izindi ngingo. Uko kugabisha kwa OMS kuje mu gihe mu bindi  bice vy'isi, ibitigiri vy'ikwirakwira rya Covid vyasubiye kuduga cane. Dr Moeti avuga ati: "Kuvanaho ingingo abanyagihugu bahora basabwa kwubahiriza  mu gukingira amagara yabo bidasigura guhesha mu gucungera ico kiza". Abantu bashika miriyoni 201 ni ukuvuga 15% y'abantu baba muri Afrika nibo bamaze kuronka incanco zuzuye za Covid, aho ni mu gihe muri rusangi ahandi kw'isi bashika 57%.

headline: France yatoye umuntu wa mbere yanduye bwa bwoko bushasha bwa coronavirus
text: Ubufaransa bwemeje ko hari umuntu wa mbere yanduye ubwokobushasha bwa coronavirus bwandukira cane buherutse kwibonekeza mu Bwongereza. Ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu bw'Ubufaransa bumenyesha ko uyo muntu ari umufaransa asanzwe aba mu gisagara ca Tours kiri hagati mu gihugu, akaba  yari yavuye mu Bwongereza ku wa 19 z'uku kwa cumi na kabiri. Ubu bushikiranganji buvuga ko uyo muntu ata bimenyetso yerekana, kandi ko yishize ukwiwe muhira. Ubu bwoko bushasha bwa coronavirus yihinduye bwabonetse mu Bwongereza bwatumye ibihugu bitari bike bifata ingingo zo guhagarika uruja n'uruza n'ico gihugu. Ubufaransa bwari bwazibiye imbibe zabwo ariko ku wa gatatu bwarahagaritse iyo ngingo, gusa bugasaba ko abantu babanza gupimwa ko bakomeye imbere yo gufata ingendo. Abashoferi b'amakamyo baharurwa mu bihumbi baririye Noweri mu mamodoka yabo mu karere ka Kent barindiriye kwinjira mu Bufaransa. Uyu muntu yanduye ubu bwoko bundi bwa coronavirus yari yapimwe mu bitaro ku wa 21 z'uku kwa cumi na kabiri, nk'uko ubushikirangani bw'amagara y'abantu bubitangaza. Ubu bushikiranganji bwongerako y'uko uyu muntu ari Umufaransa asanzwe aba mu Bwongereza, ariko ko yumva ameze neza. Hari n'ibindi bihugu vyamaze gutangaza ko vyamaze guterwa n'ubu bwoko bushasha bw'uwu mugera: Ejo ku wa gatanu, Ubuyapani bwatangaje ko abantu batanu mu ngenzi zari zivuye mu Bwongereza  banduye. Aho ni mu gihe imbere y'aho ibihudu vya Danemark, Australia n'Ubuholande navyo nyene vyari vyamaze gutangaza ko uwo mugera wabishwayemwo. Abantu barenga imiriyoni zibiri n'igice nibo banduye Covi-19 mu Bufaransa kuva yadutse, ikaba yahitanye abarenga ibihumbi 62, bukaba bugira indwi kw'isi mu bihugu bifise ibitigiri binini vy'abanduye. Itororokanirizo ry'amakuru AFP rivuga ko ku wa gatandatu incanco za mbere za Pfizer-BioNTech ari ho zinjira mu gihugu zivuye mu Bubirigi. Vyitezwe ko aba mbere batangura gucandagwa kuri uyu wa Mungu mu bigo bibiri bitunze abatama vya Sevran na Dijon. Ubu bwoko bushasha bwa coronavirus bwatanguye kwibonekeza mu Bwongereza mu kwezi kw'icenda, bukavugwa ko ari bwo bwatumye ibitigiri vy'abandura i Londres, mu buseruko bw'Ubwongereza no mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko, vyiyongera ku buryo budasanzwe. Ikigo kijejwe imibare mu Bwongereza, ONS, kivuga ko bishokoka y'uko bibiri vya bitatu vy'abandura bafise kuba bafise ubu bwoko bushasha. Iyi coronavirus yihinduye iboneka ko ari ubwoko bushobora gukwirakwira ningoga kubera ingene bumeze. Hagati aho, nta cemeza ko ishobora kuba ikaze gusumba iyisanzwe ihari, ivyumvikana ko incanco ziherutse gukorwa zishobora gukora no kuri ubu bwoko, nk'uko abahinga babivuga. Ibihugu birenga 40 vyarahagaritse ingenzi zava mu Bwongereza mu ntango z'uku kwezi. Ingendo z'indege ziva mu Bwongereza zarahagaritswe mu bihugu bitari bike harimwo Espagne, Ubuhindi na hong Kong. Arabiya Sawudite, Omani na Koweiti vyovyo vyarageze kure, mu kwugara imbibe zavyo mu kiringo c'indwi yose.

headline: Umugabo yamugaye inyuma yo gucika uruti rw'umugongo yasubiye gutambuka, bamushizemwo icuma
text: Umugabo yamugaye inyuma y'aho uruti rw'umugongo rucikiye yashoboye gutambuka kandi, inyuma yo guterwa icuma gikoresha umuyagankuba cakozwe n'umurwi w'abashakashatsi bo mu Buswusi. Ni bwo bwa mbere umuntu yacitse rwose uruti rw'umugongo asubira gutambuka. Ni nabwo buhinga bwakoreshejwe mu gusubiza ubuzima uwundi muntu yari yamugaye gushika n'aho asubira kuvyara. Ubu bushakashatsi bwatangajwe mu kinyamakuru Nature Medicine gitangaza amakuru ajane n'ubushakashatsi mu vyo ubuvuzi. Michel Roccati yamugaye biturutse kw'isanganya ry'ipikipiki, imyaka itanu iraheze. Uruti rw'umugongo rwaracitse rwose - akaba ata n'utuguvu na dukeya yari afise mu maguru. Ariko ubu arashobora gutambura - kubera icuma gikoresha umuyagankura bometse mu ruti rw'umugongo. Nta muntu yagize imvune yo kuri uru rugero yari bwigere asubira gutambuka. Aba bashakashatsi bashimangira ko iki atari umuti w'imvune y'uruti rw'umugongo kandi ko ubu buhinga bukigoye cane ku buryo budashobora gukoreshwa mu buzima bwa misi yose, ariko bagashima cane ko ari intambwe ikomeye mu bijanye no gukomeza amagara y'uwamugaye. Narasanze Michel muri laboratoire yakorewemwo iki cuma. Yambwiye ati ubu buhinga ni "umugisha kuri jewe". "Ndahaguruka, nkagenda aho nshatse hose, ndashobora gutambuka ku ngazi - ni nk'aho ndi mu buzima busanzwe". Si ubu buhinga bwonyene bwatumye Michel atora mitende. Uyu musore w'umutaliyano yamye afise ishaka ryo gusubirana itoto. Yambwiye ko kuva igihe ahura n'iri sanganya, yagumye arondera ingene yotera imbere. "Nahora nkora umukino wo guterana ingumu, nkiruka, mbere ngakora imyimenyerezo ngororamubiri mu nzu y'ibikorwa ngororamubiri (gym). Ariko inyuma y'iri sanganya, sinashoboye gukora ibi bikorwa nakunda cane, ariko sinigeze ncika intege. Sinigeze mpagarika ibikorwa vyo kwisubiza itoto. Namye nshaka gutorera umuti ikibazo canje". Umuvuduko wa Michel mu kurondera gukira watangaje umuganga yamushizemwo ico cuma akaba n'umuhinga yafatanije intsinga z'iki cuma n'imitsi yiwe, Prof Jocelyne Bloch, wo muri Laboratoire de Neurothérapies et Neuromodulation - LNTM. Avuga ati: "Naratangaye cane. Michel ni igitangaza rwose. Yarashoboye gukoresha ubu buhinga agenda atera imbere, amera neza gusumba". Ubu bushakashatsi bwashigikiwe na Ram Hariharan, umuhinga mu bitaro Northern General Hospital biri i Sheffield ariko adakorana n'uyu murwi w'abashakashatsi, akaba avugira ishirahamwe Spinal Injuries Association. Ati: "Bakoze ikintu kitari bwigere gikorwa gushika ubu. "Si nari bwigere numva ubu buhinga, aho bashize icuma [mu murwayi yacitse rwose uruti rw'umugongo] gushika aho imitsi isubira gukora agashobora guhagarara no kugendagenda". Ariko yongerako y'uko hagikenewe ibikorwa vyinshi vyo kugerageza ubu buhinga kugira ngo yemere neza ko ari umuti nyawo. "Dukeneye ibiharuro vyinshi [vy'abarwayi] kugira ngo ubwa mbere tumenye ko ata ngorane butera hanyuma kandi ko bushobora koko guteza imbere amagara yabo. Ni ho dushobora kubushikana imbere." Imitsi y'uruti rw'umugongo niyo itwara amakuru iyavana mu bwonko ikayashikana mu maguru. Rero hari bamwe baca bamugara iyo iyi mitsi yononekaye mw'isanganya. Ku kibazo ca Michel, nta kimenyetso na kimwe gishika mu maguru kubera uruti rw'umugongo rwacitse rwose. Ariko iki cuma bamushizemwo kirashikana amakuru mu maguru bikamutuma ashobora gutambuka, ariko aho ni igihe iki cuma kiba cakije. Gushika ubu, abantu icenda gusa nibo bamaze guhabwa iki cuma bagasubirana ubushobozi bwo kugendagenda. Nta n'umwe muri bo agikoresha kugira ngo kimufashe gutembera mu buzima bwabo bwa misi yose - kubera gushika ubu kikigoye gukoresha. Ico bakora, bagikoresha mu kwimenyereza gutambuka - kugira ngo imitsi ntidadarare, kigakomeza amagara yabo. David M'zee ni umwe mu barwayi ba mbere bashizwemwo iki cuma. Nk'uko vyagenze kuri Michel, yarashoboye kugendagenda n'iki cuma ariko akoreshejeje ico yishimikiza. Amagara ya David yarateye imbere ku buryo yashoboye no kuvyarana n'umugore wiwe Janine umwana w'umwigeme, ibitashoboka inyuma y'isanganya yagize mu 2010. Umukobwa wiwe,  Zoe, ubu afise umwaka umwe. Igihe nari kumwe nabo, yarasiganywe na se wiwe akoresheje n'icishimikizo c'umwana yaryohewe cane abonye asize se wiwe. N'umunezero mwinshi nka se w'umwana, avuga ati: "Ni ukuri ni ibintu bihimbaye cane". "Ni ibintu biryoshe cane. Ni bwo bwa mbere njanye na we nk'uku - akoresha icishimikizo nk'umwana, nanje ngakoresha icishimikizo canje". Kugira umuryango vyahaye David umunezero udasanzwe. Kandi iki cuma kiramufasha bukebuke, ariko mu buryo budasanzwe. "Kiramfasha cane mu kugenzura ivuduka ry'umurindi w'amaraso. Ni ingorane maranye igihe kirekire. Ubwa mbere sinashotse ndayibona. Nama numva uburuhe igihe cose". "Igihe tumenya ko iki cuma gishobora gutuma umurindi w'amaraso wongerekana, twagize tuti 'Ohooo, niko bimeze mu buzima!'" Yambwiye ati: "Utu tuntu duto duto ni two dutuma ibintu bihinduka". Haracari urugendo rutari ruto kugira ngo ubu buhinga bushobore gukoreshwa mu buryo busanzwe mu gufasha abafise ubumuga gutembera, nk'uko bivugwa na Prof Grégoire Courtine ari na we yari arongoye uyu murwi watoye ubu buhinga kw'ishure ry'ubuhinga École Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne (EPFL). "Uwu si umuti ku mvune y'uruti rw'umugongo. Ariko ni intambwe idasanzwe mu gukomeza ubuzima bw'abantu. Tugiye guha abantu ubushobozi. Tugiye kubaha ubushobozi bwo guhagarara, kugendagenda. Ibi ntibikwiye, ariko ni intambwe idasazwe". Umuti kwoba ari ugusubiza itoto uruti rw'umugongo, kumbure mu kuvura imitsi yacitse, ibi navyo bikaba bikiri ku rugero rwo hasi cane mu bushakashatsi. Prof Courtine yemeza ko iki cuma gikoreshwa muri ubu buhinga gishobora kuzokoreshwa mu buryo bwo kuvura iyi mitsi mu gihe cotangura gukoreshwa ica kera.

headline: Inyishu ya Ministre Martin Nivyabandi ku mugwi wa ONU vya coronavirus
text: Inyishu ya Ministre Martin Nivyabandi ku mugwi wa ONU ujejwe agateka ka muntu ku vya coronavirus

headline: Abagabo muri Kenya binjiye mu rugamba rwo kurwanya ikebwa ry'abakobwa
text: Kugabisha: Hari bamwe bashobora gusanga bimwe mu vyanditswe muri ino nkuru biteye ubwoba John nyashobora kwibuka neza igihe na kimwe yoba yaranguye imibonano mpuzabitsina n'umugore wiwe ntaheze umugore atari mu marira. Yarababara cane kubera yari yarakebwe (mutilation genitale feminine/female genital mutilation), ibizwi nka FGM mu mpfunyapfunyo y'icongereza. Uyu mugabo w'imyaka 40 agira ati: "Igihe cose ngize ngo ndegera Martha, aca yigira inyuma, akituna nk'umwana. Ararira, akansaba ko nomureka. Ntagishaka gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina". John na Martha bompi ni abo mu muryango w'aba Marakwet mu burengero bwa Kenya. N'aho imigirwa ya FGM itemewe n'amategeko muri Kenya, abakobwa muri uwo muryango barayikorerwa bageze mu myaka hagati ya 12 na 17, nk'umugirwa wo kwitegurira kurongorwa. Martha yakebwe igihe yari afise imyaka 15. Martha ati: "Ndababara cane iyo nkoze imibonano mpuzabitsina. Ndipfuza ko iyi migirwa ituzwa burundu". Avuga ko no kuvyara vyamugoye. Bavuga ku vyo bibuka igihe bakora imibonano mpuzabitsina ubwa mbere, bavuga ko ryari ihahamuka. Martha avuga ko yumvise ububabare butagira izina kandi ko atari azi ko imibonano mpuzabitsina yababaza ukuraho. Vyabaye ngombwa ko asaba umugabo wiwe guhagarika. John abwira BBC ati: "Si namenye ko igitsina ciwe cakebwe, bagasigaza agatoboro gatoya gusa". "Ndumvira impuhwe nyinshi cane umugore wanje. Si nshaka ko yiyumva nk'uko umengo nta cubahiro ndamuha, gusa turi umugabo n'umugore". Babayeho mu maganya ata n'icizere bafise ko ibintu bishobora kuzohinduka - atari kuri bo gusa, ariko bafitiye ubwoba umwana wabo w'umukobwa akiri muto. Babandanije biyumvira gutyo gushika aho John yumvitiye ko hari isekeza ryo kurwanya ikebwa ry'abana b'abakobwa mu kigwati cabo, ahanini ryarondera abagabo. Avuga ko ryamwuguruye amaso akabona akaga uwo mugirwa utera abagore. Ryamutumye agira iyindi mbono maze arabona ko nk'umugabo ashobora gufasha kuwuhagarika. "Uko vyogenda kwose, abagabo ni bo bafise ijambo rya nyuma ku bana kandi mvuze ko umwana wanje adashobora gukebwa, ntashobora gukebwa". Ni impinduka Moses n'umugore wiwe Josephine, na bo nyene bo muri uwo muryango, bakirije yompi. Inyuma y'imyaka hafi 25 bamaze bubakanye, nabo nyene imibonano mpuzabitsina yabo yabaye amagorwa kubera umugore yakebwe. Josephine yakebwe akiri muto cane kandi na we nyene avuga ko imibonano mpuzabitsina yabo ari amagorwa. "Igihe cose ndababara cane ariko nahavuye niga kwihangana". Josephine yibaza ko boba ari bo bonyene bari muri uwu mubabaro gushika bagiye hamwe n'abandu bubakanye nabo bavuga ko ari yo magorwa babayemwo. 'Iceyi mu muryango' Kuvuga ibijanye n'igitsina n'ibicerekeye, nk'akarorero ivyo gukebwa, muri Kenya biracari umuziro mu miryango itari mike yo muri ico gihugu, cane cane ku bagabo. Yitwengera igihe bari bamubwiye ko ivyerekeye igitsina vyovugwa amenya mu muryango wiwe, John avuga ati: "Nta muntu n'umwe yigeze ambwira ivy'imibonano mpuzabitsina, cane cane n'umugore yakebwe. N'ubu kiracari ibanga". Vyongeye, abagabo barwanya ikebwa ry'abakobwa bashobora gufatwa nk'abahemu bariko barondera kurwanya umuco kama. Mu 2014, vyavugwa ko imiriyoni zine z'abagore bo muri Kenya, hafi ica gatanu c'abagore bose mu gihugu, bakorewe FGM mu buryo kanaka. Mu miryango imwe imwe gukebwa biracafatwa nka ngombwa imbere yo kurongorwa. Josephine ati: "Mu myaka ya kahise, iyo umukobwa yanse gukebwa, yarashobora kubura umugabo, kandi bishite akarongorwa bagasanga ntiyakebwe ntiyashobora kwemerwa muri urwo rugo rushasha. Yarashobora gusubizwa iwabo, ibi navyo bikaba biteye isoni n'iceyi ku bantu bo muri uwo muryango". Dr Tamarry Esho akora amatohoza kuri  FGM akanayirwanya, avuga ko mu miryango 42 izwi muri Kenya, ine yonyene niyo izwi ko itigeze ikora uwu mugirwa muri kahise kayo. Kandi hari imwe ikiwukora. Dr Esho ati: "Uwu ni umuco washinze imizi cane. Abantu batari bake baracawumva nk'uburenganzira bwabo". Ariko imiryango itari mike iramaze guhindura ivyiyumviro kandi Kenya iri mu bihugu biboneka ko biriko birahinduka cane muri Afrika ku bijanye n'iki kibazo. Ubu, igice kimwe kw'icumi c'inkumi ziri hagati y'imyaka 15 na 19 nibo bazwi ko bakebwe, mu gihe mu 1974 bagera ku bice hafi 50%. Tony Mwebia yatanguje ishirahamwe Men End FGM ryigisha abantu kurwanya FGM, avuga ko abagabo bashobora gutuma ibintu bihinduka. Avuga ati: "Mu miryango igikora uwu mugirwa wa FGM muri Kenya, mu gihe abagore ari bo bakeba bagenzi babo b'abakobwa, abagabo nibo bafise ijambo rya nyuma. Gusa, ikibazo ni uko batazi ico ari co ikebwa ry'abakobwa, batazi ingene bikorwa canke inkurikizi mbi cane rifise ku bagore. "Mu gihe abagabo botahura ubu butumwa, yoba ari amahirwe. Bafise aho bavugira, bafise ababumva, kandi bafise n'ikibanza kinini". Inyuma yo kwitaba inama ijanye no kwigisha ivyo kurwanya ikebwa ku bapfasoni, John yaciye afata ingingo ko umukobwa wiwe adashobora gukebwa. Yashoboye kandi no kuvuga ikintu yemeza ko abagabo benshi badashaka kwemera. "Ikebwa rirafise ingaruka no ku bagabo. Benshi baratuntuye ariko bahitamwo kwihangana. Imico imwe ivuga ko rituma abagore bataja mu busambanyi. FGM nta kindi kintu na kimwe imaze atari uguhungabanya urukundo hagati y'umugabo n'umugore". Ku bagore nka Josephine, kugira abagabo bumva umugambi ni ikintu gishobora guhindura ibintu, cane cane mu gihugu aho umugabo ari we mwene urugo. "Hari igihe twumva twacitse intege, ubu siko bimeze. Nk'umwe mu babikorewe, numvise umugabo wanje avuze ko adakeneye ko umukobwa wacu akebwa, numva mpimbawe. Eka n'ababanyi bacu baradukurikiye. Bavuga ko abakobwa babo badashobora gukebwa". *Amazina y'abubakanyebavuganye na BBC muri ino nkuru yarahinduwe mu ntumbero yo kubakingira kugira ntibamenyekane. Uburyo bwa 1: bita Clitoridectomy. Ni uguca akabezi (clitoris) kose n'agashato kari kuri ko. Uburyo bwa 2:  bita Excision. Gukeba akabezi bakagakurako rwose canke bagasigaza agace gato, hanyuma bagakata iminwa y'imbere ikikuje imishino (petites lèvres mu gifaransa) ikikuje igitsinagore . Uburyo bwa 3: Infibulation. Aha ni ugukata iminwa y'imbere n'iy'inyuma yo ku rwinjiriro rw'igitsinagore  (petites lèvres et  grandes lèvres ) bakayitera ahandi. Hano hajamwo n'ivyo gushona bagasigaza agatoboro gato. Uretse ko bibabaza ku buryo burenze urugero, ibi bishobora gutera ingwara , canke kwugara igitsina bagasigaza agatoboro gato gacamwo umukoyo n'amaraso igihe umukobwa ari mu butinyanka. bituma agira ibibazo mu gihe c' imibonano mpuzabitsina canke kuvyara, bikaba ngobwa kwongera kwagura iyo ntoboro, ibijana n'izindi ngaruka. Uburyo bwa  4:  Ubu buryo burimwo ubundi bwose bubabaza cane bakora ku kabezi  canke ibindi bihimba vy'igitsina, harimwo gutobora, gukata, kuringaniza, bagacishako  n'imbugita ishushe.

headline: Africa kuronka urucanco rwa Covid-19 si vuba
text: Afrika izorindira amayinga canke amezi imbere yo kuronka inkingo za Covid-19 zemewe na OMS, nk'uko vyemezwa n'abategetsi batandukanye bariko barita ku rutare kugira uwo mugabane uronke incanco. Incanco hafi miliyoni 900 ziramaze gutumwako gushika ubu biciye mu nzira zitandukanye , izo zikaba zikwiye kugira hakingirwe  30% y'abanyafrika bose hamwe babarizwa muri  miliyaridi 1.3 Ibigoye kigira izo nkingo zishike muri Africa ni vyinshi: ukuzitanguranwa n'ibihugu bifise amikoro, ukutaboneka kw'uburyo bwari bwemewe gutangwa, n'amategeko ajanye n'ivyuma  bitanga ubukonje bwo kubikamwo izo  nkingo. Umukuru wa OMS asa mbere n'uwabonye ko ibihugu vy'amikoro make bishobora gusigara inyuma cane muri uwo mugambi wo gukinga kwandura umugera wa Covid-19. Dr Tedros Ghebreyesus yagize ati: ''Turi hafi y'akaga ko kunanirwa ivyo dutegerezwa gukora nk'abantu kandi ingaruka n'ugutakaza ubuzima n'ibibeshaho abantu mu bihugu bikenye.'' Haguma haterwa akamo ko hoba isabikanywa  atawe risiga inyuma. Gushika ubu inkingo imiliyoni 40 ziramaze guhabwa abantu mu bihugu nibura 49 vyifise, kugereranya n'incanco 25 gusa zatanzwe muri kimwe mu bihugu vy'amikoro make ku bwa Dr Tedros. ''Simvuze miliyoni 25, canke ibihumbi 25, mvuze 25 gusa'' ariko ntiyavuze ico gihugu icari co. Gushika ubu izo nkingo z'i Buraya nta na rumwe rurahabwa umuntu muri Africa, amezi abiri kuva zitanguye gutangwa i Buraya. Ihuriro ry'amashirahamwe ajejwe guhimiriza, People's Vaccine Alliance, rivuga ko ryasanze ''Ibihugu bitunze bifise abantu bangana na 14% y'ababa kw'isi yose vyaguze ibice birenga 50 kw'ijana (53%) vy'incanco zose zitanga icizere co gukingira abantu''. Aho harimwo incanco zose za Moderna muri uyu mwaka wa 2021 na 96% z'izo Pfizer itegekanya gukora. Igihugu ca Canada nico cahebuje nk'uko vyerekanwa n'ikigo cihweza  ibijanye n'ubuhinga, Airfinity. Kivuga ko ico gihugu caguze ''inkingo zihagije kugira umunyeCanada wese akingirwe incuro zitanu''. Izo rero zitegerezwa kuboneka imbere y'uko ibihugu vy'amikoro make navyo bishikirwa. ''Ntimurondere inyungu z'umurengera'' Muri Africa , ibiriko biraba vyibutsa imyaka ya 90 aho imiti yi gupfupfahaza SIDA (ARV) yakorerwa muri Amerika. N'ubwo Africa ariyo yari ifise abantu benshi kuruta iyindi migabane bagendana uwo mugera, vyatwaye imyaka itari munsi y'itandatu kugira iyo miti  ishikire Abanyafrika. Imiriyoni 12 z'abantu barapfuye muri  Afrika mu kiringo c'imyaka cumi  bahitanywe n'indwara zifatiye kuri SIDA  mu gihe igitigiri c'abapfa cari cagabanutse cane muri Amerika , nk'uko biri mu mwihwezo w'ikigo ca Africa kijejwe kurwanya indwara no kuzikinga. Umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa wa UNAids  Winnie Byanyima ari mu bantu bashira ijwi hejuru cane kugira abakora inkingo za Covid-19 ntibarondere inyungu z'umurengera. Yabwiye BBC ati : ''Ntitubasaba guhomba. Kuri za ARV, abantu  bagendana umugera wa SIDA  n'abaharanira uburenganzira bwo kubaho barahagurutse batuma ama reta yemera ko hakorwa imiti y'abahawe uruhusha n'abayikoze ubwa mbere (generique), iyo nayo ikaba yari izimbutse cane. ''Ni uko imiti ya SIDA yavuye ku ma dolari 10.000 ($10.000) ku mwaka(ku muntu umwe) ikamanuka gushika ku ma dolari ijana($100) ku mwaka. '' Ashaka ko vyogenda gutyo ku nkingo za Covi-19, agasaba ibigo bihingura imiti ngo ''ntibitwarwe no kurondera inyungu z'umurengera''. Avuga ko bishobora kubandanya vyunguka n'aho vyokwereka abandi inzira yo gucamwo mu gukora izo nkingo. 'Gusimba abandi ku murongo' Umukuru wa OMS nawe nyene asaba ko hoba ugusabikanya neza. Ariko avuga ko n'abafise iyo mvugo baca ku ruhande bakarengana Covax kugira biyumvikanire n'ayo makompanyi ahigura izo ncanco, bigatuma ibiciro biduga kandi hakaba kugerageza gusimba abandi. Covax n'umugambi wa OMS na Vaccine Alliance wo gukwiragiza inkingo za Cobid-19 kw'isi ata n'umwe asizwe inyuma. Uwo mugambi ngo ntiwashoboye gushoka ugura izo kingo nk'uko ibihugu vyifise vyabikoze kuko wabanje kurondera uburyo. Umaze kuronka miliyaridi 6 z'ama dolari kuri 8 wari wiyemeje kwegeranya, izo ngo zikaba zigenewe ibihugu 92 vy'amikoro make n'ayabayabaye nk'uko bivugwa na Thabani Mapfosa wa Vaccine Alliance. Gushika ubu uwo mugambi umaze gutumako inkingo zingana n'imiriyoni 600 kuri ivyo bihugu, harimwo ibihugu vyose vya Afrika. Ariko rero ntihakenewe uburyo bwo kugura inkingo gusa. Ibihugu bitegerezwa kuronka uburyo bwo kugura ivyuma bitanga ubukonje bwo kuzibika na cane cane nka Pfizer, ibikwa mu bukonje bwa degre 70 munsi y'ubusa (-70C). Ishami rya ONU ryitaho abana UNICEF , risanzwe ritunganya itangwa ry'incanco ku bana, rizotanga uburyo bwo gushikana inkingo za Covid-19 iyo zitegerezwa gushika mu mugambi wa Covax. Iryo shami ririko riritegura kwiremeka nibura incuro zibiri ivyo ryahora  ritwara  muco ryise ''igikorwa amahanga kitari bwigere kiba''. Ivyo kugira bikunde, ibihugu bitegerezwa kuba vyiteguye mu buryo bwo kwakira izo nkingio no kuzitanga. Benjamin Schreiber ashinzwe guhuza ibikorwa vya Covax muri Unicef  avuga ko afise ''impungenge ko ata mwiteguro uhagije uraba''. ''Ico twabonye n'uko no mu bihugu biteye imbere ishirwa mu ngiro ry'ibikorwa vyo gutanga incanco bitoroha namba, bikenera uburyo  no gutegurwa neza, gushika ubu akaba ata mwiteguro uhagije urakorwa mu bihugu vy'amikoro make.'' Ariko afise icizere ko bizoshoboka kuko avuga ko nk'ibihugu vyo muri Afrika bimenyereye ivy'incanco gusumba ibindi bihugu vyinshi kw'isi. OMS imaze kwemera  urucanco rumwe gusa Intambanyi si izo gusa. Mu mugambi wa Covax wa OMS, hemewe kugurwa incanco zimaze kwemezwa na OMS gusa. Gushika ubu naho urumaze kwemerwa gukoreshwa vyihutirwa ni Pfizer gusa. Moderna na AstraZeneca ziracari nu nzira yo kwemerwa. Gushika ubu rero nta tariki runaka BBC yabonye y'aho inkingo za mbere zishobora kubonekera muri Africa ifatiye ku bishikirizwa n'abategetsi ba Covax. Itariki yitwa ko ari iya hafi ni mu kwezi kwa kabiri ariko hashobora gushika no mpera z'ukwa gatatu kugira inkingo za mbere zirungitswe na Covax zishike muri Africa.

headline: DRC: Ikiza ca mugiga kimaze guhitana abantu 120
text: Akarere k'uburaruko bushira ubuseruko bwa Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo katangajwe ko katewe n'ikiza ca mugiga. Gushika ubu, abantu 120 ni bo bamaze guhitanwa n'iyi ndwara. Abantu ba mbere banduye iyi ndwara bamenyekanye mu kwezi kw'indwi. Gushika ubu abarenga 100 ni bo bariko baravurirwa muhira canke mu bigo vy'ubuvuzi. Ntivyoroshe kurwanya iki kiza kubera abanyagihugu mu karere basanzwe bemera ibintazi bavuga ko ari uburozi, nk'uko BBC yabibwiwe n'ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi OMS/WHO. Ibipimo vyafashwe bikajanwa mu Bufaransa kugira vyigwe vyahavuye vyerekana ko umugera w'iyi ngwara ushobora guteza akaga mu bice binini cane. Hari benshi bamaze kuhasiga ubuzima kandi ahanini bikaba biva ku banyagihugu bakinana. Hakuja kwivuza, hari bamwe bahitamwo kwimuka bakava mu karere baja mu kandi, bibaza ko iyi ndwara itabakurikira. Reta ya Congo hamwe na OMS barungitse umugwi w'abaganga mu ntara ya Tshopo guhangana n'iki kiza. Iyi ntara iri "mu gice ca Afrika  gikunze kwizizirwa na mugiga" , igice kiva muri Senegal gushika muri Ethiopia - kigizwe n'ibihugu 26. Tumwe muri utu turere dukunze guhura n'ivyago vy'iki kiza cane cane mu gihe c'uruzuba - kuva mu kwa mbere gushika mu kw'indwi. Mugiga, indwara mbi cane, yandukira iva ku muntu ija ku wundi biciye mu mpwemu canke mu gukorora iyo uhuye n'umuntu ayirwaye.

headline: Covid: Burundi, Rwanda na DR Congo mu bihugu vyavanywe ku rutonde rutukura rw'Ubwongereza
text: Amakompanyi y'ingendo yashimye iyo ngingo yo kugabanya amategeko yo kugumiza umuntu ukwa wenyene, mu gihe ibihugu 47 vyaraye bikuwe ku "rutonde rutukura". Ubu kuri urwo rutonde hasigayeko ibihugu indwi gusa. Ariko ikigo gikora muri ico gisata cavuze ko cifuza ko reta y'Ubwongereza ishira mu bikorwa imigambi yo gusubiriza  igipimo kizimvye ca Covid bita PCR hakiri kare imbere y'uko hatangura uburuhuko bwo hagati mu mwaka mu mashure bwimirije. Muri izo ngingo zaraye zihindutse, ibihugu vya Panama, Colombia, Venezuela, Peru, Ecuador (Equateur), Haiti na Dominican Republic (Republique Dominicaine) nivyo vyonyene vyagumye ku rutonde rutukura rw'Ubwomgereza - bisigura ko abantu bafashe ingendo bava muri ivyo bihugu bashitse mu Bwongereza bategerezwa kubandanya kuguma ukwa bonyene mu mahoteri ikiringo c'amajoro 11 ku giciro c'amafaranga y'Abongoreza pound 2.285 ( miriyoni zirenga 6 mu mafaranga y'Uburundi) kuri buri muntu akuze. Ibihugu abantu bakunze kuja gutemberamwo  nka  Afrika y'Epfo, Thailand na Mexico biri muri 47  bizovanwa ku rutonde rutukura guhera ku munsi wa mbere isaha cumi zo mu gitondo mu masaha y'ici  yo mu Bwongereza (isaha 11 zo mu gitondo mu Burundi no mu Rwanda), bikazotuma ingendo zoroha kandi zizimbuka kuruta uko vyahora. Kompanyi y'indege Virgin Atlantic yavuze ko ababikisha ibibanza vyo kuja muri Afrika y'Epfo biyongeye gushika ku 150% kuva iyo ngingo yo ku wa kane itangajwe. Umuvugizi yavuze ko kworosha ayo mategeko ari "intambwe nziza" ariko avuga ko Ubwongereza bukwiye gukurikira Ishirahamwe rya Buraya na Amerika mu kuvanaho ivyo kwipimisha vyose ku bantu baba bararonse incanco zose za Covid batututse muri ivyo bihugu vy'ivyago bike  mu gukwiragiza umugera. Reta y'Ubwongereza yatangaje umugambi wo gusubiriza ingingo itegeka kugirisha igipimo ca Covid ca PCR ku munsi ugira kabiri ushitse muri ico gihugu, igipimo gishobora gusaba amafaranga y'Ubwongereza pound 75 (ibihumbi birenga 200.000 mu mafaranga y'Uburundi) ku muntu, abagenda mu Bwongereza bakaba boca basabwa kurungika ifoto y'igipimo kinyaruka bakoresheje cerekana ko ata mugera babasanganye. Isoko ryo muri reta rivuga ko ishaka gushiraho iyo ngingo hakiri kare imbere y'uko hatangura uburuhuko bwo mu mwaka hagati, ubwo nabwo ku mashure menshi bukaba buzotangura itariki 22 ukwezi kw'icumi. Ikibuga c'indege ca Heathrow cavuze ko kumenyesha ryari iyo ngingo izotangurira gukora "arico kibuze" kugira ngo ubwo buruhuko bube intango nshasha ku batari bake. Izo ngingo nshasha zituma kandi vyoroha ku ngenzi zaronkeye incanco mu bihugu 37 - birimwo Brezil, Ghana, Hong Kong, India, Pakistan, South Africa na Turkey - kugira urugendo mu Bwongereza. Mu gihe ata gihugu kiri ku turonde rutukura  bagendeye mu minsi 10 imbere yo kuja mu Bwongereza, bazofatwa co kimwe n'ababa mu Bwongereza baronse incanco zuzuye. Vyose: Ibihugu  47 vyavanywe ku rutonde rutukura rw'Ubwongereza Kuva ku wa mbere isaha cumi zo mu gitondo mu masha y'ici yo mu Bwongereza (isaha 11 zo mu gitondo mu masaha yo mu Burundi no mu Rwanda, ibihugu bikurikira bizova ku rutonde rutukura rw'Ubwongereza: Afghanistan, Angola, Argentina, Bolivia, Botswana, Brazil, Burundi, Cape Verde, Chile, Congo (Republique Democratique du), Costa Rica, Cuba. Eritrea, Eswatini, Ethiopia, French Guiana, Georgia, Guyana, Indonesia, Lesotho, Malawi, Mayotte, Mexico, Mongolia, Montenegro, Mozambique, Myanmar, Namibia, Nepal, Paraguay, Philippines, Réunion, Rwanda, Seychelles, Sierra Leone, Somalia, South Africa, Sudan, Suriname, Tanzania, Thailand, Trinidad and Tobago, Tunisia, Uganda, Uruguay, Zambia na  Zimbabwe.

headline: OMS/WHO ifise ubwoba bwinshi kuri Covid yasubiye kuvyura umugara i Bulaya
text: Ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ryitaho amagara y'abantu rifise "ubwoba bwisnhi cane" ku kiza ca Covid-19 casubiye kuba nsane i Bulaya mu gihe uyu mugabane uriko urarwana n'igihuhusi gishasha c'abandura. Avugana na BBC, Dr Hans Kluge arongoye iri shirahamwe kuri uyo mugabane agabisha ko abantu bashika ku 500.000 bashobora kuba bamaze guhitanwa n'iki gihuhusi gishasha kiretse hagize igikorwa kugira ngo bagihagarike. Dr Kluge avuga ko mu gihe abantu bosubira kwambara udupfukamunwa vyofasha kugihagarika. Aka kamo gatewe mu gihe ibihugu bitari bike bitangaza ko ibitigiri vy'abandura vyasubiye kuduga ku rugero ruteye ubwoba, ivyatumye bisubira gufata za ngingo za guma mu rugo. Dr Kluge avuga ko bimwe mu bituma ibitigiri vy'abandura bisubira kuduga harimwo ikirere ca kino gihe c'urushana, ibitigiri bito vy'abicandagisha hamwe n'ikwirakwira ry'ubwoko bushasha bwa Covid-19 buzwi nka Delta bwandukira cane. Atera akamo ko abantu bokwicandagisha bakongera bagakurikiza ingingo shingiro z'isuku, hakongerezwa n'iyindi miti mishasha yo kuvura abanduye, ngo ibi vyofasha kugabanya ibitigiri vy'abandura. Yabwiye BBC ati: "Covid-19 yasubiye gufata ikibanza ca mbere mu bihitana abantu mu karere kacu, kandi igikwiye gukorwa turakizi kugira ngo turwanye uwu mugera". Dr Kluge avuga ko impera n'imperuka hofatwa ingingo zitegeka abantu kwicandagisha, ariko ko vyoba vyiza habaye ibiganiro kuri iki kibazo. Avuga ati: "Imbere y'aho, hariho ubundi buryo nko gukoresha igitabo c'inzira ca Covid (Covid pass)", akongerako y'uko ibi atari mu ntumbero yo "guhonyanga ubwigenge bwa muntu, ko ahubwo ari uburyo bwo kubungabunga ubwigenge bwacu". Ku wa gatanu, igihugu ca Autriche cabaye ica mbere ku mugabane wa Bulaya gitangaza ko kwicandagisha Covid-19 ari itegeko, kandi ko rizotangura kuja mu ngiro mu kwa kabiri, mu gihe ingingo zizoyiherekeza zikiriko zirigwa. Hagati aho, ejo ku wa gatandatu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abanyagihugu barihaye amabarabara ku mugwa mukuru Vienna biyamiriza iyi ngingo. Benshi muri bo bari bafise ivyapa vyanditseko ngo "Ntavy'incanco ng'aho" na "twaduhiwe". Hari ibindi bihugu vyinshi vyo ku mugabane wa Bulaya biriko birafata ingingo ruhasha kubera ibitigiri vy'abandura biriko biriyongera. Bimwe muri vyo biranategekanya ingingo za guma mu rugo mu gihugu cose mu gihe vyoba ngombwa.

headline: Coronavirus – Burundi: muri rya sekeza 'Ndakira, sinandura kandi sinanduza', 67 baranduye
text: Mw'isekeza ryo gupima umugera wa coronavirus rimaze indwi mu gisagara ca Bujumbura, ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu mu Burundi bumenyesha ko abantu bashika 67 aribo basanze baranduye, mu barenga 3200 bapimwe. Kuva uwo mugera umenyekanye mu gihugu, igitigiri c'abamaze kuwandura gushika ubu kikaba ari 269, muri bo 207 bakaba barayikize, nayo 61  bakaba aribo bakiyirwaye. Umwe niwe amaze guhitanwa n'uwo mugera, nk'uko bitangazwa n'ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu no kurwanya ikiza SIDA. Ku munsi wa mbere w'indwi iheze, niho iryo sekeza ryataziriwe, "Ndakira, sinandura kandi sinanduza" ryatangura, ibigo bitatu bikaba ari vyo vyakira abaje kwipimisha mu gisagara ca Bujumbura imbere y'uko gitangura hagati mu gihugu. Icegeranyo nkonganirizahamwe gihejeje gutangwa n'umuvugizi w'ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu mu Burundi, Dr Jean-Bosco Girukwishaka, abicishije ku rubuga rwa Twitter,  cerekana ko gushika uno munsi abantu 6697 ari bo bamaze gupimwa umugera wa Covid-19 kuva utangajwe muri ico gihugu, hari ku wa 31 z'ukwa gatatu 2020. Mu ndwi iheze, abitavye iryo sekeza bakaba bageze ku 4553, muri bo 3309 bakaba ari bo batowe kugira ngo bapimwe, hakaba hamaze gupimwa 3263. Iryo sekeza rizomara amezi atatu rizotuma leta imenya ingene indwara ya Covid-19 yifashe mu gihugu, nk'uko bishikirizwa na Dr. Girukwishaka U Burundi  bwaragirijwe ko bwafashe minenewe uwu mugera, mbere amashirahamwe amwe amwe akaba yabwagiriza ko butanga ibiharuro bitari vyo, ibirego abategetsi bamirira kure. Hagati aho, kva Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye ashikirijwe amabanga yo kurongora igihugu, kimwe mu bibazo nkoramutima yatangaje ko agiye guhangana navyo vuba bwango ni ikiza ca coronavirus. "Ubu nyene dutanguje isekeza ryo kurwanya ico kiza mu Burundi twise 'Ndakira, sinandura kandi sinanduza'". Igihe leta yiwe nshasha irahira, Perezida Ndayishimiye yaboneyeho bo gutangaza ingingo zitari nke zo guhangana nayo, anasaba abanyagihugu bose kuvira hasi rimwe kugira ngo barwanye iki kiza karanda.

headline: UK: Ingene abana 175 bandujwe umugera wa SIDA
text: Abana barenga 150 bari bafise ingwara y'amaraso atavura  izwi nka haemophilia/hémophilie barandujwe umugera wa SIDA mu myaka ya 1980, nk’uko biri mu nyandiko z’ububiko bw’igihugu zabonywe na BBC. Imwe mu miryango yahuye n’izi ngorane iravuga ingene vyagenze mu matohoza y’igihugu ku gifatwa ko ari akaga k’agahomerabunwa mu buganga muri kahise k’ikigo c’Ubwongereza kijejwe amagara y’abantu, NHS. Haraciye imyaka hafi 36 – mu mpera z’ukw’icumi 1986 – ariko Linda ntazokwigera yibagira umusi abwirwa ko umwana wiwe w’umuhungu yari yandujwe umugera. Ibitaro vy’abana vya Birmingham (Birmingham Children's Hospital), vyaramutumyeko, ari kumwe n’umwana wiwe w’umuhungu Michael yari afise imyaka 16. Igihe yari acavura, yarapimwe asanga yari arwaye haemophilia, ingwara yo mu muryango ituma amaraso atavura neza. Linda yibaza ko uwo mubonano wari ukuvugana ingene yokwungururizwa mu bitaro bikuru vyitiriwe Umwamikazi Elizabeth (Queen Elizabeth Hospital) muri ico gisagara. Ati: "Vyari ibintu dusanzwe tumenyereye ku buryo umugabo wanje yigumiye mu modoka hanze. "Ubwo nyene, nk’igitangaro, muganga yavuze ati, 'Ni vyo, Michael yaranduye umugera wa SIDA', kandi nyene yabivuze nk’uko umengo yariko aravuga ingene ikirere cifashe hanze. Numvise ivyari mu nda bihiye. "Twarinjiye mu modoka, ndabibwira umugabo wanje, duca turanuma gushika muhira. Nta wigeze avuga – twakubiswe n’inkuba”. Hari hakiri mu myaka ya mbere y’uwu mugera wa SIDA – hasigaye amezi make imbere y’uko isekeza rya reta ryacishwa ku mboneshakure ryiswe Don't Die of Ignorance (Ntiwicwe n’ukutamenya) ritangura kwigisha buri Mwongereza ivyerekeye iyi ngwara. Ariko kunena umuntu yanduye uwu mugera vyari vyamaze kwisasira indava. Mu 1985,  abavyeyi batari bake bari bamaze gukura abana babo mw’ishure ry’intango ryo muri Hampshire inyuma y’aho umwana w’imyaka icenda  - nawe nyene yari afise iyi ngwara ya haemophilia – apimiwe agasanga yaranduye umugera wa SIDA. Michael ntiyashaka ko abagenzi biwe canke mu muryango babimenya. Linda ati: "Uko niko yavyitwayemwo – yavyigumijemwo”. "Ntiyigeze abwira na kimwe abagenzi biwe kuko yipfuza kubaho mu buzima busanzwe". Hagati ya 1970 na 1991, abantu 1250 bari bafise ibibazo vyo mu maraso barandujwe umugera wa SIDA  mu Bwongereza inyuma y’aho bafatiye umuti witwa Factor VIII – umuti mushasha wari uje gukoreshwa mu kuvura iyo ngorane. Muri aba harimwo abana 175 bahawe uwu muti n’abaganga b’ikigo NHS mu bitaro, mu mashure canke mu bigo bivurirwamwo iyi ngwara ya haemophilia. Abandi ibihumbi n’ibihumbi bavugwa ko bandujwe ingwara y’igitigu co mu bwoko bwa C (hépatite C/hepatitis C) ishobora gutuma igitigu cononekara canke kikagwara kanseri, haba mu kuvurwa iyi ngwara uku nyene canke mu guterwa amaraso. Hafi igice c’abo bose bandujwe umugera wa SIDA barapfuye bishwe n’ingwara z’ivyuririzi imbere y’uko hatangura kuboneka imiti yo gupfupfahaza. Ico gihe, Ubwongereza ntibwari bwikwije mu bubiko bw'amaraso aterwa abantu iyo bikenewe, rero uwo muti Factor VIII washika mu gihugu uvuye muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Agapaki kamwe kamwe kaba kagizwe n’uruvange rw'amaraso yatanzwe n'ibihumbi vy'abantu. Rero, iyo umwe muri bo yaba yaranduye umugera wa SIDA, waca ukwiragira hose. Amakompanyi yahingura imiti muri Amerika yaraha amafaranga abantu kugira baze gutanga amaraso – kandi muri bo harimwo n’imirwi yari ifise ivyago vyinshi vyo gushobora kwandura, aha ni nk’abapfungwa canke abafata ibiyayuramutwe. Linda aribuka igihe abwirwa ubwa mbere ivyerekeye SIDA mu nyigisho zabereye ku bitaro vy’abana vya Birmingham mu 1984 akanagabishwa ko yoza arihweza ibimenyetso bimwe bimwe. Ariko avuga ko umuryango utigeze wigishwa neza akaga kawuhanze – igihe kimwe umuforoma yamubwiye ko atogira ubwoba, ko “Michael yari ameze neza”. Ico gihe cose, umuhungu wiwe yabandanije avurwa hakoreshejwe uwo muti wari wavuye muri Amerika. Mu mpera z’imyaka y’ubusore bwiwe, Michael yatanguye kugira ibibazo vy’amagara – guhera ku kubira icuya mw’ijoro  gushika aho atangura kumeneka umutwe hanyuma agafatwa n’igicurane. Ariko yabandanije abaho mu buzima busanzwe  - afata ingendo, yumviriza umuziki mbere abandanya ashigikira umurwi w’umupira w’amaguru, West Bromwich Albion. Linda ati: "Ico gihe hari urukino rukomeye ku kibuga ca Wembley kandi ico gihe yari ameze nabi, nabi cane”. "Rero twararyohoye imodoka yose hanyuma aragenda guhura n’abagenzi biwe. Uko yiyumva ntaco vyari bitwaye, ashoboye gushikayo, nta ngorane”. Mu nyuma mu buzima bwiwe, abasoda b’umubiri batanguye kugabanuka, Michael yaratakaje ibiro, atangura kwumva uburuhe, n’ubwonko buratakara. Yahavuye yungururizwa mu bitaro vya Heartlands muri Birmingham, ari naho Linda, inyuma yo guheba akazi kiwe k’ubuyaya mu kigo c’abakukuruke, yabandanije amufashiriza n’aho yari mu mezi make yiwe ya nyuma y’ubuzima bwiwe. Linda ati: "Yambwiye ati, 'Mama, ntuzigera uba inakuru', nanje mvuga nti, 'Ntugire ingorane kuri ico’. Ico nico nashoboye kwiyumvira nari kuvuga”. Michael yafashwe na mugiga be n’umusonga – zompi zatewe n’umugera wa SIDA  yandujwe akiri umwana. Yahavuye apfa ku wa 26 Rusama (5), 1995, hasigaye neza na neza indwi imwe gusa ngo agire isabukuru y’imyaka 26 y’amavuka. Inyuma y’imyaka hafi 30, Linda aratanga ivyemezo kuri ano matohoza y’igihe kirekire kuri kano kaga kabaye mu buvuzi. Azorenguka ari kumwe n’abandi bavyeyi, mu nama idasanzwe ijanye nivyo imiryango yaciyemwo mu kubona abana babo banduzwa umugera mu myaka ya 1970 na 1980. Ati: ''Numva ko ari ngombwa ko ndabikora kuko nshaka gufasha kugira ngo ukuri kumenyekane”. "Twese dushaka kumenya igituma baretse bikaba kandi bikabandanya uko nyene”. Linda yasavye ko izina ryiwe ry’umuryango rinyegezwa

headline: Umushikiranganji wa Sri Lanka yahimiriza umuti kama wa Covid yasanze yanduye
text: Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu wa Sri Lanka yari asanzwe ahimiriza umuti kama w'amazi mu ntumbero yo kurwanya Covid, yasanze yaranduye uwu mugera. Umunyamabanga ajejwe kumenyesha amakuru mu bushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu, yabwiye BBC ko umushikiranganji Pavithra Wanniarachchi yapimwe ku wa gatanu agasanga yaranduye. Yarahimirije cane uwu muti w'amazi wahinguwe n'umupfumu avuga ko ukora nk'urucanco rw'uwu mugera ubuzima bwose. Kuva iki kiza caduka, Sri Lanka imaze kugira abantu 56.076 banduye hamwe na 276 bapfuye, ibiharuro vy'abandura bikaba vyasubiye kuduga kuva mu mezi aheze. Umupfasoni Wanniarachchi abaye umushikiranganji wa kane yanduye coronavirus. Hari uwundi mushikiranganji na we nyene yari yafashe uwu muti yapimwe mu ntango z'iyi ndwi agasanga yaranduye. Uyu mushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu, yarawunyoye imbere y'abantu kugira atange akarorero, yongera atanga uruhusha rwo kuwukoresha mu guhagarika ikwirakwira ry'uwu mugera. Uyu mupfumu yakoze uwu muti usanzwe urimwo ubuki n'urubuto rw'igiterwa citwa muscarde avuga ko yeretswe mu ndoto ingene yowuhingura. Abaganga bo muri ico gihugu bari biyamirije amakuru yavuga ko uwu muti ukora, ariko itororokanirizo ry'amakuru AFP rivuga ko ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abantu bamwirukiye kugira ngo awubaronse. Umupfasoni Wanniarachchi yipimishije covid-19 incuro zibiri, kandi inyishu zose zaje zerekana ko yanduye, nk'uko bitangazwa na Viraj Abeysinghe, umunyamabanga ajejwe kumenyesha amakuru mu bushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu yabibwiye BBC. Uyu mushikiranganji yaciye asabwa kwitaramura, eka n'abamwegereye bose baciye bataramurwa. Iyi nkuru y'umupfasoni Wanniarachchi yaje haciye amasaha make Sri Lanka yemeje ikoreshwa rya rwa rucanco rwahingurwa na Oxford/AstraZeneca. Incanco za mbere zitegekanijwe gushika mu gihugu mu ndwi iza. Sri Lanka si co gihugu conyene abantu bafise ibibanza mu butegetsi bahimirije imiti itemejwe mu kuvuga ko ivura Covid-19. Mu mwaka uheze, umukuru w'igihugu ca Madagascar Andry Rajoelina yaraneguwe igihe ahimiriza umuti kama yavuga ko ushobora kuvura uwu mugera. Yarerekanywe ariko aratanga uwo muti mu banyagihugu ba ntahonikora bo ku mugwa mukuru w'ico gihugu. Kuva iki kiza cadutse, hari abategetsi batari bake b'ibihugu bikomeye bamaze kucandura. Perezida Emmanuel Macron w'Ubufaransa, umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza Boris Johnson hamwe n'uwahoze ari umukuru wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika Donald Trump, bose bari mu banduye iki kiza mu bihe bitandukanye mu mwaka uheze.

headline: Urukingo rwa Covi-19: Habonetse urikingo rwa mbere rurinda iyo ndwara gushika ku 90%
text: Urukingo rwa mbere rugaragaza icizere rurashobora kukingira 90% vy'abantu banduye Covid-19 nk'uko umwihwezo wambere wavyerekanye. Abakoze urwo rukingo - Pfizer and BioNTech - bavuga ko ivyashitse babibona "nk'umunsi uhambaye ku buhinga mu bumenyi hamwe n'ikiremwa muntu". Urukingo rwabo rwageragejwe ku bantu 43.500 mu bihugu bitandatu kandi nta mwitwarariko ku ngaruka zarwo wigeze ubaho. Ivyo bigo bitegekanya gusaba guhabwa uruhushwa rwihutirwa kugira urwo rukingo rutangure gukoreshwa mu mpera za kuno kwezi. Urukingo - hamwe n'ubuvuzi bwisununuye - rubonwa nk'uburyo bwa mbere bwiza bwo gukura abantu mu mategeko ya guma muhira, yashizweko mu bihugu bitari bike bigahungabanya kubaho gusanzwe kw'abantu. Hari inkingo zirenga mirongo ibiri ziri ku ntambwe ya nyuma y'igerageza - izwi nka phase 3 trial (umuce wa 3 w'igerageza) - ariko uru rukingo nirwo rwa mbere rutanze inyishu. Rukoresha uburyo butaribwakoreshwe ahantu na hamwe - burimwo gutera mu muntu igice c'akagingo ndangakamere k'uwo mugera - kugira bamenyereze abasoda b'umubiri kurwanya uwo mugera. Ukugerageza kwa mbere kwerekanye ko urwo rukingo rumenyereza umubiri ukavyara abasoda - hamwe n'ikindi gice kigize ukwikingira kw'umbiri kizwi nka T-cells mu kurwanya coronavirus. Hakenerwa guterwa urushinge rw'uru rukingo inshuro zibiri zitandukanijwe n'ikiringo c'indwi zitatu. Kugerageza - muri Amerika, Ubudage, Brezile, Argentine, Afrika y'epfo na Turkiya - kwerekana ko gukingirwa gushika ku rugero rwa 90% bishikwako nyuma y'iminsi indwi uhawe urukingo rwa kabiri.
