Pfizer cemeza ko kizoshobora gutanga inkingo miriyoni 50 gushika mu mpera z'uno mwaka, kikazotanga izishika umuriyaridi 1,3 gushika mu mpera z'umwaka wa 2021. Ariko hariho ibibazo bijanye n'ububiko, kuko urwo rukingo rugomba kubikwa mu bukanye buri ku rugero rwa dogere 80 munsi y'ubusa (-80C). Hari kandi ibibazo vyo kumenya igihe uburinzi mu mubiri bumara kandi ivyo bigo ntivyatanze amakuru y'ukuntu urwo rukingo rwitwara mu nganwe zitandukanye. Dr Albert Bourda, umuyobozi wa Pfizer, yagize ati: "Turi hafi y'intambwe ikomeye yo kuronsa abantu hirya no hino kw'isi agahengwe banyotewe mu gufasha guhagarika iki kiza kibangamiye amagara kw'isi." Prof Ugur Sahin, umwe mu bashinze ikigo BioNTech, yavuze ko ivyashitsweko ari "intambwe y'akataraboneka". Ibiharuro vyashikirijwe ntivyavuye mu mwihwezo wa nyuma. Vyafatiye ku bakorerugushaka bambere 94 banduye Covid - kumenya neza na neza yuko uru rukingo rukora birashobora guhinduka igihe kwihweza neza ingene rukora bizoba vyaheze. Ibi bigo bivuga ko bizoronka ibiharuro nyavyo vyerekana ko ataco uru rukingo rutwaye ku magara mu ndwi ya gatatu y'ukwezi kwa cumi na rimwe, bace bashikiriza uru rukingo inzego zemeza ko rukurikije amategeko. Ico gihe kitaragera, ntibishoboka ko ibihugu bitangura amasekeza yavyo yo gukingira abantu. Ubwongereza buramaze gutumiza inkingo imiriyoni 30.

headline: Covid-19: AU yahevye umugambi w'urukingo rwa AstraZeneca
text: Ishirahamwe ry'ubumwe bwa Afrika, AU, ryahevye umugambi wo kuronswa inkingo za coronavirus zovuye mu kigo co mu Buhinde, Serum Institute of India, kubera impungenge zo kuzishikana. Ahubwo AU iriko irihweza gukorana n'ikigo gihingura imiti co muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Johnson & Johnson. Umukuru w'ikigo kijejwe gukumira indwara muri Afrika (Africa's Centres for Disease Control), John Nkengasong, yavuze ko kwizezwa kuronka imiti ari ikintu nyamukuru - kandi yuko ingingo zikumira kwoheraza hanze iyo miti zafashwe n'Ubuhindi ziteje ingorane kuri Afrika. Yongeyeko yuko icemezo ca AU ataho gihuriye n'impungenge z'uko urukingo rwa Oxford-AstraZeneca rushobora, ku buryo bushika gake cane, gutera kuvura kw'amaraso. Urwo rukingo rwategerezwa kuronswa umugabane wa Afrika biciye mu mugambi wa ONU uzwi nka Covax, uronsa urwo rukingo ibihugu bitishoboye. Ikigo co mu Buhinde, Serum Institute, gifise uruhusha rwo gukora inkingo za AstraZeneca ariko leta y'Ubuhinde yarihebeye ububiko bwose bw'urwo rukingo mu gihe kwandura vyiyongera cane muri ico gihugu. Bwana NKengasong yavuze yuko AU imaze kugirana amasezerano n'ikigo Johnson & Johnson, yo kuronswa inkingo imiriyoni 400.

headline: Coronavirus: Mbe urukingo ruzodusubiza ubuzima nk'ubwo twahorana?
text: Benshi muri twebwe baripfuza ko urucanco rushasha kandi rukora neza rwa coronavirus rudusubiza mu buzima bwacu twahoramwo imbere y'ico kiza. Ariko benshi mu bahinga bavuga ko n'aho urwo rucanco rwoboneka, guca duta kure udupfukamunwa atari ivyo ubu vuba. Guma umanuka hepfo ↓ umenye ingene urukingo rukora unamenye n'igituma hakenewe gukingira abantu benshi bashoboka kugira dusubire mu buzima bwo kutegerana kure na kure. Incanco, nka hose zifatwa nka kimwe mu bintu ubuvuzi bwashitseko gihambaye mu bihe vya none kw'isi yose. Buri mwaka, zirokora ubuzima bw'abantu bari hagati ya miriyoni zibiri na zitatu, zigakinga ingwara zigeramira amagara y'abantu zirenga 20, nk'uko bimenyeshwa n'ishami rya Onu rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi WHO/OMS. Ingwara z'abana zari zimenyerewe cane mu myaka iheze zigenda zigabanuka cane. Ibihara - vyishe abantu imiriyoni n'imiriyoni - vyaratujijwe burundu. Ariko vyafashe imyaka mirongo kugira iyo ntambwe ishikweko - kandi benshi muri twebwe ubu twiteze incanco za coronavirus zikora neza kugira dushike ku ntambwe nk'iyo mu gihe gito cane. Inkuru zivuga ko zimwe mu ncanco zanyarutse kuboneka zokora ku bice 90% - bisigura ko abantu 9 kuri 10 bahawe izo ncanco bashobora kutandura Covid- 19 - vyatumye bamwe bizera ko bagiye gusubira kwegerana, banajugunyire kure udupfukamunwa. Muri Amerika no mu Bwongereza aho kwemeza izo ncanco bigiye kuba vuba vyihuta no gucandaga abantu bose bikaba biriko birategurwa, bamwe batanguye kuvuga ko bagiye gusubira mu bihe bisanzwe mu misi ya vuba. Ariko bamwe mu bahinga hamwe n'abashakashatsi mu vyo amagara y'abantu baragabisha ko incanco, zizoba  ari nke mu ntango, kandi zigenewe imigwi yatoranijwe, n'aho zizokingira imigwi igeramiwe cane n'abakozi mu vyo amagara y'abantu baza imbere mu kugwanya ico kiza, zitariko ziratuma dusubira mu buzima bwa kera twari tubayemwo ubu vuba. Uwurongoye WHO/OMS Tedros Ghebreyesus, yagize ati: "Urucanco ruzokwunganira ubundi buryo dufise, ntiruzobusubirira. Urucanco ubwarwo ntiruzorandurana n'imizi ico kiza." Insiguro ku ntera iri hagati y'ivyitezwe - hagati y'icizere kuri bamwe mu banye politike hamwe n'abanyagihugu ku ruhande rumwe, hamwe n'amakenga ya benshi mu bahinga ku rundi ruhande - bishobora, kutihwezwa neza ingene ari igikorwa kitoroshe kuronka incanco  zikwiye ku bantu zigenewe. Ico benshi muri twebwe tutabona, n'uko iyo tuvuze ingwara zandukira - zirya ziva ku muntu zija ku wundi - kugira mu vyo ukuri ukingire buri muntu, dukeneye gucandaga igitigiri kinini. Ibi ni ukubera ko inguvu z'urucanco zidahagaze ku bushobozi rufise bwo kudukingira ku giti cacu, n'ubushobozi rufise bwo gukingira abantu bose batwegereye, no mu mibano aho tubaye. Fata akarorero ka Shona ngaha. Ikibazo za Shona, twebwe hamwe no mu mibano yacu n'uko ata rucanco na rumwe rukora ijana kw'ijana. Urucanco rw'agasama ni rumwe muri nziza  kandi rukingira hagati y'ibice 95% - 98% vy'abantu. Incanco za Covid- 19 ziherutse gushirwa ahabona za Pfizer/BioNTech na Moderna zifise ubushobozi burenga 90%, basanze ari zike kandi ntituramenya nimba ivyo biharuro bizogenda bigabanuka uko umwanya ugenda canke bivanye n'ahandi ziriko zirageragerezwa atari kwa muganga. Ivyo bisigura ko hafi umuntu umwe kw'icumi ashobora kutazokingirwa Covid- 19 - n'aho twocandaga buri muntu. Mu gihe urucanco rutoshika hose ijana kw'ijana, ivyo na vyo bikaba bisa n'ibidashoboka mu mugambi uwo ari wose wo gucandaga, igitigiri c'abantu bageramiwe gishobora kwongerekana. Bashobora kuba mubo iyo ngwara igeramira gusumba - dusanzwe tuzi abatama urucanco rudafata neza, n'aho incanco za coronavirus zerekanye inyishu nziza kuri abo twariko turavuga. Mu gihe wokingira gusa abasanzwe bageramiwe, uzohagarika impfu zahora zibahitana muri uwo mugwi, ugabanye umuzigo ku bitaro vyahora bibakira, ariko ntibizohagarika ukwanduzanya, nk'uko bivugwa n'uwahoze ashinzwe igisata co gucandaga mu Bwongereza, Prof David Salisbury. Hejuru y'ivyo, bamwe mu mibano, ku mvo z'amagara, nk'abantu bari ku miti itandukanye ya cancer, bashobora kutazopfa bacandazwe. Ibi bisigura ko igitigiri kinini c'abantu batwegereye bazoguma bageramiwe n'iyo ngwara. Bamwe mu bagenzi bacu n'imiryango bashobora kuba bari muri abo. Ariko haracari inzira zo gushobora gukingira mu bundi buryo buri muntu wese - n'ukuraba ingene abantu bokingirwa ari benshi cane. Mu gihe twocandaga abantu bakwiye mu gihugu, hari ikintu kidasanzwe coshika. Tuba dushizeho amabariyeri ataboneka atuma ahagarika ukwanduzanya, mu bundi buryo bigakingira abantu bacu basanzwe bageramiwe hamwe n'umuryango. Ibi rimwe na rimwe bavyita gukingira abanyagihugu canke gucandaga. Uku ni ko bigenda. None ni bangahe muri twebwe bazokenera urucanco rwa coronavirus? Ivyo gushika ubu tutaramenya - kandi ni ngombwa kugira umenye uko wokingira bose - ni ku rugero rungana gute urucanco rwa  Covid- 19 rushobora kubuza ukwandukizanya, canke rwica imigera. Dushobora kubanza kurindira  umwanya muto kugira tumenye ibi bintu neza, ariko abahinga bakoze urucanco rwa  Pfizer/BioNTech bavuga ko hari amahirwe ko n'imiburiburi rumwe muri zo rushobora gufasha kugabanya ayo mahirwe make. Ariko n'aho twokwemeza ko ifasha mu kutandukizanya, igitigiri c'abantu bazokenera guhabwa urwo rucanco mu ntumbero yo gukingira abageramiwe gusumba kiri hejuru cane. Ibi ni ukubera, n'aho hoba harimwo urugero runini rw'umuti mu rucanco rukora neza, igitigiri kinini c'abantu benshi kiguma kigeramiwe, nk'uko bivugwa na Prof David Salisbury, yahoze arongoye igisata co gucandaga mu bushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu mu Bwongereza akaba ari n'umushakashatsi mu kigo ca Chatham House. Ibi ni ibiharuro bisanzwe, ni ko abisigura. Iki ni co gituma abahinga bavuga ko, gushika turonke incanco zo guhama abantu batari mu migwi igeramiwe na Covid- 19 gusa, kandi hagashikirwa igitigiri kinini c'abantu, ingingo yo kutegerana ntiriko iravanwaho vuba. Prof Salisbury agira ati: "Mu gihe ukingiye abageramiwe gusa, urahagarika impfu ziba muri uwo mugwi, ukagabanya n'umuzigo ku bitaro, ariko ntibihagarika ukwanduzanya." Abandanya avuga ko ukwanduzanya bibandanya hagati y'abantu batacandazwe, bashobora gukwiragiza iyo ngwara mu bantu bageramiwe ariko batacandazwe no mu bageramiwe bacandazwe ariko urucanco rutafashe neza. [Urucanco] ruzorangiza ico kiza, ni ikibazo gusa co kumenya ni ryari, kandi biragoye kumenya kubera kuronka uru rucanco gusa ari ikibazo gikomeye, nk'uko bivugwa na Azra Ghani, umuhinga mu vyo ingwara zandukira kuri Imperial College London. Ibi nta nkeka bisigura ko mu kwirinda ko haba uduce habamwo iyandukizwa no kubangamira abagenzi bacu bageramiwe hamwe n'imiryango mu mibano, dukeneye gucandaga ku rugero runini abantu bari mu myaka yose hirya no hino mu turere. Uravye ingene kw'isi ubu abantu babonana uravye uko biyunguruza hamwe n'ubudandaji, ibi bisigura ko vyokorwa muri buri gihugu kw'isi yose. Prof Salisbury avuga ati: "Iki ni ikiza cakwiye hose, si ikiza co ku rwego rw'igihugu, rero n'ukugihagarika hose hanyuma, imbere yo gukora ivyo, nta muntu n'umwe atageramiwe." Kuri ubu umugambi wo ku rwego rw'isi wo gutanga urukingo wibanda ku bahakwa cane kwandura hamwe n'abakora mu vyo amagara y'abantu, bakasonswa inkingo nkeya zimaze kuboneka ubwa mbere. Ariko bimwe mu bihugu biza vyaramaze kuvuga ko bifise umugambi wo gucandaga n'abatari mu migwi igeramiwe mu gihe incanco zoba zibonetse, harimwo Amerika n'Ubwongereza. Uwurongoye igisata c'amagara y'abantu mu Bwongereza, NHS (UK's National Health Service), yavuze ko bizofata gushika mu kwezi kwa kane kugira abageramiwe bose baronke urucanco - ariko intumbero ya reta n'iyo gucandaga abantu benshi bashoboka bafise imyaka irenga 16. Muri rusangi, WHO igereranya ko hagati y'ibice 65% na 70% vy'abantu bazokenera urucanco imbere y'uko ukwandukizanya bihagarara, abantu bose bagakingirwa hanyuma kuri buri muntu no muri buri kibanza bikamenyekana ko iyo ngwara atayikihavugwa. Prof Azra Ghani, umuhinga mu vyo ingwara zandukira kuri Imperial College London, yaminuje muvyerekeye ibiharuro vy'ingwara zandukira, yibaza ko dukeneye gushika ku bice 70% kugira "iyo ngwara ibe itakivugwa". Yemeza ko bishoboka gushika kuri ico cipfuzo co gusubira mu buzima busanzwe, ariko ko kubishikako bisaba guca mu nzira zigoye, mbere n'aho ata nzitizi zohaba. "Bizorangiza iki kiza, n'ikibazo c'ukumenya ryari, bikaba binagoye  kuvyitegurira kuko kuronka uru rucanco ari vyo vyari bigoye cane." Gucandaga igice kinini c'abantu imiliyoni 68 bo mu Bwongereza, kazoba ari akazi kanini, udashizemwo gushikira abantu baba kw'isi yose bashika imiriyaridi 7.8. Nta kintu na kimwe cari bwagere kuri uru rugero. Izo ncanco n'ibikoresho bijana - nk'aho zibikwa - bitegerezwa gukorwa ari vyinshi cane. Abakora incanco bashobora kutaronka izizoba zikenewe zose. Izo ncanco kandi zirakeneye kuvanwa aho zikorerwa zijanwa mu mavuriro - harimwo ayari kure cane, no mu turere tugoye gushikamwo hirya no hino kw'isi. Zimwe muri izo ncanco zikeneye kandi kubikwa ahantu hakanye, nk'akarorero urucanco rwa Pfizer rukeneye kuguma mu kibanza gifise ubushuhe bungana na -70 (-94F). Ikigo kijejwe amagara y'abantu mu Bwongereza kiza caramaze gutegura ibigo bizocandagirwamwo abantu benshi bifise ibikoresho bikwiye, inyuma y'aho ico gihugu kibereye ica mbere kw'isi kwemeza urucanco rwa Pfizer. Ariko ku bandi, ingorane zizoba nyinshi. Kompanyi ikomeye y'abadagi izwi cane mu gutwara ibintu, DHL, yaragabishije ko ibice binini vyo muri Afrika, Aziya na Amerika y'epfo, bidafise ahantu hakanye hakwiye  hegereye aho izo ncanco zoshikanwa, co kimwe n'ububiko bukwiye, ivyo bikaba "bishobora gutera izindi ngorane" zo gushikana incanzo aho zikenewe. Hari kandi iyindi nzitizi ishobora gutuma haba ukutanyarutsa gushikira abantu bakwiye mu gukingira abageramiwe. Abategetsi mu vyo amagara y'abantu bategerezwa kugondoza abantu benshi "bafise amakenga kuri izo ncanco" - ukwiyongera kw'abantu bagikekeranya kwicandagisha - ibibonwa nka kimwe mu bintu cumi biza kw'isonga  bigeramiye uwo mugambi w'amagara y'abantu wa WHO. Mu Bwongereza, ibice hafi 36 kw'ijana vy'abantu bavuze ko batazi canke bashobora kutazokwicandagisha, nk'uko icegeranyo c'amatohoza yakozwe n'ibigo vya British Academy na Royal Society kibivuga. Ibiharuro nk'ivyo kandi vyarabonetse mu matohoza ya YouGov mu kwezi guheze. Ayo makenga ku rucanco, hakiyongerako ibihuha vyinshi kuri urwo rucanco - ivyiswe umuhari wiyemeje kugwanya urwo rucanco - bizotuma bigorana gukingira abantu no kurushikana mu bindi bihugu vyinshi. Prof Ghani  avuga ko gusigurira neza abantu bategerezwa kuronka urucanco ariko bumva ko " batewe ubwoba" n'ingene urucanco rwa Covid- 19 rwanyarutse gukorwa, kizoba igikorwa gikomeye mu gucandaga abantu benshi mu Bwongereza. Yavuze ko akazi kanini ko kugondoza abantu no kwitaba amasango kazoba gasigura urugero rwo gutera intambwe yo gukingira abantu "buhoro buhoro". Uretse ubuhinga n'ibibazo vyo gushikana urucanco mu Bwongereza hose no kw'isi, inkuru nziza n'uko bisa n'uko incanco za mbere zizogira ico zishitseko mu rugamba rwo kurwanya Covid- 19. Mu kiringo gito, zizofasha abageramiwe cane gusumba abandi mu gihugu kutaremba cane hanyuma ngo bapfe, cane cane abasaza hamwe n'abakora mu gisata c'amagara y'abantu. Itangazo rya Pfizer/BioNTech ko urucanco rwabo ruzokingira ibice 94% vy'abantu barengeje imyaka 65 ni intambwe ikomeye muri iki gikorwa. Inkuru mbi n'uko bishobora gufata amezi canke imyaka mu gucandaga abantu benshi mu bantu baba kw'isi kugira imigenderanire yo kw'isi ntigiremwo agatosi kandi hagere igihe twese dusubira mu buzima busanzwe. Prof Salisbur yavuga ko ibivugwa ko incanco zizodusubiza mu bihe twarimwo imbere y'uko Covid itera kuri Pasika y'uyu mwaka, vyatanze icizere kidashoboka ku bantu, kandi gushika ku bintu nk'ivyo, hatabaye guhagarika ukwandukizanya, bisa n'"ibidashoboka". Avuga ko n'ibihugu bifise ubushobozi bukomeye mu vyo amagara y'abantu hamwe n'uburambe mu migambi yo gucandaga - nk'Ubwongereza - bizosanga gushikira abantu benshi mu ntumbero yo guhagarika ukwandukizanya harimwo ingorane nyinshi. Prof Salisbur avuga ko mu gihe kazoza ku migwi igeramiwe  "ata nkeka kazoba ari keza" mu mwaka uza, abandi dusigaye dusa n'uko dukwiye kwongereza ingingo zo kwikingira mu misi iri mbere, ico yise "urucanco rurenzeko". Prof Ghani yemeza akanagereranya ko bizotwara iyindi myaka 2 "kugira isi yose izogaruke mu buzima busanzwe", ariko mu gihe uko bikorwa vyonyaruka ku bihugu bitunze nk'Ubwongereza. Ariko yagabishije ko mu gihe incanco zorangiza ico kiza, "ntizizorandurana n'imizi uwo mugera", isi izokenera  "kubandanya gucandagwa" nk'uko ibikora no ku zindi ngwara. Hishimikijwe igihe gishasha c'"urucanco rurenzeko" rushobora gufasha mu kugwanya Covid- 19, umwaka wa 2021 usa n'uwuzodusaba kubandanya kurondera kugwanya ico kiza mu mezi ari imbere -  mbere n'inyuma y'aho.

headline: James Hamblin ni muganga abona ko ata mpamvu y'uko abantu bama boga buri mwanya
text: Muganga James Hamblin, ni umuhinga wo kurwanya indwara, akaba n'umwigisha kuri kaminuza ya Yale, ntabona igituma abantu bokwama  boga buri mwanya. Uyu muganga amaze imyaka itanu akora ubushakashatsi ku bijanye no kwinyukura ku mubiri akaba yiteze gusohora igitabu mu misi iri imbere. "Jewe niyumva neza ni ukuri", uko niko muganga Hamblin yishuye abajijwe ingene yiyumva inyuma y'imyaka itanu amaze atoga. Yabwiye BBC ati: "Uravamwo ukamenyera. Ni ibisanzwe". Hamblin afise imyaka 37, akaba ari umwigisha kuri Kaminuza ya Yale mu gisata c'amagara y'abantu kandi akaba ari umuhinga wo kurwanya indwara. Ni umwe mu banditsi b'ikinyamakuru co muri Amerika -The Atlantic, ari naco yanditsemwo inkuru yise: "Narahevye kwoga, kandi ubuzima bwanje bwarabandanije neza". Iyo nkuru yanditse mu 2016 ivuga iti: "Mu myaka yose tubaho kw'isi, tumara imyaka ibiri yose turiko turoga gusa. Iyumvire uwo mwanya wose, amafaranga hamwe n'amazi dutakaza". Uno mwaka kandi, yongeye kwandika iyindi nkuru yise: "Uroga birenze urugero". Hagati aho, ashimangira ko twokwama dukaraba intoke n'isabuni, ariko akavuga ko bidakenewe kwoga umwanya wose mu bindi bihimba vy'umubiri. Yatanguye nk'ukugerageza kugira arabe ingene bigenda Rero abajijwe icamutumye aheba kwoga, yabanje guhora hanyuma yishura ati: "Mvugishije ukuri, ni birebire kandi vyosaba kwandika igitabo cose kugira ndabisigure. Ariko jewe nashatse kumenya ivyokurikira". "Ndazi ko hari abantu boga gake cane kabaho. Nari nzi ko bishoboka, ariko nashatse kwigeragerezako jewe nyene kugira ngo ndabe ingaruba bishobora kungirira". Niho mu mwaka wa 2015 yafata ingingo. None wabonye iki? Hari ingaruka wibonyeko? Yishura ati: "N'ubu ni birebire. Uko umwanya ugenda, umubiri uramenyera gushika aho utakinuka cane n'aho utokoresha isabuni canke ibimoga". "Ariko ikintu gikomeye ni ugutahura ko bifata umwanya muremure. Si ibintu bica biba ubwo nyene". Ashimangira ko ku ruhande rwiwe yagiye bukebuke. Yabanje kugabanya isabuni n'ibimoga yakoresha, hanyuma agabanya incuro yoga, kuko yahora yoga hafi imisi yose. Ati: "Hari igihe numva ko nshatse kwoga kubera ntabiheruka kandi nkanuka cane. Ariko ivyo vyagiye bigabanuka cane rwose". Inyuma y'imyaka ine iheze Mu nkuru yiwe yo mu 2016, Hamblin yanditse ati: "Umunuko w'umubiri uterwa n'udukoko (bacteries)  tuba ku mubiri wacu tukabeshwaho n'ukurya amavuta ava mu mubiri wacu kubera icuya". Kwisiga amavuta ku mubiri no mu mushatsi imisi yose "hari ukuntu bihindura isano riri hagati y'aya mavuta ava mu mubiri wacu n'utu dukoko tubeshejweho nayo". "Iyo woze ukinyukura cane, uba wononye imibereho yatwo, ibi bigatuma utu dukoko dushima  kurya imikorobi ituma umubiri ugira akamoto". Ariko haciye igihe utabikora, haragera igihe umubiri ukamenyera ntube ukinuka (...) Ntuba ukinuka nk'amazi mabi (...) usanga umota bisanzwe nk'umuntu". Ariko mu kiganiro yatanze muri uno mwaka ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi rwa kaminuza ya Yale, Hamblin asobanura ati: "Si ukuvuga ko ata kamoto nari mfise, ariko gusa utu dukoko turi ku mubiri wanje ntitugisohora akamoto kabi dusanzwe dusohora". Mu kwa munani guheze, umunyamakuru wa BBC, Amy Barrett, yamubajije nimba ata mpungenge yari afise ko yashobora kuba "anuka", ariko abantu "bakamugumiriza akabanga" ntibabimubwire. Yishuye ko yamaze igihe kirekire abaza "abagenzi, incuti n'abandi bantu yari azi ko bamugumiriza akabanga" kugira ngo arabe ko atohava aboneka ko ari we wenyene anuka.

headline: Guhagarika gupima umugera wa SIDA ikivunga ngo si mu Burundi honyene
text: Leta y'u Burundi iherutse gutangaza ingingo yafashe yo guhagarika gupima umugera wa SIDA ikivunga, ahubwo ikibanda ku migwi ifise ivyago vyo kwandura kurusha abandi. Iyo ngingo ngo ntifashwe n'u Burundi gusa kuko iriko irafatwa n'ibihugu vyinshi hirya no hino kw'isi, ahanini ikaba iterwa n'uburyo ariko kandi n'uko hakenewe guhindura uburyo uwo mugera upimwa. Madamu Jeanne Gapiya, yatanguje ikigo ca ANSS gisanzwe citaho ico gikorwa co kurwanya umugera wa SIDA, yabisiguriye BBC Gahuzamiryango mu kiganiro yagiranye na Florentine Kwizera.

headline: Covid-19: Abashikiranganji b'amagara y'abantu muri Africa baraganira na WHO ku ncanco
text: Vyitezwe ko abashikiranganji b'amagara y'abantu n'abo ikigega ca reta bo ku mugabane wa Afrika babonana n'umukuru w'ishami rya Onu rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO, kugira baganire ingene bosabikanya incanco za Covid -19. Umuyobozi wa OMS, Dr Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, yagize ati: "Ndaza kubabwira ko turiko turakora uko dushoboye kugira dutangure gutanga incanco ku mugabane wa Afrika, kugira turokore ubuzima bw'abantu no gusubiza itoto ubutunzi." Mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru ku musi wa gatatu, umukuru w'ishami rya Onu rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, yavuze ko igisigaye ari uko amakungu yokora akazi kayo. Iyo ngingo ishitsweko inyuma y'aho prezida wa Afrika y'epfo Cyril Ramaphosa, asanzwe arongoye ishirahamwe ry'ubumwe bwa Afrika muri kino gihe, ahamagariye ibihugu bitunze kurusha ibindi, gutegekanya incanco zigenewe ibihugu bikenye. Ibihugu bitunze vyaguze incanco za Covid-19 hafi imiliyoni 800, zishobora gucandaga abanyagihugu bose b'ivyo bihugu imbere y'uko ibihugu bikenye bironka na zike, nk'uko bivugwa na Dr Seth Berkley, arongoye ikigo gitanga incanco ca Gavi. Muri iyo nama mpuzamakungu iraba ivy'ubutunzi kw'isi, Dr Berkley yagize ati: "Barafise kandi izindi ncanco imiriyaridi 1.4. Ariko kugira ibihugu bikenye bishobore gucandaga abanyagihugu bavyo, dutegura kuganira n'ibihugu bitunze, tubasabe guterera incanco ivyo bihugu bikeneye." Yongeyeko ati: "Mu gihe ivyo tutobishikako, tuzobabwira ko twiteguye kuzibagurira." Ibihugu birenga 45 kw'isi biramaze gutangura gutanga incanco za Covid-19. Ku mugabane wa Afrika, Misri, Maroc, Guinee, Ile Maurice na Seychelle ni vyo bihugu vyonyene vya Afrika bimaze gutangura gutanga incanco ku bakozi bo mu bisata vy'amagara y'abantu hamwe n'abantu bashobora kwandukirwa vyihuse. Ivyo bihugu bitanu bikoresha incanco vyahawe n'ibihugu bitunze basanzwe bafitaniye imigenderanire. N'aho urucanco rwa Pfizer rwamaze kwemezwa, OMS ntiratanga uruhusha rwo kurukwiragiza mu bihugu vya Afrika.

headline: Covid-19: Uganda yatanguye igerageza ry'umuti yikoreye
text: Uganda yatanguje icese ibikorwa vyo kugerageza umuti yikoreye yizeye ko ushobora kuvura ca kiza karanda ca Covid-19. Uwu muti w'amazi wakozwe n'abahinga bo muri Uganda mu kuvanga imiti kama izwi cane muri ico gihugu. Abantu barenga ibihumbi 40 baramaze kwandura uwu mugera kuva mu kwa gatatu umwaka uheze muri iki gihugu co muri Afrika y'Ubuseruko. Ibi bikorwa vyo kugerageza uwu muti bigiye gukorerwa mu bitaro bikuru vy'igihugu vya Mulago ku mugwa mukuru wa Uganda. Abazokoreshwa muri iri gerageza bose ni abantu bakuze basanzwe baranduye coronavirus kandi ku rugero rutandukanye. Abantu barenga 120 ni bo bazokoreshwa mu gice ca kabiri c'igerageza, kigamije kwiga nimba uyu muti ata bibazo ushobora gutera - ariko cane cane - nimba koko ufise ubushobozi bwo kuvura Covid-19. Mw'ijambo yashikirije igihe yariko amenyesha ibijanye n'iri gerageza, umwe muri aba bahinga bakoze uwu muti - wiswe UBV-01N - yavuze ko intambamyi ya mbere yabaye ukumenya nimba uwu muti w'amazi ushobora gushika mu maraso mu gihe ufashwe mu kunywa. Perezida Yoweri Museveni avuga ko Abanyafrika badategerezwa kuzera inze iva mu bihugu vy'abazungu mu gutorera inyishu y'ikibazo ca Covid-19. Vyitezwe ko inyishu zizoboneka inyuma y'ikiringo c'umwaka wose. Umuti w'amazi wahaririweko cane wakorewe muri Madagascar - ukozwe mu catsi kama ca Artemisia mu mwaka uheze - wabonetse ko ata bushobozi ufise bwo kuvura uwu mugera.

headline: North Korea: Kim Jong-un avuga ko ikiza karanda ca Covid ku gihugu ciwe ari akaga gakomeye
text: Ibinyamakuru vya Korea ya Ruguru bitangaza ko indongozi yaco Kim Jong-un avuga ko umuvuduko udasanzwe ikiza karanda ca Covid kiriko kirafata ari "akaga gakomeye" ku gihugu ciwe. Mu nama yihutirwa yabaye kuri uno wa gatandatu, Kim Jong-un yateye akamo ko hokoreshwa inguvu zose kugira barwanye uwu mugera. Ni inyuma y'aho abategetsi b'ico gihugu batangarije ku musi wa kane ko habonetse abantu ba mbere banduye uwo mugera - n'aho abahinga bemeza ko uwo mugera ushobora kuba umaze igihe kitari gito uzunguruka mu gihugu. Hari ubwoba ko  iki kiza gishobora kugira ingaruka mbi cane muri Korea ya Ruguru. Abanyagihugu baco bashobora kuhagirira ingorane kubera ata mugambi w'incanco uri mu gihugu, hamwe n'igisata c'amagara y'abantu atako cifashe. Kuri uno wa gatandatu, ibinyamakuru vya reta vyatangaje ko muri zino ndwi nkeya ziheze haboneste abanyagihugu bagera ku gice c'umuriyoni bari babangamiwe n'umururumbo ku buryo budasiguritse. Iki gihugu gifise uburyo buke bwo gupima, rero bikaba bishoboka ko hari abanduye Covid bashobora kuba batazwi. Iki gitigiri caraduze cane ugereranije n'ivyari vyatangajwe ku wa kane no ku wa gatanu, bikaboneka ko iki kiza kibangamiye cane Korea ya Ruguru. Itororokanirizo ry'amakuru KCNA risubiramwo Kim avuga ati: "Ikwirakwira ry'aka karanda kabi niko kaga ka mbere gakomeye gateye igihugu cacu kuva kibayeho". Avuga ko iki kibazo kivuye ku bushobozi buke bw'abategetsi n'abajejwe amagara y'abantu, aca asaba ko bokwigira bindi bihugu ingene vyarwanije iki kiza, nk'akarorero igihugu kibanyi c'Ubushinwa. Ibinyamakuru vyegamiye reta bivuga ko abantu 27 bamaze gupfa kuva muri Ndamukiza (4) biturutse ku mururumbo. Aya makuru ntavuga nimba bari baranduye Covid, kiretse umwe gusa yatangajwe ku mugwa mukuru Pyongyang ko yahitanywe na Covid yo mu bwoko bwa Omicron. Iyi ngingo yo gutangaza ko hari abanduye Covid muri ico gihugu kubwa kane ije inyuma y'ikiringo c'imyaka ibiri Korea ya Ruguru yari imaze ivuga ko ata Covid iri mu gihugu. Iki gihugu cirebanga caranse amamiriyoni n'amamiriyoni y'incanco za AstraZeneca n'izo mu Bushinwa cari cemerewe n'amakungu mu mwaka uheze. Ahubwo coco civugira ko cashoboye kuzibiria Covid mu kwugara imbibe zaco mu wa mbere 2020. Gisanzwe gisangiye imbibe na Korea y'Epfo hamwe n'Ubushinwa, vyompi bikaba vyarashoboye kurwanya aka karanda. Muri kino gihe, Ubushinwa buri mu rugamba rwo kurwanya ubwoko bwa Omicron mu kwugara ibisagara binini binini. Mu nama yari ifise intumbero yo gutangaza amabwirizwa ajanye na Covid ku wa kane, Kim yabonetse ku mboneshakure yambaye agapfukamunwa ubwa mbere. Yategetse ko haba ingingo zihutirwa zikomeye zo kurwanya uwu mugera, harimwo ibisa n'ingingo za guma mu rugo no guhagarika kurundarundana mu bibanza vy'akazi. Korea y'Epfo ivuga ko yemereye ubutabazi umubanyi wayo wo mu buraruko inyuma y'ivyatangajwe ku wa kane, ariko ko Pyongyang itarishura.

headline: Africa - Covid: Abarwaye bakaremba bafise ivyago vyinshi vyo gupfa gusumba ahandi kw'isi
text: Abarwaye bakaremba kubera Covid-19 bafise ivyago vyinshi vyo gushobora gupfa muri Afrika kurusha ahandi hose kw'isi. Icigwa giherutse gusohorwa na Lancet ivyo kivyegeka ku bukene bw'ibikoresho nkenerwa cane mu bitaro bikoreshwa mu kurokora ubuzima. Birava kandi ku bukene bw'abakozi bafise ubumenyi bukwiye. Hafi 48% y'abarwara bakaremba binjizwa ibitaro muri Afrika barapfa. Aho ni mu gihe muri rusangi urugero rw'abapfa kw'isi ari 31,5% nk'uko ico cigwa kivyerekana. Urwo rugero rushobora kuba ari runini gusumbaho aho mu bitaro bitobito bidafise ibisata vyo kwakira abantu baremvye cane. Umwigisha  Bruce Biccard wo ku bitaro vya Groote Schuur kuri kaminuza ya Cape Town avuga ati: "Icigwa cacu nico ca mbere gitanze ido n'ido ry'ishusho y'ibishikira abantu barwaye bakaremba kubera Covid-19 muri Afrika, hakoreshejwe amakuru twakuye mu bihugu no mu bitaro vyinshi". Umwigisha Biccard, ari mu bari barongoye ico cigwa, abandanya avuga ati: "Ikibabaje, n'uko ico cigwa cerekana ko ubushobozi bwacu bwo kwitaho abagwayi bubangamirwa n'ubukeneye bw'ibitanda vyo kwakira abaremvye n'uburyyo buke mu bisata vyo kwitaho abaremvye cane". Gushika ubu muri Afrika haharurwa abantu 120.000 bamaze kwicwa na Covid-19, abo bakaba bangana na 4% y'abamaze gupfa kw'isi yose. Abantu bakuze barenga 3.000 bo mu bihugu 10 vyo muyri Afrika baritabiriye ico cigwa cashimikiye ku bitaro 60 mu bihugu 10 - Misiri, Ethiopia, Ghana, Kenya, Libya, Malawi, Mozambique, Niger, Nigeria na Afrika y'Epfo. Ico cigwa catoye ko hagati y'ukwezi kwa 5 n'ukwezi kwa 12 mu mwaka uheze, 50% vy'abitabiriye ico cigwa barapfuye bataronkejwe umwuka wo guhumeka (oxygene) abandi 10% nabo ntibavurwa ingorane z'amafyigo.

headline: Kubaho afise ibitsina vyompi ni ingorane kwa Mary Waithera canke James Karanja
text: Igihe Mary Waithera canke  James Karanja yavuka mu mwaka wa 1991, abakirizi barataye umutwe, bagira ubwoba ntibaronka n'ico babwira nyina wiwe. Yavukanye ibitsina bibiri…igitsina c'umukenyezi n'igitsina c'umugabo vyose biri hamwe.  Nyina wiwe akama yibaza igituma umwana wiwe yavutse ameze gutyo. Amaze kuvuka, Mary yamaze ikiringo c'indwi zitatu mu bitaro bari bari mu twigoro two gutorera inyishu iyo ngorane. Iyo yabaye intango y'urugendo rurerure rwa Mary Waithera canke  James Karanja agerageza kwitahura. Abavyeyi biwe bafashe ingingo y'ukumurera nk'umukobwa. Mary Waithera canke  James Karanja ati: "Navutse mfise ingorane nk'uko ndabibwirwa n'abari banyegereye. Nta n'umwe yashoboye kumenya ico ndi. Abavyeyi banje bamaze kumenya ko nari mfise ingorane, dawe yafashe ingingo, bafashe ingingo yo kundera nk'umukobwa. Hagati aho, ubumuga bwanje bwatumye abavyeyi banje bahukana. Dawe yaradutaye, avuga ko mu muryango wabo ata muntu arigera avuka ameze nkanje, aranabuza ko ntorana izina ry'umuryango kuko babona ko ndi umuvumo. Ivyo vyatumye ntorana izina ryo kwa nyokuru avyara mawe. Abavyeyi banje bamaze kwahukana, mawe yaragize umwikomo kubera ivyiyumviro vyinshi, agira n'ibibazo vy'ubuzima igihe yari andeze. Igihe cose naja kuvoma amazi mu mwonga, nayatwara ku rutugu, mu gihe abandi bakobwa bobo bayatwara ku mugongo. Yarandeze nkura nk'umukobwa. Yantegura kuba umukenyezi ameze neza". Karanja yibuka ko ari we "mukobwa" wenyene yagendesha ikinga  ku mutumba wose. Karanja ati: "Nyokuru avyara mama yavuga ko kugira ngo umukobwa aje mu kwezi yategerezwa kuba yaragenyerewe". Amaze kuja mu mashure yisumbuye  kw'ishure rikuru rya Kikambala, yibuka ko habaye ikintu kidasanzwe. Ati: "Bashaka ko ndabereka udutambara two mu kwezi. Umwigisha yavuga ko batari kunyakira kw'iryo shule nterekanye utwo dutambara. Abigisha baguma banyita ko ndi umuhungu". Amaze gushika mu mwaka w'icenda, yatanguye kubona umubiri uhinduka, ageze mu myaka y'ugukura. Ibitugu biraguka n'ijwi rirahinduka. Yama avyuka kwoga mw'ijoro rinihira imbere y'uko abandi banyeshuri bavyuka kugira ngo ntibamubone. Abakobwa batangura kumukunda, bamwandikira n'udukete tutari duke n'aho ari we yari umukuru w'ishure ryabo. Abigisha bamaze kubona ayo makete, baramwirukanye bamwagiriza ko ariko akwiragiza ingeso z'uguhuza ibitsina ku babisangiye. Ati: "Iyo yabaye intango y'ukwimenya". Yagiye kwa muganga kugira ngo abaganga bamupime maze amenye ico yari. Haciye igihe, Karanja yahavuye yemererwa gukora ikibazo ca leta  kandi aronka amanota meza yamuhaye uburenganzira bwo kuja kuri kaminuza. Yararyohewe kuko yibaza ko ingorane zigiye guhera, ariko kwabaye ukwihenda. Kw'ishure kaminuza rya Nairobi, yarankiwe kwinjira incuro nyinshi n'abanyezamu bamusaba gusigura ingene afise izina ry'abagore, Mary Waithera, kandi aboneka nk'umugabo. Eka n'abigisha ba kaminuza iyo hageze gukora ibibazo, bama bashaka kumenya igituma afise izina ry'abagore kandi n'ibimuranga bikerekana ko ari umukobwa. Ni kenshi yama yirukanywe canke bakamucereza gukora ivyo bibazo. Kubera izo ngorane, Karanja yarashatse kwiyahura incuro zitatu zose. Avuga ko ukunenwa ari kwo kwamutumye ashaka gukora ivyo. Hagati aho, Karanja ashaka ko amenyekana nk'umuntu afise ibitsina vyompi, ikiranga umugore n'ikiranga umugabo. Kenya nico gihugu ca mbere muri Afrika cemeje abantu nk'abo Mu gihugu ca Kenya, abantu baharurwa hafi 700.000 nibo bazwi ko bafise ibitsina vyompi. Hagati aho, leta ntiremeza ivyo biharuro. Umushingamateka Milly Odhiambo avuga ati: "Abantu b'ibitsina vyompi ntibaboneka mu gihugu. Amategeko ntabemera". Milly avuga ko kubona amategeko atahora abemera vyatuma abo bantu ata burenganzira na bumwe baronka. Leta ya Kenya yahora yandika abantu ko ari igitsinagabo canke igitsinagore gusa. Kenya nico gihugu ca mbere muri Afrika cemeje abantu bafise ibitsina vyompi muri muri rusansuma y'uno mwaka wa 2019. Abana bavuka bafise ibitsina vyompi bafatwa ko ari umuvumo ku muryango, bigatuma akenshi iyo bavuze baca bicwa mu bihugu bitari bike vya Afrika.

headline: Uganda: Abaganga bari muri yegereyegere bemeye gusubira ku kazi
text: Abaforoma n'abaganga bari bamaze imisi muri yegereyegere bemeye kuyihagarika bagasubira ku kazi ku wa mbere. Inyuma y'inama hagati y'ababaserukira na reta, aba baforoma n'abaganga bimenyereza bemeye guhagarika yegereyegere barimwo yari imaze ukwezi kurenga basaba kwongererezwa agahembo no kworoherezwa ku kazi. Reta yemeye kubongerereza agahembo, bakaba ku mashilingi ya Uganda 750.000 (hafi $200) bakaronka imiriyoni 2.5 z'amashilingi (ni ukuvuga hafi $700). Aka gahembo kazorihwa  uhereye mu kwezi kw'indwi uno mwaka, kandi kuva ku wa mbere kazotegerezwa kuba kashitse ku ma konte yabo. Mu nama y'ejo ku wa gatanu, umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu yaremeye kandi guhagarika ingingo yari yafashe yavuga ko abaganga bose bari bahagaritse akazi bava mu bigo babamwo no mu bibanza vy'akazi vyose vyegukira reta. Uyu murwi w'aba baganga bahagaritse akazi basigaje amezi abiri ngo barangize imyimenyerezo yabo. Abari muri iyi myiyerekano bazokwongererezwa umwanya kugira ngo bashobore kuyirangiza. Kuva mu bihe biheze, imyiyerekano n'ibiganiro ku bijanye n'agashahara hamwe no kwioroherezwa ku kazi muri Uganda ni ibintu vyamye biba n'imiburiburi rimwe um mwaka kuva um 2017. Abaserukira abakozi bo mu gisata c'ubuvuzi bari mu rugendo baja ku nama nshingamateka ku wa gatatu kugira bashikirize urwandiko barazibiwe bongera barahagarikwa n'igipolisi um kiringo c'amasaha, ariko mu nyuma bavamwo bararekurwa.

headline: Kim Jong-un: Korea ya Ruguru 'iri mu ngorane zikomeye' kubera amakosa kuri Covid
text: Ibinyamakuru vya reta ya Koreya ya Ruguru bitangaza ko Kim Jong-un yahambariye abategetsi bakuru bakuru kubera amakosa yateje "ikibazo gikomeye" atavuze ico ari co gifitaniye isano na Covid-19. Cabaye ikimenyetso kidasanzwe cerekana ubukari bw'iki kiza muri Koreya ya Ruguru yamye ihakana yivuye inyuma ko ata n'umwe yigeze yandura Covid mu gihugu - abahinga bakaba bagumye bafise amakenga. Iki gihugu kiracugaye imbibe zaco mu ntumbero yo kuzibira uwu mugera. Ariko bivuye ku bihano cafatiwe n'amakungu, iyi ngingo yatumye imfungurwa zikena mu gihugu, ibintu birayangara mu bijanye n'ubutunzi. Mu misi iheze Kim yaremeye ko hari ikibazo c'imfungurwa "giteye ubwoba" aca abwira abanyagihugu kwitegurira ingaruka "zitari bwigere zibaho", aho yazigereranije n'amapfa yo mu myaka ya 1990 yihaye inkumbi muri ico gihugu. Mu ntango z'ino ndwi, imboneshakure y'igihugu yerekanye amashusho adasanzwe y'umunyagihugu yavuga ko Kim aboneka ko "afise intege nke", amasanamu aheruka akaba yamwerekanye yaratakaje ibiro. Mu majambo yacishijwe ku kinyamakuru ca reta KCNA, Kim yagirije abategetsi bakuru ko babaye abanyarwangara, hari mu nama idasanzwe y'abarongoye umugambwe. Ingaruka ni uko "bateje ikibazo gikomeye mu kubungabunga umutekano w'igihugu n'umutekano w'abanyagihugu kandi bikagira ingaruka zikomeye". Iyi nkuru ivuga kandi ko abategetsi batari bake b'uwo mugambwe bakuwe  - harimwo n'umwe ari muri komite ntayegayezwa - igizwe n'abantu batanu, harimwo na Kim ubwiwe. Ariko, iyi nkuru nta zindi nsiguro itanga ku vyabaye canke kuri abo bategetsi bakuwe. Umushakashatsi yahunze Koreya ya Ruguru, Ahn Chan-il, yabwiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru AFP ko iyi nkuru yerekana ko iki gihugu gisa n'icemera ko hari abanduye Covid. Ni icerekana kandi ko "Pyongyang ishobora kuba ikeneye imfashanyo mpuzamakungu", nk'uko abivuga. "Ahandi ho ibi ntibari kubikora kubera harimwo, vyanka bikunze, ingingo ya reta yo kwemera ko ubutegetsi bwananiwe mu twigoro twayo two kuzibira iki kiza". Iyi nkuru ni icerekana ko ibintu vyifashe "nabi cane" mu gisata c'amagara y'abantu muri Koreya ya Ruguru, nk'uko bivugwa na  Dr Leif-Eric Easley, umwigisha wa kaminuza Ewha Womans University i Seoul muri Koreya y'Epfo. Ati: "Kim ategerezwa kurondera abo atako impfane kuri izi ngorane, mu kwirukana abategetsi b'abahemu no mu kubatako amakosa. "Iki kirashobora kuba ishingiro ya Pyongyang mu gusaba abanyagihugu kwifatafata gusumba, ariko kandi kigashobora kuba gisigura ko iki gihugu kigiye kwemera incanco ziva mu mahanga". Koreya ya Ruguru yarafashe ingingo ruhasha, ibinyamakuru vya reta navyo bikaba bibandanya bisaba abanyagihugu kuba maso kugira ntibinjiranwe n'umugera. Mu mpera z'umwaka uheze ibi binyamakuru bikaba vyagabishije abanyagihugu kwirinda "umukungugu w'umuhondo" (yellow dust/tempête de sable jaune) uva mu Bushinwa. Nta sano rizwi riri hagati y'ibicu vy'umukungugu biza mu gihe kanaka c'umwaka na Covid-19. Urudandaza hagati ya Koreya ya Ruguru n'incuti yayo nyamukuru, Ubushinwa,  rwaragabanutse kuva ico gihugu cugara imbibe zaco, imfungurwa zimwe zimwe n'imiti bikaba bitashoboye kwinjira mu gihugu. Amashirahamwe y'abagiraneza aragabisha ko hashobora kuba ikibazo gikomeye c'imfungurwa n'ubutunzi. Amakuru yasohotse mu mezi aheze avuga ko ibiciro vy'ibifungurwa vyadutse cane, ko hari n'abapfuye bahitanywe n'inzara, ibitigiri vy'abantu basegerereza indya navyo bikaduga.

headline: China igiye gusubira kuba nyabagendwa kuva muri Nzero
text: Frances Mao & Fan Wang BBC News Ubushinwa bugiye kuvanaho ‘quarantaine’ [ingingo yo kugumiza umuntu ukwa wenyene] ku ngenzi, ikaba ari yo ntambwe ya nyuma yo kuva kuri poritike ya Covid-zero ico gihugu cari kigize igihe kigenderako. Inyuma y’imyaka hafi itatu imbibe zugaye, ibi bizotuma igihugu gisubira kwugururwa ku bafise visa z’akazi canke z’amashure, canke abagiye kuramutsa imiryango. Ariko ivyo bishitse mu gihe Ubushinwa buhanganye n’ikwirakwira rishasha ry’umugera mu gihe izo ngingo zariko ziravanwaho. Amakuru avuga ko ibitaro vyarengewe n’abarwaye, abageze mu za bukuru nabo bariko barapfa ku bwinshi. Ibitigiri vy’ukuri – vy’abandura n’abapfa ku munsi ku munsi – ubu ntibizwi kuko abategetsi bahagaritse gushira ahabona ibiharuro bijanye na Covid. Ku ndwi iheze, ubutegetsi bw’Ubushinwa bwari bwamenyesheje hafi abandura bashasha 4.000 buri munsi n’abapfa bake. Ku wa Mungu, bavuze ko bagiye guhagarika gushira ahabona ivyo biharuro. Ariko ikigo co mu Bwongereza kibikurikirana, Airfinity, cagereranije ko mu Bushinwa  handura abantu bashasha barenga umuriyoni hagapfa 5.000 buri munsi, ku bw’itororokanirizo ry’amakuru  Reuters. Ubushinwa nico gihugu ca nyuma ca rutura mu butunzi gifashe inzira yo “kubana na Covid”  inyuma y’imyaka itatu ya guma mu rugo, kwugara imbibe n’itegeko ryo kuja muri “quarantaine” ku bantu batowe umugera wa Covid canke abagize aho bahurira na bo. Poritike ya Covid zero yarahungabanije ubutunzi, abanyagihugu nabo bararambwirwa n’ingingo zibabuza ukwishira no kwizana hamwe n’ibipimo vya buri igihe. Ukurengerwa n’izo ngingo vyararushe bishika ku myiyerekano itamenyerewe muri ico gihugu yo kwiyamiriza prezida Xi Jinping muri Munyonyo (ukwezi kwa 11), ivyatumye abategetsi batezura ingingo za Covid mu mayinga yakurikiye. Imbibe zugaye niyo nzitizi ya nyuma yari igisigaye. Kuva muri Ntwarante mu 2020, uwari we wese yinjira mu Bushinwa yategerezwa gushika ashirwa muri quarantaine mu kibanza ca reta – mu kiringo gishika ku ndwi zitatu icarimwe. Ico ubu vuba caragabanuwe gishirwa ku minsi itanu. Ariko ku wa mbere, inama y‘igihugu ijejwe amagara yamenyesheje ko Covid igiye kumanurwa igashirwa ku rugero rwa Class B kuva ku wa 8 Nzero. Ivyo bisigura ko quarantaine izoca ivaho -n’ubwo abavuye hanze bagiye muri ico gihugu bazotegerezwa kugirisha igipimo ca PCR – kandi ko n’igitigiri ntarengwa c’indege zinjira mu Bushinwa ku munsi naco kigiye kuhava. Abategetsi bavuze kandi bazokworosha ibijanye no gusaba visa ku banyamahanga bifuza kuja mu Bushinwa kwiga, gukora canke kuramutsa umuryango canke kuja kubana nawo. Ntibiramenyekana niba harimwo na visa ku ngenzi (tourist visa), ariko abategetsi bavuze ko hagiye kuzoba gahunda y’ifatiro ku bwato mpuzamakungu bw’ingenzi. Ayo mategeko mashasha yakiriwe neza cane n’Abashinwa benshi ubu bagiye gusubira kuja mu makungu. Kompanyi ya mbere itunganya ingendo kuri internet yamenyesheje ko ibitigiri vy’abayishorera vyaduze cane mu masaha make  izo ngingo zimaze gutangazwa. Ariko hari n’abandi berekanye agashavu k’ingene ukwo kwidegenvya kuja giturumbuka inyuma y’imyaka y’igenzurwa ritabujije ko abantu baguma bandura. Abandi bashikirije impungenge ku mbuga hwaniro kuri uko kwugurura imbibe mu gihe abandura Covid basubiye kwiyongera cane mu Bushinwa. Bumwe mu butumwa bwakunzwe cane kuri Weibo bwagize buti : “Kuki tutari kurindira ko uwu mupfunda ubanza gucureha imbere y’uko twugurura? Abakozi bo kwa muganga basanzwe bamaze kuruha, hanyuma abageze mu za bukuru ntibazorusimba kabiri mu kwezi kumwe”. Ababa mu bisagara nka Beijing na Shanghai, ubu birangwamwo ubukonje bwinshi, bavuga ko baheranywe n’imiti y’ibicurane kandi bakeneye ubufasha bwo kwa muganga ku babo barwaye. Hari impungenge ko hari impfu nyinshi zitamenyekana kuko ibibanza vyo guturiramwo abapfuye vyarengewe. Ku wa mbere, prezida Xi yagize ico avuga ubwa mbere kuri izo mpinduka, asaba abategetsi gukora “ibishoboka” kugira  ubuzima burokorwe. Ibinyamamukuru vya reta vyamusubiyemwo avuga ko igihugu cugarijwe n’igihe gishasha co kurwanya ico kiza, kandi ko hakenewe inyishu yihariye. Kuba Ubushinwa  bwahindukiye ku murongo bwahorako mu kurwanya Covid vyatumye prezida Xi arotoherwa, nk’uko abihweza ibintu n’ibindi babibona. Niwe yari imbere muri poritike ya Covid zero benshi bidogera ko izingamitse ubuzima bwabo bikabije hanyuma igahungabanya ubutunzi. Ubu naho yayiyehevye, abaraba ibnintu n’ibindi bavuga ategerezwa kwemanga umutwaro w’umupfunda ukomeye w’abandura n’abinjizwa ibitaro. Benshi baribaza igituma igihugu kititeguye neza gusumba.

headline: AstraZeneca: EU ivuga ko ivyiza vy'urwo rucanco biruta inkurikizi mbi
text: Urwego rugenzura imiti mw'ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Buraya, EU, ruvuga ko rwemera rushimitse ko ivyiza vy'urucanco Oxford-AstraZeneca rwa Covid-19 birenze kure  inkurikizi mbi. Urwo rwego rwavuze rushimitse ko "ata kimenyetso na kimwe" cerekana ko urwo rucanco rutuma amaraso avura, inyuma y'aho ibihugu vyinshi bikomakomeye vyo muri EU bihagarikiye kurukoresha. Umukuru w'urwego rujejwe kugenzura imiti mw''ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Buraya (EMA), Emer Cooke, yamenyesheje ko urwo rwego rwagumijeho icemezo co kwemeza urwo rucanco. Amatohoza ku bantu bake bavuze amaraso inyuma yo kuronswa urwo rucanco aracabandanya. Ishami rya Onu rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi OMS/WHO ryasavye ivyo bihugu kudahagarika urwo rucanco. Abahinga mu bijanye n'incanco muri OMS bakoranye kuri uyu wa kabiri kugira bihweze ivyerekeye urwo rucanco rwa Oxford-AstraZeneza. EMA ivuga ko abantu vyavuzwe ko bavuze  amaraso inyuma yo kuronswa urwo rucanco atari benshi kuruta abasanganywe ico kibazo muri rusangi. Umupfasoni Cooke yavuze ati: "Turazi ko abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bagira ikibazo co kuvura amaraso muri EU, ubu rero ico dushaka, n'ukumenya nimba ivyo bintu vyatewe n'urwo rucanco canke n'ibindi bintu." Yongeyeko ati: "Mu gihe amatohoza akibandanya, ubu turacemeza tudakekeranya ko ivyiza vy'urucanco AstraZeneca mu kugwanya Covid-19, harimwo n'inkurikizi y'iyo ngwara yo kuja mu bitaro no gupfa, biruta kure izo ngaruka mbi." Ivyavuye mu matohoza ya EMA vyitezwe kuja ahabona ku musi wa kane.

headline: Covid-19: Ingene ibimenyetso vyayo vyagiye birahinduka
text: Ububabare bwo mu muhogo, kumeneka umutwe, ibiseru vyinshi n’inkorora nivyo  bimenyetso nyamukuru bishobora kwerekana ko umuntu afise covid-19. Ibi biri mu cegeranyo co mu Bwongereza gifatiye ku nkuru zatanzwe n’abantu ibihumbi 175 bapimwe bagatorwa umugera mu ndwi yari iheze. Ibi biri mu cegeranyo co mu Bwongereza gifatiye ku nkuru zatanzwe n’abantu ibihumbi 175 bapimwe bagatorwa umugera mu ndwi yari iheze. Ibiharuro vyegeranijwe hifashishijwe  app ya Zoe Covid, vyarihwejwe  ku bufatanye bw’abashakashatsi ba kaminuza ya King’s  College London, bafashwe mu mugongo na NHS, igisata citaho amagara amagara y’abantu muri ico gihugu. Ico cigwa cerekanye ko ubushuhe burenze , ukutamoterwa hamwe no kutumva ico umuntu ashize ku rurimi uko kimeze (mko kutamenya ko kirura canke gisosa) vyari bisanzwe ari vyo bimenyetso vyerekana iyo ndwara mu mezi make aheze, bitacibonekeza cane ubu. Ibindi bimenyetso nk’ijwi rijwangaraye, kwitsamura/kwasamura, uburuhe n’ububabare bw’umubiri vyagumye biboneka ku rutonde  rw’ibimenyetso vy’iyo ndwara. Ibimenyetso nyamukuru 20 vya Covid-19 kuva kuri kinini uja kuri gitoya hakurikijwe ivyigwa vyakozwe na Zoe, n’ibi bikurikira:  Aya makuru ahuye n’ubundi bushakashatsi bwa vuba . Nk’akarorero icigwa React-1, buri kwezi,  cama  gifata kitarobanuye,  abantu hafi ibihumbi 150 mu Bwongereza. Bose baca bagirirwa igipimo cihuta co gusuzuma ko ata mugera bafise. Ivyavuye muri ico cigwa ubu bwa vuba vyerekana ko ibimenyetso vya Covid-19 bigaragara kenshi bitagumye ari bimwe mu gihe c’ico kiza. Ivyo bishobora kuba vyatewe n’uko umugera wa corona wagiye urahindagura imero, nk’ukop abahinga bavyibaza. Harabonetse ubwoko bwinshi bw’umugera wa  corona kuva ubwa mbere butowe mu gisagara ca Wuhan mu Bushinwa. Ubwoko bwa vuba ni Omicron.  Abashakashatsi ba React-1 - bo kuri  Imperial College London -  bemeza ko gutakaza ukumoterwa n’ukutumva ibisosa canke ibirura bisa n’ibidakunda gushika kenshi ku bwoko bushasha bw’uwo mugera. Ariko abakozweko amatohoza bigeze kurwara bavugako  ibimenyetso vy’inkorora canke ibicurane  biguma vyibonekeza. Barihweje imero ya mbere y’ubwoko bwa Omicron buzwi nka BA.1 na BA.2,  bwiganje cane guhera  mu kwezi kwa gatatu mu 2022. Kuva ico gihe, ibisanira bibiri vyamuka kuri Omicron,  vyandukira cane , vyiswe  BA.4 na BA.5 vyarakwiye henshi kandi akaba arivyo ahanini vyafashe abanduye bashasha. Haragereranywa ko abantu miliyoni 2,7  mu  Bwongereza - n’ukuvuga 1 kuri 25 – ubu banduye  umugera wa Covid-19, kandi ko ibihugu vyinshi vyo muri Amerika y’Epfo no kw’isi nzima  ubu bwa vuba igitigiri c’abandura ciyongeye. Tim Spector arongoye ico cigwa akoresha app ya Zoe avuga ko n’ubu hataraboneka uburyo bwo kwirinda   Covid. Agira ati : ’’N’abantu bagwaye bigeze kurwara  Covid kandi bakaronka urucanco barayandura”. Abandanya ati: “Dutegerezwa kuraba neza ko ari nkenerwa ko twitaba imanza zihuriramwo abantu abantu  benshi, ko tuja gukorera mu mu biro canke canke ko dukoresha uburyo rusangi bwo kwiyunguruza um masaha buba bukenewe n’abantu benshi”.

headline: Tanzania: Paul Makonda arongoye igisagara ca Dar es Salaam avuga ko coronavirus yaheze
text: Umukuru w'igisagara ca Dar es Salaam muri Tanzania, Paul Makonda, yahamagariye abanyagihugu kwiha amabarabara kuri uyu wa Mungu bakigina ko umugera wa coronavirus waheze mu gihugu. Yababwiye ko amaduka amanura igiciro gushika ku bice 80%, abahimiriza kuja kugura uduhuzu twiza two kwambara mu kwigina . Hagati aho, abatanzaniya benshi bafise amakenga kuri ivyo vyavuzwe na Bwana Makonda, bakabona ko ingingo ibuza abantu kwegerana ishobora guhonyangwa. Nta wundi mutegetsi wundi canke ishirahamwe iryo ari ryo ryose rimenyesha ivyo uko umugera wa coronavirus woba waheze muri ico gihugu kiri muri Afrika y'Ubuseruko. Mu minsi mike iheze, ibiro vy'ubuserukizi bwa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika muri Tanzania vyamenyesheje ko ibitaro vyo mu gisagara ca Dar es Salaam vyari "vyarengewe" n'abarwayi b'umurengera. Umugambwe utavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi, ACT-Wazalendo, wariyamirije ivyatangajwe na leta, aho yamenyesha ko umurindi w'ikwirakwira ry'uwo mugera ryagabanutse muri Tanzania. Haraciye ukwezi kurenga kuva ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu bushikirije ibitigiri vy'abanduye coronavirus n'abahitanywe n'uwo mugera. Umukuru w'ico gihugu, John Magufuli, arashimangira ko ico kiza cagabanutse. Ibiharuro vya nyuma biheruka, vyavuga ko abantu 509 ari bo banduye coronavirus, 21 nabo bakaba ari bo bari bamaze guhitanwa nayo.

headline: Ikiganiro Bazamuganga ku menyo ya muzitsa.
text: Mu kiganiro Bazamuganga, BBC yaganiriye na muganga Josee Uwamariya ku menyo yitwa muzitsa. Ni amenyo y'ibijigo amera nyuma y'ayandi. Ayo menyo amaze iki? Haba se hari ibibazo ateza?

headline: DRC-Covid: Prezida Tshisekedi yiteje urukingo Moderna rwa Covid
text: Umukuru wa Repuburika ya Demokrasi ya Congo Felix Tshiseketi yiteje  urucanco rwa Moderna rwa Covid -19 inyuma y'amezi yari aheze yanse urwa AstraZeneca avuga ko atarwizeye. Gushika ubu abategetsi ba Congo bari bakigonanwa guhimiririza abantu kwicandagisha. Mu gihugu cose abangana n'umwe kw'ijana (1%) nibo bonyene bamaze kwicandagisha. Mu kwezi kw'indwi prezida  Tshisekedi yari yavuze ko adashaka kwiteza AstraZeneca kubera impungenge z'uko rushobora gutera ukuvura kw'amaraso. Ariko ko azokwiteza urundi hamwe rwoboneka. Yongeye avuga ko amaze kubura incuti kubera iyo ndwara, ko rero urucanco ari yo nzira yo gufata. Ku ndwi iheze Congo Kinshasa niho yaronka incanco za mbere za Moderna zishika ibihumbi 250. Muri Congo ibiharuro bizwi icese vyerekana ko hamaze gupfa abantu 1.000 bahitanywe na Covid. Ico gihugu gisanzwe cugarijwe n'ibindi bibazo vyinshi vy'indwara harimwo mugiga (meningite) imaze kwica abatari munsi ya 120 kuva mu kwezi kw'indwi

headline: Malaria: Gerard Niyondiko arizigiye ko OMS/WHO izokwemeza amavuta ye yirukana imibu
text: Gerard Niyondiko, umurundi aba muri Burkina Faso yinjiye ku rutonde rw'abitangiye kurwanya umubu utera malaria akoresheje amavuta yo kwisiga yise Maïa, amavuta ariko ataremerwa na OMS/WHO. Mu gihe amakungu yari aramutse ahimbaza umusi wahariwe kurwanya malaria kw'isi, Niyondiko yabwiye BBC ko we na bagenziwe batoye amavuta umuntu yisiga amukingira umubu igihe kirenga amasaha arenga umunani. Icegeranyo c'ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO cerekana ko mu 2020 abantu bababa imiriyoni 241 bwarwaye malaria, hamwe na miliyoni 228 mu mwaka uheze wa 2021, abenshi muri bo bakaba bari ku mugabane wa Afrika. Malaria ni indwara iterwa n'umubu w'ingore, uzwi nka anopheles. Hari uburyo butandukanye bwo kwirinda uwu mubu, burimwo gukoresha inzitiramibu n'ibindi. Niyondiko, avuga ko gushika ubu OMS "itarigera yemeza amavuta ayo ari yo yose canke ikintu cirukana imibu bijanye n'amavuta abantu bisiga gifise uburenganzira bwa OMS gushika ubu". Hagati aho, avuga ko we na bagenzi we bari kumwe muri uwo mugambi bakoze ubushakashatsi bwerekanye ko aya mavuta akora neza kandi ko ata ngaruka afise kubayakoresha. Ati: "Twarakoze ubushakashatsi muri Burfina Faso be no muri Tanzania aho ayo mavuta bayasuzumye, ibi bikerekana y'uko afise ububasha bwo kwirukana imibu iyo umuntu ayisize hagati y'amasaha umunani na cenda". Avuga ko babandanya bakorana na OMS, bakayishikiriza ivyo babandanya bakora vyose, akizera ko bitebe bitebuke iri shirahamwe rizokwemeza aya mavuta kuko bakora bisunga ibisabwa n'iri shirahamwe. Mu Burundi, malaria iri mu ndwara za mbere zihitana abatari bake. Ikinyamakuru gitangaza amakuru y'ubutabazi, Relief web, gisubiramwo ibiri mu cegeranyo c'Ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu mu Burundi kivuga ko gushika muri Kigarama 2021, abantu bababa imiriyoni 5,7 ari bo banduye malaria ku banyagihugu bose barenga imiroyini 12,6. Ivyo biharuro vyerekana ko ibitigiri vy'abayirwaye vyaduze ugereranije n'umwaka w'imbere y'aho wa 2020, aho abantu bababa imiriyoni 4,4 ari bo bamenyekanye ko bayirwaye. N'aho biri uko, ibiharuro vy'abahitanywe na malaria vyaramanutse ugereranije na 2020, aho gushika ku wa 12/12/2021, abashika1.519 ari bo bapfuye, ibi bikerekana ko abajejwe ubuvuzi bakoze bigashimwa. Mu butumwa bwiwe mu guhimbaza uwo musi, Dr Matshidiso Moeti aserukira OMS muri Afrika yavuze ko malaria ikiri akaga gakomeye ku magara y'abantu kandi ko ibangamiye iterambere. Atera akamo ibihugu vyose birangwamwo malaria gukorana n'amashirahamwe ajejwe iterambere kugira ngo bishobore gutuza burundu iyi ndwara.

headline: Kenya iracahanzwe n'umuti ubuza gusama uva mu Bushinwa n'ubwo umaze imyaka 10 warabujijwe
text: Na Evelyne Musambi B﻿BC News, Nairobi Igihe Susan Wamaitha yatangura kwumva arwaye haraheze umwaka, yibaza ko ari ingaruka zava ku muti ukinga gusama inda yari amaze amezi atanguye gufata - biza kumenyekana ko yari amaze indwi munani asamye inda. Uwo mugore w'imyaka 32 ubu ni nyina w’abana batatu. Ntiyamenye ko uwo muti ukinga gusama inda yari yatanguye gufata mu kwezi kwa Ruheshi (6)  mu 2021 wari ubujijwe muri Kenya. A﻿bantu muri Kenya bawuzi kw'izina rya "Sofia" ariko ukorerwa mu Bushinwa kandi insiguro zose ziwerekeye zanditswe mu gishinwa gusa. U﻿murongo wa mbere uhinduwe mu rundi rurimi uvuga ko uwo muti urimwo ibinini vya "Levonorgestrel Fast Estradiol". Uwo muti (pillule) "n'uwukinga gusama bamira ugakora igihe kirekire", nk'uko umurongo wa kabiri uvuga. Umurongo wa gatatu utanga amakuru ku wuwukora: " "Zizhu Pharmaceutical Co Ltd". Kudanzada uyo muti vyarabujijwe n’abategetsi ba Kenya haraheze imyaka 10 kubera urugero runini rw’ibiwugize bita levonorgestrel rurenga incuro 40 ugereranije n’ururekuwe. Levonorgestrel ni umuti ukora ku misemburo usanzwe ukoreshwa mu buryo  bwo kuvyara ku rugero. Ubushikiranganji bw’amagara y’abantu ntibwashize ahagaragara ivyo bwatoye vyose mu bushakashatsi bwakoze, ariko bwavuze ko abana bavutse kubera iyo miti itashoboye kubuza gusama inda bashika mu gihe co gushobora kurondoka/kuvyara (gutera canke gusama inda) hakiri kare cane. Wamaitha yabariye BBC ati: "Sinari nzi ko  wabujijwe. Benshi mu bagenzi banje bariko barawukoresha kandi bo nta ngaruka wabagirako". Co kimwe n’abandi bagore b’abanya-Kenya benshi, yari yashimye uwo muti kubera uzimbutse kandi ufatwa rimwe gusa mu kwezi. Iyo miti rimwe na rimwe yinjizwa mu gihugu bidaciye mu mategeko ivuye mu bihugu bibanyi. Abagore kenshi bagura ivyo binini Sofia buri kwezi - benshi mu babigurisha ntibemera gutanga vyinshi icarimwe. Ikinini kimwe kigurwa hagati ya 300  na 400 y'amashiringi ya Kenya (hafi 5.200  mu mafaranga y'Uburundi). Ubundi buryo bwo kuvyara ku rugero buboneka mu gihugu burimwo gufata ikinini buri munsi. Ibinini bimara ukwezi bigurwa hafi amadorari 1,70 (hafi 3.500 mu mafaranga y'Uburundi) mu mavuriro ya reta ariko ntivyama vyabonetse, gutyo abagore bagaca baja kubigurira mu mazu agurisha imiti (pharmacies) ku mafaranga menshi gusumba. I﻿yo ivyo binini bibuze, ubundi buryo bukoreshwa burimwo: Udukingirizo dutangwa ku buntu mu biro vya reta n'utuzu twa surwumwe rusangi ariko rimwe na rimwe hari aho duhera n'ubwo dushobora kugurwa mu ma butike. Wamaitha yagize ati: "Kubera akanyuzi k'umujubu kizinze nka T kadakora ku misemburo katuma mbabara mu mugongo, nafashe ingingo yo kukavanamwo hanyuma nkoreshe ibinini". Yari yashimye kandi ingene abagenzi biwe bari bamurangiye Sofia ata kiro na kimwe bongerako mu kuvyibuha - ivyo bikaba vyari mu vyo yabanza kuraba kugira amenye umuti yofata kuko yagwana arondera kutaduza ibiro [kutavyibuha gusumba]. Ariko kuva mu ntango ntiwigeze umumerera neza – naho yibazako umubiri wiwe uzomenyera uwo muti mushasha kuko yategerezwa gufata ibinini bibiri ubwambere mu nyuma akazoja arafata kimwe mu kwezi. Madame Wamaitha  yagize ati: "Naciye ntangura kuja ndameneka umutwe nkagira n'iseseme. Ukwezi kwa mbere sinagiye mu butinyanka (mu kwezi)". Ariko ntiyagize amakenga kuko mu kwezi gukurikira yagiye mu kwezi. Ariko ho aboneye mu kwezi kwa gatatu yongeye kutaja mu butinyanka, yaciye atangura kugira amakenga. Umugabo wiwe yaciye atangura kugira ubushakashatsi kuri ico kinini gikinga gusama inda aca asanga ico kinini carabujijwe. A﻿vuga ati: "Twaciye dutangura kugira ubwoba kuba twakoresheje umuti ubujijwe hanyuma aho menyeye ko mfise inda ntangura kugira impungenge ku ngaruka zawo ku mwana wanje [yari mu nda]". Ubu bafise umwana w'umukobwa w'amezi atatu , ariko uyu muryango ubabazwa no kuba ata makuru ahari ku ngaruka zishobora kuzoshikira umwana wabo mu gihe ariko arakura. Ishami rya ONU riraba amagara kw'isi, OMS, rivuga ko muri Afrika  yo munsi ya Sahara abagore 50% bakeneye imiti ikinga gusama inda ari bo bonyene bashobora kuyironka. Muri Kenya , ibijanye no gukinga gusama inda bisa n’ibivugirwa mu vyongoshwa - ahanini kubera imico n'amadini muri iki gihugu aho ijambo rinini ari iry'umugabo. A﻿bagabo bamwe bamwe ntibemerera abagore babo gukoresha uburyo bwo gukinga gusama inda kandi hari n'amadini amwe amwe atavyemera. I﻿dini rya Kavonokya mu buseruko bwa Kenya, nk'akarorero, ntiryemera ubuvuzi bwa none, rivuga ko Bibiriya ico yemera gusa ari amasengesho n'igikorwa [c'Imana]. K﻿u bw'umuhinga mw'igwirirana ry'abantu n'iterambere, muganga Josephine Kibaru, gushikira abanyagihugu basanzwe ni yo yoba inzira y'uko hemerwa uburyo bwa none  bwo gutandukanya imvyaro. M﻿uganga Kibaru yabwiye BBC ati: "Dukeneye ko abakorerabushake mu bijanye n'amagara mu kibano bahabwa ubushobozi n'amakuru kuko umugore akenshi ashobora kugirira icizere umubanyi canke umugenzi kurusha umukozi wo kwa muganga yahawe akazi kw'ivuriro." Yavuze ko hari ukutamenya uburyo bwo gutandukanya imvyaro, hari kandi ibivugwa vyinshi canke bizwi ukutari ko bikeneye gusigurwa neza. G﻿ufatanya ivyo vyompi kumbure ni vyo bikenewe, mu gihe muganga w'ibijanye no kuvyara Brigid Monda avuga ko abagore bakeneye gusaba impanuro abajejwe amagara kugira bashobore kumenya uburyo bwobabera bwiza bwo kuvyara ku rugero. Y﻿abwiye BBC ati: "Igikwiye kuri uyu ntigikwira kuri uriya". Ariko abagore bamwe bamwe basanze atako bari bugire atari ukuvanga uburyo butandukanye bwo gukinga gusama inda kubera ukutaboneka kw'umuti baba batanguye gufata ku mavuriro yo mu gihugu hagati. Sofia uracaboneka vyoroshe n'ubwo wabujijwe. Kuba abagore batazi ko ubujijwe biterwa n'uko abanyagihugu badahabwa amakuru n'igisata c'amagara y'abantu, nk'uko bivugwa na muganga Kibaru. A﻿vuga ati: "Gukoresha ibinyamakuru vyonyene ntibikwiye. Gutanga ubutumwa ku bushake bugashikira abanyagihugu bato bato birakenewe cane kugira abanyagihugu batahure neza igituma umuti wabujijwe". Abadandaza imiti barazi ko uwo muti wabujijwe - ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu bwarongeye kugabisha mu kwezi kw'icenda - ariko n'ubu babandanya kugurisha uwo muti kuko hari abawurondera. N﻿tushirwa ahabona, ariko ugurishwa mu mpisho ku bakiriya bizewe baza kuwugura buri kwezi. BBC yagendeye amazu menshi acuruza imiti  ku murwa mukuru, Nairobi, kugira ikore amatohoza kuri Sofia - menshi yavuze ko Sofia utagurishwa. Umudandaza umwe – atashimye kuvugwa izina – yasiguye ko wariho ariko udashirwa ahabona, kandi ko amazu adandaza imiti yashobora kuwugura ku bandi bawurangura mu bihugu bibanyi. Mu ntango z’ukwezi kw'icenda, umukozi  akora mu rwego rukurikirana imiti n'uburozi (Pharmacy and Poisons Board), yabariye ikinyamakuru co muri Kenya, Standard, ko hari intekera yafatiwe ku mupaka na Uganda. Wamaitha avuga ko nawe yaguze ivyo binini ku mugenzi aronka vyinshi abikuye kuri bene abo babiranguza. Yavuze ko umugenzi wiwe n’abandi bari baziko uwo muti ubujijwe igihe bawumurangira. N﻿'aho yasamye inda ntivyaciye intege abo bandi kubandanya bakoresha uwo muti - n'imyidogo y'abagore mu migwi itandukanye yo kuri Fecebook ntaco yababwiye. M﻿u migwi nibura itatu aho bavuga Sofia, abagore batari bake bawufata bavuze ko basamye inda. Ibi vyatumye Wamaitha abandanya asaba abagenzi biwe n’abandi bagore kurondera ubundi buryo bwo kuvyara ku rugero. Ati: "Ndazi ko iyo mvuze Sofia nca numva mpinze agashitsi. Sinzi uburyo nzokoresha kugira sinsame inda igira kane, ariko sinzosubira, sinzosubira gukoresha uwo muti."

headline: Mu Buhunde niho kuri ubu ikiza ca covid-19 kimeze nabi kurusha ahandi kw'isi
text: Igihugu c'Ubuhinde ku munsi kibonekamwo igitigiri kidasanzwe c'abandura covid-19, kikaba ari co gihugu kw'isi kimerewe nabi krusha ibindi muri iki gihe kubera iki kiza. Iyi video irihweza ibintu nyamukuru vyoba bibitera.

headline: Uganda-Covid : Prezida Museveni yatanze akaruhuko ko gusengera igihugu cugarijwe na Covid
text: Umukuru wa Uganda Yoweri Museveni yatangaje ko umunsi wa gatanu uzoba umunsi w'ikiruhuko wo gusengera abakozi bo kwa muganga n'imiryango  yakozweko n'ikiza ca Covid. Uganda yugarijwe n'umupfunda ugira kabiri wa Covid watumye prezida Musevenu asubizaho ingingo zo kugabanya uruja n'uruza mu gihugu. Inama nshingamateka  ubu yabaye irahagarika ibikorwa mu kiringo c'indwi zibiri mu gihe abategetsi bavuze ko abakozi barenga 100 bayo batowe umugera w'iyo ndwara. Igitigiri c'abantu bicwa n'iyo ndwara ciyongeye incuro 10 mu minsi 15 iheze, ku bw'urubuga  Our World in Data. Muri ubwo  butumwa yanditse kuri twitter Prezida Yoweri Museveni avuga ati: "Nemeye ivyasabwe n'abarongoye amadini ko twoshira igihugu mu gisabisho muri iki gihe duhanganye na Covid-19. Ndabasavye mwese musengere abakozi bacu bo kwa muganga n'imiryango yose yakozweko n'iki kiza. Kubera iyo mpamvu, ndatangaje ko ku wa gatanu (itariki 25) ari umunsi w'akaruhuko". Gushika ubu muri Uganda abari munsi ya 2% y'abanyagihugu bose nibo bamaze kuronka nibura urucanco rwa mbere rwa corona.

headline: WHO iragabisha ku miti y'inkorora ikorerwa mu Buhinde inyuma y'impfu z'abana muri Gambia
text: W﻿HO/OMS iragabisha amakungu ku bwoko bune bw'imiti y'inkorora inyuma y'aho ivugiye ko ishobora kuba ifitaniye isano n'impfu z'abana 66 mu gihugu ca Gambia. Iryo shirahamwe rivuga ko i﻿yo miti "ishobora kuba ifitaniye isano n'ibikomere vy'amafyigo hamwe n'impfu abantu bashika 66 mu bana". OMS yongerako ko i﻿yo miti yakozwe n'ihinguriro ryo mu Buhinde, Maiden Pharmaceuticals, ritashoboye gutanga ivyemeza ko uwo muti umeze neza. I﻿ryo hinguriro nta co rirabivugako. BBC yarondeye Maiden Pharmaceuticals kugira bagire ico babivuzeko. A﻿bategetsi b'Ubuhinde bavuga ko basavye OMS kwerekana ivyemezo vy'isano hagati y'uwo muti hamwe n'izo mpfu. O﻿MS ivuga ko iyo miti ari Promethazine Oral Solution, Kofexmalin Baby Cough Syrup, Makoff Baby Cough Syrup na Magrip N Cold Syrup. Mw'itangazo ryo kugabisha ku rubuga rwayo, OMS ivuga ko i﻿yo miti ko ari ine iboneka muri Gambia, ariko "ishobora kuba igurishwa ku masoko atazwi, mu bindi bihugu  canke uturere". I﻿ryo shirahamwe rigabisha ko ikoreshwa ryayo rishobora gutuma haba ugukomereka gukomeye canke urupfu, na cane cane ku bana. O﻿MS ivuze ivyo inyuma y'aho abategetsi bo muvyo amagara y'abantu muri Gambia - igihugu kigenderwa n'ingenzi nyinshi - baboneye ukwiyongera kw'ibikomere vy'amafyigo mu bana bari musi y'imyaka itanu mu mpera z'ukwezi kw'indwi. R﻿eta ya Gambia yaciye ihagarika ikoreshwa ry'imiti yose y'amazi irimwo paracetamol ica ihamagarira  abantu gukoresha ibinini mu kibanza cayo. O﻿MS ivuga ko ibipimo vy'iyo miti "vyemeje ko harimwo urugero ruhanitse rw'imisemburo ya diethylene glycol na ethylene itera ingwara." I﻿yo misemburo n'ubumara, ingaruka ryayo "harimwo kubabara mu kaziba k'inda, kuyogwa, gucibwamwo, kunanirwa gusohora umukoyo, kumeneka umutwe, guhungaban mu mutwe n'ibikomere vy'amafyigo bishobora gutuma umuntu apfa." Mu kwezi guheze, a﻿bategetsi ba Gambia bajejwe amagara y'abantu bavuze ko abana barenga mirongo ibiri bapfuye, ariko nta gitigiri kanuni batanga.

headline: Ubwo abagore bibungenze barashobora guhabwa urucanco rwa Covid-19? Biravana
text: Mu gihe urucanco rwa coronavirus rwari rurindiranywe igishika rwatanguye, biramaze kugaragara neza ko atari bose bazoshobora kururonswa. Ku bagore bibungeze hamwe n'abonsa, bizovana n'aho basanzwe baba kugira ngo baruhabwe. Mu bantu bakoreweko igerageza ry'urucanco rwa Pfizer-BioNTech, abagore bibungenze canke bonsa ntibarimwo, kandi iyi kompanyi ivuga ko amakuru aboneka kugeza ubu "adahagije" kugira ngo hamenyekane ingaruka zose uru rucanco rushobora kugira ku mugore yibungenze. Mu Bwongereza, ibi vyatumye ababijejwe bakuramwo abagore bibungenze n'abonsa mu mugambi wo gucandaga. Muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, abo bagore bo nyene ubwabo nibo bifatira ingingo. Ng'ibi ibituma ibi bihugu vyafashe inzira zitandukanye kuri iki kibazo, hamwe n'ico ibi bivuze ku bagore bibungenze. Gushika ubu, nta vyinshi. Ruth Faden, umuhinga mu bijanye n'inyifato ndongoramutima mu bijanye n'ubuvuzi kuri kaminuza Johns Hopkins  isanzwe ikurikiranira hagufi Covid-19, akaba ariko akurikirana ibijanye n'uburenganzira hamwe n'amagara y'abagore bibungenze, avuga ati: "Nta makuru dufise". Nta kintu na kimwe kivuga ko uru rucanco rufise kugira ingaruka mbi ku bagore bibungenze n'abonsa, nta makuru akwiye ahari". Pfizer ivuga ko kubona itashimye kugeragereza uru rucanco ku bagore bibungenze n'abonsa yakurikije impanuro yahawe n'ikigo ca Amerika kijejwe imfungurwa n'imiti. Abahinga bavuga ko ibi bishingiye ku mico. Muganga Faden avuga ati: "Mu bihe bisanzwe ata biza karanda biriho, iyo uvuze ibijanye n'urucanco rushasha, abantu benshi biyemeje guharanira inyungu z'abagore bibungenze n'ibibondo vyabo bavuga ko abagore bibungenze batobigiramwo uruhara.  Ntushobora kubaharurako cane". Muganga Faden avuga ko mu nyifato ndongoramutima ijanye n'ibibazo vy'amagara y'abantu, abagore bibungenze bafatwa "nk'abantu badasanzwe". Ati: "Muri rusangi, nta muntu n'umwe yita ku buzima bw'umwana nk'umugore yibungenze. Ikibazo ca mbere ukunze kubazwa ni 'ibi nta ngaruka mbi bizogira ku mwana wanje'?" Ariko ingingo yo gushira ku ruhande abagore bibungenze muri iri geragezwa ry'izi ncanco ntiyoroshe na gato. Muganga Emily Stinnett Miller, umuhinga mu bijanye n'ukwibarutsa kuri kaminuza ya Northwestern akaba n'umwe mu bagize umurwi ujejwe kurwanya Covid-19 mw'ishirahamwe rihurikiyemwo abakora mu gisata c'irondoka rijanye n'amagara meza, avuga ati: "Turi mu bihe bigoye. Bategerezwa gufata ingingo zikomeye mu buryo bwihuta, kandi hari ivyiza n'ibibi mu kubashiramwo canke kutabashiramwo". Ikibazo gikomeye - ni ukuvuga iri kena ry'amakuru ahagije - kiragaragara neza ubu. Ati: "Burya nta makuru ahagije dufise kugira ngo dushobore gufata ingingo dukeneye gufata". Mu gihe ibi bihugu vyompi bihanzwe n'iyi ngorane yo kubura aya makuru ahagije ku bijanye n'abagore bibungenze n'abonsa, Ubwongereza na Amerika vyafashe inzira zitandukanye. Muganga Faden ati: "Iyo udafise amakuru atomora neza ingene vyogenda kuri iki kibazo, intambwe ikurikira ni ukwibaza uti 'ni vyo, none dufate iki'?" Ubwongereza bwafashe inzira yo kwinengesera. Muganga Edward Morris, umukuru w'ishuri rikuru ryigisha ibijanye n'irondoka n'amagara y'abakenyezi (RCOG) yasohoye itangazo aho avuga ati: "Kubera ata geragezwa ry'izi ncanco za Covid-19 ryakozwe mu buryo bwihariye ku bagore bibungenze, nta bimenyetso bifatika vyerekana ko inkingo za Covid-19 zokoreshwa ku bagore bibungenze canke bonsa". Abahinga muri Amerika bobo bafashe iyindi nzira, aho bahaye uburenganzira abagore bibungenze n'abonsa gufata ingingo bo nyene. Abajejwe amagara y'abantu muri Amerika n'Ubwongereza bavuga ko ibikorwa vy'igerageza vyoba vyabaye mu muvuduko udasanzwe, ariko y'uko ata ntambwe n'imwe yasimbwe, kandi ko ivyo ukwemeza urucanco kanaka biba mu gihe babonye ko ata ngorane rutera kandi ko rukora neza. Muri ibi bihugu vyompi, abagore bibungenze n'abonsa bazotegerezwa kurindira gushika baronse ayandi makuru imbere y'uko bafata ingingo kuri izi ncanco. Amakuru ya mbere y'ivyavuye mu bushakashatsi ku ngaruka z'ubumara bwa Pfizer zishobora kwibonekeza mu bijanye n'irondoka yitezwe gutangazwa imbere y'uko uyu mwaka urangira. Ubu bushakashatsi bumaze kurangira,  iyi kompanyi ishobora gukoresha n'abagore bibungenze mu bikorwa vy'ukugerageza urucanco rwayo. Hariho kandi n'abagore basamye inda mu gihe bari mu bantu bariko barageragerezwako bazotegerezwa gukurikiranirwa hagufi mu gihe cose bazoba bibungenze. Ubu ingene ibintu bimeze, hari abagore bamwe bamwe bibungenze n'abonsa bavuga ko bazokwirinda uru rucanco. Akarorero ni nk'uyu mukenyezi w'imyaka 35, Joanna Sullivan, aba mu ntara ya Ohio, yiteze kwibaruka mu kwa gatandatu kw'umwaka uza. Avuga ko ata mugambi afise wo kwiteza uru rucanco mpaka abanze yibaruke. Ni co kimwe n'uyu mugore Amy Collender w'imyaka 34 wo mu karere ka Gloucestershire mu Bwongereza, avuga ko ashobora kwiyumvira uru rucanco mu gihe yonsa, ariko ni kubera umwana wiwe w'umuhungu ariko arakwiza imyaka ibiri. Avuga ati: "Iyaba yari akiri uruyoya, sinashobora", akavuga kandi ko iyaba yari acibungenze, yahitamwo kuruheba. Aba bagore bompi bavuga ko bo ubwabo badashobora kwemera kuja mu bantu bogeragerezwako uru rucanco, mu gihe bakirindiriye amakuru ahagije. Umupfasoni Sullivan ati: "Ni uko bimeze, ndatahura igituma ata bagore bibungenze bagiye muri iryo gerageza. Ni nde yokwipfuza gushira umwana wiwe mu bibazo?". Ariko rero, muganga Faden abona ko ari ngombwa ko n'abagore bibungenze hamwe n'abonsa nabo nyene ari ngombwa kubageragerezako uru rucanco nimba koko bashaka ko urucanco rwa Covid-19 rukora neza. Ati: "Nta rucanco rwiza rw'iki kiza dushobora kuronka mu gihe tutaronse urucanco abagore bibungenze bashobora gufata, ngejeje aha".

headline: Afrika ntikirangwamwo indwara y'ubukangwe/imbasa
text: Umurwi ujejwe ivyemezo mu karere ka Afrika (Africa Regional Certification Commission) watangaje ko indwara y'ubukangwe (indwara y'imbasa mu kinyarwanda) muri Afrika itakiri ikibazo. Indwara y'ubukangwe (polio mu gifaransa no mu congereza) ifata cane cane abana bari munsi y'imyaka itanu, ikanatera ubumuga. Irashobora no kwica mu gihe imitsi y'ihemero yafashwe n'ubwo bumuga. Iyi ndwara nta muti wayo uriho, ariko urucanco ruhabwa abana rubatuma bakingirwa ubuzima bwabo bwose. Iyi ndwara isigaye gusa mu bihugu vya Afuganistani na Pakistani. Nijeriya nico gihugu ca nyuma catangajwe ko ciganzuye ubukangwe ku mugabane wa Afrika, aho mu myaka idashika cumi carangamwo abarwayi barenga igice c'abarwaye iyo ndwara kw'isi yose. Ubukangwe ni indwara iterwa n'umugera (polio) wanduzwa hagati y'umuntu n'uwundi, akenshi biciye mu mazi mabi. Ni indwara itera ubumuga bitumwe n'uko ubwonko bwafashwe. Ibice birenga 95% vy'abanyafrika bose barakingiwe iyi ndwara. Iyi yari imwe mu ntumbero nyamukuru y'umurwi ujejwe ivyemezo muri Afrika kugira ngo ushobore gutangaza ko muri Afrika ata bukangwe bukiharangwa. Mu gihe iyo ndwara itagira umuti, urucanco rwakozwe mu 1952 na muganga Jonas Salk rwatanze icizere kinini ko abana bashobora gukingirwa iyi ndwara. Mu 1961, Albert Sabin yarongoye isekeza ryo gucandaga hakoreshejwe urucanco rwo kunywa rwari rusanzwe rukoreshwa mu bikorwa vyo gucandaga kw'isi yose. Mu 1996 ubukangwe bwamugaje abana barenga 75.000 ku mugabane wose - aho ibihugu vyose vyahuye n'aka kaga. Muri uwo mwaka, niho Nelson Mandela yaca atanguza isekeza yise "Kick Polio Out of Africa" (Dutuze ubukangwe muri Afrika), umugambi wegeranije abakozi bo mugisata c'ubuvuzi baharurwa muri za miliyoni  bategetswe guca kuri buri gatumba bacandaga. Kuva mu 1996, amamiriyairidi y'incanco yaratanzwe, bituma abantu bashika umuliyoni 1.8 bofashwe n'ubukangwe batandura. Ibibazo vyabaye mu burere bumwe bumwe bugoye gushikamwo muri iryo sekeza ryo gucandaga. Nijeriya nico gihugu ca nyuma caranzwemwo ubukangwe mu 2016 - mu ntara ya Borno isanzwe ari ikiririmbiro ry'umurwi Boko Haram. Ico gihe hari haciye imyaka ibiri iyo ndwara itavugwa mu gihugu cose. Imbere y'aho, iyo ndwara yari yabonetse mu ntara ya Puntland muri Somalia mu 2014. Ibihuha kandi vyavugwa ku bijanye n'urucanco vyatumye utwigoro two gukinga iyi ndwara tugenda ku muvuduko muto. Akarorero ni mu ntara ya Kano no mu zindi ntara zimwe zimwe zo mu buraruko bwa Nijeriya nyene, aho mu 2003 abategetsi b'idini rya Isilamu babwira abantu ko urwo rucanco rwarimwo imiti itera ubugumba, bakavuga ko wari umugambi w'abanyamerika wo gutera ubugumba abagore b'aba isilamu. Umwaka wakurikiye iryo sekeza ryarabandanije, ariko ivyo bihuha bigumaho. Mu 2013, abakozi batanu b'abagore bakora muri iryo sekeza barishwe n'umurwi Boko Haram ubasanze ku kigo bakorerako. Vyafashe imyaka irenga mirongo kugira ngo iyi ndwara irwanywe kubera ibihuha vyavugwa kuri uru rucanco. Indwara y'ubukangwe ifata cane cane abana bari munsi y'imyaka itanu. Mu bimenyetso vyayo harimwo ubushuhe, kumeneka umutwe, uburuhe, kudahwa, kuremerwa izosi no kubabara mu ngingo. Ifata kandi ubwonko bigatuma mu masaha make gusa uwuyanduye amugara. Umwe kuri 200 baramugara ubutakivayo. Muri abo bamaze kumugara, ibice 5% gushika kuri 10% barashobora gupfa iyo imitsi ibatuma bahema yafashwe. Indwara y'ubukangwe irashobora kwinjira mu gihugu idasanzwe ivugwamwo ivuye hanze, kandi igashobora gukwirakwira ku muvuduko munini cane mu bantu batacandazwe. Ibi vyarabaye muri Angola yari yashoboye kuyirandurana n'imizi mu 2001 n'aho hari haciye imyaka n'iyindi iri mu ntambara. Iki gihugu caramaze imyaka ine yose iyi ndwara itavugwamwo gushika mu 2005 aho hasubiye kuboneka abayanduye, bikavugwa ko yari yavuye hanze. Ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO, ritera akamo ko utwigoro two gucandaga tubandanya kandi abantu bakama barikanuye, kugira ngo ntihagire abana basubira kumugara muri kazoza.

headline: Umuntu wa mbere yanduye coronavirus muri Nigeria, Afrika y'Epfo nayo igiye gutahana abayo
text: Umuntu wa mbere yanduye wa mugera ruhonyabantu coronavirus muri Afrika yo munsi y'ubugaragwa bwa Sahara yatowe muri Nigeria. Uyo murwayi akomoka mu Butaliyano akaba asanzwe akora muri Nigeria, yageze ku mugwa mukuru Lagos ku wa 25 z'uku kwa kabiri avuye mu gisagara ca Milan mu Butaliyano. Abategetsi bamenyesha ko adasinzikaye kandi ko ariko aravurirwa mu bitaro i Lagos. Leta ya Nigera itangaza ko yari yariteguriye iki kibazo kandi ko yasubiye kuvyura ikigo kijejwe kurwanya ibiza kugira ngo came kigavye. Abategetsi bavuga kandi ko batanguye kurondera abo bose boba barakoranyeko n'uyo murwayi kuva ageze muri Nigeria. Umukuru w'igihugu ca Afrika y'Epfo, Cyril Ramaphosa yategetse ko abanyagihugu bayo bagera kuri 132 baba mu gisagara ca Wuhan catanguriyemwo uwo mugera  mu Bushinwa batahukanwa. Ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu bimenyesha ko iyo ngingo yafashwe ejo ku wa kane inyuma y'inama nshikiranganji, kandi bisabwe n'imiryango y'abanya Afrika y'Epfo baba muri ico gisagara. Nta kiringo ntarengwa cashinzwe, ariko leta ivuga ko abo 132 kuri 199 basanzwe baba muri ico gisagara aribo basavye ko batahukanwa. Muri bo, nta n'umwe arandura uwo mugera canke ngo yerekane ibimenyetso vyawo, ariko bazoshikizwa ukwa bonyene mu kiringo c'iminsi 21 bamaze gushika muri Afrika y'Epfo "nk'ingingo y'ukwiyubara", nk'uko biri mw'itangazo ryasohowe n'ibiro vy'umukuru w'ico gihugu. Ryongerako riti: "Leta ibandanya ivugana n'imiryango y'abo bantu, kandi ibisata bibijejwe vyarategekanije ibikenewe vyose kugira ngo babakire". Abajejwe amagara y'abantu hamwe n'abasirikare bazorungikwa gufasha mu gihe bazoba bashikanywe mu gihugu mu gikorwa co kubaronderera aho babashikiza. Ikompanyi y'indege y'ico gihugu, South African Airlines, yarahagaritse ingendo mu gihugu c'u Bushinwa. Igihugu ca Kenya coco nta ngingo kirafata yo guhagarika ingendo z'indege hagati y'ico gihugu n'Ubushinwa. Leta y'ico gihugu iranegurwa bikomeye inyuma y'aho yemereye ingenzi zivuye mu Bushinwa kwinjira muri ico gihugu, ubwa mbere mu kiringo c'indwi zibiri. Hirya y'ejo ku wa gatatu, abantu 239 barinjiriye ku kibuga c'indege c'i Nairobi bururutse indege China Southern Airlines, baca basabwa  kwitandukanya n'abandi mu kiringo c'iminsi 14. Iyo ngingo yaraneguwe n'abatari bake. Ikinyamakuru Daily Nation gisubiramwo amajambo y'abanyagihugu banegura ubushikiranganji bw'umutekano, bw'imigenderanire n'ayandi makungu, bw'ukwunguruza abantu hamwe n'ubwo amagara y'abantu, bavuga ko leta iriko irakinisha ubuzima bw'imiliyoni z'Abanyakenya. Hari inzandiko zacishijwe ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi zikaba zimaze guterwako igikumu n'abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi zisaba leta ya Kenya guhagarika ingendo zo mu Bushinwa kubera coronavirus. Abantu barenga ibihumbi 80 baramaze kwandura coronavirus mu bihugu 40. Abashika 60 nibo bamaze kumenyekana ko bahitanywe n'uwo mugera hanze y'Ubushinwa, aho watanguriye. Hagati aho, igitigiri c'abandura uwo mugera hagati mu Bushinwa kibandanya kigabanuka. Ku mugabane wa Afrika, hampande ya Nigeria, ibihugu vya Algeria na Misiri navyo nyene biramaze gutangaza ko hari abanyagiohugu bavyo bawanduye.

headline: Tanzania:Prezida Magufuli yemeye ko corona yasubiye kwinjira mu gihugu
text: Prezida John Pombe Magufuli yavuze ko abanyagihugu bagiye mu mahanga kwiteza urucanco bagaruka mu gihugu banduye ubundi bwoko bw'umugera, gutyo akaba yemeye ubwa mbere kuva mu kwezi kwa gatandatu ko hari abantu banduye umugera muri Tanzania. Mu mwaka uheze prezida Magufuli yatangaje ko igihugu ciwe kitakirangwamwo coronavirus avuga ko ibisabisho vyafashije igihugu gutsinda ico kiza. Ariko uyu munsi yavuze ko uwo mugera winjijwe mu gihugu n'abantu bavuye hanze kwiteza incanco. Prezida wa Tanzania John Pombe Magufuli yagabishije abajejwe amagara y'abantu ku kuzana incanco za Covid-19 - baterekanye ivyemeza - kuko zishobora kubangamira amagara y'abanyagihugu. Magufuli yavuze ati: "Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu ategerezwa kuhagabira, bashobora kwirukira izo ncanco hadakozwe ubushakashatsi, si incanco zose ari nziza kuri twebwe, dutegerezwa kwivyitondera. "Incanco si nziza. Iyaba umuzungu yashobora gutora incanco, yobaye yaratoye urucanco rwa Sida, cancer na TB." Prezida wa Tanzania, John Pombe Magufuli yagabishije kuvyerekeye urucanco rwa Covid-19 rumaze gutangura gutangwa mu bihugu bitandukanye vy'isi. Igihe yariko arugurura icese iterwa ry'ibiti mw'ishamba mu karere ka Chato mu ntara ya Geita, yagize kandi ico avuga ku kungene ingwara ya Corona yifashe mu gihugu, aca ahamagarira abanyagihugu  kubandanya gusenga no kwiyubikira. Yagize ati: "Tubandanya kwiyubara, no kwiyubikira hamwe no gusenga, mu gihe tubandanya n'akazi ka misi yose, murye neza muhage Corona inanirwe kwinjira mu mibiri yanyu." Na yo kuvyerekeye ko hariho ubundi bwoko bwa corona, Magufuli yavuze ko hariho aba Tanzania baja gucancwa hanze y'igihugu ariko bakagaruka bazanye ubundi bwoko bwa corona. Prezida Magufuli yagize ati: "Ndazi ko hariho aba Tanzania bamwe bamwe bavuye muri kino gihugu baja hanze gucancwa, bahejeje bagaca baza batuzaniye iyindi Corona y'ubundi bwoko." "Ntituze turirukira incanco incanco, si buri rucanco rutugirira akamaro, ni ngombwa ko aba Tanzania tuba maso, tugabe, tuzogeragezwa, tubandanya gusenga Imana yacu kandi tubandanye kwinengesera." Ivyo prezida Magufuli abivuze mu gihe Ekleziya Katorika muri Tanzania  yaraye isohoye itangazo aho igabisha ko ibitigiri vy'abandura coronavirus n'abicwa na Covid-19 bigenda vyiyongera, ihamagarira abanyagihugu gukurikiza ingingo zose zo kwikingira.

headline: Mbega umunyu udafise icunyunyu 'iode' ufise ingaruka izahe?
text: Umushikiranganji w'ubudandaji, amahinguriro n'ingenzi mu Burundi aherutse kugabisha ko mu gihugu hibonekeza imyunyu mibi itagira ivyunyunyu bikwiye, aho yagabishije abadandaza ko  leta idashobora kwihanganira urwo rudandaza. Gérard Niyondiko, umushakashatsi ari mu batoye isabuni ikinga imibu itera malaria, asobanura ingene iyo myunyu idakwije ibisabwa igira ingaruka mbi ku magara y'abantu. Asaba leta ko yohakanurira kugira ngo bacungere ko imyunyu iriko iradandazwa ikwije ivyunyunyu bisabwa. Mu kiganiro yagiranye na BBC, Bwana Niyondiko avuga ko iode, icunyunyu kirangwa ahanini mu munyu ukwije ibisabwa, ituma abantu bashobora gukura neza. Avuga ati: "Barya bantu bakunze kwitwa ibitandara baba barabuze ico cunyunyu ca 'iode' mu mubiri wabo kirangwa mu munyu". Bwana Niyondiko avuga kandi ko iyo abantu babuze umunyu urimwo 'iode' bashobora kurwara izindi ndwara nk'umwingo, indwara zo mu mutwe canke indwara zituma abana batagira ubwenge bukwiye. Bwana Niyondiko  avuga ko iyo umuntu atariye umunyu, hariho n'utundi tuntu duto duto bashobora kuronkamwo ico cunyunyu ku rugero ruto ruto. Ati: "Mu bisanzwe, umunyu ni co kintu gikuru abantu baronkeramwo 'iode', ariko hariho n'ibindi nk'amazi usanga afise ico cunyunyu, n'imfungurwa zimwe zimwe bashobora gusangamwo 'iode'". Mu gihe bivugwa ko umunyu uba warobwe mu mazi ari wo urimwo 'iode' ikwiye gusumba uwo baba bimvye  i musozi, Bwana Niyondiko avuga ko mu bisanzwe abantu badashobora kumenya ko urimwo 'iode' canke itarimwo. Ati: "Mu bisanzwe ni igikorwa ca leta co gusuzuma ko imyunyu idandazwa mu gihugu ikwije ivya ngombwa kugira amagara y'abanyagihugu akingirwe".

headline: Ubushakashatsi bwerekana ko kurya amagi kenshi bishobora gutera indwara z’umutima
text: Abahinga mu vyo amagara y'abantu bavuga ko gufungura amagi hampande y'izindi mfungurwa bishobora gufasha umubiri guhingura ivyo ukeneye kugira ugire amagara meza.
