Nk'akarorero, ubushakashatsi bwerekana ko kwongera igi rimwe mw'i salade vyongereza urugero rwa vitamin E dukura muri zo. Hagati aho, abahinga bamaze igihe kitari gito bihweza nimba gufungura amagi ata ngaruka bishobora kugira ku magara yawe. Inyishu kuri ico kibazo ishobora kuvana n'igitigiri c'amagi wihereza ku ndwi - nk'uko vyerekanwa n'amatohoza mashasha yatangajwe mu kinyamakuru c'ubuvuzi muri Amerika (JAMA). Nk'uko ico kinyamakuru kibivuga, kwihereza amagi abiri gusa buri munsi birashobora gutera indwara z'umutima mbere bigatuma umuntu ashobora gupfa hataragera. Ivyo biva ku rugero runini cane rw'icunyunyu bita kolesteroli rusanzwe ruri mu muhondo w'igi. Igi rimwe rirashobora kugira urugero rwa miligrama 185 za kolesteroli nk'uko bivugwa n'igisata kijejwe uburimyi muri Amerika. Urwo rugero rusumba igice c'urugero rwa kolesterol umuntu yemerewe gufungura ku munsi, ariwo miligramu 300, rwemewe n'ishirahamwe OMS rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi. Ibiharuro biherutse gutangazwa, vyerekana ko kuva mu mwaka wa 2015 Amerika ari igihugu kigira gatanu kirya amagi menshi kw'isi - aho umuntu umwe arya ayashika 252 ku mwaka. Ivyo biharuro vyerekana ko ico gihugu gifise ingorane ziva ku ndwara z'umutima, aho zituma impfu ku bice 20 % . Umwe mu bakoze ubwo bushakashatsi akaba n'umuhinga muvyo imiti y'ukwikingira kw'ishure kaminuza rya Northwestern University, Norrina Allen, avuga ko vyiza ata muntu akwiye kurenza amagi atatu ku ndwi. Anahanura abakunda kuyihereza ko vyiza bokwibanda cane cane kurya umweru w'igi. Ati: "Si mbwiye abantu ngo bakure amagi ku rutonde rw'imfungurwa zabo, ndabahanura gusa kutarenza urugero". Ubwo bushakashatsi bwatangajwe mu ntango z'uno mwaka buriyamiriza ibivugwa ko gufungura amagi ata ngaruka mbi bifise ku magara yacu. Abahinga bakoze ubushakashatsi ku bantu 30.000 mu kiringo c'imyaka 17, bakaba basanze ko kurya igi rirenze rimwe ku munsi, n'aho worenzako inusu yaryo, bishobora gutuma umuntu afatwa n'indwara z'umutima, mbere n'urupfu rukajamwo. Allen avuga ati: "Twasanze kurya igi rirenze rimwe, n'aho worenzako igice caryo, iminsi yose bishobora gutuma umuntu arwara indwara z'umutima ku bice bitandatu kw'ijana (6%)". Ubushakashatsi bwo muri kahise butandukanye n'ubu bushasha. Ubu bushakashatsi bushasha, buratandukanye n'ubwari bumaze gukorwa bwerekana ko atasano riri hagati y'indwara z'umutima n'ugufungura amagi. Hagati aho, Allen avuga ko ubwo bushakashatsi bw'imbere yabo bwakoreye ku bantu bake cane kandi butafashe umwanya ukwiye w'ugukurikirana abafungura amagi. Abashakashatsi babukoze baremera ko hashobora kuba harabaye amakosa ku vyo bobo batoye. Bobo bakoze ayo matohoza bakoresheje uburyo bw'ibibazo gusa, aho ababazwa vyaba ngombwa ko bibuka ivyo bariye mu kiringo c'amezi canke imyaka. Abandi bashakashatsi bavuga kandi ko ivyavuye muri ayo matohoza ari ivyo gusubira kwihweza, bakavuga ko n'aho vyaboneka ko hari isano hagati y'ukurya amagi n'iyongerekana ry'indwara z'umutima n'impfu za kare, badashobora gusigura ikibituma. Ubushakashatsi bwa JAMA  bwihweje ivyavuye mu matohoza yakozwe incuro zitandatu ku bantu 30.000 bakoreshejwe muri ubwo bushakashatsi mu kiringo c'imyaka17. Abashakashatsi bashitse ku cegeranyo kivuga ko kurya miligramu 300 za kolesteroli buri munsi bituma umuntu ashobora kwandura indwara z'umutima ku bice 17 kw'ijana, n'impfu ku bice 18 kw'ijana. Iyo ngorane irashobora kwiyongera cane bivuye ku gufungura amagi, aho abahinga bavuga ko kurya amagi atatu canke ane ku munsi bishobora gutuma umuntu yandura indwara z'umutima ku bice 6%, mbere ku bice 8% agashobora gupfa hakiri kare. Ubwo bushakashatsi bwerekana ko ivyo bitavana n'imyaka umuntu afise, inguvu ziwe, kunywa itabi canke kw'ivumbuka ry'amaraso. Norrina Allen ati: "Ubushakashatsi bwacu bwerekana ko, iyo abantu babiri bafunguye indya zimwe bagatandukanira ku kurya amagi gusa, urya muntu arya amagi menshi niwe ashobora guhura n'ibibazo vy'indwara z'umutima ku rugero runini".

headline: VIH/Sida: Menya intambwe zitatu zimaze guterwa mu kuyirwanya
text: N﻿a Leire Ventas B﻿BC Mundo, Los Angeles Ubu wanduye   umugera wa Sida, ntibikiri nko kuba uciriwe urubanza rwo gupfa nk’uko vyari bimeze mu myaka mirongo iheze, kuko ubu ushobora kubaho ubuzima busanzwe. Ubu nibwo butumwa bukomeye mw’umwizero butangwa n’abari mu gisata kijejwe kurwanya uyu mugera wa VIH utera indwara ya Sida. Kuva hamenyekanye abantu ba mbere banduye iyo ndwara mu myaka ya 1980, abantu barenga imiriyoni 40 baramaze  gupfa bahitanywe n’indwara zifitaniye isano n’uwo mugera, hamwe n’indwara iterwa nawo, izwi nka Sida. Mu mwaka uheze wonyene, iyo ndwara yahitanye abantu 450.000, imiriyoni 1,5 nabo barandura umugera wayo, nk’uko biri mu biharuro bitangwa n’ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y’abantu kw’isi OMS/WHO. Urwo rwego ruvuga ko imiriyoni 38,4 kw’isi bagendana umugera, 2/3 bakaba baba ku mugabane wa Afrika. Ubu, uburyo bwo gupima umugera hakiri kare bwararwiriye, imiti nayo iriyongera kandi igashikira abayikeneye. Hari n’ibihugu biri hafi yo kuwutuza burundu. David Goodman-Meza  umwigisha wa kaminuza,  abwira BBC ati:  "Tumaze imyaka 40 dukora ubushakashatsi, kandi, n’aho ata rucanco dufise, hari intambwe zikomeye zimaze gushikwako mu kurwanya uwu mugera, kuwuvura no gukomeza amagara y’abamaze kuwandura”. None ni izihe ntambwe nyamukuru zitatu zoba zimaze guterwa zigatanga n’umwizero mu rugamba rwo kurwanya iki kiza? Umugera wa SDA, ari wo VIH, utera abasoda b’umubiri ukabaka  inguvu zo gushobora kurwanya izindi ndwara zitari nke, harimwo n’ubwoko bumwe bumwe bwa kanseri (cancer) umubiri w’umuntu wari ushoboye kurwanya mu buryo bworoshe. Iyi ngorane irashobora gutorerwa umuti n’imiti yo gupfupfahaza, izwi nka Antiretroviral therapy canke ART mu mpfunyapfunyo. Kuva mu 2016, OMS yategetse ko abo bose banduye umugera wa SIDA bahabwa ART ubuzima bwabo bwose, harimwo abana, imiyabaga n’abagore bibungenze ata kuraba nimba hari izndi ndwara bariko barivuza. Ibi vyatumye mu mwaka uheze, abantu imiriyoni 28,7 banduye umugera kw’isi bahabwa iyi miti ipfupfahaza. Iyi miti ntabwo ivura uwu mugera, ariko ituma utiyongera mu mubiri bigatuma abasoda b’umubiri bagira inguvu zo kurwanya izindi ngwara. Ayako Miyashita  wo mu kigo ca California c’ubushakashatsi ku mugera wa SIDA, (California HIV/AIDS Policy Research Centers, CHPRC) avuga ati: "Vyongeye, ico twize muri ino myaka ya vuba ni uko iyo umuti ufashwe neza ugabanya ivyago vyo gukwiragiza umugera ku rugero rwa 100%”. Avuga ati: "Iyo umugera udashobora kuboneka mu mubiri w’umuntu, ni uko aba adashobora kuwanduza ku muntu wundi n’umwe”. Iki rero ni ikintu gikomeye cane, atari mu kurwanya iyi ndwara gusa, ariko kandi no kurwanya inenwa ku bagendana umugera”. Avuga kandi ko muri ino myaka ya vuba habaye intambwe “zidasanzwe” mu bijanye n’ubwo buvuzi. Umwigisha wa kaminuza Goodman-Meza  avuga ati: "Ibintu vyarahindutse cane kuva mu myaka ya 1990 canke 2000, aho abarwayi bategerezwa gufata imiti myinshi ku musi umwe n’ingaruka yabagirako”. Ubu ni ikinini kimwe gusa ku musi kandi nta ngaruka nini kibagirako. Kandi ubushakashatsi burabandanya muri iki gisata, barondera ubuvuzi bw’igihe kirekire. Mu mwaka uheze, ikigo ca Amerika kijejwe kugenzura imiti n’imfungurwa (Food and Drug Administration, FDA) caremeje umuti wa mbere ukora igihe kirekire, urushinge rw’imiti ibiri umuntu aterwa rimwe mu mezi abiri. Miyashita  ashimangira ati: "Iyumvire ico bisigura nko ku muntu yari amaze imyaka mirongo ari ku binini vya misi yose”. Kuri Suzi Steward w’imyaka 62 agendana umugera wa Sida kuva mu 2006, nico kintu ca mbere gikomeye cabaye kuri we mu myaka 15. Yabaye mu murwi wageragerejweko uwo muti, mbere igihe yemererwa kuba muri uwo murwi yararize kubera umunezero. Yabwiye ikinyamakuru gitangaza amakuru ku bijanye n’amagara y’abantu, Healthline,  ati: "Ni ukuri nari ndushe n’ibinini biguma binyibutsa ingwara yanje imisi yose”. Hari kandi n’ubushakashatsi buriko burakorwa ku miti yohabwa abantu imibiri yabo itakira iyi miti yo gupfupfahaza. "Hari intambwe zikomeye zatewe mu kuvura uwu mugera, ariko ikintu nyaco gikomeye kiri mu rwego rwo gukinga”, niko  Miyashita  wo mu kigo CHPRC avuga. Aha ashaka kuvuga umuti uzwi nka prophylaxie pré-exposition/ pre-exposure prophylaxis, uzwi mu mpfunyapfunyo nka PrEP. Mu gihe PrEP ifashwe imisi yose, ishobora kugabanya ivyago vyo kwandura umugera utera Sida uciye mu guhuza ibitsina ku rugero rwa 90% canke 70% biciye mw’ikoreshwa ry’inshinge canke ibikoresho bindi bitobora uruhu bidatunganye, nk’uko bivugwa n’ikigo ca Amerika kijejwe kugenzura indwara, Centers for the Disease Control and Prevention (CDC). Ikompanyi ya Amerika ihingura imiti, Gilead Sciences, yatanguye kuyigurisha mu 2012 yitwa Truvada. Haciye imyaka itatu, OMS yaciye itangura gusaba ko yokoreshwa mu gukinga umugera wa Sida ku mirwi y’abantu bari mu vyago vyinshi vyo gushobora kuwandura , nk’abahuza ibitsina babisangiye, ababeshejweho n’ubumaraya, canke abafise abakunzi banduye umugera. Ariko rero, n’aho mu bihugu biteye imbere habonekamwo akarusho, uturere tubangamiwe cane gusumba utundi nta nyungu ibonekamwo kubera igiciro cayo kiri hejuru. Goodman-Meza  avuga ko n’imiti y’urushinge imara igihe kirekire iherutse kwemezwa. Aha ashaka kuvuga nk’akarorero ku muti w’urushinge uriko urageragerezwa muri Afrika y’Epfo wagiye kuboneka ko ari intambwe ikomeye: watumye abariko bawugeragerezwako bagira amahirwe manini yo kutandura umugera wa Sida ku rugero rwa 88% gusumba ibinini bariko barafata imisi yose. Muri ino myaka ya vuba, urugero rw’abandura rwaragabanutse, umuti wa PrEP uterwa mu rushinge ukaba ari wo muti wa mbere ufise akamaro kanini mu kwirinda umugera wa Sida igihe kirekire. Inyuma y’imyaka hafi 40 y’ubushakashatsi, nta rucanco rwa SIDA rurashobora kuboneka. Iziriko zirageragezwa ziracari ku rugero rwo hasi cane. Anthony S. Fauci yahoze ari umukuru w’ikigo kijejwe kurwanya indwara z’uguhuganirwa n’izandukira, National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases (NIAID), ubu akaba ari umuhanuzi w’umukuru w’igihugu mu vyo amagara y’abantu, avuga ati: " Gutora urucanco rwa SIDA biboneka ko kikiri ikibazo c’ingorabahizi”. "Inyuma y’aho dutoreye incanco nyazo za Covid-19, turafise amahirwe menshi yo kuraba uno musi nimba twoshika ku ntambwe nk’iyo mu kurwanya umugera wa SIDA”. Miyashita  ati: "Muri iki gihe, nta rucanco turaronka, kandi nta n’umuti turaronka”. Nivyo ko hari abantu bazwi ko bashoboye gukira, canke n’imiburiburi bakamara amezi atari make badafise umugera. Ariko ibi ni ivyavuye mu buvuzi n’amagerageza bishasha bitoroshe gukoresha ku bantu banduye. Uyu muhinga ashimangira ati: "Kimwe mu bintu tudashobora kwibagira ni uko hari abantu bagendana umugera wa SIDA ubu kandi mu gihe tuzoba tutarashika kuri iyo ntambwe yo kuronka, atari urucanco gusa, ariko kandi n’umuti, turacafise igikorwa gikomeye imbere yacu”. Hanyuma kandi, ntitwibagire ko atari ibihugu vyose bifise ubushobozi bwo kuronka ibiva muri ubu buhinga. "Uburinganire ku magara no kuvurwa neza ni ikintu kitarashikwako kw’isi. Rero iterambere muri ubwo buhinga mu vyo amagara y’abantu ntaco rivuze. Mu gihe tudashitse ku rugero rw’aho bose bazoba bashobora kuronka ubwo buryo, ntiturote twibaza ko umugera wa SIDA tuzoshobora kuwutuza”.

headline: Coronavirus: Uganda iriko irondera umutanzania yanduye kugira imusubize iwabo
text: Ubushikiranganji bw'amagara yu'abantu bwa Uganda bumenyesha ko buriko burarondera umutanzania yanduye coronavirus kugira ngo bumusubize mu gihugu ciwe. Uyo mugabo w'imyaka 34, asanzwe ari umushoferi w'amakamyo, akaba yinjiye muri ico gihugu  kuwa 16 z'uku kwa kane, yinjirira ku mupaka wa Mutukula avuye i Dar es Salaam. Nk'uko bimenyeshwa n'ubwo bushikiranganji, uyo mugabo ntiyashotse yerekana ibimenyesto vya Covid-19. Ingingo ya Uganda yo gusubiza iwabo abanyamahanga banduye umugeracoronavirus yateye impanri nyinshi ku mbuga hwaniro zitandukanye, haba mu gihugu canke no hanze. Ku munsi wa kane, umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu Ruth Jane Aceng  yamenyesheje ko ibihugu bihurikiye mu muryango wa Afrika y'Ubuseruko vyumvikanye ko umuntu uwo ari we wese wo muri ivyo bihugu azopimwa agasanga yaranduye coronavirus ko azoca asubizwa iwabo kugira ngo avurirweyo. Avuga ko buri munsi Uganda yakira abashoferi b'amakamyo bashika 3000 bava mu bihugu vy'akarere ka Afrika y'Ubuseruko, ko rero ata bushobozi ifise bwo kubavura. Ejo ku wa gatanu, Uganda yatangaje ko mu badereva b'amakamyo bashika 774 bafashwe ibipimo ku mipaka imbere y'uko binjira mu gihugu hari umwe bahavuye basanga yaranduye. Gushika ubu, Uganda ifise abantu 55 bamaze kwemezwa ko banduye Covid-19. Mu ntango z'ino ndwi, umukuru w'ico gihugu, Yoweri Museveni, yarongereje ikiringo ca Gumamurugo gushika ku minsi 21 anavuga ko n'izindi ngingo zose zafashwe imbere y'iyo ngingo zizobandanya uko bisanzwe. Muri zo harimwo kubuza amakoraniro, kwugara amasengero hamwe n'ibigo vy'amashure. Abemerewe gukora akazi bonyene ni abo mu gisata c'amagara y'abantu, abajejwe umutekano, abakozi b'amabanki hamwe n'abamenyeshamakuru. Amamodoka yunguruza abantu yarahagaritswe, co kimwe n'indege zitwara ingenzi. Amamodoka atwara imizigo n'indege nazo nyene zitwara imizigo nivyo vyemerewe kubandanya bikora. Hagati aho, abadereva hamwe n'abandi bakozi bo muri izo ndege bategerezwa gushirwa mu bibanza vya leta vyateguwe gushirwamwo abiketswe ko banduye.

headline: Kenya-Covid: Kudatembera mu masaha y'ijoro bizobandandanya ayandi mezi abiri
text: Umukuru wa Kenya Uhuru Kenyatta yongeye ayandi mezi ibiri ku kiringo c'umukwabu wo mw'ijoro uhera isaha zine ugashikana isaha cumi zo mu gitondo mu ntumbero yo kwirinda ukwiyongera kw'abandura umugera wa Covid-19. Muri Kenya  haheze  hafi umwaka abantu batarekuriwe gutembera mw'ijoro, ariko umukuru w'igihugu avuga ko kwongereza ico kiringo bikenewe kubera ukwiyongera kw'abandura. Ububare n'amazu y'uburiro azoguma arekuriwe gukora gushika isaha zitatu z'ijoro muri ico kiringo. Umukuru w'igihugu yanahagaritse kandi amakoraniro yose ya poritike mu kiringo c'iminsi 30. Gushingura uwapfuye bitegerezwa gukorwa mu kiringo c'amasaha 72, abantu bateranga 100 akaba aribo barekuriwe kwitaba urubanza rwo guherekeza uwapfuye. No ku rubanza rw'ubugeni ntibazorenga abo. Ibitgiri vy'abandura muri Kenya bimaze igihe vyiyongera uko hongerekana amakoraniro ya poritike aho ingingo zo kwirinda Covid zitubahirizwa uhereye  no ku banyaporike bo hejuru. Ubu rero umukuru yaciye ategeka  ko abanyaporitike bose batubahiriza izo ngingo bafatwa, hatarabwe igihagarararo cabo. Mu kwezi kwa mbere handura abantu badashika ijana ku munsi, ariko mu kwezi kwa gatatu ibitigiri vyaraduze gushika ku 750 ku munsi. Umukuru wa Kenya yavuze ko igihugu kimaze gutakaza mirayaridi 5,1 z'ama dollars mu 2021 kubera ingingo za Covid-19 . Avuga ko zafashwe kugira birinde impfu z'abantu bashobora gushika 150.000 n'abantu barenga umuriyoni bari kuba banduye gushika kuri Noel iheze , nk'uko bigereranywa n'abahinga. Yavuze ko butunzi bwiyongeye kuri 0.6% kuri 6.2% bari biteze. Ubu igihugu citeze izamuka ringana na 7% mu 2021. Gushika ubu Kenya iharura abantu 1899 bamaze kwicwa na Covid-19 n'abarenga 111.000 bamaze kwandura uwo mugera.

headline: Covid - UK: Abagore bibungenze basabwa kudateba kwiteza urucanco
text: Reta y'Ubwongereza itera akamo abagore bibungenze kudateba kwiteza urucanco rwa coronavirus. Ikigo c'Ubwongereza citaho irondoka,  Obstetric Surveillance System, kivuga ko abagore bibungenze barenga 96% basanzwe bari mu bitaro kubera Covid hagati y'ukwa gatanu n'ukw'icumi umwaka uheze ari abatari bw'ibicandagishe. Iri sekeza rigiye gushira ku maradiyo n'imbuga hwaniro ivyemezo bitangwa n'abagore bibungenze bamaze kwiteza incanco. Reta ivuga ko uru rucanco rumeze neza kandi ko ata ngorane rutera ku bijanye n'irondoka. Mu kw'icumi na kabiri, umurwi ujejwe incanco warashize abagore bibungenze ku rutonde rw'abategerezwa gucandagwa imbere y'abandi bose, ukavuga ko bari mu bantu bari mu vyago vyinshi vyo kwandura Covid. Hari umugore umwe kuri batanu mu bagore bari mu bitaro bibungenze vyabaye ngombwa ko bibarutswa imbere y'igihe kugira ngo babafashe kurokora ubuzima, mu gihe uruhinja rumwe kuri zitanu rwakeneye gukurikiranirwa hagufi, nk'uko bivugwa n'ikigo citaho amagara y'abantu, Department of Health and Social Care (DHSC). Kuva mu kwa kane 2021, abagore bari biteguriye kuvyara barahawe urucanco rwa Pfizer-BioNTech canke rwa Moderna. Hari abagore bibungenze 84.000 baronkejwe urucanco rumwe, nayo abarenga 80.000 bakaba bararonkejwe icanco zibiri za Covid-19 kuva ico gihe, nk'uko iki kigo kibivuga. Igihe uwu mugambi wo gucandaga utangura mu Bwongereza, abagore bari bibungenze bahanurwa kwiteza urucanco mu gihe baba bari mu murwi w'abantu bashobora kugeramirwa canke bari mu bikorwa bishobora kubatuma bandura. Dr Jen Jardine, wo kw'ishure kaminuza Royal College of Obstetricians and Gynaecologists, akaba amaze amezi indwi yibungenze mbere akaba yararonkejwe urundi rucanco rwo kwongereza ubudahangarwa, avuga ati: "Jewe ubwanje nk'umuganga nkongera nkaba nibungenze, ndemeza ata nkeka ko incanco za Covid-19 zikingira neza  wewe nyene hamwe n'uyo mwana ataravuka kugira ntimwandure uwu mugera. "Nosaba nshimitse abagore bibungenze nkanje, nimba utararonka uru rucanco, ko wovugana n'umuganga agukurikirana canke umwakirizi mu gihe woba ugikekeranya hanyuma ugasaba uru rucanco uno musi nyene". Prof Lucy Chappell, umuhanuzi mukuru mu bijanye n'ubuhinga mu kigo DHSC, avuga ati: "Kwiteza urucanco rwa Covid-19 ni kimwe mu bintu nkenerwa cane umugore yibungenze ashobora gukora uno mwaka kugira ngo yikingire yongere akingire umwana wiwe uwu mugera. "Ubu dufise ivyemezo vyinshi vyerekana ko izi ncanco ari nziza kandi ko ingaruka ziterwa na Covid-19 zikomeye cane". Ku wa Mungu, Ubwongereza bwaharuye abantu bashasha banduye bashika 141.472, hamwe na 97 bapfuye mu misi 28 kuva aho batorewemwo Covid.

headline: Covid: Abafungura binenaguza bashobora kuba batumva akamoto n'akanovera k'indya.
text: Abana batanguye kuza barinenaguza mu gufungura barashobora kuba bariko barerekana ibimenyetso vya nyuma yo kwandura Covid birimwo kutamoterwa no kutumva akanovera, nk'uko bivugwa n'abahinga. Paromia, ikimenyetso aho abagifise usanga bafise ingorane zo kumoterwa, ni ingaruka yizwe neza yigaragaza mu bantu bakuze bigeze kurwara Covid. Kaminuza ya East Anglia (UEA) n'ishiramwe ry'abagiraneza Fith Sense vyashizeho ico bokwisunga mu kubibona ku bana. ''Nibazako hari abavyeyi benshi batakimenya 'ico bokora kandi bihebuye vy'ukuri'' nk'uko bivugwa na Carl Philpott wo kuri Kaminuza UEA. "Kenshi ico kibazo gituma abana baterekwa ibifungurwa, kandi benshi barashobora kuba badafungura na gatoyi." Iki kibazo, avuga ko cashikiye abantu bakuze bashika ku 25.000 kubera Covid, gishobora gutuma ivyo kurya bizana akamoto canke akanovera kabi, gasa nk'ak'inyama iboze canke ubumara. Umwigisha Philpott, yize ibice bikora mu kumoterwa kuri Kaminuza y'ubuganga ya Norwich yavuze ko bwabaye ubwambere atangura kubona abakiri bato bafise ibimenyetso vyo gutakaza kumoterwa kuva atanguye uyu mwuga. Yongeyeko ati "ni ikintu gushika ubu kitaremezwa vy'ukuri n'abanyamwuga mu vy'ubuvuzi, bibaza yuko abana baba bariko barinebaguza mu gufungura ntibabone ko hariho ikibazo kivyihishe inyuma". "Ku bana bamwe - cane cane abasanganywe ikibazo co gufungura, canke bafise uburwayi bwo mu mutwe nka autism - birashobora kugorana cana." Kuva aho arwariye Covid mu kwezi kwa Myandagaro (9), Malisse Kafi w'imyaka 11, vyaciye bimugora gufungura canke kunywa kuko vyose vyagira akanovera "k'amazirantoke canke amagi aboze". Nyina wiwe Dawn Kafi w'i Liverpool, yavuze yuko indya zamuteye kumokorwa. Mu mezi abiri, yaciye anyarukanwa kwa muganga yafashwe n'umwumira, amaze gutakaza ibiro 2. Yagize ati ''vyari biteye ubwoba''. ''Vyari bigoye kugira ico ukora. Twakoze uko dushoboye kugira afungure, twatetse ibifungurwa akunda vyose, ariko vyose vyamutera kurwara cane''. Malisse basanze afise parosmia baca bamuha inkabuzo ya steroid icishwa mu zuru, ariko ntaco vyafashije kandi igihe yari mu bitaro yagaburirwa hakoresheje agahora (tube). Madamu Kafi yagize ati "Ntitwari bwumve parosmia". ''Vyari bibabaje cane kubona amagara yiwe asubira inyuma, agaheba gufungura rwose''. Malisse ubu afata ibifungurwa bitamugwa nabi birimwo ifi ya salmon na foromaje ya Dairylea, ariko nk'uko nyina abivuga "aba arushe cane anafise imbeho igihe cose", kandi afise ibibazo vy'amagara vy'urutavanako. Duncan Boak wo muri Fith Sense, ishirahamwe ry'ubugiraneza ry'abantu bashikiwe n'ibibazo vyo kumoterwa no kwumva akanovera, yavuze ko bumvise inkuru zemeza yuko abana vy'ukuri bagira ingorane zo gufungura nyuma yo kurwara Covid. Yagize ati "Twarumvise amakuru ya bamwe mu bavyeyi usanga abana babo bafise ingorane zo gufungura kandi bagatakaza ibiro, ariko abaganga bakavuga ko ari ukwinenaguza ibifungurwa gusa." "Turashaka cane gusangira ayandi makuru kuri iyi ngorane n'abahinga mu vy'amagara kugira bamenye ko iki ari ikibazo gishika kure." Icerekezo, catunganijwe na Prof Philpott na Fifth Sense, cerekana yuko abavyeyi bashobora gufasha mu gutegura ikirangaminsi c'imfungurwa zitamerera nabi abana hamwe n'iziteza ingorane. Abana bari bakwiye guhimirizwa kugerageza ibifungurwa bisyeye, kugira barabe ivyo boshobora bikanabaryohera, kandi bakagerageza gukoresha utuntu tuzibira izuru bariko barafungura, kugira bakumire akanovera. Ico cerekezo kandi gihimiriza uburyo bwo "kwimenyereza kumoterwa" mu kwimotereza ibintu nka bine bitandukanye inshuro zibiri ku munsi, mu kiringo c'amezi menshi, bikazofasha gukira.

headline: Igihugu ca Lesotho cahagurukiye umugera wa SIDA mu mabohero
text: Mw'ibohero rikuru ry'abagabo ku mugwa mukuru wa Lesotho, Maseru, abapfungwa bama baronswa inyigisho z'ingene bokwikingira umugera wa SIDA. Iryo bohero ririmwo abapfungwa barenga 700, abategetsi bakavuga ko abarenga ica gatatu muri bo bawugendana. Niho umugambi w'ugutanga udukingirizo ku bapfungwa watanguriye, haciye imyaka itatu. Icigwa cakozwe mu mwaka wa 2016 cerekana ko abatari bake muri abo bapfungwa bakora imibonano mpuzabitsina batikingiye, bigatuma bashobora kwandura uwo mugera. Ico cigwa casavye ubutegetsi ko bwokwiragiza udukingirizo. Umunyamakuru wa BBC Namukabo Werunga i Maseru, yavuganye n'umwe mu bapfungwa bari muri iryo bohero, aho yamubwiye ko abapfungwa benshi bakora imibonano mpuzabitsina kandi ko bitabiriye uwo mugambi w'udukingirizo. Yamubwiye ati: " Maze kubona abantu benshi binjira ibohero bakaza ata mugera bafise, bagasangayo abandi bafise umugera kandi bakisanga bashobora gukorana imibonano mpuzabitsinda nabo. Benshi barakora imibonano mpuzabitsinda, ariko iciza ni uko benshi muri bo bakoresha utwo dukingirizo". Eka no mw'ibohero ry'abagore utwo dukingirizo turiyo, aho abarenga igice c'abapfungwa 59 basanzwe bari muri ryo bagendana umugera wa SIDA. N'aho ata cigwa kiraba kugira hihwezwe ko uwo mugambi woba waragize akamaro, abawuhagarariye bamenyesha ko hari icahindutse mu mibereho y'abapfungwa, kandi ko batagitinya kuvugana ibijanye n'ukwikingira mu gihe c'imibonano mpuzabitsina. Hari icizere ko inyigisho baronswa ku bijanye n'amagara y'abantu bishobora kubafasha mu kubandanya bitaho amagara yabo, n'inyuma y'ukurekurwa. Umushikiranganji w'ubutungane, Mokhele Moletsane, avuga ko yishimiye uwo mugambi. "Biradutera intege kuko abapfungwa bariko bahindura inyifato. Iyo tubona udukingirizo tugenda duhera, bivuga ko turiko turakoreshwa". "Nta cigwa turakora kugira turabe nimba koko uwo mugambi waragize akamaro, ariko turazi ko uwukoresheje agakingirizo aba yikingiye ku bice 94 kw'ijana". Mu mwaka wa 2012, Lesotho yarakuye amategeko yahana abahuza ibitsina babisangiye, ariko abanyagihugu baracinuba cane rwose abantu nk'abo mu gihugu. Avuga ku banegura uwo mugambi, umushikiranganji Moletsane avuga ko intumbero nyamukuru y'uwo mugambi ari ugukingira amagara y'abapfungwa. "Si uguhimiriza abahuza ibitsina babisangiye canke guhamagarira abapfungwa gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina - ikiriho ni uko imibonano mpuzabitsina ikorwa kandi dutegerezwa gukora uko dushoboye mu gukwiragiza udukingirizo kugira abantu ntibabandanye bandura". Ibiharuro vy'ikigo kijejwe kurwanya umugera wa SIDA, UNAIDS, vyerekana ko Afrika ariyo ifise ibitigiri binini vy'abagendana uwo mugera, kandi ko abapfungwa bari mu bageramiwe. Igihugu ca Lesotho kiri mu bihugu bifise ibiharuro binini vy'abagendana umugera wa SIDA kw'isi, aho hafi ica kane c'abanyagihugu baco bangana imiliyoni  zibiri n'ibihumbi 300 bawugendana. Haciye imyaka itatu uwo mugambi utanguye kandi waramaze gukwiragizwa mu mabohero yose yo muri ico gihugu.  Mu gihe biteye kubiri n'amategeko  gutanga udukingirizo ku bapfungwa, abajejwe kudukwiragiza badushira ahantu abapfungwa bashobora kudushikira vyoroshe, nko hafi y'utuzu twa surwumwe.

headline: Coronavirus: Ibitigiri bishasha vyerekana ko n’abaganga bandukirwa gusumba mu Bushinwa
text: Mu gihe ibitigiri vy'abandura wa mugera wa Coronavirus, abategetsi b'Ubushinwa bamenyesha ko n'abaganga bageramiwe, hakavugwa n'ubukene bw'ibikoresho vyo kwikingira. Abavuzi batandatu baramaze kuhasiga ubuzima, nayo abashika 1716 bamaze kwandukirwa kuva uwo mugera wadutse, nk'uko abo bategetsi babimenyesha. Gushika ubu, abantu barenga 1300 baramaze guhitanwa n'uwo mugera. Urupfu rwa muganga Li Wenliang, yari yagerageje kugabisha abategetsi uwo mugera ugitangura kwibonekeza, rwatumye abanyagihugu bashangashirwa. Zeng Yixin icegera c'umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu w'Ubushinwa, avuga ko abaganga 1102 banduye mu karere ka Wuhan, ahatanguriye ico kiza, abandi 400 nabo bakaba ari abo mu bindi bice vy'igihugu. Avuga ko igitigiri c'abaganga bagenda bandura uwo mugera kigenda congerekana. Asubirwamwo n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters, Bwana Zeng avuga ati: "Abaganga bafise akazi katoroshe na gato; bakorera mu buryo butoroshe kandi ntibanaruhuka; bamana umutima uhagaze, kandi kwandukirwa ni ibintu vyoroshe kuri bo". Abategetsi bo muri ako karere babandanya bita ku rutare kugira barabe ko bobaronsa ibikoresho vyo kwikingira nka twa dutambara two kwambara mu maso, ya marori yo kwikingira hamwe n'impuzu Bambara mu kwikingira. Umuganga umwe yabwiye Reuters ko we na bagenzi we 16 bafise ibimenyetso vyerekana ko bashobora kuba baranduye. Uwundi nawe avuga ko we na bagenziwe barenga ijana ku bitaro akorerako bashizwe ukwa bonyene. Yabwiye televiziyo CNN ya Amerika ko abandi 30 kuri 500 bahakora bamaze kwandura. Ibiharuro vya nyuma vyerekana ko abantu bashasha 122  bapfuye mu Bushinwa, ivyatumye ico gitigiri gishika kuri 1381. Muri ico gihugu nyene, ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu bumenyesha ko abantu banduye uwo mugera bababa 64.000. Hagati aho, ibitigiri vy'abandura uwo mugera hanze y'Ubushinwa biracari hasi, nk'uko bivugwa n'ishirahamwe OMS. Uwo mugera umaze gukwiragira mu bihugu bishika 24 kw'isi, aho abashika 500 bamaze kuwandura hanze y'Ubushinwa. Muri Philippines, umuntu umwe aramaze guhitanwa n'ico kiza. Umukuru w'ishami rya ONU ryitaho amagara kw'isi OMS, Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus,  afise ubwoba ko mu gihe woshika mu bihugu bitifashe mu birava ubuvuzi wokora ibara.

headline: Covid: Wa murwi wa WHO wo gutohoza inkomoko ya coronavirus washitse muri China
text: Wa murwi w'abahinga b'ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO, wahavuye ushika mu gisagara ca Wuhan co mu Bushinwa kugira utangure amatohoza ku nkomoko y'ikiza ca Covid-19. Uyu murwi wari urindiriwe kuva igihe kirekire ushitse muri ico gihugu inyuma y'amezi atari make OMS n'Ubushinwa bari mubiganiro. Umurwi w'abahinga cumi witeze kugiriranira ibiganiro n'ibigo bijejwe ubushakashatsi, ibitaro hamwe n'isoko ridandaza ibiva mu mazi rizwi ko ari ryo nkomoko y'iki kiza. Ikiza karanda ca Covid-19 catowe ubwa mbere mu gisagara ca Wuhan mu mpera z'umwaka wa 2019. Uyu murwi washitse muri ico gihugu mu gatondo ko kuri uyu wa kane, bikaba bihuriranye n'ibitigiri bishasha vy'abandura vyasubiye kwibonekeza mu buraruko bw'Ubushinwa, mu gihe Wuhan isa n'iyasubiye mu buzima busanzwe. Bazotegerezwa kumara indwi zibiri  bitaramuye  imbere y'uko batangura amahotoza yabo, azoshimikira ahanini ku vyo bazoba bahanwe n'abategetsi y'Ubushinwa. Iri tohoza rigamije kwiga ingene ibikoko vyatete iki kiza, rigiye gutangura inyuma y'inzitizi zari zabanje kwibonekeza. Mu ntango z'uku kwezi, OMS yavuze ko uyu murwi ujejwe amatohoza wari wankiwe kwinjira mu Bushinwa inyuma y'aho umwe mu bawugize asubijwe inyuma, uwundi nawe akankirwa kubandanya urugendo. Ubushinwa buvuga ko hari habaye ukutumvikana mu gihe ibiganiro vyari bikibandanya kugira uyo murwi ushobore kwemererwa kwinjira. Ubushinwa bwaramaze amezi atari make buvuga ko iki kiza karanda kitakomotse muri ako karere. Umwigisha wa kaminuza, Dale Fisher arongoye igisata kijejwe guhangana n'indwara z'ivyaduka muri OMS, yabwiye BBC ko yizeye neza y'uko isi izofata ko uru rugendo ari urugendo rukozwe n'abahinga ata mvo za politike zirimwo. Ati: "Nta politike irimwo canke kurondera gutanako umwikomo, ariko ni igikorwa c'abahinga co kurondera koko inkomoko y'iki kibazo". Prof Fisher yongera ko y'uko abahinga hafi bose bemera ko uwu mugera ufise inkomoko kama. Ku wa kane, Ubushinwa bwatangaje umuntu wa mbere yishwe na Covid-19 mu mezi umunani yose. Iki gihugu cashoboye guhagarika uwu mugera ku rugero runini kibicishije mw'isekeza ryo gupima abantu benshi, ingingo ruhasha za guma mu rugo hamwe n'izo guhagarika ingendo. Ariko muri zino ndwi za nyuma haribonekeje abantu bashasha banduye, cane cane mu ntara yo mu buraruko ya Hebei ikikije umugwa mukuru Pékin/Beijing hamwe n'intara ya Heilongjiang mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko.

headline: Bazamuganga: Menya igishobora gutuma ugutwi kwawe kutumva
text: Umva insiguro za Muganga ku bishobora gutuma ugutwi kwawe guhura n'ingorane zo kutumva

headline: Japan yabaye irahagarika doze imiriyoni 1.6 za Moderna ku bwoba bw'uko zoba zirimwo imicafu
text: Ubuyapani bwahagaritse ikoreshwa rya doze hafi imiriyoni 1.63 z'urucanco rwa Moderna ku bwoba bw'uko zishobora kuba zirimwo imicafu. Ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu buvuga ko mu ducupa hafi 560.000 batoye uko nyene basanzemwo harimwo "ibinti bidatomoye". Ikigo Takeda Pharmaceutical kigurisha kikanatanga uru rucanco mu Buyapani, kivuga ko Moderna yaciye iba irahagarika imizigo itatu mu kwicungera. Kivuga ko vyoba vyavuye ku kagorane ku kigo co muri Espagne gisanzwe gihingura uru rucanco, ariko ntigitanga insiguro. Moderna ivuga iti: "Gushika ubu, nta kibazo c'umutekano canke kijanye n'ubushobozi bwayo cari bwigere cibonekeza". Ivuga ko igiye gukorana n'abagenzuzi hamwe n'ikigo Takeda kugira hakorwe amatohoza ku vyabaye. Nta nsiguro zatanzwe kuri ibi "bintu bidatomoye" basanzemwo, ariko Takeda ivuga ko ari akantu gatoya, ivuga ko yaciye yihutira gukorera amatohoza. Amakuru y'uko izi doze zirimwo imicafu yatanzwe kandi n'ibindi bigo indwi vyo gucandaga, nk'uko bivugwa n'ikinyamakuru Japan Times, aho basanze uducupa 39 twabonetse ko turimwo iyi micafu. Japan Times yongerako y'uko ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu bwasohoye amanomero y'iyi mizigo kugira ngo abantu bari baronse urucanco imbere y'uko ruhagarikwa bashobore kuraba nimba batoba bahawe urucanco rwanduye. Ubuyapani buhanganye n'ibitigiri vy'abandura Covid bigenda biduga, intara zindi umunani zikaba zashizwe ku mategeko adasanzwe kuva ejo ku wa gatatu. Umugwa mukuru Tokyo muri kino gihe uriko uberamwo za nkino za Paralympic zihuza abanonotsi bagendana ubumuga. Iki gihugu caramaze kwemeza ikoreshwa ry'incanco za Pfizer na AstraZeneca - cari catanguye gukoresha Moderna mu kwa gatanu. Ibice 40% birenga gato vy'Abayapani nibo bamaze gucandagwa, nayo ibice hafi 50% bakaba bamaze kuronswa doze imwe.

headline: Umugore wo muri Nouvelle-Zélande yapfuye inyuma y'uko atewe urucanco rwa Pfizer
text: Igihugu ca Nouvelle-Zélande/ New Zealand catangaje umuntu wa mbere cemeza ko yapfuye biturutse ku rucanco rwa Covid-19 yatewe. Umurwi wigenga w'abahinga bakurikiranira hagufi ibijanye n'umutekano w'incanco uvuga ko urupfu rw'uyu mugore "rushobora" kuba rwavuye ku ndwara ya myocardite/myocarditis, indwara y'ubushe bw'umutsi w'umutima. Uvuga kandi ko hari ibindi bibazo vy'amagara bishobora kuba "vyatumye uru rucanco rugira ingaruka mbi". Abagenduzi ba Bulaya bavuga ko myocardite/myocarditis ari ingaruka "zidakunze kwibonekeza" kandi ko inyungu z'uru rucanco zirengeye cane ingaruka mbi zishobora kubaho. Hagati aho, impamvu nyamukuru y'uru rupfu ntiramenyekana. Ariko, umurwi ukurikiranira hagufi ibijanye n'incanco za Covid ( Covid-19 Vaccine Independent Safety Monitoring Board) uvuga ko myocardite/myocarditis "ishobora kuba yatewe n'uru rucanco". Mw'itangazo wasohoye, uyu murwi uvuga ko ari rwo rupfu rwa mbere muri Nouvelle-Zélande rufitaniye isano n'urucanco Pfizer rwa Covid-19. Iri tangazo ribandanya riti: "N'aho ikigo kijejwe gukurikiranira hagufi ingaruka mbi z'incanco (Centre for Adverse Reactions Monitoring) umaze kuronka ayandi makuru y'umuntu yapfuye haciye imisi acandazwe, nta na hamwe izi mpfu zifitaniye isano n'urucanco". Urupfu rw'uyu mugore ruriko rurakorwako amatohoza yimbitse, uwujejwe kuyakora akaba yiteze gutanga icegeranyo. Abategetsi nta yandi makuru baratanga, harimwo n'imyaka y'uyu mugore. Ikigo kijejwe imiti ca Bulaya (European Medicines Agency, EMA) kivuga ko ingaruka za myocardite/myocarditis ziturutse ku ncanco za Covid za Pfizer na Moderna, "zidakunze kwibonekeza", kikongerako y'uko zikunze kwibonekeza cane cane ku bagabo bakiri bato. Nk'akarorero, Ubwongereza buvuga ko bwaronse abantu 195 bahuye n'ico kibazo ca myocardite/myocarditis mu bantu batewe urucanco rwa Pfizer, iki giharuro kikaba kiri ku rugero rwa 5/1.000.000. Ikigo EMA gitera akamo abanyagihugu ko bobandanya bicandagisha, kuko bituma abantu badasinzikazwa na Covid-19. Mu bimenyetso vya myocardite/myocarditis harimwo ububabare mu gikiriza, ukubura impemu n'umutima utera ku rugero rudasanzwe. Abahinga basaba umuntu uwo ari we wese afise ibi bimenyetso mu misi ikurikira urucanco kwihutira kwa muganga kugira ngo abaganga bamukurikirane. Kuri uno wa mbere, abategetsi ba Nouvelle-Zélande, batangaje ko ata "makenga bafitiye urucanco rwa Pfizer muri Nouvelle-Zélande".

headline: Covid-19: OMS/WHO isaba Tanzania gutanga ibitigiri vy'abandura coronavirus
text: Ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi OMS/WHO, ryongeye gusaba reta ya Tanzania gusubira gutangaza abanduye ca kiza karanda ca Covid-19, rikavuga ko bishobora gufasha gukingira Abatanzania n'incuti zabo. Umukuru w'iri shirahamwe Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, avuga ko amaze kuvugana n'abategetsi ba Tanzania ku bijanye n'ingene bofata ingingo zo kuzibira ikwirakwira ry'ikiza ca Covid-19, ariko ko gushika ubu OMS ata na kimwe iramenyeshwa ku ngingo reta iriko irafata mu kurwanya iki kiza. Ati: "Nasavye ko boza barerekana ibi bitigiri inyuma y'aho bibonekeye ko hari ingenzi zanguye". Sibwo bwa mbere OMS itanga iki cipfuzo kuva aho reta ya Tanzania ihagarikiye kumenyesha ingene iki kiza cifashe mu gihugu n'abo kimaze guhitana. Mw'itangazo ryo guhoza iki gihugu ku rupfu rw'umutegetsi aherutse kwitaba Imana, umukuru wa OMS avuga ko atewe impungenge n'ingene iki kiza cifashe muri ico gihugu. Ati: Nsaba Tanzania gushira mu ngiro ingingo zijanye n'ukubungabunga amagara y'abantu tuzi twese ko zifasha guhagarika ikwirakwira, kandi ikitegurira incanco". Avuga ko hari Abatanzaniya batari bake baherutse kuja mu bihugu bibanyi no mu zindi mpande z'isi bapimwe bagasanga baranduye Covid-19. Ati: "Ibi vyerekana ko ari ngombwa ko Tanzania ifata ingingo ruhasha kugira ngo ikingire abanyagihugu bayo n'abo muri ibi bihugu n'ahandi". Iri tangazo risohowe mu gihe umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Tanzania Kasim Majaaliwa aherutse gusaba abanyagihugu gukurikiza ingingo zo guhagarika ikwirakwira ry'uwu mugera mu gukurikiza ingingo ngenderwako zashizweho n'igisata kijejwe amagara y'abantu harimwo kwambara udupfukamunwa. Umushikiranganji Majaaliwa yavuze aya majambo ku musi bashingura umunyamabanga wa reta John Kijazi yasandavye ku wa gatatu ahitanywe n'indwara itatangajwe. Uno musi niwo musi wa nyuma w'ikiringo co gusenga casabwe na Perezida John Magufuli, aho yasaba abarongoye amadini gusenga kugira ngo Imana ikingire igihugu umugera wa coronavirus. Mu mwaka uheze, yarateye akamo nk'aka ko gusenga mu kiringo c'imisi itatu, mu nyuma atangaza ko ico gihugu cashoboye kwiganzura ikiza karanda ca Covid 19.

headline: OMS ivuga ko amahirwe yo kurwanya Coronavirus agenda agabanuka
text: Umukuru wa OMS, ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, avuga ko afise amakenga ku kungene wa mugera ruhonyabantu coronavirus ugenda ukwiragira mu buryo budatomoretse. Umukuru wa OMS, Muganga Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, avuga ko amahirwe yo kurwanya uwo mugera agenda "agabanuka". Uno munsi ku wa gatandatu, abategetsi b'Ubushinwa batangaza ko ibitigiri vy'abahitanwa n'uwo mugera canke abawandura vyagabanutse. Hagati aho, ibitigiri vy'abawandura biriko biriyongera muri Koreya y'Ubumanuko, Mu Butaliyano, muri Irani eko no mu bindi bihugu. Muganga Tedros avuga ko igitigiri c'abanduye hanze y'Ubushinwa gisa n'uko ari gito, ariko y'uko ingene igenda ikwiragira biteye amakenga. Ati: "Turatewe amakenga n'ibitigiri bigenda vyiyongera, mu gihe biboneka ko bidatumwa n'uko abanduye baba baheruka mu burere bugeramiwe, canke ko boba barakoranyeko n'abamaze kwandura". Avuga kandi ko ibitigiri vy'abapfa n'abandura mu gihugu ca Irani "biteye amakenga menshi". Abarenga 1200 nibo bamaze kumenyekana ko banduye coronavirus mu bihugu 26 havuyemwo Ubushinwa, nayo umunani bakaba ari bo bamaze gupfa nk'uko bivugwa na OMS. Muri abo bamaze gupfa hanze y'Ubushinwa harimwo babiri bo muri Koreya y'Ubumanuko, izwi ko ari co gihugu gifise igitigiri kinini c'abamaze kwandura uwo mugera hampande y'Ubushinwa. Kuri uno wa gatandatu, Koreya y'Ubumanuko  yamenyesheje ko hari abandi 142 bashasha banduye coronavirus, bikaba vyatumye igitigiri c'abanduye uwo mugera muri ico gihugu gishika 346. Umushikiranganji wa mbere, Chung Sye-kyun, avuga ko igihugu kiri mu bihe bidasanzwe. Mu Butaliyano, ejo ku wa gatanu, abaganga muri ico gihugu bamenyesheje ko umutama w'imyaka 78 ariwe muntu wa mbere yishwe na coronavirus, nk'uko bitangazwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Ansa ryo muri ico gihugu. Imbere y'aho, Ubutaliyano bwari bwatangaje ko hari abandi bantu 16 bari banduye uwo mugera, bituma ubushikiranganji bujejwe amagara y'abantu butangaza ko amashure n'ibiro vya leta vyugarwa maze ibikorwa bijanye n'inkino bigahagarikwa, mu turere tugeramiwe. Gushika ubu, Ubushinwa bumenyesha ko abantu 76.288 mu gihugu cose aribo banduye coronavirus, nayo 2345 bakaba bamaze kuhasiga ubuzima. Muri Irani, uwo mugera ubarizwa cane cane mu gisagara ceranda ca Qom kiri mu bumanuko bw'umugwa mukuru Tehran, kikaba gisanzwe kigenderwa cane n'aba isilamu b'aba Shia bo mu karere k'Uburasirazuba bwo hagati. Ico gihugu catangaje ko hari abantu babiri bapfuye ejo ku wa gatanu muri Qom, biyongera ku bandi babiri nyene bari bapfuye ku wa kane. Abantu 18 nibo bamaze kumenyekana ko bamaze kwandura uwo mugera muri ico gihugu. Eka n'igihugu ca Libani naco nyene kimenyesha ko hari umuntu wa mbere amaze kwandura uwo mugera, akaba ari umukenyezi w'imyaka 45 yagiye kumenyekana ko yawanduye ashitse ku mugwa mukuru Beirut avuye mu gisagara ca Qom muri Irani. Ibihugu vya Isirayeli , Leta Zunze Ubumwe z'Abarabu (Emirats Arabes Unis) hamwe na Mirisi, navyo nyene bimenyesha ko ico kiza camaze gushikayo.

headline: Uganda-Covid: Amashure n'iyindi mirimo vyongeye guhagarara
text: Umukuru w'igihugu ca Uganda yafashe ingingo yo kwugara amashuri ahagarika n'amakoraniro y'abantu benshi mu gihe  igihugu gihanganye n'umusumiyanyo wa kabiri w'ikwirakwira ry'indwara ya Covid - 19. Imodoka zunguruza abantu hagati y'ama district ntizizokora kuva ku wa kane, iyo minsi yo gushika ku wa kane ikaba ariyo kugira abanyeshure bari mu  buraro batahe. Ubunywero, cinema hamwe n'aho barabira ivyese navyo vyugawe. Amashure n'amakoraniro vyo vyahagaze kuva kuri uyu wa mbere kandi iyo ngingo ikazobandanya mu kiringo c'imisi 42. Amashure atari make yari amaze iminsi ashikiriza ibitgiiri vy'abandura umugera wa corona mu banyeshure n'abakozi, kimwe mu vyatumye hafatwa iyo ngingo yo kwugara amashure. Iyo ngingo yatangajwe haheze amasaha make umushikiranganji ajejwe amagara atangaje abantu bashasha 1.259 banduye umugera, igitigiri ca mbere kinini c'abanduye ku munsi umwe - hamwe na 9 bapfuye ku wa mungu. Ukwiyongera kw'abandura umugera wa corona kwatanguye kuvugwa harehezwe indwi zibiri, abategetsi bakaba bari bamaze iminsi biyunvira guhagarika canke kugabanya uruja n'uruza kugira birinde ko amavuriro ahava arengerwa n'abarwaryi. Ibitaro bikuru vy'igihugu vya Mulago ku ndwi iheze vyatangaje ko abarwayi biyongeye cane, bivuga ko bikeneye kwongereza ibitanda vyo kubaryamikako. Uganda  yugaye amashuri ubwa mbere mu kwezi kwa gatatu mu 2020 mu nyuma igenda irayugurura buke buke kuva mu kwezi kw'icumi. Ariko amashure matomato n'ayisumbiuye ntiyari b wugururwe. Umukuru w'igihugu mw'ijambo yashikirije igihugu ku wa mungu yavuze ko kuva ubu abigisha bose bategerezwa gucadarwa imbere y'uko basubira ku kazi. Bari bashizwe mu bohererwako igihe hatangura isekeza ryo gutanga incanco mu kwezi kwa gatatu uyu mwaka. Muri ico kiringo nta bantu barenga 20 bemerewe kwitaba ubukwe canke  amaziko . Uretse mu  gisagara ca Kampala gusa, ahandi imiduga yunguruza abantu kuva ku wa kane ntizoba ikora kiretse iyitwara ibintu gusa. Gushika ubu Uganda haharugwa abantu hafi  52.929 vy'abamaze kwandura umugera wa corona na 374 bamaze gupfa.

headline: Coronavirus: "Muri Afrika turakeneye urucanco rwo gukingira abageze mu zabukuru''
text: Mu gihe bimaze kuvugwa bikanasubirwawo ko hashobora kuba ''agahomeramunwa'' k'uko habura incanco zo gukinga coronavirus ku bihugu vy'amikoro make, umuganga w'indwara zo mu mutwe muri Zimbabwe, Dr Dixon Chuibanda, aravuga ingene kuronka urwo rukingo vyomufasha, we n'abanyokuru bakorana. Haheze amayinga atanu nanduye Covid-19, n'ubwo atako ntakora kugira ndayirinde: kwambara agafukamunwa,gukaraba no kutegera cane abandi. Sinahengeshanya kuguma nibaza ingene ataco nshoboye bifatanye n'ukudashobora guhema ndiko ndaraba ingene urugero rwa oxygene mu mubiri wanje ruguma ruhindagurika, n'ubwo nanje ndi muganga. Nari nzi kandi ko amahirwe yo gushobora kuronka umwuka(oxygene) igihe nowukenera yasa nk'aho atayahari muri iki gihugu cacu kitagira uburyo. Ndembejwe n'uburuhe bw'ikirenga, no gucishamwo umwuka ukamperana, ku munsi ugira gatatu naciye mbona ko nshobora gupfa. N'ubwo uwariwe wese ashobora guhitanwa na Covid-19, urugero rwo gushora gupfa ni runini kuruta mu gihugu nka Zimbabwe aho igisata c'amagara y'abantu cifashe nabi cane. Muri ico gihe nari ndwaye, abaganga batanu twakoranye imyaka myinshi, barishwe n'iyo ndwara. Baritaweho kwa muganga ariko ntivyababujije gupfa. Impfu z'abantu nk'uko zirababaza cane. Ariko kandi ingaruka zo kubura abaganga batanu bafise uburambe mu kazi mu gihe c'indwi zine ku gihugu nka Zimbabwe n'agahombo kanini cane ku gihugu cose. Imana zose kuri jewe, ku munsi ugira gatanu, urugero rwo kwinjiza umwuka rwaciye rutangura kuduga. Ntawuzi igituma nahakuye agatwe kandi bagenzanje twasa n'abafise kahise k'amagara gasa bo barapfuye. Haracari vyinshio vyo kwiga kuri uwo mugera Uko nagenda ndatora mitende,niko naja ndiyumvira abantu bakora mu kigo maze imyaka 10 ndongoye. N'umugambi witaho abantu  ku bibazo vy'inyifato(psychologique) urangurwa n'abanyokuru barenga 700 bavyigiye, mu turere turenga 100 muri Zimbabwe. Mu gihugu kitarenza abanganga b'indwara zo mu mutwe 13 ku bantu bangana na miriyoni 16,uwo mugambi warafashije guteza imbere amagara yo mu mutwe. Vyafashe imyaka kugira twubake umugambi wa Friensship Bench kugira twerekana ko hakoreshejwe ubuvuzi bw'ijambo, abanyokuru bavyize bashobora kuvura akabonge n'umwitwarariko urengeje no gutezura ivyiyumviro vyo kwiyahura muri Zimbabwe n'ahandi. 'Abanyoku bari mu bageramirwa cane' Mu mwaka uheze abo banyokuru nibo bagiye imbere mu kurwanya iyongerekana ry'indwara zo mu mutwe zivuye ku kiza ca Covid-19. Ariko uko uwo mugera wakwiragira vuba mu gihugu abo uhitana nabo bakaba benshi uko bukeye uko bwije, abo banyokuru n'abaganga ba bitumwako baciye baja mu bageramirwa ubwa mbere. Umunsi umwe nahamagaye umunyokuru Kusi Kwenyu amaze imyaka 10 akorera  Friendship Bench uugira mdamubaze ingene abanyokuru bamerewe i Mbare, aho Friendship Bench yatanguriye. Kuva ndwaye nta n'umwe muri bo twari bwasubire kuvugana. ''Mumerewe gute, wewe n'abandi banyonkuru bose, bose barakomeye? Ubu ntimuva imuhira?'' Haciye umwanya utari muto kugira anyishure. ''Twarabuze umwe mu banyokuru.'' Haraciyemwo akandi kanya  imbere y'uko yishsura ikibazo canje ca kabiri ku ngingo zo kwikingira yari yafashe. ''Kuguma ukwa wenyene i Mbare? Ntibishoboka. Kandi ubu abantu baradukeneye cane kuruta na mbere.'' Namubwiye nti: Ariko murashobora kubaha ubufasha mukoresheje telefone muri mu ngo zanyu, nk'uko twari twabibabwiye na mbere'' Ntiyarindiriye ko mpeza kuvuga. ''Uwundi munsi umusore afise se yishwe na Covid  yarandondeye kugira tuvugane. Yari yataye umutwe kandi yari akeneye ko tubonana amaso mu yandi. ''Sinari kumubwira ngo taha turaja kuvugana kuri telefone-nta na telefone afise. Naramuvugishije kuko nabona ko ari mu mugwi w'abarwayi baba bageramiwe cane. Naragerageje uko nshobora kugira ntitwegerane cane igihe twariko turavugana.'' Aca yongerako ati: ''Turi mu bihe bibi.'' Ivyo yavuga vyari vyo-kuruta na mbere abantu benshi bari bakeneye ubufasha bwa Friendship Bench,kandi ubwo bufasha bwashikira abantu neza mu biganiro vy'imbona nkubone. Naciye ndamubaza n'agahinda:''Mwibaza ko hari icoshobora gukorwa kugira mukingirwe, wewe n'abandi banyokuru 700 bakorera Friendhip Bench?'' Aragorora ijwi aca avuga ati: ''Turakeneye urukingo.Urukingo rw'umwe umwe mu munyokuru.'' Amasaha yitereye uwo munsi, nasomye mu binyamakuru ko hafi miriyoni 40 z'incanco zatanzwe kw'isi, ariko Afrika ikagenerwa nke ncane. Kandi ko hafi miliyari 7.25 z'incanco zaguzwe zitaranakorwa n'ibihugu vya Bura Bukeye nakwirikiye kuri zoom igisabisho co gusezera uwundi  dukorana yari yahitanywe na Covid-19. Umunsi uheze naciye nibaza nti mbega hazotegerezwa gupfa abakora kwa muganga n'abanyokuru bangahe imbere y'uko ngaha turonka urucanco. N'abakozi bangahe nkabo bazokwemera kubabara kugirango bafashe abandi bababaye? Mu nyuma nca ndonka ubundi butumwa kuri whatsapp ko uwundi muganga yapfuye ahitanywe n'ingaruka za Covid-19. Turakeneye urucanco muri Afrika.

headline: Abahanganye na Ebola muri Kongo barenga 300 baramaze guterwa
text: Leta ya Republika ya Demokrasi ya Kongo ivuga ko kuva mu ntango z'uno mwaka abakozi bahanganye n'ikiza ca Ebola barenga amajana atatu bamaze kugabwako ibitero mu buseruko bw'igihugu. Icegeranyo c'ubushikiranganji bujejwe amagara kivuga ko batandatu bamaze kwicwa abandi mirongo indwi barakomereka. Ico cegeranyo congerako yuko ivyo bitero bibangamira utwigoro two kubuza uwo mugera ngo ntukwiragire. Mu mpera z'indwi yaraye iheze umunyamakuru wa radiyo okapi yariciwe iwe muhira. Yishwe nyuma gatoyi yo gushikiriza ikiganiro co guhimiriza abantu ku kwirinda Ebola kuri radio. Kuva ico kiza caduka mu kwezi kwa munani mu mwaka uheze, kiramaze guhitana abantu ibihumbi bibiri n'ijana na mirongo umunani.

headline: Ibishobora gushikira umwana uvyaye urengeje imyaka 35
text: Abagabo bafata umugambi wo kuvyara barengeje imyaka 35 bafise imana mbi ku rugero runini yo kuvyara abana bataragera canke bafise ubumuga bwa "Autisme". Uko umwaka utashe, imbuto z'umugabo ziragabanuka cane mu bwinshi no mu bwiza, bigashobora rero gutuma haba inzitizi mu kurondoka. Ni vyo ivyigwa vyinshi vyakozwe imyaka myinshi vyerekanye, harimwo icakozwe n'igisata c'amagara y'abantu muri kaminuza ya Stanford, muri Reta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, yihweje amatohoza yakozwe ku bana bakivuka imiliyoni 40. Muri rusangi, ugushobora gutwara imbanyi uteba birazwi cane mu banyagihugu kandi abagore barazi neza  ingorane zikomeye zo gutwara imbanyi inyuma y'imyaka 35 canke 40. Ku ruhande rw'abagabo (aho bitazwi cane), inkuru nziza n'uko hari ivyo basabwa gukora, ibipimo hamwe n'imiti bifasha gukurikiranira hagufi buri muntu no kugabanya ibishobora gushikira umwana, nk'uko biri aha hepfo. Dr Karla Giusti Zacharias, umuhinga muvyo irondoka ry'abantu akama ari n'umwe mu bagize umugwi w'abavuzi ba Rede D'OR - Ibitaro vya São Luiz Itaim i  São Paulo, asigura ko yama yakiriye mu biro iwe abagabo bakuze cane bipfuza kuronka abana. Agira ati:"Ndabona abaza kunyitura bafise imyaka mirongo itanu canke mirongo itandatu bafise abagore bagira kabiri bari kumwe n'abagore bakiri bato ku basumba  bashaka gutwara imbanyi." Ikibazo babaza abahinga muvyo amagara y'abantu  n'iki: N'izihe ngaruka zo kuvyara ukuze uri umugabo? Muri rusangi, igihimba c'irondoka c'umugabo gikora mu buryo butandukanye cane n'ico umugore. Mu gihe umugore afise igitigiri ntarengwa c'imbuto, ku bagabo imbuto z'umugabo zitangura kuboneka mu bugimbi (puberté) zibandanya kuboneka ubuzima bwiwe bwose. Aho reri n'iho haca haza ikintu gikomeye: N'aho imbuto z'umugabo zibandanya ziboneka nk'uko bisanzwe, uburyo zibonekamwo ntibuba bukimeze co kimwe inyuma y'imyaka runaka. Uko imyaka igenda, n'ibisanzwe ko uduce tugize umubiri tugenda turahingurwa ku rugero ruto kandi dufise n'utunenge. Utwo tunenge na two rero dushobora kubuza gusama. Ubushakashatsi bumwe bumwe bwerekana ko no mugihe bikunze ukibaruka, umwana ashobora kugira ingorane z'amagara z'urutavanako, uhereye ku ngorane zo guhema akivuka gushika ku bumuga bwa "Autisme". Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe mu 2018 n'igisata c'ubuvuzi muri kaminuza ya Stanford bwerekanye ko muri rusangi, uko umugabo asaza, ni ko n'amahigwe mabi ku mwana aba menshi. Abagabo bavyara abana inyuma y'imyaka 35 , ku rugero runini bishoboka ko abana babo bagira ibiro bike bakivuka, kurabirana canke agakenera ubuhinga bwo guhema amaze kuvuka. Abantu bafise imyaka irenga 45  bafise gushika ku bice 14%  ivyago vyo kuvyara umwana atageze, hanyuma abarengeje imyaka 50 na bo bafise gushika ku bice 28%  ivyago birengeje vy'uko abana bavyaye bashobora kumara igihe kirekire babundikiriwe. Igihe ubwo bushakashatsi bwashirwa ahabona,  Michael Eisenberg, umwigisha muvyo inzira z'umukoyo (Urologie) akaba ari na we yari arongoye abagize ubwo bushakashatsi, yavuze ko ibivyo biharuro bidakwiye gufatwa nk'ibintu vyo kurenza urugero. Ku bwiwe, ibi bifasha imiryango kwitegura no gukurikiranwa bikwiye. Agira ati:"Dusa no kwitaho kuraba ibintu vyerekeye abagore gusa iyo turiko turaraba ivyago bijanye no kuvyara. Ariko icigwa cacu cerekana ko kuronka umwana akomeye ari akazi k'abantu babiri, kandi ko imyaka y'umugabo ifisemwo uruhara na yo nyene. " Ikinyamakuru cegeranya ibikorwa vyinshi vy'ubushakashatsi bwakozwe ku kintu kimwe mu myaka iheze casohotse mu 2017 caradomye urutoke iyindi ngorane yo kuvyara uteba uri umugabo: ivyago zikomeye zo kuvyara umwana afise ubumuga bwa "Autisme". Mu gusozera, ico cirwa kivuga gishimitse ko, kuri buri imyaka 10 yiyongera ku mugabo, hari ivyago ku bice 21%  ko umwana agira iyo ngorane ifatanye n'ingorane yo kuvuga, kubana n'abandi n'inyifato. Ubushakashatsi ntiburamenya gushika ubu igituma ibi biba. Ariko n'aho haba habaye igabanuka ry'ubwiza n'ubwinshi bw'imbuto z'umugabo uko imyaka igenda, bigaragara ko imbuto inyaruka zishobora gutuma haba ugusama, ivyo bikaba bibaganura ivyago vy'ingwara ku mwana, nk'uko bisigurwa na Alfredo Canalini, arongoye ishirahamwe ry'abigisha ivyerekeye ahaca umukoyo muri Brezil. Canalini avuga ko ata buhinga buhari bwo gusimba imitego ishoboka ijanye no kuvyara uteba. Agira ati:"Ibijanye n'ubuhinga bwo kurondoka ku mugabo bijanye n'umwe umwe  ari na co gitumwe umugabo wese akeneye kwisuzumisha kugira atahure uko biriko biramugendera n'ico ashobora gukora." Uko kwivuza gusaba kuja ku muganga asanzwe canke ku muhinga araba ivyo inzira y'umukoyo. Ivyo bishobora gukorwa buri gihe, buri mwaka, igihe hari ugushaka umwana canke mu gihe hari ibimenyetso bimwe bimwe bigaragaye, nko kuribwaribwa cane, kutipfuza gukora amabanga y'abubatse, ingorane yo kubarukwa canke kumara umwanya muremure ubarutswe (Erection), hamwe rero no kugerageza kenshi atakivamwo gutwara imbanyi. Uwo muganga avuga kandi ati:" eh..ni vyo hari ivyo ushobora gusabwa gukora bisanzwe bifasha ku magara y'umubiri wose, nko gufungura neza, kutaguma mu kibanza kimwe, gukora imyimenyerezo ngororamubiri kenhsi, kutanywa itabi, no kugira ibiro bike..." Zacharias aratwibutsa ko uguhindura uburyo bwo kubaho ata co bishitseko, bishoboka gutangura kwipimisha no gufata imiti bijanye. Agira ati:"Mu gihe imbuto z'umugabo zitameze neza, turashobora kubabwira uko umuntu avyifatamwo kugira zibe nziza kandi nyinshi." Uwo muhinga aravuga kintu ca nyuma kigeramiye abagabo bashaje: Ikibazo kijanye n'akazi ko kurera umwana. Agira ati:"Ntitwokwiyibagiza ko abagabo benshi bakuze cane bageze ku rugero rwo kuba barakoze cane ko rero baba barushe. "Ivyo ni ngombwa kubishira ku munzani hanyuma ukiyumvira agaciro ko gukurikirana indero y'umwana, kuvyuka mu gitondo kumuhindurira impuzu yiyononye, gukina... Aheraheza agira ati:"Abubakanye botegerejwe kubivugana kugira misi yose bafate ingingo ibereye ibaraba no ku muryango wabo."

headline: Mu kugwanya ubugumba, intanga z'abagabo bapfuye zikwiye kwemerwa gutangwa
text: Ingabire y'intanga  zivuye mu  bagabo  bitavye imana, ikwiye kwemerwa, nk'uko biri mu cigwa cakozwe. Ubwo bushakashatsi bwasohorewe mu kinyamakuru ''Journal of Medical Ethics'' burasaba ko haboneka inzira zo kugwiza  ibihimba vy'umubiri vy'abapfuye nk'ingabire  bikozwe mu buntu. Mu 2017 mu Bwongereza, utuyoya 2,345 twaravutse bivuye kw'itangwa ry'intanga nk'ingabire. Ariko hari ubukene bw'ingabire z'ibihimba vy'umubiri hirya no hino mu gihugu kubera amategeko akaze agenga iki kibazo. Intanga zishobora gutororokanywa inyuma y'urupfu rw'umugabo biciye ku gushusha  umuhora zicamwo uzikabuje umuyagankuba canke ukabaga nyenezo, hanyuma ukazibika ahantu hakanye cane. Hari ivyemezo vyerekana ko intanga zibitse mu bagabo bitavye Imana zishobora gutuma umugore yibungenga kenshi kandi akagira abana bafise amagara meza, naho zoba zakuweyo inyuma y'amasaha 48 amaze gupfa. Muri ubwo bushakashatsi, umuganga Nathan Hodson wo muri Kaminuza ya Leicester, na  Joshua Parker wo ku bitaro vya Wythenshawe i Manchester, bemeza ko ubu buhinga buja mu rukurikirane rw'itangwa ry'ibihimba vy'umubiri nk'ingabire. Bavuga bati: ''Nimba vyemewe ko abantu  bashobora gutanga uduce duto duto tugize umubiri mu cubahiro, kugira bakure mu mubabaro abandi mu kubongera iminsi yo kubaho batewe ibindi bihimba vy'umubiri mu kubavura  ingwara ka naka, tubona ko ata mvo n'imwe yotuma gutanga intanga bitoshirwa mu kugabanya umubabaro  nk'uwubugumba. ''Ariko bishobora kwongereza ibibazo bijanye n'ukuntu nyene izo ntanga aba yaravyemeye, uruhara  rw'umuryango ruba ntarengwa, hamwe  n'imyitwarariko ijanye n'ukutamenyekana kw'umuntu aba yatanze intanga''. Mu 2014 ububiko bw'intanga ku rwego rw'igihugu mu gihugu c'u Bwongereza ruri i Birmingham bwakoresheje amafranga ya leta amapound ibihumbi 77. Inyuma y'imyaka 2 gusa, ubwo bubiko bwarugawe bwongera butangura kurondera abatanga intanga. Abantu 9 gusa baremeye gusubira kuzitanga ariko umuntu umwe mu nyuma yarasokoye. Kuva mu 2005, amategeko avuga ko abantu batanze intanga zabo nk'ingabire mu Bwongereza bategerezwa kwemera ko abana bavutse biciye kuri izo nkanga, bashobora kubonana n'uwazitanze  bamaze gushikana imyaka 18. 'Challenging stigma' Kutabonwa neza Jeffrey Ingold yigeze  gutanga intanga aba i Londres,  yabwiye BBC ko yizeye ko habaye kwemera gutanga intanga inyuma y'ugupfa, vyoshobora guhimiriza abagabo benshi mu kuja  mu gitigiri c'abazitanga. Avuga ati: ''Sinibaza  ukuntu ishigwaho ry'uburyo bushasha bwo gutanga intanga nk'ingabire co kimwe n'itangwa ry'ibindi bihimba vyofatwa ukundi kuntu,  atari uko ari vyiza gusa. "Ku bwanje mu gutanga intanga sinigeze mbona ko hari aho bihuriye n'uduce ntanga kamere twanje, canke ibindi bisa n'ivyo, ariko nariko mfasha abagenzi bafise ico bakeneye. ''Nibaza ko kugira intumbero nk'iyo bishobora gutuma uyu mugambi ufata inzira zimwe zirimwo utubazo two  kutabibona neza,  canke ivyiyumviro ataho bivuye vyo mu kibano bijanye n'itangwa ry'intanga''. Yongeye avuga ati: ''Nimba abantu bari bazi ibijanye n'uyu mugambi,  bashobora kuvuga neza  ingingo zafashwe, kugira abagabo bamenye ko boja mu batanga intanga canke abatazitanga. Nibaza ko twari gusanga hari benshi bafashe intumbero yo kuzitanga''. Naho biri uko, Prof Allan Pacey, umwigisha mu bijanye n'ingwara ziboneka ku bagabo muri Kaminuza ya Sheffield  yemeza ko hakwiye kuba intambwe yo gusubira inyuma mw'itangwa ry'intanga. Avuga ati: ''Jewe nibaza ahubwo ko twoshira inguvu zacu mu kugerageza kurondera urwaruka rukiri ruto, rufise amagara meza, kandi rukeneye kuzitanga, runafise amahirwe  yo kuzoba rukiriho,  kugira uwuzoba  yatanze intanga atanguye  kurondera kumenya ivyazo,  azoronke akaryo ko kubonana n'abavutse atwundi afashije''. Mu 1997, umukenyezi yaratsindiye  ububasha bwo gukoresha intanga z'umugabo wiwe yari yitavye Imana. Stephen Blood yanduye ingwara ya mugiga mu kwezi kwa kabiri mu 1995, haheze amezi 2 gusa ashinze urugo rushasha n'umukenyezi wiwe Diane. Yatakaje ubwenge bamaze kumukuramwo intanga ariko atarandikira umukenyezi wiwe ko bozikoresha, mu nyuma ahava yitaba Imana. Bwana Blood yibarutse umuhungu  Joel - hakoreshejwe intanga zari zabitswe ahantu hakanye cane - mu  2002, mu mwaka ukurikira uyo mukenyezi yatsindiye urubanza rw'uko yibarutse umwana n'umugabo bubatse biciye mu mategeko.

headline: Loise arasama, ariko inda ntikura
text: Ubumuga bw'irondoka nk'ubwa Loise, burapfupfahazwa, iyo uwubugaragaza yiyugururiye abaganga. Iyi ni intahe yiwe.

headline: China: Abantu 80 bakora incanco za Corona za magendu bahagaritswe
text: Ubushinwa buvuga ko buriko burarondera abagizi ba nabi bakora "incanco za magendu" za Covid-19, bakora ubwo bugizi bwa nabi kuva mu kwezi kw'icenda, nk'uko bivugwa na CNN. Igipolisi ca Jiangsu, Beijing na Shandong cafashe abantu barenga 80 bafise uruhara mu gukora incanco zirenga 3.000 za magendu za Covid-19, nk'uko bivugwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru ry'ico gihugu, Xinhua. Xinhua ivuga ko ubushikiranganji bw'umutekano mu Bushinwa buvuga ko buriko buragira amatohoza kuri izo ncanco za magendu hamwe n'iyindi miti yo mu gisata co gukinga ingwara. Igipolisi cemeza ko kuva mu kwezi kw'icenda mu 2020, abo bakora izo ncanco za magendu baronse amahera menshi cane, aho bashira umunyu mu rushinge bagaca bazigurisha ku mahera menshi, nk'uko bibandanya bivugwa na Xinhua. Ubushinwa buriko buracandaga abanyagihugu bukoresheje incanco ziva mu bigo bibiri, Sinovac na Sinopharm, incanco z'ico gihugu  kandi zaratanguye gutangwa mu bindi bihugu, harimwo n'igihugu ca Turkia.

headline: G﻿usama inda ata gihe kinini giheze iyindi ikorotse nta ngaruka -icigwa
text: Na  Michelle Roberts Umunyamakuru mu gisata c'amagara Bihushanye n’inama zari zihasanzwe, gusama inda mu mezi makeya inyuma y’inda ikorotse canke ikorowe biboneka ko ata ngaruka mbi vyongera ku muvyeyi no ku mwana, nk’uko bivugwa n’abashakashatsi bihweje abo vyashikiye mu buzima. Ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw’isi (OMS/WHO), rigira inama ko hoca amezi atandatu imbere yo gusama iyindi nda. Aho ni ukugira umugore aronke umwanya wo kuruhuka. Ariko icigwa co muri PLoS Medicine, cagizwe ku nda zasamwe 72.000, cerekana ko abubakanye bashobora kugerageza ata bwoba gusubira kurondera umwana. Ishirahamwe rishigikira abagize ivyago inda zikavamwo, Tommy, rivuga ko abagore bumva biteguriye gusubira kugerageza buno nyene inda igikoroka bobikora mu gihe ata mpamvu yo kwa muganga ibibuza. OMS ivuga ko ubushakashatsi ku gutandukanya imbanyi busanzwe buriko burakorwa kandi ko buzotanga inama nshasha niyo zaboneka. Ubwo bushakashatsi bwo muri Norvège, bwamaze imyaka umunani kuva mu 2008 gushika mu 2016, bwasanze ata budasa bunini buhari ku vyoshika  iyo inda isamwe  imbere y’uko haca amezi atandatu. Ivyatowe biratandukanye n’igikorwa cari cakozwe imbere muri Amerika y’Epfo -hamwe n’ibindi vyigwa – ari vyo OMS  yagendeyeko mu gutanga inama zerekeye gutandukanya imbanyi. Abanditse ico cigwa ca vuba co muri Norvège  bavuga ko inama zitangwa zikwiye gusubirwamwo kugira ngo abubakanye bafate ingingo bafise amakuru nyayo ku vyerekeye ryari bogerageza kurondera umwana. Gusaba abavyeyi kurindira amezi atandatu inyuma y’inda ikorotse canke ikorowe gishobora kuba ikiringo kirekire cane bamwe batorindira, cane cane iyo ata mvo igaragara yo kwa muganga ihari yo kubishigikira, nk’uko babivuga. Basaba ko hoba ibindi vyigwa. Abahinga bavuga ko kuba ufise amagara meza vyongereza amahirwe yo gusama. Abagore bagirirwa inama yo gufata ibinini vya acide folique buri munsi mu gihe bariko baragerageza gusama gushika ku ndwi z’ibiri z’imbanyi. Bigabanya ivyago vyo kuvyara umwana afise ubwonko canke uruti rw’umugongo bitameze neza. Inda zikoroka kare bishikira hafi umwe ku bagore batanu  (ni ukuvuga 20%) mu buzima bwabo. Kenshi nta kibitera kimenyekana. Vyarashitse inda igakoroka, hari amahirwe menshi ko inda ikurikira izogumayo. Ntibikunze gushika ngo inda zikoroke zikurikiranya. Ishirahamwe Tommy  rivuga ko iyo  vyigeze kuba inda igakoroka, birashobora gufasha kubaza umuganga wawe ko hoba hari imvo zo kwa muganga zotuma biba ngombwa ko urindira imbere yo gusubira kugerageza gusama. Ariko n’ingene umuntu avyakira navyo n’ukubishingirako. Bamwe bumva bikenewe ko bofata umwanya wo kwitegura kuvyakira no gutwara iyo nda nshasha. “Hari igihe bikenerwa ko ufata umwanya wo kuririra umwana wabuze imbere y’uko wiyumvira kazoza. "Abandi bibaza ko kugerageza kandi bibafasha kwihanganira ivyabashikiye”, nk’uko Tommy ivuga. . “Ni ingingo umwe umwe afata ku giti ciwe  canke iyo mubanza kwumvikanako n’uwo mwubakanye iyo ahari”.

headline: Malaria imaze guhitana abantu 1800 uno mwaka mu Burundi
text: Malariya imaze guhitana abantu barenga 1800 mu Burundi uno mwaka, igitigiri kingana hafi nico abamaze guhitanwa n'ikiza ca Ebola muri Repubulkika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Kongo, nk'uko bivugwa n'igisata ca ONU kijejwe ubutabazi, OCHA. Mu cegeranyo giherutse, OCHA ivuga ko abantu imiliyoni zitanu n'ibice indwi banduye malariya muri uno mwaka mu Burundi, igitigiri kingana hafi igice c'abanyagihugu bose muri ico gihugu. Muri abo bantu bose, abangana 1801 barahitanywe n'iyo ndwara iterwa n'umubu kuva mu kwezi kwa mbere gushika ku wa 21 z'ukw'indwi. Leta y'Uburundi ntiratangaza niba iyo ndwara ari ikiza, n'aho OCHA yoyo yemeza ko mu kwezi kwa gatanu ibitigiri vyarengeye ibisanzwe bifatirwako kugira indwara ifatwe nk'ikiza. Ikinyamakuru ca OCHA gisohoka ku ndwi ku ndwi ku vyerekeye ubutabazi, kivuga kiti: "Integuro y'igihugu y'uguhangana n'ikiza ca malaria, isanzwe iriko irigwa, irerekana ko hari ikena ry'abakozi, uburyo n'amafaranga". "Abegwa n'iki kibazo bose, harimwo abategetsi b'igihugu n'amashirahamwe, basabwa kwegeranya ibisabwa vyose kugira ngo hatorwe inyishu ikomeye kuri iki kibazo amazi atararenga inkombe". OCHA ivuga ko kubona ata ngingo z'ugukinga zifatwa nk'ugukoresha imisegetera, ihindagurika ry'ibirere hamwe n'uruja n'uruza rw'abantu badakingiwe rwiyongereye, biri mu bituma iyo ndwara yiyongera. Umwe mu bategetsi ba OCHA yabwiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru AFP ko "ingingo y'ugutangaza ikiza ari ingingo yega leta y'Uburundi nk'igihugu cigenga". Mu kwezi kwa gatandatu uno mwaka, OCHA yamenyesheje ko igitigiri c'uburere bw'ubuvuzi aho malariya igenda iba nk'ikiza ciyongereye mu kwezi kwa gatanu, aho cashitse ku burere 33 kuri 46. OCHA ivuga ko malaria yiyongereye ku bice 164 kw'ijana (164%) ku ndwi igira 29 y'umwaka wa 2019 ugereranije n'indwi ya 29 y'umwaka uheze wa 2018. Mu kwezi kwa gatatu kw'umwaka wa 2017, leta yaratangaje malariya nk'ikiza igihe abantu umuliyoni n'ibihumbi 800 bari bamaze kwandura iyo ndwara, abandi nabo 700 irabahitana, ariko ubu ntirafata ingingo nk'iyo.

headline: Covid-19: Amerika imaze gupfisha abasumba abapfiriye muri Vietnam, Iraki na Afghanistani
text: Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika nico gihugu kimaze kubura abantu benshi kw'isi kubera coronavirus, mu gihe abarenga imiliyoni 1.69 banduye, ibice 30% vy'abamaze kwandura. Leta y'ico gihugu yatanguye gutangaza umuntu wa mbere yanduye uwo mugera ku wa 21 z'ukwa mbere mu ntara ya Washington. Kw'isi yose, imiliyoni zirenga 5.6 nibo bamaze kwandura uwo mugera, nayo 354.983 bakaba bamaze kuhasiga ubuzima kuva uwo mugera wadutse mu gisagara ca Wuhan mu Bushinwa mu mpera z'umwaka uheze. Ishure kaminuza John Hopkins, riri muri leta ya Maryland rikaba risanzwe rikurikirana ibijanye n'uwo mugera, ritangaza ko abamaze guhitanwa n'uwo mugera muri Amerika ari 100.276. Ni ukuvuga ko Covid-19 imaze guhitana abantu basumba abasize ubuzima mu ntambara za Korea, Vietnam, Iraki na Afghanistani bafatiwe hamwe bose. Ibitigiri vy'abahitanwa n'uwo mugera muri Amerika bibandanya vyiyongera, kandi abajejwe amagara y'abantu bavuga ko ibiharuro bifise kuba bisumba ibitangazwa. Amatohoza yakozwe n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters avuga ko mu ndwi iheze intara 20 zatangaje ko ibiharuro vy'abandura vyiyongereye. Caroline du Nord, Wisconsin na Arkansas ziri mu ntara zabonye umurindi munini w'abanduye. Ibiharuro vy'abanduye biguma ku rugero runini cane mu bisagara, harimwo Chicago, Los Angeles na Washington DC. Hagati aho, hari intara zimwe zimwe zari zigeramiwe cane ariko ubu abapfa bakaba bagenda bagabanuka, aho harimwo nk'intara ya New York, aho abashika 21.000 bamaze guhitanwa n'uwo mugera. Perezida Donald Trump ashimangira ko iyo ubutegetsi bwiwe budafata ingingo abapfa baba barenga incuro 25 abamaze gupfa, n'aho abamunegura bamwagiriza ko yananiwe no gufata ingingo mu mwanya wo nyawo. Abakuru b'intara baragirizwa ko bananiwe no gufata nka nkama amakuru yagabisha ko uwo mugera ushobora kwiha inkumbi mu bigo vy'abakukuruke. Mu ntango, uyo mukuru w'igihugu wo mu mugambwe w'aba Republika yafashe minenerwe ico kiza, aho yakigereranije n'ibicurane bisanzwe. Mu kwa kabiri, yavuze ko bari bamaze kugitsinda kandi ko gushika mu kwa kane "cashobora kuba camaze kuranduranwa n'imizi". Uko iminsi yagenda niko yagenda ahindura imbono, aho ubwa mbere yavuga ko cashobora guhitana abantu bari hagati ya 50.000 na 60.000, mu nyuma aja kuri 60.000 na 70.000, akaba yabona ko abari gupfa batari gushika 100.000. Mu nyuma rero akaba yahavuye ahindura imvugo, aho muri kuno kwezi yivugiye ko ari "umudari w'iteka" kubona Amerika ifise ibiharuro binini vy'abanduye gusumba ibindi bihugu kw'isi, akavuga ati ni "dufise ubushobozi bwo gupima bukomeye gusumba ibindi bihugu". Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe n'ishure kaminuza Columbia University ry'i New York bwerekana ko uwo mugera wari guhitana abatarenga 36.000 iyo Amerika ifata ingingo hakiri kare. Joe Biden, umunyapolitike wo mu mugambwe w'aba Democrates aboneka ko ari we ashobora guhiganwa na Perezida Trump mu matora yo mu kwa cumi na rimwe aranegura ingene ubutegetsi bwa Trump bwavyifashemwo. Avuga ko iyo hagafatwa ingingo zo guhagarika uwu mugera ko ibintu bitaba bimeze uko bimeze. Gushika ubu, imiliyoni 39 z'abanyamerika baratakaje akazi kabo kubera ico kiza kubera ingingo za guma mu rugo, leta ikaba iriko isaba abarongoye intara ko boreka abantu bagasubira ku bikorwa. Gushika ubu, nta rucanco rwa Covid-19 rurashobora kuboneka, kandi nta n'umuti uremezwa, n'aho hari myinshi iriko irageragezwa.

headline: Coronavirus: Kenya yiketse uwoba yanduye, 106 bamaze gupfa mu Bushinwa
text: Abantu 106 nibo bamaze guhitanwa na wa mugera mushasha wa coronavirus, mu gihe igitigiri c'abandura kigenda congerekana, ubu kikaba kigeze ku barenga 4500. Ico gitigiri kigenda ciyongera mu gihe leta y'Ubushinwa iriko yita ku rutare kugira ngo ituze uwo mugera. Igihugu c'Ubuyapani carungitse indege mu gisagara ca Wuhan hatanguriye iyo ndwara, mu ntumbero yo gutahukana abantu baco. Uyo mugera waratandukiriye n'ibindi bihugu, aho ibishika 15 bimaze kwandukirwa hampande y'Ubushinwa. Mu karere k'ubuseruko bwa Afrika, igihugu ca Kenya kiriko kirakurikiranira hagufi umuntu yiketswe ko yoba yanduye uwo mugera, aho yashikanywe mu bitaro vyitiriwe Kenyatta ku mugwa mukuru Nairobi. Ubushinwa bwafashe ingingo zo kugabanya uruja n'uruza mu bice bibangamiwe harimwo Wuhan, hamwe n'intara ya Hubei. Mu bisagara bitari bike, kwambara udutambara dupfuka umunwa n'amazuru ni itegeko. Umugera wa coronavirus uronona ibihimba vy'ihemero bigatuma umuntu agira ingorane zo guhema, kandi gushika ubu nta muti canke urucanco ruraboneka. Abenshi mu bamaze guhitanwa n'uwo mugera ni abo mu ntara ya Hubei. Mu ntango hakarirwa abatama n'abatamakazi canke abari basanzwe bafise ibibazo vyo guhema, ariko nta makuru menshi arashikirizwa ku biraba abaherutse guhitanwa n'uwo mugera. Coronavirus yifashe gute kw'isi? Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zimaze kugabisha abanyagihugu bazo kwitondera ivy'ingendo zo mu Bushinwa, zinababuza kuja mu ntara ya Hubei. Amerika kandi itegura gukura mu minsi iza abakozi bo mu biro vyayo vy'ubuserukizi mu gisagara ca Wuhan. Eka n'Ubuyapani buriko bufata ingingo nk'izo. Butegura kurungika indege ejo ku wa gatatu gutahukana Abayapani bashika 200, bakazoba bari kumwe n'abaganga bazogenda barabakurikirana. Ubufaransa nabwo nyene butegura gukura abanyagihugu babwo mu ntara ya Wuhan. Ubwongereza ntiburafata ingingo nk'iyo ariko bwasavye abanyagihugu babwo kuva muri ico gisagara mu gihe vyobakundira. Hagati aho, bamwe mu bongereza basanzwe baba mu ntara ya Hubei bafise ishavu kuko bavuga ko batabona ayo bacira n'ayo bamira. Uno munsi, igihugu ca Philippines catangaje ko kigiye kwima impusha zo kwinjira muri ico gihugu (Visa) ingenzi zivuye mu Bushinwa. Ishami rya ONU ryitaho amagara y'abantu OMS, rimenyesha ko abantu bashika 47 baba hanze y'Ubushinwa bamaze kwandura uwo mugera. N'aho ata muntu arahasiga ubuzima, ibihugu vya Thailand, Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Australia, Singapour, Taiwan, Malaysia, Koreya y'Epfo, Ubuyapani, Ubufaransa, Vietnam, Nepal, Canada, Cambogge, Sri Lanka n'Ubudagi biramaze kwandukirwa n'uwo mugera. Amakuru avuga ko umuntu umwe yiketswe ko yoba yanduye uwo mugera yashikanywe mu bitaro vyitiriwe Kenyatta ku mugwa mukuru Nairobi kugira bamukurikirane. Ibinyamakuru vyo muri ico gihugu bitangaza ko uyo muntu, umunyeshure, yiketswe mu gihe yari yururutse indege, ariho yaca ashirwa mu kibanza ca wenyene. Bivugwa ko uyo munya Kenya yari avuye mu gisagara ca Guangzhou mu Bushinwa kandi ko abajejwe amagara y'abantu muri ico gihugu aribo bamwemereye ko ashobora gufata urugendo. Ejo haheze, Kenya yaragabishije abanyagihugu bayo ko bokwirinda ingendo zo mu gisagara ca Wuhan, gushika aho uwo muhera uzotuzwa burundu. Ubushikiranganji bw'imigenderanire y'ico gihugu bumenyesha ko bubandanya buvugana n'abanyagihugu ba Kenya bugaraniwe muri ico gisagara ca Wuhan, arico catanguye kubonekamwo uwo mugera. Mw'itangazo bwasohoye, ubwo bushikiranganji bumenyesha ko abanyagihugu ba Kenya bashika 85 aribo bazwi ko baba muri ico gisagara. Baciye ku rubuga rwa Twitter, basohoye ubutumwa bakoresheje urufunguruzo  #KenyansInWuhan, aho basaba leta ko yokora ibishoboka ikabakura muri ico gisagara.

headline: Madagascar 'iratabaza ngo ifashwe kurwanya coronavirus'
text: Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu wa Madagascar yasavye amashirahamwe akorana n'ico gihugu hamwe n'inzego zijejwe amagara y'abantu ko yofasha ico gihugu kurwanya Covid-19 mu gihe ibiharuro bibandanya biduga. Urubuga rwa Actu Orange ruvuga ruti: " Ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu bwerekanye ko ikiza ca Covid-19 mu ndwi ziheze ciyongereye ku buryo buteye ubwoba muri Madagasikari, aho habonetse abantu benshi bayanduye mu turere tumwe tumwe, cane cane ku mugwa mukuru, Antananarivo". Abarongoye ibitaro bimwe bimwe vyo ku mugwa mukuru wa Madagasikari baragabisha ko barengewe inyuma y'ibiharuro biherutse kuduga ku buryo buteye ubwoba, kandi ko bazokwakira gusa indembe za Covid-19. Kugeza ubu iryo zinga rya Madagascar rifise abantu  hafi 7500 banduye Covid-19 kandi ko hafi 80% muri bo basuzumwe mu kwezi guheze. Perezida Andry Rajoelina mu ntango z'uku kwezi yongeye kwugara umugwa mukuru inyuma y'aho ibiharuro vy'abanduye vyongerekaniye. Mu kwa kane, yatanguje icese "umuti" kama wo kwirinda Covid-19 wakwiragijwe cane mu gihugu, anashimangira ko igihugu kiriko kirarwanya iyi ndwara. Eka hari n'ibihugu bitari bike vya Afrika navyo nyene vyarungikiwe uwo muti, Covid-Organics. Hagati aho, uwo muti kama w'amazi wariyamirijwe n'abahinga mu vyo amagara y'abantu muri Nijeriya na Republika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo, inyuma yo kuwukorako ivyigwa kugira bihweze nimba koko ushobora kuvura Covid-19.

headline: Ukraine: Ingwano ishobora kurangira gute? Inzira zitanu zishoboka
text: Mu gipfungu/gihu  c'intambara, biragoye kubona inzira yo gukomeza. Amakuru yo ku rugamba, iyo abakurukirana imigenderanire umenga ntibakivuga, agahinda k'abababaye n'abateshejwe izabo; ibi vyose birashobora kukurenga. Reka rero dufate akanya gato turabe iyo ingwano yo muri Ukraine iyo ishobora gutera igana. Zimwe mu nzira abanyaporitike n'abategekanya ivya gisirikare bariko baribaza ni izihe? Si benshi bokwemeza ko babona neza iyo ibintu bitera bija , ariko ibi ni bimwe mu bishobora kuba. Vyinshi ntibihumuriza. Kugira bigende uko, Uburusiya busohora inguvu nyinshi za gisirikare. Ibitero vy'ibisasu vya rutura na za roketi bikaraswa ata gutoranya. Inguvu zo mu kirere  z'Uburusiya -gushika ubu ata ruhara rukomeye ziragira - ziragaba ibitero vy'indege bitema bigatongora. Ibitero vy'ikivunga vy'ubuhinga bwa none  bw'ama ordinateurs (cyber attacks),  bitota ibikorwa remezo bikuru bikuru vy'igihugu. Inzira z'inguvu (amatara, ibitoro) n'ugutumatumanako ziracibwa. Abantu benshi barapfa.  N'ubwo bihagararako rugabo, Kyiv irafatwa mu minsi mike. Reta isubirizwa n'ubutegetsi bugendera mu kwaha kwa Moscou. Prezida Zelensky aricwa canke arahunga, aje muri Ukraine yo mu burengero canke mbere hanze y'igihugu, kugira ashinge reta yo mu buhungiro. Prezida Putin aratangaza ko  atsinze ace avanayo ingabo zimwe ariko asigeyo izihagije kugira agume ahagenzura. Abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi baguma bahunga. Ukraine ica ihamvya Belarus mu kuba igikoresho ca Moscou. Ibi ntacobuza ko bishoboka, ariko habanza  guhinduka ibitari bike kugira ntibibe uko: ingabo z'Uburisiya zikora neza gusumba, kugomora izindi ngabo nyinshi, hanyuma agatima kadasanzwe ka Ukraine ko kwigwanira kakayoyoka.  Putin ashobora guhindura ubutegetsi muri Ukraine no guhagarika ko yinjira mu muryango w'ibihugu vy'i Buraya. Ariko  intwaro yose  igendera ku murongo w'Uburusiya  ntiyokwemerwa mu gihugu kandi ishobora guhangana n'ubugumutsi. Bigenze uko nta maragamo yoboneka kandi hokwama  ubwoba ko intambara ishobora gusubira kwaduka umwanya uwari wo wose. Kandi  n'igihe ingabi z'Uburusiya zoshinga imizi mu bisagara vya Ukraine, kumbure vyozigora kuguma zihagenzura. Kumbure Uburisiya bishobora kubugora kuronka ingabo bukwiza muri ico gihugu kinini cane. Ingabo za Ukraine zica zitangura gukora nk'inyeshamba, zifise ishaka kandi zishigikiwe n'abanyagihugu. Ibihugu vya Buraya bibandanya kubaha ibigwanisho n'ivyo bijana. Hanyuma kumbure inyuma y'imyaka myinshi, kumbure n'ubutegetsi bwarahindutse i Moscou ingabo z'Uburusiya amaherezo zive muri Ukraine, zicurikiye kandi zuzuye amaraso, nk'uko imbere yaho zavuye muri Afghanistan inyuma y'imyaka cumi zirwanya intagondwa z'aba Islam. Birashoboka ko iyi ntambara irenga imbibe za Ukraine? Prezida Putin ashobora kurondera kugaruza bimwe mu bice vy'icahoze ari nk'ubwami bw'Uburisiya mu kurungika ingabo mu zahoze ari  ibihugu bigize Ubumwe bw'aba Soviet nka Moldova na Georgia, ubu bitari mu muryango wo kwivunira umwanshi hamwe rwa Otan/Nato. Ariko hashobora kuba n'ukwihenda ibintu bikunyuka. Putin ashobora kuvuga ko ukuba ibihugu vya Buraya biha ibigwanisho ingabo za Ukraine ari igikorwa c'agasotoro gikwiye  ingere ku yindi. Ashobora gukangisha kurungika ingabo mu bihugu vya Baltique- bisanzwe biri muri Otan- nka Lithuania, kugira ace inzira yo ku butaka yo gushika muri  Kaliningrad. Ivyo vyoba bibangamye cane kandi bishobora kuvamwo intambara na Otan. Hagendewe ku ngingo ya 5 y'amasezerano y'uwo muryango, igitero kuri kimwe mu bihugu biwugize, n'igitero kuri vyose. Ariko Putin ashobora  kugerezako agafata iyo nzira mu gihe yobona ko ariyo yonyene  isigaye kugira ikize  ubutegetsi bwiwe. Hamwe yobona, kumbure ko agiye gutsindwa muri Ukraine, ashobora kwunyura ibintu. Ubu turazi ko uwo mutegetsi w'Uburusiya ashaka gusambura uko ibintu bisanzwe bitunganijwe ku rwego mpuzamakungu. Bifatiwe ngaho bishobora no kugenda gutyo ku bigwnaisho vya nucleaire. Muri iyi ndwi, Putin  yatanze itegeko ko ibigwanisho vya nucleaire bishirwa ku rugero rwo hejuru rwo kumera magabo. Abaraba ibintu n'inbindi ntibibaza ko ivyo bisigura ko hagiye kuba ikoreshwa ryavyo canke ko ryimirije. Ariko kwabaye ukwibutsa ko Uburusiya bushobora gukoresha bimwe mu bigwanisho vya nucleaire ku rugamba. Uko ibintu biri kwose, biracashoboka ko haba inyishu iciye muri diplomasi? Umunyamabanga mukuru wa ONU  António Guterres yavuze ati: "Ubu inkoho/imbunda nizo ziriko zirayaga, ariko inzira z'ibiganiro zitegerezwa kuguma zuguruye". Nta nkeka ibiganiro birakomeza. Prezida Macron w'Ubufaransa yaravuganye kuri terefone na Putin. Abajejwe imigenderanire bavuga ko inzira zo kurondera inyishu ziguma zirungikwa i Moscou. Kandi mu biboneka nk'ibitangaje, intumwa za Ukraine n'Uburusiya zarahuye mu biganiro ku rubibe rwa Belarus. Bashobora kuba ata vyinshi bashitseko. Ariko kubona yemeye ko haba ibiganiro, Putin  asa nibura n'uwemera ko bishoboka ko haba uguhagarika intambara kwumvikanyweko. Ikibazo gihambaye n'ukumenya niba ibihugu vy'uburengarazuba bishobora gutanga ico abajejwe imigenderanire bita "off ramp", ijambo abanyamerika bakoresha bashaka kuvuga gusohoka uva mw'ibarabara rikuru (high way canke autoroute). Abakurikirana ivy'imigenderanire bavuga ko bikenewe cane ko umutegetsi w'Uburusiya amenya ico vyosaba kugira ibihano vy'abanyaburaya bivanweho kugirango umwumvikano wo guhuma amaso nibura ushoboke. Turabe bigenze uko. Ingwano igenze nabi ku Burusiya. Ibihano bitanguye gushegesha Moscou. Amajwi y'abadashaka ingwano atanguye kuba menshi mu gihe ibiziga vy'abagwa ku rugamba biguma bitahanwa ku bwinshi. Putin aribaza niba yasemuye bunini kuruta ubwo ashobora kumira. Asanga kubandanya intambara vyobangamira ubutegetsi bwiwe kuruta kwemera ibimaramare vyo kuyihagarika. Ubushinwa burahagurutse mu kwotsa igitutu Uburisiya kugira bwemere umwumvikano bugabisha ko butazogura ibitoro na gaz  vy'Uburusiya budahosheje intambara. Putin aca  atangura kurondera ingene yobisohokamwo. Hagati aho abategetsi ba Ukraine baguma babona ingene igihugu cabo kiriko kirasambura babona ko umwumvikano wa poritike ari mwiza gusumba kuguma bariko baratakaza ubuzima. Gutyo abajejwe imigenderanire baragiye ku kivi , amasezerano arabonetse. Dufate ko Ukraine yemeye ko Uburusiya aribwo buramutswa intara ya Crimee n'ibice vya Donbas. Putin nawe yemeye ubwigenge bwa Ukraine n'uburenganzira bwayo bwo gukomeza ubucuti na Buraya. Ibi bisa n'ibitoba. Ariko ntibisa n'ibiri mu rugero rw'ibitoshoboka  aho intambara yasize umunyota n'urupfu. Ku vyerekeye  Vladimir Putin  nawe ubwiwe. Igihe yatangura igitero, yatangaje ati: " Twiteguriye ibishoboka vyose." None hamwe igishoboka kwoba uko atakaza ubutegetsi? Ariko ubu isi yarahindutse muri iyi minsi ya vuba ku buryo ivyo bintu ubu bishobora kwibazwa. Professor Sir Lawrence Freedman, umwigisha w'iteka  ku bijanye n'ingwano kuri kaminza ya  Kings College, London, muri iyi ndwi yanditse ati:  "Ubu bishoboka ko ubutegetsi buhinduka i Moscou co kimwe nk'uko bishoboka i Kyiv." Kubera iki ashobora kuvuga ivyo? Kumbure Putin ariko aragwana ingwano y'akaga. Abasirikare ibihumbi vy'abarusiya barapfa. Ibihano vy'ubutunzi biraryana. Putin aratakaza ugushigikirwa n'abanyagihugu.  Kumbure igihugu gishobora guhagaruka kigakora impinduka (revolution). Putin arakoresha ingabo z'igihugu mu kuzimaganya abateye kubiri n'imigambi yiwe. Ariko ivyo bihindukiye nabi ku buryo  abatari bake mu  ngabo z'Uburisiya, abaza imbere mu butunzi n'uburongozi bamuhindutse.
