Abategetsi ba Buraya bafatiye ngaho bati hamwe Putin yohava hanyuma hakaza umutegetsi yoroheje  kuruta, ibihano vy'ubutunzi vyohava hanyuma imigenderanire igasubira kuba uko yahora. Harabaye itembagazwa ry'ubutetsi risheshe amaraso Putin akaba arahavuye. N'ubu nyene. Ibi bisa n'ibitoshika  muri iki gihe. Ariko ntawovyigizayo burundu mu gihe abakuye inyungu mu butegetsi bwa Putin botangura kubona ko atagishoboye guzkingira. Muri izi nzira zose zishoboka, imwe ntituma iyindi itoba - zimwe zishobora gukorera rimwe kugira zitange inzira itandukanye. Ariko uko iyi ntambara izorangira kwose, isi yahindutse. Ibintu ntibizosubira kumera uko vyari bisanzwe bimeze. Imigenderanire y'Uburusiya n'ibindi bice vy'isi izoba iyindi. Ingene ibihugu vya Buraya bitegekanya umutekano bizosubirwamwo. Hagati aho amakungu azoba yongeye gusubira kubona ico indinganizo mpuzamakungu  y'isi ishingiye ku mwidegemvyo  n'amategeko yari ibereyeho.

headline: Ukraine: Ivyaha 21.000 vyo mu ntambara biriko bigirwako amatohoza - Umushikirizamanza
text: Ukraine ivuga ko iriko iragira amatohoza ku vyaha bishobora kuba ari ivyo mu ntambara n'ivyo kuvogerwa vyakozwe n'Uburusiya kuva ico gihugu gitewe. Umushikirizamanza mukuru Iryna Venediktova yabwiye BBC ko yaronse ivyegeranyo biri hagati y'ivyaha vyo mu ntambara 200 na 300 ku musi umwe. Aremeza ko nyinshi muri izo manza zishobora kuzocibwa abagirizwa batahari, ariko amenyesha ko ari "ikibazo c'ubutungane" kubandanya guca izo manza. Uburusiya bwateye Ukraine itariki 24 z'ukwezi kwa kabisi. Burahakana ivyaha vyose vyo mu ntambara bwagirizwa. Avugana na BBC, Venediktova yagabishije abasirikare b'Uburusiya bishe, bagasinzikariza ubuzima abantu canke bagafata ku nguvu abasivile ko "bategerezwa kumenya ko ari ikibazo c'umwanya gusa kugira bose bashikirizwe ubutungane". Yavuze ko n'aho umugwi arongoye uriko urakorera mu turere twose muri Ukraine, utashoboye kugira amatohoza ku vyaha vyose "neza kandi ata nzitizi" kubera kudashobora gushikira abantu bamwe bamwe n'uturere. Aha bigaragara ko yashaka kuvuga uturere twigaruriwe n'ingabo z'Uburusiya. Mu kwezi kwa gatanu, Venediktova yavuze ko abantu bakekwako ivyaha 600 bamaze kumenyekana kandi ko imanza 80 zimaze gutangura. Umusirikare wa mbere w'Umurusiya yaciriwe urubanza muri Ukraine ni Sgt Vadim Shishimarin, yaciriwe urubanza rwo gupfungwa ubuzima bwiwe bwose yagirizwa kwica umusivile mu kwezi kwa gatanu. Ukraine ivuga ko imaze gutahura ibindi bibanza vyatawemwo abantu ikivunga i Bucha, Borodyanka hamwe no mu bindi bisagara vyegereye umugwa mukuru Kyiv hari higaruriwe n'ingabo z'Uburusiya umwanya muto. Sentare mpuzamakungu mpanavyaha yavuze ko Ukraine ari "ikibanza c'ubwicanyi", inarungikayo igitigiri kinini c'abafasha mu matohoza kitari bwaboneke muri ico gihugu, gufasha. Uburusiya bwagumye buhakana ko budatera abasivile. Ku rubuga rw'intambara, abasirikare ba Ukraine bavuga ko ingabo z'Uburusiya ziriko zirategura ibitero ku karere ko mu buseruko ka Donetsk, mu gutera ibibombe ku bisagara vyinshi. Uburusiya bwarigaruriye akarere ka Luhansk nka kose mu mpera z'indwi iheze, nk'imwe ntumbero yo kugerageza kwigarurira akarere ka Donbas kose. Mu nkuru zishasha, igisirikare ca Ukraine kivuga ko ingabo zaco ziriko ziraterwa cane ariko ko gushika ubu bashoboye kuzihagarika. Ababa i Slovyansk, igisagara nkenerwa kiri mu minwe ya Ukraine, basabwe kukivamwo bahungire mu burengero - umusi umwe inyuma y'igitero c'Uburusiya kw'isoko cahitanye abantu benshi. Hagati aho, prezida wa Ukriane Volodymyr Zelensky, yavuze ati "ibigwanisho birasa kure vya bagenzi bacu b'i Buraya vyatanguye gukora n'inguvu, igitigiri c'abaduteye bahasiga ubuzima kizokwiyongera".

headline: Ukraine: Mbega Putin ashaka iki, ubwo Russia izoteba ihagarika intambara?
text: Igihe Vladimir Putin ata Ubulaya mu ntambara mu kugomorera ingabo ku gihugu c'imiriyoni 44 z'abantu, insiguro yatanga kwari uko Ukraine ya none yegamiye ku bihugu vyo mu burengero yari akaga kandi ko Uburusiya butari kwumva ko "butekaniwe, butera imbere canke ngo kubandanya bubaho". Ariko inyuma y'amayinga amaze acucagira amabombe kuri iki gihugu, ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bamaze kuhasiga ubuzima amamiriyoni nabo bagata bagahunga, hari ikibazo kibandanya cibazwa: intumbero y'intambara yiwe ni iyihe, hari umuti ushoboka? Intumbero yari afise igihe Uburusiya butangura intambara zisa n'izapfuye uko intambara yagiye igenda mu gihe yayitanguje yibaza ko yari kuyitsinda mu kanya isase. Nta n'uko yavuga ko cari igitero canke intambara, agashima kwivugira ko ari "ibikorwa bidasanzwe vya gisirikare". Ariko ikiboneka ni uko abona iki gihe nk'ikidasanzwe mu mateka y'Uburusiya. "Kazoza k'Uburusiya n'ikibanza cabwo kw'isi muri kazoza biri mu kibazo", nk'uko bivugwa n'umukuru w'igisata kijejwe igendereza ryo hanze, Sergei Naryshkin. Mu ntango, umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburusiya yari afise intego yo kwigarurira Ukraine agatembagaza reta, mu ntumbero yo kurangiza burundu icipfuzo cayo co kwinjira mw'ishirahamwe ryo kurwaniriza umwansi hamwe rihuza ibihugu vyo mu Burengero, OTAN/NATO. Yabwiye abanyagihugu b'Uburusiya ko intumbero yiwe ari "ugusambura igisirikare no gukuraho ubutegetsi bw'iki Nazi muri Ukraine", gukingira abanyagihugu ico yita imyaka umunani y'agatotezo n'ihonyabwoko bakorerwa na reta ya Ukraine. Ashimangira ati: "Intumbero yacu si ukwigarurira ubutaka bwa Ukraine. Nta ntumbero dufise yo gushiraho ikintu ico ari co cose canke umuntu uwo ari we wese ku nguvu". Ariko nta ba Nazi bariyo, nta n'ihonyabwoko ryariyo, kandi Uburusiya buriko bukoresha inguvu z'ubunyamaswa mu gutera ibisagara bitari bike, mu gihe abanya Ukraine bishize hamwe mu kwiyamiriza abashaka kwigarurira igihugu cabo. Ibibombe bibandanya bicucagirwa - ariko amakuru ya nyuma ava mu twigoro tw'ibiganiro avuga ko Uburusiya butakirondera gusenyura ubutegetsi, ko ahubwo burondera Ukraine itagira aho yegamiye. Kuva Ukraine ironse intahe y'ukwikukira mu 1991, igihe icahoze ari Ubumwe bw'aba Soviet gisambukiye, yagiye ishaka kwishira ku ruhande rw'Uburengero - mw'ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya hamwe no muri OTAN. Perezida Putin ashaka guhindura ivyo, akabona ko isambuka rya Reta Zunze Ubumwe z'aba Soviet ari "isenyuka ry'Uburusiya". Avuga ko Abarusiya n'abanya Ukraine ari bamwe. Mu kwaka Ukraine akahise kayo, yavuze ati: "Ukraine ntiyigeze iba igihugu nyaco kuva muri kahise". Mu 2013 yasavye ashimitse Perezida Viktor Yanukovych yari yegamiye ku ruhande rw'Uburusiya kudatera igikumu ku masezerano n'ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya, ivyatumye haduka imyiyerekano yasenyuye ubu butegetsi bwa Ukraine muri Ruhuhuma (ukwa kabiri) 2014. Uburusiya bwaciye bwihora mu 2014 mu kwigarurira intara ya Crimée/Crimea iri mu bumanuko bwa Ukraine buca bufata mu mugongo inyeshamba zo mu buseruko zishaka kwiyonkora kuri Ukraine zikaba zimaze imyaka umunani zirwana n'igisirikare ca Ukraine mu ntambara imaze guhitana abantu 14.000. Harabaye agahengwe, haba n'amasezerano ya Minsk mu 2015 atigeze ashirwa mu ngiro. Hasigaye imisi mike ngo igitero gitangure, Perezida Putin yarasambuye aya masezerano y'amahoro mu kwemeza ukwikukira kw'intara zibiri za Ukraine zishigikiywe n'Uburusiya. Igihe agomora ingabo, yagirije OTAN ko igeramiye "kazoza kacu nk'igihugu", avuga, ariko ata vyemezo, ko ibihugu vya OTAN vyashaka guteza intambara muri Crimée. Umuhanuzi w'umukuru w'igihugu ca Ukraine Mykhailo Podolyak arizeye ko agahengwe gashobora gutangura mu misi iza kubera ingabo z'Uburusiya zazibiriwe ku birindiro zisanzwe ziriko. Impande zompi ziremeza ko hari intambwe mu biganiro, Podolyak na we akavuga ko umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburusiya yoroheje ivyo asaba. Igihe intambara itangura, Perezida Putin yashaka ko Ukraine yemeza ko Crimée ari akarere k'Uburusiya yongere kandi yemere ukwikukira kw'intara zo mu buseruko zishaka kwiyonkora. Ukraine yotegerezwa guhindura ibwirizwashingoro ryayo kugira ngo yerekane ko itazohava yinjira mw'ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya no muri OTAN. Ikibazo ca kazoza ka Crimée n'intara za Luhansk na Donetsk zishigikiwe n'Uburusiya nk'ibihugu vyigenga nticimirije gutorerwa umuti, ariko ntikizobuza ko haba umwumvikano mu gihe impande zompi zokwemera gutorera umuti iki kibazo mu nyuma. Uburusiya busa n'ubwemeye ko butazotembagaza ubutegetsi bwa Ukraine kugira bubusubirize na reta bwogenzura, nk'uko bimeze muri Biélorussie/Belarus. Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky avuga ko igihe intambara yaduka yari yamaze kugabisha ko "umwansi yari yamfashe nka nomero ya mbere mu baronderwa; umuryano wanje ukaza ubwa kabiri". Tatiana Stanovaya wo mu kigo RPolitik gikora umwihwezo hamwe no mu kigo Carnegie Moscou avuga ati: "Bisa n'uko [Putin] azotegerezwa kugabanya ivyo asaba". Ni kubera  Uburusiya bushaka guhindura Ukraine "igihugu kidafise aho cegamiye" bukoresheje inguvu za gisirikare, bukayihindura nka Autriche cyangwa Suède, ariko vyompi bikaba biri mw'ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya. Autriche ntaho yegamiye, ariko Suède si gutyo bimeze. Mu vy'ukuri ntifise umurongo yafashe ariko ikorana imyimenyerezo ya gisirikare na OTAN. Ibisabwa na Ukraine biratomoye, nk'uko bivugwa n'umuhanuzi w'umukuru w'igihugu: guhagarika intambara ingabo z'Uburusiya zikavanwa mu gihugu, ariko kandi iripfuza ivyemezo ko izoshobora gutabarwa n'ihuriro ry'ibihugu bishize hamwe ryobuza ko haba ibitero kandi "rikagira uruhara riri ku ruhande rwa Ukraine". Marc Weller, umwigisha w'amategeko mpuzamakungu akaba yahoze ari n'umuhinga mu vyo ibiganiro avuga ko uretse ko Ukraine isaba ko ingabo z'Uburusiya zivanwa mu gihugu zigasubizwa ku birindiro zariko imbere y'intambara, iki coba kandi umurongo utukura ku bihugu vyo mu Burengero, bititeguye kwemera iyindi ntambara yokwegwa n'Uburusiya. Ukraine nayo nyene yariyoroheje kuva igitero c'Uburusiya gitanguye, aho Perezida Zelensky avuga ko abanya Ukraine ubu batahura ko OTAN idashobora kubakira mw'ishirahamwe. "Uko ni ukuri kandi dutegerezwa kukwemera". Podolyak  yabwiye ikinyamakuru ca Amerika PBS ati: "Turiko turakorera ku nzandiko abakuru b'ibihugu bashobora kuganirako hanyuma bakaziterako igikumu. Biraboneka ko ibi bigiye kuba mu misi mike iri imbere kuko niyo nzira yonyene yo kurangiza iyi ntambara". Ahubwo umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburusiya yongereje urwanko afitiye ibihugu vy'Uburengero n'ishirahamwe ryavyo ryo kwivunira umwansi hamwe rihurikiyemwo ibihugu 30. Ashobora kuba ariko arondera umwumvikano na Ukraine, ariko kuri we Uburengero bufise intumbero imwe rudende - gucamwo ibice Uburusiya impera n'imperuka buyisambure. Imbere y'iyi ntambara, yasavye ko OTAN isubira ku masezerano yo mu 1997 kandi igahagarika ingendo yayo yo kwiyagurira akarere itera ija mu buseruko, yongere ikure ingabo zayo n'ibikoresho vya gisirikare mu bihugu vyinjiye muri iryo shiramahwe kuva mu 1997, yongere kandi ihagarike ibikorwa vyo kurungika "ibirwaniho hafi y'imbibe z'Uburusiya". Aha ni ukuvuga mu Bulaya bwo hagati, Ubulaya bw'Ubuseruko no mu bihugu vyo ku kiyaga Baltique (pays baltes/Baltic states). Mu maso ya Putin, ibihugu vy'Uburengero vyaremeye mu 1990 ko OTAN itazokwiyagurira "n'isantimetero imwe amaja mu buseruko", ariko vyarangiye ibikoze. Ariko, ibi vyari imbere y'isenyuka rya Reta Zunze Ubumwe z'aba Soviet (URSS/USSR), ivyo yari yiyemeje ku butegetsi bw'umukuru w'igihugu w'umu Soviet Mikhail Gorbachev vyari vyerekeye gusa Ubudagi bw'Ubuseruko mu gihe igihugu c'Ubudagi cariko kirondera gusubirana kikaba igihugu kimwe. Mu nyuma Gorbachev yavuze ko "ivyo kwiyagurira akarere vya OTAN bitigeze biganirwako" ico gihe. Rero bamaze kubona ingene Putin afise ishaka ryo gusambura ibisagara vya Bulaya kugira ashike ku ntego yiwe, abategetsi b'ibihugu vy'Uburengero ntibihenda. Umukuru wa reta y'Ubudagi Olaf Scholz yemeza ko umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburusiya "ashaka kwigarurira Ubulaya mu mbono ziwe z'ukungene isi ikwiye kumera" mbere na Perezida Joe Biden yamwise inkozi y'ikibi. Scholz na mugenziwe w'Ubufaransa Emmanuel Macron bompi bavuga ko uyu mugabane uri mu bihe bikomeye kuva muri kahise kawo. Imbere y'intambara, Uburusiya bwasavye ko ibirwanisho ruhonyanganda vy'ubumara vyose vya Amerika bitorengana imbibe z'ibihugu bisanzwe birimwo. Amerika yaremeye gutangura ibiganiro vyo kugabanya misire zirasa hafi no ku ntera yo hagati, hamwe kandi no ku masezerano mashasha yo kugabanya misire zambukiranya imigabane n'imigabane, ariko hari amahirwe make ko ibi bishoboka muri kino gihe. Tatiana Stanovaya aratinya ko bishobora kwinjira mu yindi ntambara nshasha y'ukwikekana (guerre froide/Cold War): "Ndabona neza ko ari ngombwa ko twitegurira akaga gashasha kazoba gashingiye ku nguvu za gisirikare kandi kabi cane mu buryo tutari bwigere twiyumvira". Perezida Putin yarumiwe abonye ingene Uburengero bwamusubirije mu ndumane ku gitero ciwe. Yari azi ko ibihugu vya OTAN bitari guhirahira ngo bihonyoze ikirenge ku butaka bwa Ukraine, ariko kandi ntiyibaza ko yashobora gufatirwa ibihano ku rugero nk'uru bimaze no kugira ingaruka zikomeye ku butunzi bw'Uburusiya - ubu akaba arakaye. Ubumwe bwa Bulaya, Amerika, Ubwongereza na Canada vyariziziye ubutunzi bw'Uburusiya mu buryo bwinshi butandukanye: Nta masezerano na Ukraine ashobora gukuraho ibi bihano, kandi Vladimir Putin arabizi. Ahubwo yahindukiriye Abarusiya barwanya iyi ntambara. Abantu bababa 1500 bari mu myiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza iyi ntambara baramaze gupfungwa kandi n'ibinyamakuru vyose vyigenga vyategetswe kutagira ico bivuze. Nta batavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bakomeye bagisigaye kuko barahunze igihugu, abandi nabo, dufashe nk'akarorero Alexei Navalny, barapfunzwe. Perezida Putin ati: "Abanyagihugu b'Uburusiya bazokwama bashobora gutandukanya abakunda igihugu nyabo, n'imicafu be n'ibihemu".

headline: ‘Igihugu gikomeye gitegerezwa kugira igisirikare gikomeye’ – ivyo Xi Jinping yize kw'isenyuka rya URSS
text: Hari ikintu kidasanze mu mateka y’Ubushinwa caraye kibaye ejo ku wa Mungu: ikoraniro kaminuza ry’Umugambwe w‘Abakomunista (Congress of the Communist Party (CCP)  rigira 20, iri rikaba risanzwe riba uko imyaka itanu irangiye mu ntumbero yo kwemeza uwurongora iki gihugu rutura co ku mugabane wa Aziya, ryaraye rihaye umukuru w’igihugu ahari ubu, Xi Jinping, ikiringo kigira gatatu yikurikiranya, ibitari bwigere bibaho. Iyi ngingo, yiyongereye kw’ihindurwa ry’ibwirizwashingiro  mu 2018 ryakuyeho ingingo yategeka ko ata mukuru w’igihugu ashobora kurenza ibiringo bibiri, igiye kwongerereza inguvu Xi mu kugenzura Ubushinwa, mu kumugira, nk’uko abenshi mu bihweza ibintu n’ibindi babivuga, umukuru w’igihugu wa mbere akomeye kuva ku washinze Repubulika y’Ubushinwa, Mao Zedong. Kimwe mu vyo Xi yemereye abanyagihugu igihe atorwa mu buryo butari bwitezwe kuba umunyamabanga mukuru ni uko CCP itazobona amahano nk’ayo Umugambwe w’Abakomunista w’Ubumwe bw’Abasoviyeti (URSS/USSR) wasenyutse mu 1991. Isenyuka rya URSS – gushika ico gihe yafatirwako akarorero n’Ubushinwa – ryateje ibibazo abategetsi benshi b’Ubushinwa, ariko nta bavyitayeho nk’uko Xi avyitayeho. Joseph Torigian, umwigisha kw’ishure kaminuza  School of International Service of China, yabwiye BBC Mundo ati: “Xi Jinping yavutse mu 1953 kandi ico gihe inyigisho ngenderwako yakoreshwa cane mu Bushinwa yari: 'Reta Zunze Ubumwe z'Abasoviyeti uyu munsi ni Ubushinwa bw'ejo'.” Uyu mwigisha wa kaminuza akongera akaba n’umuhinga muri poritike z’Uburusiya n’iz’Ubushinwa avuga kandi ati:  “Rimwe mu majambo ya mbere kandi akomeye ya Xi yashikirije igihe ashika ku butegetsi ryari ryerekeye isenyuka ry’Ubumwe bw’Abasoviyeti”. Xi yaryise ko ari “imburi”. Muri ino nkuru tugiye kurabira hamwe ibintu bitatu nyamukuru Xi yigiye kw’isenyuka ry’Abasoviyeti n’ingene vyamufashije kuguma arongoye CCP igihe kirekire kuva kuri Mao. Mw’ijambo Xi yashikirije abarongoye  CCP  – ijambo ryabacorotse kandi ryakunzwe gusubirwamwo – yavuze ko isenyuka rya URSS ryatumwe n’itituka ry’indero (discipline) mu mugambwe, n’uko ata muntu yari ajejwe akarangamutima k’umugambwe. “Kubera iki Ubumwe bw’Abasoviyeti bwasenyutse? Kubera iki Umugambwe w’Abakomunista w’Abasoviyeti wasenyutse?” bivugwa ko ari vyo yama abaza bagenziwe. “Imvo nyamukuru ni uko ivyiyumviro n’akarangamutima kayo vyatitutse”. Hagati aho, nk’uko abivuga, igihe uwari arongoye igihugu ico gihe, Mikhail Gorbachev,  afatiye ingingo yo kuzana impinduka zavuyemwo isenyuka ry’ubutegetsi bw’Abasoviyeti, nta n’umwe yamwiyamirije. Xi yasubiwemwo avuga ati: "Amaherezo ya vyose, ryabaye ijambo rituje rya Gorbachev avuga ko Umugambwe w’Abakomunista b’Abasoviyeti usambutse, umugambwe rutura urazimangana”. Mu majambo yo kunegura, avuga ati: "Impera ya vyose, harabuze umugabo nya mugabo. Nta n’umwe yubahutse guhagarara bwuma”. Ku wa 01 Mukakaro (7)  2021, mw’ijambo yashikirije mu birori vyo guhimbaza imyaka 100 y’umugambwe CCP, Xi – yari asanzwe atavugira ku mugaragaro kenshi mu myaka cumi amaze ku butegetsi – yashimangiye akamaro k’umugambwe. Ati: “Umugambwe ni rwo ruti rw’umugono rw’Ubushinwa. Iterambere ry’Ubushinwa rishingiye ku mugambwe”. Umunyamakuru w’Ubuyapani Katsuji Nakazawa yandika mu kinyamakuru gikomeye co muri Aziya Nikkei Aziya, yavuze ko “gushiraho ubutegetsi bw’umugambwe umwe - uburyo bwiwe bwo gukingira Ubushinwa ivyashikiye Ubumwe bw’Abasoviyeti – niyo poritike yonyene Xi agenderako kandi yahagarariye ku butegesi bwiwe”. Imwe mu ngingo za mbere Xi yafashe ashikiriye ubutegetsi yabaye gushinga “imirwi mito mito” itari mike muri komite nkuru y’umugambwe, ari nayo yavuyemwo inzego nkuru  zifata imigambi mikuru y'igihugu. Xi we nyene ubwiwe ni we yarongoye iyi mirwi.  Yafashe ubutegetsi bwose mu minwe hanyuma agabanya ubushobozi bw’Inama nkuru y’igihugu (State Council/ Conseil des affaires de l'État), inama nshikiranganji irongowe na Li Keqiang, umukeba wa Xi muri poritike. Inkurikizi y’ibi, na poritike y’ubutunzi yari isanzwe irongowe n’umushikiranganji wa mbere buhoro buhoro yahavuye ayigarurira. Ikindi mu mayeri yakoresheje kuva mu ntango mu ntumbero yo gutsimbataza umugambwe kugira ngo ntusambuke, kwabaye ugutanguza amasekeza akomeye yo gutuza ibiturire. Mw’ijambo ryiwe ryo kwugurura ikoraniro rigira 20 rya CCP ku wa Mungu uheze, yemereye abari aho ko reta yiwe “yakuyeho inzitizi zikomeye zari zinyegeje mu mugambwe”, kubera poritike yiwe. Hagati aho, abenshi mu bihweza ibintu n’ibindi babona ko aya masekeza yabaye ugukura imitego yari kumuzibira mu gutsimbataza ubutegetsi bwiwe, akuraho abashobora kumubera abakeba. Ibihumbi amajana n’amajana y’abategetsi b’umugambwe w’Abakomunista baragirijwe kurya ibiturire, ibi bica bituma Xi atanguza impinduka mu mugambwe, aho nyene ariko aba kibirengeye muri CCP. Carl Minzner, umwanditsi w’igitabo “End of an Era: How China’s Authoritarian Revival Is Undermining Its Rise,” aherutse kubwira ikinyamakuru New York Times, ati: “Inguvu zose Xi – mu kugenzura gusumba amarangamutima, kwemeza ko umugambwe wiganje mu gihugu cose, be no gusubiza Pekin/Beijing mu butegetsi bw’umuntu umwe – zifise intumbero yo gukingira Ubushinwa kugira ngo ntibuhave bugwa mu mutego nk’uwo [Ubumwe bw’Abasoviyeti] bwaguyemwo”. Minzner, umunywanyi w’ikigo c’abahinga ca Amerika,  American Council on Foreign Relations, abona ko iki ari igihushane, kuko, mu gihe anegura Abakomunista b’Abasoviyeti baretse Gorbachev agafata ingingo wenyene kw’isenyuka rya URSS, ukwigungirako ubutegetsi bwose n’ukwigira ikimana, ibi bikibutsa ubutegetsi bwa Mao, biriko bijana hamwe. Ati: “Igitangaje ni uko inzira Xi yahisemwo ishobora gusubiza Ubushinwa mu buryo ntasubira inyuma mu bihe vya kera vy’ubutegetsi canke ikabushira mu bihe Uburusiya burimwo iki gihe, aho intwaro yose igendera kw’ishaka ry’umuntu umwe rudende”. Ikindi cigwa gikomeye umukuru w’igihugu c’Ubushinwa yakuye mw’isenyuka ry’Umugambwe w’Abakomunista b’Abasoviyeti ni akamaro ko kugira igisirikare gikomeye kandi kikuyoboka. Torigian  ati: “Xi abona ko ari ikintu ngirakamaro ko umugambwe ugenzura igisirikare, kugira ngo iyo hadutse akaguma, nka kamwe ko mu 1989 ku kibanza ca Tiananmen Square, gishobore kukazimya gikoresheje inguvu”. Nk’uko uyu muhinga abivuga, kurya abona ko gukomeza umugambwe ari ukuwufata mu minwe, niko yakoze no mu gisirikare rutura, kizwi nka People’s Liberation Army (PLA) c’Ubushinwa. Ati: “N’aho ata bubasha kama afise kuri PLA, nk’uko vyari bimeze kuri Mao Zedong na Deng Xiaoping, bazwi ko bari abategetsi bakomeye mu gihe c’impinduka (revolution), mu kiringo c’imyaka itari mike,  Xi Jinping yaritayeho kugiriranira ubucuti n’igisirikare , aduza abantu bari bamwegereye, hamwe rero n’abajejwe akarangamutima bama bibutsa igisirikare ko ari we mutegetsi mukuru”. Nk’uko Torigian abivuga,  “Xi yifata ko ari we buraro n’uburamuko mu bijanye n’umutekano w’igihugu kandi ko akeneye kugenzura igisirikare mu gihe hokwaduka ikintu kigeramiye ubutegetsi, caba ikiva hagati canke hanze y’igihugu”. Mu vy’ukuri, ni we agenzura “inyabutatu ya gikomunista”  - Umugambwe, Reta, n’Ingabo -  ari co gituma abenshi mu bihweza ibintu n’ibindi bafata Xi nk’umukuru w’igihugu wa mbere akomeye kuva kuri Mao. Xi ntiyifatiye mu minwe PLA  gusa, yarayikomeje, mu kwongereza amafaranga ikoresha, mu gushinga uturere twa gisirikare, mu kwongereza imyimenyerezo ya gisirikare mu ntumbero yo kwitegurira intambara yokwaduka, hamwe no kwagura ububiko bw’ibirwanisho vya nikleyeri, ikintu giteye impungenge Uburengero, nk’uko Torigian  abivuga. Ibi vyose birajanye n’ikindi kimwe kiri mu ngingo ngenderwako yigiye kw’isenyuka ry’Abasoviyeti: “Igihugu gikomeye gitegerezwa kugira igisirikare gikomeye, kuko ni ubu buryo bwonyene gishobora gukingira ubutaka bwaco”, nk’uko yabivuze mw’ijambo ryiwe mu birori vyo guhimbaza imyaka 100 y’umugambwe CCP. Ku wa Mungu uheze, yarashimangiye ubu butumwa, mu kuvuga ko intumbero y’umugambwe ari “ukwubaka igisirikare gikomeye muri kino gihe gishasha”. Nk’uko abahinga babivuga, Xi yagarutse kw’ijambo “umutekano” incuro zirenga 70 mw’ijambo ryiwe, harimwo kandi no kugabisha Taiwan, igihugu Ubushinwa bufata ko ari ubutaka bwabwo. Xi kandi yarigiye mu ngorane z’Abasoviyeti ko ategerezwa kugenzura poritike n’akarangamutima vy’umugambwe n’igisirikare. Abonye ingene igihugu cari kinini gusumba ibindi vyose kw’isi ico gihe gisambaguritse, inyuma y’isenyuka ry’umugambwe w’Abakomunista, kigacikamwo ibihugu vyinshi bishasha, yarabonye ko kugira ngo Ubushinwa bugume mu bumwe, yategerezwa gutuza abantu bose batavuga rumwe, baba abo hagati mu gihugu canke hanze. Nico gituma adahesha, atari kuri  Taiwan giusa - "Gusubiza hamwe igihugu cacu ni ngombwa kandi bitegerezwa gukorwa”, nk’uko yagabishije ku wa Mungu – canke kuri Hong Kong, ubutaka bwasubijwe Ubushiwa mu 1997 ariko Pekin igashinga itegeko rijanye n’umutekano w’igihugu mu ntumbero yo gutuza imyiyerekano y’abarondera intwaro rusangi. Ubushinwa kandi burarwanya abanyagihugu bo mu bwoko bw’aba Uyghur  hagati mu gihugu, mu kwugaranira ibihumbi n’ibihumbi vy’aba banyagihugu b’aba-Islam mu bibanza bapfungiwemwo mu ntara ya Xinjiang, itoteza, nk’uko icegeranyo c’ishirahamwe ONU kibivuga, “rishobora kuba ivyaha mpuzamakungu, cane cane ivyaha bikorewe kiremwa muntu”. Yarakomeje kandi igenzura ry’igisata c’abikorera utwabo mu myaka iheze, aho yibanze cane cane ku buhinga n’igisata c’indero kiri mu minwe y’abigenga. Nk’uko abamunegura babivuga, ikiza ca coronavirus hamwe na poritike ya “covid-zero” vyahaye icitwazo Xi na CCP co kwugarana Ubushinwa kw’isi, atari mu ntumbero yo kuzibira umugera gusa, ariko kandi n’abanyamahanga bashobora guhungabanya ubutumwa bwa gikomunista. Hagati aho, gushinga ikizwi nka " Great Chinese Firewall " – ubuhinga bw’ico gihugu bwo kugenzura ikirere nyabwonko (cyberspace) no kuzibira imbuga ngurukanabumenyi z’Uburengero, harimwo, Facebook, Google, Twitter na Wikipedia – bwatumye uyu mukuru w’igihugu c’Ubushinwa agenzura ihanahana ry’amakuru, kuva ku makuru acishwa mu binyamakuru vyari bimenyerewe gushika no ku makuru acishwa ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi. Ibi bizorondera kuzibira glasnost ntihave ishika mu Bushinwa, iyi ikaba ari potirike ya Gorbachev yo kwugurura imiryango yatumye igenzura ry’amakuru ryakorwa n’Abasivoyeti rihagarara, maze abanyagihugu benshi batangura kubaza ibibazo abategetsi.

headline: Misire ICBM ya Korea ya Ruguru yari ifise ubushobozi bwo gushika muri Amerika
text: Na Jean Mackenzie U﻿munyamakuru i Seoul Korea ya Ruguru yarashe igisasu cambukiranya imigabane (missile ballistique intercontinental/intercontinental ballistic missile, ICBM), ifise ubushobozi bwo gushika ku butaka bwa Amerika, nk’uko bivugwa n’umushikiranganji w’Ubuyapani ajejwe kwivuna abansi. Igisata c’Ubuyapani kijejwe gucungera inkengera kivuga ko ico gisasu ca misire gishobora kuba caguye mu nyanja ku birometero vyababa 210 mu burengero bw'izinga Hokkaido. Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ziriyamiriza iraswa ry’iki gisasu, mu gihe Korea y’Epfo yategetse ko hafatwa ingingo ruhasha zo kwihaniza Korea ya Ruguru. Ejo ku wa kane, umushikiranganji wa Korea ya Ruguru ajejwe imigenderanire Choe Son Hui yaragabishije ko bazokwihora “bikomeye” ku migambi ya Amerika yo kurondera gushinga imizi muri ako karere. Uwo musi nyene Korea yarekuye igisasu ca misire kiraswa ku ntera ngufi. Ibi bibaye inyuma y’inama yo ku wa Mungu hagati ya Perezida Joe Biden wa Amerika, Yoon Suk-yeol wa Korea y’Epfo hamwe n’umushikiranganji wa mbere w’Ubuyapani Fumio Kishida aho bari mu nama muri Cambodge. Umuvugizi w'inama nkuru ya Amerika ijejwe umutekano Adrienne Watson avuga ko Biden yabimenyeshejwe kandi ko Amerika izovugana n'ibihugu bigenzi vyayo. Umuhanuzi wa Amerika mu vyo umutekano avuga ko “bazokwihora bari hamwe” mu gihe Korea ya Ruguru yoramuka igerageje ikindi kirwanisho ca nikleyeri kigira indwi kimaze kuvugwa amezi atari make n’inzego zijejwe igendereza za Amerika na Korea y’Epfo. Korea ya Ruguru imaze kurekura ibisasu vya misire birenga 50 mu mezi abiri aheze, vyinshi bikaba ari ibiraswa ku ntera ngufi. Ibiraswa ku ntera ndende ntibikunze kugeragezwa, kandi bigeramiye Amerika, kubera izo misire zahinguwe ku buryo zigenda zikoreye ibisasu vy’ubumara zikazoshika aho ari ho hose ku butaka bwa Amerika. Iki gisasu cikekwa ko ari ICBM carashwe isaha zine n’iminota 15 (10:15) mu masaha ya Korea ya Ruguru, ni ukuvuga isaha cumi n’iminota 15 z’ijoro mu masaha y’Uburundi n’Urwanda, hafi y’umugwa mukuru Pyongyang, nk’uko bivugwa n’abakuru ba gisirikare ba Korea y’Epfo. Cagurutse gushika ku birometero 6.100 uja hejuru, kikaba cageze ku ntera y’ibirometero 1.000, ku muvuduko ungana n’uw’ikindi yarekuye ku wa 22 z’ukwa gatatu, nk’uko bivugwa n’igisirikare ca Korea y’Epfo. Umushikiranganji w’Ubuyapani ajejwe kwivuna abansi Yasukazu Hamada avuga ko iyo misire yari ifise ubushobozi bwo gushika muri Amerika kandi ko yoguruka gushika ku birometero 15.000. Kishida yabwiye abanyamakuru muri Thailand  ati: “Twabwiye (Pyongyang) ko tudashobora na gato kwihanganira ibintu nk’ibi”. Ingendo ya Korea ya Ruguru mu mezi aheze ni iyo kurasa ibisasu vya misire mu kwihora ibikorwa vya gisirikare vya Amerika mu micungararo y’ikigwa ca Korea. Iriko irahingura ubundi bwoko bwa misire iraswa kure, izwi nka Hwasong-17, ikaba ari ndende gusumba misire za ICBM imaze kugerageza muri kahise. Abahinga bemeza ko imaze kugerageza kurasa Hwasong-17 incuro zitari nke ariko bikanka, kandi ko Pyongyang itarashobora kuyitunganya neza ku buryo yoguruka gushika aho yagenewe. Mu ntango za kuno kwezi, igisasu ca ICBM carakwamiye mu nzira, nk’uko bivugwa n’igisirikare ca Korea y’Epfo. Mu kw’icumi, Korea ya Ruguru yararekuye igisasu ca misire kiraswa kure hejuru y’Ubuyapani,  bwari bwo bwa mbere mu myaka itanu. N’aho yafatiwe ibihano vyayimugaje, Pyongyang yaragerageje ibirwanisho vya nikleyeri incuro zitandatu hagari ya 2006 na 2017, ikaba izwi ko iriko irategura irigira indwi. Ibandanya kandi yongereza ubushobozi bwayo bwa gisirikare.

headline: Burundi: EU yavanye ibihano ku mushikiranganji wa mbere Ndirakobuca
text: Ishirahamwe rya Buraya ryavanye ibihano ku barundi batatu barimwo umushikiranganji wa mbere w’Uburundi, Gervais Ndirakobuca, batazira Ndakugarika. Mu kwezi kw’icenda Ndirakubuca ni ho yagenwa kuba umushikiranganji wa mbere muri reta ya prezida Evariste Ndayishimiye. Gushika aho yari amushikiranganji ajejwe intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu, umutekano n’iterambere rusangi kuva prezida Ndayishimiye ashitse ku butegetsi mu kwezi kwa gatandatu mu 2020. Ubutumwa bwo kuri Twitter bw’ubuserukizi bw’ishirahamwe rya Buraya mu Burundi buvuga  ko “ugukomera kw’imigenderanire UE [Union Euopeenne]-Burundi kwatumye havanwaho ingingo ya 96. Ubu UE ivanyeho ibihano vyari vyafatiwe abantu batatu ku giti cabo barimwo umushikiranganji wa mbere.” Uwundi yakuweko ibihano ni Godefroid Bizimana , intwazangabo mu giporisi ubu akora mu biro vy’umukuru w’igihugu. U﻿mushikiranganji w'Uburundi ajejwe imigenderanire n'amakungu, Albert Shingiro yavuze ko yashimishijwe cane n'iyo ngingo y'ishirahamwe rya Buraya. Ariko m﻿uri ubwo butumwa bwiwe bwo kuri Twitter, umushikiranganji Shingiro avuga "abantu babiri" n'ubwo ibihano vyakuwe ku bantu batatu. Uwundi ni Leonard Ngendakumana, yahunze igihugu inyuma y’igerageza ryo gutembagaza ubutegetsi bw’umuhisi prezida Pierre Nkurunzi mu kwezi kwa gatanu mu 2015. Ubu ari mu baronderwa n'ubutungane bw'Uburundi ku riuhara yoba yaragize. S﻿hingiro avuga iyo ngingo ya Buraya yavuye mu "biganiro...n'ugushaka guhuriweko kwo  kunagura imigenderanire y'ubucuti n'ugufashanya n'ishirahamwe rya Buraya". Ubu uwusigaye muri ivyo bihano ni Mathias Joseph Niyonzima, batazira Kazungu, wo mu biro vy’igihugu bijejwe iperereza mu Burundi. Ivyo  bihano vyarimwo kudahabwa uruhusha rwo kuja mu bihugu bigize iryo shirahamwe no gufatira amatungo yabo. Mu kwezi kwa Munyonyo (11) mu mwaka uheze, ivyo bihano vyafashwe mu 2015 vyari vyongewe ikiringo c’umwaka umwe. Ishirahamwe rya Buraya ryari ryabifatiye abo bantu ku mvo z’uruhara rwabo mu bikorwa vy’intureka, gutoteza, canke gukaburira intureka”  mu gihe c’imyiyerekano y’abagwanya ikiringo ca gatatu c’umuhisi prezida Nkurunziza canke mw’igeragezwa ryo gutembagaza ubutegetsi bwiwe mu 2015. I﻿shirahamwe rya Buraya ryari ryarafatiye kandi ingingo zo kudaha reta y'Uburundi imfashanyo y'iterambere kuva mu  2016. Izo ngingo na zo  zavanyweho  mu kwezi kwa kabiri uyu mwaka. I﻿mbere y'izo ngingo, ishirahamwe rya Buraya ni ryo ryari irya mbere mu guha imfashanyo nyinshi Uburundi. Ubu rivuga ko rigiye "kubandanya rishigikira utwigoro tw’iterambare n’impinduka Uburundi buriko burakora".

headline: Ukraine - Russia: Odesa na Mariupol bibandanya bicucagirwa amabombe
text: Misire zakoreshejwe mu gisagara ca Odesa zishobora kuba ari izo ku ntwaro y'aba Soviyeti - ariko ivyo zononye ntibiharurwa. Abategetsi b'ico gisagara bemeza ko umusi w'ejo igenekerezo rya 9 Rusama (5) Odesa yatewe misire icenda hakoreshejwe indege. Videwo yacishijwe ku mbuga hwaniro n'igisirikare ca Ukraine yerekana abasirikare bariko baca mu bihomoka vy'inyubakwa yahoze ari iy'ubucuruzi (centre commercial/shopping centre) n'iy'ububiko. Umwotsi mwinshi wakwiragiye hagati muri ico gisagara gifise kahise karekare. Ariko kubera amategeko yo kutava muhira amabarabara yagaragara igihe izo misire zaterwa isaha zine n'iminota 30 z'ijoro ryakeye. Abategetsi bavuga ko umuntu umwe yahasize ubuzima abandi batanu nabo barakomereka bakaba bajanywe mu bitaro. Ibi bitero vyabaye mu masaha y'ijoro ry'ejo ku wa mbere, umusi umukuru w'Inama y'ishirahamwe ry'abanyabulaya yari yagendeye ico gisagara. Charles Michel yavuze ko yabonye ibigega vyuzuye intete, ingano n'ibigori i Odesa birindiriye gushorwa hanze - ariko bikaba vyarazibiwe. Ubwoba bw'uko hashobora kuba ikibazo c'imfungurwa kw'isi ni ikintu cagarutsweko na Perezida Zelensky mw'ijambo ryiwe yashikirije ejo mw'ijoro. Yavuze ko ibihugu bitari bike bigeze ahatemba kubera ubukene bwimfungurwa kandi ko ibintu bishobora "kuba, mvugishije ukuri, nabi cane", mu gihe vyokwanka ko Ukraine ishora ivyimburwa hanze. Ibi biri uko mu gihe ibitero vy'urutavanako bibandanya mu buseruko bwa Ukraine. Haravugwa intambara zikomeye mu micungararo y'ibisagara vya Rubizhne na Bilohorivka - vyompi biri mu ntara ya Donbas. Hagati aho, umutegetsi wo ku rwego rwo hejuru mu bushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi bwa Amerika avuga ko mu misi mike iheze, Uburusiya ata kintu kinini bwashitseko, n'aho bwigaruriye igisagara ca Popasna kiri mu buseruko. Uyo mutegetsi abandanya avuga kandi ko igisagara ca Kharkiv kikiri mu minwe ya reta ya Ukraine. Mw'ijambo ryiwe, Perezida Zelensky yagabishije ko Uburusiya buriko "buhonyora  mu mahwa amwe" n'ayo abigeze gutera Ukraine bahonyoyemwo, yongerako ati "nta mwansi n'umwe yigeze ashinga imizi hano". I Mariupol naho, umushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi wa Ukraine avuga ko ingabo z'Uburusiya ziriko "ziracucagira ibibombe" ku ruganda rw'ivyuma rwa Azovstal, aho amajana n'amajana y'abarwanyi ba Ukraine babandanya bahanganye n'ibitero vy'Uburusiya. Petro Andriushchenko, umuhanuzi w'umukuru w'igisagara ca Mariupol avuga ko ingabo z'Uburusiya zatanguye kugota urwo ruganda inyuma y'aho amamodoka ya ONU aviriye mu karere ka Donetsk. Avuga ko Abarusiya bariko bagerageza kubomora ikiraro gikoreshwa mu guhungisha abantu, mu ntumbero yo kuzibirirayo abarwanyi babandanya barwanira urwo ruganda. Umugore w'umusirikare wa Ukraine arwanira muri urwo ruganda avuga ko yamubwiye ko ibintu bibandanya biba nabi, mu gihe amazi agenda abaherana, amajana n'amajana y'abasirikare bakomeretse nabo bakaba bakizibiriweyo. Avugana na BBC, Yuliia Feosiuk yavuze ko igihe avugana ubwa nyuma n'umugabo wiwe yamusavye ko yobaronderera ibintu "bishobora kubongerera imisi yo kubaho ata mazi igihe kirekire gishoboka". Yuliia Feosiuk avuga ko umugabo wiwe yamubariye ko abasirikare bababa 700 bakomeretse bakizibiwe muri urwo ruganda, kandi ko ibiziga vy'abasirikare bapfuye bikibitswe muri vya vyuma bikanyisha.

headline: Intambara ya Ukraine na Russia: Ibombe y'umwuka ni iki?
text: Uburusiya bwagirizwa ko butegura gukoresha ibirwanisho vy'umwuka - bizwi nka thermobarics canke vacuum bombs - mu gitero yakoze kuri Ukraine. Ibi birwanisho biteje impari kuko ni rutikiza inganda gusumba ibirwanisho bisanzwe, kandi bikagira ingaruka mbi cane ku muntu uw'ari we wese yegereye aho giturikiye. Ikibombe c'umwuka, kizwi kandi nka aerosol bomb canke fuel air explosive, gifise agasaho k'ibitoro ariko kikaba gifise ibiturika bibiri bitandukanye. Gishobora guterwa n'inkoho itera roketi canke kigaterwa n'indege nka bombe. Iyo gishitse aho carungitswe, igiturika ca mbere cugurura aka gasaho hagaca haduka uruvangatirane rw'ivyuka nk'igicu. Iki gicu gishobora kwinjira mu nyubakwa iyo ari yo yose umuntu yinyegejemwo iyo idapfunze neza. Igiturika ca kabiri rero gica gituritsa iki gicu, hagaca haduka umuriro mwinshi cane, umukuba w'umuyaga mwinshi cane n'umwuka mubi uca unywa impwemu (oxygen) iri muri ako gace kose. Iki kirwanisho gishobora gusambura amazu yose yitwa ngo yubatswe mu bikoresho bikomeye, kikica kikanakomeretsa abantu. Bikoreshwa mu ntumbero nyinshi zitandukanye, kandi bikaba bifise ubunini butandukanye - harimwo n'ibirwanisho bikoreshwa n'umuntu umwe nk'ama grenade canke zigaterwa n'inkoho zitera amarokete zitwarwa n'umuntu. Ibibombe nk'ibi binini cane bitererwa mu kirere na vyo vyarahinguwe, cane cane mu ntumbero yo kwica abarwanyi baba binyegeje mu masenga no mu myobo igoye gushikamwo - ingaruka z'iki kirwanisho zikaba ari zo za mbere mbi cane mu bibanza vyugaye. Mu 2007, Uburusiya bwaragerageje ikibombe kinini cabwo co muri ubu bwoko, iciswe "Father of all bombs" (se w'amabombe yose). Casohoye ibiturika bingana n'itoni 44 z'ibombe isanzwe - gica kiboneka ko ari co kibombe ca mbere kinini kw'isi atari ica nikleyeri. Kubera ingaruka yaco, n'ingene gituza umwansi yinyegeje mu mazu canke mu myobo, ibibombe vy'umwuka bikunze gukoreshwa cane cane mu bisagara. Iki ni ikintu gikomeye uravye ingene ibintu bimeze ku rubuga muri Ukraine, aho ingabo z'Uburusiya ziriko ziragerageza kwigarurira umugwa mukuru wa Ukraine, Kyiv, hamwe n'ibindi bisagara bikuru bikuru mu buseruko bw'igihugu. Oksana Markarova, aserukira Ukraine muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, yagiriza Uburusiya ko bukoresha amabombe y'umwuka mu gitero cabwo kuri iki gihugu. Hagati aho, ibi ntibiremezwa ku mugaragaro. Mu misi iheze, hari amakuru yavuga ko habonetse inkoho zitera amaroketi y'umwuka muri Ukraine. Nta mategeko mpuzamakungu yihariye abuza ikoreshwa ry'ubu bwoko bw'ibirwanisho, ariko iyo igihugu kibikoresheje mu gutera ibibanza birimwo inyubakwa za gisivire nk'amashure canke ibitaro, gishobora kwagirizwa ivyaha vyo mu ntambara nk'uko bitegekanijwe n'amasezerano y'i La Haye/The Hague yo mu 1899 na 1907. Umushikirizamanza mukuru wa sentare mpuzamakungu mpanavyaha Karim Khan avuga ko sentare yiwe izokora amatohoza ku bishobora kuba ivyaha vyo mu ntambara muri Ukraine. Ibirwanisho vy'umwuka bishobora kuba vyatanguye gukoreshwa mu gihe c'intambara ya kabiri y'isi yose, aho vyakoreshejwe ubwa mbere n'igisirikare c'Ubudagi. Ntivyatejwe imbere cane imbere y'imyaka ya 1960, aho Amerika yabikoresha muri Vietnam. Amerika yarabikoresheje kandi mu 2001 mu kugerageza gusambura abarwanyi ba al-Qaeda bari binyegeje mu myobo yo mu misozi ya Tora Bora muri Afghanistan. Uburusiya bwarabikoresheje mu ntambara yabwo muri Chechnya mu 1999. Ibi birwanisho vy'umwuka vyahinguriwe mu Burusiya biravugwa kandi ko vyakoreshejwe mu ntambara yo mu gihugu ca Syria n'ubutegetsi bwa Bashar al-Assad.

headline: Burundi-ONU: Uwujejwe agateka ka zina muntu 'ashizweho ku gahato'.
text: Umushikiranganji  w'Uburundi ajejwe imigenderanire avuga ko reta y'ico gihugu itazokwakira intumwa ya ONU ijejwe gutanga  raporo y'ingene agateka ka zina muntu kifashe muri ico gihugu. Albert Shingiro yabivugiye mu  mubonano n'abaserukira ibihugu vyabo mu Burundi kuri uyu wa  i Bujumbura kuru uyu wa kane. Urwego rw'intumwa ya ONU yo gutanga raporo z'agateka ka zina muntu rwashizweho mu kwezi  kw'icenda kugira rusubirire umugwi udasanzwe wari umaze imyaka itanu ukora amatohoza ku mabi y'ikirenga yakozwe mu Burundi kuva mu 2015. Uwo mugwi wari urungowe na Doudou Diene nawo nyene wamaze iyo myaka yose ata n'umwe mu bawugize ahonyoje ikirenge mu Burundi. Mu  kiganiro n'abaserukira ibihugu vyabo mu Burundi, umushikiranganji w'ico gihugu ajejwe imigenderanire Albert Shingiro yababwiye ko iyo ntumwa yagiyeho ku gahato k'ibihugu bimwe bimwe. Umusjhikiranganji Shingiro yagize ati: ''Sinibaza ko bizoshoboka ko iyo ntumwa igendera Uburundi. Kuko ingene yashizweho vyaciye mu gahato". Yishura ku kibazo cari kibajijwe n'uwuhagarariye Ubuholandi mu Burundi, umushikiranganji Shingiro yavuze ko urwego rw'iyo ntumwa  rwashizweho  ''n'ubwo umugwi wa Afrika wari wavyanse". Yongeyeko ati : ''Ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyarakoresheje agahato kugira urwego rw'iyo ntumwa rushirweho''. Iyo ntumwa igiye kuba nk'umurwi wo gutohoza ku gateka ka zina muntu yari ije gusubirira. Mu myaka itanu wamaze, reta y'Uburundi ntiyigeze yemera ko hari uwuwugize ahonyoza ikirenge mu Burundi. Mbere bamwe muri bo reta y'Uburundi yatangaje ko ari ''persona non grata", n'ukuvuga abantu badashobora guhabwa ikaze mu Burundi. Ariko bagumye bashikiriza ivyegeranyo buri mwaka. Icanyuma bagitanze mu kwezi kw'icenda, bavuga ko hari  ibimaze guhinduka mu nzira nziza kuva umukuru w'igihugu mushasha , Evariste Ndayishimiye ashitse ku butegetsi mu 2020 ariko ko ''inzira ikiri ndende". Uwo mugwi wavuze ko hari amabi akibandanya gukorwa arimwo ubwicanyi, ukuburwa irengero n'ukutemerera abantu gushikiriza ivyiyumviro mu bwisanzure  na cane cane abatavuga rumwe na reta. Havugwa kandi ukudahana abagirizwa gukora ayo mabi. Ivyo vyegeranyo reta y'Uburundi yagumye ivyiyamiriza ivuga ko ari ''ibinyoma" kandi bifise ''intumbero ya poritike". Ibiro vy'urwego rwa ONU rushinzwe agateka ka zina muntu  mu Burundi navyo reta yaravyugaje  burundu mu 2019. Ibiro vy'intumwa idasanzwe y'umunyamabanga mukuru wa ONU navyo vyugaye  mu kwezi kwa  gatanu uyu mwaka. Ariko , umushikitranganji Albert Shingiro yabwiye abaserukira ibihugu vyabo mu Burundi ko reta yiwe iguma ''yuguruye imiryango yo gufashanya no kuganira n'icicaro gikuru ca Geneve hamwe n'ishami ryaco riri i Younde."

headline: Abanye Ethiopia bavuga igituma bashaka kuja muri Russia
text: Ababoneka batonze imirongo imbere y’ubuserukizi bwa Russia muri Ethiopia, bavuga ko bashaka kuja kurwana muri Ukraine, cane cane kuko ubuzima bugoye mu gihugu.

headline: Russia: aba nye Syria baja imbere mu bitero bemererwa $ 7 000
text: Mu bitero vya Russia muri Ukraine vyavuyemwo intambara, abacangero bahabwa $3 500, bari inyuma mu bitero. Aba nye Syria batorwa nk’uko vyagenze muri Libya. Kui ari benshi biyandikisha?

headline: Ethiopia: Igisirikare kivuga ko cisha ibihumbi vy'inyeshamba za TPLF muri Tigray
text: Igisirikare ca Ethiopia kivuga ko cishe inyeshamba zirenga 5600 zirwanira mu ntara ya Tigray mu buraruko bw'igihugu. Kuva mu kwa cumi na rimwe umwaka uheze, intambara zirabica bigacika, ariko itangazo ry'intwazangabo yo ku rwego rwo hejuru Jenerali Bacha Debele ntiyerekana igihe izo nyeshamba zishwe. Abanyamakuru bavuga ko zishobora kuba ari izaguye mu ntambara ziheruka. Uyu mu jenerali avuga ko izindi nyeshamba 2300 zakomeretse, izindi 2000 nazo zirafatwa. Abasivire baharurwa mu mamiriyoni bahanganye na kigoyi giturutse kuri iyo ntambara, nk'uko ishirahamwe ONU ribivuga. Liyetena Jenerali (Lt Gen) Debele yagiriza umugambwe Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF) kugerageza gusambura Ethiopia, inyuma y'aho inyeshamba zawo zinjiriye mu ntara za Amhara na Afar zihana imbibe na Tigray. Avuga ko umurwi umwe w'abarwanyi ba TPLF wagerageje kwigarurira akarere ka Humera kari ku rubibe rugabura Tigray na Amhara, ariko ko "bakubiswe bikomeye". TPLF ntaco iravuga kuri ibibivugwa n'iyi ntwazangabo. Iyi ntambara yatanguye mu mwaka uheze inyuma y'icuka kibi cari kimaze amezi atari make hagati ya reta y'umushikiranganji wa mbere Abiy Ahmed n'abategetsi ba TPLF, umugambwe mukuru mu ntara ya Tigray. Umushikiranganji wa mbere yahavuye arungika ingabo muri Tigray kugira ngo zirukane reta y'iyo ntara, inyuma y'uko TPLF yagirijwe ibitero bitari bike ku makambi y'igisirikare c'igihugu. Iyi ntambara ivugwa ko imaze guhitana ibihumbi vy'abanyagihugu, mu gihe abaharurwa mu mamiriyoni nabo bateshejwe izabo, bamwe muri bo bakaba bahungiye muri Sudani. Impande zompi ziragirizwa amabi, harimwo ugufata abagore ku nguvu n'ubwicanyi bw'abasivire mu kivunga. Na Kalkidan Yibeltal, umunyamakuru wa BBC muri Ethiopia Ibi biharuro bitangwa n'igisirikare ni binini cane kandi ntivyoroshe kubihinyuza. Ariko ikizwi ni kimwe. Iyi ntambara imaze amezi cumi iracatikiza inganda kandi ikanagira inkurikizi mbi. Muri iri jambo yashikirije ejo ku wa gatandatu, Lt Gen Bacha, avuga ko habaye intambara zikomeye cane akavuga ko hifashishijwe ibitero vy'indege, ariko ntavuge igihe zabereye. Inyuma y'aho abarwanyi ba TPLF bigaruriye Tigray giturumbuka mu kwa gatandatu, barashoboye gushika no mu ntara za Amhara na Afar zihana imbibe na yo, ivyerekana ko intambara yatera ikwira mu gihugu. Mu ndwi zibiri ziheze, igisirikare n'imirwi igishigikiye basa b'abahagaritse ingabo za Tigray mbere bazisubiza inyuma, banigarurira uturere tumwe tumwe dukomeye. Ariko, uturere dukomeye two mu ntara za Afar na Amhara, harimwo igisagara ca Lalibela kirimwo amasengero yo muri kahise ari mu murage wa Unesco, turacari mu minwe ya TPLF. Ku wa gatanu, ONU yaragirije reta kuzibira imfashanyo zategerezwa kuja muri Tigray, inagabisha ko ibi bibangamiye ubuzima bw'amamiriyoni y'abantu. ONU yibaza ko abantu bangana n'imiriyoni 5.2 bakeneye imfashanyo yihuta, atari ivyo naho bahure na "kigoyi ca mbere gikomeye kw'isi inyuma y'imyaka mirongo". Ariko ejo ku wa gatandatu, reta ya Ethiopia yavuze ko amakamyo 500 yuzuye imfashanyo aherutse kwinjira muri iyo ntara, harimwo 152 mu misi ibiri iheze. Ivuga kandi ko n'igitigiri c'amabariyeri caragabanutse. Aya makuru ntarashobora guhinyuzwa n'abigenga. Ishirahamwe ONU ryari rimaze igihe ryidoga ko kuva ku wa 22 ata kamyo n'imwe yari bwigere ishika muri Tigray, mu gihe hari hakenewe 100 buri musi.

headline: France: 'Gufungwa imyaka itatu' kuri Mpozagara yari umushikiranganji mu Burundi
text: Gabriel Mpozagara yari umushikiranganji w'ubutungane ku butegetsi bwa Micombero hamwe n'umugore wiwe bari imbere y'ubucamanza i Paris ku birego birimwo "kugira urudandaza rw'abantu". Bwana Mpozagara n'umugore wiwe bagirizwa kandi "gukoresha abantu mu kinyegero", gukoresha umuntu adafise ivya ngombwa", no "ugukingira ikibaba umuntu abaye mu gihugu bidaciye mu mategeko". Uwo muryango kandi wagirizwa ko wakoresheje umuntu nk'umuja mu kiringo c'imyaka cumi. Abaregwa ariko bahakana ivyo bagirizwa. Ubushikirizamanza bubasabira gupfungwa imyaka itatu. Ari imbere y'abacamanza,  Méthode Sindayigaya, umurundi w'imyaka 39, yaravuze ivyamubayeko. Igihe yava i Bujumbura mu 2008, yari azi ko agiye kurera umwana w'uwo muryango yari amugaye, waba mu karere ka Ville-d'Avray i Paris. Méthode Sindayigaya avuga ko Gabriel Mpozagara n'umugore wiwe bari bamwemereye akazi k'amezi atatu, bakaba bari banamurihiye itike y'indege n'uruhusha rw'ukuba muri ico gihugu (visa). Avuga ko igitabu ciwe c'inzira bakimwatse, baca bamukoresha nk'umuja mu rikingo c'imyaka 10 kandi bakaba batigeze banamuha agahembo kiwe. Méthode Sindayigaya ati: "Bankoresheje nk'igikoresho, banyaka uburenganzira bwanje, baranyugaranira iwabo. Nakora iminsi indwi ku ndwi, ntanaruhuka. Naba mu nzu yo mu kuzimu, ahantu hakanye cane. Bangize umuja wabo. Ndibaza ko ubutungane buzontunganiriza". Uyo mugabo avuga ko yagiye kurekurwa mu kwezi kw'indwi umwaka uheze wa 2018, igihe umuntu yakora mw'ishirahamwe ry'ubwubatsi yari aje ku kazi yabwira igipolisi ko hari umuntu asa n'uwakubaguwe yari aryamye ku gatanda kabi mu nzu yo mu kuzimu. Imbere y'abacamanza, Gabriel Mpozagara n'umugore wiwe barahakanye bivuye inyuma ivyo wagirizwa. Bwana Mpozagara yavuze ko Méthode Sindayigaya yari afise uburenganzira bwo gutembera, ko atigeze yakwa igitabu ciwe c'inzira, ko ahubwo ari we atashaka kuva i muhira. Sibwo bwa mbere uyo muryango wa Mpozagara - yigeze kuba umushikirizamanza mukuru wa Repubulika, umushikiranganji w'ubutungane hanyuma umushikiranganji w'ubutunzi mu myaka ya 1960 no mu myaka ya 1970 - yagirizwa ivyaha bisa n'ivyo. Mu mwaka wa 2007, wari warengukishijwe imbere y'ubucamanza mu Bufaransa, uracibwa urubanza ariko urunguruza, mu rubanza rwari rwerekeye abishwa babo babiri bari bavuye i Burundi. Umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC avuga ko uwo muryango ushobora gupfungwa imyaka itatu ukanatanda n'amande y'ibihumbi 150 vy'ama euro. Sentare izosoma urubanza ku wa 21 z'ukwezi kuza kw'icumi.

headline: Perezida Zelensky wa Ukraine ari mu nzira aja muri Amerika
text: Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky wa Ukraine  avuga ko ari mu nzira aja  i Washington kuri uyu wa gatatu, aho aza kubonana na Perezida Joe Biden wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Ni rwo urugendo  rwiwe rwa mbere agize hanze y’igihugu kuva igitero c’Uburusiya gitanguye mu kwa kabiri. Maison Blanche/White House (ibiro vy’umukuru w’igihugu wa Amerika) iremeza uru rugendo, ikavuga kandi ko izoha Ukraine misire zo mu bwoko bwa Patriot, zizokwongerereza  cane iki gihugu ubushobozi bwo gukingira ikirere. Zelensky kandi ategekanya gushikiriza ijambo inama nshingamateka na nkenguzamateka zikoranye yongere agire n’amanama atari make. Yanditse kuri Twitter ati: “Ndi mu nzira nja muri Amerika mu ntumbero yo gukomeza ubushobozi bwa Ukraine bwo kwihagararako no kwivyukiranya, hamwe no kwivuna abansi”. Perezida Zelensky arakunze kwakira abategetsi mvamakungu ku mugwa mukuru Kyiv, kandi abandanya agendera ingabo ziri ku rugamba muri Ukraine. Perezida Zelensky arakunze kandi kuvugana n’abategetsi b’isi kuri terefone no ku buhinga bwa videwo – akenshi ari mu biro iwe i Kyiv. Ariko urugendo rutamenyeshejwe mu gihugu co hanze rubaye urwa mbere kuva intambara itanguye, kandi rukerekana akamaro k’imigenderanire ya Ukraine na Amerika isanzwe iri kw’isonga mu gutanga imfashanyo ya gisirikare. Mu kiganiro n’abanyamakuru imbere y’urugendo rwa Zelensky, Maison Blanche yemeje iyindi mfashanyo mu rwego rw’umutekano ifise agaciro k’imiriyaridi zababa zibiri z’amadorari y’abanyamerika. Muri yo harimwo misire zo mu bwoko bwa Patriot, zizofasha Ukraine gukingira ibibanza nyamukuru ibitero vy’Uburusiya. Abategetsi bamaze igihe basaba Uburengero ibirwanisho bigezweho vyo gukingira ikirere. Uburusiya bumaze igihe butera ibigo vy’amasoko ntanganguvu, ivyatumye amamiriyoni y’abanyagihugu bisanga mu kizime muri kino gihe c’ubukonje burenze urugero. Maison Blanche ivuga ko izokwigisha ingabo za Ukraine ingene bakoresha izi misire za Patriot, kandi ko “bizofata igihe kanaka”. Hari ibikorwa biriko birabandanya muri kino gihe muri Amerika vyo gusaba ko hemezwa integuro y’itegeko ryoha Ukraine imiriyaridi zirenga 40 z’amadorari y’abanyamerika nk’imfashanyo y’inyongera  imbere y’umwaka wa 2023.  Ku bijanye n’amafaranga akoreshwa muri rusangi mu mfashanyo ya gisirikare kuva intambara itanguye, Amerika imaze gutanga imiriyaridi 18,5 z’amadorari y’abanyamerika, imfashanyo isumba kure cane iyitangwa n’ikindi gihugu ico ari co cose. Perezida Zelensky asaba ayandi mafaranga, akavuga ko ku kwezi Ukraine ikoresha hafi imiriyaridi zitanu z’amadorari mu vya gisirikare. Akoze uru rugendo inyuma y’umusi umwe agize urugendo rutamenyeshejwe mu gisagara kiri mu ntambara ca Bakhmut, aho ingabo za Ukraine n’iz’Uburusiya zimaze amezi atari make mu ntambara zikomeye. Ibiro vy’umukuru w’igihugu bimenyesha ko yabonanye n’ingabo yongera atanga n’udushirukabute ku basirikare. Uru rugendo rwari intambwe ikomeye yo kwerekana ko adatinya urukamvye – be no kwerekana ko afashe mu mugongo ingabo za Ukraine zihanganye n’umwansi muri zimwe mu ntambara zikomeye cane muri zino ndwi za vuba. Abasirikare bahaye Zelensky ibendera rya Ukraine ririko amazina yabo bamusaba ko yorishikiriza Perezida Biden n’inama nshingamateka na nkenguzamateka za Amerika, nk’uko vyabonetse muri kamera (camera). Kuri uwo musi nyene, ari muri Kremlin, Perezida Vladimir Putin w’Uburusiya yahaye ibidari abasirikare bagize uruhara mu gitero c’Uburusia kuri Ukraine. Kuva Uburusiya buteye Ukraine ku wa 24 Ruhuhumua (2), igisirikare ca Amerika kivuga ko n’imiburiburi abasirikare 100.000 ba Ukraine hamwe na 100.000 b’Uburusiya bamaze kwicwa canke gukomereka, hamwe n’abasivire 40.000 bishwe. Ishirahamwe ONU rimaze guharura impunzi z’abanya-Ukraine imiriyoni 7,8 bahungiye ku mugabane wa Bulaya, harimwo n’Uburusiya. Hagati aho, ivyo biharuro ntibirimwo abateshejwe izabo ariko bakaguma muri Ukraine.

headline: AC-Génocide ivuga ko kuvuga ko habaye jenoside y'Abahutu mu Burundi ari 'ikinyoma'
text: Umurwi ujejwe gutohoza ukuri ku mabi yakozwe mu Burundi kuva ku gihe c'ubukoroni  (CVR) uremeza ko abahutu bo mu Burundi bakorewe ubwicanyi bw'ihonyabwoko (genocide) mu 1972 no mu 1973. Vyashikirijwe inama  nshingamateka na nkenguzamateka zikoraniye hamwe mu ngoro ya Kigobe i Bujumbura ejo ku wa mbere. Umukuru w'uwo murwi, Pierre Claver Ndayicariye yashikirije icegeranyo cerekana ido n'ido ry'ingene Abahutu na cane cane abize n'abari bafise ubuzima bwiza, bahizwe, bagafatwa bakicwa mu buryo bw'agashinyaguro kandi buteye ubwoba mu gihugu cose kuva mu mpera z'ukwezi kwa kane mu 1972 kubandanya no mu 1793. Ndayicariye  yavuze ko uwuza kw'isonga muri ako kabi ari uwari umukuru w'igihugu ico gihe Capitaine Michel Micombero. Hagati aho, ishirahamwe ryishinze kurwanya ihonyabwoko mu Burundi, AC-Génocide ririyamiriza iki cegeranyo ca CVR, rikavuga ko ari ikinyoma. Umurwi  CVR wavuze ko washitse kuri iyo nyito umaze kwihweza amakuru umaze kwegerenya ku bwicanyi  bwakozwe ico gihe, ivyaha vyakozwe  hamwe n'amategeko avuga ingene bikwiye kwitwa. Pierre Claver Ndayicariye yabwiye abashingamateka n'abakenguzamateka ko umugwi CVR umaze kwugurura ibishobora kuba ari ibinogo rusangi 679, ukaba umaze guharura ibisigarira vy'abantu babihambwemwo bashika 19.897, uretse ko ''hari amagufa yamaze gucika ifu n'abishwe bagatabwa mu nzuzi". Umukuru w'uwo mugwi yavuze ko kimwe mu bimenyetso ko bwari  ubwicanyi bwateguwe ari uko ''ibinogo birebire" vyahambwemwo abantu ikivunga ''vyari vyarimbwe imbere y'igihe mu 1970 no mu 1971." Emmanuel Nkurunziza arongoye ishirahamwe ryishinze kurwanya ihonyabwoko, AC-Genocide wewe siko abibona, akavuga ko ata cizere afitiye umurwi CRV. Wewe yemeza ko ubwicanyi bwakorewe Abahutu mu Burundi ari ubwakozwe na reta yariko ihasha abari bateguye gutikiza ubwoko bw'Abatutsi. Ati: "Icabaye ico gihe iriko ihasha abo bicanyi bagomba guhonya ubwoko bw'abatutsi yakoze ubwicanyi nayo kuri ubu ikajaniranya n'abataco bazira kandi abantu bagapfa ku bwinshi". Avuga ko kubona CVR itakoranye n'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU nk'uko vyumvikanyweko mu masezerano y'amahoro y'i Arusha mu 2000 ari ukuvuga y'uko "bategura ivyabo atawubagiriza". Umviriza ingene Emmanuel Nkurunziza avuga: Nico kibazo BBC yabajije umuhinga mu vyo amategeko Ernest Sagaga, akavuga ko mu bisanzwe ONU yemera ivyemejwe n'inzego iba yarashizeyo yo nyene. Avuga ko kugira yemere ko habaye jenoside, bitegerezwa kwemezwa n'urwego rw'ubucamanza yo nyene yashizeho. Hagati aho avuga ko icaha ca jenoside gishobora kwemerwa mu gihe inzego zitandukanye z'ibihugu, nk'akarorero inama nshingamateka canke ama reta ubwayo, ariko bikaba ata nkurikizi bizogira mu butungane. Umviriza ingene avuga: Hamaze imyaka hari impari zo kumenya inyito y'ubwicanyi bwo mu 1972 mu gihe hari abavuga ko mu ntango ryari ihonyabwoko ry'abatutsi hanyuma rigakurikirwa n'iyicwa ry'abahutu n'inzego za reta y'ico gihe. Umugwi CVR uremeza ko imbere y'uko abahutu bicwa mu gihugu hari abatutsi babanje kwicwa na cane cane mu ntara z'ubumanuko bw'Uburundi. Umukuru w'umugwi CVR yavuze ko abokoze ayo mabi botangura gutegura imitima yabo kugira basabe imbabazi, abayakorewe nabo bagategura iyabo kugira bazitange. Yavuze kandi ko hakwiye kuzoca haba amatohoza yimbitse kugirango harabwe ko  abatwawe  ibintu bishoboka ko bobisubizwa. Umugwi CVR uvuga kandi  ko na reta ikwiye gusaba ikigongwe kuko mu bakoze ayo mabi na cane cane harimwo inzego za reta. Uwo mugwi uvuga kandi ko hakwiye gushingwa umunsi w'icese wo kwibuka iryo honyabwoko ryakorewe  abahutu mu 1972 no mu 1973. Amatohoza ya CVR arabandanya ku yandi mabi arimwo ubwicanyi  yabaye mu Burundi harimwo ubwo mu 1988 no mu 1993. Ikiringo co gutohozako kiva ku ntwaro ya gikoroni mu mpera z'ikinjana  ca 19 gushika mu 2008.

headline: Ndayizeye Domitien: 'Mu Burundi hari imigambwe myinshi itari ngombwa'
text: Uwahoze atwara u Burundi Ndayizeye Domitien, nyuma yo kugenwa n'urunani Kira-Burundi ngo azoruserukire mu matora y'umukuru wigihugu, yabwiye BBC ko hari imigambwe myinshi itari ngombwa. Bwana Ndayizeye yatwaye u Burundi mu kiringo ca kabiri c'ubutegetsi mfatakibanza nyuma y'amasezerano ya Arusha yo mu 2000, yavuze ko ku burungozi bwiwe yaranguye ivyo yategerezwa gukora vyose. Avuga ko yashoboye kwumvikana n'ibanki y'isi ikadohorera u Burundi ideni bwari buyifitiye, anatunganya amatora y'umukuru w'igihugu atagiyemwo anashikiriza ubutegetsi uwayatsinze. Uyu ashaka kugaruka ku butegetsi yabwiye BBC ko hari imigambwe myinshi itari ikwiye kubaho ngo kuko vyogira akamaro gusumvya ihurije inguvu hamwe ikagira ikintu kimwe gikomeye. Ndayizeye Domitien mu matora yo mu 2010 yari yagenywe n'umugambwe Sahwanya Frodebu ngo azowuserukire, ariko ayikuramwo avuga ko uburyo yateguwe bwarimwo amanyanga. Abaye umukandida yiyongeye ku bandi barenga 15 bashaka guhiganirwa kuba umukuru w'igihugu c'u Burundi mu matora yitezwe mu kwezi kwa gatanu 2020. Bwana Domitien Ndayizeye yavuganye na Jacques Niyitegeka mu kiganiro ushobora kwumva aho hejuru.

headline: Coup d’Etat Burkina Faso: uwabogojwe avugwa ko ariko ategura igitero co kwihora
text: Uwitangaje ko ari we mukuru w’igihugu wa Burkina Faso avuga ko uwo yabogoje, haciye imisi ibiri ubu, ariko arategura kwivuna. Col Ibrahim Traoré yagiriza kandi igisirikare c’Ubufaransa ko ari co kinyegeje Lt Col Paul-Henri Damiba muri kimwe mu birindiro vyabwo – ariko Ubufaransa burahakana ko ata ruhara bubifisemwo. Inkoho zarumvikanye ku mugwa mukuru wa Burkina Faso, Ouagadougou nijoro ku wa gatandatu, za kajugujugu zikaba zazunguruka ikirere c’iki gisagara. Abari mu myiyerekano barakije umucanwa hanze y’ubuserukizi bw’Ubufaransa – igitero Paris yiyamirije “yivuye inyuma”. Ubushikiranganji bw’Ubufaransa bujejwe imigenderanire bwabwiye itororokanirizo ry’amakuru AFP ko umutekano w’abantu babwo ari co kiza imbere ya vyose, kandi ko buguruje ikigo c’ubutabazi i Ouagadougou. Imbere y’aha, ababibonye bavuga ko ingabo zugaye amabarabara mu micungararo y’igisagara kandi ko n’amaduka yari yuguruye yaciye yugarwa mu nyuma. Mu gisagara kigira kabiri c’iki gihugu, Bobo-Dioulasso, hari amakuru avuga ko umwugariro w’ikigo c’Ubufaransa (Institut Francais) waturiwe n’abari mu myiyerekano. Itembagazwa ry’ubutegetsi ku wa gatanu ryatangajwe ku mboneshakure y’igihugu, bukaba bwari ubugize kabiri igisirikare c’iki gihugu gifata ubutegetsi. Muri ibi bihe vyompi, abatembagaza ubutegetsi bavuga ko babikora kubera umutekano w’igihugu uba ugeramiwe. Burkina Faso igenzura ibice biri msi ya 60% vy’ubutaka bwayo, nk’uko abahinga babivuga, kandi ko inyeshamba zirwanya reta zakomeje umurego. Kuva mu 2020 abantu barenga umuriyoni barataye izabo kubera indyane. Ishirahamwe ry’Ubumwe bwa Afrika risaba ko ubutegetsi bushingiye kw’ibwirizwashingiro busubizwa ijambo bitarenze mu kw’indwi 2023, rikaba ryemeranya n’ishirahamwe ry’akarere CEDEAO/ECOWAS ko gutembagaza ubutegetsi bwa Lt Col Damiba biteye "kubiri n’ibwirizwashingiro". Imbere y’aha, CEDEAO yari yatangaje ko “bitabereye” ko aba basirikare bagumutse bafata ubutegetsi mu gihe igihugu cariko gikora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo ubutegetsi busubire mu minwe y’abasivire. Uwundi yiyamirije iri tembagazwa ry’ubutegetsi ni António Guterres, umunyamabanga mukuru w’ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU. Ku ncuro ya kabiri mu masaha 24 gusa, abateguye iri tembagazwa ry’ubutegetsi basohoye irindi tangazo ku mboneshakure y’igihugu riteweko igikumu n’umukuru wabo Col Ibrahim Traoré. Muri ryo bavuga ko Lt Damiba yariko ategura igitero co kwivuna kubera bobo bipfuza gukorana n’izindi ncuti mu kurwanya inyeshamba ziyitirira idini rya Islam. Iri tangazo ntiryerekana izi ncuti zindi, ariko abaharanira uburenganzira bwa muntu bavuga ko ingabo zo mu gihugu kibanyi ca Mali zikorana numurwi w’abacangero b’Abarusiya uzwi nka Wagner, n’aho ibi bihugu vyompi bibhakana. Ku mugoroba wo ku wa gatanu, ahagatiwe n’abasirikare bari bigumuye kandi bambaye ibitambara vyirabura bibafuka mu maso, intwazangabo yasomye itangazo ku mboneshakure y’igihugu avuga ko birukanye Lt Damiba, bagatembagaza reta kandi bagahagarika n’ibwirizwashingiro. Iri tangazo kandi ryasomwe kw’izina ry’intwazangabo ya gisirikare yitwa Col Traoré, avuga ko biyamiriza ukunanirwa kwa Lt Col Damiba guhangana n’inyeshamba ziyitirira idini rya Islam. Ati: "Abanyagihugu bacu bari mu mahano atagira izina, kandi babandanya bababara”. Nta vyinshi bizwi kuri Col Traoré, intwazangabo ya gisirikare y’imyaka 34 yarongoye urugamba rwo kurwanya umurwi w’abarwanyi biyitirira idini rya Islam uzwi nka Cobra. Itagazo ryiwe ryo ku wa gatanu ryamutangaje nk’umukuru w’igihugu w’imfatakibanza wa Burkina Faso.

headline: P﻿rezida Ndayishimiye aranegura abaja gukora mu mahanga ivyo banse gukora iwabo
text: M﻿u kiganiro yatanze kuri radio Kazoza FM ikorera mu Burundi kuri uyu wa gatanu, prezida Evariste Ndayishimiye yavuze ko ashigikiye urwaruka ruja kurondera imitahe hanze kugira rugaruke kurangurira imigambi mu Burundi. I﻿vyo umukuru w'igihugu yabivuze ariko arishura ku kibazo c'abamaze imisi baja mu gihugu ca Serbia. B﻿enshi mu baja kurondera ubuzima mu mahanga ni urwaruka ruri muri y'imyaka 35. P﻿rezida Evariste Ndayishimiye agira ati:"Ndateye intege abagenda kurondera  imitahe hanyuma bakagaruka gukorera mu Burundi, ariko ndanebagura abagenda gukora ubuzi banse gukora  mu gihugu cabo." K﻿uri ico kibazo nyene, prezida ndayishimiye abandanya avuga ko amahera abaja muri Serbia bakoresha, boshobora kuyakoresha mu gukora imigambi mu gihugu. M﻿u kiganiro ca "Be your own Boss" ca Kazoza FM, umukuru w'igihugu yari yatumiwe kuyaga n'urwaruka ku migambi y'iterambere bashobora gukora n'inzitizi bagenda baragira. P﻿rezida ndayishimiye yavuze ko Uburundi buriko burategura imigambi y'iterambere yo gushika mu mwaka wa 2040. A﻿gira ati:"Turiko turategura imigambi y'iterambere yo gushika mu 2040. Umutahe turawufise. "﻿Tubasavye (urwaruka) kudufasha kuko iyo migambi ni rwanyu. Hageze ico gihe, urwaruka muzoza murucira imigani muti 'ntimubone ngo mumerewe neza igihe twatangura ntivyari vyoroshe'". Yateye akamo abantu bafise amikoro make, kwubahuka kugira imigambi mito mito ibinjiriza amahera kugira basahirize imiryango yabo, gutyo bagire uruhara mw'iterambere ry'ubutunzi. R﻿usansuma ruheruka mu 2008 mu Burundi rwerekanye ko urwaruka rufise imyaka iri musi ya 35 rushika ku 66%. U﻿bu biharuro biva mu mashirahamwe atandukanye mpuzamakungu vyerekana ko urwaruka rugeze ku bice 72%. M﻿uri rusansuma rw'ibishomeri rwabaye mu 2020, vyagaragaye ko mu Burundi hari urwaruka rwize rushomereye rushika ku 400.000. A﻿ho ni mu gihe reta ikoresha abantu batarenga 120.000 gusa. M﻿u ntumbero yo kugwanya ubushomeri, reta yarashizeho umugambi wo gufasha urwaruka kwitunganiriza imigambi no kubaronsa akazi witwa PAEEJ (Programme d’autonomisation économique et d’emploi des jeunes)

headline: Intambwe Ukraine iriko iratera zizohava zigira ingaruka kuri Putin?
text: Na Steve Rosenberg Umwanditsi mukuru mu kirusiya, i Moscou Ni ibisanzwe ko wama wumva, mu kiganiro nyamukuru co kuri buri ndwi cerekeye amakuru ku mboneshakure y’Uburusiya, ivyo Kremlin imaze gushikako. Ariko ikiganiro co ku wa Mungu catanguriye ku makuru adakunze gutangazwa, aho reta yemera ko ibintu bitameze neza. Aboneka mu maso ko atamerewe neza, umunyamakuru Dmitry Kiselev yavuze ati: "Ku rubuga rw’intambara mu gikorwa kidasanzwe [muri Ukraine], iyi niyo yabaye indwi ya mbere itoroshe gushika ubu”. "Ntivyari vyoroshe na gato cane cane ku rugamba rwa Kharkiv, aho inyuma, y’igitero c’umwansi yari yadusumbije inguvu, ingabo (z’Uburusiya) vyabaye ngombwa ko ziva mu bisagara zari zabohoje”. Mu kibanza ca "zabohoje", fata ko ari "zigaruriye". Moscou yari yigaruriye utwo turere mu mezi aheze, ariko inyuma y’ibitero vyo kwivuna vyaje nk’umuravyo vyakozwe n’ingabo za Ukraine, igisirikare c’Uburusiya catakaje ubutaka butari buto mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko bwa Ukraine. Hagati aho, gushika ubwo, ibinyamakuru vya reta y’Uburusiya bibandanya vyerekana ubutwari bw’ingabo zabwo. Ivyabaye mu ntara ya Kharkiv ntibifatwa nk’uguhunga. Ikinyamakuru ca reta, Rossiyskaya Gazeta, candika kiti: "Ubushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi bw’Uburusiya burahakana ibihuha bivuga ko ingabo z’Uburusiya zahunze mu buryo buteye isoni, uturere twa Balakliya, Kupiansk na Izyum. Ntibahunze. Iyi yari integuro yari isanzwe ihari yo kwiyubaka”. Mu kinyamakuru Moskovsky Komsomolets, umuhinga mu vya gisirikare wewe abibona ukundi: "Biramaze kugaragara ko twafashe umwansi minenerwe. [Ingabo z’Uburusiya] zarakweze ibirenge mu gufata ingingo ari naho havuye ugutsindwa…Inkurikizi yavyo ni uko twatsinzwe hanyuma tukagerageza kuraba ko tutotakaza vyinshi mu gukurayo ingabo zacu kugira ngo ntizihave zugaranwa”. Uku "gutsindwa" kwateye uburakari abakoresha imbuga hwaniro zegamiye reta hamwe n’imbuga ngurukanabumenyi zitanga amakuru yo “gukundisha igihugu”, aho bagiriza igisirikare ko cakoze amakosa. Eka n’umutegetsi akomeye wa Tchétchénie /Chechnya, Ramzan Kadyrov, niko abibona. Kadyrov agabisha ati: "Mu gihe uno musi canke ejo ata cohinduka, bizoba ngombwa ko mvugana n’abarongoye ubushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi be n’ubutegetsi bw’igihugu kugira ngo ndabasigurire ingene ibintu bimeze ku rubuga. Ni ibintu dutegerezwa gukurikiranira hagufi. Ni ibintu bitangaje”. Haraciye amezi arenga atandatu Vladimir Putin agomoreye ingabo kuri Ukraine. Mu misi yakurikiye, umuntu yokwibuka ingene abanyaporitike b’Uburusiya, abanyamakuru n’abihweza ibintu n’ibindi ku mboneshakure bavuga ko ico Kremlin yita “igikorwa kidasanzwe ca gisirikare” cari kurangira mu misi mike cane; ko abanyagihugu ba Ukraine bari kwakiriza yompi ingabo z’Uburusiya nk’abaje kubabohora, kandi ko reta ya Ukraine yari gutembagara mu kanya isase. Siko vyagenze. Ahubwo, mu kiringo kirenga amezi atandatu, igisirikare c’Uburusiya kigenda gitakaza urubuga. Rero, ng’iki ikibazo nyamukuru: none ibi birashobora kugira ingaruka za poritike kuri Vladimir Putin? Ivyo ari vyo vyose, mu kiringo kirenga imyaka 20, Putin yarabaye rurangiranwa imbere y’incabwenge z’Uburusiya, ko yamye atsinda urugamba; ko yamye aca mu bihe bigoye cane akabitsinda; mu majambo make ko adashobora gutsindwa. Nkunze kumufata nk’umurusiya karuhariwe yamenyekanye nk’umuhinga mu gukwepa, Harry Houdini. Iyo hari ikintu ico ari co cose kimuzibira canke kimugoye, Putin yamye, igihe cose, abicamwo. Ibintu vyagiye guhinduka kuwa 24 Ruhuhuma (2). Amezi atandatu aheze yerekana ko Perezida Putin yakoze ibiharuro atari vyo na gato ku ngingo yiwe yo gutera Ukraine. Uretse ko yananiwe no gushika ku ntsinzi vuba bwango, Uburusiya bwinjijwe mu ntambara ndende, kandi iriko iratikiriramwo abatari bake, mbere ikaba imaze gutsindwa mu buryo buteye isoni. Iyo ibintu bihindutse ku mutegetsi asanzwe azwi ko adatsindwa, bishobora kumuzanira ingorane. Kahise k’Uburusiya kazotegerezwa kwigisha Vladimir Putin. Abakuru b’ibihugu b’Uburusiya bose barwanye intambara bakazitsindwa muri kahise ntibigeze barangiza neza. Igihe Uburusiya butsindwa n’Ubuyapani, vyavuyemwo impinduka z’Ubutegetsi mu Burusiya (Révolution russe/Russian Revolution) mu 1905. Amakosa ya gisirikare mu gihe c’intambara ya mbere y’isi yose yatumye haba impinduka z’Ubutegetsi mu 2017 zavuyemwo isenyuka z’ubutegetsi bw’igi Tsar. Hagati aho, Perezida Putin nta mugambi afise wo kurangiza intambara atsinzwe. Ejo ku wa mbere, umuvugizi wiwe Dmitry Peskov yabwiye abanyamakuru ati: “Igikorwa kidasanzwe ca gisirikare [c’Uburusiya] kirabandanya kandi kizobandanya gushika aho intumbero zose twihaye kuva mu ntango zizoshikwako”. Ibi bidushikana ku kindi kibazo gikomeye: none Putin azoca akora iki? Ntivyoroshe kuronka umuntu ashobora kuba azi ivyo Vladimir Putin yibaza canke ategura. Vyinshi vyoba biva ku kuri kw’amakuru ahabwa n’abarongoye igisirikare n’ibisata vy’igendereza. Ariko aha hari ibintu bibiri tuzi: ni gake umukuru w’igihugu c’Uburusiya yemera ko yakoze amakosa. Kandi ni gake yemera guhinduka. Dufatiye ku vyo ibinyamakuru vya reta bitangaza, turamaze kubona ibimenyetso vyerekana ko ugutsindwa ku rugamba kuriko kwegekwa ku mfashanyo Ukraine ihabwa n’Uburengero. Imboneshakure ya Reta y’Uburusiya itangaza iti: "Ku mfashanyo ya OTAN/NATO, Kyiv yatanguje igitero co kwivuna”. Hari ikibazo kitoroshe kimaze amezi atari make mu mitwe y’abantu: mu gihe yonanirwa no gutsinda intambara akoresheje ibirwanisho bisanzwe, Perezida Putin azohava yikora ku birwanisho ruhonyanganda vy’ubumara? Mu misi mike gusa iheze, umukuru wa gisirikare wa Ukraine, Valeriy Zaluzhnyi, yagabishije ati: "Hari ubwoba ko ingabo z’Uburusiya, mu bihe kanaka, zishobora gukoresha ibirwanisho vy’ubumara”. Gushika ubu, nta bimenyetso vyerekana ko Kremlin ifise ubwoba. Imboneshakure y’Uburusiya yerekana icizere. Ivuga ko ibisasu vya misire biherutse guterwa ku bigo vy’amasoko ntanganguvu ya Ukraine ari “impinduka zikomeye mu gikorwa kidasanzwe”. Naho ku muyobozi wa Kremlin, ku wa gatandatu uheze - ubwo amakuru yaza avuye muri Ukraine avuga ko Uburusiya bwatakaje ubutaka – asubiye i Moscou, Vladimir Putin yari yisanzuye igihe yariko yugurura urugori rushasha, runini cane ku mugabane wose wa Bulaya. Perezida asa n’uwucizeye ko igikorwa ciwe kidasanzwe kizomugendera neza.

headline: Rishi Sunak agiye kuba umushikiranganji wa mbere wa UK wa mbere w'amamuko ya Asia
text: Rishi Sunak  agiye kuba umushikiranganji wa mbere  wa UK wa mbere w’amamuko ya Asia. Ni inyuma y’aho uwo bari kumwe mw’ihiganwa asokoreye mu kurondera kuba umukuru w’umugambwe w’aba Conservative (canke Tory). Hafi abashingamateka 200 b’aba Conservative bashigikiye ku mugaragaro uwo yahoze ari umushikirikiranganji ajejwe ikigega mu gihe igenwa ryategerezwa kurangira uyu munsi. Umukuru w’inama nshingamateka Penny Mordaunt yasokoye aho ananirirwe no kuronka abamushigikira bakwiye mu bashingakateka imbere y’uko igihe ntarengwa kirangira isaha umunani z’umuhingamo mu masaha yo mu Bwongereza. Bisigura ko Sunak agiye gusubirira Liz Truss  mu kibanza c’umushikiranganji wa mbere inyuma y’aho ibivuye mw’ihiganwa bitangarijwe na Sir Graham Brady, umukuru w’umugwi 1922 utunganya itorwa ry’umukuru w’aba Tory.  Umwami Charles III azoca agena Sunak kugira asubirire Liz Truss yatanze imihoho ku ndwi iheze amaze iminsi 45 gusa ku butegetsi. Gutorwa kwa Sunak kuba umukuru w’aba Tory kubaye ukugaruka vuba cane kw’uwo yahora ari umushikiranganji ajejwe ikigega  inyuma yo kurushwa mw’ihiganwa n’uwo asubiriye  mu minsi iheze. Imigambwe itavuga rumwe n’uwuri ku butegetsi yo imaze iminsi isaba ko haba amatora rusangi ivuga ko Sunak adafise inshingano ya democrasi co kuba umushikiranganji wa mbere. Ayandi matora rusangi ntiyitezwe imbere nibura mu 2024 uhereye aho aba Conservative batsindiye ayaheruka  ku majwi menshi cane mu 2019. S﻿unak yavukiye i Southampton mu 1980 ku bavyeyi bamuka muri Punjab mu Buhindi bimukiye mu Bwongereza mu myaka ya 1960 bavuye muri Afrika y'Ubuseruko.

headline: Burundi – Rwanda: Ni igiki kigiye gukurikira inyuma y'amajambo meza?
text: Imigenderanire y'u Burundi n'u Rwanda imaze imyaka itandatu yifashe nabi, ariko guhera kw'igenekerezo rya mbere uku kwezi biraboneka ko igomba gufata intumbero nshasha. Inyuma y'uko u Rwanda rurungitse umushikiranganji wa mbere mu birori vyo guhimbaza isabukuru igira 59 y'ukwikukira kw'Uburundi, Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye yavyise "igitangaza", akavuga ko ibihugu vyompi bigomba kwandika "ikigabane gishasha mu migenderanire yavyo". Ariko inyuma y'ibi, Abarundi n'Abanyarwanda babandanya kwibaza niba ibibazo vyariho biheze, mbere bakibaza ikigiye gukurikira inyuma y'amajambo meza. Cyprien Mbonimpa yahoze ari umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire n'amakungu w'Uburundi avuga ati: "Mu gifaransa bavuga umugani ngo 'une hirondelle ne fait pas le printemps'… ubu ntiwovuga ngo vyose biratunganye". Abantu ibihumbi vyinshi barahomvye cane mu budandaji n'imigenderanire hagati y'ibi bihugu bisangiye vyinshi kubera imishamirano ya politike hahati ya Kigali na Gitega. Uburundi bwagiriza u Rwanda guha indaro abashatse gutembagaza ubutegetsi bw'umuhisi Presida Pierre Nkurunziza, u Rwanda narwo rukagiriza Uburundi guha inzira abagomba gutera ico gihugu. Avuga ku kibazo bafitaniye n'u Rwanda mu ntango z'ukwezi kw'umunani umwaka uheze, Perezida Ndayishimiye yagize ati: "Ntitwifuza y'uko tugirana imigenderanire n'igihugu gikoresha uburyarya, igihugu c'iciyorobetsi". Kuri ivyo, u Rwanda rwishuye ko rwabonye Uburundi "ata bushake bwo kubana neza n'u Rwanda bufise". Gusa munyuma abategetsi mu gisirikare n'abashikiranganji barahuye ku mbibe z'ibi bihugu barayaga. Mbonimpa abona ko intambwe yatewe kw'itariki ya mbere z'uku kwezi ari "ikintu co gushimira abakuru b'ibihugu bompi…, ni ikintu ciza cane." Mbonimpa avuga ko ubu ata wovuga "ngo vyose biratunganye" kuko ibibazo bikiriho, avuga ati: "Hariho umugani baca mu gifaransa ngo 'une hirondelle ne fait pas le printemps (mu kirundi wosigura uti: intamba imwe ibonetse ntibisigura ko urushana ruheze)'. Yongera ati: "Si ubwa mbere u Rwanda n'uburundi tugira ibibazo hagati yacu, kuva twikukiye haragiye haraba ibibazo vyo kutumvikana mugabo ikintu cagumye kiriho ni uko abakuru baguma bavugana, babonana. "Bigatuma n'ubwo habaho ibintu badahuje ata ntambara yigeze iba hagati y'u Rwanda n'Uburundi ngo baterane, barwane." Mbonimpa avuga ko urugendo rw'umushikiranganji wa mbere w'u Rwanda rwerekana ko abakuru b'ibihugu bariko barayaga ku bibazo biriho ngo babitorere inyishu. Abarundi n'Abanyarwanda bariteze cane igihe bazongera kugenderanira, gukorana ubudandaji nka mbere ya 2015. Niyo nyungu niniya biteze yova ku banyepolitike babatwaye. Ariko biraboneka ko hari ibizobanza kuba kugira bigere kuri urwo rwego. Mbonimpa ati: "Narumvise Perezida Ndayishimiye ashimira ko umukuru w'u Rwanda yarungitse intumwa mu birori twarimwo kandi akavuga ati 'ubucuti bugirwa n'akarenge'. "Bivuga y'uko ko umutegetsi w'u Rwanda yaje i Burundi kumbure mu minsi iza hoba umutegetsi w'u Burundi agenda mu Rwanda. "Hanyuma rero ibintu vyo guterana amajambo bikagabanuka ntibisubire, ibibazo ntibiheze igihambaye ni uko bakomeza kubivugana, ubuzima hagati y'ibihugu bibiri bukabandanya, Abanyarwanda bakaza i Burundi Abarundi bakagenda i Rwanda."

headline: Ethiopia -Tigray: 'Koresha ibigwanisho ivyo ari vyo vyose mufise' mu kugwanya TPLF-akamo ka Abiy Ahmed
text: Umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Ethiopia Abiy Ahmed yasavye abamushigikiye gukoresha ibigwanisho ivyo ari vyo vyose bashobora kuronka kugira bahagarike ugusugerezwa n'ingabo z'inyeshamba za Tigray. Abiy yavuze ko ari inshingano z'umunyagihugu wese ''kuzibira, gusambura no guhamba" ingabo z'inyeshamba za Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF). Ni wo mugambwe wahora utwara intara ya Tigray imbere y'uko  haduka intambara hagati yawo na reta ya Ethiopia. Ako kamo umushikiranganji wa mbere yagateye abicishije kuri Facebook inyuma y'aho inyeshamba zivugiye ko zigaruriye  utundi turere mu ntara ya Amhara, gutyo zikaba ziriko ziregereza umurwa mukuru, Addis Ababa. Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika (US)  zivuga ko zitewe impungenge cane n'amakuru y'uko ingabo z'inyeshamba za Tigray zigaruriye ibisagara bibiri vya Dessie na Kombolcha. Umunyamabanga wa reta (umushikiranganji ajejwe imigenderanire wa US,  Antony Blinken), yanditse kuri twitter ati: "uko intambara ikomeza ni ko hakomeza akaga ku bantu bo mu buraruko bwa Ethiopia", aca asaba impande zose guhagarika  ibikorwa vyo kugwana. Reta ya Ethiopia irahakana ivyemezwa n'inyeshamba za TPLF ko zafashe igisagara ca Dessie n'akarere vyegeranye ka Kombolcha mu ntara ya Amhara. Umwe mu bavugizi ba TPLF, Getachew Reda, yavuze ko bafashe Kombolcha kandi ko intego yabo yonyene ari ukugira bugururire iyo ntara bavuga yo yugawe na reta ya Addis Ababa. Uburyo bwo gutumatumanako n'iyo ntara ahanini bwarahagaritswe kandi imfashanyo ikenewe cane ntishobora gushikayo. Ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU rigereranya ko abantu 400.000 muri iyo ntara babayeho nko mu bihe vy'amapfa inyuma y'umwaka urangiye iyo ntambara itanguye.

headline: Igisirikare ca Ethiopia cishe Seyoum Mesfin yahoze ari umushikiranganji w’imigenderanire
text: Igisirikare ca Ethiopia gitangaza ko cishe uwahoze ari umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire Seyoum Mesfin, akaba yari umwe mu bashinze umugambwe Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF) wahora urongoye intara ya Tigray. Uyu yabaye umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire kuva mu 1991 gushika 2010, yicanywe n'abandi bategetsi batatu bo hejuru b'umugambwe TPLF muri iyo ntara ya Tigray inyuma y'aho bankiye kwishikana, nk'uko bivugwa n'igisirikare. Inyuma y'ukuba umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire, Seyoum yahawe amabanga yo guserukira Ethiopia mu Bushinwa. Azwi ko ari we yakomeje imigenderanire hagati y'Ubushinwa na Ethiopia - kimwe mu bihugu vya Afrika gifise abanyamitahe benshi b'Abashinwa. Reta ya Ethiopia yari yasohoye umutahe wo kumuhagarika - co kimwe n'abandi bategetsi bakuru b'uyo mugambwe - inyuma y'intambara yabereye muri Tigray mu kw'icumi na rimwe guheze. Agashimwe kangana n'ibihumbi 254,000 vy'amadorari y'abanyamerika niko kari kemerewe umuntu yari gutanga amakuru yari gushobora gufasha kubahagarika. Igisirikare kivuga ko basabwe kwishikana ariko baranana. Kivuga kandi ko abategetsi batari bake ba TPLF bishwe abandi barahagarikwa mu bikorwa vya gisirikare biheruka. Umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Ethiopia Abiy Ahmed yaragomoye ingabo zirwanira mu kirere no hasi ku wa 04 z'ukwa cumi na rimwe kugira ngo yirukane uyo mugambwe ku butegetsi, ni inyuma y'aho ingabo zawo zifatiye ibirindiro vya gisirikare vy'igihugu. Yahavuye atangaza intsinzi ya reta muri Tigray inyuma y'intambara zamaze ukwezi, ariko abategetsi ba TPLF bashoboye guhunga batangaje ko bari biteguriye kubandanya intambara.

headline: COP26: Biden aranegura cane abakuru b'ibihugu vya China na Russia kubera batitavye inama
text: Perezida Joe Biden wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika aranegura abakuru b'ibihugu vy'Ubushinwa n'Uburusiya kubona batitavye inama mpuzamakungu COP26 yiga ikibazo c'ihindagurika ry'ikirere. Mw'ijambo yaraye ashikirije mw'ijoro ryo ku wa kabiri, Perezida Biden avuga ko ikibazo c'ikirere ari "ikibazo gikomeye cane", ariko ko Ubushinwa "bwiyonjoroye" - yongerako kandi ko "ari co kimwe n'Uburusiya hamwe na Putin". Yaba Perezida Vladimir Putin w'Uburusiya canke Xi Jinping w'Ubushinwa, nta n'umwe ari muri iyi nama mpuzamakungu yo mu gisagara ca Glasgow muri Ecosse (Scotland). Hagati aho, ibi bihugu vyompi vyararungitse intumwa muri bino biganiro vyitezwe kumara indwi zibiri gushika ku wa 12 z'uku kwa cumi na rimwe. Ubushinwa ni co gihugu ca mbere kw'isi gisohora ivyuka vya gaz carbonique (carbon dioxide) bihumanya ikirere, bugakurikirwa na Amerika. Uburusiya buza ku mwanya wa gatanu inyuma y'Ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya n'Ubuhindi. Abategetsi b'ibihugu barenga 120 bari muri iyi nama. Hari ibihugu bimaze gutangaza imigambi mikuru mikuru ijanye no kurwanya ihindagurika ry'ikirere, harimwo kugabanya urugero rw'imyuka ya methane kw'isi gushika mu 2030, hamwe no guhagarika guhonya amashamba imbere y'uwo mwaka nyene. Ubushinwa n'Uburusiya vyompi vyarateye igikumu ku masezerano yo gukingira amashamba cimeza. Imbere y'uko Perezida Biden ashikiriza ijambo ryiwe, Perezida Putin yarashikirije ijambo yifashishije ubuhinga bwa videwo mu nama yariko yiga ivyo gukingira amashamba cimeza muri iryo koraniro rya COP26 ejo ku wa kabiri, aho yavuze ko Uburusiya bwafashe "ingingo ruhasha mu ntumbero yo kubungabunga" amashamba cimeza, nk'uko biri mw'itangazo ry'ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu, Kremlin. Perezida Biden yashikirije aya majambo igihe yari abajijwe uruhara ibindi bihugu - harimwo Ubushinwa, Uburusiya na Arabie Saoudite - bimaze kugira gushika ubu muri ibi biganiro. Ati: "Ni vyo ko Ubushinwa buriko bugerageza kwiha ikibanza gishasha, kandi ni ibintu vyumvikana, kw'isi nk'igihugu c'igihangange - ariko kubona butitavye, oya n'ukuri", yongerako ko kubona Xi Jinping atitavye ari "ikosa rikomeye". Yavuze nk'uko nyene kuri Perezida Putin, aho yavuze ko amashamba y'Uburusiya ariko arasha ariko umukuru wabwo "akaguma anumye" kuri iki kibazo. Igihe batangaza iyi ngingo mu kw'icumi, umuvugizi wa Putin Dmitry Peskov nta nsiguro yatanze zari gutuma uyu mukuru w'igihugu atitaba ibiganiro, n'aho yavuze ko ikibazo c'ihindagurika ry'ikirere ari ikibazo "nkoramutima" ku Burusiya. Muri uko kwezi nyene, abategetsi baragabishije umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza Boris Johnson ko umukuru w'igihugu c'Ubushinwa Xi Jinping ata mugambi yari afise wo kwitaba iri koraniro. Bivugwa ko Perezida Xi atarigera ava mu gihugu kuva mu ntango za 2020. Mu kwezi kw'icenda, Perezida Xi yatangaje ko gushika mu mwaka wa 2060 Ubushinwa bwihaye intego yo kuzoba bwashize ku rugero rumwe imyuka ihumanya ikirere n'ivyo bukora ngo bugisukure. Ico gihe, yanavuze ko imbere y'umwaka wa 2030 imyuka ihumanya ikirere Ubushinwa busohora izoba yageze ku rugero rwo hejuru rushoboka, hanyuma rugatangura kugabanuka. Mw'ijambo yashikirije mu nama mpuzamakungu yerekeye amasoko ntanganguvu ku wa 13 z'ukw'icumi, Perezida Putin yavuze ko Uburusiya nabwo nyene bugiye kwita ku rutare kugira ngo gushika mu 2060 buzobe ata vyuka bihumanya buzoba bugisohora. Intego y'isi yo kugera kuri 0% mu gusohora imyuka ihumanya ikirere (Net Zero), bisigura ko ata gusubira gusohora ibindi vyuka bibi bija guhumanya ikirere.

headline: Sudan: Igisirikare kigiye gusubizaho umushikiranganji wa mbere Hamdok yaheruka kubogozwa
text: Umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Sudani yari aherutse kubogozwa mu kwezi guheze, Abdalla Hamdok, agiye gusubizwa ubutegetsi, inyuma y'igihe yari amaze mu minwe y'igisirikare cari camubogoje. Abahuza bavuga ko abapfungiwe ivya poritike bose bazorekurwa nk'uko biri mu masezerano yashitsweko hagati y'igisirikare, abategetsi b'abasivire hamwe n'imirwi y'inyeshamba yahoze irwanya reta.
