Ku wa 25 z'ukwa cumi, umutegetsi wa gisirikare yatangaje amategeko adasanzwe, kandi ko ubutegetsi bwa  gisivire buhagaritswe. Ibi vyatumye haduka imyiyerekano y'urutavanako yahitanye abantu batari bake bahasize ubuzima. Aya masezerano yashitsweko nijoro ku wa gatandatu mw'ijoro, akaba yiteze kuja mu ngiro kuri uyu wa Mungu, nk'uko vyemezwa n'umukuru w'umugambwe Umma Party, Fadlallah Burma Nasir. Umurwi w'abahuza, wari ugizwe n'abigisha bo mu mashure ya kaminuza, abamenyeshamakuru n'abanyaporitike, barasooye itangazo ryerekana ibiri muri aya masezerano. Rivuga ko umushikiranganji wa mbere Hamdok n'abagize reta yiwe bapfunzwe igihe ubutegetsi bwiwe butembagazwa bazorekurwa kandi ko azoca asubira mu kibanza ciwe c'umushikiranganji wa mbere. Rivuga kandi ko amategeko agenga ubutegetsi mfatakibanza bwa Sudani butegura intwaro rusangi azoca asubizwaho. Abategetsi ba gisirikare n'abasivire barumvikanye ingene basangira ubutegetsi kuva mu kwa munani 2019, inyuma y'aho intwaro y'uwari arongoye iki gihugu imyaka myinshi Omar al-Bashir itembagarijwe. Uwu mwumvikano wagiye gutosekara mu kwezi uheze igihe umutegetsi wa gisirikare Jenerali Abdel Fattah Abdelrahman Burhan akuriyeho uruhande rwa gisivire ruri muri reta, aca apfunga abategetsi barwo. Yavuze ko atari itembagazwa ry'ubutegetsi, ko ahubwo yari ingingo yari ikenewe kugira ngo ntihabe intambara yari igiye kwaduka kubera abanyaporitike bariko bagumura abanyagihugu babateranya n'inzego zijejwe umutekano. Yaciye yigena nk'umukuru w'inama nkuru irongoye igihugu, akikijwe n'abasirikare hamwe n'abahoze bahoze barongoye iyari imirwi y'inyeshamba. Mu bisagara bitari bike harimwo n'umugwa mukuru Khartoum, abari mu myiyerekano barazibiye amabarabara baturira n'amapine, mu kwerekana agashavu kabo ko utwigoro two gushika ku ntwaro rusangi twanigiwe mu menshi. Igisirikare caciye gikoresha inguvu, mbere kikagirizwa ko carashe abari muri yo. Aya masezerano mashasha aje mu gihe hari hategekanijwe iyindi myiyerekano kuri uyu wa Mungu. Amakungu yariyamirije iri tembagazwa ry'ubutegetsi anasaba ko abapfungiwe ivya poritike barekurwa. Ibanki y'isi yarahagaritse imfashanyo yahabwa Sudani, Ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Afrika naryo rica rihagarika iki gihugu.

headline: Pelosi muri Taiwan: China ishobora kwerekana ko ikomeye kubera uru rugendo - US
text: Umutegetsi wo ku rwego rwo hejuru mu mugambwe w'aba-Democrats uri ku butegetsi muri Amerika, Nancy Pelosi, ari muri Taiwan mu muce w'urugendo arimwo muri Aziya, naho Ubushinwa bwari bwagabishije. Uru rugendo, rudashigikiwe na Prezida Biden, ni rwo rwambere rugizwe muri Taiwan n'umutegetsi akomeye wa Amerika mu kiringo c'imyaka mirongo. Ubushinwa bubona Taiwan, isa n'iyigenga, nk'intara yayo yiyonkoye ariko bitebe bitebuke ikaba izosubira kuba igice c'igihugu. Uburusiya n'Ubushinwa vyari vyagabishije Amerika yuko urugendo rwa Pelosi ari agasombororotsi kandi ko ruhungabanya. Maison Blanche/White House (ibiro vy’umukuru w’igihugu wa Amerika) iragabisha ko Ubushinwa bushobora gusotora bukoresheje uburyo bwa gisirikare mu kwihora urugendo ruteje impari rwa Nancy Pelosi  muri Taiwan. Muri aka gasotoro harimwo gutera ibisasu vya misire hafi ya Taiwan, canke ibikorwa vya gisirikare bikomeye mu kirere canke mu mazi, nk’uko umuvugizi wa Maison Blanche John Kirby abivuga. Ibinyamakuru vya Taiwan na Amerika bivuga ko ategekanya kugendera Taipei (umugwa mukuru wa Taiwan), ariko ntibiremezwa na reta ya Amerika. Pékin/Beijing (umugwa mukuru w’Ubushinwa) igabisha ko hazoba “inkurikizi zikomeye” mu gihe Pelosi yoramuka agiyeyo. Mu gihe Amerika ibandanya ico yita “imigenderanire ikomeye ariko itazwi” na Taiwan, ifitaniye imigenderanire n’Ubushinwa izwi, ariko atari Taiwan. Ku wa mbere, umuserukizi w’Ubushinwa muri ONU Zhang Jun yaragabishije ko uru rugendo rushobora guhungabanya imigenderanire hagati ya Pékin na Washington, nk’uko itororokanirizo ry’amakuru Reuters rivyandika. Impande zompi mu migambwe ibiri irwanira ubutegetsi muri Amerika zirashigikiye cane Taiwan, co kimwe no mu nama nshingamateka na nkenguzamateka. Ni mu gihe Pelosi, umutegetsi mukuru mu mugambwe w’aba Democrats, kuva kera yamye anegura ubutegetsi bw’Ubushinwa, yiyamiriza ihonyanga ry’agateka ka zina muntu ryo ku rwego rwo hejuru. Yarigeze kubonana n’abarwanira intwaro rusangi mbere aragendera ikibanza ciswe Tiananmen Square i Pékin mu kwibuka abaguye mu bwicanyi bwo mu 1989. Uyu mukuru w’inama nshingamateka yatanguye urugendo rwiwe muri Aziya ku wa Mungu, bikaba bitegekanijwe ko aca muri Singapour, Malaysia, Korea y’Epfo no mu Buyapani. Yategekanya kugendera Taiwan mu kwa kane, ariko yarungurije urugendo rwiwe inyuma y’aho yanduriye Covid-19. Mu ntango za kuno kwezi, Pelosi yavuze ko vyari “nkenerwa kuri twebwe kwereka Taiwan ko tuyishigikiye”. Perezida Joe Biden avuga ko igisirikare ca Amerika cemera ko urugendo rwa Pelosi muri Taiwan atari “iciyumviro ciza muri kino gihe”. Ku wa mbere, umuvugizi wa Maison Blanche mu gisata c’umutekano w’igihugu John Kirby yavuze ko mu vyo Ubushinwa bushobora gukora mu kwunyura ibintu ari “ugushinga imanza z’amanyanga” mu misi iri imbere, nk’akarorero bukavuga ko Umuhora wa Taiwan (Détroit de Taïwan / Taiwan Strait ) atari umugezi mpuzamakungu. Avuga ko ibindi bimenyetso vyerekana ko Pékin ishobora kurungika indege z’itambara muri iryo zinga, nka kimwe mu bigize ibikorwa vyo kuvogera ikirere ca Taiwan. Kirby asigura ko uwahoze ari umukuru w’inama nshingamateka w’Umurepubulika Newt Gingrich yigeze kugendera Taiwan mu 1997, kandi ko n’abandi bashingamateka ba Amerika bagendeye Taiwan mu ntango z’uno mwaka. Avuga ati: "Nta cahindutse. Ntaco twovuga kidasanzwe. Si bwo bwa mbere umukuru w’inama nshingamateka azoba agendeye Taiwan”. Yongerako y’uko Pelosi arerurwa n’indege za Amerika muri uru rugendo rwo muri Aziya. Mw’ijambo yashikirije muri ONU, umunyamabanga wa Amerika ajejwe imigenderanire Antony Blinken asaba Ubushinwa kwinengesera mu gihe Pelosi yogendera Taiwan. Inyuma y’ibiganiro vyo kurwanya ibirwanisho vya nikleyeri i New York, Blinken yabwiye abanyamakuru ati: "Mu gihe umukuru w’inama nshingamateka yofata ingingo yo gukora uru rugendo, hanyuma Ubushinwa bukagerageza guteza ingorane canke naho bugatuma ibintu vyunyuka, vyose bizoba biri ku gatwe ka Pékin”. "Turiteze ko – mu gihe yoramuka afashe ingingo yo kugendera Taiwan – ivyo bokora vyose bokwinengesera hagukora ikintu ico ari co cose cotuma ibintu vyunyuka”.

headline: Intambara ya Ukraine: Russia ntiyera de, ariko ntimaramazwa no kwerekana ico iri - Lavrov
text: Steve Rosenberg\nUmwanditsi mukuru wa BBC mu rurimi rw'ikirusiya, Moscow Kuva igisirikare c’Uburusiya giteye Ukraine, haraciye hafi amezi ane, ibihumbi n’ibihumbi vy’abasivire baramaze kwicwa, ibisagara bitari bike navyo bicika umunyota, mu gihe imiriyoni z’abanya-Ukraine nabo bataye izabo. Ariko ejo ku wa kane, umushikiranganji w’imigenderanire Sergei Lavrov yarandavye mu maso ambwira ko ibintu bitari uko abantu bibaza. Ati: “Twebwe ntitwateye Ukraine”. “Twatangaje igikorwa kidasanzwe ca gisirikare kubera ata yindi nzira twari dusigaje yo gusigurira Uburengero ko kurondera kwinjiza Ukraine muri OTAN/NATO cari icaha”. Kuva Uburusiya buteye Ukraine ku wa 24 Ruhuhuma (2), umushikiranganji Lavrov ni gake yari amaze guha ikiganiro ibinyamakuru vyo mu bihugu vy’Uburengero. Asubiramwo amajambo avugwa na Kremlin (ibiro vy’umukuru w’igihugu c’Uburusiya) ko muri Ukraine harimwo aba-Nazi. Abategetsi b’Uburusiya bakunze kuvuga ko igisirikare cabo kiriko “kirakura ivyiyumviro vy’iki-Nazi” mu gihugu. Lavrov aherutse guteza uburakari igihe agerageza gusigura amajambo yafashwe nk’ibitutsi ku mukuru w’igihugu ca Ukraine, nawe akaba ari Umuyahudi, mu kuvuga mu buryo bw’agasuzuguro ko Adolf Hitler yari afise “amaraso y’Abayahudi”. Namusubiriyemwo icegeranyo c’ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU ku bijanye n’ikigwati ca Yahidne mu ntara ya Chernihiv muri Ukraine, kivuga ko “abantu 360, harimwo abana 74 na batanu bafise ubumuga, bahatiwe n’ingabo z’Uburusiya kumara imisi 28 yose bari mu vyumba vyo mu kuzimu kw’ishure rimwe .... Nta tuzu twa surwumwe twarimwo, nta n’amazi...abatama 10 muri bo barapfuye”. Nca ndamubaza nti: “None uko ni kwo kurwanya Abanazi”? Yishuye ati: “Birababaje cane, ariko abaserukira ibihugu n’amashirahamwe mpuzamakungu, harimwo umukuru w’ishami rya ONU rijejwe agateka ka zina muntu, Umunyamabanga mukuru wa ONU n’abandi baserukira ONU, bariko baraterwa igitsure n’Uburengero”. “Uburusiya ntibwera de. Uburusiya buri ico buri. Kandi ntitumaramazwa no kwerekana ico turi”. Lavrov w’imyaka 72, amaze imyaka 18 aserukira Uburusiya ku rwego mpuzamakungu, ariko we n’umukobwa wiwe barafatiwe ibihano n’ibihugu vyo mu Burengero. Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zimwagiriza ko abandanya ashikiriza amajambo y’ibinyoma mu kuvuga ko Ukraine ari yo ibasotora, kandi ko ari we abazwa igitero c’Uburusiya nk’umwe mu bagize Inama Nkuru y’igihugu ijejwe umutekano. Niho rero nahava ndamubaza ibijanye n’imigenderanire y’Uburusiya n’Ubwongereza. Iki gihugu kiri ku rutonde rw’ibihugu vy’abansi b’Uburusiya, nca mvuga ko kuvuga y’uko imigenderanire ari mibi kwoba ari ukworosha ibintu. Lavrov yishuye ati: “Sinibaza ko hoba hari iyindi nzira yoba isigaye kuko yaba [Umushikiranganji wa mbere Boris] Johnson canke [Liz] Truss, bompi bavuga amenya ngo ni ngombwa ko dukubita hasi Uburusiya, ni ngombwa ko dukora ibishoboka vyose Uburusiya bugapfukama. Bandanye, bikore rero!”. Hari mu kwezi guheze igihe umushikiranganji w’Ubwongereza ajejwe imigenderanire yavuga ko umukuru w’igihugu c’Uburusiya Vladimir Putin yariko yiteza urubwa we nyene ku rubuga mpuzamakungu, kandi ko “dutegerezwa gukora ibishoboka vyose kugira atsindwe muri Ukraine”. Mbajije Lavrov ingene abona Ubwongereza ubu, yavuze ko “bwasubiriye guta inyungu z’abanyagihugu mu kaga ku nyungu z’abanyaporitike”. Narongeye ndamubaza ivyerekeye Abongereza babiri baherutse gucirirwa urubanza rwo gupfa n’abategetsi b’akarere gashaka kwiyonkora bashigikiwe n’Uburusiya mu buseruko bwa Ukraine. Ndamubwiye ko mu maso y’ibihugu vy’Uburengero Uburusiya ari bwo bubazwa ibizobabako vyose, yishuye ati: “Jewe amaso y’ibihugu vy’Uburengero nta na kimwe ambwiye. Jewe ndajwe ishinga n’amategeko mpuzamakungu. Nk’uko amategeko mpuzamakungu abivuga, abacangero ntibafatwa nk’abarwanyi”. Nishuye ko aba bagabo bari basanzwe mu gisirikare ca Ukraine kandi ko batari abacangero, hanyuma Lavrov aca avuga ko ivyo bitegerezwa kwihwezwa na sentare. Yahavuye yagiriza BBC ko idashira ahabona ukuri ku vyamye bishikira abasivire bo mu turere turi mu minwe y’abarwanyi dushaka kwiyonkora mu buseruko bwa Ukraine, “aho abasivire bari bamaze imyaka umunani baterwa amabombe n’ingabo za Kyiv”. Nashimangiye ko mu myaka itandatu yose iheze, BBC yavuganye incuro nyinshi n’abategetsi bo mu turere dushaka kwiyonkora isaba uruhusha rwo kwinjira kugira ngo yibonere ivyariko biraba. Igihe cose twabigerageje baratwimye uruhusha. Uburusiya bwagiriza Ukraine ihonyabwoko. Ariko mu 2021, abasivire umunani barishwe mu turere turi mu minwe y’inyeshamba, nk’uko bivugwa n’abategetsi b’ubutere twegamiye Uburusiya dutangaza ko twigenga, hamwe rero n’abandi indwi mu mwaka w’imbere y’aho. Navuze ko mu gihe ubwicanyi ubwo ari bwo bwose ari akaga, ubu bwobwo ntibwabaye ihonyabwoko. Navuze nti nimba koko harabaye ihonyabwoko, abategetsi b’uturere dushaka kwiyonkora twa Luhansk na Donetsk bari kwumva ko bikenewe ko baduha uruhusha tukinjira. Namubajije nti “kubera iki batwankiye?”. Yishuye ati: “Ntavyo nzi”.

headline: Wa mutegetsi wa Huawei yari yafashwe na US yarekuwe, China nayo ica irekura abanya Canada babiri
text: Icuka kibi kiri hagati y'Ubushinwa n'ibihugu vyo mu burengero gisa n'ikiriko kirahera inyuma y'aho wa mutegetsi wa Huawei yari apfungiwe muri Canada arekuriwe, hanyuma Ubushinwa nabwo bugaca burekura abanya Canada babiri bwari bwarapfunze. Meng Wanzhou ajejwe ikigega mw'ikompanyi ikora ama terefone Huawei yari yafashwe mu 2018 ku mutahe wasohowe na Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, akaba yarekuwe ejo ku wa gatanu habaye umwumvikano n'abashikirizamanza ba Amerika, aca asubira mu Bushinwa. Haciye amasaha make, haciye hatangazwa ko Michael Spavor na Michael Kovrig nabo bari mu nzira batashe muri Canada, inyuma y'imyaka bari bamaze bapfungiwe mu Bushinwa bagirizwa maneko muri uyo mwaka nyene, Pékin/Beijing irahakana ko itapfunze aba banya Canada mu kwihora ihagarikwa ry'umupfasoni Meng. Ariko abanegura Ubushinwa bavuga ko iki gihugu cabakoresha mu rugamba rwabwo rwa poritike. Aba bagabo bompi bagumye bahakana ivyo bagirizwa muri ico gihe cose. Mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru, umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Canada Justin Trudeau yavuze ko bari babaye mu "mahano atagira izina". Yongerako ati: "Ni inkuru nziza kwumva ko bari mu nzira basubira mu miryango yabo. Mu minsi 1000 iheze, barerekanye inguvu, ukwihangana, n'ubuntu". Umushikiranganji wa mbere yavuze ko mu gaturuturu ko kuri uyu wa gatandatu ari ho bari bitezwe muri Canada. Baherekejwe na Dominic Barton aserukira Canada mu Bushinwa. Mu kwa munani guheze, sentare yo mu Bushinwa yari yaciriye  Spavor umunyororo w'imyaka 11 ku caha ca maneko. Kovrig wewe ntiyari bwasomerwe. Mw'itangazo yasohoye, umunyamabanga wa Amerika ajejwe imigenderanire Antony Blinken avuga ko igihugu ciwe "kinezerejwe" n'ingingo y'Ubushinwa, ariko yongerako y'uko aba bagabo batuntujwe "imyaka irenga ibiri n'igice yose  bapfunzwe kandi bazira ubusa". Imbere y'uko arekurwa, umupfasoni Meng - umukobwa w'umutunzi karuhariwe Ren Zhengfei yashinze ikompanyi y'Ubushinwa y'amaterefone ngendanwa Huawei - yaremeye ko yayobeje abajejwe amatohoza ba Amerika ku vyerekeye ibikorwa vy'ubucuruzi Huawei yakorana na Irani. Yari amaze imyaka itatu yose apfungiwe muri Canada, aho hose akaba yari mu rugamba rwo kubuza ko ajanwa muri Amerika. Ejo ku wa gatanu, umucamanza wa Canada yategetse ko umupfasoni Meng, ajejwe ikigega muri Huawei arekurwa, inyuma y'aho ashikiye ku masezerano n'abashikirizamanza ba Amerika ku vyo bamwagiriza vya magendo. Ahagaze kuri sentare ya  Vancouver amaze kurekurwa, yabwiye abanyamakuru ati:  "Mu myaka itatu nari maze, ubuzima bwanje bwaratosekaye". Abandanya ati: "Ikintu ico ari co cose kibi cama gifise uruhande rwiza. Sinzigera nibagira abantu bose kw'isi yose bampojeje". Mu nyuma yacishije ubutumwa ku rubuga rwa Twitter aho ashimira umugambwe w'abakomunista, reta y'Ubushinwa "n'igihugu ciwe c'amavukiro". Huawei nayo yasohoye itangazo aho ivuga ko irindiranye igishika cinshi co kubona umupfasoni Meng asubiye mu muryango, inavuga ko izobandanya yisigura muri sentare. Imbere y'uko ahagarikwa, abashikirizamanza ba Amerika bamwagirije magendo, bavuga ko yayobeje amabanki mu bucuruzi bwa Huawei bwahonyanze ibihano Amerika yafatiye Irani. Igisata c'ubucamanza ca Amerika kivuga ko kibandanya citegurira urubanza na Huawei, ikompanyi ikiri ku rutonde rwirabura rwa amerika. Umupfasoni Meng ni  umukobwa mukuru w'umutunzi karuhariwe Ren Zhengfei yashinze ikompanyi Huawei mu 1987 , akaba yaranabaye umusirikare w'Ubushinwa mu kiringo c'imyaka icenda. Huawei yo nyene ubwayo niyo kompanyi nini gusumba izindi zose kw'isi  ikora ibikoresho vy'itumatumanako. Imaze igihe yagirizwa ko abategetsi b'Ubushinwa bashobora gukoresha ibikoresho vyayo mu bikorwa vya maneko - ivyo Huawei yamirira kure. Mu 2019, Amerika yarafatiye ibihano Huawei ica iyishira ku rutonde rwirabura rw'amakompanyi ashora ibintu hanze, yongera iyibuza gukoresha ubuhinga bwa amerika. Ubwongereza, Suede, Australia n'Ubuyapani, na vyo nyene vyarahagaritse  Huawei, mu gihe ibindi bihugu harimwo Ubufaransa n'Ubuhindi bwafashe ingingo zisa n'izo kuyihagarika.

headline: EU – Burundi: Bateye intambwe ya mbere mu kunagura imigenderanire
text: Inyuma y'imyaka itanu yaranzwe n'icuka kibi hagati y'Uburundi n'umuryango w'ubumwe bw'ibihugu vya Buraya (UE/EU) izi mpande zibiri zaraye zishinze umushinge wo gusubira kunagura imigenderanire. Iyo migenderanira yari yarahagaze kuva mu 2015 kubera ukutumvikana ku bibazo bimwe bimwe, ariko ubu imyango ikaba isubiye kwugururwa nk'uko vyandikwa n'urubuga ngurukanabumenyi rw'ibiryo vy'umukuru w'igihugu. Ejo ku wa mbere, Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye w'Uburundi yarahaye umubonano uwuserukira uyu muryango aherekejwe n'abaserukira ibihugu biri muri uwo muryango bifise ivyicaro i Bujumbura. Ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu bimenyesha ko izi mpande zompi zumvikanye "kwibagira akahise zikibanda kuri kazoza maze zikanagura imigenderanire". Kuva hadutse indyane za politike mu 2015 bivuye ku ngingo ya nyakwigendera Perezida Petero Nkurunziza yo gusubira kwitoreza ikiringo kigira gatatu - abamurwanya bavuga ko gihonyanga ibwirizwa shingiro, ariko we n'abo mu mugambwe CNDD-FDD bavuga ko cari gikurikije amategeko - imigenderanire hagati y'izi mpande yaratitutse, zompi zikitana ba mwana. Inyuma y'uwo mubonano, ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu vyamenyesheje ko abaserukira ibihugu vy'umuryango w'Ubumwe bw'ibihugu vya Buraya bemeye gukora uko bashoboye kugira ngo uyu Muryango ufate mu mugongo inzego z'Uburundi mu migambi y'iterambere, cane cane bishimikije ya migambi nyamukuru itandatu yashirwa imbere na Perezida Ndayishimiye. Nk'uko bibandanya bivugwa n'ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu, abo baserukira ibihugu vyo muri uyo muryango mu Burundi bamenyesheje ko "hageze y'uko bakemura ibibazo batumvikanako mu bwubahane". Ku ruhande rw'umuryango w'Ubumwe bw'ibihugu vya Buraya, uwu mubonano ni umushinge wa kazoza keza mu migenderanire hagati y'Uburundi n'uyu muryango, nk'uko bivugwa na Claude Bochu, awuserukira mu Burundi. Kuva haduka indyane za 2015 zagiye kuvamwo ukugerageza gutembagaza ubutegetsi ku wa 13 z'ukwa gatanu uwo mwaka, reta y'Uburundi yamye yagiriza umuryango w'Ubumwe bw'ibihugu vya Buraya ko ari wo ntandaro yazo, mbere ko inahaye indaro bamwe mu bashatse gutembagaza ubutegetsi. Uyu muryango nawo wahavuye uranahagarika imfashanyo wahora uha Uburundi, ukagiriza reta ko yariko ihonyanga agateka ka zina muntu, amasezerano ya Arusha,  kandi ko yariko irenga ku ngingo ya 96 iri mu masezerano yiswe Amasezerano ya Cotonou yo gufashanya hagati y'uyu muryango n'ibihugu bigize ACP.

headline: Amerika iriyamiriza Ubushinwa ku myimenyerezo yabwo ivugwa yo gutera Taiwan
text: Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zagiriza Pékin/Beijing (umugwa mukuru w’Ubushinwa) ko ikora ibikorwa vyo “gusotora” kandi “bidafise ishingiro” inyuma y’aho Taiwan itangarije ko Ubushinwa bwakoze imyimenyerezo yo gutera iri zinga. Ibiro vy’umukuru w’igihugu vya Amerika (Maison Blanche/White House) bivuga ko Pékin iriko igerageza “guhindura uko ibintu bimeze” kuri Taiwan. Icuka kibi cariyongereye inyuma y’urugendo ruherutse gukorwa muri Taiwan n’intumwa za Amerika zari zirongowe n’umukuru w’inama nshingamateka, umu Democrat Nancy Pelosi. Ubushinwa bufata uru rugendo nk’inzitizi ku vyo busanzwe buvuga ku bijanye n’ubwigenge bwa Taiwan yoyo yifata nk’iyigenga. Umushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi wa Taiwan avuga ko amato n’indege z’intambara vy’Ubushinwa vyakoreye imyimenyerezo mu muhora wa Taiwan (détroit de Taïwan/ Taiwan Strait) ejo ku wa gatandatu, mbere zimwe zikaba zararenze umurongo ugabura ibi bihugu vyompi.Taiwan yaciye irungika indege zayo z’intambara kuzirukana. Igisirikare ca Taiwan kivuga ko iyi yari imyimenyerezo yo kwigana igitero kuri iri zinga. Pékin ntaco irashikiriza kuri ino myimenyerezo ya gisirikare, ariko vyitezwe ko ibandanya mu kirere no mu mazi mu micungararo ya Taiwan gushika kuri uno wa Mungu. Washington yagiriza Ubushinwa ko butuma icuka kibandanya kiba kibi. Umuvugizi wa Maison Blanche avuga ati: "Ibi bikorwa vyerekana ko Ubushinwa bwakobeje mu twigoro twabwo two kurondera guhindura ingene ibintu bitunganijwe. Ni ivy’agasotoro, bitagira inshingano, mbere ni ukutiyumvira”. "Biteye kubiri kandi n’intumbero yacu y’igihe kirekire yo kubungabunga amahoro n’umutekano ku muhora wa Taiwan, ari na vyo amakungu yiteze”. Ubushinwa buvuga ko urugendo rw’umupfasoni Pelosi "rwahungabanije cane " amahoro n’umutekano ku muhora wa Taiwan. Ubushinwa bufata Taiwan ko ari intara yabwo ishaka kwiyonkora kandi ko amaherezo yayo ari uko izoruhira kuja mu minwe ya Pékin. Hagati aho, Taiwan ni izinga rifise ubutegetsi bwaryo, rikifata ko ari igihugu cigenga. Ariko, iyo hagize umutegetsi n’umwe w’igihugu kanaka yemera ubutegetsi bwaryo, Ubushinwa buca burakara. Ku wa gatanu bwatangaje ko bufatiye ibihano Nancy Pelosi n’umuryango wiwe kubera uru rugendo. Pékin kandi yatangaje ko ihagaritse imigenderanire yose na Amerika mu bisata nyamukuru bitari bike harimwo ihindagurika ry’ikirere, ibiganiro vya gisirikare n’utwigoro two kurwanya ubukozi bw’ikibi kw’isi. Umunyamabanga wa Amerika ajejwe imigenderanire Antony Blinken yagiriza Ubushinwa gufata “ingingo zitagira ishingiro” mu kuzibira imihora mikuru mikuru yo guhanahana amakuru na Washington. Pelosi – nk’umuntu yamye anegura Ubushinwa akaba kandi n’umutegetsi wo ku rwego rwo hejuru agendeye iri zinga mu myaka 25 – yashitse muri Taiwan ku wa kabiri, yirengagije amajambo yo kugabisha yashikirizwa na Pékin. Mu rugendo rwiwe, Pelosi yavuze ko “isi ihanganye n’ikibazo co guhitamwo hagati y’ubutegetsi bw’agahotoro n’ubutegetsi bwa demokarasi”.

headline: Ukraine - Russia: Perezida Putin yategetse igisirikare gutegura ibirwanisho ruhonyanganda
text: Prezida w'Uburusiya Vladimir Putin yategetse igisirikare ko urwego rw'ibirwanisho ruhonyanganda vy'ubumara rwomera magabo mu buryo budasanzwe - urugero rwo hejuru cane rwo kugaba mu nteguro igenga ibisasu vya misire vy'Uburusiya. Ni inyuma y'ico Moscou yise "amajambo y'agasotoro" ashikirizwa n'ibihugu vya OTNA/NATO. Avugana n'abategetsi bakuru ba gisirikare, harimwo n'umushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi Sergei Shoigu, yavuze ko ibihugu vy'Uburengero biriko "bikora ibikorwa bibi" ku Burusiya mbere bikaba vyabufatiye "ibihano vy'akarenganyo". Uyu mukuru w'igihugu c'Uburusiya yari yamaze gutangaza amajambo yo kugabisha ko ashobora kuzokoresha ibirwanisho vya nikleyeri igihe agomorera ingabo kuri Ukraine. Mu ndwi iheze, yagabishije ko "umuntu uw'ari we wese yogerageza kwitambika imbere yacu" ashobora guhura n'ingaruka "atari bwigere abona kuva abaho". Aya majambo yabonywe nk'iterabwoba ryo gukoresha ibirwanisho vya nikleyeri mu gihe Uburengero bwomubera intambamyi. Abahinga babona ko ubu ari uburyo bwo gutanga ubutumwa bwo kugabisha. Uku kugabisha gusa no gutegura imitima ko ibi birwanisho bishobora gukoreshwa, ariko ntibisigura ko hari ishaka ryo kubikoresha ubu bwa vuba. Uburusiya nibwo bufise ububiko bunini bw'ibirwanisho vya nikleyeri gusumba ibindi bihugu vyose kw'isi, ariko busanzwe buzi ko OTAN ifise  ibikwiye vyo gusambura Uburusiya mu gihe vyoramuka bikoreshejwe. Ariko biboneka ko intumbero ari ukugerageza gutera igitsure OTAN  ngo ireke guha imfashanyo Ukraine. Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zivuga ko iyi ngingo yo kwiyumvira gukoresha ibirwanisho vya nikleyeri idashobora kwihanganirwa, nk'uko uwuyiserukira muri ONU Linda Thomas-Greenfield yabibwiye CBS News. Ati: "Ibi bisigura ko Perezida Putin abandanya yunyura ibintu muri iyi ntambara mu buryo budashobora kwihanganirwa na gato, rero ni ngombwa ko tubandanya tuzibira ibikorwa vyiwe mu buryo bwose bushoboka". Umunyamakuru wa BBC Frank Gardner ajejwe amakuru ajanye n'ivyo kwivuna abansi avuga ko ibi bivugwa n'Uburusiya vy'ukugabisha urwego rw'ibirwanisho vya nikleyeri ari ikimenyetso c'uko Perezida Putin ashavuriye ibihugu vy'Uburengero kubera ibihano vyafatiye igihugu ciwe hamwe n'ubwoba bubandanya ko igihugu ciwe kigeramiwe na OTAN. Avuga ko iki ari co abajejwe gutegura imigambi muri OTAN bamye batinya kandi ari naco gituma iri shirahamwe riguma risubiramwo ko ridashobora kurungika ingabo gufasha Ukraine kwirukana Abarusiya bayiteye. Umukuru wa OTAN avuga ko itegeko rya Vladimir Putin ryo gusaba ko urwego rujejwe ibirwanisho vya nikleyeri rwokwama rugavye ari akaga ko ku rwego rwo hejuru kandi ko ari ingendo "iteye isoni". Yabwiye imboneshakure CNN ati: "Ni vyo, iyo ushize hamwe amajambo ashikirizwa n'ivyo bariko barakora ku rubuga muri Ukraine - gutera igihugu cikukiye, cigenga, ugakora intambara yeruye kuri Ukraine - ibi vyerekana ko ibintu bitoroshe". Hagati aho, Amerika ivuga ko ata kintu na kimwe OTAN yakoze cotera ubwoba Uburusiya. Avuga kuri ibi vyashikirijwe na Perezida Putin, Jen Psaki, umunyamabanga ajejwe kumenyesha amakuru mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu wa Amerika,  avuga ko OTAN ata na rimwe yigeze ibangamira Uburusiya kandi ko na Ukraine ata na rimwe yigeze ibangamira Uburusiya. Ati: "Ivyo turabimenyereye kuri Perezida Putin kandi ntidushobora kuvyemera". "Turafise ubushobozi bwo kwivuna, ariko kandi ni ngombwa ko twiyamiriza ivyo turiko turabona kuri Perezida Putin". Iri tangazo ry'Uburusiya ryibutsa icitwa misire za Cuba (Missiles de Cuba/ Cuban Missile Crisis) mu 1962 - igihe Washington na Moscou zihakwa kwinjira mu ntambara ya nikleyeri Imana igakinga.

headline: Joe Biden-Pologne: Umukuru wa Amerika arabonana n'impunzi za Ukraine
text: Umukuru wa Amerika Joe Biden yitezwe kubonana n'impunzi z'abanya-Ukraine kuri uyu wa gatanu mu gisagara kiri hafi y'urubibe Pologne ihana na Ukraine. Prezida Biden ari ku ntambwe ya nyuma y'urugendo yarimwo ku mugabane wa Buraya. Indege itwara umukuru wa Amerika -Air Force One - ija kugwa mu gisagara ca Pologne ca   Rzeszow, ku birometero bike uvuye ku rubibe rwa Ukraine. Abanya-Ukraine bashika miriyoni 2 bamaze guhungira muri Pologne - umurwa mukuru Vasovie umaze kwakira abashika 300.000. Bisden aja kubonana n'umukuru wa Pologne  Andrzej Duda kugira ashimire ico gihugu ku twigoro two gufasha abari mu kaga. Urwo rugendo rw'umukuru wa Amerika rubaye mu gihe Buraya na Amerika bikomeje  kubazwa vyihuta ikindi  kirenga ico bimaze gukora mu gufasha abanya-Ukraine kwirinda amahano bariko  barakorerwa n'Ubususiya. Hagati aho ubushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi bw'Ubwongereza (MoD) bwasohoye umwihwezo w'iperereza wa vuba w'ingene bubona intambara, buvuga ko Ukraine yashoboye  kugaruza ibisagara n'ibirindiro vyo kwivuna mu buseruko bw'umurwa mukuru, Kyiv. MoD ivuga kandi ko Ukraine yashoboye gusubiza inyuma ingabo z'Uburusiya izivana aho zari zarafashe mu buraruko bushira uburengero bwa Kyiv. Umwihwezo w'Ubwongereza wongerako ko uburyo bw'Uburusiya  bwo guhererekanya ivyankenerwa busanzaye cane. Mu yandi makuru,  misire z'Uburusiya biranka ko zikora ku rugero rushobora gushika ku 60%, nk'uko bivugwa n'abategetsi batandukanye  bo muri Amerika ariko batavugwa abari bo mu makuru atangwa na Reuters. Uko kudakora bishobora guterwa n'imvo zitandukanye harimwo kunanirwa kuzitera neza canke kwanka guturika iyo zigemye ico zatumberejweko. Urwo rugero ata handi rurahinyuzwa, rushobora gusigura ukutoroherwa kw'Uburusiya mu kugumya umurindi wo gutera intambwe imbere muri ico gitero kimaze ukwezi. Ku bwa Amerika, Uburusiya bumaze gutera misire 1.100 kuva intambara itanguye. Ntibavuga zingahe muri izo zagemye ico zari zigamije canke niba koko zaraturitse. Uburusiya ntibwishuye ubwo Reuters yabusaba kugira ico buvuze. .

headline: Ukraine: Amerika ivuga ko Irani ubu ari yo ya mbere ifashe mu mugongo Uburusiya mu vya gisirikare
text: Na Elsa Maishman & Sam Hancock BBC News Imigengeranire hagati y’Uburusiya na Irani yahavuye ivamwo ubucuti bwuzuye bwa gisirikare, nk’uko Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zibivuga. Uburusiya buha Irani imfashanyo ya gisirikare itari bwigere iboneka, nk’uko bivugwa n’umuhanuzi w’igihugu mu vyo umutekano wa Amerika, John Kirby. Amerika yarabonye ivyegeranyo vyerekana ko ibi bihugu vyompi biriko birihweza ingene bihingurira hamwe za ndege zitagira abadereva (drones) zizokoreshwa mu ntambara, nk’uko abivuga. Amadrone ya Irani aherutse gukurikiranirwa hagufi, aho Ukraine yagiriza Uburusiya ko bwayakoresheje mu ntambara, Australia nayo igafata ibihano kuri iki kibazo. Ico gihugu co mu burasirazuba bwa hagati cabanje guhakana ko ata drone n’imwe carungiiye Uburusiya, ariko mu nyuma kivamwo kiremera ko hari amwe caburungikiye imbere y’igitero muri Ukraine. Kirby avuga ko ugufashanya hagati ya Irani n’Uburusiya mu guhingura ama-drones kuzoba ari akaga kuri Ukraine, ibihugu bibanyi vya Irani hamwe n’amakungu. Avuga ati: "Uburusiya buriko burarondera ingene bukorana na Irani mu bisata vyo guhingura ibirwanisho, inyigisho”. Yongerako y’uko Amerika ifise ubwoba ko Uburusiya butegura “guha Irani ibikoresho vya gisirikare bigezweho”, birimwo za kajugujugu n’ibikoresho vyo gukingira ikirere. Ati: "Irani yabaye igihugu ca mbere gishigikiye Uburusiya gisirikare…. Uburusiya bukoresha amadrone ya Irani mu gutera ibibanza vy’amasoko ntanganguvu, ivyatumye amamiriyoni y’abanyagihugu ba Ukraine babura umuyagankuba, uburyo bwo kwishusha n’ibindi vya nkenerwa. “Abanyagihugu ba Ukraine uno musi bariko barapfa kubera ibikorwa vya Irani”. Kuri aya majambo ya Kirby, umushikiranganji w’Ubwongereza ajejwe imigenderanire James Cleverly avuga ko Irani yabaye kimwe mu bihugu bishigikiye cane Uburusiya gisirikare kandi ko ubucuti hagati y’ibi bihugu ari akaga ku mutegako w’isi yose. Avuga ko aya "masezerano y’akaga" hagati y’ibi bihugu bibiri yatumye Irani irungikira Uburusiya amajana n’amajana y’amadrone. Ati: "Mu kuyisubiriza mu ndumane, Uburusiya buha ubutegetsi bwa Irani ubufasha mu vya gisirikare n’ubuhinga, ibi bikazotuma ivyago vyiyongera ku ncuti zacu mu burasirazuba bwo hagati n’umutekano kw’isi”. Avuga ko Ubwongereza bubona kumwe na Amerika ko ubufasha bwa gisirikare Irani iha Uburusiya bushobora kwiyongera mu mezi ari imbere, mu gihe Uburusiya buriko buragerageza kwegeranya ibirwanisho vyinshi, harimwo amajana ya za misire ziraswa kure. Ukraine yagiriza Irani guha Uburusiya amadrone “y’ubwiyahuzi” aherutse gukoreshwa mu bitero bitari bike akica abantu nibura umunani ku wa 17 Gitugutu (10). Inyuma yo guhakana ibi, Irani yahavuye yemera ko yarungikiye Uburusiya “igitigiti gito” c’amadrones, “amezi atari make” imbere y’intambara yo muri Ukraine. Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky  wa Ukraine avuga ko iki ari ikinyoma kandi ko Ukraine yakorora amadrone ya Irani hafi cumi buri musi.  Kuri uno wa gatandatu, Australia yatangaje imigambi ifise yo gufatira ibihano bijane n’amafaranga abanya-Irani batatu hamwe n’umurwizatunga wa Irani nyene kubera bahaye Uburusiya amadrone yakoreshejwe mu gutera Ukraine. Penny Wong, umushikiranganji wa Australia ajejwe imigenderanire, yanditse urwandiko rwacishijwe mu kinyamakuru Sydney Herald ruvuga  ruti: "Guha amadrone Uburusiya vyerekana uruhara Irani ifise mu gutera umutekano muke kw’isi yose. Uru rutonde rurerekana ko abo bose baha uburyo Uburusiya bazobona inkurikizi”. Yatangaje izindi ngingo zafatiwe abantu 19 n’amashirahamwe abiri, harimwo igipolisi ca Irani kijejwe inyifato gitoteza abari mu myiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza reta inyuma y’urupfu rwa Mahsa Amini , umugore w’imyaka 22 aherutse gupfira mw’ibohero. Mu yandi makuru avugwa muri Ukraine, Perezida Zelensky avuga ko Uburusiya  bwagize umunyota igisagara ca Bakhmut, inyuma y’amezi atari make y’intambara rutikiza nganda mu karere ka Donbas kari mu buseruko bwa Ukraine.

headline: Kémi Seba ati: ‘Ivyo mvuga ndavyemanga, urwaruka rwa Afrika ruzofata ibintu mu minwe’
text: Umunya Benin aharanira agateka k'abanya Afrika, Kemi Seba, yaciriwe urubanza rw'ugupfungwa amezi abiri n'amande ya 200.000 y'amafaranga y'ama CFA yagirizwa gutyoza umukuru wa Burkina Faso, hamwe n'abakuru b'ibihugu vya Niger, Côte d'Ivoire n'Ubufaransa. Bwana Seba yari yavuze ko Umukuru w'igihugu ca Burkina Faso, Roch Marc Christian Kaboré, ari "ikiraro ca politike", nayo Perezida w'Ubufaransa amwita "agaperezida gato". Yavuze ivyo mu kwerekana akababaro kiwe afise kubera abo yita akarwi k'abakoloni b'abafaransa babarya babicayeko, hari mw'ikoraniro imbere y'abanyeshure. Uyo mukuru w'ishirahamwe Urgences pan-africanistes avuga ko ico gihano kidashobora kumutuma ahagarika urugamba rwiwe. Avugana n'abamenyeshamakuru, Bwana Seba yavuze ati: "Mu gihe cose umukuru w'igihugu azobandanya ahabwa amategeko n'abo bakoloni b'abafaransa, hazokwama hari urwaruka rutazigera rwemera agacinyizo rufaste ibintu mu minwe, ku giciro ico ari co cose". "Banciriye gupfungwa amezi abiri, ariko ico gihano ntaco kivuze kuko n'abacamanza barazi ko mvuga ukuri, ko urwaruka rufise ishaka ryose ry'ugufata ibintu mu minwe, tuzobandanya urugamba rwacu". Avuga ko ababazwa n'ukubona ko iyo Perezida Macron atanze itegeko ata n'umwe aryogora, ariko iyo urwaruka rwa Afrika rusavye abavyeyi babo ko bafata ibintu mu minwe, baca bakubita mu mutwe, aho aho kurwanya ako karwi k'abafaransa gafatiye amaboko inyuma igihugu. Ati: "Ibohero nta kintu na kimwe rizohindura, n'aho rwoba urupfu. Ni urugamba twarazwe na basokuru". Bwana Seba ashimira umwunganirizi wiwe avuga ko yakoze akazi kiwe n'umutima wiwe wose. Avuga ko ivyiyumviro vyiwe ari ivyo abantu benshi ariko batubahuka kuvuga.

headline: EU/UE yagirije Russia guteza ubukene bw’indya abaserukizi bayo baca barasohoka
text: Uwuserukira Uburusiya muri ONU yivumbuye mu mubonano w’Inama nkuru ya ONU ijejwe umutekano kw’isi inyuma y’uko umukuru w’Inama nkuru y’Ubumwe bwa Bulaya avugiye ko igitero c’Uburusiya kuri Ukraine ari co giteje ikibazo c’imfungurwa kw’isi. Charles Michel avuga ko Uburusiya bukoresha imfungurwa “nka misire mbi” ku bihugu bikiri mu nzira y’amajambere, bigatuma baterwa n’ubukene. Intumwa y’ Uburusiya Vassily Nebenzia yagirije Michel ko akwiragiza ibinyoma. Intambara yatumye imfungurwa zugaranirwa ku bivuka vya Ukraine. Ukraine ni igihugu gishora hanze amavuta yo guteka menshi co kimwe n’intete, nk’ibigori n’ingano. Uburusiya na bwo nyene burashora hanze ingano nyinshi hamwe n’intabire. Ubukene bw’ibi bidandazwa bwatumye ibiciro vy’ibibisubirira biduga cane. Muri uwo mubonano w’Inama Nkuru ijejwe umutekano mw’ishirahamwe ONU i New York, Michel yavuze ati: “Nyakwubahwa Ambasaderi yUburusiya, reka tuvugishe ukuri, Kremlin iriko ikoresha ikibazo c’imfungurwa nka misire mbi ku bihugu bikiri mu nzira y’amajambere. “Ingaruka mbi z’intambara y’Uburusiya ziriko zirarenga inkombe kw’isi yose kandi ibi biriko bituma ibiciro vy’imfungurwa biduga, bigatuma abantu binjira mu bukene, mbere bigateza umutekano muke mu burere. “Uburusiya bwonyene ni bwo ntanduruko y’iki kibazo c’imfungurwa”. Yongerako kandi ko yiboneye we nyene ubwiwe amamiriyoni y’amatoni y’ingano zugaraniwe ku kivuko ca Odesa kubera Uburusiya bwazibiye imihora ya Ukraine yo ku nyanja. Michel kandi yagirije Uburusiya kwiba intete ikanabuza abanyagihugu gutera ibiterwa be no kwimbura ivyimburwa muri Ukraine kubera ibikorwa vya gisirikare vyabwo muri ico gihugu. Aya majambo yatumye Nebenzia yivumbura. Ariko arasohoka, Michel yamubwiye imbonankubone ati: “Urashobora gusohoka, kumbure biroroshe kutumviriza ukuri”. Nebenzia yabwiye Reuters ko atashobora kugumayo kubera “ibinyoma Charles Michel yaje gushikiriza hano”. Mu nama yindi, umunyamabanga wa Reta ya Amerika ajejwe imigenderanire, Antony Blinken, na we nyene yavuze ko Uburusiya bubuza Ukraine gushora intete hanze, yongera yagiriza ingabo z’Uburusiya gusambura uburimyi bw Ukraine. Mw’ijambo yashikirije mu nama yabaye hakoreshejwe ubuhinga bwa none yahuje abagiraneza, amashirahamwe ategamiye reta hamwe n’amashirahamwe yo mu gisata c’abigenga. Blinken yavuze ati: “Hari ahantu harunze imiriyoni 20 z’amatoni y’ingano zazibiriwe mu bigega hafi ya Odesa, hamwe no mu mato yuzuye ingano azibiriwe ku kivuko ca Odesa kubera Uburusiya bwugaye imihora”. Blinken yavuze nk’uko Charles Michel avuga, ko hari amakuru yo kwizera ko Uburusiya “buriko buranyaga urukombamazi” intete za Ukraine kugira ngo buzigurishe ku nyungu zabwo.

headline: US: Derek Chauvin yahamwe n'icaha co kwica George Floyd
text: Derek Chauvin, umuzungu yahoze ari umupolisi, yahamwe n'icaha co kwica umwirabure George Floyd mu muji wa Minneapolis muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu mwaka uheze. Derek yagiriwe n'ibirego bitatu vyose bijanye no kwica yari yarezwe muri uru rubanza rwakurikiranywe cane. Humvikanye induru n'impundu hanze ya sentare igihe umucamanza yasoma ivyashitsweko n'abanyagihugu bumviriza bagaca urubanza (jury) nk'uko bigenda mu manza muri Amerika. Uwo mugwi wa jury vyawutwaye ikiringo kiri munsi y'umunsi umwe kugira uhamye icaha Derek Chauvin ku birego vyose bitatu bijanye n'urupfu rwa George Floyd. Derek yafashwe video mu kwezi kwa gatana mu mwaka uheze, yashize ivi mw'izosi rya Floyd ikiringo c'imitona icenda igihe yariko aramufata ico gihe. Vyamuviriyemwo gucikana. Umucamanza yari yabwiye umugwi wa jury kwihweza ibimenyetso vyose kandi ukibuka yuko igikorwa co kuzana ibimenyetso cega leta, kitaraba ababuranira uwuregwa. Ababuranira Chauvin bari bireguye bavuga yuko ibiyayuramutwe hamwe n'amagara atifashe neza ari vyo vyatumye Floyd apfa. Ubushinjacaha bwahimirije umugwi wa jury kwemera ivyo wabonye muri video. Iyo video yararabwe nka hose kw'isi iteza ishavu ryinshi ryadutsemwo imyiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza amacakubiri afatiye ku rukoba hamwe no gukoresha inguvu z'ikirenga bigirwa n'abapolisi. Umucamanza yatangaje ko Derek Chauvin w'imyaka 45 azosomerwa igihano mu ndwi umunani ziri imbere, aca yambwikwa amapingu ajanwa mw'ibohero. Ni ubwa mbere umupolisi w'umuzungu ahamwa n'icaha co kwica umwirabure yafashe mu mateka ya Leta ya Minnesota, nk'uko bivugwa n'ishirahamwe riharanira agateka muri Amerika, American Civil Liberties Union.

headline: Abasirikare ba Ukraine bapfa buri musi bagera ku 200 - umuhanuzi wa Zelensky
text: Umuhanuzi wo mu rwego rwo hejuru wa prezida wa Ukraine yabwiye BBC ko abasirikare ba Ukraine bari hagati ya 100 na 200 bicirwa ku rubuga rw'intambara buri musi. Mykhaylo Podolyak yavuze ko Ukraine ikeneye amajana n'amajana y'ibigwanisho bikomakomeye mu kwongereza ubushobozi ku rubuga rw'intambara ibahuza n'Uburusiya mu karere ko mu buseruko ka Donbas. Yavuze kandi ko Ukraine ititeguye gusubira mu biganiro vy'amahoro n'Uburusiya. Ingabo za Ukraine ziriko ziraterwa amabombe urutitsa mu gihe ingabo z'Uburusiya ziriko ziragerageza kwigarurira akarere kose ka Donbas. Podolyak agira ati: "Ingabo z'Uburusiya zikoresha ikintu cose uretse ibigwanisho vy'ubumara ku rugamba, harimwo n'ibikoho bikomakomeye, ibikoho bitera za rokete hamwe n'indege." Yasubiyemwo akamo ka Ukraine ku bihugu vya Buraya ko gusaba ibindi bigwanisho vyinshi, avuga ko "ubusumbane bukomeye" hagati y'igisirikare c'Uburusiya n'ica Ukraine, ari yo mpamvu haba abapfa benshi ku ruhande rwa Ukraine. Yavuze "ugusaba ibigwanisho bikomeye si ukwigirisha... ariko n'intumbero dukeneye gushikako uravye uko ibintu vyifashe ku rubuga." Yongeyeko yuko Ukraine ikeneye ibigwanisho bitera rokete nyinshi ica rimwe biri hagati ya 150 na 300 kugira babangabanganwe n'Uburusiya - igitigiri kinini batari bwigere baronka gushika ubu. Podolyak yavuze kandi ko ibiganiro vy'amahoro bishobora gusubira mu gihe gusa Uburusiya busubije uturere bwigaruriye kuva buteye ico gihugu itariki 24 z'ukwezi kwa kabiri. Igitigiri c'abasirikare bari hagati 100 na 200 ba Ukraine bapfa buri musi kiri hejuru cane n'ivyahora bigereranywa. Ku musi wa kane, umushikiranganji wa Ukraine ajejwe kwivuna abansi, Oleksii Reznikov, yavuze ko Ukraine ibura abasirikare 100 buri musi, abandi 500 bagakomereka. Uko gutanga ibiharuro bitandukanye vyerekana ingene bitoroshe kuronka inkuru nyazo ziva ku rugamba. Uretse uko gutakaza abantu benshi, Reznikov yemeza ko igitigiri kinini c'abasirikare na bo bicwa. Reznikov agira ati: "Uburusiya bubandanya guhangana n'abantu benshi n'inguvu nyinshi kandi buratakaza abantu benshi." "Ariko buguma bufise inguvu zo gutera intambwe ku rugamba mu turere tumwe tumwe." Muri ico gihe nyene, umukuru w'intara ya Luhansk yavuze ko abarusiya "bariko barapfa nk'isazi" ariko akanasubiramwo ivyavuzwe na Podolyak ko Ukraine ihanganye  n'ingorane "zikomeye cane" z'ibura ry'ibirwanisho bikomakomeye. Abarusiya bariko bashira inguvu nyinshi mu bitero vyo ku gisagara ca Severodonetsk. Ku musi wa gatatu, prezida Zelensky yavuze ko "kazoza ka Donbas kariko kararondererwa ngaho" kandi abategetsi bavuga ko iyo ntara yahinduwe umunyota n'ibitero bikomeye vy'Uburusiya vyiganjemwo za Misile. Kuri izo ntambara, hiyongeyeko abagwanyi b'abongereza babiri hamwe n'umunye Maroc bagwana ku ruhande rw'igisirikare ca Ukraine baciriwe urubanza rwo gupfa ku musi wa kane na sentare itemewe n'amakungu y'iciyita Republica y'abanyagihugu ya Donetsk. Bagiriwe n'icaha co kuba abacangero no "gufata ibigwanisho bagamije gufata ubutegetsi ku nguvu."

headline: Cote d'Ivoire: Laurent Gbagbo yasubiye kugirwa umwere na ICC
text: Igisata c'iyungururizo muri sentare mpuzamakungu mpanavyaha, ICC, cemeje kugirwa umwere kwa Laurent Gbagbo, yahoze atwara Cote d'Ivoire yari yaragirijwe ivyaha bikorewe zina kiremwa muntu. Bwana Gbagbo niwe mukuru w'igihugu wa mbere yarengutse imbere ya ICC, akaba yarejejwe ivyaha bijanye n'ubwicanyi, bwabaye haraciye imyaka cumi, bwakurikiye amatora muri ico gihugu co mu burengero bwa Afrika. Ariko ubushinjacaha bwarunguruje kuri iyo ngingo buvuga yuko, naho habaye amakosa mu mburano, kwagirwa n'icaha kwa Bwana Gbagbo kwari kwerekanywe ata gukekeranya. Bwavuze yuko impapuro zishika ku bihumbi hamwe n'ivyabona 96 vyatanze ubuhamya muri sentare, vyerekanye ko uwo mugabo yagirwa n'icaha. Bwana Ggagbo w'imyaka 75 ubu yari acumbikiwe mu Bubigiri nyuma yo kwezwa bwa mbere na ICC mu 2019, akaba yizeye guca atahuka muri Cote d'Ivoire mu gihe kwunguruza kw'ubushinjacaha kwabaye ubusa. Mu mwaka uheze haradutse itana mu mitwe ryaguyemwo n'abantu, igihe mukeba w'igihe kirekire wa Bwana Gbagbo ari we Alassane Ouattara, yatangaza ko azosubira kwitoza mu kibanza c'umukuru w'igihugu. Ubwicanyi bwakurikiye amatora yo mu 2010 bwatanguye igihe Laurent Gbagbo, yari amaze imyaka cumi ku butegetsi, yanka kwemera ko yatsinzwe mu gihe yemenga ko ari we yari yatsinze. Yaje gufatwa n'inteko za ONU zifatanije n'iz'Ubufaransa, bamusanze mw'ihoteri yari yinyegejemwo we n'umugore wiwe Simone Gbagbo, aca ajanwa i La Haye kuri ICC.

headline: Afghanistan: Aba Taliban babujije abagore kwiga kaminuza
text: Aba Taliban babujije abagore kwiga amakaminuza muri Afghanistan, ingingo yiyamirizwa n’amakungu mbere yateye n’umwikomo mu rwaruka muri ico gihugu. Umushikiranganji w’inyigisho za kaminuza yatangaje iyo ngingo isubiza inyuma igihugu ejo ku wa kabiri, avuga ko yategerezwa guca ija mu ngiro ubwo nyene. Iyo ngingo ije gusubiza inyuma gusumba indero ku bagore -  mu gihe abakobwa bari bamaze kubuzwa kwiga amashure yisumbuye kuva aba Taliban bagarutse ku butegetsi mu mwaka uheze. Kuno uno wa gatatu, hari abagore bamwe bateguye imyiyerekano ku mugwa mukuru Kabul Abagore bahurikiye mw’ishirahamwe Afghanistan Women's Unity and Solidarity bavuga bati: “Uno musi twihaye amabarabara ya Kabul kugira ngo twerekane akababaro kacu ku ngingo yo kwugara amashure ya kaminuza ku bakobwa”. Ariko iyi myiyerekano yarimwo abantu bake yatujijwe vuba bwango n’abategetsi b’aba Taliban. Ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU n’ibihugu bitari bike biriyamiriza iri tegeko, risubiza inyuma Afghanistan nko mu gihe c’ubutegetsi bwa mbere bw’aba Taliban igihe abakobwa batari bemerewe kwiga amashure. Intumwa idasanzwe ya ONU muri Afghanistan avuga ko ari "iyindi ntambwe inyuma isubiriye guhonyanga uburenganzira bwo kwiga kuri bose ibandanya irondera gufuta abagore mu mibereho ya Afghanistani”. Ku ruhande rwayo, Amerika iriyamiriza bikomeye ingingo z’aba Taliban, ikavuga ko iyo ngingo "izogira ingaruka mbi ku ba Taliban”. Mw’itangazo, umunyamabanga wa reta ajejwe imigenderanire wa Amerika, Antony Blinken , avuga ati: "Aba Taliban ntibizere ko bashobora kwinjira mu muryango mpuzamakungu igihe cose batazoba barubahiriza uburenganzira bw’abanya-Afghanistani bose. "Nta gihugu gishobora gutera imbere mu gihe inusu y’abanyagihugu baco bakibohewe amaboko imugongo”. I Kabul, abanyeshure b’abakobwa na bo nyene babwiye BBC akababaro kabo. Umwe yiga kuri kaminuza ya Kabul agira ati: "Barasambuye ikiraro conyene compuje na kazoza kanje. "None nogira gute? Nari nizeye ko nari kwiga ngahindura kazoza kanje canke bikambera umuco mu buzima bwanje, ariko bagisambuye”. Uwundi nawe yabwiye BBC ko ari “umugore yatakaje vyose”. Yahoze yiga amategeko ya Islam, Sharia – akavuga ko amabwirizwa y’aba Taliban ateye kubiri “n’uburenganzira Islam na Allah baduhaye”. Abwira BBC ati: “Ni ngombwa ko baja mu bindi bihugu vya ki-Islam kugira ngo babone ko ibikorwa vyabo atari ivya Islam”. Ibihugu vy’uburengero bimaze umwaka wose bisaba aba Taliban gukomeza indero y’abagore nimba bashaka kwemerwa ku mugaragaro nka reta ya Afghanistan. Hagati aho, mu gihugu kibanyi ca Pakistan, umushikiranganji w’imigenderanire yavuze ko ababajwe n’iyi ngingo y’aba Taliban. Bilawal Bhutto Zardari  ati: "Ndacibaza ko inzira yoroshe kugira dushike ku ntumbero yacu – n’aho hari inzitizi nyinshi ku nyigisho y’abagore no ku bindi – ni uguca kuri Kabul no kuri reta mfatakibanza”. Aba Taliban bari bemereye abanyagihugu ubutegetsi bugenza buhoro inyuma y’aho bafatiye ubutegetsi mu mwaka uheze inyuma y’aho Amerika itahukaniye ingabo zayo. Ariko Aba ba-Islam bagendera ku vyiyumviro bikaze vya Islam babandanije basubiza inyuma uburenganzira bw’abagore n’ubwigenge mu gihugu. Umutegetsi w’aba Taliban Hibatullah Akhundzada n’abo bafatanije kurongora igihugu ntibigeze berekwa indero igezweho yo mu mashure – canecane ku bakobwa n’abagore. Bamwe mu bategetsi biyoroheje ntibashigikiye iyi ngendo, abahinga bakavuga ko iki kibazo cabacanishijemwo muri uno mwaka wose. Hamwe n’ivyo, ejo ku wa kabiri ubushikiranganji bw’indero bwavuze ko abahinga babwo bihweje intunganyo y’ivyigwa vya kaminuza n’uburyo bigamwo, hanyuma bafata ingingo ko abakorwa bahagarikwa vy’agateganyo “gushika hatunganijwe uburyo bwiza”. Buvuga kandi ko vuba buzotanga iyo nteguro kandi ko “abanyagihugu batogira ubwoba”.. Hagati aho, mu kwa gatatu, aba Taliban bari bemeye gusubira kwugurura amashure yisumbuye amwe amwe y’abakobwa ariko mu nyuma barabihagarika ku musi nyene bari biteze gusubira kw’ishure. Iri totezwa kandi rikurikiye urukurikirane rw’ayandi mabwirizwa yo gukumira abagore mu mezi aheze. Mu kw’icumi na rimwe, abagore barabujijwe kuja mu bibanza vy’ihuriro, mu mazu y’ukwinonora imitsi hamwe no mu bwogero rusangi ku mugwa mukuru. Umwigisha wa kaminuza akongera akaba n’umwe mu banya Afghanistan baharanira uburenganzira bwa kiremwamuntu avuga ko aba Taliban barangije ingingo yabo yo gutaramura abagore mu kubabuza amashure kaminuza. Humaira Qaderi  yabwiye BBC ati: "Iki ni co kintu ca nyuma aba Taliban bari basigaje gukora. Afghanistani si igihugu ku  bagore, ahubwo ni ikirunduru ku bagore”. Hari haciye amezi atatu aba Taliban bemereye ibihumbi n’ibihumbi vy’abakobwa n’abagore gukora ikibazo co kwinjira muri kaminuza hafi mu ntara zose z’igihugu. Ariko hariho ivyigwa batari bemerewe gusaba kwiga, aho nk’ivyigwa vy’ubufundi, ubutunzi, ubuganga bw’ibitungwa n’uburimyi vyari bibujijwe, mugihe kandi ivyigwa vy’ukumenyesha amakuru bibujijwe cane rwose. Imbere y’iyi ngingo y’ejo ku wa kabiri, amashure kaminuza yari yamaze gushiraho amategeko akumira abagore kuva aba Taliban bafashe ubutegetsi mu 2021. Hari ubwinjiriro n’amasomero bitandukanye ufatiye ku gitsina, kandi abanyeshure b’abakobwa bategerezwa gusa kwigishwa n’abigisha b’abagore canke abagabo bashaje. Ubutunzi bwa Afghanistani ahanini bugendera ku mfashanyo mpuzamakungu kuva mu myaka mirongo iheze, ariko amashirahamwe y’abagiraneza hamwe hamwe yagabanije - ariko ahandi arakuraho burundu -    imfashanyo yatanga mu gisata c’indero inyuma y’aho aba Taliban bankiye kwemerera abakobwa kwiga amashure yisumbuye. Abigisha benshi barataye baromoka inyuma y’aho ingabo zari zirongowe na Amerika ziviriye muri ico gihugu, nayo muri uno mwaka abigisha benshi bakaba baramaze amezi atari make badahembwa.

headline: Umudemocrate Bernie Sanders ariyamiriza Uburusiya buvugwa ko bushaka kwivanga mu matora ya Amerika
text: Bernie Sanders  asanzwe ariko arwanira guserukira umugambwe w'aba Democrates mu matora yo muri Amerika ariyamiriza Uburusiya buvugwa ko buriko burondera kumufasha mu myiyamamazo, aho abubwira ati "reka kwivanga mu matora ya Amerika". Ejo ku wa gatanu, Bwana Sanders yavuze ko abategetsi ba Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika bamubwiye mu kwezi guheze ko Uburusiya bwari mu twigoro two kumufasha mu myiyamamazo yiwe. Ari mu ntara ya California, Bwana Sanders avuga ko bitaboneka neza ingene Uburusiya bwashaka kwivanga muri ayo matora. Ariko, uyo mukenguzamateka w'imyaka 78 akomoka mu ntara ya Vermont akaba ariko arondera guhangana na Perezida Donald Trump yariyamirije bikomeye uwo mugambi w'Uburusiya. Yagirije Perezida Vladimir Putin w'ico gihugu ko ari "umutegetsi akoresha igikenye", ko leta yiwe "ikoresha imbuga ngurukanabumenyi mu gushaka kubiba amacakubiri mu gihugu cacu". Ati: "Hinge twumvikane, Abarusiya bashaka guhuvya intwaro rusangi ya Amerika mu kuducamwo ibice. Jewe rero simeze nk'uyu mukuru w'igihugu, ndiyamirije  nshimitse iyo migambi yabo hamwe n'igihugu ico ari co cose coshaka kwivangha mu matora yacu". Bwana Sanders asanzwe yiyita ko ashaka intwaro rusangi ishingiye ku matwara y'abasosiyaliste, niwe aboneka ko ari imbere mu bariko baharanira guserukira umugambwe w'aba Democrates mu matora y'umukuru w'ico gihugu. Hagati aho, Facebook ivuga ko ata cemezo na kimwe iratora cerekana ko Uburusiya buriko burondera gufasha Sanders mu myiyamamazo yiwe. Ejo ku wa gatanu, ikinyamakuru Washington Post cavuze ko Perezida Trump wa Amerika hamwe n'abashingamateka b'ico gihugu baronse amakuru avuga ko Uburusiya bwariko bushaka gufasha Bwana Sanders. Ku rundi ruhande, abategetsi bakuru bo mu rwego rw'igendereza bazi ko Uburusiya buriko burarondera kwivanga mu matora ya Amerika mu gushaka gufasha Perezida Trump ngo atsinde amatora. Umurwi ujejwe igendereza mu nama nshingamateka mu kanama kayo ko ku wa 13 z'uku kwa kabiri wamenyeshejwe ko Uburusiya bwipfuza ko Bwana Trump ari we yotsinda ayo matora. Mu gihe yariko yiyamamaza mu ntara ya Nevada ejo ku wa gatanu, Perezida Trump yavuze ko ibivugwa y'uko Uburusiya buriko bwivanga mu matora vyari "ibihuhua" vyatangujwe n'abademocrates. Ati: "Ndabira izi mburakimazi, aba Democrates ataco bafise bakora, uno munsi bavuze ngo Putin ariko akora ibishoboka vyose ngo Trump atorwe. Murumva ivyo bintu !" Ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburusiya Kremlin, birahakana ayo makuru bikavuga ko ata shingiro afise. Umuvugizi wavyo, Dmitry Peskov, yabwiye abanyamakuru ko ari "amajambo y'ubwoba" ashingiye "ku binyoma gusa", nk'uko vyandikwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters.

headline: Ingwano muri Ukraine: Abanyeshure b'abanya-Africa batekewe n'ubwoba muri Kherson yifatiwe n'Abarusiya
text: Abanyeshure b'abanya-Afrika bashika 100 baratakamba basaba gufashwa kugira bave mu gisagara ca Kherson kiri ku kivuko muri Ukraine, inyuma y'indwi zirenga zibiri cifatiwe n'ingabo z'Uburusiya. Binyegeje mu vyumba vyo guhungiramwo ama bombe mu buraro bwa kaminuza mu bukonje bwinshi cane, ntihagira uburyo bwo gususurutsa inzu kandi ntibaronka n'imiti. Bavuga ko bahahamutse kandi bifuza cane icobakura muri ico gisagara. Umwe mu banyehure yabwiye BBC ko bacumva urwamo rw'amasasu n'ama bombe n'indege za gisirikare. Urwo rushobora kuba ari urwamo rwo ku rugamba mu gihe ingabo z'Uburusiya ziguma zisunika zija  mu buraruko  zerekeza igisagara ca Mykolaiv. Abanyeshure b'abanya-Nigeria bari muri abo baratakambiye reta yabo ngo ibafashe kuvayo amazi atararenga inkombe. Babwiye BBC ko bari mu banyamahanga ba nyuma bakiri muri ico gisagara. Umwe muri abo banyehure yabwiye BBC kuri terefeone  ati: "Turatakamvye, n'ukuri turakeneye kuva muri iki gisagara, ibintu ntibitworoheye namba." Ntitubavuga amazina ku mvo z'umutekano wabo. Reta ya Nigeria ivuga ko iriko irakora ibishoboka vyose kugirango ibavaneyo. Ku ndwi iheze uwuyiserukira  i Moscou yabwiwe n'umutegetsi w'Uburusiya  ko hariko harategurwa umugambi w'ingene bovanwayo baciye mu Burusiya. Ariko ivyo ntibiraba gushika ubu kandi uko biri abo banyeshure  bafise impungenge zo gushikanwa mu Burusiya. Hagati aho abo banyeshure, harimwo abava muri Cameroun, Ghana, Misiri, Tunisia na Maroc, bavuga ko kuri kaminuza ho hakiri ivyo kurya ariko ko mu masoko  vyaheze. Aho bikiri naho, bigurishwa incuro zibiri canke zitatu igiciro vyahorako. Umwe mu banyeshure yavuze ati: "Abari muri twebwe baba mu buraro bwa kaminuza bo baracafise amahirwe kuko mu buriro haracatangwa ivyo kurya." Uwundi munyeshure yavuze ko ingabo z'Uburusiya zigenzura ico gisagara zirakororera hasi  n'indege ivyo kurya nk'imboga, umuceri, n'amazi hafi y'inyubakwa za reta n'ibituro vy'ama tereni n'ama bus hirya no hino mu gisagara. Ariko abo banyeshure  bavuga ko basabwe kudafata ivyo vyo kurya kugira abanya-Ukraine ntibabafate nk'uko boba ari ivyitso vy'Abarusiya. Yagize ati: "Twokwemera gute kwakira imfashanyo y'Abarusiya igihe abanya-Ukraine bariko baragerageza  kugaruza igihugu cabo? Uwokwubahuka kwerekana ko twakira izo ndya yoba ariko aradukwegera urupfu". Amazi yo kumesa no gusukura inzu aracahari ariko ayo kunywa ntakiboneka cane. Amashirahamwe afasha aratanga amazi n'ivyo kurya ariko ntawuzi gushika ryari ivyo bizokorwa. Kherson kiri mu bisagara vya mbere bikomeye vyafashwe n'Uburusiya mu ndwi ya mbere y'igitero, kuva ico gihe abahaba bakaba baguma bagira imyiyerekano ku kwiyamiriza Abarusiya. "Twaje muri iki gihugu tuzanywe no kwiga amashure none turi hagati mu ntambara, aho iriko irabera nyenizina." "N'ubwo twebwe ubwacu ata ntambara turabona, abanya-Ukraine tuvugana batubwiye ko batarota bashira ibigwanisho hasi. Bashaka kugaruza igisagara cabo, hanyuma igihugu cose." Uwo munyeshure avuga kandi ko ingabo z'Uburusiya zanse ko indya zizanwa mu gisagara zivuye mu bindi bice vy'igihugu mu gutinya ko abasirikare ba Ukraine bokwikika mu kiza bakagaruka muri Kherson kugwana. Abategetsi ba kaminuza babagiriye inama ko baramutse bihevye bakaja hanze bongenda mu migwi, no kwibohera igitambara cera haruguru y'inkokora y'ukuboko kw'ukubamfu kugira Abarusiya babone ko ari abanyagihugu basanzwe (aba Civil). Umwe yavuze ko abasirikare b'Uburusiya bababwiye ko amategeko bafise  ari "kurasa uwo wese  yigenjeje nabi - kumurasa ubwo nyene". Abanyeshure ibihumbi n'ibihumbi baturuka muri Afrika na Asia y'ubumanuko bariga muri kaminuza za Ukraine imbere y'uko Uburusiya butera ico gihugu. Ubu bamwe bariko baragerageza kubandanya ivyigwa mu bihugu bibanyi mu gihe abandi ubu batashe mu bihugu vyabo. Ariko ku bari muri Kherson, birabangamye kugerageza kwigwanako ngo bave muri ico gisagara, n'ubwo hari abironderera amataxi yo kubavanayo. "Abagerageje kwivana bonyene muri Kherson n'ukugereza ku buzima bwabo", nk'uko bivugwa n'umwe mu banyeshure. "Hari umunsi usanga abasirikare b'Uburusiya bavyukanye umutima mwiza bakubwira neza gusubira inyuma. "Hari abandi  bakara - baca barasa mu kirere mu buryo bwo ku kubwira ngo subira iyo uvuye."

headline: Rwanda: Kagame avuga ko ashobora  kwitoreza ikiringo kigira kane nk’umukuru w’igihugu
text: Inyuma y’imyaka irenga 20 ari ku butegetsi, umukuru w’igihugu c’u Rwanda avuga ko azokwihweza ko yobandanya yitoza ngo arongore iki gihugu mu yindi myaka 20. Paul Kagame yemereye imboneshakure y’Abafaransa ko ashobora gusubira kwitoza mu matora yimirije mu 2024. Mu  2015 yahinduye ibwirizwashingiro, rikaba rimuha uburenganzira bwo kuguma ku butegetsi gushika mu 2034. Mu matora y’umukuru w’igihugu aheruka haraciye imyaka itanu, ibiharuro bitangwa bivugwa ko yatsinze ku rugero rwa 99% vy’amajwi yose, ivyo abenshi mu bari hanze y’igihugu babona nk’amanyanga. Abajijwe nimba azosubira kwitoza, Perezida Kagame, ubu afise imyaka 64, avuga ati: "Nzokwihweza ko nokwitoza no mu yindi myaka 20. Jewe nta ngorane mfise kuri ico. Amatora ni abanyagihugu bahitamwo”. Umuyobozi wa Human Rights Watch muri Afrika yo hagati, Lewis Mudge, yabwiye BBC ati "Igitangaje ni uko abantu bamwe batangara". Ati: "Urwanda ni igihugu aho kizira kikaziririzwa kuvuguruza reta…tureke kuba uwutavuga rumwe muri poritike…kandi ubu butegetsi bw’agahotoro buzobandanya no muri kazoza ka hafi”. Umwe mu banyarwanda bakomeye anegura u Rwanda yanakoresheje amajambo akomeye. Charles Kambanda , umunyamategeko akaba n’umwigisha wa kaminuza ubu aba muri Amerika, yabwiye BBC ati: "Mu gihe yobandanya iyindi myaka 20, u Rwanda ruzoba umuriro udahera”. Kambanda avuga ko Abanyarwanda basanzwe baba mu bwoba, mbere avuga ko abashikiranganji barenga umwe bamubwiye ko baguma muri reta kuko batinya ko bohava bicwa mu gihe boyivamwo. Hagati aho, Perezifa Kagame yarashigikiye cane intambwe Urwanda rugezeko mu bijanye n’agateka ka zina muntu, igihe haba ikoraniro rya Commonwealth ku mugwa mukuru Kigali muri Ruheshi (6). Amezi make imbere y’aha, ni ukuvuga mu kwa kane, Ubwongereza bwatangaje integuro itabonwa kumwe yo kurungika mu Rwanda bamwe mu basaba ubuhungiro binjira ku butaka bwabwo, kugira Basabe ubuhungiro muri iki gihugu co muri Afrika y’ibiyaga binini. Iyi ngingo yariyamirijwe n’ishirahamwe ONU riyigereranya “n’urudandaza”, ariko ibiro vy’umushikiranganji wa mbere vyiyemeje kubandanya n’uwu mugambi n’aho Boris Johnson agiye kugenda. Perezida Kagame ari mu butegetsi kuva mu 1994, inyuma y’aho umuhari wa FPR-Inkotanyi - ubu ukaba ari wo mugambwe uri ku butgetsi -  ufatiye igihugu mu 1994 inyeshamba zawo yari arongoye zibanje gutuza jesonide. Ico gihe yabaye icegera c’uwari umukuru w’igihugu Pasteur Bizimungu yahavuye atanga imihoho mu 2000, Paul Kagame agaca amusubirira, kuva ico gihe akaba ari we aramutswa igihugu. Perezida Kagame aboneka nk’umutegetsi yashikanye igihugu kw’iterambere rikomeye kuva shitse ku butegetsi, ariko abamunegura bavuga ko abandanya kwifatira mu minwe ico babona nk’ubutegetsi bw’agahotoro.

headline: Umuhungu wa Joe Biden ashobora gukurikiranwa ku vyaha bijanye n’amakori
text: N﻿a  Bernd Debusmann Jr BBC News, Washington Ikigo c’igendereza ryo hagati muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika FBI gifise ivyemezo bikwiye kugira ngo birengutse Hunter Biden ku vyaha bijanye no kunyegeza ikori hamwe no gutanga insiguro z’ibinyoma mu ntumbero yo kugura inkoho, nk’uko bivugwa n’ikinyamakuru CBS gikorana na BBC muri Amerika. Uyu muhungu wa Perezida Joe Biden amaze igihe akorwako amatohoza kuva mu 2018. Ingingo yo kumwugururira dosiye mpanavyaha ubu iri mu minwe y’umushikirizamanza mukuru muri reta ya Delaware. Umushingwamanza wa Hunter avuga ko ata mutegetsi wo mu rwego rw’igendereza yigeze amwegera. Abandanya ahakana ko ata mategeko yahonyanze. Igisata ca Amerika kijejwe ubutungane canse kugira ico kibivuzeko. Hunter Biden w’imyaka 52 ni umunyamategeko akaba n'umuntu uvuga rikumvwa yakoreye hanze, harimwo mu Bushinwa no muri Ukraine. Mu 2014 yarasezerewe mu gisirikare ca Amerika kirwanira mu mazi bamaze gusanga yaranyoye ikiyayuramutwe co mu bwoko bwa kokayine (Cocaine). Nk’uko vyandikwa na Washington Post, abajejwe igendereza ku rwego rw’igihugu batanguye kumugirako amatohoza mu 2018, mu ntango aya matohoza akaba yashingiye ku mafaranga yakoresha mu bikorwa vyiwe yakorera mu mahanga. Inyuma y’imisi, amatohoza yatanguye kwibanda ku kumenya nimba Hunter yaramenyesheje amatungo yiwe akanatanga insiguro z’ibinyoma mu mpapuro ziwe yakoresheje mu kugura inkoho mu 2018. Mu gitabo casohowe umwaka uheze, yaremeje ko yari akinywa ikiyayuramutwe co mu bwoko bwa kokayine ico gihe. Ariko Washington Post yandika ko yavuze ngo “oya” kw’ifishe (fiche) y’igihugu yamubaza nimba “yarakoresha ikiyayuramutwe co mu bwoko bwa marijuana, canke ikindi kiyayuramutwe ico ari co cose camutwara ubwenge”. Ibirego mpanavyaha bifise inkomoko ku binyoma biri kw’ifishe yo kugura inkoho bibandanya biba imbonekarimwe kandi bigaharurwa mu majana buri mwaka. Mw’itangazo ryarungikiwe CBS, umushingwamanza w’uyu muhungu wa Perezida wa Amerika avuga ko yiteze y’uko igisata kijejwe ubutungane “kizokora amatohoza ataho gihengamiye congere kiburanye” abo bose basohoye amabanga ku bijanye n’iri tohoza. Itangazo ry’umushingwamanza Chris Clark rivuga riti: “Nk’uko ari nkenerwa kandi bisabwa n’amategeko, twizeye ko abashikirizamanza muri runo rubanza bariko barihweza mu bwitonzi bwinshi, atari ivyemezo bitangwa n’abajejwe igendereza gusa, ariko kandi n’ibindi vyabona muri iyi dosiye, harimwo ivyabona vy’uwuburanywa”. "Iki ni igikorwa c’abashikirizamanza. Ntibategerezwa guterwa igitsure, kwihutishwa canke ngo banengwe kubera bariko barakora ico bajejwe”. Clark yongerako y’uko atigeze avugana n’umuntu n’umwe mu bariko barakora amatohoza. Avuga ko inkuru iyo ari yo yose yatanzwe n’abajejwe amatohoza – yavuzwe na Washington Post, ari nayo yasohoye ubwa mbere iyi nkuru – yari “ihengamye, y’uruhande rumwe kandi ntiyari iy’ukuri”. Hunter Biden amaze igihe kitari gito agenzurwa n’abo ku ruhande rw’aba Conservateurs/Conservative basanzwe bavuga ko ibikorwa vyiwe vy’ubucuruzi akorera mu mahanga vyuzuye ibiturire. Abarepubulikani bariyemeje kumukorako amatohoza mu nama nshingamateka mu gihe boronka intebe nyinshi mu matora y’abashingamateka n’abakenguzamateka yimirije mu kwezi kuza. Mu gihe Hunter Biden yemera ko ubuzima bwiwe bwabayemwo ibibazo kandi ko yigeze kunywa ibiyayuramutwe, yaba se wiwe canke we nyene, bompi barahakana ko ata bikorwa biteye kubiri n’amategeko yagiyemwo. Yemeye ubwa mbere ko yari azi ko hari amatohoza ariko arakorwa mu kw’icumi na kabiri 2020. Mw’itangazo, Hunter yari afise icizere ko “isuzumwa ry’abahinga kandi ataho ryegamiye muri ibi bintu rizokwerekana neza ko nakoze ibikorwa vyanje mu nzira nziza kandi nkurikije amategeko, ndabifashijwemwo n’abahanuzi b’abahinga mu bijanye n’amakori”. Mu kwa kane, umukuru w’ibiro vy’umukuru w’igihugu Joe Biden, Ron Klain, yavuze ko umukuru w’igihugu "yizeye ko umuhungu wiwe atigeze ahonyanga amategeko”, ariko ko ari igikorwa kiraba igisata c’ubutungane kandi ko ibiro vy’umukuru w’igihugu bidashobora kuvyivangamwo. Mu 2018, Hunter Biden yarakozweko amatohoza inyuma y’aho uwari umukunzi wiwe ico gihe ataye inkoho yiwe mu gikapu c’imyanda hafi y’ishure, nk’uko vyavuzwe n’ibinyamakuru vya Amerika. Abakozi bo mu gisata c’igendereza bavugwa ko baciye baseruka, nk’uko vyandikwa n’ikinyamakuru Politico, mu kugendera iduka rya Delaware yari yaguriyemwo iyi nkoho mu ntango z’uko kwezi baca basaba ko baronswa ifishe yerekana kahise kiwe. Nyene iyo duka y’inkoho yaranse kubaha izo mpapuro, nk’uko vyandikwa n’iki kinyamakuru co ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi kandi nta vyaha yagirijwe.

headline: MTN iragirizwa guha ibiturire aba Talibani na Al-Qaeda
text: Ikompanyi nkuru ya terefone ngendanwa muri Afrika, MTN, iragirizwa ko yoba yarahaye  imirwi y'abarwanyi bagendera kuvyiyumvira bikaze vya Isilamu muri Afghanistani amahera mu kwikingira. Ivyo birego vyatanzwe mu rubanza rwugurujwe ku wa gatanu muri sentare ya Amerika bivuga ko iyo kompanyi yahonyanze amategeko ya Amerika arwanya iterabwoba. Urwo rubanza rwugurujwe kw'izina ry'imiryango y'abanyamerika bishwe mu bitero vyo muri Afghanistani. Hari n'ayandi makompanyi atanu avugwa muri urwo rubanza. Muri urwo rubanza, MTN iregwa ko yahaye ibiturire Al-Qaïda hamwe n'abarwanyi b'aba Talibani mu ntumbero y'ukurondera kubungabunga umutekano w'iminara yayo. Ayo mahera avugwa yarafashije mu migumuko yateguwe n'aba talibani, yatumye haba ibitero muri Afghanistani hagati ya 2009 na 2017, nk'uko ivyo birego bivuga. Ayo mahera yoba yarafashije "imirwi y'iterabwoba izwi mu vyo uburyo", ivyahonyanze amategeko yerekeye kurwanya iterabwoba. Iyo kompanyi yo muri Afrika y'Epfo yemeza ko yoyo ibandanya ikora ibikorwa vyayo "mu buryo bwemewe n'amategeko mu bihugu vyose ikoreramwo". MTN niyo kompanyi ya mbere ikomeye ya terefone ngendanwa muri Afrika, ikagira umunani ku rwego rw'isi, ikaba ifise abanywanyi imiliyoni 240. Mu 2015, abategetsi ba Nigeria baraciriye iyo kompanyi ihadabu rya miliyari zitanu zirenga z'amadolari y'abanyamerika kubera yiyobagije guca ama karata sim yayo atari yanditswe. Ico gihano cagihe kugabanywa gushika kuri miliyari 1.7 habanje kuba impari ndende, hanyuma n'uwari umukuru w'igihugu ca Afrika y'Epfo Jacob Zuma na we nyene arafasha. Mu kwa kabiri kw'umwaka uheze, uwahoze aserukira ico gihugu muri Irani yarahagaritswe ku mugwa mukuru Pretoria, yagirijwe ko yariye igiturire kugira afashe MTN kuronka uruhusha rwa miliyari 31.6 rwo gukorera muri Irani.

headline: Joe Biden: "Ivyiyumviro vya Trump birageramiye demokrasi ya Amerika"
text: Abashigikiye umugambi wa Trump “Make America Great Again” (Maga) barageramiye demokrasi, vyaraye bivuzwe n’umukuru wa Amerika Joe Biden. “Abashigikiye Maga bashaka gusubiza iki gihugu inyuma,” niko Biden yavuze mw’ijambo yashikirije mu gihe tevelivison iba iriko irarabwa n’abantu benshi cane, akaba yari muri Pennsylvania. Umukuru w’aba-Republicain (umugambwe wa Trump)  Kevin McCarthy, nawe yarashikirije ijambo ryiwe, avuga ko Biden “yakomerekeje cane umushaha wa Amerika”. Ayo majambo abiri abangabanganwa yavuzwe mu gihe hasigaye amezi abiri ngo habe amatora yo hagati mu kiringo (mid-term canke mi-mandat) , amatora avamwo kubona ingene ubwiganze bumeze mu butegetsi bwa Washington. Prezida wa Amerika ijambo ryiwe yarishikirije ku wa kane mw’ijoro ari ahitwa Independence Hall muri Philadelphia, ahashiriwe umukono kw’itangazo ry’ukwikukira kwa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Yagarutse ku civuga ciwe co mu matora yo mu 2020 co kugarukana ”umushasha wa Amerika”. Yavuze ko  atiyamiriza Abanyamerika bose bashika miriyoni 74 batoye Trump haraheze imyaka ibiri. Yavuze ati:  “Umu-Republicain wese si umu-Maga, mbere n’ubwiganze bw’aba-Republicain si aba-Maga”. Yabandanije ati: “Ariko si ivyo kubaza,  ubu umuganbwe w’aba-Republicain wifatiwe kandi   ugoswe na Trump n’aba-Maga, ivyo rero birageramiye igihugu.” Biden yavuze ko abashigikiye Trump bibaza bibaza ko abateye Capitol mu mwaka uheze ari abakunda igihugu aho gufata ko ari abagumutsi. Yabandanije ati: “Mu  gihe kitari gito, twagumye twibaza ko demokrasi ya Amerika ataho ikija. Ivyo si vyo. Dutegerezwa kuyirwanira. Kuyikingira. Tukayihagararira. Umwe umwe wese muri twebwe.” Yishura, Trump yashigikiye icivugo ciwe ca Maga  hanyuma avuga ko umukeba wiwe ari we “ageramiye Amerika”. Mu gihe cose Biden yariko arashikiriza ijambo, hari umuntu yagumye avuza inzamba, nk’uko bivugwa n’umunayamakuru wa BBC yari ahari. Prezida Biden yagize ico abivugako kabiri, irya kabiri avuga ati :” Bafise uburenganzira bwo kurakara. Iyi ni demokrasi.” Biden yashitse ku butegetsi avuga ko aje kwunga igihugu, agize igihe yakajije imvugo yiwe ku bashigikiye Trump. Ku ndwi iheze, Biden yagereranije ico yise aba-Republicain bakaze no  kuba begeranye na “faschism”. McCarthy, arongoye aba-Republicain ubu badafise ubwiganze mu nama nshingamateka, yari yavuze imbere, ari mu gisagara c’amavukiro ca Biden ca Scranton muri Pennsylvania. Uwo mushingamateka wo muri California yavuze ko umukuru w’igihugu “yahisemwo gucanishamwo, gutesha agaciro benewewabo b’abanyamerika”. “Kubera iki? Ni ukubera batemera imigambi yiwe. Ubwo si uburongozi.” Yasavye Biden “gusaba imbabazi ku kwambika ibara miriyoni z’abanyamrika mu kubita aba-faschist”. Umukuru w’aba-Republicain yavuze ko ubutegetsi bwa Biden bwatumye abanyamerika bugarizwa n’iduga ry’ibiciro, imbibe zuguruye, amashure yugawe mu gihe ca Covid aguhangabanya ivyigwa vy’abana, ukuva muri Afghanistan kwabaye mu kajagari , hamwe n’ubwicanyi mu gihugu kuruta ikindi gice cose mu myaka 20. Yabandanije ati: “Mu myaka ibiri iheze, Joe Biden yarabbaje umushasha wa Amerika, abanyagihugu bayo, amategeko yayo, n’ingengagaciro za mbere ntakorwako. Yarababaje, imigambi yiwe yarakomerekeje cane umushasha wa Amerika, isubiza hasi agatima ka Amerika kandi arahemukira icizere ca Amerika. Trump nawe yongereje ikineguro kw’ijambo rya  Biden mu butumwa yanditse ku rubuga hwaniro rwiwe. Yanditse ati: “Niba adashaka gusubiza Amerika kuba igihangange, ivyo navyo mu majambo, mu bikorwa, mu vyiyumviro akaba atabishaka, aho rero nta nkeka ntakwiye kuva ahagarariye  Reta Zunze za Amerika.” Ariko abitaba amatora bavuganye na BBC mu gisagara gitoya ca Newfoundland ku 190km mu buraruko bw’aho Joe Biden yavugiye ijambo, nta mpungenege berekanye zo kuba demokrasi igeramiwe nk’uko yabivuze. Igiciro c’ibitoto niwo wari umwitwarariko w’abanyamerika aho bari mw’ihayanishwa muri iyo ntara. Abanyamerika benshi berekanye ubudasa bw’ubutunzi mu gihe ca Trump n’ubu. Ariko hari umuntu yavuze ko yabaye umu-Republicain ubuzima bwiwe bwose yavuze ko atazokwigera atora Trump canke abo bose azoba ashigikiye. Izina rya Trump nta na hamwe rizoba ryanditse ku mpapuro zo gutora, ariko kuba ahari ntibizohara. Mu mpera z’iyi ndwi niwe azoba arongoye ikoraniro rya poritike mu karere ka  Scranton. Benshi mu ba-Republicain bitoza  muri iyi ntara baronse amajwi yo kwitoza kubera bashigikiwe n’uwo yahora ari umukuru w’igihugu.

headline: Burundi-HCR : 'Amakungu ashigikiye igikorwa co gutahukana impunzi' - Filippo Grandi
text: Umukuru w'ishami rya ONU riraba impunzi Filippo Grandi  avuga ko mu gihe akunze guhura n'ibibazo vyihuta vy'abahunga ibihugu vyabo, mu Burundi ho yasanze abataha kuko ''hari amahoro''. Bavuye ku mupaka w'Uburundi n'Urwanda wa Gasenyi/Nemba aho yajabukiye avuye mu Rwanda ku wa kabiri, Filippo Grandi  n'abategetsi b'Uburundi bamwakiriye baciye baja Musasa muri Ngozi. Aho hari  ikambi irimwo impunzi z'abanyekongo barenga ibihumbi umunani. Bagiye na  Kinazi mu ntara ya Muyinga, ahari ikambi abarundi bahungutse  bamaramwo igihe c'iminsi itatu imbere y'uko basubizwa mu ntara n'amakomine baturukamwo. Nihano hashikiye abarundi barenga 150 baje bazananye n'uwo mutegetsi wa HCR bahungutse bava mu Rwanda. Muri ico gihugu haracabarizwa impunzi z'abarundi zirenga ibihumbi 50. Abatari bake muri bo bivugwa ko muri iyi minsi biyandikishije ku bwinshi kugirango batahe mu gihe bugarijwe n'inzara kubera imfashanyo yo kubaho yagabanuwe gushika ku 60%. Umukuru wa HCR Filippo Grandi yamenyesheje ko amakungu ashigikiye uwo mugambi wo gutahuka. Ijambo ritegerezwa kuba ryakiriwe neza na reta y'Uburundi hari igihe yigeze kwagiriza HCR ko itorohereza abarundi bashaka gutaha. Filippo Grandi  yagize ati: "Akenshi nkuze guhura n'abari mu bibazo vy'abakeneye ubutabazi bwihuta... ni gake nsanga aho abantu bahunguka kuko mu gihugu cabo hari  amahoro. ''Ndabakeje rero kuri iyo ngingo mwafashe yo guhunguka…. Ndi ngaha mu Burundi kandi kugira mbwire reta y'iki gihugu ko amakungu ashigikiye igikorwa co gutahukana impunzi." Umushikiranganji w'Uburundi ashinzwe umutekano n'intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu Gervais Ndirakobuca yakiriye uwo mutegetsi wa HCR, yahaye ikaze abari bahungutse n'abandi bose bari mu nzira baza. Abasaba gufaha urugamba rumwe gusa avuga ko Uburundi busigaranye, urugamba rw'ubukene. Yavuze ko ashaka kubashimira ko bumvise akamo k'umukuru w'Uburundi ''aho asaba y'uko abarundi n'abarundikazi bose bahunze igihugu  kuza gufasha bene wabo kugira tuje muri rwa rugamba rumwe dusigaranye rw'ubukene. ''Urugamba dusigaranye muri iki gihugu, ni urugamba rumwe gusa, n'urugamba rw'ubukene". Uburundi  buracafise mu Rwanda, muri Tanzania, Congo na Uganda abarundi hafi ibihumbi 300 bahungiyeyo. Abahinga ba ONU n'imiryango iharanira agateka ka zina muntu mu  minsi bagirije reta za Tanzania  n'Uburundi kubangamira agateka k'impunzi muri Tanzania mu bikorwa birimwo kuzinyuruza, kizifunga no kuzitahukana mu Burundi ku gahato canke mu buryo bunyuranye n'amategeko. Uburundi nabwo burahaye indaro impunzi zishika ibihumbi 80 zigwiriyemwo cane cane abanyekongo, ku bw'ibiharuro bitangwa na HCR.

headline: Ethiopia - TPLF: Amakungu atewe impungenge n’indyane za Tigray zabaye ndanse
text: Amakungu abandanya atera akamo ko intambara yo mu ntara ya Tigray igoswe n’ingabo za Ethiopia ihagarara. Ni mu gihe kuva mu misi mike iheze ibintu vyasubiye kwunyuka mu turere twinshi, harimwo Shire, igisagara gihaye indaro ibihumbi n’ibihumbi vy’abataye izabo. Ingabo za Tigray ziherutse kwagiriza igisirikare ca Ethiopia hamwe n’incuti zaco za Eritrea ko babandanya bacucagira amabombe hagati no hanze y’iki gisagara. Ishirahamwe ry’abatabazi International Rescue Committee rivuga ko umukozi waryo yari umwe mu basivire baherutse kwicigwa muri ico gisagara. Inyuma y’aho hasubiriye kwaduka indyane zigatuma utwigoro tw’ubutabazi muri iyo ntara dukwama kuva mu kwa munani, amashirahamwe y’ubutabazi aratera akamo atabaza ko izi ndyane zishobora gutuma ibintu biyangara kandi vyari bisanzwe ari bibi. i﻿biganiro vyari bitegekanijwe mu ndwi iheze mu ntumbero yo gutorera umuti izi ndyane zirangwa muri ino ntara yo mu buraruko bwa Ethiopia vyarungurijwe ku mvo z'uburyo. Umunyamabanga mukuru w’ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU, Antonio Guterres, avuga ko atewe impungenge n’ingene ingwano zasubiye kuba ndanse, agasaba ashimitse ko zihagarara. Josep Borrell Fontelles ajejwe imigenderanire mw’ishirahamwe ry’Ubumwe bwa Bulaya nawe avuga ko ababajwe cane n’indyane hamwe n’abasivire baterwa muri ico gisagara ca Shire. Addis Ababa ntaco iravuga ko aya majambo ariko imbere y’aha yahakanye ko idatera abasivire. Ku ruhande rwayo,  mw’itangazo yasohoye ku wa gatandatu, Eritrea yavuze ko ivyo yagirizwa n’Ubumwe bwa Bulaya ko “ifise uruhara rwo gusambura” mu ntambara ya Tigray ko ari “ugutoteza n’ibigirankana abahitanwa n’iyi ntambara yahiswemwo na TPLF”. Umukuru w’ishirahamwe USAID  Samantha Power yanditse ku rubuga rwa Twitter uno musi ku wa Mungu avuga ko “ibitero vy’urudavagi” bikorwa n’ingabo za Ethiopia n’iza Eritrea, ndetse n’uko bishoboka ko iz’iki gihugu ca Eritrea “zishobora vuba kwigarurira ibigo vy’abasivire, biteye impungengen nyinshi”. Umunyamabanga wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ajejwe imigenderanire Anthony Blinken yateye akamo ingabo za Ethiopia n’iza Eritrea guhagarika “ibitero rusangi” vyavyo, ingabo za Tigray nazo “guhagarika ibikorwa vy’agasomborotso”. Ntibiboneka neza nimba Addis Ababa n’ingabo za Tigray bazosubira ku meza y’ibiganiro inyuma y’aho ibiganiro vy’intangamarara vyari bitegekanijwe gutangura mu ndwi iheze vyugururijwe ku mvo zivugwa ko ari iz’uburyo. Ariko umushikiranganji wa Ethiopia ajejwe ikigega ca reta, Eyob Tekalign, aho ari muri kino gihe i Washington mu nama y’ikigega mpuzamakungu n’ibanki y’isi yose, avuga ko yizeye ko hazoba ibiganiro vy’amahoro mu “ndwi nkeya ziri imbere”.

headline: Roberta Metsola: Inama nshingamateka ya Buraya yatoye umukuru wa mbere akiri muto cane
text: Roberta Metsola yatowe nk'umuntu wa mbere akiri muto abaye umukuru w'inama nshingamateka ya Buraya, kandi akaba abaye umugore wa mbere agiye muri ico kibanza mu myaka 20. Madame Metsola, w'imyaka 43, azwi cane kuba aterekwa ivyo gukorora inda, yavuze yamara ko ashigikiye uburenganzira bw'abagabo canke abagore bagira imigenderanire mpuzabitsina n'abagabo canke abagore nka bo, abiyumva mu bitsina vyompi, n'abiyumva mu gitsina batavukanye (LGBT). Uwo mugore akomoka muri Malte agiye muri ico kibanza asubirira David Sassoli, yari afise imyaka 65, yapfuye mu ndwi iheze ahitanywe n'indwara ikomeye. Abaye umwe mu bagore batatu bafise ibibanza bikomeye cane  mw'Ishirahamwe rya Bulaya inyuma y'umukuru w'urwego rutwara iryo shirahamwe (Commission Europeene), n'umukuru w'ibanki nkuru ya Buraya. Ariko igihe yariko arishura ibibazo vy'abamenyeshamakuru ku wa kabiri, yabajijwe akarenga rimwe ku bijanye n'ingene asanzwe abona uburenganzira bw'abagore ku bijanye n'ukuvyara. Yaraneguwe ku buryo yagiye aratora kuri ico kibazo, kandi mu 2015, yifatanije n'abandi bashingamateka ba Buraya bakomoka muri Malte mu kuvuga ko "bateye kubiri bashimitse n'ugukorora inda". Igihugu gisanzwe ciganjemwo idini rya katolika, Malte nico conyenyene co mw'ishirahamwe rya Buraya gifise amategeko abuza rwose ugukorora inda. Ariko Madame Metsola yagumye ashimika ko azohagararira aho inama nshingamateka ya Buraya ihagaze kuri ico kibazo, aho guhagararira aho wenyene uko we asanwe abona ibintu. Yavuze ko iyo nama nshingamateka "yasubiyemwo kenshi ko ubwo burenganzira bwokingirwa neza gusumba". "Aho mpagaze ni ahahagaze inama nshingamateka ya Buraya". Uwo mugore asanzwe yize ivy'amategeko. Mu buzi yari amaze gukora harimwo kuba umujenama w'umunyaporitike w'umwongereza Baroness Ashton, ico gihe yari ajejwe poritike y'imigenderanire y'Ishirahamwe rya Buraya. Ariko amamuko yiwe  yo muri Malte niyo yitaweho cane amaze gutorwa n'abashingamateka ba Buraya. Malte ni igihugu gifise abantu barenga gato 500.000 kikaba ari naco gihugu ca mbere gito mu bigize ishirahamwe rya Buraya. Yatangaye anezerewe igihe yabona abavukagihugu biwe aho abanyamakuru bakoranira I Strasbourg ati: "Sinari bwabone abanya-Malte benshi gutya ngaha". Yanaronse uwumusubiza kuko umwe mu banyamakuru yaciye avuga ati:  "Turagukeje. Nk'abanya-Malte turishimiye cane kuba watowe kuja muri ico kibanza c'iteka rikomeye." Malte n'igihugu gisanganywe imigenderanire ya kahise n'Ubwomgereza, caronse intahe yo kwikukira mu 1964. Imigenderanire y'Ubwongereza n'Ishirahamwe rya Buraya ntiyoroshe kuva habaye Brexit n'ubwo umushikiraganji w'Ubwongereza ajejwe imigenderanire Liz Truss azwi kuba ariko aragerageza ko hoba "ukuyisubiza ku ntango". Umu-diplomate umwe  wo mw'Ishirahamwe rya Buraya yavuze ko mu gihe Madame Metsola ashobora "guhengamira gutahura Abongereza", nta nzira nshasha azobaha ku migenderanire ifatiye kuri Brexit: "Ashira imbere Uburaya. Ico azoshira imbere ya vyose ni Ishirahamwe rya Buraya". Vyari kugorana ko atorwa kuba umukuru w'inama nshingamateka ya Buraya iyaba yari ameze ukundi uko ariko kwose kiretse uko.

headline: Intambara ya Ukraine: ibiraro vyose vyinjira muri Severodonetsk vyarabomowe
text: Ibiraro vyose vyinjira mu gisagara ca Severodonetsk muri Ukraine vyarabomowe, nk’uko bivugwa na buramatari. Mu gihe iki gisagara ubu cazibiwe burundu, Serhiy Haidai avuga ko ivyo gufasha no guhungisha abasivire ubu ari ibinti bitagishoboka. Intambara zikomeye ziriko zibera muri ico gisagara aho abategetsi ba Ukraine bavuga ko amabombe y’Uburusiya yomoye ingabo za Ukraine hagati muri ico gisagara. Haraciye indwi zitari nke igisirikare c’Uburusiya kigerageza gufata Severodonetsk. Kwigarurira Severodonetsk hamwe n’ikindi gisagara vyegeranye ca Lysychansk bishobora gutuma Uburusiya bugenzura intara yose ya Luhansk, mu gihe ubu igice kinini cayo kiri mu minwe y’inyeshamba zishaka kwiyonkora kuri Ukraine zishigikiwe n’Uburusiya. Haidai yanditse ku rubuga rwa Instagram ko ibiraro vyose vyinjira muri Severodonetsk vyabomowe. Yongerako y’uko abanyagihugu basigaye  muri iki gisagara babayeho mu “buzima bubi cane”. Jordan Gatley yahoze ari mu ngabo z‘Ubwongereza ni umwe mu bahasize ubuzima bariko bagerageza kurwanira iki gisagara, nk’uko umuryango wiwe wavyemeje ku wa Mungu. Umukuru w’igihugu ca Ukraine, Volodomyr Zelensky, avuga ko igiciro c’abantu bamaze kuhasiga ubuzima barwanira Severodonetsk “giteye ubwoba”. Avuga ko ingabo za Ukraine zatanye mu mitwe n’iz’Uburusiya “hafi imetero ku yindi”. Amakuru avuga ko ibice hafi 70% ubu biri mu minwe y’Uburusiya. Ingabo za Ukraine zikiri mu gisagara zitegerezwa “kwishikana canke gupfa”, nk’uko bivugwa n’intumwa ya gisirikare yo mu ntara ya Donetsk iherutse gutangaza ko yikukiye ikitwa Donetsk People's Republic ishigikiwe n’Uburusiya. Avugana n’abanyamakuru i Donesk, Eduard Basurin yavuze ati: “Ingabo za Ukraine ziri hariya [ i in Severodonetsk] ziriyo ubutakivayo. Umutegetsi mukuru w’Uburusiya avuga ko intumbero ya Moscou yari iyo gukingira Donetsk na Luhansk ziherutse gutangaza ko ari repubulika zigenga. Umuvugizi wa Kremlin, Dmitry Peskov, yasubiwemwo n’itororokanirizo ry’amakuru RIA Novosti avuga ati: “Muri rusangi, gukingira izi repubulika niyo ntumbero nyamukuru y’igikorwa kidasanzwe ca gisirikare”. Igihe Perezida Vladimir Putin atanguza intambara ku wa 24 Ruhuhuma (2), yavuga ko intumbero y’Uburusiya yari iyo “gusambura igisirikare no gukuraho ivyiyumviro vy’iki-Nazi muri Ukraine”. Mu nyuma hiyongeyeko iyindi ntumbero: gukora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo Ukraine ntigire uruhande na rumwe yegamira. Ejo ku wa mbere, abategetsi ba Ukraine bongeye kuvuga ko ibirwanisho bitangwa n’Uburengero bitariko birashika ningoga nk’uko vyategerezwa. Umuhanuzi mukuru wa Perezida Zelensky yavuze ko kugira ngo bashobore guhagarika intambara ari uko igisirikare ca Ukraine “kironswa ibirwanisho bikomeye”, anashira ahabona urutonde rw’ibirwansiho rutura Kyiv ikeneye.
