Avuga mu kiganiro ca BBC, Newshour, umuhanuzi wo mu bushikiranganji bwa Ukraine bujejwe kwivuna abansi yavuze ko ingabo zirwanira Severodonetsk zari kuba zarihagazeko iyo zironswa ibirwanisho bikomeye imbere y’igihe. Yury Sak yavuze ko ingabo ziriko zirwanira iki gisagara “zikoresheje uburyo bushoboka zifise” ariko ko zishobora kuba zaravyifashemwo “neza gusumba mu kwirukana umwansi no kubohoza ubutaka bwa Ukraine iyo turonswa ibindi birwanisho bikomeye gushika ubu”. Yongerako y’uko inguvu z’Uburusiya ziteye ubwoba – aho ingabo zabwo zitera ibisasu 50.000 ku musi, zikubaka “uruhome rwa vya muzinga, ibitero vy’indege, hamwe n’ibisasu vya misire” kuri Ukraine. Mu ndwi nke ziheze, ibihugu vy’Uburengero vyariyemeje kurungikira Kyiv ibirwanisho birasa kure, harimwo n’Ubwongereza bwatangaje ku ncuro ya mbere ko bwari kurungika ibikoho birasa ica rimwe bibisasu vya roketi vyinshi mu ntumbero yo gufasha Ukraine kwivuna.

headline: Ukraine-Russia: Amb Edouard Bizimana avuga ko aba hariya bo babona ata ntambara ishoboka
text: Ingingo y'Uburusiya yo kwemera ubwigenge bwa Donetsk na Luhansk, zishaka kwiyonkora kuri Ukraine ishobora gutuma haba impande zibiri zitana mu mitwe bigatuma intambara ikomera, nk'uko Edouard Bizimana aserukira Uburundi mu Burusiya yabwiye BBC Gahuzamiryango. Ambasaderi Bizimana abona ko "Ukraine iriko iraba nk'ikintu c'igikoresho bakoresha kugira ngo bamwe bamwe bashike ku nyungu zabo". Imbere y'uko Vladimir Putin ategeka ingabo kwinjira muri utu turere turi mu minwe y'inyeshamba ku musi wa mbere, hari utwigoro twari tuhasanzwe two kugarura icuka ciza muri ako karere. Utu twigoro twari dushingiye ku masezerano yo mu 2014 hagati y'Uburusiya na Ukraine, azwi nk'amasezerano ya Minsk, yari yerekeye guhagarika intambara hagati ya Ukraine n'izi nyeshamba zishigikiwe n'Uburusiya Ariko inyuma y'aho Putin yemereye ubwigenge bw'izi ntara zibiri zishaka kwiyonkora kuri Ukraine ku wa mbere, ibihugu vyo mu Burengero vyagirije umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburusiya ko yayahamvye, maze bica vyihutira gufatira ibihano Uburusiya. Ambasaderi Bizimana avuga ko, ku bijanye n'umutekano wa Ukraine inyuma y'iyi ngingo ya Perezida Putin, "zirya ntara zishobora kwitabaza Uburusiya nk'uko nabwo nyene bwabitangaje ko buzorungika abantu gucungera umutekano". Agira ati: "Urumva ico gihe, hazoca haba impande zibiri z'igisirikare ceruye, zishobora guhangana, ugasanga intambara iciye ikomera kuko urumva ko n'ibikoresho bizoca vyiyongera, vyongererezwe n'ubushobozi". Nayo ku kibazo c'ibiganiro, Ambasaderi Bizimana abona ko hakiri amahirwe, kuko impande zompi ziremeza ko imiryango icuguriye. Ukraine ni kimwe mu bihugu vyahoze bigize icitwa Reta Zunze Ubumwe z'Aba Soviet (URSS/USSR) yasambutse mu 1991, ivyari biyigize, harimwo Uburusiya na Ukraine, bigaca vyigenga. Ukraine ntirinjira mw'ishirahamwe ryo kwivunira umwansi hamwe, OTAN/NATO, ariko ni "incuti yaryo" - ibi bigasigura ko hari umwumvikano izi mpande zompi zagiriraniye ko iki gihugu gishobora kwemererwa kwinjira muri iri shirahamwe muri kazoza. Mu gihe Uburusiya buvuga ko ivya Ukraine vyo kwinjira muri OTAN ari umurongo utukura, Ambasaderi Bizimana abona ko iri shirahamwe ridashobora kwakira Ukraine ubu nyene muri bino bihe. Abona kandi ko kugira ibintu birinde bigera aho bigeze, habuze ugushaka kw'impande zompi kwo kwumviriza ibibazo buri ruhande rufise. Ati: "Buriya [...] iyo bumvikana bakumviriza ingorane Abarusiya babatura, hanyuma na Ukraine bakumviriza ibibazo ifise, nibaza ko tutari gushika hiyo". Hampande y'uko igice kitari gito c'abanya Ukraine bakoresha ururimi rw'ikirusiya, ibi bihugu bisangiye vyinshi harimwo n'imico n'imigenzo. Ambasaderi Bizimana abona ko haba Abarusiya ubwabo, canke abanya Ukraine, bose babona ko ari abavukanyi, rero ko ata ntambara ishoboka hagati y'ibibihugu bibiri. Ati: "Abanya Ukraine barasangiye ibintu vyinshi n'Uburusiya kandi na hano ubumvirije - ari Abarusiya canke abanya Ukraine - baravuga y'uko ari abavukanyi. "Hariho benshi gushika ubu bavuga bati 'ntitwiyumvira y'uko Abarusiya bodutera, bakaturwanya bakatugirira nabi. N'Abarusiya na bo nyene baravuga bati 'ni abavukanyi […] ni abavandimwe mu bisanzwe'".

headline: Ukraine - Russia: Intambara ziriko zibera ku mugwa mukuru Kyiv, Zelensky asaba ibiganiro
text: Itangazo rya reta ya Ukraine ryasubiwemwo n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru rya Ukraine, Interfax, rivuga ko intambara ziriko zibera mu mabarabara ya Kyiv, umugwa mukuru w'iki gihugu. Rivuga riti: "Hari intambara mu mabarabara y'igisagara cacu muri uno mwanya". Rigabisha ababa muri iki gisagara kuguma mu mazu kandi bakirinda kwegera amadirisha canke amabaraza. Uyu musi ugize gatatu igirisirikakre c'Uburusiya gitanguye igitero gikomeye muri Ukraine inyuma y'aho utwigoro tw'ibiganiro hagati ya reta y'Uburusiya n'ibihugu vyo mu Burengero ataco dushikiyeko. Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky wa Ukraine asaba ibiganiro na Perezida Vladimir Putin w'Uburusiya kugira ngo intambara ihagarare, ni inyuma y'aho Kremlin itangarije ko Uburusiya bwiteguye kuganira n'ubutegetsi bwa ukraine. Itororokaniro ry'amakuru Reuters rivuga ko ibibombe biremereye vyumvikanye, biherekejwe n'amasasu menshi mu turere tw'uburengero bw'umugwa mukuru Kyiv. Amakuru ava muri ico gihugu avuga ko hari intambara zikomeye muri Kyiv. Giciye ku rubuga rwa Facebook, igisirikare ca Ukraine gitangaza "intambara z'urutavanako ziriko ziraba" mu karere ka Vasylkiv muri ico gisagara. Kivuga kandi ko casubije inyuma igitero c'ingabo z'Uburusiya kw'ikambi ya gisirikare iri ku mugwa mukuru Kyiv. Amakuru atangwa ku mbuga hwaniro n'abanyamakuru bakorera i Kyiv aremeza ko intambara ziriko zibera mu mabarabara ya Kyiv, abenshi bakavuga ko bumva ibibombe biremereye biturika n'amasasu hafi cane y'akarere ko hagati mu gisagara. Igisirikare ca Ukraine congerako y'uko ingabo zaco zakoroye indege zitari nke "z'umwansi" ku musi w'ejo, kandi ko zabujije ingabo z'Uburusiya kwigarurira ibisagara vya Ukraine. Icakora, umunyamabanga mukuru w'inama y'igihugu ijejwe umutekano no kwivuna abansi, Oleksiy Danilov, avuga ko ingabo z'igihugu zifise "ibintu" i Kyiv, agira ati: "Turahagarika aka kajagari dukoresheje uburyo bwose bushoboka", nk'uko vyandikwa n'ikinyamakuru gikorera ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi  co muri Ukraine Lb. ua. Mu gihe igisirikare c'Uburusiya kibandanya ibitero vy'urutavanako kuri Ukraine, umuvugizi wa Perezida Zelensky avuga ko igihugu ciwe citeguye kuja mu biganiro vy'amahoro no guhagarika intambara n'Uburusiya vuba bwango. Avuga ko abategetsi b'Uburusiya n'aba Ukraine ubu bariko baravugana igihe n'ikibanza ivyo biganiro vyoberamwo. Uburusiya bwobwo buvuga ko buzoganira gusa mu gihe igisirikare cose ca Ukraine kizoba camanitse amaboko. Umunyamabanga mukuru w'ishirahamwe ONU Antonio Guterres asaba ko hoba akandi karyo k'ibiganiro vy'amahoro, ni inyuma y'umubonano w'Inama nkuru ya ONU aho Uburusiya bwahagaritse integuro y'icemezo cayo co kwiyamiriza igitero kuri Ukraine. Yanditse ku rubuga rwa Twitter ati: "ONU yavyawe n'intambara mu ntumbero yo guhagarika intambara. Uno musi, vyanse ko dushika kuri iyi ntumbero. Ariko nta gucika inkokora. Ni ngombwa ko dusubira tukagerageza Inyuma y'aho, yateye akamo ingabo z'Uburusiya zakoze iki gitero kuri Ukraine gusubira ku birindiro vyazo. Iki cemezo vyaboneka ko ataho cari gushika kubera Uburusiya bufise ububasha bwo guhagarika ingingo iyo ari yo yose budashimye (veto) kuko ari umunywanyi ntayegayezwa w'iyi Nama Nkuru ya ONU. Ku ruhande rwiwe, uwuserukira Uburusiya muri ONU Vassily Nebenzia yashimiye ibihugu biri mu Nama nkuru ya ONU bitashigikiye integuro y'iki cemezo cayo avuga ko ari ico "kurwanya Uburusiya".

headline: Ethiopia – Tigray: Uko umushikiranganji wa mbere Abiy Ahmed yayoboye urugamba rwo gutuza inyeshamba
text: Umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Ethiopia Abiy Ahmed yabanje kwibutsa ubutwari bw'abami batwaye ico gihugu mu gufata ingingo yo kuja ku rugamba kurwanya inyeshamba za Tigray zari zagabishije ko zigiye gutembagaza ubutegetsi bwiwe. Mu mashusho adasanzwe yerekana umugabo yatangajwe ko yatsindiye ku ncuro ya 100 agashimwe k'amahoro kitiriwe Nobel mu mwaka wa 2019, umushikiranganji wa mbere Abiy yerekanywe ku ma videwo n'amasanamu ari mu mwambaro wa gisirikare, aca mu mashamba, aduga imisozi, agenzura akarere akoresheje za ndabirakure (jumelles), avugana n'abasirikare bari munsi y'ibiti. Yavuga ati: "Mwebwe mwese mushaka kuba mu bana ba Ethiopia, mushaka kuzohayagizwa mu mateka y'igihugu, haguruke murwanire igihugu canyu uno musi. Duhurire ku rugamba". Kjetil Tronvoll, umwigisha w'ivyigwa bijanye n'intambara kuri kaminuza Oslo New University College muri Norvège/Norway, avuga ko ata nkeka ko ingingo ya Abiy yahinduye ibintu mu rugamba rwo kurwanya inyeshamba za Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF). Ati: "N'aho amasanamu yerekana ko yari hafi y'ingabo ku rugamba ariko atari ku rugamba nyezina, ingingo yiwe yaragize akarusho". "Yarateye intege abajenerali biwe, ivyura agatima ko gukunda igihugu mu banyagihugu ba Ethiopia, ituma intwari za Ethiopia nka Haile Gebrselassie bahaguruka bafata mu mugongo urugamba, ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abanyagihugu baja gushigikira igisirikare n'imirwi y'abarwanyi bo mu ntara ya Amhara". TPLF yahuye n'ibibazo bikomeye cane. Abarwanyi bayo bari mu micungararo y'igisagara ca Debre Birhan, ku birometero hafi 130 uvuye ku mugwa mukuru Addis Abeba, imbere y'uko birukanwa bagasubira ku birometero hafi 400 mu gisagara ca Weldiya. Ibi bisigura ko inyeshamba zatakaje ibisagara bikomakomeye kw'ibarabara A2 rifatanya icicaro cazo ca Tigray n'icicaro gikuru c'ubutegetsi bwa Ethiopia. Prof Tronvoll avuga ko mu gihe Abiy yari kumwe n'ingabo ziwe ku rugamba, indege za drone - bivugwa ko yoba yahawe n'Ubushinwa, Turukiya na Iran- zakoze igikorwa kidasanzwe mu gusubiza inyuma TPLF: "Wing Loong II y'Ubushinwa ivugwa ko yabonetse ko ari indege [ya drone] ifise inguvu za gisirikare zo ku rwego rwo hejuru mu gusambura vya bimodoka vya burende, ibirwanisho rutura no gutera amabombe ku basirikare bari ku maguru". Muri uwo mwanya nyene, reta yarateye akagere Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika n'ishirahamwe ry'ubumwe bw'ibihugu vya Bulaya (EU/UE) vyariko biyitera igitsure ngo ije mu biganiro vyo guhagarika intambara, inerekana ko ibihugu vya rutura vyo mu burengero bw'isi bishigikiye TPLF - ibi bikanavugwa kandi na Gebrselassie, uwahoze ari umunonotsi rurangiranwa wa Ethiopia. Yabwiye ikinyamakuru ca reta ati: "Twarabonye ingene Iraq, Syria, Yemen na Libya vyasambutse canke vyatatanye. Ariko Ethiopia ni igihugu gifise abanyagihugu barenga imiriyoni 120. Rero uwogerageza guhungabanya iki gihugu vyomugarukako". Ati: "Ndazi abavukanyi bacu ba Afrika baradushigikiye, kandi tumaze imyaka ibinjana turwaniriza hamwe ubukoloni". Prof Tronvoll avuga ko Abiy yatoye imvugo yatumye ibihugu vya Afrika bimushigikira, co kimwe n'ibindi vy'abakeba b'ibihugu vyo mu Burengero bw'isi: "Igihe iyi ntambara itangura, Abiy yavuze ko yariko ararwanya TPLF nk'akarwi k'inkorabara". "Ariko mu nyuma yaciye akoresha imvugo ya Afrika mu kuvuga ko TPLF ari icitso c'ibihugu birondera kuganza ibindi, kandi ko yariko arwanira iteka rya Ethiopia, nk'uko abami bo muri kahise babikoze". Mu kwa cumi na rimwe, Abiy yarerekanye isano riri hagati ya TPLF iriko igerageza gutembagaza reta yiwe n'Abataliyano bateye igihugu hanyuma bagatsindwa mu ntambara yabaye rurangiranwa ya Adwa (Battle of Adwa) mu 1896, barwanijwe n'igisirikare c'umwami w'abami Menelik II, ari na we yashinze Ethiopia y'ubu, akaba yava mu bwoko bwa Amhara. Aciye ku rubuga rwa Twitter, yanditse ati: "Bagenzi banje b'abanya Ethiopia, ng'aha no hanze, uruhara rwanyu rwo kubwira ukuri amahanga ni kirumara. Twese turi hamwe, turashobora gutsinda ikibazo gihanze iri hanga rya kera rihanganye n'inguvu za kure n'iza hafi. Nk'abana ba #Adwa tuzokwama turwanira #Ethiopia". TPLF wari umuhari w'inyeshamba washitse ku butegetsi muri Ethiopia mu 1991. Ni wo wari wiganje muri reta gushika mu 2018, igihe Abiy ashikiye ku butegetsi inyuma y'imyiyerekano ikomeye yo kwiyamiriza ubutegetsi bwayo bw'agahotoro. Waciye wisubirira mu cicaro cawo muri Tigray, ari naho watangurije intambara ya kanyeshamba mu mwaka uheze biturutse ku kutumvikana gukomeye na Abiy ku mpinduka yariko arazana mu gihugu. Uwihweza ibintu n'ibindi mu karere k'ihembe rya Afrika, Abdurahman Sayed asanzwe ari mu Bwongereza, avuga ko abanya-Ethiopia batari bake bahaye icubahiro Abiy inyuma y'aho afatiye ingingo yo kuja kurongora rugamba rwo kurwanya inyeshamba, ni mu gihe icizere cagenda kigabanuka igihe inyeshamba zariko zisatira. Avuga ati: "Mu guhaguruka agata umuhana agahamvya igisirikare, Abiy yatanze ubutumwa ko yari yiteguriye gupfira Ethiopia, bibaye ngombwa". "Arakunda cane kahise k'abami ba Ethiopia, mbere umusi umwe yabwiye abari bamuteze amatwi ko nyina wiwe yatanze ubuhanuzi ko azokomera gushika aho aba umwami agira indwi. Abami barakunda kurongora ingabo zabo ku rugamba, kandi nawe yakoze ikintu gisa n'iki". Prof Tronvoll avuga ko ivyakozwe na Abiy ari ibintu bitari bimenyerewe ku muntu yatsindiye agashimwe k'amahoro ka Nobel - agashimwe yahawe mu 2019 kubera yarangije indyane na Eritrea, akazana n'impinduka muri poritike ya Ethiopia inyuma y'imyaka mirongo y'ubutegetsi bw'agahotoro. Ati: "Barack Obama yatsindiye aka gashimwe amaze kuba perezida wa Amerika, hanyuma atanguza intambara ya drone muri Afghanistan, yiyicariye mu cumba c'intambara ca Maison Blanche/White House. Abiy ni we wa mbere yegereye ingabo ziri ku rugamba". Umushikiranganji wa mbere Abiy yabanje kugendera ingabo zari ku rugamba mu buseruko mu kw'icumi na rimwe, aho ingabo zidasanzwe hamwe n'imirwi y'abarwanyi bo mu ntara ya Afar bari bakubise bikomeye TPLF. Abdurahman ati: "Aba Afar ni ababanyi ba hafi cane n'aba Tigray. Muri kahise, bafatwa nk'abarwanyi. Hafi buri mugabo wese w'umu-Afar yategerezwa kuba atunze inkoho kuva ku myaka 15. Barahanganye bikomeye na TPLF, mbere n'abagore b'aba Afar baraja ku rugamba". "Ibi vyerekana ishavu bafitiye TPLF kubera amarorerwa abarwanyi bayo bakoze muri Afar, igihe bagerageza ubwa mbere kurenga imbibe za Tigray, haraciye hafi amezi atandatu". Abdurahman abona ko iki ari ikintu gikomeye muri iyi ntambara, kuko caburijemwo integuro ya TPLF yo gushika ku rubibe na Djibouti, ati: "Ethiopia ni igihugu kidafise umuhora ugishikana kw'ibahari, ikivuko ca Djibouti kikaba ari co soko ry'ubutunzi bwayo". "Iyo TPLF yigarurira ibarabara rishika ku rubibe, ubutunzi bwa Ethiopia bwari guhungabana, mu gihe ata bidandazwa vyari gushika i Addis Ababa, kandi ibi bikaba vyari gutuma abanya Tigray bagira amahirwe menshi yo kwigarurira umugwa mukuru". Abiy yagiye gusubira muhira inyuma y'indwi hafi zibiri, muri ino ndwi ibiro vyiwe bikaba vyatangaje ko yasubiye ku rugamba kurongora igisirikare mu kwigarurira utundi turere mu ntara ya Amhara. Ku ruhande rwayo, TPLF yatangaje ko yisubije igisagara ca Lalibela gifise amasengero yo muri kahise. Kubwa Prof Tronvoll, uyu mutegetsi wa Ethiopia yarashoboye kurwanira ubutegetsi bwiwe ariko akaba yaratosekaje ishusho yiwe kw'isi, ati: "Intumbero nyamukuru y'uwahawe agashimwe k'amahoro kitiriwe Nobel yategerezwa kuba amahoro, ariko Abiy yaranse incuro nyinshi umugambi wo guhagarika intambara, kandi n'ingabo ziwe zakoze amarorerwa menshi". Ariko Abdurahman avuga ko Abiy ata kundi yari kugira atari ukurwana kubera TPLF yari yiteguye gusubira gufata ubutegetsi ku nguvu. "Ntituzi igihe iyi ntambara izomara n'igihe izorangirira, ariko Abiy yarerekanye ko atari mugabo n'iryo".

headline: Cyprien Ntaryamira: Abasigwa n'abapfanye n'umukuru w'igihugu bababajwe n’uko ata muco uraboneka
text: Ishirahamwe AVOD rihuriyemwo impfuvyi n'abapfakazi b'abategetsi bagiye baragandagurwa mu ndyane zagiye ziba mu Burundi basaba ko haba itegeko ribaha uburenganzira bwo kubandanya bafatwa mu mugongo na reta. Bavuga ibi mu gihe kuri uyu wa 06 ukwezi kwa kane Uburundi bwibuka imyaka 27 irangiye umukuru w'igihugu Cyprien Ntaryamira apfiriye mu gitero c'ibisasu ku ndege yarimwo, cabereye i Kigali mu Rwanda. Prezida Cyprien Ntaryamira w'Uburundi yari mu ndege ya mugenziwe w'Urwanda Juvenal Habyarimana bavanye mu nama i Dar Es Salaam muri Tanzania. Mu bari mu ndege, barimwo n'abashikiranganji babiri ba reta ya Ntaryamira, nta n'umwe yarokotse. Abo bashikiranganji bari Bernard Ciza yari ajejwe intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu na Cyriaque Simbizi yari ajejwe kumenyesha amakuru. Adele Ahishakiye arongoye iryo shirahamwe avuga ko imiryango y'abasigwa ibayeho mu buzima atari bwiza, kandi mbere ko usanga n'ubutegetsi butabitaho. Mw'itangazo ryaraye risohoye buca bibuka urupfu rwa Perezida Ntaryamira, AVOD ivuga ko ari ibintu bibabaje kubona gushika ubu ata muco uraboneka kuri ico gitero. Riti: "Ishirahamwe AVOD rirababazwa n'ukubona imyaka 27 iheze inyuma y'ico cago Abarundi bose muri rusangi, na cane cane imiryango y'ababuze, batararonka umuco ku vyabaye". Umupfasoni Ahishakiye yabwiye BBC ko afise icizere ko impera n'imperuka hazoteba hakaba ubutegetsi buzofata ibintu mu minwe maze ukuri kukamenyekana. Umupfasoni Ahishakiye avuga ko imiryango isigwa n'abo bari kumwe na Perezida Cyprien Ntaryamira, ari bo Bernard Ciza na Cyriaque Simbizi isa n'iyibagiwe. Ati: "Benshi usanga bifumbereje umengo ntibakibaho. Nivyo ko intatemwa zabo ziri kumwe n'iz'abandi, ariko imiryango yabo ntifashwe nk'uko yategerezwa gufatwa". Hagati aho, arashima ingene abategetsi bagerageza kubaba hafi "turavye ibihe igihugu caciyemwo", ariko avuga ko hari hakenewe ikintu canditse kibaha uburenganzira bugaragara nk'abasigwa b'abakoreye igihugu. Ati: "Urashobora kwumva ko umengo ufashwe mu mugongo, mugabo mu gihe ata tegeko rigenga iyi mfashanyo, umengo n'utwo baguha bariko batugufashisha kugira ngo utekereze. "Dushaka ko haba itegeko ryanditse ryerekana ingene abo basigwa bazofatwa kugira ngo n'aho ubutegetsi bwohinduka itegeko ribandanye rikora ntibibe ivyo gutangura gushasha". Gushika ubu hagumye impari ku boba bararashe iyo ndege y'umukuru w'igihugu c'Urwanda, igikorwa gifatwa na benshi nk'uko ari co cabaye imbarutso y'ihonyabwoko ryaciye riba muri ico gihugu.

headline: Ingorane muri Ethiopia: Vyagenze gute ngo igihugu gishike aho kiri ubu?
text: Intara ya Tigray muri Ethiopia irangwamwo umutekano muke cane ku buryo hatanguwe no kuvugwa ikibazo c'inzara. Iyi nkuru irasigura uko vyagenze ngo ibintu biyangare muri iyo ntara n'imidurumbanyo ahandi mu gihugu.

headline: Ayandi makuru ku ntambara muri Ukraine: Russia ntifata ko iri mu ntambara na OTAN/NATO – Lavrov
text: Umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire w'Uburusiya Sergei Lavrov avuga ko igihugu ciwe kitibona mu ntambara na OTAN/NATO, nk'uko bitangazwa n'ikinyamakuru ca reta, Ria. Avuga ko ibi vyotuma  haduka intambara ya nikleyeri, ibidashobora kwihanganirwa, nk'uko bibandanya bivugwa na Ria. Lavrov avuga kandi ko Uburusiya ata muntu n'umwe buriko buratera ubwoba ko bushobora gutanguza intambara ya nikleyeri, ariko akagiriza ibihugu vyo mu Burengero ko vyovyo biriko birabikora. Uyu mushikiranganji w'imigenderanire yagiriza Ukraine ko ari yo ituma ibiganiro vy'amahoro bihagarara kubera ico yita "ukwiteza utunyoni" kwa Kyiv. Ku bindi bivugwa na Sergei Lavrov, avuga ko "Abanya - Moldavie bakwiye kwitondera ibijanye na kazoza kabo, kuko bariko bahendwa ngo binjire muri OTAN", niko Ria ibandanya ivuga. Ibiturika biherutse kwumvikana mu karere ka Transnistria, akarere kiyonkoye kuri Moldavie gashigikiwe n'Uburusiya kakaba gahana urubibe na Ukraine  - vyatumye haduka ubwoba ko intambara ishobora kuba iriko irarandagata. Lavrov avuga kandi ko incuti nkuru nkuru z'Uburusiya hafi zose  zemeye kuriha gaze zikurikije uburyo buherutse gushikirizwa na Moscou, nk'uko bivugwa n'ikinyamakuru Tass naco nyene cegamiye reta. Mu ntango z'ino ndwi, Uburusiya bwavuze ko buhagaritse gushorera gaze muri Pologne na Bulgaria, inyuma y'aho ibi bihugu vyankiye kuriha mw'ifaranga ry'Uburusiya, rouble. Ubumwe bwa Bulaya buvuga ko iyi ngingo ari uburyo bw' iterabwoba. Umutegetsi mu bushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi bwa Amerika avuga ko Uburusiya muri inyuma mu nteguro bwari bufise bwo kwigarurira akarere ka Donbas kandi ko bugenda bukebuke. Ukurinda kw'ingabo za Ukraine hamwe no gutinya gukora amakosa bwakoze mu kurondera kwigarurira Kyiv nivyo bituma "ata terambere riboneka" Uburusiya bugira muri ako karere, nk'uko Pentagon ibivuga. Uyu mutegetsi avuga ko ingabo z'Uburusiya zitinya guhuruduka, akongerako ati: "Twibaza ko ivyo bariko barakora ari ukubandanya bitegurira igitero kinini kandi c'umwanya muremure". Pentagone yibaza ko Abarusiya "n'imiburiburi bari inyuma imisi itari mike uravye ivyo bipvuza kuba bashitseko", nk'uko uyo mutegetsi abivuga. Moscou ubu ifise batayo (bataillons) 92 mu buseruko no mu bumanuko bwa Ukraine, mu gihe hari abameze magabo ku ruhande rw'Uburusiya ku rubibe buhana na Ukraine, nk'uko bivugwa n'ubushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi. Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zivuga ko amakungu adashobora gukorana na Perezida Vladimir Putin w'Uburusiya nk'uko vyahora imbere y'aha, ni inyuma y'aho Indonesia imuhereye ubutumire - hamwe na Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky wa Ukraine - mu nama y'ibihugu 20 bitunze gusumba ibindi kw'isi (G20). Perezida Joe Biden "yiyamirije ku mugaragaro ko adashigikiye ko "Perezida Putin yitaba iyo nama mu gihe Amerika "yashigikiye itumirwa rya Ukraine", nk'uko bivugwa na Jen Psaki, umunyamabanga ajejwe kumenyesha amakuru muri Maison Blanche/White House. Avuga ko Uburusiya bwahawe ubutumire bwo kwitaba iyi nama muri iryo zinga imbere y'igitero ca Putin kuri Ukraine. Aho nyene, umuvugizi w'ubushikiranganji bwa Amerika bujejwe imigenderanire, Jalina Porter, yavuze ko "ibintu bidashobora kuba nk'ukovyamye" n'Uburusiya ku rwego mpuzamakungu. Ntiyamenyesheje nimba Amerika izoshobora kwitaba iyi nama. Ukraine ntiri muri uyu murwi wa G20 ugizwe n'ibihugu bitunze kurusha ibindi, mu gihe Uburusiya bwobwo burimwo.

headline: Rwanda: Umukuru w'umugambwe RPD Christopher Kayumba yahagaritswe
text: Itangazo rya RIB (Rwanda Investigation Bureau) ku rubuga rwa Twitter rivuga ko ryapfunze Dr Christopher rimwagiriza ivyaha vyo gukoresha imibonano mpuzabitsina abantu batandukanye ku gahato. Uwo mukuru w'umugambwe wa Rwandese Platform for Democracy' (RPD) utavuga rumwe na reta yari yitavye umutahe wa RIB kuri uyu wa kane kugira yisigure kuri ivyo vyaha yagirizwa. Dr Christopher Kayumba yari yashize uwo mugambwe mu kwezi kwa gatanu uyu mwaka. Inyuma y'imisi 11 gusa ashinze uwo mugambwe, yaciye arengukishwa mu rwego rujejwe kugira amatohoza mu Rwanda yagirizwa gukoresha imibonano mpuzabitsina abantu batandukanye ku gahato. Bamwe bavuga ko ari ikirego'gifise ivyinyegeje inyuma' mu gihe umunyamategeko wiwe yavuga ko ibimenyetso ari co kintu gikomeye ku birego nk'ibi. Itariki 16 z'ukwezi kwa gatanu, umugambwe RPD wa Kayumba watangaje ko uvutse, bukeye itariki 17 kuri Twitter hatangazwa inkuru ivuga ko Dr Kayumba yagerageje gufata ku nguvu umukobwa yigisha  mw'ishure ryo kumenyeshama amakuru amusanze muhira iwe. Inyuma y'imisi cumi, hataramenyekana izina ry'uwuvga ko yamuhohoteye, umumenyeshamakuru Fiona Muthoni Ntarindwa yanditse kuri Twitter ko ari we Kayumba yashatse gufata ku nguvu mu 2017. Fiona yemeje ko ari we avugwa mu ruhererekane rw'inyandiko yanditswe kuri Twitter na Kamaraba Salva, ivuga ko yagiye kuraba Kayumba ngo bavugane ivyerekeye ishure, ngo 'asanga ameze nk'uwaborewe' ashaka kumufata ku nguvu, ariko aramwiyaka arahunga. Christopher Kayumba, na we kuri Twitter, yariyamirije ivyo bamwagiriza, avuga ko bifise intumbero 'yogutanga isura mbi ku vyiyumviro vyo gutanguza' umugambwe uharanira demokarasi.

headline: Myanmar: Aung San Suu Kyi yabonetse muri sentare kwagirizwa ivyaha
text: Aung Aung San Suu Kyi yabonywe ubwa mbere kuva apfunzwe n'abasirikare batembagaje ubutegetsi haraheze ukwezi, hari ku buryo bwa video. Yabonetse ''afise amagara meza'' hanyuma asaba kubona abamwunganira mu mategeko, nk'uko abashingwamanza biwe babivuze. Apfungiwe ahantu hatazwi kuva hatembagajwe ubutegetsi itariki ya mbere ukwezi kwa kabiri. Abiyamiriza iryo tembagazwa no kuri uyu wa mbere bazindukiye mu mabarabara, n'ubwo kuwa mungu wabaye umunsi mubi aho hishwe abantu 18. Abo bantu bishwe ubwo igiporisi  n'igisirikare vyakajije ivyo gushaka guhasha imyiyerekano mu gihugu  mu kurasa amasasu y'ukuri mw'isinzi ry'abari mu myiyerekano. Ariko abantu bagarutse mu mabarabara kuri uyu wa mbere n'inguvu nyinshi cane, basaba ko reta yatowe isubizwaho hanyuma Madame Suu Kyi nawe n'izindi ndongozi z'umugambwe wiwe, National League for Democracy(NDL), barekurwe. Igisirikare kivuga ko cafashe ubutegetsi kubera ubusuma bwabaye mu matora yo mu kwezi kwa 11, yatsinzwe  ku rugero runini cane na NDL. Nta vyemezo cerekanye vy'ubwo busuma n'ubwo casubirije umugwi ujejwe amatora kikemera ayandi matora mu kiringo c'umwaka. Madame  Suu Kyi, w'imyaka 75, yafashwe igihe itembagaza ryatangura itariki imwe z'ukwezi kwa kabiri, kuva ico gihe akaba atasubiye kuboneka ahagaragara gushika ku ntahe y'uno munsi, aho yabonetse biciye muri video muri sentare ku murwa mukuru, Nay Pyi Taw. Ntawuzi aho apfungiwe  kuva afashwe haraheze ukwezi, ariko hari amakuru avuga ko yapfungiwe mu rugo iwe mu gisagara ca Nay Pyi Taw imbere y'uko yimurirwa mu kindi kibanza kitamenyeshejwe. Madame Suu Kyi mu ntango yakurikiranwa ku vyaha bibiri harimwo kugura no kwinjiza mu gihugu amaradiyo yo kuvuganirako ( walkie talkie) no kurenga ku mategeko ya Myanmar yerekeye ibiza, ariko hari ibindi vyaha vyongeweko kuri  uyu wa mbere, harimwo kurenga ku ngingo zo kwirinda Covid-19 mu gihe co kwiyamamariza amatora hamwe no gutera "ubwoba n'uguhagarika umutima". Ivyaha vya mbere bishobora guhanishwa umunyororo ushika ku myaka itatu. Ntibiramenyekana neza  igihano c'ivyo vyaha bishasha icari co. Intahe ikurikira yashizwe ku wa 15 uku kwezi kwa gatatu. Inkinyamamuru Myanmar Now catangaje ku wa mbere ko umukuru w'igihugu yatembagajwe Win Myint -afadikanije urugamba na Madame Suu Kyi- nawe yagirijwe kugumura hisunzwe igitabo mpanavyaha. Ukumenyekana n'ugukundwa kwa Madame Suu Kyi kwarongerekanye cane kuva afashwe, ariko izina ryiwe mu makungu n'ubu riracahumanye kubera ibivugwa ko yaravye hirya ku kibazo co  kwomora aba Islam b'abanyamuke  bo mu bwoko bw'aba Rohingya. Imyiyerekano yasubiriye kandi mu bisagara vyinshi mu gihugu. Ku bw'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru AFP, hari aho vyashitse abari mu myiyerekano ata bigwanisho bitwaje biriruka barahunga igihe hari amasasu yari arashwe. Ntibizwi niba yari amasasu y'ukuri canke niba yari ayo akamwanya (caoutchouc). Iryo tororokanirizo ryongeyeko ko muri Yangon, abari mu myiyerekano babonetse bakoresha ibintu birimwo ibiti vy'imigano, intebe zo mu nzu hamwe n'amashami y'ibiti kugira bazibire amabarabara. Amasanamu  yerekanye kandi imyuka ikoroza amosozi isukirwa ku bari mu myiyerekano. Igisirikare ca Myanmar cafashe ubutegetsi ku wa mbere ukwezi kwa kabiri, gishiraho amategeko adasanzwe kandi gishira ubutegetsi bwose mu minwe ya  General Min Aung Hlaing. Haheze iminsi haciye hatangura ingendo yo kwanka amategeko, abakozi banka  gusubira ku mirimo kugira biyamirize ico gikorwa c'abasirikare. Ntivyatevye abantu batangura kwitaba iyo ngendo ari benshi, abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bihereza amabarabara. Muri iyi minsi ya vuba imyiyerekano yagiyemwo intureka ikomeye hagati y'igiporisi n'abanyagihugu basanzwe; gushika ubu hakaba hamaze gupfa abantu 21.

headline: Intambara ya Ukraine: Ibibombe kandi ku mugwa mukuru Kyiv
text: Ibibombe vyumvikanye hagati mu gisagara ca Kyiv, umugwa mukuru wa Ukraine, mu gaturuturu ko kuri uno wa gatatu, nk’uko bivugwa n’umukuru w’iki gisagara. Vitali Klitschko avuga ko ibi bibombe vyaguye muri district ya Shevchenkivskyi iri hagati mu gisagara, abajejwe ubutabazi bakaba baciye barungikwayo. Igisata kijejwe kwivuna abansi kiri ku bikorwa, nk’uko bivugwa na Buramatari wa Kyiv, Oleksiy Kuleba. Abanyamakuru ba BBC bumvise ibiturika bikomeye cane inyuma y’amajwi y’inzamba yo kugabisha. Uburusiya bubandanya butera ibigo ntanganguvu kuva mu kw’icumi bukoresheje ibisasu vya misire na za ndege zitagira abadereva (drones). Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky avuga ko ingabo za Ukraine zakoroye amadrone 13 yo mu bwoko bwa Shahed yavuye muri Irani, avuga ko ayo yose ari yo yari yarungitswe n’Uburusiya mu gatondo ko kuri uno wa gatatu. Abakuru ba gisirikare mu gisagara ca Kyiv bavuga ko igisigarira ca drone caguye ku nzu ya reta hagati mu gisagara no ku nzu zine zituwemwo n’abanyagihugu. Ariko umuvugizi w’igisata kijejwe ubutabazi yabwiye ibinyamakuru vya Ukraine ko ata muntu n’umwe yaguye muri ivyo bitero. Buramatari wa Kyiv, Kuleba, avuga ati: "Igisata co gukingira ikirere kiri ku bikorwa. Ni nkenerwa ko muguma aho mwinyegeje. Uburusiya burabandanya ibitero vy’iterabwoba ku bigo ntanganguvu. Ariko tugenda dukomera buri musi”. Ukraine yagiriza Irani guha Uburusiya amadrones “y’ubwiyahuzi” yakoreshejwe mu bitero vyo ku wa 17 Gitugutu (10), ivyo Tehran (umugwa mukuru wa Irani) ihakana. Mu nyuma, Irani yahavuye yemera ko yahaye Moscou amadrone makeya “amezi atari make” imbere y’intambara. Mu kwishura, Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky yavuze ko ivyo vyari ibinyoma, ko ahubwo amadrone menshi cane yariko arakoreshwa. Kuva mu mezi aheze, Uburusiya bubandanya butera ibigo ntanganguvu mu ntumbero yo guca intege abanyagihugu. Abategetsi b’isi bavuga ko ibi bitero ku bigo vya gisivire ari ivyaha vyo mu ntambara, ariko mu ndwi iheze, Perezida Vladimir Putin w’Uburusiya yarishigikiye ku ngingo yo gukora ibi bitero, aho yavuze ko vyari ivyo kwihora igitero ca bombe cakozwe ku wa 18 Gitugutu ku kiraro c’Uburusiya mu karere ka Crimea bwigaruriye. Ibi bitero bibaye mu gihe hari amakuru avuga ko Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ziriko zitegura kurungikira Ukraine ibirwanisho vya none vyo mu bwoko bwa Patriot vyo gukingira ikirere. Abategetsi bakuru bo mu gisata co kwivuna abansi babwiye itororokanirizo ry’amakuru Reuters ko ibi bishobora gutangazwa imbere yo ku wa kane. Ibi birwanisho biri mu bigezweho gusumba ibindi, kandi ko ari bikeya. Kubera bifise ubushobozi bwo kurasa kure, bishobora gukorora amadrone n’ibisasu vya misire vy’Uburusiya imbere y’uko bishikira ibisagara vya Ukraine. Ariko ibirwanisho vyo mu bwoko bwa Patriot bisaba abantu benshi bo kubikoresha, ibitandukanye n’ivyo Ukraine isanzwe ikoresha ubu, bigashobora gusaba amezi atari make yo kwigisha ingabo za Kyiv ingene babikoresha neza. Uburusiya bushobora gufata ko kugerageza mu buryo ubwo ari bwo bwose guha Ukraine ibi birwanisho vyo mu bwoko bwa Patriot  ari ukurenga umurongo, ivyotuma ibintu biyangara. Mu kwezi guheze, uwahoze ari umukuru w’igihugu Dmitry Medvedev – ubu akaba ari icegera c’inama nkuru y’igihugu ijejwe umutekano – yaragabishije kuri ino ngingo.

headline: South Africa: Jacob Zuma yatanguye ari intwari y'ubwigenge, aba Prezida, ubu ari mw'ibohero
text: Jacob Zuma yatahukanye ipete ry'ikimaramare muri politke mu kuba uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu wa mbere wa Afrika y'Epfo atawe muri yompi. Ubuzima bwiwe nk'umuntu yidegemvya - bwuzuye icubahiro c'uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu - bwaheze imbere gatoyi y'isaha zitandatu z'ijoro ryo kuwa gatatu. Niho mu buryo buteye ibishobisho yajanwa n'urukurikirane rw'imiduga akuwe iwe muhira mu kigwati ca Nkandla ajanwa mw'ibohero mu gisagara gitoya ca Estcourt. Umuhungu wiwe, Edward Zuma, yari yagabishije yuko "amaraso azoseseka" niyafatwa, ariko impera n'imperuka nta n'ima ryayo ryasesetse. Uyo mutama w'imyaka 79 yarishikanye, kuko yari azi neza y'uko atoshobora guhangana n'ubushobozi bwa leta, asiga inyuma umuhungu wiwe yari yashinze ibirindiro kw'irembo yitwaje inkoni. Zuma yarigeze kuba ari umunyepolitike ahayagizwa. Yarapfunzwe imyaka 10 mu 1963 ahowe kurwanya intwaro karyanishamiryango ya apartheid muri Afrika y'Epfo, hanyuma arahunga mu 1975 aja kuba uwujejwe igendereza rya African National Congress (ANC), imbere yuko agaruka muri Afrika y'Epfo mu 1990, aza gushikira ikibanza c'umukuru w'igihugu mu 2009, ariko gushika ico gihe izina ryiwe ryari rimaze gucafuzwa n'ivyagiriji vya ruswa. Yaragirijwe kandi gufata ku nguvu umugenzi w'umuryango, ariko aza kwezwa mu 2006 mu rubanza rwaciyemwo kubiri cane ANC, umuhari wahoze urwanira ubwigenge waje guhinduka umugambwe uri ku butegetsi mu 1994 kandi Zuma akaba yarawubereye umunywanyi kuva agifise imyaka 17. Ubu, yatawe muri yombi azize gusuzugura sentare igizwe n'abacamanza bo ku rwego rwo hejuru muri Afrika y'epfo - bakaba ari bo bajejwe guhagararira demokrasi yarwaniye ubuzima bwiwe bwose. Mu ntango za kuno kwezi, abacamanza ba sentare yubahiriza ibwirizwa shingiro bamukatiye umunyororo w'amezi 15 kubera gusuzugura itegeko ryo kwitaba abajejwe itohoza ku vyaha vy'igiturire yaregwa vyo mu kiringo c'imyaka icenda yabaye umukuru w'igihugu. Yanagomba kubazwa cane cane ku migenderanire yiwe n'abavukanyi Gupta bahunze Afrika y'Epfo mu 2018 igihe umugozi w'ubutungane wabagera ibikonjo. Bose barahakanye ivyo bagirizwa, kandi Zuma agashimangira y'uko abansi biwe ba politike bariko barakoresha sentare mu kumuhiga. Kuba yarwanije ivangura rifatiye ku rukoba muri Afrika y'Epfo igihe hari hakomeye intambara inyegeje yiswe Cold War hagati ya Amerika n'icahoze ari Ihuriro ry'Abasoviyeti (Union Soviétique), Zuma mu mutwe wiwe yumva akiri muri urwo rugamba. Abona y'uko ari inzirakarengane igambanirwa mu mugambi wateguwe n'ibihugu vya Buraya na Amerika - hamwe n'ibikoresho vyabo vyo muri Afrika y'Epfo - mu kuburagiza ibikorwa vyiwe vyo guheraheza inguvu z'ubutunzi bw'abazungu muri Afrika y'Epfo. Abatavuga rumwe nawe babona yuko uyu yahoze ari uwurwanira ubwigenge wo mu muryango ukenye, yaborejwe n'umurengwe w'ubutegetsi igihe intambara yo kwibohora yahera - ari kumwe n'abagenzi biwe bashasha b'abagwizatunga - asahura ubutunzi bw'igihugu ku rugero rw'ikirenga. Ahari ukuri ntiharamenyekana ariko ni intambwe ikomeye kuri demokrasi ya Afrika y'Epfo imaze imyaka 27, kubona uwahoze aharanira ubwigenge akanaba umukuru w'igihugu, atabwa muri yompi ahowe kugerageza kwiyumanganya kubazwa ivyo yakoze ari ku butegetsi. Vyerekana y'uko inzego za demokrasi za Afrika y'epfo - zikunze kwifatirwa mu gahanga n'abanyepolitike - zigikomeye, kandi abacamanza, abapolisi n'abakozi ba leta baraciteguriye gukurikiza amategeko mu gupfunga umugabo azinanye vyihariye na bamwe muri bo kandi bigeze gusangira urugamba mu gihe co kwibohora. Vyongeye, abacamanza baroroheye Zuma, bafata umwanya wo kumwumviriza igihe cose yakoresha muri sentare uburyo buzwi nk'umukenyuro wa Stalingrad - mu kurwanya ingingo ku yindi mu zashirwa imbere zose kugira arengutswe ku vyaha bikomeye aregwa. Kuwa gatanu (09/07/2021) umucamanza yaranse gukuraho ingingo y'ifatwa ryiwe, ku wa mbere naho sentare ikuriye izindi zose mu gihugu izokwumviriza ivyo yasavye vy'uko icaha co gusuzugura sentare cohanagurwa. Ibi ni akataraboneka muri Afrika y'Epfo,  kandi amezi ari imbere arashobora kubamwo ivyosanishwa n'ireresi igihe Zuma azoba ariko araburana, mu rubanza rundi, ku vyagiriji vya ruswa bijanye n'amahera imiriyaridi $5 ajanye n'isoko ry'ibirwanisho mu myaka ya 1990. Yagirizwa ivyaha 15 bijanye n'ubunyonyezi, igiturire, magendo, kutariha ikori hamwe no gutunga amahera atazwi imvo - ivyo vyaha vyose akaba yarabihakanye igihe yarenguka muri sentare mu kwezi kwa gatanu. Mu gihe Zuma ahanganye n'imanza mu nzira zitandukanye, ikibazo nyamukuru ni iki: Mbe azohava atsinda yidegemvye, canke azokwunguka irindi pete nk'impfungwa yo ku rwego rusumvya izindi muri Afrika y'epfo?

headline: Ibintu bihagaze gute muri Ukraine, Putin yoba ategura kurandura Kyiv?
text: Biraboneka ko ukwihangana kwa Perezida Vladimir Putin kuriko kurarangira, Uburusiya bukaba buriko buja ku yindi ntambwe nshasha y'intambara. Ingabo zabwo zegeranije ibirwanisho vyazo rutura, ibikoho bitera ibisasu vya rokete, za ndege zitagira abadereva (drones), ibisasu vya misire, mu micungararo y'ibisagara vya Ukraine, harimwo n'umugwa mukuru Kyiv. Kumbure kugira ngo umuntu atahure ingene Uburusiya bushobora kurwana intambara za nyuma na nyuma ku mugwa mukuru, ni uko yobanza akihweza ingene ingabo zabwo zarwanye intambara zo muri Grozny, muri Tchétchénie  n'i Alep muri Syria - ibarabara ku rindi, ariko kandi zisambura ibisagara bizima. Ubwo Putin arashobora gukora gutyo i Kyiv? Biragoye kuvuga. Kyiv ifise kahise gakomeye - ni wo wari umugwa mukuru w'icahoze citwa Empire russe de Kiev/ Kyivan Rus Empire, imyaka myinshi cane imbere y'uko na Moscou ibaho. Mu gihe yosambura Kyiv, amakuru akamenyekana mu Burusiya, ntivyoba vyiza kuri we. Ariko Putin ashobora gukora ikintu ico ari co cose kugira ngo ashire Ukraine mu minwe. Yopfuma abona Ukraine iruhande yiwe yabaye umunyota hakubona Ukraine yinjiye mu bihugu vyo mu Burengero,  mu kwinjira mw'ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya n'ishirahamwe OTAN ryo kwivunira umwanshi hamwe. Hari ubwoba ko hashobora kuba igitero gikomeye cane kuri Kyiv, na rirya abategetsi bo mu bushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi b'Ubwongereza bavuga ko nyinshi mu ngabo z'Uburusiya muri kino gihe barundanye ku nkengera z'umugwa mukuru. N'aho bahura n'ingabo za Ukraine zaratse igihe cose bagerageje kwinjira muri iki gisagara, hari amakenga ko Uburusiya bwoba buriko burategura ibitero bikomeye kuri co, kandi ko bashobora kukigota nk'uko bimeze no mu bindi bisagara. Amakuru atangwa n'igendereza ry'igisirikare c'Ubwongereza avuga ko ingabo z'Uburusiya ziri ku birometero 25 uvuye ku mugwa mukuru Kyiv. Mu gihe igisirikare c'Uburusiya kibandanya gitera amabombe ku bisagara bitari bike vya Ukraine, mu gatondo ko kuri uyu wa gatandatu, habaye intambara zikomeye mu micungararo y'uburaruko bushira uburengero bw'umugwa mukuru. Mu gisagara ca Vasylkiv kiri mu bumanuko bw'umugwa mukuru Kyiv, ikibuga c'indege ca gisirikare catewe ibisasu vya misire, umukuru w'iki gisagara akavuga ko ico gitero casambuye ico kibuga congera giturira n'ububiko bw'igitoro, gituma kandi haba n'ibiturika vyateje umuriro mwinshi ku bubiko bw'amasasu. Amasanamu yerekanye umwotsi mwinshi uva kuri ico kibuga c'indege ca gisirikare. Ibi biri uku mu gihe Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky wa Ukraine wewe ahejeje gusohora iyindi reresi ku mbuga hwaniro ashikiriza ijambo igihugu. Mw'iryo jambo Perezida Zelensky avuga ko igisirikare c'Uburusiya kimaze gutakaza vyinshi gusumba ivyo kimaze gutakaza mu myaka mirongo - aho avuga ko ama batayo 31 y'intambara amaze gusamburwa. Asaba ko umukuru w'igisagara ca Melitopol Ivan Fedorov avugwa ko yanyurujwe n'ingabo z'Uburusiya arekurwa bidatevye. Abategetsi ba Israel barahakana amakuru yandikwa n'ibinyamakuru avuga ko Israel yasavye Ukraine "kumanika amaboko" ikemera ivyo Uburusiya bwasavye mu biganiro biheruka. Israel yagize uruhara mu twigoro two kugerageza guhagarika intambara muri Ukraine. Ku wa gatandatu w'indwi iheze, umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Israel Naftali Bennett yaragize urugendo i Moscou, aho yaganiriye na Perezida Putin imbona nkubone, yongera kandi aravugana na Perezida Zelensky kuri terefone. Amakuru yandikwa n'ibinyamakuru avuga ko Bennett yagerageje gusaba Ukraine ko yokwemera ibisabwa n'Uburusiya kugira ngo intambara ihagarare. Ariko umutegetsi umwe muri retra ya Israel yavuze ko aya makuru ari "ibinyoma vyeruye". Uyu mutegetsi yabwiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters ati: "Nta na hamwe Bennett yigeze abwira Zelensky ico akwiye gukora, kandi uwo mugambi ntawo afise". Umwe mu bahanuzi mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu wa ukraine, Mykhaylo Podolyak, avuga ko mu vy'ukuri, "Israel ibona ko Uburusiya bukwiye kwihweza neza ibintu".

headline: William Ruto: Intsinzi yanje yuguruye imyango
text: Umukuru w’igihugu yatowe muri Kenya yemereye abanya-Kenya ko ata muntu n'umwe azohorwa ivyiyumviro vyiwe vya poririke. Yabivuze mw’ijambo ryiwe rya mbere kuva sentare ntahinyuzwa yemeje intsinzi yiwe  mu rubanza rwo kuyanka rwari rwashingishijwe n’uwo bahiganywe, Raila Odinga. Iryo jambo yarishikiririje ku kirimba c'icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu  i Karen mu nkengera z'umurwa mukuru Nairobi. Yari kumwe n'uwuzoba icegeraa ciwe, Rigathi Gachagua, n'abagore babo, Rachael wa Ruto na Dorcas wa Gachagua. Ruto yavuze ko intsinzi yiwe ubu ishimangiwe n'ingingo ya sentare ntahinyuzwa  mu rubanza rw'abari bitwaye bavuga  ko ivyavuye mu matora vyogirwa impfagusa. Yavuze ko intwari y'aya matora ari umukuru w'umugwi wari uyajejwe, Wafula Chebukati. Ruto yavuze ko we n'abamushigikiye baburabujwe bagakorerwa amabi atandukanye muri iki gihe c'amatora. Ariko we yavuze ko ku butegetsi bwiwe ata n'umwe azohorwa ivyiyumviro vyiwe. Yakeje abo bahiganywe mu kibanza c'umukuru w'igihugu harimwo uwuza imbere Raila Odinga. Ati "turahiganwa ariko ntituri abansi". "...ndahamagara Raila Odinga tuvugane ingene tugiye kuzokorana ... mu ruhara rwabo nk'abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi". Ruto yari amaze imyaka 10  ari icegera ca prezida Uhuru Kenyatta ahejeje ibiringo vyiwe bibiri. Ariko prezida Kenyatta yahisemwo gushigikira uwo batavuga rumwe  Raila Odinga. Ruto yavuze ko adafata nabi  kuba "yahisemwo gushigikira uwundi muntu", kuko  "igihe nashigikira Uhuru Kenyatta ntaco nabanje kumusaba". Uwo mukuru w'igihugu yatowe yavuze ko aja guhamagara "umugenzi wanje prezida Kenyatta" kugira bavugane ivyo kubisikanya ku butegetsi. Ati: "Haheze amezi menshi tutavugana". "Ndazi ko yakoze cane mu buryo bwiwe, ariko abanya-Kenya barahisemwo". "Tuzokwubaha umukuru w'igihugu cacu nk'uwarangije igihe c'ubutegetsi...turi abantu b'iteka". Yavuze ko prezida Uhuru yakoze  akazi keza kandi ko azogira ikibanza muri kahise k'igihugu. William Ruto- avuka mu muryango w'abantu basanzwe cane- yavuze ko intsinzi yiwe yuguruye imyango  kugira umwana uwari wese muri Kenya agire indoto ko nawe ashobora kuba indongozi. Uhuru Kenyatta we n'umuhungu w'uwabaye prezida wa mbere wa Kenya , Jomo Kenyatta. Raila Odinga nawe se yari umuntu yari azwi cane muri poritike ya Kenya. Amategeko ategekanya ko mu minsi indwi kuva intsinzi yemejwe ariho umukuru w'igihugu  yatowe azorahirira amabanga yo kuba umukuru w'igihugu. Ariko yavuze ko buno nyene agiye gutangura kuja ku kivi. Ati: "Ndazi ka abantu biteze vyinshi cane. "Hari abarimyi baja batanguye kumbaza ngo "mbe  ibitabizo bizimbutse bizoboneka ryari"?'' Abajijwe ico azokora mu minsi ijana ya mbere y'ubutegetsi bwiwe, Willian Ruto yavuze ko  azobivuga mw'ijambo azoshikiriza  ku munsi wo kurahira.

headline: Ethiopia - Tigray: Reta ivuga ko yisubije ibindi bisagara
text: Abategetsi ba Ethiopia batangaza ko bisubije ibisagara bitari bike mu ntara ya Amhara vyari vyigaruriwe n'inyeshamba za Tigray, mu gihe ingabo za reta zibandanya zitera intambwe ku rubuga. Umushikiranganji ajejwe kumenyesha amakuru Legesse Tulu yabwiye abanyamakuru kuri uyu wa gatandatu ko ibisagara Haran, Gobye, Robit Kobo na Woldiya vyasubiye mu minwe ya reta, ubwa mbere kuva mu ci riheze. Inyeshamba za Tigray ntaco ziravuga, ariko mu misi iheze zavuga ko zasubiye inyuma kugira ngo zipange gushasha. BBC ntiyashoboye guhinyuza aya makuru, ariko mu gihe vyoba ari vyo, reta yoba yisubije ibisagara hafi vyose bikomeye, kiretse igisagara ca Lalibela casubiye kwigarurirwa n'inyeshamba. Lalibela, igisagara kirimwo amasengero ya kera, yari yafashwe n'ingabo za Tigray mu kwa munani, mu ntango z'uku kwezi ikaba yari yigaruriwe n'ingabo za reta imbere yo gusubira kugitakaza mu ntango z'iyi ndwi. Iyi ntambara imaze umwaka hagati y'ingabo za reta n'inyeshamba z'umuhari Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF) imaze guhitana abatari bake, isiga abandi mu kangaratete. Inyuma y'aho inyeshamba za Tigray zivugiye ko zariko zirasugereza umugwa mukuru wa Ethiopia Addis Abeba, vyabaye ngombwa ko umushikiranganji wa mbere Abiy Ahmed afata ingingo yo kwigira ku rubuga kugira ngo ashigikire ingabo ziru ku rugamba. Yarerekanywe ku ma videwo n'amasanamu ari mu mwambaro wa gisirikare, aca mu mashamba, aduga imisozi, agenzura akarere akoresheje za ndabirakure (jumelles), avugana n'abasirikare bari munsi y'ibiti.

headline: Burundi: Perezida Ndayishimiye yavuze ku bivugwa mu gihugu no ku gihugu
text: Inyuma y'iminsi 100 ashikirijwe amabanga y'ukurongora igihugu, Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye avuga ko yashimye kuvugana n'abanyagihugu kugira ngo yumve ivyo barindiriye ku butegetsi bushasha. Ati: "Kuva igihe narahira, novuga nti naciye ntangura kuja mu mukwanguro, rero uno munsi inzego z'igihugu zarahejeje kujaho, umukwanguro twarawuronse, ubu turashobora kuvuga tuti turatanguye ubwahuro". Yabajijwe ibibazo ku migenderanire, ubutunzi, abakozi ba leta, ugushigikira urwaruka, agateka ka zina muntu, hamwe n'ibindi bijanye n'ubuzima bw'igihugu. Bwana Ndayishimiye abona ko itari inama ikomeye cane ku buryo hari uwusivye hari kuba ikibazo. Kubw'iwe, yari inama isa n'uko ari abagenzi baziranye bashaka kwicarana kugira ngo babe baraganira ku tuntu tumwe tumwe. Ati: "Ico gihe rero, umuntu abonye ingene iyo nama yatumiwe, urabona ko ari inama itagira urwego, idakeneye vya bitigiri kanaka bavuga bati aba badakwiye inama ntiba". "Uwufise umwanya wese aritaba kuko ni vyiza ko abantu baganira. Ariko iyo hari uwabuze akaryo ntikibuza ko inama ibandanya kuko ntiruba ari urwego". Bwana Ndayishimiye avuga ko yabuze umwanya kubera agifise vyinshi cane ariko arakora, akavuga ko ari ibisanzwe cane cane mu gihe inzego zikiri nshasha. Hagati aho, Perezida Ndayishimiye avuga ko mu gihe iyi nama yotunganywa afise akanya gakwiye ko yoyitaba ata ngorane. Bwana Ndayishimiye avuga ko imigenderanire yatosekaye kubera u Burundi bwasanze ibi bihugu bifise uruhara mu vyabaye mu 2015, cane cane mu kugerageza gutembagaza ubutegetsi. Ati: "Hanyuma bitwaje igikenye baca babohera amaboko imugongo leta kugira ngo bikunde itembagare mu bukene bwayo, ariko Imana yarakinze". Yongeraho ati: "Uno munsi twaramaze kubamenyesha tuti mu kugenda mwarijanye, si twe twabirukanye. Mushatse kugaruka muzoza, mudashatse naho ntawubahata". Ibihugu vya Bulaya vyarafatiye ibihano u Burundi kuva bwinjiye mu ndyane za politike mu 2015 vyisunze amasezerano ya Cotonou yerekeye ugufashanya hagati y'Ubulaya n'ibihugu vya Afrika, Karayibe na Pasifike, cane cane bikaba vyisunze ingingo ya 96 yo muri ayo masezerano. Abajijwe kuri aya masezerano, Perezida Ndayishimiye yishuye ko ikiringo cayo caheze, ko "rero tutobandanya duharira ku kintu caheze". Bwana Ndayishimiye avuga ko hari ingorane zikiri ku Rwanda yagiriza ko rubitse abakoze ivyaha mu Burundi. Ati: "Uno munsi nyene, bamwe batembagaza ubutegetsi, bakica abantu, bagaturira amazu n'imiduga, n'ubu bibereye harya mu Rwanda, twebwe tukiyumvira mbere y'uko u Rwanda ruriko rurabategura gutera u Burundi". U Rwanda ruhakana kugira uruhara mu igerageza ryo gutembagaza ubutegetsi mu Burundi mu 2015. Asaba iki gihugu ko nimba ari umubanyi mwiza, gutanga aba bantu kugira ngo bahanwe maze imigenderanire imere neza, kuko kuri we, umwana akoze ikibi mu muryango arahanwa. Avuga ko u Rwanda rukwiye gusubiza abo bantu bagirizwa nk'uko n'u Burundi nabwo bwama busubiza inkozi z'ikibi zihungabanya u Rwanda iyo ziramutse zihungiye i Burundi. Umurwi wa ONU uheruka gutangaza raporo nshasha uvuga ko hariho ivyaha vyo guhonyanga agateka ka muntu vyabandanyije mu Burundi. Mbere uvuga ko udafise icizere ku butegetsi bwa Ndayishimiye kuko abagirijwe ivyaha hambere "ubu barushijeho gukomera muri leta". Bwana Ndayishimiye aha we yavuze ko abavuga ibi bafise intumbero ya politike, akavuga ko mu vyo bavuga batigera biyumvira abakorewe ivyaha, ko ahubwo bavugira ababikoze. Ati: "Ni baba bashaka kuvuga agateka ka zina muntu nibatubwire bati hariho aba "victimes" naka na naka mutigeze mushaka guca urubanza kugira ngo batunganirwe. "Mugabo usozanga bariko bavugira abakoze ikibi. "Akarorero, uze wumve bageze kuvugira abapfunzwe bariko baraburana, ntibigera bibuka bati bamwe bapfa ubwo leta iriko irabavugira? "Mbega ni kuki bataza mu Burundi kugira ngo bumvirize abenegihugu ingene bariko baravuga?" Umurwi wa ONU wowo uvuga ko leta y'u Burundi itawemerera kuja mu gihugu kandi idasubiza ivyo uyibaza vyose. Mu minsi iheze, umuhari RED-Tabara waratangaje ko hari abarwanyi bawo binjiye mu gihugu kandi ko ari bo baherutse gukora ibitero mu mihingo imwe imwe y'igihugu. Kubwa Bwana Ndayishimiye, nta barwanyi bateye igihugu, avuga ko ari abicanyi n'abasuma bakoze ivyo bakora kubera bazi ko hari abanyapolitike baca babavugira. Ati: "Uteye igihugu, uravuga uti ndamaze gufata iyi komine, n'amakungu akabimenya, hari aho ivyo muravyumva? "Hariho ico bita ubwicanyi, ubugizi bwa nabi, harimwo ubusuma, kurandura akarimbi, kwica umuntu, ivyaha bihanwa n'amategeko. Iyo rero umuntu ari umwicanyi, umusuma […] ntaca avuga ngo yateye igihugu". Nayo kw'ifatwa ry'agasakisaki ririko riribonekeza kuva iyi mirwi ivuze ko yateye igihugu, aho abenshi mu bafatwa bavugwa ko ari abanywanyi b'umugambwe CNL, nk'uko kandi n'abawurongoye baherutse kubivuga, Bwana Ndayishimiye avuga ko abafatwa bafatwa ku mvo z'amatohoza.

headline: EAC: ONU isaba amakungu gufasha Afrika y’Ubuseruko guhangana n'inzige
text: Ishirahamwe ONU risaba amakungu ko yofasha akarere ka Afrika y'Ubuseruko kurwanya ikiza c'inzige kiriko kirakora ibara. Umuvugizi w'igisata ca ONU kijejwe imfungurwa kw'isi, FAO, asaba imfashanyo kugira ngo ako karere gashobore "guhangana n'inkurikizi z'inzara". Ethiopia, Kenya na Somalia birageramiwe n'igitero c'izo nzige zitema zigatongora imirima, zigatera n'ikigoyi. Iryo shirahamwe rifise ubwoba ko gushika mu kwa gatandatu, izo nzige zishobora kuba ziyongereye ku ncuro 500. Mu Burundi inzige zaravuzwe muri kahise, aho zateye amapfa. Ibihugu vya Ethiopia na Somalia ntivyari biherutse guhura n'ibiza nk'ivyo mu kiringo c'imyaka 25, nayo Kenya yoyo ikaba itari bwigere iterwa n'inzige mu kiringo c'imyaka 70, nk'uko FAO ibivuga. Mu gihe zobandanya zirwirirana kandi zikwiragira, ibihugu vya Sudani y'epfo na Uganda nivyo bivugwa ko bishobora kugeramirwa. FAO iti: "Uravye ingene izo nzige zikwiragira n'ingene zingana, ni ibintu bidasanzwe ku buryo ibisata bijejwe guhangana nazo vyarengewe". Izo nzige zavuye mu gihugu ca Yemen zijabukira mu kiyaga gitukura. Imvura nyinshi yaguye mu mpera z'umwaka wa 2019 zatumye utwo dukoko duhonya imirima n'amashamba twiyongera ku rugero rudasanzwe. Mu kwezi guheze, izo nzige zaratumye indege yunguruza abantu muri Ethiopia ihagarika urugendo rw'indege, zimaze kwinjira mu mamoteri ziranazibira ku buryo umudereva atashobora kubona iyo aja, biba ngombwa ko atura ku kibuga muri Addis Abeba. Abatari bake barumva ivyerekeye inzige mu Burundi, ariko bakavyumva muri kahise nk'umugani kubera amarira n'amaganya vyasiga mu gihugu nk'uko bivugwa na Aloys Batungwanayo, umucukuzi mu vya kahise. Bwana Batungwanayo asigura ko muri kahise inzige zateye mu Burundi, aho wasanga zitumye igihugu giterwa n'amapfa. Avuga kandi ko zanatuma hashobora kwaduka n'intambara kuko zafatwa ko ari ikimenyetso c'uko umwami atari agishoboye gutwara, agasabwa gutanga, yanana ugasanga haradutse intambara yo kumurwanya. Ati: " Aho ziciye ziratema zigatongora hagasigara ubugaragwa, zigasiga inzara izura inzara". "Iyo rero zishitse mu Burundi ku ngoma y'umwami kanaka, baca bavuga ko atagishoboye gutwara, bakamusaba ko yiha ubuki, iyo yanse hagaca haduka indwano hirya no hino". Bwana Batungwanayo avuga ko izizwi cane muri kahise k'u Burundi ari izateye mu 1860 ku mwami Mwezi Gisabo, zivuye muri Tanzania. Avuga kandi ko zasubiye gutera u Burundi igihe bwacurwa bufuni na buhoro n'abakoloni b'Ababirigi, aho mu mwaka wa 1929 zateye ikigoyi bise MANORI, be no mu 1949 aho zateye ikigoyi ciswe GAKWEGE. Yibutsa ko n'ubu bwa vuba, "mu 2006 zateye mu ntara ya Bubanza ziri kumwe n'ibinyabwoya ariko Imana ikaba yarakinze ntizonona imirima kuko zaciye zigenda". Aho inzige ziciye zihasiga amarira n'amaganya kuko zirya ibiterwa mu mwanya muto cane kandi ntaco zisiga, nk'uko Batungwanayo abivuga. Ati: "Abantu batunzwe n'imirima, ibikoko bitunzwe n'imirima hamwe n'ivyatsi, rero aho ziciye hasigara ubugaragwa". "Ni ukuvuga ko inkurikizi ari uko zisiga inzara izura inzara, ikica abantu n'ibikoko". Bwana Batungwanayo afise ubwoba ko zishobora gushika no mu Burundi kuko ata n'ubuhinga busanzwe buhari bwo kuzirwanya. Hagati aho, afise icizere ko u Burundi bufise igisata kijejwe gukinga impanuka z'ivyaduka mu bushikiranganji bw'umutekano. Agisaba kuba maso kugira ngo babe bariyumvira "umuti mu gihe zoshika mu Burundi na rirya ziri ku muryango". Ishirahamwe FAO rivuga ko inzige zishobora kugenda urugendo rw'ibirometero 150 ku munsi, haba hari ubwoba ko zishobora no kubandanya zikwiragira no mu bundi burere.

headline: US: Abarepubulikani bafashije kwemeza itegeko ryemerera abubakana basangiye ibitsina
text: Abarepubulikani batari bake bashigikiye aba-Democrats mu nama nshingamateka ya Amerika mu kwemeza integuro y’itegeko rishobora kuzokingira abubakanye basangiye ibitsina. Aba-Democrats babona ko Sentare Nkuru (urukiko rw'ikirenga) ya Amerika ishobora gufuta uburenganzira bw’abubakanye basangiye ibitsina, ariko Abarepubulikani babinegura biyamirije iyi nteguro bafata nk’ugushaka kubahendahenda. Mu 2015, Sentare Nkuru ya Amerika yaremeje ko abubakana basangiye ibitsina babifitiye uburenganzira mu gihugu cose. Ariko mu kwezi guheze, yarafuse uburenganzira bwo gukorora inda bwari bumaze igihe kirekire bukingiwe n’ibwirizwashingiro. Amahirwe y’uko haba itegeko rikingira abubakanye basangiye ibitsina hamwe n’abadasangiye ubwoko (Respect for Marriage Act) asa n’uko ari make mu nama nkenguzamateka ifise ibitigiri bingana hagati y’aba-Democrats n’abarepubulikani. Abarepubulikani bababa 47 bishize hamwe n’aba-Democrats mu kwemeza iyi ngingo ku majwi 267-157 ejo ku wa kabiri inyuma y’aho abarongoye abarepubulikani bahereye uburenganzira abanywanyi b’umugambwe wabo gutora ikiri ku mutima. Abarenga bitatu vya bine vy’abashingamateka b’abarepubulikani bariyamirije iyi nteguro kuri iki kibazo kimaze igihe kirekire ari ikigeragezo ca poritike ku ruhande rw’abagendera ku mico ya kera. Abagendera ku mico ya kera basanzwe banegura iyi nteguro bagabisha ko aya matora ari umutego w’aba-Democrats kugira bagondoze abarepubulikani kwerekana aho bahagaze mu gihe himirije amatora y’abashingamateka yo mu kw’icumi na rimwe uno mwaka. Umushingamateka Jim Jordan wo muri Ohio avuga ati: "Turi ng’aha mu manyanga ya poritike". Uwurongoye inkehwa mu nama nshingamateka Kevin McCarthy hamwe n’uwujejwe indero ku ruhande rw’inkehwa Steve Scalise batoye oya, ariko uwugira gatatu mu bashingamateka b’abarepubulikani Elise Stefanik yatoye ego. Uwundi kandi yatoye ego ni umurepubulikani azwi cane Liz Cheney yigeze gucanamwo muri kahise n'umugore bavukana wo mu bubukana basangiye ibitsina, igihe Cheney yiyamiriza abubakana basangiye ibitsina. Iyi nteguro y’itegeko izoshobora kandi gutuma abubakanye badasangiye ubwoko bakingirwa n’amategeko. Aba-Democrats bazanye iyi nteguro inyuma y’aho ba nyarwinshi bagendera ku mico ya kera bo muri Sentare Nkuru y’igihugu mu kwa gatandatu bahinduriye itegeko rizwi nka Roe v Wade  ryo mu 1973 ryatanga uburenganzira bwo gukorora inda. Umucamanza ari ku ruhande rw’abagendera ku mico ya kera Clarence Thomas yanditse mu kwezi guheze ko n’ibindi vyemezo vyo muri kahise ku bibazo nk’ivy'abubakana basangiye ibitsina hamwe n’ivyo kugenzura imvyaro bishobora gusubirwamwo. Ariko umucamanza Samuel Alito, uwundi agendera ku mico ya kera, yarasiguye neza mu ngingo yiwe ko "iki cemezo cerekeye uburenganzira butangwa n’ibwirizwashingiro bwo gukorora inda gusa”. Abarepubulikani baneguye ibivugwa n’aba-Democrats ko ukwubakana hagati y’abadasangiye ubwoko gushobora kubangamirwa, berekana ko umucamanza Thomas ari umwirabure yarongoye umuzungukazi. Umukuru w’aba-Democrats mu nama nkenguzamateka Chuck Schumer ejo ku wa kabiri yavuze ati: "Reka duhangane naco: Uku ni ukuzana ca civugo ca 'Kwongera kugira Amerika Igihangange' muri Sentare Nkuru y’igihugu. Uruhande rw’intagondwa muri Sentare Nkuru y’igihugu rugomba kugarukana iki civugo”. 'Kwongera kugira Amerika Igihangange' (Make America Great Again), ni icivugo cakoreshwa n’uwahoze ari umukuru w’igihugu Donald Trump mu myiyamamazo y’amatora yatsinze mu 2016. Umushingamateka Schumer ntiyiyemeje gutwara mu nama nkenguzamateka iyi nteguro kugira ije mu matora. Ivyabaye ejo ku wa kabiri vyerekana intambwe Amerika imaze gushikako kuri kino kibazo c’abubakana basangiye ibitsina cigeze kuba kibacanishamwo cane, neza na neza inyuma y’imyaka 14 Barack Obama, umu-Democrat, yariko yiyamamariza kurongora igihugu, avuze ko ukwubakana ari hagati y’umugabo n’umugore. Amatohoza yakozwe n’ikigo Gallup mu kwa gatandatu yerekana ko igitigiri c’abashigikiye abubakana basangiye ibitsina ciyongereye, aho 70% vy’Abanyamerika bakuze bashigikiye ubugeni nk’ubwo.

headline: Amasezerano ya AUKUS: France na US biriko bigerageza guhagarika icuka kibi
text: Ubufaransa na Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika biri mu twigoro two guhagarika icuka kibi hagati yavyo catanguye mu ndwi iheze inyuma y'amasezerano ajanye no kwivuna umwansi azwi nka AUKUS hagati ya Amerika, Ubwongereza na Australia. Aya masezerano yatumye Ubufaransa butakaza isoko ryo kwubakira Australia amato (sous-marins/submarines) ry'imiriyaridi 37 z'amadorari. Paris ivuga ko yagiye kumenya ivy'ayo masezerano hasigaye amasaha make ngo ashirwe ku mugaragaro. Abakuru b'ibihugu vya Amerika n'Ubufaransa basohoye itangazo rivuga ko ibintu bishobora kuba bigiye kuja mu buryo kubera ibiganiro bitaziguye hagati y'ibi bihugu bisanzwe bicuditse. Ejo ku wa gatatu, Joe Biden na Emmanuel Macron baravuganye kuri terefone mu kiringo c'iminota 30. Bazohurira kandi n'i Bulaya mu mpera z'ukwezi kuza. Aya masezerano ya AUKUS yateweko igikumu mu ndwi iheze afatwa ko afise intumbero yo guhagarika ubwiganze bw'Ubushinwa mu nyanja y'Ubushinwa (Mer de Chine méridionale/South China Sea). Abihweza ibintu n'ibindi bavuga ko aya masezerano ashobora kuba ari yo ya mbere akomeye abaye hagati y'ibi bihugu bitatu kuva inyuma y'intambara ya kabiri y'isi yose. Ariko rero uburakari bw'Ubufaransa nibwo bwabonetse cane - umushikiranganji w'Ubufaransa ajejwe imigenderanire akaba yavuze ko ari amasezerano "y'incamugongo". Kimwe mu bintu bidakunze kuboneka muri ibi bihugu bicuditse, ni uko Perezida Macron yaciye ategeka ko abaserukira Ubufaransa i Washington na Canberra batahukanwa. Hagati aho, uwuserukira Ubufaransa agiye gusubira i Washington ku kazi kiwe. Ariko ntacatangajwe nimba umuserukizi wabwo muri Australia nawe azosubira i Canberra. Perezida Biden yasubiye gushimangira uruhara Ubufaransa n'Ubulaya bifise mu karere ka Aziya na Pasifike. Hanyuma iri tangazo rirashimangira ko Amerika yemera akamaro k'Ubulayi mu bijanye n'ukwivuna abansi mu ntumbero yo gushigikira ishirahamwe ryo kwivunira abansi hamwe OTAN/NATO - kimwe mu migambi nyamukuru ya Perezida Macron. Kuri uyu wa kane, hitezwe umubonano hagati y'umunyamabanga wa Amerika ajejwe imigenderanire Anthony Blinken n'umushikiranganji w'Ubufaransa ajejwe imigenderanire, Jean-Yves Le Drian, inyuma y'inama nkuru ya ONU i New York, nk'uko bivugwa n'umutegetsi wa Amerika. Ariko, haracari amakenga ku bijanye n'inama hagati y'abategetsi b'ishirahamwe ry'ibihugu vya Bulaya (UE/EU) n'aba Australia itegekanijwe mu ndwi iza. Ni ikoraniro rigize gatatu - hagati ya EU na Australia canke hagati ya EU na Amerika - rishobora kuzokwunguruzwa biturutse kuri aya masezerano. Ejo ku wa gatatu, umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza yabwiye Perezida Macron ati "donnez-moi un break", anamusaba gutsinda ishavu ku vyerekeye Aukus. Umwihwezo w'umunyamakuru Nomia Iqbal, akorera i Washington Aya ni amayeri y'abanyamerika yo "gusaba imbabazi udasavye imbabazi": ni ukuvuga mu gusaba imbabazi ku kuntu yavyitwayemwo (habuze ibiganiro), ariko ntasabe imbabazi kuri aya masezerano (amasezerano ya Aukus). Ariko rero, Perezida Biden yabonetse amwenyura igihe yari kuri terefone na Macron, mu ntumbero yo kwerekana ko ibintu bimeze neza. Ariko turavye ibijanye n'iri tangazo, rishobora kuboneka ko ata kirimwo, ariko rifise insiguro nyinshi. Ubwa mbere, ni itangazo rihuriweko na bose, mu gihe mu bisanzwe usanga uruhande rumwe rumwe rusohora itangazo ryarwo, rero aba bategetsi bompi bashatse kwerekana ko bashize hamwe inyuma "y'ikiganiro c'iminota 30 bagiriraniye kuri terefone". Iri tangazo ryatanguye kwerekana neza ko ari Perezida Biden yarondeye Macron - kumbure iki gishobora kuba ari ikintu Ubufaransa bwipfuza ko kimenyekana. Hanyuma kandi hari uyu murongo uvuga uku: "Aba bategetsi bompi bemeranije ko ibintu bishobora kuba vyafashe inzira nziza kubera baganiriye badahishanya" - kumbure n'iki gifise kuba ikintu Ubufaransa bwipfuza ko kimenyekana. Ariko na Amerika nayo ntigugumwa, Biden ntiyigeze ahindura ivyo yamye avuga kuva kera, ko Ubulaya ubwabwo butegerezwa gukora gusumba ku bijanye n'umutekano wabwo. Hanyuma kandi iri tangazo riheraheza ryibutsa ko Amerika ifashe mu mugongo ibikorwa vyo kurwanya iterabwoba mu karere ka Sahel, akarere Ubufaransa busanzwe buriko burakoreramwo cane. Muri make, iri ni itangazo ryitondewe cane n'impande zompi kugira ngo bahurize hamwe hanyuma ibintu bibandanye. Ariko gusa, akamwenyuro ka Biden igihe yari kuri terefone ni ikindi kintu. Mbega bizogenda gute ni bahura amaso mu yandi mu kwezi kuza i Bulaya? Ni ngombwa kandi kwibutsa ko Perezida Macron arondera gusubira kwitoza mu matora y'umwaka uza. Uku kwihagararako agahangana na Perezida Biden kwari nkenerewa kuri we hagati mu gihugu kugira ngo yerekane ko afise inguvu, ariko kandi aho nyene agategerezwa kurondera ingene ashobora kuvyigobotoramwo. Rero iki kiganiro yagiranye na Biden kuri terefone camufashije cane.

headline: RED Tabara ihakana ko ata murwanyi wayo yafashwe na FARDC
text: Nyuma yaho igisirikare ca Republika ya Demokrasi ya Kongo kivugiye yuko cafashe abarwanyi b'umugwi w'inyeshamba zirwanya leta y'u Burundi, RED Tabara, uwo mugwi wavyiyamirije. Umuvugizi wa RED Tabara, Patrick Nahimana, yabwiye Florentine Kwizera ko abo bantu igisirikare ca Kongo kivuga ko cafashe atari abarwanyi bayo.

headline: Umwamikazi azobanana na Prezida Joe Biden ku ndwi iza.
text: Umwamikazi azobonana na Prezida wa Amerika Joe Biden n'umutambukanyi wiwe Jill Biden ku ndwi iza, ku ndwi iza, nk'uko ikirimba  ca Buckingham cabimenyesheje. Uwo mubonano uzobera ku kirimba ca Windsor ku wa mungu itariki 13 ukwezi kwa gatandatu, uhuriranye n'uko hazoba harangiye urugendo rwa prezida Biden mu Bwongereza aho azoba yitavye inama y'abakuru b'ibihugu 7 vyambere bitunze cane kw'isi, G7. Biden azoba abaye umukuru wa Amerika agira 12 azoba abonanye n'Umwamikazi nk'uwuri ku ngoma mu Bwongereza. Yarabonanye n'uwo Biden yasubiriye Donald Trump n'umutambukanyi wiwe Melania Trump ku kirimba ca Buckingham mu 2019. Umwamikazi, ubu afise imyaka 95, yabonanye ubwa mbere n'umukuru wa Amerika ari ku butegetsi , Harry S Truman, akiri Umuganwakazi Elizabeth mu 1951. Kuva ico gihe  nta mukuru n'umwe yatowe kurongora Amerika batarabonana mu myaka 69 amaze ku ngoma, kiretse Lyndon B Johnson wenyene. Biden n'umutambukanyi wiwe bararungitse ubutumwa bwo guhoza Umwamikazi igihe yabura umugabo wiwe, Duc wa Edimburgh, mu kwezi kwa kane. Bavuze ko bagumiza umuryango w'i bwami ''mu mitima yacu muri ibi bihe". Iyo nama ya G7 i Cornwall izoba ariyo ya mbere Biden yitavye hanze ubwiwe, kubera ikiza ca coronavirus camubujije gutembara hanze ya Amerika kuva yinjiye ibiro vya Maison Blance (White House). Ikirimba ca Buckingham  cavuze mw'itangazo rigufi ko : "Umwamikazi azobonana na prezida wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika n'umutambukanyi wiwe Jill Biden ku kirimba ca Windsor ku wa mungu itariki 13 ukwezi kwa gatandatu mu 2021."

headline: US: Bemeje integuro y’itegeko rikingira abubakanye basangiye igitsina
text: Inama nkenguzamateka ya Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika yemeje integuro y’itegeko rikingira abubakanye basangiye ibitsina hamwe n’abubakanye badasangiye amoko. Iri tegeko rica risubira mu nama nshingamateka yiteze kuryemeza hanyuma ice irirungikira umukuru w’igihugu Biden kugira ngo aritereko igikumu. Abashigikiye iri tegeko bizeye ko ryemezwa imbere y’uko Abarepubulika bafata Inama nshingamateka mu kwa mbere. Hagati aho, iyi nteguro ntitegeka intara zose mu gihugu gushingira abubakana basangiye igitsina. Integuro y’iri tegeko yagiye kuronka inguvu inyuma y’aho, mu kwa gatandatu, Sentare nkuru y’igihugu ifatiye icemezo igafuta uburenganzira bwo gukorora inda bwatangwa n’igihugu. Abaharanira agateka k’abari muri wa murwi w’abahuza ibitsina babisangiye (LGBT) bafise ubwoba ko uburenganzira bwo kurongorana hagati y’abasangiye igitsina bushobora kugwa mu ngorane mu mezi ari imbere. Abemeje iyi nteguro mu matora yabaye nijoro ku wa kabiri ni 61 kuri 36 ,aho Abarepubulika 12 bayemeje. Iyi nteguro yagiye gushigikirwa n’abakenguzamateka b’Abarepubulika inyuma y’aho yongewemwo ingingo zikingira ubwigenge bw’amadini. Integuro y’iri tegeko ifise intumbero yo gushimangira uburenganzira bw’abarongorana basangiye ibitsina mu mategeko y’igihugu, n’aho ababana muri iyo nzira basanzwe bakingiwe mu gihugu biciye mu ngingo Sentare nkuru y’igihugu yafashe imbere y’aha. Mw’itangazo, umukuru wa nyarwinshi mu nama nkenguzamateka Chuck Schumer arashimagiza iyi ngingo, akavuga ko ari intambwe ikomeye “mu rugendo rurerure rutera ruja ku buringanire nyabwo”. "Mu kwemeza iyi nteguro, inama nkenguzamateka irungitse ubutumwa buri munyamerika akeneye kwumva: Ata kuraba uwo uri canke uwo ukunda, na wewe ukeneye iteka no gufatwa kumwe nk’abandi imbere y’amategeko”. Tammy Baldwin, umukenguzamateka wa mbere w’umu-Democrat yavyiyemeje ku mugaragaro, akongera agafata iya mbere mu rugamba rwo guharanira iyi nteguro, avuga ko iri tegeko “rizokingira intambwe yashitsweko bigoranye” ku burenganzira bw’abubakana basangiye ibitsina muri Amerika. Iyi nteguro nshasha ikuraho ku mugaragaro itegeko rikingira ugushingira, rizwi nka Defense of Marriage Act (DOMA) ryo mu 1996 risigura neza ko ukurongorana biba gusa hagati y’umugabo n’umugore. Mu 2013, Sentare nkuru y’igihugu yafashe ingingo yavuga ko iri tegeko riteye kubiri n’ibwirizwashingiro. Integuro y’iri tegeko yaraye yemejwe n’inama nkenguzamateka isaba kandi intara kwemera abubakanye basangiye ibitsina bashingiraniye mu zindi ntara. Isaba kandi intara gukora ku buryo abubakanye basangiye ibitsina baronswa uburenganzira butangwa n’igihugu. Aya matora yabaye inyuma y’ibiganiro hagati y’imigambwe yompi iri mu nama nkenguzamateka vyamaze amezi atari make, akaba kandi abaye inyuma y’amatora aheruka yo hagati muri manda, akaba ahumuriza bamwe mu bakenguzamateka.

headline: Amatora muri USA - 2020: Kubera iki Abraham Lincoln yavuzwe cane mu mpari hagati y'abahiganwa
text: Mu kiganiroi c'impari hagati ya Donald Trump na Joe Biden mw'ijoro ryo ku wa kane, hari ikintu kibandanya kigaruka mu mitwe y'ababakurikiranye. Ku kibazo kitavugwako rumwe na gato ku bijanye n'umubano hagati y'amoko muri Amerika, Perezida Trump yarafatiye cane kuri Abraham Lincoln - umukuru wa Leta Zuze Ubumwe za Amerika yagira 16  yarwanije ubucakara amaze gutsinda intambara yo mu myaka ya 1960s. Bwana Biden yarashatse kubikorerako akoresheje amajambo y'agahemo, ariko Bwana Trump wewe nta vyo gufyina vyagiyemwo. Vyagenze uku; Perezida Trump yavuze - kandi ntibwari bwo bwa mbere - ati:  "Nta wundi mukuru w'igihugu arigera akorera ivyiza abirabure gusumba Donald Trump ...kiretse Abraham Lincoln". Yongera ko ati: "Muri ino nzu ni jewe ntagendera ku vyiyumviro vy'ivanguramoko". Bwana Biden nawe ati: "'Abraham Lincoln' dufise ng'aha ni umwe mu ba perezida bashira imbere ivanguramoko dufise mu gihe ca none. Akantu ako ariko kose kajanye n'ivanguramoko, ako ari ko kose, aca agafatirako mu gukokeza". Trump: "Afatiye kuri Abraham Lincoln, ivyo bivuye he?". Biden: "Uvuze ko uri  Abraham Lincoln." Trump: "Oya, oya... Sinavuze ko 'ndi Abraham Lincoln'. Navuze nti , 'Kiretse Abraham Lincoln nta wundi muntu arigera akorera Abirabure nk'ivyo maze kubakorera". Mu kumwihora, Bwana Trump yaciye abaza Biden ivyo amaze gukora we ubwiwe ku kibazo c'umubano hagati y'amoko.  Yaciye amwibutsa integuro y'itegeko ryo mu 1994 Bwana Biden yafashije kwandika, itegeko ryiyamirizwa n'abari muri rya sekeza Black Lives Matter (ubuzima bw'abirabure ni kirumara) bakavuga ko ari ryo ryatumye Abanyamerika bakomoka muri Afrika bama bariko barapfungwa. Aya majambo yaciye atuma abatari bake bavuga amajambo menshi ku mbuga hwaniro. Uyu umwe muri bo ati : "Abraham Lincoln ariko arihweza muri rino joro: Perezida Trump arakunze kwigereranya na Abraham Lincoln akavuga ko ubutegetsi bwiwe bwitayeho gusumba ibibazo vy'Abanyamerika bakomoka muri Afrika mu bijanye n'indero, ubuzi n'ibindi bisata. Abasesenguzi baciye bakorera kuri aya majambo akunze kuvugwa na Trump, bavuga ko mu gihe ca none hari abaperezida bakoze ibintu vyinshi cane cane cane mu bijanye n'uburenganzira bwa kiremwamuntu. Batanga akarorero cane cane ka Lyndon B Johnson, yahagarariye itegeko ritanga uburenganzira bwo gutora ritavangura, itegeko Fair Housing Act  rikuraho ivanguraruhu iryo ari ryo ryose mu bijanye no kugura, kugurisha canke gukotesha inzu mu myaka ya 1960. Mu mwaka uheze, Trump yarigereranije n'uyu mukuru w'igihugu yagira 16, mu kuvuga ko ata wundi mu perezida arigera afatwa nabi n'ibinyamakuru nka we - ndetse na Lincoln. Ati: "Biravugwa ko Abraham Lincoln yafashwe nabi cane, ariko nta wundi arigera afatwa nabi nka jewe". Perezida Lincoln yararongoye igihugu mu rugamba rwo kurwanya amaleta yo mu bumanuko yari yishize hamwe kugira yiyonkore maze yibandanirize n'ubucakara mu ntambara ya Amerika yo mu 1861-1865.  Mu 1863 yaciye ategeka ko Abanyamerika bakomoka muri Afrika, ari bo bari abacakara, baronka umwidegemvyo. Haciye iminsi mike Jenerali Robert E Lee amanitse amaboko mu 1865, Lincoln yaragandaguriwe mu nzu ndangabirori mu gisagara ca Washington DC n'uwitwa John Wilkes Booth.

headline: Kenya: Icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu Ruto yasavye imbabazi prezida Kenyatta
text: Icegera c'umukuru wa Kenya William Ruto yasavye imbabazi umukuru w'igihugu  Uhuru Kenyatta batabandanije gucana uwaka inyuma y'amatora yo mu 2018. Kuba  Ruto na Kenyatta batacumvikana vyageze ahantu bija ku mugaragraro. Umukuru w'igihugu ntashigikiye Ruto mu kwitoza ngo amusubirire mu matora azoba mu kwezi kwa Myandagaro (8), ahubwo yahisemwo gushigikira uwutavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi Raila Odinga. Ruto ivyo yabivuze mw'ikoraniro ry'igisabisho ngarukamwaka  categuwe n'inama nshingamateka - prezida Kenyatta akaba yari yacitavye. Icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu yavugiye imbere y'abari aho, asaba abanya-Kenya ikigongwe ku ho reta itakoze neza - hanyuma  yita Kenyatta ''umugenzi wiwe mwiza''. Yavuze ati: ''Ndazi kandi ko mu mabanga y'icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu nshobora kuba hari aho ntashitse ku vyo nari nitezweko n'umukuru wanje, nyakwubahwa umukuru w'igihugu - umugenzi wanje mwiza, ndagusavye imbabazi". Yabandanije  yifuriza ikiruhuko ciza umukuru w'igihugu. Prezida Kenyatta ararangiza  uyu mwaka ikiringo ciwe ca kabiri ari naco ca nyuma. Muri Kenya umukuru w'igihugu ntafise ububasha bwo gukura icegera ciwe - ashobora kuvanwaho gusa n'inama nshingamateka canke izindi nzira z'amategeko. Raba video y'amajambo yashikirijwe na William Ruto. BBC ntibazwa ibivuye ku zindi mbuga.

headline: P﻿akistan: Uwahoze ari umushikiranganji wa mbere yarashwe arakomereka mu myiyerekano
text: U﻿wahoze ari umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Pakistani, Imran Khan, yakomerekejwe n'urusase ku kuguru igihe yaraswa ari mu myiyerekano mu gisagara co mu buseruko ca Wazirabad. U﻿mutegetsi wo mu rwego rwo hejuru yabwiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru AFP  ko cari igikorwa "co kugerageza kwica", ariko igipolisi ntikiremeza ko ari we yaronderwa. A﻿banywanyi b'umugambwe wiwe wa PTI bavuga ko abandi bantu bane bakomeretse. K﻿han w'imyaka 70 ni we yari ayoboye iyo myiyerekano ku mugwa mukuru Islamabad basaba ko hapa amatora ikiringo kitararangira inyuma yo gukurwa ku butegetsi mu kwezi kwa kane. U﻿wo yahoze ari umushikiranganji wa mbere yabonetse ajanywe kwa muganga i Lahore. Umuvugizi w'umugambwe wiwe yavuze ko yababaye ku murundi. U﻿wundi mutegetsi w'umugambwe, umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu w'akarere, Yasmeen Rashid, yavuze ko Khan ataremvye cane. I﻿gipolisi cerekanye video y'umugabo bahagaritse bavuga ko ari we yahatswe kwica uwo yahoze ari umushikiranganji wa mbere. N﻿tibiramenyekana uko iyo video yafashwe, ariko muri yo, uwo mugabo yariko arabazwa n'igipolisi igituma yarashe, aca yishura:"Yariko arajana abantu mu nzira itari yo. Nashaka kumwica. Nagerageje kumwica." A﻿masanamu ya video y'aho vyabereye yerekana Khan n'abayoboke biwe baryama hejuru ya kontenere ijamwo y'ikamyo itwaye imizigo imbere y'uko humvikana urufasha rw'amasase rwumvikana. Haboneka Khan yunamye, mu gihe abandi bari bamuzungurutse bariko baragerageza kumupfuka. I﻿yindi video yerekana Khan akomeye afise ibande ku kuguru kw'i buryo, ajanywe mu modoka inyuma yo kuraswa. U﻿mwe mu bayoboke b'umugambwe PTI na we nyene yabonetse afise ibande mu maso n'amaraso ku mpuzu, avuga ko abantu bakwiye gusengera Khan n'abandi bakomeretse. Umutegetsi wo mu rwego rwo hejuru muri uwo mugambwe Raoof H﻿assan yegereye cane Khan yabwiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru rya AFP ati:"Kwari ukugerageza kumwica, kumugandagura." U﻿mushikiranganji wa mbere ahari ubu Shehbaz Sharif yateye ivyatsi ico gitero aca ategeka ko haba amatohoza ubwo nyene. Prezida Arif Alvi yavuze ko ivyabaye kwari "ukugerageza kugandagura umuntu bunyamaswa." K﻿han yari arongoye imyiyerekano - iyigira kabiri nk'iyo muri uyu mwaka - mu misi indwi, ahamagarira ko hoba amatora mashasha. R﻿eta iguma ivuga ko izotunganya amatora mu mwaka uza  nk'uko bitegekanijwe. M﻿u kwezi guheze, akanama kajejwe gutegura amatora karafashe ingingo yo kubuza Khan gukora amabanga ayari yo yose y'igihugu, ivyo uwo yahoze ari rurangiranwa mu rukino rwa Cricket avuga ko ari ingingo yinyegeje inyuma ya politike. Y﻿agirijwe ko atagiye aramenyesha ido n'ido ry'utuganuke yagiye arahabwa n'abategetsi bo mu bindi bihugu n'amahera yavuye mw'igurishwa ryatwo. Utwo tuganuke turimwo amasaha yo mu bwoko bwa Rolex, impeta,... P﻿akistan ifise kahise kabi k'ubwicanyi bushingiye kuri politike. Ubwamenyekanye cane, n'iyicwa ry'umushikiranganji wa mbere Benazir Bhutto mu myiyerekano yo mu 2007.

headline: DR Congo: Ibihumbi vy'abasirikare bacungera inzego bagize urugendo rwo gushigikira Tshisekedi
text: Abasirikare ibihumbi n'ibihumbi ba Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo bihaye amabarabara ku mugwa mukuru Kinshasa mu  rugendo rwo gushigikira umukuru w'ico gihugu Félix Tshisekedi inyuma y'imisi mike havuzwe ivyo gusenyura ubutegetsi. Bambaye inkofero zitukura kandi bafise inkoho, imirongo miremire y'abasirikare bo mu gisata kijejwe gucungera umutekano w'umukuru w'igihugu n'izindi nzego z'igihugu  (Garde Républicaine/Republican Guard) bazungurutse mu mabarabara y'i Kinshasa. Ni urugendo ruteguwe inyuma y'indwi umuhanuzi mukuru wa Perezida Tshisekedi afashwe agapfungwa n'igendereza rya gisirikare, mu vyo reta ya Kinshasa yatangaje ko yari mu migambi yo guhungabanya umutekano w'igihugu. Amakuru yacanacanako i Kinshasa yavugaga ko ku wa gatandatu w'indwi iheze, François Beya  ari kumwe n'abandi basirikare, bashatse guhirika ubutegetsi mu gihe Perezida Tshisekedi yari i Addis Ababa mu nama y'ubumwe bwa Africa (AU). Intumbero y'uru rugendo itangazwa n'ubutegetsi ni uko abo basirikare bari mu myimenyerezo yo kugorora umubiri. Ariko ni urugendo ubaye inyuma y'indwi habaye ibikorwa vyo gushaka guhungabanya umutekano w'igihugu. Igihe Perezida Félix Tshisekedi yari mu nama y'ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Afrika i Addis-Abeba yari yerekeye kwiga ikibazo c'itembagazwa ry'ubutegetsi rikorwa n'inzego za gisirikare mu bihugu vya Afrika, uyu muhanuzi wiwe mu vyo umutekano nawe niho yahagarikwa. Reta ivuga ko Francois Beya yariko ategura umugambi wo guhungabanga igihugu - abanyagihugu batari bake ba Congo bakavuga ko yariko ategura gusenyura ubutegetsi bwa Tshisekedi. Urugendo nk'uru, ibidahuse kuboneka mu gihugu aho ibihumbi vy'abasirikare biha amabarabara, ni uburyo bwo kwerekana ko bari maso kandi ko ata muntu n'umwe yorota agerageza gutegura umugambi mubi.

headline: Iran yarahiye ko izokwihora ku gitero ca Israel ku ruganda rwa 'nucleaire' rwa Natanz
text: Umushikiranganji wa Iran ajejwe imigenderanire yavuze ko igihugu ciwe ''kizokwihora'' ku gitero ku ruganda rwo mu kuzimu, igitero yagiriza Israel. Abategetsi ba Iran bavuze ko urwo ruganda rwo guhingura uranium rwagabweko igitero ''c'iterabwoba rishingiye kuri nucleaire'' ku wa  mungu, inyuma yaho bavugiye ubwa mbere ko  hari habaye ikibazo c'umuyagankuba. Imashine zigezweho zo guhingura uranium zaheruka kwatswa. Israel ntaco iravuga, ariko hari iradiyo y'igihugu yavuze ko amakuru ava mw'iperereza avuga ko ari igikorwa giciye kuri internet ca Mosad, urwego rujejwe iperereza muri Israel. Bavuga ko ico gitero cononye vyinshi kuruta uko vyari vyavuzwe ubwa mbere. Abategetsi ba Amerika babwiye ikinyamakuru The New York Times ko uguturika gukomeye cane kwasambuye ata gisigaye ubuhinga bwigenga bw'umuyagankuba bwarungika umuyagankuba muri izo mashini muri urwo ruganda rwi mu kuzimu. Bagereranya ko bishobora gutwara amezi icenda kugirango ibikorwa vyo guhingura uranium vyongere kurangurirwa aho hantu. Itororokanirizo ry'amakuru rya Iran Nour, ryegamiye Inama nkuru y'umutekano muri ico gihugu, hagati aho ryavuze ko inkuru zo mu bushikiranganji bujejwe iperereza zivuga ko 'umukuru' mu bagavye ico gitero yamenyekanye kandi ko 'ingingo zikenewe ziriko zirafatwa kugira uwo muntu afatwe'. Israel yari igize igihe igabisha ku mugambi wa  wa nucleaire wa Iran mu gihe hariko higwa ingene hovyugwa amasezerano yo mu 2015 yerekeye nucleaire yahebwe n'uwahoze ari umukuru wa Amerika Donald Trump. Uwamusubiriye, Joe Biden, yavuze ko ashaka kuvyura ayo masezerano ahambaye. Ariko Iran n'ibibindi bihugu bitanu vya rutura bikiyarimwo - Ubushinwa, Ubufaransa, Ubudagi, Uburusiya n'Ubwongereza - bakeneye ingene bamuronkera inzira yo kuvanaho ibihano vy'abanyamerika hanyuma Iran nayo ikagaruke ku humvikanywe kutarengwa mu mugambi wayo wa nucleaire. Abategetsi ba Amerika na Iran bari mu biganiro atari ivy'imbonankubone i Vienne kugira barabe ko bakuraho ayo mayira abiri, ibikorwa abanyaburaya bafashamwo nk'abahuza. Ihsirahamwe rya Bukaya rivuga ko rigikeneye kumenya neza ivyashitse ku ruganda rwa Natanz, ariko ko ryiyamiriza "ikintu cose coza gitoba canke gica inguvu utwigoro twerekeye amasezerano ya nucleaire". Umushikiranganji wa Amerika ajejwe kwivuna abansi Lloyd Austin, ariko mu rugendo muri Israel, yavuze ko azi ibiriko biravugwa kuri Natanz kandi ko utwigoro tw'uubutetegetsi bwa Biden two kugarukana amasezerano na Iran tuzobandanya.

headline: Uganda: umugambwe utavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi wagiriraniye amasezerano na Museveni
text: Perezida Yoweri Museveni wa Uganda yagiriraniye amasezerano yo gufashanya n’umukuru w’umugambwe utavuga rumwe n’uwuri ku butegetsi akaba mbere yari ahanganye nawe mu matora aheruka, Nobert Mao. Aya masezerano hagati y’umugambwe uri ku butegetsi National Resistance Movement hamwe n’umugambwe Democratic Party yateweko igikumu nijoro ku wa gatatu inyuma y’umubonano hagati y’aba bategetsi babiri mu biro vy’umukuru w’igihugu, State House, i Entebbe. Perezida Museveni arakeza abategetsi b’umugambwe Democratic Party kuri iki “kimenyetso ca poritike y’abantu bakuze, babona kure kandi bafise intumbero yo kwubaka”. Mao arongoye uyu mugambwe utavuga rumwe n’uwuri ku butegetsi kuva mu 2010. Yarerekanye ubuhinga bwiwe mu kuvuga ijambo kandi nk’umunyaporitike arwanya ubutegetsi buri mu minwe y’akarwi kamwe, ariko umugambwe wiwe umaze imyaka mu ndyane z’amacakubiri watumye utakaza ikibanza mu gihugu. Imbere y’amatora yo mu 2021, yaratakaje abatari bake mu bo bari bafatanije kurongora uyu mugambwe bahisemwo kwigira mu mugambwe mushasha ico gihe National Unity Platform ukirongowe gushika ubu na Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu azwi ku ritazirano nka Bobi Wine. Abashigikiye Mao babona ko iyi ngingo ari inzira nziza yo gukorana hagati y’iyi migambwe ibiri, ariko abamunegura bobo bazobona ko barenganuwe inyuma yo kumwagiriza ko akorana na Museveni. Abandi nabo banegura poritike ya Uganda bashobora kubona aya masezerano nk’ayandi mayeri y’umukuru w’igihugu yo guca intege abatavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi bwiwe. Imbere y’aho, yari yashoboye guhendahenda abanyaporitike batavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi bwiwe mu kubaha ibibanza muri reta.
