Abagisigaye ku ruhande rw’abatavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi nabo babandanya baburabuzwa mu bikorwa vyabo. Perezida Museveni yasohoye videwo yerekana ingene yariko atera igikumu kuri ano masezerano n’umugambwe Democratic Party:

headline: Ethiopia - Tigray: Icegeranyo kivuga ko hashobora kuba harakozwe ivyaha vyo mu ntambara
text: Impande zose ziri muri iyo ntamabara ya Tigray muri Ethiopia zararenze ku mategeko mpuzamakungu y'agateka ka zina muntu, mbere bimwe mu vyaha bikaba bishobora gufatwa nk'ibikorerwa ikiremwa muntu nk'uko biri mu cegeranyo gishasha. Ivyaha ndengerabutungane, iyica rubozo, gufata ku nguvu no kugira  ibitero ku mpunzi no kubateshejwe izabo vyaragizweko amatohoza. Amatohoza yakozwe n'akanama kajejwe agateka ka zina muntu muri Ethiopia (EHRC) kari kumwe n'ibiro vya Onu bijejwe agateka ka zina muntu yerekana ko hoba hariho ivyemeza ko habaye ivyaha vyo mu ntambara. Intambara yadutse itariki zine z'ukwezi kwa cumi na rimwe mu 2020. Yatanguye igihe umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Ethiopia Abiy ategekeye ko haba ibitero ku ngabo z'intara ya Tigray iri mu buraruko. Mu ntango, ingabo za reta zaromoye abagwanyi, ariko ibintu biza guhinduka mu kwezi kwa gatandatu igihe abagwanyi ba Tigray bagaruza igice kinini. Ubu bivugwa ko basugereje umugwa mukuru Addis Abebas. Ku wa kabiri, reta ya Ethiopia yatangaje ibihe nk'ivyo igihugu kiri mu ntambara inyuma y'amasaha make isavye ababa ku mugwa mukuru gufata ibigwanisho. Umukuru w'igisata ca Onu kijejwe agateka ka zina muntu Michelle Bachelet yavuze ko iyo ntambara yaranzwe n'amabi arenze urugero, agasaba  ko haba ihagarikwa ry'intambara. Ico cegeranyo kivuga  kiti: "Hari ivyo gufatirako ata gukekeranya vyemeza ko impande zose ziri muri iyo ntambara... zagize ibitero ku basivile n'ivyabo, nk'amazu, amashure, ibitaro, ibibanza vyo gusengeramwo canke zakora ibitero bidatoranije vyahitanye abasivile, bisambura canke vyonona ibintu  batunze." Ubwicanyi ndengerabutungane buragaragara muvyo babonye. Ico cegeranyo kirerekana urudome ku rundi ingene urwaruka rwo muri Tigray rwo mu mugwi uzwi kw'izina rya Samri rwishe abasivile barenga 200 bo mu bwoko bw'aba Amhara i Mai Kadra mu kwezi kwa cumi na rimwe mu mwaka uheze. Ubwicanyi bwo kwihora ico gihe bwarakozwe n'abo mu bwoko bw'aba Tigray muri ico gisagara nyene. Igisirikare ca Eritrea caragiye muri iyo ntambara kigwana ku ruhande rw'abasirikare ba reta ya Ethiopia. Abasirikare ba Eritrea barishe abasivile barenga ijana i Aksum hagati mu ntara ya Tigray mu mpera z'ukwezi kwa cumi na rimwe mu 2020, nk'uko bivugwa n'ico cegeranyo. Kigira kiti:"Hashobora kuba harakozwe ivyaha vyo mu ntambara kuko hari ivyemezo ntahinyuzwa ko abantu batari bafise uruhara muri iyo ntambara bishwe n'izo mpande zose zihanganye." Kiravuga kandi ku bantu basambanijwe ku nguvu harimwo n'imigwi y'abagizi ba nabi bakora ivyo vyaha ku mpande zose ku bagore , abagabo, abakobwa n'abahungu. Hamwe, umwigeme w'imyaka 19 yarapfunzwe yongera arasambanywa ku nguvu urutitsa amezi atatu yose. Haravugwa n'umugore agendana ubumuga yasambanijwe  ku nguvu. Ico cegeranyo kivuga ko ugusambanya ku nguvu vyakoreshejwe "mu kumaramaza no kwaka ubuntu ababikorewe". Abagize ico cegeranyo batera akamo reta ya Ethiopia gukoresha "amatohoza n'inzego zigenga kandi ata ho zegamiye kuri ivyo bivugwa vy'ubwicanyi hamwe no guhana ababigizemwo uruhara". Umushikiranganji wa mbere Abiy yavuze ko yategetse igitero ca gisirikare mu kwezi kwa cumi na rmwe guheze mu kwishura ku bitero vyari vyagizwe ku nyubakwa z'abasirikare ba reta babayo. Ibintu vyagiye kwunyuka inyuma y'amezi yo guterana amajambo hagati ya reta ya Abiy n'abategetsi ba TPLF, umugambwe ukomeye wo muri Tigray. Mu nyuma abategetsi bavuze ko TPLF ari umugwi witwaza iterabwoba, baniyamiriza ibiganiro vy'amahoro ivyo ari vyo vyose vyoza bibahuza. Reta ya Addis Abebas yasubiye kugira ibindi bitero mu ndwi ziheze, harimwo gukoresha indege, ariko yarananiwe guhagarika abo bagwanyi baguma bigarurira utundi turere.

headline: Sri Lanka: Imyiyerekano yatumye Rajapaksa atanga imihoho
text: Imyiyerekano yatanguriye aho umushikiranganji wa mbere avukana na Perezida aba. Aho yakwira igihugu, inguvu zigakoreshwa, we yahavuye atanga imihoho. Mu mashusho ya video, uko vyatanguye.

headline: Abakobwa batwaye inda muri Tanzania bemerewe gusubira mw'ishure
text: Abigeme bo muri Tanzania basubiye mu mashure n'abana babo inyuma y'aho habonekeye itegeko rishasha risubirira iryahahora ribuza abakobwa batwaye inda kubandanya kwiga. Esnath Gideon yabwiye BBC igisata c'igiswahili ko adafise uwumufatira umwana hanyuma abigisha baramwumvira ikigongwe baramureka arinjira mw'ishure n'umwana wiwe w'amezi ane. Uwo mukobwa w'imyaka 19 yari yarataye icizere co kurangiza amashure igihe yatwara inda ari mu mwaka wa kane w'amashure yisumbuye. Ubu aranezerewe ko reta yarekuriye abo bavyeyi bakiri bato gusubira mu mashure, ubu akaba ashaka kwiga n'umwete kugira abe umushingwamanza. Yavuze ati: "N'umwana mw'ishure, siniga neza ariko kenshi ndashobora gukurikirana neza. Ikibazo n'iyi umwana yiyononye, nkakenera kumuhindurira kuko ata kibanza kihari mw'ishure co kumuhinduriramwo." Gedeon abana na nakuru adandaza isambusa kw'isoko, akaba anezerezwa n'uko umwuzukuru wiwe yasubiye kw'ishure. Nakuru yari yashavujwe n'uko Gedeon yatwaye inda kuko yategerezwa guca aheba ishure. Uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu ca Tanzania John Magufuli yari yarabujije abakobwa bafise inda  n'abavyaye kubandanya kwiga, ariko prezida ahari ubu Samia Suluhu yarahinduye iryo tegeko. Abakowa bafise imbanyi barenga 1500 barirukanywe mw'ishure mu karere ka Mbeya. Abashika 240 muri bo baragarutse kwiga, hakaba harashizweho umugambi wihariye w'ivyigwa kugira bashobore kubimara mu mwanya muto.

headline: UK na US vyagiriza Iran gukora igitero ku bwato bw'igitoro cahitanye babiri
text: Ubwongereza na Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika bibona ko Irani ari yo yakoze igitero ku bwato butwara igitoro kigahitana abantu babiri, bibaka birahira bikarengwa ko bitegerezwa kwihora. Vyagiriza iki gihugu ko cahonyanze amategeko mpuzamakungu. Ubwato MV Mercer Street bwegukira Israel bwaratewe ku wa kane bugeze hafi y'umweha wa Oman. Abantu babiri, umwe ava mu Bwongereza uwundi akomoka muri Romania, nibo baguye muri iki gitero. Amatangazo y'ibi bihugu bibiri asohotse inyuma y'aho umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Israel Naftali Bennett avugiye ko hari "ivyemezo" ko umwansi wayo rutura, Iran, ari yo yakoze iki gitero. Umushikiranganji Bennett agabisha ati "turazi ingene turungika ubutumwa muri Irani mu buryo bwacu", mu gihe Tehran yoyo yiyamiriza ivyo yise "ibirego bitagira mvura". Ico gitero kuri MV Mercer Street gisa n'icerekana ko ibintu biriko birarenge inkombe mu ntambara "itaja ahabona" hagati ya Israel na Irani. Haciye amezi haba ibitero bitari bike ku mato ya Israel na Irani, mu biboneka ko ari "ijisho ku rindi iryinyo ku rindi", n'aho bidakunze kugwamwo abantu. Irani kandi iragiriza Israel ko ibangamiye ibigo vyayo vyo guhingura ubutare bw'ubumara n'abahinga bayo. Mw'itangazo ry'ejo ku wa Mungu, umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire w'Ubwongereza Dominic Raab yavuze ko Londres yemeza ko Irani yakoresheje imwe muri za ndege zitagira abadereva, zizwi nka drones, mu gutera ubwato MV Mercer Street. Raab avuga ko ari "ihonyanga ry'amategeko mpuzamakungu, ryeruye, ryateguwe kandi ryakozwe n'ibigirankana". Yongerako ati: "Iran itegerezwa guhagarika ibitero nk'ibi, kandi amato ategerezwa kugira uburenganzira bwo gukora ingendo ata nzitizi". Umunyamabanga wa reta wa Amerika ajejwe imigenderanire Antony Blinken avuga ko Washington yizeye neza ko "Irani ari yo yakoze ibi", kandi ko "inyishu nyayo" itegerezwa gukurikira. Umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Israel avuga ko yiteze ko amakungu ategerezwa kwereka neza Irani ko yakoze icaha gikomeye. Mu nyishu yatanze, Iran nta na kimwe yemera ko yakoze. Umuvugizi w'ubushikiranganji bwayo bujejwe imigenderanire, Saeed Khatibzadeh, yabwiye abanyamakuru ko "ubutegetsi bwa Siyoni (Israel) buteje umutekano muke, iterabwoba n'akaguma". Avuga ko Israel "itegerezwa guhagarika ibirego bitagira mvura", anagabisha ati: "Uwuzobiba umuyaga azosoroma igihuhusi". Iki gitero kibaye mu gihe hari ibiganiro bicumbagira hagati ya Irani n'ibihugu vya rutura i Vienne/Vienna (umugwa mukuru wa Autriche/Austria) mu ntumbero yo kunagura ya masezerano yo mu 2015 yerekeye guhagarika umugambi wa Irani wo guhingura ubutare bw'ubumara. Ibihugu vyo mu burengero bw'isi vyikeka ko Irani ishobora kuba iriko irahingura ibirwanisho ruhonyanganda vy'ubumara ibanje guhonyanga amasezerano - ivyo Irani yiyamiriza yivuye inyuma.

headline: Intambara ya Ukraine na Africa: Ingaruka ku bitoro, abanyeshure n'umukate
text: Intambara muri Ukraine ishobora kugira ingaruka zikomeye ku bihugu bimwe bimwe vyo muri Afrika, igahungabanya ubutunzi bwavyo, ibindi ikabituma kwerekana  aho bihagaze muri uko kudacana uwaka hagati y'Uburusiya n'ibihugu vya Buraya na Amerika. Ikinyamakuru co muri Afrika y'Epfo Daily Maverick canditse  kiti intambnara y'i Buraya n'aho iri kuri "ingaruka zayo zizokora kuri Afrika y'Epfo n'ahandi  kw'isi". Kibandanya kiti : "N'igihe misire za mbere zitari bwaraswe,  iyi ntambara yatwaye vyinshi: yatumye amafaranga aharurwa muri za miriyaridi z'ama dorari  aja mu vyo gusubira kurondera ibigwanisho aho yofashije kurwanya ubukene, ibiza vy'indwara, amashure, kurwanya ubusumbane hamwe n'ihindagurika ry'ibihe muri uwu mwaka utoroshe". Afrika y'Epfo - igihugu ca mbere giteye imbere muri Afrika - yasavye ko ingabo z'Uburusiya ziva muri Ukraine buno nyene, ivuga ko amatati atorerwa inyishu mu nzira y'amahoro. Inyifato ya Afrika y'Epfo ni incamugongo ku Burusiya bubona ico gihugu nk'incuti yaco ikomeye muri Afrika. Ivyo bihugu vyompi bifitaniye imigenderanire y'ubutunzi ikomeye cane, vyompi biri muri Brics - umugwi w'ibihugu biriko biraduga mu butunzi kw'isi. Afrika y'Epfo ifise imitahe mu Burusiya ishika ku mafaranga angana na miriyaridi 5 z'ama dorari, mu gihe Uburusiya nabwo imitahe yabwo muri Afrika y'Epfo ishika kuri miriyaridi 1.5 z'ama dorari. Kenya - igihugu ca mbere gitunze mu karere ka Afrika y'ubuseruko, kikaba no mu nama y'umutekano ya ONU mu mugwi w'bihugu bijayo mu buryo butamaho- nayo yarenze aho mu kwiyamiriza Uburusiya. Mw'ijambo rikarishe yashikirije, uwuhagarariye Kenya muri ONU, Martin Kikani, yavuze ati: "Ubutavogerwa bw'igihugu ca Ukraine bwatewe. Amazezerano ya ONU  aguma ahungabanywa no guhonyangwa na ntaryo n'ibihugu vy'inguvu". Ghana na Gabon - ibindi bihugu bibiri navyo biri mu nama y'umutekano ya  ONU, navyo  nyene vyiyamirije Uburusiya. Nta gihugu ca Afrika kirashigikira igitero c'Uburusiya  muri Ukraine, naho na Mali canke Centrafrique, aho ingabo z'Uburusiya ziriko zirafasha ama reta y'ivyo bihugu kugwanya  imigwi y'intagondwa z'aba Islam. Ariko mu kimemenyetso c'uko  intwaro z'umukazo zizoshigikira Uburusiya- umutegetsi wa gisirikare wa Sudan, Gen   Mohamed Hamdan "Hemeti" Dagolo yashitse i Moscou ku munsi nyene intambara muri Ukraine itangura. Urugendo rwiwe rwari urwo  gukomeza  ugufashanya n'Uburusiya mu gihe abo bigaruriye ubutegetsi muri Sudan ubu bahariwe ivomo n'ibihugu vya Buraya kubera ugusubiza inyuma inzira yo kugana intwaro ya demokrasi  inyuma y'itembagazwa rya Omar al-Bashir yari amaze imyaka myinshi ku butegetsi muri ico gihugu. Ibiciro vy'ibitoro vyaciye biduga birenza ama dorari 100 akagunguru, igiciro ca mbere kiri hejuru ubwa mbere kuva mu 2014. Ibihugu vyimbura ibitoro muri Afrika nka Angola na Nigeria bishobora kuhatorera akajisho mu kwinjiza amafaranga menshi,  ariko ibiciro vyo gutwara abantu n'ibintu bishobira kuzoduga cane ku mugabane wose.Ivyo buzogira ingaruka ku biciro vy'ibindi vya nkenerwa hafi vyose. Ariko umukuru w'abandika ikinyamakuru Africa Confidential gishingiye mu Bwongereza, Patrick Smith, avuga ko intambara izozana amahirwe menshi ku bihugu vyimbura ibitoro na gaz. "Ibihugu vya Buraya bitegerezwa kwihuta mu kurondera igisubirira gaz y'Uburusiya, kandi hamwe mu hashoka ko iva bitagoranye mi muri Afrika. "Ni akaryo ku bihugu vyo muri Afrika ko gufatira aho, maze birondere amasoko mashasha, vyihuta". Ikibazo gikomeye  cane kuruta ibindi gishobora guhanga Afrika ni iduga rishoboka ry'ibiciro vy'umukate, mu gihe Uburusiya na Ukraine  vyavamwo 30% y'ingano zigurishwa kw'isi. Smith avuga ati: "Igiciro c'umukate caragize uruhara rukomeye mu bibazo vya poritike, kiba n'imbarutso y'iciswe Arab Spring/Printemps Arabe (imigumuko yo gusaba ko ibintu bihinduka mu Bihugu vy'Abarabu  mu buraruko bwa Afrika). Kenya nayo ifise ihagaritswe umutima n'ingaruka z'iyo ntambara- hamwe n'ibihano vy'ubutunzi ku Burusiya -bishobora kugira ku cayi cayo gifise ikibanza gikomeye mu butunzi bwayo. Uburisiya buri mu bihugu bitanu vya mbere bigura cane icayi ca Kenya , bigatuma Kenya yinjiza amafaranga y'agaciro. "Icayi ubundi gishirwa mu mugwi w'ivyo kurya gutyo ku bisanzwe nticategerezwa gukorwako n'ibihano  ku rudandazwa" nk'uko bivugwa na  Edward Mudibo, umuyobozi mukuru w'ishirahamwe ry'abacuruza icayi muri Afrika y'ubuseruko ( East Africa Tea Traders Association, EATTA). Ariko, bamwe mu bagwizatunga bashobora kutarondera kwigerezako mu gihe Uburusiya bwovanwa mu buryo mpuzamakungu bwo kuriha. Kubera amashure yaho azimbutse, kuva no mu gihe c'aba Soviet, Ukraine  camye ari igihugu abanya-Afrika benshi baja kwigamwo muri kaminuza, na cane cane mu gisata c'ubuganga. Hari n'abandi banya-Afrika baba kandi bakora muri Ukraine. Igihugu ca Ghana cahaye inama abanyeshure baco biga muri Ukraine kurondera aho bikinga mu mazu babamwo canke mu bibanza reta yagenye vyo kwikingamwo kuva Uburusiya buteye Ukraine. Abantu barenga 1.000 baturuka muri Ghana bari mu mashure muri Ukraine canke bakorayo, nk'uko ubwo bushikiranganji bubivuga, bukabandanya buvuga ko butewe impungenge nyinshi n'umutekano wabo. Ariko ishirahamwe ry'abanyeshure muri Ghana rishaka ko ico gihugu kigira intambwe irenze aho yo gutahukana abanyeshure b'abanya-Ghana kibakure mu bice birimwo intambara gushika umutekano uhagarutse. Itangazo ry'ishirahamwe ry'abanyeshure muri Ghana ryavuze mw'itangazo riti: "Uko babikoze mu gutahukana abanyehure mu bihe bikomeye cane vya Covid n'ubu vyokora". Umunya-Nigeria aba muri Ukraine, Olutobi Fatonade, yabwiye BBC ko benshi mu bantu azi bariko barategekanya ingene bova nuri ico gihugu kubera intambara n'Uburusiya. Yavuze ko nawe nyene afise mushikiwe asanzwe ari umwenegihugu wo mu Bwongereza, none ko ategekanya kujayo "gushika ibintu bicureshe." Fatonade yahejeje kaminuza mu 2017 mu gisata c'ubuganga. Ubu yatunganya umuziki ku murwa mukuru bwa Ukraine, Kyiv. Yabwiye ikiganiro ca BBC Focus on Africa ati: "Abantu benshi mubo nzi bariko baragerageza gusubira muri Nigeria ariko hari n'abandi batagira iyo baja". Fatonade avuga yamara ko abantu bizigiye ko ibintu bitazokwunyuka gusumba. Reta ya Nigeria yamenyesheje ko yiteguriye gutahana abenegihugu bayo bifuza kuva muri Ukraine hamwe ibibuga vy'indege vyotangura gukora muri ico gihugu.

headline: ACAT risaba ko Rukuki yokingirwa niyarekurwa
text: Ishirahamwe ry'Abakristu rirwanya ikubagurwa mu Burundi, ACAT, risaba ko uwuharanira agateka ka muntu Germain Rukuki, yokingirwa niyarakurwa. Ku wambere sentare gasambura-manza ya Ntahangwa yafashe icemezo co kugabanya cane igihano c'igifungo cahawe Bwana Rukuki, igikura ku myaka 32 kija ku mwaka umwe. Germain Rukuki yatawe muri yombi mu mwaka w'2017, nk'uko itegeko ribivuga, iyo ngingo ya sentare ikaba isigura yuko yategerezwa guca arekurwa. Ishirahamwe ry'Abakristu rirwanya ikubagurwa mu Burundi, ACAT, ari naryo Germain Rukuki yakorera, ryasohoye itangazo risaba leta y'u Burundi kumucungerera umutekano niyava mw'ibohero. Prudent Nsengiyumva yavuganye n'umuyobozi wa ACAT, Armel Niyongere, atangura amubaza impamvu gushika ubu Bwana Rukuki atararekurwa.

headline: Burundi: OLUCOME isaba Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye ‘gufatira akarorero kuri Tanzania’
text: OLUCOME, ishirahamwe ritegamiye kuri reta rigamije kurwanya igiturire n'imungwa ry'ubukungu ryongeye kwandikira ikete Prezida Evariste Ndayishimiye rimusaba gutunganya ibibazo ribona, muri izo ngingo hakaba harimwo n'izerekeye ikiza karanda Covid. Iri shirahamwe rirashima ibikorwa bimwe bimwe Prezida Ndayishimiye amaze kurangura mu kuvugurura ibintu mu Burundi no mu migenderanire n'amakungu. Gusa umukuru w'iri shirahamwe yabwiye BBC ko "ushize ku munzani biboneka ko amajambo ari menshi cane gusumba ibikorwa", n'ubwo ngo bafise ivyizigiro kuri Prezida Ndayishimiye kuko wewe atari 'corrompue' (corrupt). Mu kwezi guheze, Perezida Ndayishimiye yumvikanye avuga ko yabonye "ingene barwanya igiturire", yagize ati: "urabareka bakagihana mugabo ntihagire ico kimara". Mw'ikete ry'iri shirahamwe rimusaba kwubahiriza amategeko ahari abwiriza abakozi bakuru bakuru ba reta kumenyekanisha itunga ryabo kuko "ari ishingiro ry'umuco n'intwaro ibereye mu buzima bw'igihugu". Si irya mbere OLUCOME ineguye ko aya mategeko atubahirizwa kuko hariho bamwe bamwe muri reta bafise itunga babonye mu nzira mbi batobasha gusigura inkomoko, eka umwaka uheze ryabona ko 'Ndayishimiye yasumbijwe inguvu n'abasuma'. OLUCOME yongeye gusaba Ndayishimiye gukurikirana cane igiturire no kubesha bigamije kwiba bivugwa mw'itangwa ry'amasoko ya reta. Imusaba kandi gufata ingingo zo guhagarika ubucuruzi bw'ubutare 'bw'amaraso', no gukurikirana kugirango ubwimburwa bwinjirize amahera reta kuko hinjira make kandi himburwa ubutare bwinshi. Iri shirahamwe risaba Prezida Ndayishimiye kwemera gukorana n'amashirahamwe yo kurwanya igiturire ategukira reta na mpuzamakungu mu bugenzuzi kw'ikoreshwa y'itunga ry'igihugu. Mu majwi yahererekanijwe ku mbuga hwaniro mu mpera z'ukwezi guheze, Prezida Evariste Ndayishimiye yumvikanye avuga ko yahagurukiye kurwanya igitutire mu Burundi. Agira ati: "Nasanze hariho abahinga muri ubu Burundi! Iyumvire nk'abantu barementanya isoko, ati 'wewe mfournisa (fournisser) ibi, akabikuzanira [kandi] atabizanye, mukagira PV de reception mugasinya, ko vyaje kandi atavyo, mugafata facture mukayikora neza, mukaja kwa ministre wa finance ngo riha uyu muntu yarakoze ibi. Hariho abantu bazi gutekinika!". Ndayishimiye avuga ko umunsi yafashe abo bakoze ivyo bibajije uko yabimenye, bibaza uwabimubwiye. Ati: "Mushaka rero izo ngeso nimuzihebe! "Nagira nsabe abenegihugu, nimumfashe gucunga mwe mufise amaso menshi." Yongeraho ati: "None Uburundi turira ngo burakenye kubera iki? Harya mwiyumvira rirya deni mwumva ngo reta ifise muraziko 80%, ari amahera yagiye mu mifuka y'abantu!? Muga ni ideni ry'Abarundi bose." Reta y'Uburundi mu kwezi kw'indwi yemeye kwakira imfashanyo y'incanco za Covid-19 ariko ivuga ko itazohimiriza abanyagihugu kwicandagisha. OLUCOME yoyo ibibona ukundi. Iri shirahamwe rivuga ko ryamenye ko reta iheruka gusaba ideni rya miliyoni $78 yo kurwanya ikiza karanda ca Covid-19, risaba reta guhindura ingingo ku ncanco no ku ngamba zo kwirinda ico ciza. Mw'ikete yaryo, risaba reta gufatira akarorero kuya Tanzania igahimiriza abanyagihugu kwicandagisha no kubategeka kwambara 'mask' ahahurira abantu benshi n'izindi ngingo zo kwirinda. Ibaruwa yabo igira iti: "Izo ngingo zikurikijwe, bizofasha kuvyura ubukungu no guha umwidegemvyo Abarundi ngo bakore ingendo mu bihugu vy'amahanga." OLUCOME isaba kandi ko iryo deni reta yafashe ryocungwa mu muco, "ikirinda ivyabaye ku mahera yo kurwanya SIDA, aho abakozi ba reta bashinga amashirahamwe yo kurya ayo mahera nabo abo agenewe [abarwayi ba SIDA] ntibabone inyungu n'imwe." Iri shirahamwe risaba kandi; gushira ku nyabwonko (informatiser) ibikorwa vya reta mu rwego rwo kurwanya igiturire, gushiraho itegeko rivuga ba nyene kompanyi zifise amasoko ya reta mu kurwanya ububeshi bwo kuzandikako abatari benezo, eka no gushinga sentare nkuru. Gabriel Rupfiri arongoye OLUCOME yabwiye BBC ko kenshi bandikiye amakete Prezida Ndayishimiye ariko ubu ari ubwa mbere bamwandikiye urwandiko rw'impapuro 11 ruvuga ku ngingo nyinshi. Ati: "Mu vyo twagiye turamwandikira, nko mu bijanye n'ubutare, twarabonye y'uko yashoboye gufata ingingo zitari nke, tukibaza neza ko kwishura atari ukuturungikira urwete, ahubwo cane cane ari ukubona ko ivyo twavuze vyashizwe mu ngiro." Rufyiri avuga ko uru rwete ari "imfunyapfunyo y'ibintu bitari bike tumaze kumurungirukingira", bipfuza kandi bizigiye ko yokorako. Ati: "Umukuru w'igihugu ahari uyu munsi ni umuntu atari 'corrompue' kuko iyo umuntu ameze atyo biragora cane ko yokwiyumvira ineza y'abandi akayishyira imbere. "Mu majambo aguma ashikiriza, tubona ko ikibazo kijanye n'intwaro ibereye, kubaho neza kw'abantu, biri mu mwitwarariko wiwe, ico naco kiduha ikizigiro. "Hasigaye intambwe igira kabiri yo kuva mu majambo cane umuntu akaja mu bikorwa, ubu umuntu ashize ku munzani biboneka ko amajambo ari menshi cane gusumba ibikorwa mugabo biboneka ko ari ku ntango nziza."

headline: DR Congo-Kishishe: ‘Monusco ni baze berekane aho abo bantu bahambwe’-M23
text: Umuhari w’inyeshamba M23  urahakana ibiri mw’igendereza rya MONUSCO riwagiriza kwica abasivire barenga  130 mu karere ka Rutshuru mu ntara ya Kivu ya Ruguru mu buseruko bwa Repubulika ya Demokarasi ya Congo. Mw’itangazo, M23 ivuga ko iri gendereza rihengamye kubera ko ritakorewe ahabereye ubwicanyi. Ku wa kane , ubutumwa bwa ONU bwo kubungabunga amahoro muri Congo buzwi nka Monusco bwasohoye icegeranyo c’intangamarara c’igendereza rivugwa ko ryakorewe hafi y’uduce twa Kishishe na Bambo muri Rutshuru, rikerekana ko abasivire bagera kw’131 bishwe muri utwo turere ikoresheje  amasasu n’ibirwanisho kama. Reta ya Congo yo yavuze ko hishwe abantu barenga 270. Monusco ivuga ko ivyo bigwati bibiri vyahohotewe n’abarwanyi ba  M23 mu gitero co kwihora mu gitero c’iyindi mirwi y’inyeshamba. Munyarugerero Canisius ni umuvugizi wa M23, yavuganye na Prudent Nsengiyumva, umviriza uko asigura igituma igendereza rya Monusco ataryemera.

headline: Parezida Donald Trump wa Amerika yahagaritse ibiganiro vy’amahoro n’aba Talibani
text: Umukuru w'igihugu ca Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Donald , avuga ko yahagaritse ibiganiro vy'amahoro n'aba Talibani vyarondera kurangiza intambara ya Afganidstani imaze imyaka 18. Bwana Trump yatangaje ko yari yiteguye kubonana n'umukuru w'igihugu ca Afganistani Ashraf Ghani n'abategetsi bakuru b'aba Talibani uno munsi ku wa Mungu. Ariko yahagaritse uwo mubonano wari utegekanijwe mw'ibanga aho asanzwe ari mu karuhuko i Camp David, inyuma y'aho abarwanyi b'aba Talibani bamenyeshereje ko aribo bakoze igitero cahitanye umusirikare wa Amerika. Ivyo biganiro vyari bitegekanijwe hasigaye iminsi mikeya ngo hibukwe igitero co ku wa 11 z'ukwezi kw'icenda mu 2001 muri Amerika, gikozwe n'abarwanyi ba Al-Qaeda kigahitana abarenga 3000. Amerika yateye Afganistani yomora ubutegetsi bw'aba Talibani mu 2001 kubera bwagirizwa ko bwari bwahaye indaro uyo murwi wa al-Qaeda, igihe wariko utegura igitero co ku wa 11 z'ukw'icenda. Umwe mu bakora mu biro vy'aba Talibani i Doha mu gihugu ca Qatar yabwiye BBC ko uyo murwi wariko utegura "inama yihuta" kugira ngo bihweze iyo ngingo ya Bwana Trump. Ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu Ashraf Ghani - ashobora kuba yarabonanye na Bwana Trump  nk'uko bivugwa na Trump nyene - bivuga ko amahoro nyakuri ashoboka mu gihe aba Talibani bokwemera guhagarika intambara, bakaganira imbonankubone na leta ya Afganistani. Uwo mubonano amaso mu yandi n'aba Talibani wobaye ikintu gikomeye kibaye inyuma y'amezi atari make yari aheze abategetsi ba Amerika bari mu biganiro n'abategetsi b'aba Talibani i Doha, umugwa mukuru wa Qatar. Ivyo biganiro vyari vyashitse no ku masezerano y'intangamarara, yavuga ko Amerika yotegerejwe kuba yakuye abasirikare bayo muri Afuganistani bashika 5,400 mu mezi 20 ari imbere, aba Talibani nabo bakemera ko ico gihugu kitazosubira guha indaro imirwi y'iterabwoba. Gushika ubu, Amerika ifise abasirikare 14.000 bari muri Afuganistani. Muri kino gihe, aba Talibani biganzira igice kinini c'igihugu, bakaba bashimangira ko badashobora kuganira   ya Afuganistani gushika bumvikanye na Amerika ku kirangamisi cerekana ingene abasoda bayo bazotahukanwa. Ivyo biganiro kandi vyari bifise intumbero y'ugucira inzira ibiganiro hagati y'abanya Afuganistani ubwabo mu ntumbero y'ugutorera inyishu ya politike ibibazo bihari. Hagati aho, hari abanya Afuganistani batari bake bafise ubwoba ko amasezerano ayo ari yo yose ashobora gutuma uburenganzira baronse bigoranye bugenda buyonga, mbere n'aba Talibani bagasubira gufata ubutegetsi. Abasirikare mpuzamakungu  bashika 3500 baramaze gusiga ubuzima mu ntambara yo muri Afuganistani kuva mu mwaka wa 2001, abarenga 2300 bakaba ari abanyamerika.

headline: US : Abanyamadini rukristu bashigikiye Trump bagize uruhara mu migumuko yo kuri Capitol
text: Abanyamadini rukristu bashigikiye Perezida Donald Trump bari mu bantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bari mu myiyerekano i Washington DC mu ndwi iheze. Hari bamwe babona ko ukwitabira iyo migumuko vyerekana ingene amashengero Rukristu muri Amerika yacanyemwo. Imbere y'uko baja kwugariza ku ngoro ya Capitol ku wa gatatu w'indwi iheze, babanje gupfukama barasenga. Ibihumbi n'ibihumbi barashitse ku cicaro c'ubutegetsi bwa Amerika mu myiyerekano yiswe "Kiza Amerika" (Save America) yari yateguwe kugira ngo biyamirize ivyavuye mu matora aheruka. Perezida Trump yarashikirije ijambo isinzi ryari imbere ya Maison Blanche/White House, abasaba kuja kwugariza ibiro vy'inama nshingamateka na nkenguzamateka, aho abatowe bari bakorane kugira ngo bemeze intsinzi ya Joe Biden. Isinzi ry'abari muri iyo myiyerekano bari bitwaje amasanamu avuga ivy'Imana.  Amabendera yanditseko ngo "Yezu/Yesu 2020" (Jesus 2020) yarahungabana hampande y'amadarapo ya Trump hamwe n'aya Amerika. Iryo sinzi ryahavuye rija kwugariza ku nyubakwa y'amakoraniro y'inama nshingamateka na nkenguzamateka, ivyatumye haduka akajagari kuri Capitol. Hari n'imiburiburi umurwi umwe wari witwaje umusaraba ukozwe mu giti. Akandi karwi kavuza inzamba - umugirwa wa kiyahudi wahavuye wifatirwa n'amwe mu mashengero rukristu nk'ikimenyetso c'urugamba. Ahandi naho, hari abari bafise amabendera ariko ifi, ikimenyetso ca kera c'idini rya gikristu. Ku bakristu bamwe, kubona ibi bimenyetso biri kumwe n'amabendera yerekana ya mareta yari yishize hamwe ngo arwanire ubucakara (États Confédérés) vyabaye ibintu biteye agahinda. Ariko ku bandi, Trump ni rwo rukiza - umuntu yariko arwanira ngo " imico rukristu ntiyiganzirwe n'ab'isi", nk'uko Franklin Graham, umuhungu w'uwahoze ari umuvugabutumwa akomeye, Billy Graham, yabibwiye BBC. Umusi umwe imbere y'iyi migumuko, umurwi w'abakristu bashigikiye Trump bakoze urugendo bise "urugeno rw' i Yeriko" i Washington. Bikoreye imisaraba baririmba n'indirimbo zihayagiza Imana, bakoze imyiyerekano mu micungararo ya Capitol basubiramwo  inkuru yo muri Bibiliya ivuga igihe Abanyisirayeli bugarije umwansi  wa Yeriko. Amashusho bari bitwaje ntabwo yerekana amacakubiri ashingiye ku rukoba na politike gusa muri Amerika, yarerekanye ahubwo ko igihugu gihanzwe n'amacakubiri ashingiye ku madini. Mu matora ya 2020, nk'uko vyagenze mu 2016, vyabonetse ko bine vya bitanu vy'abavugabutumwa b'abazungu - bari bashigikiye uyu mukuru w'igihugu wo mu mugambwe w'aba Repubulika. Ariko ibi ni iigihushane ku bakristu b'Abirabure - imbere y'amatora, hafi ibice 90% vyabo bipfuza gutora uwariko ahiganwa kw'izina ry'umugambwe w'abaharanira Demokarasi (Democrat), Joe biden. Kuva abanyamadini b'abazungu babaye umurwi ufise inguvu za politike muri Amerika mu mpera z'imyaka ya 1970, bamye bakora amasekeza yo kurwanya ugukorora inda, bakarondera gukomeza amategeko atanga ubwisanzure mu vyo amadini, kandi bagahimiriza ugufata mu mugongo igihugu ca Isirayeli. Muri ibi bisata vyose, ubutegetsi bwa Trump bwarakoze birashimwa: Trump yaragabanije amafaranga ku mashirahamwe ashigikiye abakorora inda, agena abacamanza barenga 200 ku rwego rw'amareta hamwe na batatu ku rwego rw'igihugu bashigikiye ukubungabunga imico ya kera (Conservateurs), yongera yimurira i Yeruzalemu ibiro vy'ubuserukizi bwa Amerika muri Isirayeli abivanye i Tel Aviv  -  iki kikaba cari icipfuzo co kuva kera cane mu banyamadini bamwe bamwe b'abazungu. Baremera ko Trump afise utunenge. Mu majambo y'umwe mubanywanyi biwe  bakomeye arongoye urushengero rukomeye i Texas,  Robert Jeffress, umukuru w'igihugu "si umuntu w'umunyaruhimbi". Ati: "Ntasa n'umuntu yihebeye gusenga". Ariko, uretse utubazo kanaka two mu myiyamamazo, hari abahinga bamwe bavuga ko "Ukurwanira imico Rukristu" biri mu vyatumye abanyamadini bashigikira imyiyamamazo ya Trump. Bavuga ko Ubukristu bwabaye kimwe mu biranga umunyamerika: Kuba umunyamerika ni ukuba umukristu. Abashigikiye iyi ngendo bavuga ko Amerika igeze aho igeze kubera igendera ku mico rukristu, bakagabisha, bakoresheje amajambo ya Trump, ko abakeba muri politike "bariko bararwanya imico rukristu". Umuhinga mu vyo imibereho y'abantu yitwa Andrew Whitehead, mu mwihwezo yakoze ku banywanyi ba Trump, yanditse ati: "Gutora Trump ku banyamerika benshi, vyaboneste nk'uburyo bwo kurwanira iragi rukristu rya Amerika." Abahinga nka Whitehead na Philip Gorski, umwigisha mu bijanye n'imibereho kuri kaminuza ya Yale, bavuga ko, mu kiringo cose amaze ku butegetsi, Trump yihetse inyuma y'ivyiyumviro bishingiye ku mico rukristu mu kwama avuga ko Amerika iriko iribagira iragi Rukristu ryayo. Yariyemeje "kurwanira imico rukristu" mbere ku banywanyi biwe batari bake, icivugo ciwe co "Gusubira gukomeza Amerika" ( Make America Great Again) gishobora kuba citiranwa na "Gusubiza Amerika mu bukristu" ( Make America Christian Again). Mu myiyerekano yabereye muri Ohio umwaka uheze, yaragabishije ko ubutegetsi bwa Biden bushobora gusigura buti "nta dini, nta kintu na kimwe". Ati: "Kurwanya Bibliya, kurwanya Imana. Arwanya imana...". Ariko, amadini Rukristu yarigabuye. Umwepiskopi arongoye urushengero Episcopal Church of the US, Nyen'icubahiro Michael Curry, yavuze ko imigumuko iheruka yari iyo "kurondera gutembagaza ubutegetsi" kandi ko vyari ibintu "biteye ubwoca cane". Umwepiskopi wa Washington ,Nyen'icubahiro Mariann Budde, avuga ko ibimenyetso vy'idini vyerekanywe "ari isakirirego ryo ku rwego rwo hejuru, uburyo bwo gutukisha Ubukristu". Mu ndwi iza, Biden azokwimikwa nk'umukuru w'igihugu w'umukatolika agize kabiri mu mateka ya Reta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika  kandi abigendera. Mu buryo bwinshi, yaboneka ko ari we mukandida nyawe ku bakristu benshi gusumba Trump. Yama yitabira imisa n'imiburiburi rimwe mu ndwi, kandi n'amajambo yiwe arimwo amajambo ya Bibliya, kandi agakora uko ashoboye kwose asigura uruhara ukwemera gufise muri politike yiwe. Hagati aho, abakristu benshi, harimwo n'abakatolika bagenzi we, ntibashaka kumubona nk'umukristu "nyawe" kubera ashigikiye uburenganzira bwo gukorora inda hamwe n'ubwo bahuza ibitsina babisangiye. Mw'ijambo ry'itsinzi yiwe inyuma yamatora yo mu kw'icumi na rimwe, Joe Biden yasubiyemwo igitabo c'Umubwiriza muri Bibliya aho yavuze ko cari "igihe co gukiza" Amerika. None ubwo Biden arashobora kwemeza Abakristu bashigikiye Trump ko - mu majambo yiwe - "azogarukana umutimamana wa Amerika"? Mu majambo yashikirijwe n'abarongoye amadini inyuma y'imigumuko iheruka mu ndwi iheze, nta cemezo kinini kihari cerekana ko bariko bava inyuma ya Trump.

headline: Intambara ya Ukraine: IAEA ivuga ko uraganda rw'inguvu za  nucléaire rwa Zaporizhzhia atawurwitayeho
text: Umukuru w'ishami rya Onu rigenzura inguvu za nucléaire, avuga ko uruganda runini rw'inguvu za nucléaire  rwigaruriwe n'Uburusiya inyuma y'ibitero bwagize muri Ukraine, " ata n'umwe arwitayeho". Rafael Grossi yasubiwemwo n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru rya Associated Press avuga ko uruganda rwa Zaporizhzhia rukeneye kugenzurwa no gukorwa. Yavuze ati:"Ufise urutonde rw'ibintu bitategerezwa na rimwe gushika ku ruganda urwo ari rwo rwose rw'ubumara." Urwo ruganda rwa mbere runini rw'inguvu za nucléaire i Buraya rwegereye biteye ubwoba ahabera imigwano. Mu ntango y'iyi ndwi, umunyamabanga wa reta wa Amerika ajejwe imigenderanire Antony Blinken yagirije Uburusiya  gukoresha urwo ruganda, bwigaruriye mu kwezi kwa batatu, nk'ikirindiro ca gisirikare bukoresha mu kugira ibitero ku ngabo za Ukraine. Abategetsi ba Ukraine bavuze ko abarusiya bashize ingabo n'ibikoresho vya gisirikare kuri urwo ruganda ruri ku ruzi Dnipro mu bumanuko bwa Ukraine. Ariko umutegetsi yashizweho n'Uburusiya muri ako karere yabwiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru rya Reuters ko abasirikare ba Ukraine bakoresha ibigwanisho bahawe n'abanye Buraya mu kugira ibitero kuri urwo ruganda. Yevgeny Balitsky yavuze ko abategetsi biteguye kwereka urwego Grossi arongoye rugenzura inguvu za nucleaire kw'isi (IAEA), uko abarusiya bacungereye urwo ruganda mu gihe abanye Ukraine bagirizwa kurugirako ibitero. Igihe Uburusiya bwafata urwo ruganda, iterwa ry'ibimbombe kuri izo nyubakwa  ryatumye haba ukunebagurwa kw'isi yose. Urwo ruganda ruracakora, abakoze b'abanye Ukraine bari ku kazi ariko bagenzurwa n'Uburusiya. Mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru ku cicaro ca Onu i New York, Grossi yagize ati:"Ibintu vyifashe nabi cane. Ingingo iyo ari yo yose yerekeye gukingira uruganda rwa nucleaire yarahonyanzwe mu nzira iyi canke iriya, ntidushobora kwemera ko ivyo bibandanya." Uwo muyobozi wa IAEA avuga ko ariko aragerageza kwegeranya abantu bogira urugendo vuba hashoboka kuri urwo ruganda ariko ko ivyo bikeneye uruhusha rw'impande zose, Ukraine n'Uburusiya, hamwe na Onu, ufatiye ku ngorane zo kugendera akarere kaberamwo intambara.

headline: Iran yanse ibisabwa na Biden ku bijanye n'amasezerano yo guhingura ubutare bw'ubumara
text: Irani ntishobora kwemera ibisabwa na reta nshasha ya Biden ku bijanye n'amasezerano yayo yo guhingura ubutare bw'ubumara, kandi Amerika itegerezwa kubanza gusubira mu masezerano yo mu 2015 imbere y'uko twiyumvira ibijanye n'ibiganiro, ibi ni ibivugwa n'umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire wa Irani. Javad Zarif avuga ko Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ifise "ivyo yiyemeje yo nyene" itegerezwa kubanza gushira mu ngiro. Umukuru w'igihugu wa Amerika aherutse gutorwa, Joe Biden, yaramenyesheje ko azosubira muri ayo masezerano kandi akureho ibihano Irani yahafitwe mu gihe iki gihugu "cokwubahiriza aya masezerano". Ikiboneka ni uko buri ruhande rushaka ko urundi rubanza kwubahiriza aya masezerano ubwa mbere na mbere. Mu kwa gatanu 2018, Perezida Donald Trump yarivumbuye muri ano masezerano yateweko igikumu n'uwo yasubiriye, Barack Obama. Ubwo nyene, yaciye asubizaho ibihano vyafatiwe Irani mu bisata vy'igitoro n'ikigega vy'iki gihugu. Kuva ico gihe, Tehran (umugwa mukuru wa Irani) yaciye itangura guhingura ubutare bw'ubumara ku rugero runini gusumba urwo yari yemerewe muri ayo masezerano, ivyatumye amakungu agira amakenga ko ifise guca yikika mu kiza igahingura ibombe y'ubumara. Hagati aho, reta ya Irani yoyo ibandanya ishimangira ko umugambi w'uguhingura ubu butare bw'ubumara ari umugambi w'amahoro. Aya masezerano yari yumvikanyweko mu ntumbero yo guhagarika uwu mugambi wa Irani, maze nayo igatezurirwa ibihano. Ku wa kane, umushikiranganji Zarif yavugiye mu nama yari irongowe n'Ubutariyano ko, igihe yivumbura muri aya masezerano,  Amerika "yahonyanze bikomeye cane " icemezo cafahswe na ONU, avuga ko ubutegetsi bwa Trump ari "ubutegetsi bubi". Ati: "Amerika itegerezwa guhagarika, Amerika itegerezwa guhagarika ihonyangway'amategeko mpuzamakungu. Ibi ntibisaba ibiganiro ivyo ari vyo vyose". Zarif abandanya avuga ko Amerika "itari ku rugero rwo kugira ivyo ibanza gusaba". Joe Biden yiteze kurahirira kuba umukuru w'igihugu agira 46 wa Amerika ku wa 20 z'ukwa mbere, avuga ko azokwihutira gusubiza Amerika muri ayo masezerano, kandi akaraba ingene akuraho ibihano, ariko ko bizosaba ko Irani kubanza kwubahiriza ibiri muri ayo masezerano. Ku wa gatatu w'iyi ndwi, Inama nshingamateka ya Irani yaremeje integuro y'itegeko ryo guhagarika abagenduzi b'ishirahamwe ONU ku bigo vyayo bihingura ubutare bw'ubumara, maze hagatangura ibikorwa vyo kwongereza inguvu za uranium gushika ku rugero rwa 20% - urugero ruri hejuru cane ugereranije na 3.67% rwari rwumvikanyweko mu masezerano yo mu 2015  - mu gihe ibihano iki gihugu cafatiwe bitoba vyavanyweho mu kiringo c'amezi abiri. Uranium yongerejwe inguvu kurenga uru rugero rwa 20% ishobora gukoreshwa mu guhingura ibombe y'ubumara. Umukuru w'igihugu wa Irani Hassan Rouhani avuga ko yanse ishirwa mu ngiro ry'iri tegeko, mu gihe umutegetsi w'ikirenga, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, ari na we mutegetsi mukuru muri ico gihugu atarashikiriza aho ahagaze kuri iyi nteguro y'iri tegeko. Iri tegeko ryemejwe haciye iminsi mike wa muhinga mu bijanye n'ubutare bw'ubumara, Mohsen Fakhrizadeh, agandaguwe, mu gitero kidasanzwe cabereye kw'ibarabara hanze y'umugwa mukuru Tehran ku wa gatanu w'indwi iheze. Irani ivuga ko Israyeli hamwe n'umurwi utavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi uri mu buhungiro ari bo bakoze ico gitero bakoresheje ikirwanisho gikoreshwa na telecommande. Israyeli ntaco iravuga ku ruhara yagirizwa ko yagize muri ico gitero. Igihe Trump yivumbura muri aya masezerano, yavuga ko ashaka gutera igitsure Irani kugira ngo ije mu biganiro vyo gushiraho ayandi masezerano yohagarika burundu uwu mugambi wayo wo guhingura ubutare bw'ubumara, kandi igahagarika ibikorwa vyo guhingura ibirwanisho ruhonyanganda. Irani yaragararije mbere mu kw'indwi 2019 ihonyanga ingingo yayitegeka kutarenza ibice 3.76 % vya uranium, ibikorwa vyo kwongereza inguvu za uranium bikaba vyarabandanije ku rugero rwa 4.5 kuva ico gihe. Ivuga ko kuva mu kwa mbere itazigera isubira kwubahiriza ingingo n'imwe iri muri aya masezerano. Mu kwezi guheze, ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu rijejwe inguvu z'ubumara (IAEA)  ryavuze ko Irani ifise urugero rwa uranium rusumba incuro 12 urutegekanijwe muri ayo masezerano.

headline: DR Congo: Leta yarungitse gushaka amahoro muri Ituri abahoze barongoye inyeshamba
text: Leta ya Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo yarungitse abahoze barongoye imirwi yahoze irwana muri ico gihugu kugerageza kwumvisha imirwi iri mu mtambara mu burere baturukamwo guhagarika intambara. Intumwa zigizwe n'abahoze bafise uruhara mu ntambara zo muri kahise, harimwo mbere babiri bigeze gucirwa urubanza na ya sentare mpuzamakungu mpanavyaha y'i La Haye,. Aba barashitse mu ntara ya Ituri mu buseruko bushira uburaruko bwa Congo mu ntumbero yo kugerageza guhagarika intambara ziriko ziriha inkumbi muri ako karere. Muri bo harimwo Germain Katanga yaciriwe urubanza n'iyo sentare mu 2014 yagirizwa ihonyangwa ry'agateka ka zina muntu be n'ivyaha vyo mu ntambara igihe umurwi w'abarwanyi bo mu bwoko bw'aba Lendu yari arongoye watera ku mutumba umwe bakica abantu bagera ku 200. Uwundi ni Mathieu Ngudjolo, yaciriwe urubanza n'iyo sentare nyene yagirijwe ivyaha nk'ivyo muri ico gitero nyene ariko mu nyuma akaza kurekurwa. Muri iyo ntara ya Ituri, abantu bitwaje ibirwanisho baherutse kugandagura abantu 11 harimwo abasirikare n'abategetsi b'akarere mu mutego wagirijwe umurwi CODECO umaze igihe wagirizwa ubwicanyi butari buke. Adel Alingi Mokuba arongoye akarere ka Djugu, yasubiwemwo amajambo avuga ati: "Abapfuye ni 11, harimwo icegera c'umukuru w'akarere ajejwe umutunzi n'ikigega, abapolisi batatu hamwe n'abasirikare bane". Ituri ni imwe mu ntara zitari nke ziziziwe n'imirwi nkorabara y'inyeshamba mu buseruko bwa Congo, igihugu kingana n'uburerengo bw'umugabane wa Bulaya. Kuva mu kwa 12 kw'umwaka wa  2017, abantu barenga 1,000 bagizwe ahanini n'abasivire baramaze kwicwa mu ntara ya Ituri, muri bo 375 bakaba bishwe kuva mu kwa gatatu uno mwaka, nk'uko bitangazwa n'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU. Iryo shirahamwe riramaze kugabisha ko ibitero biriko biraba "bishobora gufatwa nk'ivyaha y'agahomerabunwa bikorerwa kiremwamuntu hamwe n'ivyaha vyo mu ntambara".

headline: ADF: Menya uyu murwi w'inyeshamba za Uganda ukorana na IS ukagirizwa ibitero vy'iterabwoba
text: Akarere k'Ubuseruko bwa Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo (RDC) kamaze igihe kirekire ari ikiririmbiro ry'imirwi y'inyeshamba zirwanya ubutegetsi bw'iki gihugu n'ubwo mu bihugu vy'u Rwanda, Uburundi na Uganda. Umwe muri iyi  mirwi izwi cane mu bikorwa vy'ubugome ikorera mu buseruko bwa Congo ni uyu murwi uva muri Uganda, Allied Democratic Forces (ADF). Uyu murwi ugendera ku vyiyumviro vya Islam washinzwe mu myaka ya 1990, ukaba wari uzwi mu ndyane zo hagati muri Uganda. Ariko rero umaze gushika muri Congo, waciye utangura ibikorwa vy'iterabwoba, aho ibitero vyawo vyinshi ukora bivugwa ko bikorwa kw'izina ry'umuhari wiyitirira Reta ya ki Islam, canke Islamic State/Etat Islamique (IS). Ku wa kabiri w'iyi ndwi, abihevyi barakoze igitero ku mugwa mukuru wa Uganda, Kampala, cahitanye abantu batandatu kinakomeretsa abandi barenga 30. IS yasohoye itangazo ku rubuga rwa Telegram, ryasohowe kandi n'ikinyamakuru cayo Amaq, aho ivuga ko abarwanyi bayo ari bo bakoze ico gitero. Abategetsi ba Uganda bari bamaze gutangaza ko umurwi wa Allied Democratic Forces (ADF), umurwi watangaje ko winjiye muri IS mu 2019, ari wo wakoze iki gitero. ADF yatanguye gute? ADF yashingiwe mu buraruko bwa Uganda n'abahoze ari ntwazangabo z'igisirikare c'uwahoze arongoye Uganda Idi  Amin, maze uca utanguza intambara yo kurwanya umukuru w'iki gihugu amaze igihe kirekire ku butegetsi, Yoweri Museveni, ivuga ko reta yiwe yakorera amabi atagira izina abanywanyi b'idini rya Islam. Uyu muhari umaze gutsindwa n'igisirikare ca Uganda mu 2001, waciye uhungira mu ntara ya Kivu y'Uburaruko muri Congo. Inyuma y'igihe kirekire yamaze ata bikorwa vyinshi ikora, ADF yasubiye kuvugwa cane mu 2014 aho watangura urukurikirane rw'ibitero ku banyagihugu basanzwe ba Congo. Mu 2015, niho Musa Seka Baluku  yashikira uburongozi bw'uyu muhari inyuma y'aho uwo yasubiriye Jamil Mukulu afatiwe. Bakulu avugwa ko yatagangaje ko yishize hamwe na IS mu 2016. Ariko umuhari IS wagiye gutangaza icese ko ukorera muri ako karere mu kwa kane 2019, aho wemanze ko ari wo wakoze ibitero ku birindiro vy'igisirikare hafi y'urubibe rwa Uganda. Mw'itangazo wasohoye, watangaje icitwa IS Central Africa Province  (Iscap), ni ukuvuga Intara ya IS yo muri Afrika yo hagati, ari nayo yagiye ivugwa gushika no muri Mozambike. N'aho hari ivyerekana ko IS na ADF zishize hamwe, IS ntirigera icisha mu kanwa ku mugaragaro uyu muhari muri poropagande yayo. Mukw'icenda 2020, Baluku yatangaje ko umuhari ADF utakibaho. Ati: "Ubu twebwe turi intara, intara ya Afrika yo hagati, umwe mu ntara nyinshi zigize Etat Islamique/Islamic State". Ibintu bimeze gute muri RD Congo? Nk'uko bivugwa n'ishirahamwe rijejwe impuzi kw'isi, UNHCR, kuva mu kwa mbere 2021, ADF iramaze kwica amajana n'amajana y'abanyagihugu b'inzirakarengane, abarenga 40.000 nabo mu karere ka Beni bateshwa izabo. Uyu murwi w'inyeshamba kandi ntugera umutwe ibirindiro vy'ingabo za reta n'iza ONU. Kuva IS imaze kwibonekeza muri RD Congo, ibitero vyagiye vyiyongera. Ibitero vya ISCAP bikunze kwibonekeza mu karere gakorerwamwo na ADF, Beni, ni mu ntara ya Kivu y'Uburaruko, ariko bikanashika no mu ntara ya Ituri ihana urubibe na Kivu y'Uburaruko. Ibitero vyinshi bikorwa ku makambi y'igisirikare, ariko vyinshi mu bitero vy'ubugome bikorwa ku banyagihugu b'abakirisu. Igitero kinini la ISCAP kivugwa ko ari icakozwe mu kw'icumi 2020 kw'ibohero ryo mu gisagara ca Beni, catumye abapfunzwe barenga 1000 batoroka. Indyane zirangwa mu buseruko bwa Congo rimwe na rimwe zikunze gutera imidugararo ishingiye ku madini, ariko kubona IS nayo ivyisutsemwo ibintu bishobora kwunyuka. Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo ni igihugu gifise abanywanyi benshi b'aba Katorika, kandi iri dini rifise ikibanza gihambaye muri ico gihugu. Aba Islam bababa ibice 10%. Abanywanyi b'idini rya Islam i Beni ntiberekwa uyu muhari ariko rero ibi  bifise ingaruka zavyo. Mu kwa gatanu, abategetsi babiri ba Islam bari bazwi cane ko banegura ADF barishwe i Beni. ADF kandi izwi ko ikora ibitero ku banywanyi ba Katorika. Mu kw'icumi 2012, yarafashe mpiri abasenyeri batatu ba Katorika mu karere ka Mbau. Mu nyigisho zayo, IS irifatira mu gahanga Abakristu ikanakora kw'itama igisirikare ca Congo ko cananiwe no kubakingira ibitero vyayo. Inyigisho za IS ADF iboneka ko idafise ibinyamakuru vyayo icishako amakuru yayo. Ariko IS yoyo ifise imbuga zayo ku buhinga bwa none. Vyinshi muri propagande za ISCAP bishingiye ku nyandiko zayo aho yemanga ko yakoze ibitero mbere ikanerekana n'amasanamu yavyo. Mu kwa gatatu, mu nzira yo kwerekana ko ifise inguvu, ISCAP yasohoye amasanamu yavugwa ko ari ayo abarwanyi bayo bazunguruka mu kigwati kimwe mu ntara ya Ituri inyuma y'igitero bakoze ku ngabo z'igihugu. Ariko gusa, amashusho nk'aha ntakunze kuboneka, ibi bikerekana ko IS koko itarashinga imizi muri RD Congo. Umutekano muke uterwa n'imirwi y'inyeshamba muri Congo utumwa ahanini n'uko ubutegetsi bujegajega kandi ingingo zifatwa n'igisirikare zikaba ata cizere zifitiwe. Uku niko IS igenda ikwirakwira nk'uko vyagenze muri Irq na Syria mu mwaka wa 2014, hamwe no muri iki gihe nyene muri Afrika y'Uburengero, aho yakwirakwiye mu karere kose ka Sahel ihereye mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko bwa Nigeria. ISCAP nayo irashobora kwiheka inyuma y'indyane igakwirakwira mu bihugu bibanyi.

headline: Tshisekedi - Kabila: Ibintu bitandatu vyofasha gutahura ikibazo ca politike ya DR Congo
text: Imbere y'uko inama nshingamateka ya Repubulika y'Intwaro rusangi ya Congo yemeza ko umukuru wayo abogozwa, hari haciye imisi hari icuka kibi hagati y'abanywanyi ba Perezida Félix Tshisekedi hamwe n'abo ku ruhande rw'uwo yasubiriye, Joseph Kabila. Kimwe mu vyerekana ko ibintu vyari vyabaye ndanse, ni igihe ku musi wa kabiri w'iyi ndwi haduka imishamirano ikomeye mu nama nshingamateka y'ico gihugu hagati y'abashingamateka bo mu mugambwe wa Kabila hamwe n'abo mu mugambwe wa PerezidaTshisekedi. Vyabaye ngombwa ko igiporisi kija kubanguranya abanywanyi ba Perezida Tshisekedi  hamwe n'aba Kabila. Abantu batatu barakomeretse mu gihe abari bashamiranye baterana ivyuma, bakonona ivyo bonona mu biro vy'inama nshingamateka. Abajejwe umutekano bakoresheje vya vyuka bikoroza amosozi kugira ngo birukane abari bugarije inyubakwa y'inama nshingamateka ku mugwa mukuru Kinshasa. Iyo migumuko yadutse inyuma y'aho Perezida Félix Tshisekedi, mw'ijambo yashikirije ku wa Mungu, atangarije ko  amasezerano hagati y'izi mpande zibiri zigize ubutegetsi, ni ukuvuga ihuriro CACH (Cap pour le Changement, rihuriyemwo na Félix Tshisekedi na Vital Kamerhe)  hamwe na FCC  (Front commun pour le Congo) y'uwahoze arongoye DR Congo, Joseph Kabila, ahagaze. Muri iryo jambo ryaciye ku mboneshakure y'igihugu, Perezida Tshisekedi yamenyesheje ko yari agiye gushiraho uwundi muyobozi yoshinga urundi runani rwotuma agira abamushigikiye benshi mu nama nshingamateka isanzwe yiganjemwo abari ku ruhande rwa Kabila. Yavuze ko yari yiteguriye gufuta inama nshingamateka bibaye ngombwa. Inama nshingamateka, iguye mu mporero y'ukutumvikana hagati y'abanywanyi ba Perezida Tshisekedi ku ruhande rumwe,  hamwe n'abandi ba Kabila ku rundi ruhande. Aba mbere bashaka ko umukuru w'inama nshingamateka Jeanine Mabunda n'abo bafatanije kuyirongora, babogozwa, ivyaraye bibaye, ibi navyo bikaba biha inzira abari ku ruhande rwa Perezida Tshisekedi kwiganzira iyi nama nshingamateka. None iyi mishamirano isigura iki? Ehe ibintu bitandatu vyogufasha gutahura iki cuka kibi kiri muri iki gihugu. Ubucuti hagati CACH (Cap pour le Changement, hagati ya Félix Tshisekedi na Vital Kamerhe)  hamwe na FCC  (Front Commun pour le Congo) y'uwahoze arongoye DR Congo, Joseph Kabila, burarangiye.  Inyuma y'amezi atari make y'icuka kibi hagati ya FCC-CACH, umukuru w'igihugu wa Congo yafashe ingingo yo gukuramwo akarenge. Ku wa 16 z'ukwezi kw'indwi uyu mwaka, igihe yari mu rugendo muri Congo Brazzaville, Perezida Félix Tshisekedi yari yamenyesheje ko yari agifise icizere ko uru runani ruri ku butegetsi rwari kubandanya neza n'aho hari ukutumvikana ku bijanye n'ingene igihugu kirongowe. Perezida Félix Tshisekedi yagize  ati: "Nobaremesha ko ivyo ari vyo vyose tutagiye gusambura urunani rwacu. Iki coco ni uku nyene". Hagati aho, uru runani rwari rwavutse mu buryo butari bwitezwe, rwagiye guhura n'ibibazo, aho izi mpande zibiri zaterana amajambo n'ibitutsi, mbere rimwe na rimwe hakaba ukurwana hagati y'abanywanyi n'abanyapolitike b'izi mpande zibiri zari zirugize. Ku wa Mungu uheze, Perezida Tshisekedi yatangaje ko umugambi wiwe wo kuzana impinduka mu gihugu wahuye n'inzitizi, kandi ko yashaka gushinga reta nshasha y'ubumwe canke n'aho agahamagaza ayandi matora. Joseph Kabila yamusubiriye, akaba afise inguvu ariko avuga make, hamwe n'abanywanyi biwe babandanya biganje mu nama nshingamateka no muri reta. Ku wa mbere w'iyi ndwi, Perezida Félix Tshisekedi yarakiriye mu biro iwe umushikiranganji wa mbere Sylvestre Ilunga Ilunkamba. Uwu mubonano wabo wa mbere kuva mu kw'icumi wamaze ikiringo c'isaha yose. Hagati aho, urangiye aba bategetsi babiri baranse kugira ico batangaje. Intumwa idasanzwe y'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU muri Congo, Leila Zerrougui, yaragabishije ko izi ndyane za politike zishobora kugira inkurikizi mbi cane ku buzima bw'igihugu. Nk'uko bivugwa n'umwigisha wo kw'ishure kaminuza Cardinal Malula akongera akaba n'umuhinga mu vya politike, Octave Nasena, aya mezi ya nyuma yaranzwe n'indyane zidahera hagati ya reta n'inama nshingamateka. Asigura ati: "Umukuru w'igihugu yarashikirije ivyo amaze kurangura kuva ashikirijwe ubutegetsi, we nyene akaba yarabonye ko yananiwe. Yavuze ko ivyo vyose ari ukubera ko urunani ruri ku butegetsi rutigeze rumufata mu mugongo kandi ko yahuye n'inzitizi nyinshi canke ko bamuteze imitego kugira ngo bamunanize mu bikorwa vyiwe". Yibutsa ati: "Ica nyuma giherutse ni uko inama nshingamateka yoba yaramubujije gutegura neza ibirori vyo kurahiza abagize Sentare ijejwe ibwirizwashingiro, cane cane umukuru w'inama nshingamateka, umukuru w'inama nkenguzamateka hame n'umushikiranganji wa mbere batitabiriye ivyo birori mbere bakamugarariza". Iki kintu caratumye ibintu biyangara hagati ya CACH na FCC. Igenwa ry'abacamanza batatu muri sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro ryarateye impari zikomeye muri urwo runani ruri ku butegetsi. Félix Tshisekedi yari abashigikiye, ariko uruhande rwa Kabila ruragangura kugira ngo rubandanye rwiganziye iyo Sentare, urwego rukomeye cane mu nteguro y'amatora yimirije mu 2023. Umukuru w'igihugu yarirengagije umushikiranganji wa mbere, maze agena abo bacamanza batatu. FCC yaramaze kugabisha ko itemera abagize iyi sentare kandi ko itunganywa ryayo riteye kubiri n'ibwirizwashingiro, ko rero batazigera bemera ingingo izofata. Iyi ngendo ibonwa nk'uburyo bwo kwerekana ko umukuru w'igihugu yashavuye, yamutumye aca atangura ibiganiro n'abandi banyapolitike, imwe mu ngingo nyamukuru zashitsweko kukaba ari ugusenyura uru runani  CACH/FCC. FCC,, ihuriro rya Joseph Kabila yahoze arongoye igihugu, ivuga ko yakiriye iyo ngingo ya Perezida Félix Tshisekedi  yo gusenyura uru runani, ariko ikiyamiriza ivyavuye mu biganiro vyose vyo kuva ku wa 2 gushika ku wa 25 z'ukwa cumi na rimwe guheze. Néhémie Mwilanya, umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa muri FCC avuga ati: "FCC ntirabwa n'ibiherutse gutangazwa n'umukuru w'igihugu kuko biteye kubiri n'ibwirizwa shingiro, kandi iravyiyamirije. Ishigikiye umushikiranganji wa mbere na reta yiwe, hamwe n'abagize ibiro vy'inama nshingamateka". Ku bw'iwe, "CACH izotegerezwa kwemera inkurikizi zose zizova kuri iyo ngingo yo gusenyura urunani, ikava muri reta y'igihugu n'amareta y'uburere isanzwe ifisemwo ibibanza, kandi ibi vyoca bituma umubano mwiza ugaruka". Hagati aho, abayaze na BBC mu mabarabara ya Kinshasa bakirije yompi iyi ngingo ya Perezida Tshisekedi yo kuvana burundu n'uyu yahoze acuditse nawe. Umwe ati: "Jewe ijambo rya Perezida ryaranezereje cane kuko ingingo zafashwe kw'ishaka ry'abanyagihugu". Uwundi ati: "Turanezerejwe cane n'ingingo y'umukuru w'igihugu, kuko ni zo twari turindiriye kuva kera. Turi inyuma yiwe kandi turindiranye igishika impinduka ategura haba muvyo imibano canke mu butungane". Nk'uko Octave Nasena abivuga, Félix Tshisekedi  afise inzira nyinshi zo kurondera abamushigikira. Ati: "Arashobora kwisunga amahuriro atatu canke ane ya politike mu nama nshingamateka amushigikiye, aya ni nka AFDCA (Alliance Des Forces Démocratiques du Congo) rirongowe na Modeste Bahati Lukwebo, ikaba igizwe n'abiyonkoye kuri Kabila, canke na ho akisunga abari inyuma y'imirwi ikomeye cane ya Lamuka nka Moïse Katumbi canke Jean-Pierre Bemba, ibi bigashobora kumutuma aronka abamushigikiye benshi". Hagati aho, uwundi muhinga mu vya politike Christian Moleka, na we avuga ko Perezida Tshisekedi atavavanuye burundu n'abo bahora bacuditse. Abona ko mw'ijambo ryiwe yashikirije ku wa Mungu yerekanye ko imiryango y'ibiganiro yuguruye kugira ngo bumvikane. Octave Nasena avuga ati: "Fatshi (ashaka kuvuga Félix Tshisekedi) ariko akoresha uburyo bwose bwomushobokera kugira ngo yigarurire ubutegetsi bw'iki gihugu ca Congo kuko yari abusangiye na Kabila. Mu gihe uyu na we ariko aranyagwa abantu biwe muri FCC, Tshisekedi ariko aregeranya inguvu zose muri politike kugira ngo atsimbataze ubutegetsi bwiwe imbere y'uko ikiringo ciwe kirangira". Uku kurondera "kwigarurira ubutegetsi"  kuje guhungabanya umubano wa politike. Christian Moleka wewe avuga ati: "Umukuru w'igihugu nta ngingo yafashe yo kubogoza umushikiranganji wa mbere, ariko amusaba ko yotanga imihoho we nyene". Ati: "Mu gihe umugambwe uri ku butegetsi wobandanya inzira yawo maze ikavamwo igira iti 'ubu rero ni twe turi benshi muri ino nama nshingamateka ...' dushobora gusanga twinjiye mu ndyane nshasha za politike zishobora gusa n'izo muri 1960, aho Perezida Kasavubu yabogoje umushikiranganji wa mbere ariko inama nshingamateka ikamusubizaho". Christian Moleka agumana amakenga. Ati: "Jewe ngumana amakenga kuri kazoza kacu, ingingo yafashe ntizitanga icizere c'ugutsimbataza demokarasi, kandi ntizihumuriza ko zishobora kugarukana icuka ciza mu banyaporitike". "Hazohera nk'amezi nk'abiri bagikwegana amashati". Octave Nasena abona ko uru rugamba rwo gushinga izindi nani rushobora gutuma "Fayulu atakaza inguvu" mu gihe ari we yaboneka ko ahanganye na reta yashinzwe na Tshisekedi". Martin Fayulu, yari yitoje kw'izina ry'urunani Lamuka mu matora y'umukuru w'igihugu ya 2018, afata ko ari we mukuru w'igihugu wa Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo yatowe, kandi ntiyemera ivyatangajwe ko vyavuye mu matora. Uyu yahoze arongoye Congo abandanya afise ijambo rikomeye mu gihugu, n'aho avuga gake cane mbere akaba adakunze n'ugutanga ibiganiro ku bamenyeshamakuru. Ariko, ikizwi ni uko 42 kuri 65 bagize reta, ni ukuvuga 2/3 y'inama nshikiranganji, bava mw'ihuriro FCC, ari naryo ryiganziye inama nshingamateka na nkenguzamateka. Ku wa 22 z'ukw'icenda, Félix Tshisekedi yarabonanye n'uyu yasubiriye Joseph Kabila, ariko uwu mubonano ntiwashoboye kugarukana icuka ciza mu runani rwabo. Ku bwa Christian Moleka, "Joseph Kabila yatakaje sentare ijejwe ibwirizwashingiro. Kuva ubu, arashobora gutanga umukandida ashaka, nk'akarorero agatanga umugore wiwe, ariko ntagishoboye kwitoza wenyene ubwiwe".

headline: Kamala Harris muri Korea y’Epfo inyuma y’umusi umwe Korea ya Ruguru irashe ibisasu vya misire
text: N﻿a  Jean Mackenzie muri Seoul na Frances Mao muri  Singapore B﻿BC News Icegera c’umukuru w’igihugu ca Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika Kamala Harris yashitse muri Korea y’Epfo inyuma y’umusi umwe Korea ya Ruguru igerageje ibisasu vya misire biraswa ku ntera ngufi ku nkengera yayo y’ubuseruko. Iraswa ry’ibi bisasu - risanzwe riteye kubiri n’ibihano vya ONU - ribaye mu gihe Amerika na Korea y’Epfo biri mu myimenyerezo rusangi ya gisirikare mu mazi y’inyanja izungurutse ikigwa ca Korea. Abategetsi ba Korea y’Epfo n’ab’Ubuyapani bariyamiriza aka “gasomborotso”. Bubaye ubwa kabiri mu ndwi imwe gusa Korea ya Ruguru igerageza ibisasu vya misire muri uno mwaka umaze kuberamwo ibikorwa vy’igerageza ry’ibirwanisho gusumba iyindi myaka yose. Ribaye kandi mu gihe kidasanzwe – mu rugendo rwiwe muri Korea y’Epfo, umupfasoni Harris azoshika ku rubibe hamwe no muri ka karere katemerewemwo ibikorwa vya gisirikare (Demilitarised Zone, DMZ) ariko gacungerewe cane kagabuza izi Korea zompi. Ejo ku wa gatatu, yashikirije ijambo ingabo za Amerika ku kirindiro cazo co mu Buyapani, aho yiyamirije ibikorwa biheruka vya Pyongyang vyo kugerageza ibirwanisho, hamwe “n’umugambi utemewe n’amategeko wo guhingura ibirwanisho uteye akaga ku mutekano w’akarere”. Mu gihe ibiganiro hagati ya Korea ya Ruguru na korea y’Epfo vyerekeye guhagarika umugambi wo guhingura ibirwanisho vy’ubumara vyahagaze, mu gihe kandi izi mpande zompi zibandanya zikomeza ibisata vyazo vyo kwivuna abansi, ibi bikorwa vy’igerageza ni bimwe mu bituma ibintu vyunyuka cane. Ibikorwa vyo muri ino ndwi vy’igerageza ry’ibirwanisho – ica mbere kikaba cabaye ku wa Mungu imbere y’uko iyi myimenyerezo ya gisirikare y’ibisata birwanira mu mazi itangura – ni ivya mbere kuva mu ntango z’ukwa gatandatu, ariko Korea ya Ruguru imaze kugerageza ibirwanisho birenga 30 gushika ubu muri uno mwaka, kurusha mu yindi myaka yose. Abategetsi ba Korea y’Epfo bavuga ko igerageza ry’izi misire ejo ku wa gatatu ryabahe hagati y’isaha 18:10 na 18:20 mu masaha yo muri ako karere, bikaba vyarashwe ku ntera y’ibirometero 360, bikaba kandi vyagurutse gushika ku birometero 30 uja hejuru. Abajejwe gucungera imbibe b’Ubuyapani nabo nyene barabonye ibi bisasu. Abakuru ba gisirikare ba Korea y’Epfo basohoye itangazo bavuga bati: "Aka gasomborotso ka Korea ya Ruguru kazotuma ibikorwa vya Korea y’Epfo na Amerika vyo kuzibira no kwivuna bikomezwa, kandi nta kindi bizovamwo atari kubandanya bikumira Korea ya Ruguru ku rubuga mpuzamakungu”. Abahinga babona ko ibi bikorwa vy’igerageza ari ukwihora ku myimenyerezo rusangi ya gisirikare y’ibisata vya gisirikare birwanira mu mazi mu gihe Washington na Seoul biriko bikomeza igisata co kwivuna abansi ca Korea y’Epfo – iyi myimenyerezo rusangi ni iya mbere ibaye harimwo ubwato bwa Amerika  butwara indege kuva mu 2017. Mw’ijambo yashikirije inama ya bose mu ntango z’ino ndwi, uwuserukira Pyongyang mw’ishirahamwe ONU, Song Kim, yaraneguye Amerika na Korea y’Epfo kuri ino myimenyerezo yabo, avuga ko yariko ituma iki kigwa “cegereza intambara”. Yavuze ko “poritike y’urwanko” ya Amerika kuri Korea ya Ruguru ari yo mvo isi ubu “iriko itera ija mu bihe bibi cane”. Korea y’Epfo na Amerika vyamye vyishigikira mu myimenyerezo yavyo rusangi, bikavuga ko ifise intumbero yo kuzana ituze mu karere. Amakuru avuga ko iki gihugu ca gikomunista gisanzwe gikorera mw’ibanga coba gitunze ibirwanisho vy’ubumara, abandanya yiyongera – ibi bikaba biteye umutima uhagaze Amerika na Korea y’Epfo. Mu ntango z’uku kwezi, Korea ya Ruguru yemeje itegeko ryemeza ko ari igihugu gitunze ibirwanisho vy’ubumara. Indongozi yayo Kim Jong-un  yariyemeje ko igihugu ciwe kitazokwigera giheba umugambi waco wo guhingura ibirwanisho canke ngo citabe ibiganiro bifise intumbero yo kukibuza gutunga ibirwanisho vy’ubumara. Iri tegeko kandi ryemerera Korea ya Ruguru kurasa ubwa mbere, mu bihe bitari bike bishobora gushika. Gushika mu misi iheze, camye kivuga ko ibirwanisho vyaco ari ivyo kwikingira, mu ntumbero yo gukinga intambara. Haraciye amezi ibisata vy’igendereza vya Amerika na Korea y’Epfo bivuga ko Korea ya Ruguru yiteguye kugerageza ikirwanisho c’ubumara ariko ko irindiriye akanya keza ka poritike. Iri ryoba ari igerageza rigize indwi ry’ikirwanisho c’ubumara, rikazoba kandi ribaye irya mbere mu myaka itanu. Ejo ku wa gatatu, igisata ca Korea y’Epfo kijejwe igendereza cabwiye abanyaporitike ko iri gerageza ry’ikirwanisho c’ubumara rishobora kuba hagati y’ukwezi kw’icumi n’ukw’icumi na rimwe, mu kiringo kiri hagati y’ikoraniro ry’umugambwe Chinese Party Congress be n’amatora y’abashingamateka n’abakenguzamateka muri Amerika. Perezida Yoon Suk-yeol wa Korea y’Epfo, kuva ashitse ku butegetsi mu kwa gatanu, yibanze gukomeza ugukorera hamwe hagati ya korea y’Epfo na Amerika mu ntumbero yo kwirinda akaga gaterwa na Korea ya Ruguru.

headline: “Mwalimu wanje ni Perezida w’igihugu”
text: Muri Centrafrique, mu banyeshule ba Perezida Faustin-Archange Touadéra bashinga intahe uko abigisha. Nawe ati, "iyo ndiko ndigisha, turanaganira n'abanyeshule, bikanyuzuza".

headline: Igihugu ca Amerika kiremeza ko misile y'igisirikare ca Irani yakoroye drone yaco
text: Umurwi karuhariwe w'igisirikare ca Irani,  Iran's Islamic Revolution Guards Corps (IRGC), umenyesha ko wakoroye indege ya drone ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika yari yinjiye mu kirere c'ico gihugu. Ivyo vyareyeye mu karere ka Kuhmobarak mu ntara ya Hormozgan iri mu bumanuko bw'ico gihugu. Ibimenyeshamakuru vya leta bimenyesha ko umukuru w'uwo murwi, Jenerali-Majoro Hossein Salami, avuga ko ivyabaye ari "ubutumwa butomoye kuri Amerika". Ivyo bishitse iminsi mike inyuma y'aho ubushikiranganji bw'ukwivuna abansi bwa Amerika (Pentagon) bumenyeshereje ko bugiye kurungika abandi basirikare 1000 muri ako karere inyuma y'imishamiraho hagati y'ivyo bihugu. Ikinyamakuru cegukira leta ya Irani kimenyesha ko igisirikare c'ico gihugu carashe iyo drone mu gatondo ko kuri uyu wa kane mu gihe yari yavogereye ikirere caco. Ejo ku munsi wa gatatu, umunyamabanga w'Inama nkuru ya Irani ijejwe umutekano yari yamenyesheje ko ico gihugu kidashobora kwihanganira ivogerwa ry'ikirere caco. Ikinyamakuru Tasnim gicuditse n'ubutegetsi casubiyemwo amajambo yashikirijwe na Ali Shamkhani ati: "Ikirere cacu ni umurongo ntarengwa. Irani yamye yivuna kandi izokwama yivuna igihugu ico ari co cose kizovogera ikirere cacu". Irani imenyesha ko iyo drone yari iyo mu bwoko bwa RQ-4 Global Hawk, ariko umutegetsi wo mu gisirikare ca Amerika yabwiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters ko ari iyo mu bwoko bwa MQ-4C Triton ikoreshwa n'igisirikare kirwanira mu mazi. Amerika yagiriza Irani ko yateye ubwato bwari butwaye igitoro hakoreshejwe vya bisasu vya mine mu kigobe ca Oman. Iyo mishamirano yagiye kwiyongera ku munsi wa mbere aho Irani imenyeshereje ko mu ndwi iza izokwongereza urugero rw'ubutare bwitwa Uranium bukorwamwo ibirwanisho vy'ubumara, kurenza urugero yari yasezeraniye amahanga mu masezerano yo mu mwaka wa 2015. Irani yarongereje urugero rw'ubwo butare mu kwihora ibihano vy'ubutunzi cafatiwe na Amerika inyuma y'aho yivumburiye muri ayo masezerano mu mwaka uheze. Akarere ka Kuhmobarak Irani ivuga ko yakororeyemwo iyo drone kuri uyu wa kane kari hafi y'akarere ka Strait of Hormuz - inzira ikomeye icamwo igitoro kija mu bice bitandukanye vy'isi.

headline: Ukraine-Russia: Bakhmut, igisagara Abarusiya bakibandanya barondera kwigarurira
text: N﻿a Jonathan Beale BBC News, Bakhmut Inyuma y’amezi hafi umunani kuva igitero c’Uburusiya kuri Ukraine gitanguye, ingabo zabwo ntizorohewe mu gihe Ukraine iriko itera intambwe yigarurira ubutaka mu buseruko no mu bumanuko. Mu karere ka Donbas kari mu buseruko, ingabo z’Uburusiya ziracarondera kwigarurira igisagara ca Bakhmut kandi ziriko ziratera intambwe. Iki gisagara cumvikanamwo vya muzinga vy’urutavanako, ijoro n’umurango. Amayinga atari make araheze ari uku. Abanyagihugu ba Bakhmut bangana na 70.000 hafi bose baramaze guhunga. Abasigayeyo nka bose ni abatama. Nta mazi, nta matara. Umurongo muto w’abantu bakirondera guhungishwa niwo uboneka, imodoka ntoya y’abagiraneza niyo igenda igaruka muri ico gisagara. Olena w’imyaka 70 yari umwe muri abo bari barindiriye guhungishwa. Uyu mutamakazi ati: "Abantu bararushe”, aho nyene ibindi bisasu vya muzinga vyariko birasirana muri ico gisagara. Buri muntu aca yifata uko bimujemwo, nk’uko abivuga – bamwe bakanywa itabi, abandi bakarondera ico guhekenya, mu gihe abandi nabo bicara aho bakuzura amarira. Ubuzima bwaranse, nk’uko abivuga, kuko bateka hanze, bakamana indobo ku mutwe baja kuvoma amazi. Ati: "Ndavumye uyu muntu yatanguje iyi ntambara. Ndamuvumye incuro 100”. Igihe yari yuriye imodoka yagaranzuye amaboko mu kwishimira ko yari ashoboye kuva muri ako kaga. I Bakhmut, Uburusiya buriko bwita m uziko bugerageza guhindura ibivugwa kuri ino ntambara. Ni kimwe mu bibanza bike ingabo zitariko zirasubira inyuma. Intambwe ziterwa hano zigenda buke buke kandi zikiha inkumbi, ariko ingabo z’Uburusiya zigenda zigarurira ubutaka. Kumbure hari impamvu Uburusiya bwashize inguvu zidasanzwe kuri Bakhmut. Mu ntango za rino ci, bwari bwigaruriye  ibisagara vya Severodonetsk na Lysychansk. Bakhmut yategerezwa gukurikira, vyari vyitezwe ko ingabo z’Uburusiya zari guca rero zisatira Kramatorsk na Sloviansk. Ariko aha hari igihe Ukraine itari bwatangure ibitero giturumbuka vyo kwivuna mu buseruko no mu bumanuko. Ingabo z’Uburusiya zarirukanywe amaja mu buraruko. Ibisagara vya Kramatorsk na Sloviansk ntibigishobora gushikirwa na vya muzinga vy’Uburusiya nk’uko vyari bimeze mu kw’indwi. Uburusiya ku ruhande runini vyabaye ngombwa ko buhindura amayeri, bukarwana intambara yo kwivuna, hakurwana intambara yo gutera. Koroneri (Col) Serhiy Cherevatyi, umuvugizi w’ingabo za Ukraine zirwanira mu buseruko, aracafise amakenga ko Abarusiya boba bagisigaranye abantu bakwiye n’uburyo bwo kwigarurira Bakhmut – ari naho bwashize inguvu nyinshi cane za gisirikare ubu, nk’uko abivuga. Aho nyene, nk’uko abivuga, Uburusiya buriko buragerageza kwubaka ibirindiro vyo kwivuna hirya mu buraruko mu micungararo y’ibisagara vya Svatove and Kremenna – naho nyene amayira nyamukuru yo gushikana uburyo ku rugamba akaba ageramiwe n’ingabo za Ukraine. Col Cherevatyi avuga ko ubu vyinshi bizovana n’igitigiri c’ingabo nshasha Uburusiya bushobora kwegeranya hamwe n’ubushobozi bwazo. “Gushika ubu, turabona ko bagoyagoya kandi ntabirwanisho bikwiye bafise”. Nasanze uyu mukoroneri mu bisigarira vy’ikimodoka ntamenwa c’Uburusiya casambuwe be n’imodoka z’intambara hafi y’igisagara ca Lyman giherutse kwigarurirwa. Niyo sanamu y’igisirikare c’Uburusiya Ukraine ishaka kwereka amakungu – iracabuza abanyamakuru gushika ahabera intambara. Col Cherevatyi avuga ko Uburusiya buherutse kurungika ku rugamba ibimodoka ntamenwa vya kera bizwi nka T62, vyakozwe mu myaka ya 1960, kubera vyinshi mu bikoresho bigezweho vyasambuwe. Mu kwezi guheze, Perezida Putin yatangaje ko ategerezwa kwinjiza mu gisirikare abantu 300.000 kugira baje kurwana, Uburusiya ubu bukavuga ko buzoba bwabakwijije mu ndwi zibiri uhereye ubu. Ariko utwigoro two kwigarurira Bahkmut turiko dukorwa n’abarwanyi b’umurwi Wagner, nk’uko igenedera rya gisirikare ry’Ubwongereza ribibona. Uyu murwi w’abacangero urwanira muri Ukraine kuva mu 2014, mu kwezi guheze hakaba hari videwo yasohotse yerekana umukuru wawo ariko arondera abarwanyi mw’ibohero ryo mu Burusiya. Yabwiye Abarusiya ati: "Ni ibigo vya gisirikare vyigenga n’abapfungwa, canke abana banyu – ifatire ingingo wewe nyene”. Biracashoboka ko ingabo z’Uburusiya zishobora kwigarurira Bakhmut. Ariko none haca hakurikira iki? Col Cherevatyi  ati: "Igihe tuva muri Lysychansk twararuhishije umwansi”. Yiteze ko bishobora kugenda uko nyene muri Bakhmut.  Nayo ku vyerekye iyongerekana ry’ibitero vya misire vy’Uburusiya biraswa kure, avuga ko ikintu conyene bizokora ni ukwongerereza intege Ukraine: "Turabakubita ku rugamba, ikintu conyene basigaranye ni ibisasu vya misire”.

headline: Raila Odinga yahakanye ivyavuye mu matora muri Kenya
text: Raila Odinga yahakanye ivyavuye mu matora y'umukuru w'igihugu yabaye muri Kenya mu ndwi iheze. Mw'itangazo yasomye imbere vy'ibinyamakuru, Odinga yavuze ko azoca mu nzira zose zemewe n'amategeko kugira ivyavuye mu matora bibe impfagusa. Ku wa mbere umukuru w'umugwi ujejwe amatora yatangaje ko ayo matora yatsinzwe na Willian Ruto ku majwi 50,49% ku ri 48,85% ya Raila Odinga. Gusa imbere y'uko ivyavuye mu matora bitangazwa  , bane kuri ndwi bagize umugwi ujejwe amatora batangaje ko badashobora "kwemanga ivyayavuyemwo kubera umwijima waranze intambwe  ya nyuma yo gusuzuma amajwi". Mr Odinga yagirije umukuru w'umugwi ujejwe amatora, Wafula Chebukati "kwirengagiza vyeruye ibwirizwa nshingiro". Yavuze ati: "Turiyamirije twivuye inyuma ivyavuye mu matora y'umukuru w'igihugu". Odinga yari amaze kwanka ivyavuye mu matora abiri yaheruka, mu 2017 sentare ikaba yaremeje ikirego ciwe amatora arasubirwamwo. Imbere y'uko Raila Odinga ashikiriza aho ahagaze, bane kuri ndwi bagize umugwi ujejwe amatora bari bahaye ikiganiro abamenyeshamakuru kugira basigure igituma bavyanse. Bavuze ko umukuru w'umugwi, Wafula Chebukati, yabakumiriye hageze gutangaza ivyavuye mu matora, hanyuma atangaza ibiharuro birimwo amakosa kandi "bitagira umutwe n'amaguru". Icegera ciwe Julia Cherera yavuze ko uteranije ivyo kw'ijana Chebukati yatangaje utora 100,1% , ariko hari abavuga ko ivyo vyatewe no kwihenda mu kuduza igiharuro kiza inyuma y'agakwabu. N'aho biri uko, ibihugu bitandukanye birimwo Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika vyakeje abanya-Kenya uburyo bitwaye mu matora binakeza uwayatsinze, William Ruto. Abakuru b'ibihugu bitandukanye ba Afrika nabo bakeje William Ruto ku ntsinzi yaraye atahanye. Raila Odinga w'imyaka 77 bwari ubugira gatanu yitoza mu kibanza c'umukuru w'igihugu. William Ruto w'imyaka 55, yari asanzwe ari icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu, Uhuru Kenyatta, arangije ikiringo ca kabiri c'imyaka itanu, akaba atari arekuriwe gusubira kwitoza nk'uko amategeko ya Kenya abitegekanya. Muri aya matora ariko, Uhuru Kenyatta yahisemwo gushigikira uwo batahora bavuga rumwe, Raila Odinga.

headline: Ubuhindi bwongereje abasirikare ku rubibe buhana n’Ubushinwa rurangwamwo induru
text: Umushikiranganji w’imigenderanire w’Ubuhindi avuga ko igihugu ciwe congereje abasirikare ku rubibe gihana n’Ubushinwa ku rugero rutari bwigere rubaho. Jaishankar yongerako y’uko Ubuhindi budashobora kwemera ko Ubushinwa “buhindura uko bwishakiye” uko ibintu bimeze ku mupaka. Ashikirije aya majambo yiwe inyuma y’imisi mikeya ingabo z’Ubuhindi n’iz’Ubushinwa zikozanijeko mu karere ko ku rubibe gateje impari mu ntara ya Arunachal Pradesh. Ubuhindi buvuga ko vyose vyatanguye igihe ingabo z’Ubushinwa zivogera ubutaka bwabwo. Ubushikiranganji bw’Ubushinwa bujejwe imigenderanire buvuga ko ku vyo buzi, ibintu “bimeze neza muri rusangi ku mupaka” kandi ko impande zompi zibandanya ziganira kuri iki kibazo. Ubuhindi n’Ubushinwa bisangiye urubibe rurangwa n’induru rungana na 3.440km – ruzwi nka Line of Actual Control, or LAC – rutaboneka neza. Abasirikare bo ku mpande zompi bakunze gushamirana mu turere tutari duke, mbere icuka kibi rimwe rimwe kirarenga inkombe gushika n’aho batana mu mitwe. Impande zompi ziragerageza kugarukana icuka ciza inyuma y’imishamirano yadutse mu kwa gatandatu 2020 mu Kiyaya ca Galwan (Galwan Valley) mu karere ka Ladakh amaja mu burengero – abasirikare 20 b’Ubuhindi hamwe n’abo Ubushinwa nibura bane bakaba barapfiriye mu ntambara. Imishamirano iheruka – iya mbere mu kiringo kirenga umwaka -  ni iyabaye ku wa 09 Kigarama (12), ikaba yatumye abasirikare bakomereka bukebuke. Impande zompi zaciye ziva muri ako karere, nk’uko igisirikare c’Ubuhindi cavuze. Jaishankar yavuze ibi mu gihe yariko yishura ibibazo kuri iki kibazo mw’ijambo ryiwe yashikirije mu birori vyateguwe n’ikompanyi y’ibinyamakuru India Today ku wa mbere. Ati: "Uno musi, igisirikare c’Ubuhindi carungitse ingabo zitari bwigere zirungikwa ku rubibe rw’Ubushinwa. Uno musi igisirikare c’Ubuhindi carungitswe kuzibira Ubushinwa mu gihe bwogerageza guhindura intunganyo y’icungera ry’urubibe”. Ubushinwa ntaco burishura kuri ibi. Imishamirano iheruka yateje imvururu za poritike mu Buhindi mu ndwi iheze, aho imigambwe itavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi yivmbuye mu nama nshingamateka inyuma y’icipfuzo cayo c’ibiganiro ku kibazo co ku mupaka cankiwe. Rahul Gandhi, umukuru w’umugambwe mukuru utavuga rumwe mu Buhindi Congress party, yagiriza reta kwirengagiza ibibazo biterwa n’Ubushinwa, akavuga kandi ko ingabo z’iki gihugu ”zikubita” iz’Ubuhindi ku rubibe. Ari imbere y’inama nshingamateka ejo ku wa mbere, umushikiranganji Jaishankar yavuze ko amajambo ya Gandhi "ateza urubwa" abasirikare b’Ubuhindi anahakana ko reta itigira sindabibazwa ku biriko biraba. "Nimba turi ba sindabibazwa ku Bushinwa, ni nde yarungitse igisirikare c’Ubuhindi ku rubibe? Nimba turi ba sindabibazwa ku Bushinwa, kubera iki turiko duhatira Ubushinwa ko igabanya icuka kibi kandi ikigiza inyuma ingabo”.

headline: Afghanistan: Baracanacanako kugira bave muri ico gihugu
text: Abavyiboneye bavuga ko nibura abantu  babiri bapfuye mu gihe abantu amajana n'amajana bagerageza  gusohoka Afghanistan babandanya kurundana ku kibuga mpuzamakungu c'indege ca Kabul. Hari video zagaragaye ku mbuga hwaniro zerekana abanyagihugu basanzwe b'abanya-Afghanistan bafashe ku ruhande rw'indege mu gihe yariko iritegura kuguruka. Muri izo video, BBC itashoboye guhinyuza, hari abantu baboneka basa n'abicaye ku ruhande rw'indege ya gisirikare y'Abanyamerika iriko ibandanya inzira yayo yo kuguruka, abantu isinzi nabo bayikurikira. Inkuru zimwe, nazo BBC itarashobora guhinyuza, zivuga ko abantu babiri bapfuye inyuma yo gukoroka bava kuri iyo ndege ubwo yari imaze kuva hasi. Abantu nibura babiri bivugwa ko bapfuye kuri ico kibuga nyene, ubwo abantu isinzi bagerageza guhunga igihugu. Ntibizwi niba barashwe canke bapfuye mu gucanacanako. Ingabo za Amerika, ubu arizo zigenzura ico kibuga mu gihe indege  zo kuvanayo abantu zikomeje guhaguruka, bivugwa ko zarashe hejuru kugira bashwiragize abantu isinzi kuri uyu wa mbere. Itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters rivuga ko igitigiri c'abapfuye gisumba ngaho. Rivuga ko umwe mu bavyiboneye yaribwiye ko  yabonye imivyimba y'abantu batanu ijanywe mu modoka. Uwundi yavuze ko atawuzi neza niba abo bantu barashwe canke bapfuye mu musunikano no gucanacanako. Hagati aho, ibihugu vy'i Buraya biriko biracanacanako mu kuvana abayagihugu bavyo ku mugwa mukuru wa Afghanistan, Kabul. Ku wa mbere, umushikiranganji wa mbere wa repuburika ya Czech yemeje ko indege ya mbere y'ico gihugu itahanye  abantu yashitse ku murwa mukuru Prague, irimwo aba Czech, abanya-Afghanistan bahora bakorana hamwe n'imiryango yabo. Ubudagi bwatangaje ko indege zo kuvana abantu babwo muri Afghanistan zatanguye ku wa  mungu ku mugoroba, indege za gisirikare zikaba zararungitswe kuvanayo Abadagi n'abandi bakozi b'abanya-Afghanistan kuri uyu wa mbere. Ibihugu vy'Ubufaransa na Nouvelle Zelande  na vyo nyene vyavuze ko biriko biraraba ingene bivana abanyaguhugu bavyo muri Afghanistan. Umushikiranganji w'Ubwongereza ajejwe kwivuna abansi yemeye ko "abantu bamwe bamwe ntibazoshobora kugaruka bava muri Afghanistan" mu gihe hakomeje urugambwa rwo kutahukana Abongereza bari muri Afghanstan n'abo bakoranye muri ico gihugu. Ben Wallace ubwa mbere yari yavuze ko "aremye" ko Abongereza bose bazova muri Afganistan ariko kuri uyu wa  mbere mu kiganiro kuri radiyo LBC vyamwankiye kwifata aca avuga ati: "Biri mu vyo nicuza cane…raba, hari abantu batazogaruka. Hari abantu batazogaruka, tuzokora ivyo dushobora duce ku bindi bihugu kugira dukureyo abo bantu". Abajijwe igituma yumva bimubabaje we ubwiwe Wallace yishuye ati: "Ndi umusirikare…kandi biteye agahinda kandi Abanyaburaya ivyo bakoze babikoze, dutegerezwa gukora  ivyo dushoboye vyose kugira tuvaneyo abantu kuko biri mu nshingano zacu, imyaka 20 yo kwitanga, murumva icari co". Aba  Taliban binjiye umurwa mukuru wa Afghanistan ,  Kabul, ku wa mungu, bagenzura igihugu  ubwa mbere mu myaka hafi 20 ubwo reta yatembagaye umukuru w'iguhugu Ashraf Ghani nawe agahungira mu mahanga.

headline: Iran yongereje urugero rwa uranium inyuma y'igitero ku ruganda rwayo cayibabaje
text: Iran igiye kwongereza urugero rwa uranium gushika ku bice 60% mu kwihora igitero ku ruganda rwayo cikekwa ko cakozwe na Israel, nk'uko bivugwa n'umukuru w'ico gihugu Hassan Rouhani, ibi bikayituma yegereza urugero rukenewe kugira ihingure ikirwanisho c'ubumara. Igitero co ku wa Mungu casambuye ivyuma vy'umuyagankuba ku ruganda rwa Natanz, bituma ibikoresho vyo guhingura ubutare bwa uranium biharurwa mu bihumbi vyononekara. Perezida Rouhani yaciye agabisha ababikoze ko urugero rwa uranium rugiye kwongerezwa kubera "ubugome bwanyu". Ariko yashimangiye ko ibikorwa vya Irani vyo guhingura ubutare bw'ubumara "ari ivy'amahoro gusa". Ubufaransa, Ubudagi, n'Ubwongereza vyaciye vyerekana "impungenge nyinshi " kuri iyo ngingo, bikavuga ko Iran "ata kintu na kimwe cosigura ko ikeneye kwongereza uru rugero mu mugambi wa gisivire". Ibi bihugu biri muri ya masezerano yo mu 2015 na Iran, amasezerano ayemerera guhingura uranium gushika ku rugero rwa 3.76% kugira ngo ikore umuyagankuba. Kugira ngo hashobore guhingurwa ikirwanisho c'ubumara hakenewe uranium itunganyije iri ku rugero rwo 90% no kurenga. Iran yatanguye kwongereza uranium itunganyije ishika ku rugero rwa 20%, hari mu kwa mbere mu kwihora ku bihano vyari bisubijweho na Amerika igihe yari irongowe na Donald Trump, inyuma y'aho yiyonkoreye muri aya masezerano haraciye imyaka itatu. Israel ntirashobora kwemeza canke guhakana uruhara rwayo mu gitero co ku ruganda rwa Natanz, ariko isanzwe ibona ko umugambi wa Iran wo guhingura ubutare bw'ubumara ari akaga ku kubaho kwayo kandi aranegura utwigoro twa Joe Biden two kunagura aya masezerano. Iradiyo y'igihugu yatangaje amakuru yahawe n'igendereza avuga ko ico gitero cari igitero cakozwe ku nyabwonko na Mossad, urwego rwa Israel rujejwe igendereza ryo hanze. Abajejwe igendereza rya Amerika babwiye ikinyamakuru New York Times ko igisasu kinini caturitse kigasambura ibikoresho vyatanga umuyagankuba mu cumba co mu kuzimu ku ruganda rwa Natanz cahingurirwamwo uranium. Ku wa kabiri, umukuru w'ikigo c'inama nshingamateka ya Irani kijejwe amatohoza, Alireza Zakani, yavuze ko ibikoresho biharurwa mu bihumbi "vyononekaye canke bigasamburwa mu mwanya muto" kandi ko "igice kitari gito c'ubushobozi bwacu bwo kwimbura ubu butare" casambutse. Ku wa kabiri mw'ijoro, uwuserukira Iran mw'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu rijejwe inguvu z'ubumara ( International Atomic Energy Agency, IAEA) yatangaje ko Iran yari yatanguye kwongereza uranium gushika ku rugero rwa 60% ku ncuro ya mbere mu kwihora ico gitero. Iran izoshiraho ibindi bikoresho 1000 ku ruganda rwa Natanz vyo gusubiriza ivyasambuwe biri mu bwoko bwa IR-1 vyari bishaje kandi bitakora neza - ibisubirize n'ivyo mu bwoko bwa IR-6 bigezweho, ibi bikazotuma ishobora kwongereza cane uru rugero rwa uranium. Ejo ku wa gatatu, Perezida Rouhani yabwiye inama nshikiranganji ko mu gihe hakirindiriwe icegeranyo ntabanduka c'inzego za Irani zijejwe umutekano za Iran kuri ico gitero, "biraboneka ko ari igitero cakozwe na Israel". Iran ntiyemera ko Israel ari igihugu gifise uburenganzira bwo kubaho mbere ikunze kucita "igihugu c'abanya siyoni". Ati: "Ntushobora kurondera guhungabanya umutekano wa Irani hanyuma ngo ukore icaha i Natanz; tuzoguca amaboko igihe uzoba ukoze icaha". Yongeyeko ati: "Wakoze icaha c'iterabwoba rya nikleyeri; ivyo turiko turakora bijanye n'amategeko". Perezida Rouhani avuga ko ababikoze bashaka kuburizamwo ibiganiro hagati y'abategetsi ba Amerika na Irani i Vienna mu ntumbero yo kurondera kunagura aya masezerano azwi nka Joint Comprehensive Plan of Action (JCPOA). "Turazi ico uriko uragerageza kugira; ushaka ko tuja muri ivyo biganiro turi imbokoboko ariko nagomba ndakubwire ko tugiye muri ibi biganiro dufise inguvu nyinshi". Mu nyuma, indongozi y'ikirenga ya Iran, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, yagabishije abategetsi ba Amerika ko "batari bashatse kwemera ukuri" kandi ko akenshi bagiye batanga ivyiyumviro bitari "binakwiye gufatirwako". Ati: "Ni ngombwa ko ibihano bibanza gufutwa. Mu gihe tuzobona ko ivyo vyakozwe, tuzoheza twubahirize ivyo twiyemeje". Reta z'Ubufaransa, Ubudagi n'Ubwongereza, zivuga ko kwongereza urugero rwa uranium gushika ku bice 60% ari "ikintu gikomeye" kuko ari "intambwe ikomeye mu nzira yo gukora ikirwanisho c'ubumara". "Amajambo ya Iran arababaje cane kubera avuzwe mu gihe ibihugu vyose biri muri aya masezerano hamwe na Amerika vyatanguye mu ntumbero yo kunagura amasezerano.  Ivyavuzwe na Irani biteye kubiri n'intumbero yo kwubaka n'ukugarukana umwizero muri ibi biganiro". Umuvugizi w'ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu wa Amerika Jen Psaki avuga ko ingingo ya Irani ari "agasotoro".

headline: Desmond Tutu: South Africa yatanguye ikigandaro c'indwi mu kwibuka iyi ntwari yarwanije apartheid
text: Afrika y'Epfo igiye kumara indwi yose iri mu bikorwa bitandukanye bibuka urupfu rw'uwarwanije intwaro y'ivanguramoko ya apartheid, Musenyeri Desmond Tutu, yaraye ashengeye ku myaka 90.
