Mu nteguro z'iki kigandaro (canke icyunamo), ikiziga ciwe kizomara imisi ibiri kiri ahagaragara imbere y'uko haba ibirori vyo kumushingura bitegekanijwe ku wa 01 z'ukwa mbere 2022 i Cape Town. Abategetsi batari bake kw'isi bashikirije ubutumwa bw'icubahiro, harimwo Umwamikazi Elizabeth II, Perezida Joe Biden wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika hamwe na Papa Francis. Tutu yari umwe mu bantu bazwi cane mu gihugu hagati no mu makungu. Perezida Cyril Ramaphosa yasohoye itangazo aho avuga ko Tutu yafashije "kubohoza Afrika y'Epfo". Mu runganwe rwa  Nelson Mandela, Tutu yahawe agashimwe k'amahoro kitiriwe Nobel mu 1984 kubera uruhara yagize mu kurwanya ubutegetsi bw'ivanguramoko bwa apartheid bwari bwashinzwe n'inkehwa z'abazungu mu guhonyora ku gakanu abirabure ari nabo nyamwinshi mu gihugu, kuva mu  1948 gushika 1991. Ejo ku wa Mungu, abanya-Afrika y'Epfo b'imice yose  barashitse kw'isengero nkuru ya Cape Town (Cape Town's St George's Cathedral) bashiraho amashurwe bunamira iyi ntwari y'igihugu. Akorora amosozi mu gihe yari mu kigandaro, Brent Goliath yabwiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru AFP ati:  "Ivyo yakoze birarengeye kwitwa umu-Anglican gusa". "Nakoroye amosozi mu gitondo numvise urupfu rwiwe. Ndashimiria Imana kubona yari yaramuduhaye", niko Goliath avuga, anongerako y'uko yabonanye na Tutu incuro nyinshi. Abategetsi batari bake b'isi bashikirije ubutumwa bwo kwibuka iyi ntwari. Perezida Biden avuga ko yababaye cane yumvise "urupfu rw'uwitangiye Imana n'abantu", yongera ko ati  "iragi rya Tutu rirengeye imbibe kandi rizokwama ryibukwa imyaka yose". Uwahoze arongoye Amerika Barack Obama nawe avuga ko Tutu yamubereye "umuhanuzi, umugenzi n'umwigisha". Mu butumwa bwiwe bwo guhoza, Umwamikazi Elizabeth II avuga ko azirikana n'umutima wiwe incuro yahuye nawe, igishika n'uburwaneza vyiwe. "Urupfu rwa Musenyeri Tutu ruzokorako abanyagihugu ba Afrika y'Epfo hamwe n'abatari bake mu Bwongereza, Irlande ya ruguru  hamwe no muri  Commonwealth yose, aho abatari bake bari bamufitiye urukundo n'icubahiro kidasanzwe". Itangazo rya Vaticano rivuga ko Papa Francis yahojeje "cane umuryango n'incuti ziwe". "Twibutse ubutumwa bwiza yatanga abicishije mu guhimiriza uburinganire n'ugusubiza hamwe hagati y'abadasangiye amoko muri Afrika y'Epfo, ubweranda bwiwe bushikane umutima wiwe ku mbabazi z'urukundo rw'Imana mushoboravyose". Urupfu rwa Tutu ruje haciye indwi nkeya umuzungu wa nyuma yarongoye ico gihugu muri butegetsi bwa apartheid, Frederik Willem de Klerk, asandavye ku myaka 85.

headline: Zelensky arashikiriza ijambo Congress mu gihe US yamwemereye miriyoni $800m z'imfashanyo ya gisirikare
text: Umukuru w'igihugu wa Ukraine yitezwe kubandanya asaba ko ibihugu bigize OTAN/NATO bifasha guhagarika ibitero vy'Uburusiya mw'ijambo aja gushikiriza inama nshingamateka na nkenguzamateka (Congress) vya Amerika abicishije ku buhinga bwa none (video link) mu masaha ari imbere. Bishoboka cane ko prezida Volodymyr Zelensky  aja gusubiramwo ivyo yasavye ko hashingwa ikirere ata ndege zirekuriwe gucamwo (no fly zone) mw'ijambo aheruka gushikiriza inama nshingamateka. Ijambo ryiwe rije mu gihe prezida wa Amerika Joe Biden yitezwe gutangaza ayandi mafaranga angana na miriyoni 800 z'amadorari y'imfashanyo ya gisirikare kuri Ukraine. Ayo mafaranga azofasha Ukraine kuronka ibisasu bisambura ibiduga  ntamenwa n'ibirasa indege, nka Stingers na Javelins, nk'uko bivugwa n'ibinyamakuru vyo muri Amerika. Ayo mafaranga ari mw'itegeko rigenga imfashanyo kuri Ukraine ryemejwe n'inzego zishinga amategeko ku ndwi iheze. Ashira umukono kuri iryo tegeko ku wa kabiri, prezida Biden yavuze ko igitero c'Ubususiya kuri Ukraine cunze ubumwe mu bantu hirya no hino kw'isi. Mu mwaka uheze, intwaro ya Biden yahaye Ukraine miriyaridi 1,2 z'amadorari aciye mu bigwanisho birimwo kajugujugu za Mi-17, ubwato bwo gukizura  hamwe n'ibigwanisho bito bito birimwo ivyo gutera ama granade n'inkoho za machine guns, nk'uko bivugwa n'ikinyamakuru New York  Times. Prezida Zelensky amaze gusaba kenshi OTAN ko yoshinga ko ikirere ca Ukraine kizira kugicishamwo indege, ariko OTAN yaranse. Ikirere kizira gucishamwo indege hejuru ya Ukraine coba gisigura ko  OTAN yoca ihangana n'indege z'Uburusiya zigiciyemwo hanyuma ikazirasa bikenewe. Kuwa kabiri, abashikiranganji ba mbere ba  Pologne, Slovenia na Czech Republic bafashe gariyamoshi baja i Kyiv aho bahuye na prezida Volodymyr Zelensky. Umushikiranganji wa mbere Janez Jansa wa Slovenia yabwiye abanya-Ukraine ati: "Ntabwo muri mwenyene. Intambara yanyu ni iyacu kandi hamwe tuzotsinda." Nirwo rugendo rwa mbere rw'abategetsi ba Buraya muri Ukraine  kuva Uburusiya bugavye igitero muri ico gihugu mu kwezi guheze. Uretse ico kirere kibujijwe indege, prezida Zelensky  yarasavye kandi Amerika n'ishirahamwe rya Buraya kumuha indege za Pologne za MIG-29  z'intambara, ariko ivyo vyaranswe na presida Biden kuko kwoba ari ugukwegera ibihugu vya OTAN muri iyo ntambara. Biden yitezwe kuja Bruxelles ku ndwi iza kubonana n'abo basangiye umuryango wa OTAN  yongere aje mu nama y'abategetsi b'ibishirahamwe rya Buraya. Umukuru wa Amerika azovugana na begenziwe ba Buraya utwigoro two ''kwivuna umwansi  no gutururuza," hanyuma ashimangire ukudahesha kw'igihugu ciwe mu gushigikira ibihugu vya OTAN , nk'uko bivugwa n'umunyamabanga ajejwe amakuru muri Maison Blanche, Jen Psaki.

headline: Mw'isengero Notre Dame habaye imisa ya mbere kuva ihiye abapatiri bambaye inkofero zera
text: Ejo ku munsi wa gatandatu, niyo haba imisa ya mbere kw'isengero Notre Dame i Paris mu gihugu c'Ubufaransa, inyuma y'aho ihiriye mu kwezi kwa kane kw'uno mwaka. Muri iyo misa yari irongowe na musenyeri wa diyoseze ya Paris Michael Aupetit, abapatiri bari bambaye inkofero zikomeye (casques) zera. Iyo misa yahuriyemwo abantu bake bari bagizwe n'abakuru ba Ekleziya Katolika, abakozi b'iyo Ekleziya hamwe n'abandi, harimwo n'abariko barasanura iyo sengero. Igihe  iterwa n'umuriro, abantu bari bafise ubwoba ko ishobora gusha ikazimangana inyuma y'imyaka amajana umunani (800) yari imaze. Abajejwe kuzimya imicanwa y'ivyaduka bashika 500 bakaba barashoboye kuzimya uwo muriro wamaze ikiringo c'amasaha icenda, mbere igice kitari gito co hagati muri iyo nyubakwa kikaba ataco cabaye. Emmaneul Macron, umukuru w'igihugu c'Ubufaransa, akaba yihaye intumbero y'uko urwo rusengero rusanurwa mu kiringo c'imyaka itanu. Yavuze ati: "Iyi sengero tugiye kuyisanurira hamwe kuko ata nkeka ko ari imwe mu bigize inzira yacu nk'abafaransa muri kazoza". Uwo muriro wadutse mw'iyo sengero kw'igenekerezo rya 15 z'ukwa kane uno mwaka, hari mu gihe c'i Karema, umunara hamwe n'urusenge bikaba vyarasenyutse. Ariko Altari, umusaraba mukuru uri kuri Altari bikaba biri mu bitahiye.

headline: Uganda: Musenyeri mukuru wa Kampala Cyprian Kizito Lwanga yitavye Imana
text: Itangazo rya Diyoseze Katorika nkuru ya Kampala yahora irongowe na Cyprian Kizito Lwanga rivuga ko ejo mu gitondo basanze uyu musenyeri w'imyaka 68 yapfiriye mu cumba ciwe. Urupfu rwiwe rwababaje abanya Uganda benshi bacishije ubutumwa bwabo ku mbuga za Twitter na WhatsApp berekana akababaro kabo. Ku wa gatanu, yari yarongoye imisa mu birori vyo guhimbaza uwa Gatanu Mweranda. Kizito Lwanga - yaronse ubupatiri muri Katorika mu 1978 - yari umuntu azwi cane ko adatinya kuvuga, akaba yaboneka nk'umwe mu banekura cane umugambwe NRM uri ku butegetsi. Yari umuntu adatinya kunegura abarya ruswa, ihonyangwa ry'agateka ka zina muntu hamwe n'ivyo guhindura ibwirizwashingiro mu ntumbero yo gukuraho ingingo zigabanya ibiringo n'imyaka vy'umukuru w'igihugu vyatumye Perezida Yoweri Museveni abandanya atwara. Mu 2012 yarandikiye urwandiko rwabaye rurangiranwa Perezida Museveni amusaba ko mu 2016 yokukuruka. Mu 2018, uyu musenyeri mukuru yaragirije reta ko yariko iragura abapatiri kugira ngo bamukoreko igendereza anahakana amakuru yariko amuvugwako ko yariko ategura gutembagaza ubutegetsi. Mu misi iheze, yariyamirije itotezwa n'inyuruzwa ryavugwa ko rikorerwa abanywanyi b'imigambwe itavuga rumwe n'uwuri ku butegetsi. Mu gihe hari hegereje amatora yo mu kwa mbere 2021, yasavye ko yokwunguruzwa mu kiringo c'imyaka itatu kubera ikiza ca coronavirus n'icuka kibi ca politike. Hagati aho, abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi ntibabishimye. Urupfu rwiwe rubaye mu gihe igihugu kirangwamwo icuka atari ciza inyuma y'amatora yo mu kwa mbere yabayemwo induru nyinshi, abatavuga rumwe n'umugambwe uri ku butegetsi nabo bakavuga ko abanywanyi babo banyurujwe.

headline: Abakuru b'amasengero bamwe bakwirakwiza ububeshi ku ncanco za Covid-19
text: Abakuru b'amasengero bamwe bakwirakwiza amakuru y'ububeshi ku ncanco za coronavirus.

headline: Germany: Abapatiri bagararije Vatican bahezagira abubakana basangiye ibitsina
text: Kuva ku wa mbere, abapatiri bakorera mu masengero ashika ijana muri Ekleziya Katolika mu Budagi batanguye guhezagira abubakana basangiye ibitsina. Umuhari wiswe Love Wins (Urukundo ruratsinda) wavutse inyuma y'aho Ekleziya Katolika itangarije mu kwa gatatu ko Imana "idashobora guhezagira igicumuro". Imbere y'aha, uyu muhari wanditse uti: "Abubakanye bose bategerezwa kuronka imihezagiro Imana ishaka kubaha - ku mugaragaro". Haraciye imisi Papa Francis avuze ko yibaza y'uko abubakanye basangiye ibitsina bokwemerwa "imbere y'amategeko". Mw'ireresi (documentaire) yasohotse mu mwaka uheze, yumvikanye avuga ko aba bantu "bafise uburenganzira bwo kuba mu muryango". Hagati aho, yagiriyeko yemeza inyigisho nyobokamana za Ekleziya zivuga ko Ekleziya Katolika ata bubasha ifise bwo guhezagira abashaka kwubakana basangiye igitsina. Muri Ekleziya Katolika, umuhezagiro utangwa n'umupatiri canke uwundi yihebeye Imana kw'izina rya Ekleziya. Ico gihe Papa yavuze ko inyishu ya Vatikano itari ifise intumbero yo kuvangura, ahubwo ko kwari ukwibutsa ukuri kw'imigirwa nyobokamana ya Ekleziya. Hagati aho, umuhari Love Wins wafashe iyo ngingo ya Ekleziya yo kwima umuhezagiro abubakanye basangiye ibitsina nk'uguhohotera abantu kw'isi. Uyu muhari wasohoye ikarata yerekana amasengero yose agiye guhezagira aba bantu mu misi iri imbere. Abapatiri n'abandi bakozi ba ekleziya baharurwa mu bihumbi bateye igikumu ku rwandiko rusaba ko Ekleziya yohezagira abubakanye basangiye ibitsina, mu gihe amaparuwase amwe amwe amanika amabendera afise amabara y'umunywamazi (umukororombya mu kinyarwanda) imbere y'amasengero. Umunyamakuru wa BBC Damien McGuinness i Berlin avuga ko Ekleziya Katolika mu Budagi ifise ubwigenge kandi itunze gusumba ibihugu vyinshi, ibi bikumvikana ko kubona ibitigiri vy'abantu bemera abubakanye basangiye ibitsina bitera vyiyongera muri ico gihugu, bizogorana ingene Vaticano ivyirengagiza. Kuva mu 2017, amategeko araha uburenganzira abubakanye basangiye ibitsina mu Budagi kandi iki gihugu carakuyeho za nyigisho ziswe "inyigisho zo kugarura abafise ingendo ijana ku guhuza ibitsina babisangiye" (gay conversion therapy) ku bana bari musi y'imyaka 18.

headline: Ekleziya Katolika mu Burundi ibona amakenga, CNDD-FDD iti 'Katolika igomba gucanishamwo Abarundi’
text: Ekleziya Katolika mu Burundi isaba Abarundi kwirinda ivyo vyose vyotuma amatora ategekanijwe mu mwaka uza imitima y'Abarundi idatekaniwe. Mw'ijambo ryasomwe kuri uyu wa Mungu 22/09/2019 mu masengero yose ya Katolika mu Burundi, Inama nkuru y'Abepiskopi b'i Burundi bavuga ko batewe amakenga n'ibikorwa bimwe bimwe babona  ko bihagaritse imitima Abarundi batari bake. Abategetsi b'u Burundi bagize iminsi batarabana ryiza n'abarongoye Ekleziya Katolika, bakabagiriza ko bivanga muvya politike, bakanabasaba ko batogira uruhande begamiyeko. Abasenyeri bobo bavuga ko bazokwama bavuga ukuri "n'aho hari aho bishika kukababaza". Mw'iryo tangazo, inama nkuru y'abepiskopi b'i Burundi iragabisha ko mu ntara zitari nke hibonekeza "agatima kabi k'ukuburabuza n'uguhohotera imigambwe imwe imwe n'ugutoteza abanywanyi bayo", mu gihe yemerewe gukorera ku mugaragaro. Bavuga ko ivyo vyiyongera ku mvugo, ku nzandiko n'inyifato "vy'iterabwoba bishobora kubuza amatora kugenda neza". Abo basenyeri bavuga kandi ko hari ubugizi bwa nabi burimwo ubwicanyi bufatiye ku mvo za politike bwibonekeza mu ntara zimwe zimwe. Bati: "Ahatari hake bukorerwa abatavuga rumwe na Leta, kandi ahenshi, ubutungane ntibubanguka ngo bwerekane ko buriko burahana inkozi z'ikibi bukurikije amategeko". Abo basenyeri kandi baratewe amakenga n'ico bita "ugushaka kwitiranya umugambwe uri ku butegetsi n'igisata kijejwe intwaro", bakavuga ko hari ibice bimwe bimwe aho urwaruka ruri muri uyo mugambwe womenga rugomba gusubirira inzego zishinzwe umutekano. Basaba inzego zirongoye igihugu gushinga n'ukwubahiriza amategeko, cane cane irirekurira imigambwe myinshi gukora. Iryo jambo yasohoye ku wa 13 z'uku kwezi kw'icenda ryagiye gukwiragizwa ku mbuga hwaniro imbere y'uko risomwa kuri uyu wa Mungu, rikaba ryarashavuje umugambwe CNDD-FDD uri ku butegetsi. Mu gihe yari muri komine Mugongomanga mu ntara ya Bujumbura ejo ku wa gatandatu, umunyamabanga mukuru w'umugambwe CNDD-FDD, Evariste Ndayishimiye, yabwiye abanyagihugu ko ata yindi ntumbero inama y'abepiskopi ifise atari uguteranya abarundi. « Abungere ba Ekeleziya Katorika bashaka gusubira kuvyimvya imitima y'Abarundi, nkuko babigize mu mwaka wa 2015, imbere y'amatora». Kuri we, iyo amatora yegereje, haba hageze ko bashikiriza amajambo y'ugucanishamwo Abarundi. Evariste Ndayishimiye aranegura kandi ko abungere ka Katolika babona ko amatora ateguwe hakiri impunzi zikiri hanze "kuko babona ko ikibazo catumye bahunga kitaratorerwa umuti". Bwana Ndayishimiye abona ko iyo atari ingorane kuko kuri we, n'ayandi matora yabaye mu myaka yaheze yatunganijwe impunzi zikiri hanze, akababazwa n'uko ko ata tangazo abo bungere ba Ekleziya Katolika bigeze basohora. "Mu matora yo mu 1993, 2005, 2010, impunzi zose zari zarahungutse? Mwarigeze mwumva  itangazo ngo amatora ntashoboka mu masengero kubera impunzi zose zitarahunguka"? Ku bwiwe abavuga ko amatora ashobora kutagenda neza, ni abantu badakunda amatora bashako ko abarundi basubira mu "ntwaro za dyogora duhure". Iryo jambo risohotse iminsi mikeya inyuma y'aho umukuru w'inama nshingamateka, Pascal Nyabenda, asabiye abarongoye Ekleziya ko boreka kwerekana aho bahengamiye mu bijanye na politike muri kino gihe. Hari ku munsi mukuru wa Assomption i Mugera imbere y'isinzi ry'abakirisu bari bavuye mu mihingo yose y''igihugu. Musenyeri Yohakimu Ntahondereye, umuvugizi w'inama y'abepiskopi mu Burundi, nawe ati: "Kubera rivuga ukuri, ijambo ry'Imana hari aho rigera rikababaza, rikamera nka wa mugera w'ukumena igihute, kandi ntidushobora gucisha iruhande".

headline: Karnataka: 'Kwambara hijab ntibigira abagore b'aba-Islam abahohotewe'
text: Nabeela Shaikh yatanguye kwambara hijab afise imyaka 30. Ni we yayambaye ubwa nyuma mu bakobwa batatu bavukana. Mukuru wabo, Muzna, wewe yatanguye kuyambara afise imyaka umunani, avyigiye kuri muvyarawe. Kuva ico gihe yashobora kuyambara bivanye n'abo bari kumwe - guhika aho, nk'uko abivuga, aboneye ko "bitanezereza bose". Mutoyi wabo, Sarah, wewe yatanguye kuyambara "ageze mu bihe bitoroshe" mu buzima bwiwe igihe indoto yiwe yo kuba umuganga yicwa n'amanota mabi yaronse mu kibazo. Ati: "Vyatanguriye ku bintu nko gusenga ku mwanya, Hijab yanjemwo mu nyuma nk'ibintu bisanzwe". Aba bakobwa - bavuka ku baganga - bakuriye mu ntara ya Mumbai y'Ubuhindi iri ku nkengera z'ibahari. Nyina wiwe gushika ubu ntiyitwikira, ariko iyo bobo bitwikiriye abantu bafata ko babikoze ku gahato. Ikibazo - nimba abakobwa bafise uburenganzira bwo kwambara hijab mw'ishure - kiri muri sentare. Ni ikibazo cateje imigumuko, kiracanishamwo abanyeshure mbere kinatuma abakobwa batari bake b'aba-Islam mu ntara ya Karnataka baheba kuja kw'ishure. BBC yavuganye n'abagore b'aba-Islam mu Buhindi, aho bavuga ko bababajwe n'ukubona iki kibazo giteje impari. Umwe muri aba bagore ati: "Twama twibukijwe ko kugira ngo twisanzure, duhebe ibintu vy'amadini". Abahitamwo kwambara hijab bavuga ko batabitumwa gusa n'idini, ariko ko ari umuntu aba yavyiyumviriye. Hanyuma abahitamwo kutayambara nabo bakavuga ko imishatsi yabo atari igipimo c'ukwemera kwabo. N'agatwengo, Nabeela avuga ati: "Abantu ntibatahura ingene umuntu yumva ko akomeye iyo yambaye igitambara ku mutwe. Birabatesha umutwe ugasanga bariko baducira imanza". Guhohoterwa ni ijambo rikunze gukoreshwa ku bagore bambaye hijab - ariko benshi bavuga ko kwanka kwemanga igituma bayambara ataco bibafasha, kandi ukwanka kuyikura atari vyo bituma abakobwa bataja kw'ishure. Uwiyita Nag w'imyaka 27 ava mu gisagara ca Bangalore, avuga ati: "Abagore b'aba-Islam bakiri bato bari mw'ibarabara baharanira uburenganzira bwabo. None ushaka kumbwira ko aba bagore badashobora kwiyumvira bo nyene ubwabo"? Igihe Naq afata ingingo yo kwambara hijab, haraciye imyaka itanu, avuga ko yahuye n'ingorane "zidasanzwe". Ati: "Umwitwikiro wanje washize ahabona ibiri mu mitwe y'abantu. Abantu baguma bankekeza: urahohoterwa? Wumva ushushe? Ukoresha shampo iyahe? Hari abantu bambaza nimba nari mfise imishatsi - bibaza ko mfise kanseri". Abandi bagore b'aba-Islam  - nka Wafa Khatheeja Rahman, umunyamategeko wo mu gisagara ca Mangalore -  avuga ko kutambara hijab kutagabanya ubu-Islam bwabo. Avuga ati: "Sinanse kuyambara kubera itajanye n'ico ndi - kandi nta n'umwe ashobora kuntegeka kuyambara. Ariko kandi, ni nk'uko ata muntu n'umwe yoza ambwira ko ntegerezwa kuyambara". Na nyina wa Wava ntiyigeze yambara hijab - ariko avuga ko yakuranye ukwemera kwose ari kumwe na nyina, yumviriza amakuru y'Intumwa ariko kandi n'ay'abagore bo muri Islam. "Umugore wa mbere w'Intumwa yari umudandaza, mu gihe uwa kabiri yagendesha indogobwe mu ntambara. None wumva koko duhohoterwa nk'uko isi ishaka ko tuvyemera?" Hari igihe Falak Abbas yahora yanka iciyumviro co gupfuka imishatsi yiwe, ikintu kidasanzwe i Varanisi, igisagara co mu buraruko kigendera ku vya kera. Ariko igihe yari afise imyaka 16 akabona Malala Yousafzai, umunya-Pakistan yahawe agashimwe kitiriwe Nobel, ku mboneshakure, yaciye ahinduka. Ati: "Yari yitwikiriye kandi yariyumva ko akomeye cane. Iciyumviro caciye kinzamwo nca mfata ingingo yo kwitwikira nanje". Ishure ryiwe ry'abihebeye Imana ryaravyanse, rikavuga ko hijab itajanye n'umwambaro w'ishure wari ugizwe n'ikanzu ndende n'ipantaro. Falak avuga ko yabujijwe kwinjira mw'ishure imisi itatu - mbere agatakaza n'ikibazo ndondamubiri (biologie) yategerezwa gukora. Yiyamirije iyi ngingo, abategetsi b'ishure baciye batumako abavyeyi biwe baca bamwagiriza ko afise ingeso mbi. Avuga ati: "Bavuze ngo ni nambara hijab nzoteza ingorane, atari kuri jewe gusa, ariko no kw'ishure ryose kuko bose bazoca babona ko ndi umu-Islam. None ingorane iri he kuba umu-Islam?" Ariko rero mu nyuma yahavuye yigarura inyuma y'aho abavyeyi biwe bamusabiye "kutonona amashure yiwe kubera hijab". Inyuma y'imyaka umunani, abonye ivyabaye i Karnataka, avuga ko asubiye kwumva yarengewe "n'ishavu ryinshi". Khadeeja Mangat, ava mu ntara yo mu bumanuko ya Kerala, na we nyene arababajwe n'ukuntu babakurikirana. Umusi umwe ishure ryiwe ryarabujije hijab mu 1997  - ariko iyi ngingo yahavuye ihagarikwa, ariko Khadeela aribaza ingene bizogenda i Karnataka. Ati: "Vyose biri imbere yawe - ibwirizwa shingiro, imico n'induru zacu. Ariko twaremwe kugira ngo kurwanire agateka kacu tudahengeshanya, naho hoba ari ugutakaza amashure". Mu gihe sentare yibanda cane cane ku kibazo co kwambara hijab mw'ishure, abagore b'aba - Islam bafise amakenga ku kungene uru rubanza ruzogenda mu gihugu c'Ubuhindi gitwarwa na reta y'igi-Hindu irongowe n'umushikiranganji wa mbere Narendra Modi. Simeen Ansar ava mu gisagara co mu bumanuko ca Hyderabad, avuga ko hijab iriko irahindurwa ikimenyetso c'ubugumutsi ku "nyungu za poritike". Ati: "Nakuranye n'abakobwa b'aba Hindu bapfuka amaguru yabo mu mwambaro w'ishure, ivyo jewe ntari nitayeho ico gihe gusumba uko nabona ingene abahungu b'aba Sikh bambaye igitambara co mu mutwe". "Ariko iyo haje ikibazo co kwambara hijab, abagore b'aba-Islam bafatwa ukundi. Mba nkiri inyuma kandi mpohotewe iyo ndayambaye, nkaba uwugezweho kandi nisanzuye iyo ntayambaye". Avuga ko we n'uwo bavukana bari batanguye kwambara hijab, ariko bibaka ngombwa ko baca bayiheba kubera abantu batigeze bavyihanganir Mu gihe uwo bavukana yanenwa ku kazi, Simeen avuga ko abantu bamutamarira mu bibanza bitamenyerewe kubonwamwo umugore yambaye hijab - nko mu mazu y'imyimenyerezo ngororamubiri (gym), mu kabare canke ku musi mukuru. Ati: "Ukungene abantu bakubona birashobora koko kuryana umutima". Kandi rero ibi bivugwa na benshi mu bagore b'aba-Islam batari bake - mu gihe hijab ari ikintu abantu bagiye kubona gusumba uko vyari bimeze muri kahise. Ni zo mpungenge zatumye Wafa, n'aho asanzwe atanambara uwu mwitwikiro, akurikirana cane urubanza. Ati: "Naho noba ndi ku kazi, ndambara ama ecouteurs kugira ngo nkurikirane ingene urubanza ruriko ruragenda". Afise amakenga ku kungene ibi bizogira ingaruka ku ncuti n'abagenzi basanzwe bambara uwu mwitwikiro". "Uranyambuye hijab yanje, none hakurikira iki? Izina ryanje riracari iry'icarabu. None nzotegerezwa kurihindura kugira ngo unyubahe"?

headline: Vatican yahinduye amategeko mu ntumbero yo guhasha ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina
text: Papa Francis yahinduye amategeko ya Ekleziya Katorika kugira ngo ahashe mu buryo bweruye ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina. Izi mpinduka mu mategeko mpanavyaha nizo za mbere zikomeye mu kiringo c'imyaka hafi 40. Aya mategeko mashasha ategeka ko ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina, kwosha abana bato mu ntumbero yo kugira imibonano mpuzabitsina nabo, gutunga amareresi y'ubusambanyi bukoresha abana hamwe no guhishirira ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina ko ari ivyaha bihanwa n'amategeko ya Vaticano. Papa avuga ko imwe mu ntumbero ari "kugabanya igitigiri c'ibi vyaha aho... igihano wasanga kigizwe ibanga ry'abategetsi". Integuro y'izi mpinduka mu mategeko ya Ekleziya yafashe imyaka 11 mu baziteguye hakaba harimwo abahinga mu mategeko ya Ekleziya hamwe no mu mategeko mpanavyaha. Kuva mu myaka ya vuba, Ekleziya Katorika irahanzwe n'ibibazo indiri n'indiri vy'abapatiri bagirizwa ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina muri kahise mu mpande zitandukanye z'isi, abategetsi bakuru b'Ekleziya nabo bakabakingira ikibaba. Abakorewe ibi vyaha hamwe n'abanegura Ekleziya bamaze imyaka mirongo bidoga, bavuga ko amategeko yahahora yari yataye igihe, ko yari yakozwe mu ntumbero yo gukingira ababikora kandi ko atari atomoye. Aya mategeko mashasha aje gusubirira impinduka za nyuma zikomeye zari zakozwe na Papa Yohani Paulo wa II (Jean-Paul II) mu 1983. Ashizweho kugira ngo yerekane neza ingingo nyazo kandi zihariye zitegerezwa gufatwa, akanategeka abasenyeri gufata ingingo hagize uwubitura. Aya mategeko azotangura gushirwa mu ngiro kuva ku wa 08 z'ukwa cumi na kabiri uno mwaka. Abuza kandi ukwatira abagore mw'ibanga ry'ubusaserdoti, gufata amajwi y'abirega hamwe na ruswa. Itegeko rya Vaticano ubu riremera ko abakuze co kimwe n'abana bashobora gukorerwa amabi n'abapatiri bakoresha ububasha bafise. Imbere y'aho, Ekleziya yemera ko abantu bakuze bashobora kwemera canke bakanka kubera imyaka y'abo, ntiyigeze yiyumvira ko n'abakuze nabo nyene bashobora gukorerwa ayo mabi, cane cane iyo abashaka kuyabakorera babafiseko ububasha. Iri tegeko rivuga ko umupatiri ashobora gukurwa ku mabanga  mu gihe akoresheje "inguvu, iterabwoba, canke ububasha bwiwe" mu kwishora mu busambanyi. Ku ncuro ya mbere, abalayike (laïcs/laypeople) bafise amabanga muri Ekleziya, na bo nyene barashobora guhanwa ku vyaha vy'ihohotera, nk'akarorero kwirukanwa mu kazi, kurihishwa ihadabu canke bakavanwa mu miryango y'abihebeye Imana begukira. Amategeko mashasha afata nk'icaha "ukwosha" abana canke abakuze batishoboye mu ntumbero yo kubashuhurira mu mareresi y'ibiterasoni ku gitsure. Nibwo bwa mbere Ekleziya yemeye ku mugaragaro ko "ukwosha" (grooming/manipulation sexuelle) ari inzira ikoreshwa n'abasambanyi mu kurondera guhohotera no gusambanya abantu. Iri tegeko kandi ryakuyeho ububasha bwahora buhabwa abategetsi bakuru ba Ekleziya bwo gukingira ikibaba abapatiri bagirijwe ico caha. Ubu, uwo ari we wese azokora ibi azoshobora kwagirizwa urwangara kubera yananiwe no gukora amatohoza hamwe no guhana abasambanya abandi. Musenyeri Filippo Iannone arongoye igisata ca Vaticano gihagarariye izi mpinduka, avuga ko habaye "ugufata minenerwe birengeje urugero amategeko mpanavyaha", aho rimwe na rimwe impuhwe ari zo zashirwa hejuru y'amategeko. Kuva atanguye amabanga mu 2013, Papa Francis yakoze ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo ahangane n'ibirego vy'ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina vyagirizwa abapatiri Mu ntumbero yo gukorera ku mugaragaro gusumba, yarayoboye inama ikomeye mu 2019 yiga ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina ryagirizwa abapadiri, anakuraho itegeko ritabonwa kumwe ryategeka abarongoye Ekleziya kugumya ibanga. Imbere y'aha, muri Ekleziya ivyaha vy'ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina vyagumijwe mw'ibanga, mu vyafatwa nk'utwigoro two kugumiriza ibanga ababikorewe, no gukingira icubahiro c'abagirizwa kubikora. Abayinegura bavuga ko bamwe mu bakuru ba Ekleziya bakoresheje nabi iryo tegeko kugira ngo bakwepe gukorana n'igiporisi mu manza zijanye n'ivyaha vy'ihohotera.

headline: Impirimbanyi zisaba ko kubaga igitsina mu gusubizaho ubusugi bibuzwa n'amategeko
text: Izo mpirimbanyi zisaba zishimitse ko Leta ishirako itegeko ribuza kubaga abakenyezi babasubizako ubusugi. Abakenyezi benshi bo mw'idini rya Islam bahakwa  guharirwa ivomo canke n'ukwicwa bakicwa, iyo abagabo babo canke imiryango yabo imenye ko basambanye imbere yo kwubaka ingo zabo. Bamwe barafata umugambi wo kwivuza, aho abaganga babasubirizako ince bagasubira kuba "amasugi". Ariko hari amakenga ko kubibuza bishobora gutuma abakenyezi bo mw'idini rya Islam baja kwa muganga mu kinyegero ari benshi. Amategeko y'uburongozi  agenga ukuntu umurwayi yemererwa kuvurwa ashobora kugira ico akemwa bishitse uwikekwa akaba yipimishije ku gahato canke yapimishije ku nguvu uwundi muntu. Kubaho mu bwoba Halaleh Taheri, yatanguje ikigo c'abakenyezi bo mu burasirazuba bwo hagati, yabariye igisata ca BBC bita BBC News yuko umunyeshule wo muri Maroke aba mu gisagara ca Londres, yinyegeje inyuma yo kubwirwa ko se wiwe yari yahemvye umuntu amwica. Inyuma yo kuza mu Bwongereza kwiga mu 2014, uyo mukenyezi  ubu afise imyaka 26, yararonse umugabo, baca barabana. Ariko inyuma yo kubona ko imigenderanire hagati yabo itakiri myiza, se wiwe yaciye amusaba gusubira muri Maroke aho yamujanye mu bitaro kugira arabe ko yatakaje ubusugi, aca asanga ince zaraciwe. Yahungiye mu Bwongereza ariko ubu abayeho mu bwoba bw'uko se wiwe ashobora kurondera aho atuye. Umukenyezi yavukiye muri Maroke, afise imyaka 40, yabariye BBC ko inyuma yo kubagwa kugira bamusubirizeko ince, vyamaze amaseconda 20 gusa, akavuga ko atibaza ko yohimiriza abana biwe ngo babikore nk'uko yabikoze. Yagize ati: ''Sinzopfa na gato ndabakoreye  ibintu nk'ivyo. Nzobigisha kubaho bafise ubwisanzure''. Amatohoza yakozwe n'ikinyamakuru Sunday Times yerekana ko muri iki gihe  hari ibitaro 22 vy'abigenga bibaga abakenyezi bikabasubiriza ku bitsina uduhimba twerekana ubusugi, bita mu kirundi ince. Bisaba amafranga ari hejuru  y'ibihumbi 3 vy'ama pound ku mukenyezi umwe, mu gikorwa kimara hafi  isaha imwe. Abo bakenyezi bavugako ibitaro nk'ivyo biriko bironka inyungu ku bantu bo mw'idini rya Islam kubera ubwoba bujanye n'ingaruka zova ku gusanga hari agahaze  mw'ijoro ryo  ku musi w'ubugeni. Igikorwa giteye ubwoba Umushikiranganji ajejwe amagara y'abantu mu Bwongereza, Matt Hancock, agiye kugira ''amatohoza kugira iki gikorwa giteye ubwoba gihagarare'' ariko igisata kijejwe amagara y'abantu  canse kugira ico kivuze ku kuntu kubuza ibi bintu vyoshirwa mu ngiro ku nguvu. Ariko umukenyezi Taheri yavuze ko abakenyezi bashobora n'ugupfa iki gikorwa gihagaritswe hadashizweho ingene bitaho abahora bajayo. Khalid Khan, umwigisha wo muri Kaminuza y'ivy'ubuganga, London School, yashize ku mugaragaro ubwambere uburyo iki gikorwa kiba, yavuze ko kubuza ibi bikorwa atariyo nyishu nziza. Mugihe amakuru ameze neza yari yabonetse ku bagwayi, ingingo zishoboka n'uko boreka abakenyezi bazwi bakabikorerwa. Ndemeza ko intumbero y'abaganga ari ugukingira abantu bakoresheje ubwenge, kugira abagwayi  ntibahohoterwe. Ariko muganga Naomi Crouch aserukira ikigo co mu Bwongereza kijejwe ingwara z'abakenyezi, ku bana n'abayabaga, ababajwe n'abakenyezi hamwe n'abigeme bahimirizwa kuja kwa muganga ku bintu bidafise inyungu n'imwe mu bijanye n'amagara. Avuga ati: ''Ibikorwa vya muganga vyerekanwa n'amategeko yashizweho n'ikigo kigenzura abaganga n'ubuvuzi, GMC'. "Twebwe nk'abahinga bo kwa muganga tugengwa n'ibanga ryo kutagirira nabi abarwayi kandi ingingo ziteye kubiri n'aya mategeko zikurikirwa n'amatohoza hamwe n'ukubicungera neza." Colin Melville, umuyobozi ajejwe imiti akongera akaba n'umuyobozi w'igisata c'indero hamwe n'ibikwiye kugorwa mu kigo GMC yavuze ko ari ngombwa  kubona ubushobozi buke n'imibereho abarwayi bakeneye, ubwambere. Agira ati: ''Ariko bishitse umurwayi agashirwako agasugerezo ko gufata ivyigwa ka naka, ntavyemera bivuye ku gushaka. "Ariko iyo abaganga babonye ko umwana canke umuyabaga adakeneye umuti uhindura umubiri, ntibashobora kuwumushirako''. Ariko ubundi buryo bwo kubaga ibitsina biciye ku kubihindura, nko kugira igitsina gito canke kinini, benshi baguma babikoresha na cane cane abakenyezi bato, bavuye mu migwi minshi yo mu Bongereza. Impirimbanyi zivuga ko bitazwi neza nimba kwivuza mu buryo nk'ubwo bigira akamaro inyuma y'igihe kinini kandi abakenyezi bafise amakenga ajanye n'ubufasha baronka buhagaze ku kubarinda ihahamuka imbere y'uko bemera kubagwa. Taheri yavuze ko abo bakenyezi ku rugero rumwe ntakundi bibona atari igikoresho gikundwa, ahukubonwa nk'abantu. Ku bakenyezi b'abagore b'aba Islamu, ibi rero kubona vyabonetse bibatera isoni  kandi bigiye gutuma bagira ubwobwa bw'ibihano. Ku bandi bigabanije ukunezerererwa imibiri yabo, bigakaburwa n'uko ikibano kibabarira ko ari ibisanzwe.

headline: Papa Francis avuga ko ashigikiye ko abasangiye ibitsina 'bemerwa imbere y'amategeko'
text: Papa Francis avuga ko yiyumvira ko abubakanye basangiye ibitsina bakwiye "kwemerwa imbere y'amategeko". Yashikirije aya majambo ateye kubiri n'amategeko ya Vaticano n'abamuboneye izuba, mw'ireresi yateguwe na Evgeny Afineevsky. Muri iyi reresi yasohotse ubwa mbere kuri uyu wa gatatu, avuga ati: "Abaryamana basangiye igitsina bafise uburenganzira bwo kuba mu muryango. "Ni abana b'Imana kandi bafise uburenganzira bwo kugira umuryango. Nta n'umwe akwiye gutabwa canke ngo agirirwe nabi kubera ico. "Ico tugomba gushiraho ni itegeko ribaha uburenganzira bwo kubana. Gutyo bakaba bakingiwe n'amategeko". Avuga kandi ko "iki arico ahagazeko", aha akaba asa n'uwushaka gufatira ku gihe yari musenyeri mukuru wa Buenos Aires, n'aho yarwanya abubakanye basangiye igitsina imbere y'amategeko, yarashigikiye ko abubakanye basangiye igitsina bakingirwa n'amategeko. Hampande y'ivyo avuga ku bijanye n'ukwemerewa imbere y'amategeko, iyi reresi imwerekana ari mu rusengero ariko atera intege abagabo babiri babana basangiye ibitsina kurera abana babo. Aya majambo avuguruza amajambo yagiye ashikiriza muri kahise ku bijanye n'uburenganzira bw'abahuza ibitsina babisangiye. Mu 2013, mu gitabo On Heaven and Earth (Mw'ijuru no kw'isi), Papa yavuze ko gufata ku rugero rumwe ubugeni bw'abahuza ibitsina babisangiye n'ubw'abubakanye badasangiye ibitsina ko kwoba ari "itituka ry'imico ya kiremwamuntu". Yavuze kandi ko mu gihe ababana bahuje ibitsina bokwemererwa kurondera abo barera "bishobora kugira ingaruka ku bana ... umuntu wese akeneye se w'igitsinagabo na nyina w'igitsinagore bashobora kumufasha kwitahura no kwiyubaka". Umwaka wakurikiye, vyavuzwe ko Papa Francis yashikirije, mu kiganiro, ko ashigikiye y'uko amategeko yemerera abasangiye igitsina kubana, ariko abajejwe kumenyesha amakuru mu biro iwe bakaba barabihakanye. Niho rero mu 2018, Papa Francis yavuze ko "arajwe ishinga" n'abaryamana n'abo basangiye ibitsina mu bapadiri, kandi ko "ari ikibazo gikomeye".

headline: Eritrea yarekuye ivyabona vya Jehovah 28
text: Igihugu ca Eritrea carekuye abayoboke 28 b'idini ry'ivyabona vya Jehovah inyuma yo kurangiza igipfungo cabo. Mu 1994 abayoboke b'iryo dini bose baratswe ubwenegihugu, abakurikira iryo dini bose barahigwa buhongo barapfungwa ata rubanza baciriwe. Kimwe mu vyo bagirizwa kwari kwanka kuja mu myimenyerezo ya gisirikare. Itangazo ry'ivyabona vya Jehovah rivuga ko abayoboke baryo bavuye mw'ibohero muri Eritrea inyuma yo kurangiza igipfungo kiri hagati y'imyaka itanu na 26. Bamwe bapfunzwe bazira kwanka ibitajanye n'ukwemera kwabo - mu gihugu kuja mu myimenyerezo ya gisirikare ari itegeko. Iryo shengero rivuga ko abandi bayoboke baryo 24 bakiri mw'ibohero. Mu 1994 Prezida Isaias Afwerki yatse ubwenegihugu ivyabona vya Jehovah - haciye umwaka umwe abaye umukuru w'ico gihugu cari gihejeje kwikukira. Eritrea ni kimwe mu bihugu bitwaza umukazo kw'isi - nta matora canke inama nshingamateka bibayo, kandi integuroy'ibwirizwa shingiro ntirigera ishirwa mu bikorwa. Amashengero atatu yonyene ni yo yemewe - abakirisu b'abaOrthodoxe, aba Islam b'aba Sunni hamwe n'aba Luther.

headline: Katolika mu Burundi isabwa kutagira aho yegamiye nayo yishura ko izovuga ukuri
text: Leta y'u Burundi irasaba abarongoye Ekleziya Katolika ko batokwerekana aho bahengamiye muvya politike mu nyigisho batanga muri kino kiringo Uburundi bwitegurira amatora ya 2020. Mw'ijambo yashikirije mu birori vy'uguhimbaza umunsi mukuru wa Assomption kw'izina rya Leta ejo ku wa gatanu i Mugera, umukuru w'inama nshingamateka y'Uburundi asaba abarongoye Ekleziya Katolika kuguma hagati na hagati. Ekleziya Katolika yoyo ivuga ko ishikiriza ijambo ry'Imana uko riri. Pascal Nyabenda, umukuru w'inama nshingamateka  avuga ko werekanye aho uhengamiye muvya politike biratsitaza abakristu. Avuga ati: "Umwe wese hano arafise ikiri ku mutima, mugabo iyo tuje mw'isengero twipfuza ko twumva ijambo ry'Imana riduhumuriza, ibisigaye vya politike bihurira hirya no hino turafise iyo tuvyumvira". Yishura ku vyari bihejeje gushikirizwa, Umuvugizi w'inama y'abepiskopi mu Burundi yamenyesheje ko bazovuga ijambo ry'Imana uko riri ata gucisha iruhande. Musenyeri Yohakimu Ntahondereye ati: "Kubera rivuga ukuri, ijambo ry'Imana hari aho rigera rikababaza, rikamera nka wa mugera w'ukumena igihute, kandi ntidushobora gucisha iruhande". Mu kwezi kwa gatandatu kw'uno mwaka, umukuru w'umuryango wa Afrika w'ivugabutumwa wasavye ko amashengero atosubira kwigisha ubutumwa bujanye na politike mu Burundi mu gihe bitegurira amatora ya 2020. Uwurongoye iryo shirahamwe, Aime Pascal Nduwimana, yavuze ko ubutumwa nk'ubwo butuma abantu babura ico bafata n'ico bareka, bamwe bakabona "umengo mw'isengero habaye nko muri permanance mu mugambwe". Ishengero Katolika ryoryo rivuga ko mu gihe ryemewe n'amategeko mu Burundi rifise uburenganzira bwo kwigisha ijambo ry'Imana nk'uko risanzwe ribigira, ariko rikajana n'ibihe abantu barimwo. Umuvugizi w'inama y'abepiskopi mu Burundi, Musenyeri Joachim Ntahondereye, yabwiye BBC ko bigisha ijambo ry'Imana ariko rikajana n'ibihe abantu barimwo.

headline: Jerusalem: Abayahudi biyambika nk’aba Islam ngo bashobore gusenga
text: Bamwe mu ntagondwa z’Abayahudi bavuga amayeri bakoresha ngo binjire muri iyo  sengero Al-Aqsa, rya mbere mu kwemera kwabo. Aba Islam bo babona ko ari agasomborotso, muri ico kibanza kiza ubwa 3 mu kwemera kwabo.

headline: Covid19-Kenya: Musenyeri Peter Ambuka yanebaguye prezida Uhuru Kenyatta
text: Inyuma y'imisi mike reta ya Kenya ihagaritse uruja n'uruza mu ntara zitantu mu ntumbero yo gutuza coronavirus, umuvugabutumwa w'i Nairobi yanebaguye prezida Uhuru Kenyatta kuri iyo ngingo. Musenyeri Peter Ambuka wo mw'ishengero Pefa mu karere a Kahawa West yavuze ati:"Wewe prezida n'abo muri kumwe muri politike ni mwe mukwiye kubazwa ivyerekeye iyaduka ry'ubwo bwoko bushasha bwa coronavirus." Yongeyeko ko abanye Kenya benshi bagiye kumeregwa nabi kubera "ingingo zabo zagiye zirafatwa zitihwejwe neza". Musenyeri Ambuka avuze ati:"Mwabandanije kubaho mu buzima bwanyu bwiza mwifashishije amakori tudasiba gutanga n'igihe tuba twakaje ubuzi." Yavuze ko igihe ibiharuro vy'abandura vyagabanuka mu mpera z'umwaka uheze, Prezida Kenyatta n'umukuru w'abatavuga rumwe na reta Raila Odinga baciye batangura isekeza ryo guhindura ibwirizwa shingiro, ryakoranya abantu benshi. Icegera ca Prezida William Ruto, yiyamiriza ko ibwirizwa shingiro rihinduka na we yarakoze amakoraniro. Vyabaye ibintu "bikomeye bikwiragiza ivyo ngwara, nk'uko Ambuka abandanya abivuga. Uwo musenyeri kandi avuga ko ingingo zishasha ziherutse gushirwaho na prezida zidakwiye zisa n'izishaka kugumiza abanye Kenya mu mazu no mu mukwabu. Yavuze ati:"Isekeza ryo gupima no kwikingira ni ryo rishobora gutuma dusubira mu buzima busanzwe." Muri Kenya abantu bamaze kugwara Covid-19 barenga 130.000, abarenga 2,000 bakaba bamaze gupfa. Mu ndwi iheze, ishirahamwery'abaganga ryavuze ko ibitanda vyuzuye mu bibanza bakiriramwo indembe, vyinshi bikaba vyarimwo abagwayi ba Covid-19.

headline: DRC: 29 baciriwe urwo gupfa ku ruhara bagize mu migumuko ya Eid el Fitr yabaye ku wa kane
text: Abantu 29 baciriwe urwo gupfa mu rubanza rw'abagize uruhara mu migumuko yabaye ku wa kane ku mugwa mukuru wa Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo, Kinshasa igihe aba Islam bari baramutse bahimbaza Eid el Fitr. Umuporisi umwe yarishwe abandi batari bake barakomereka mu mishamirano yadutse hagati y'impande zibiri zitavuga rumwe mw'idini rya Islam. Bari bakoraniye hamwe kugira ngo bahimbaze umusi mukuru urangiza ukwezi kweranda kwa Ramadhani, ariko ntibumvikana ku wari kurongora ibirori. Aba bagiye kumara ubuzia bwabo bwose bapfunzwe kubera igihano c'urupfu kitakibaho muri iki gihugu. Muri iyi migumuko, abantu 31 nibo barengukishijwe, 29 nibo baciriwe urwo gupfa, babiri nabo bacirirwa umunyororo w'imyaka itanu. Uru rubanza rwamaze ijoro ryose  rwerekanywe ku mboneshakure. Abategetsi bavuga ko mu baporisi bakomeretse harimwo abababaye cane n'ubu bakaba bakiremvye. Hari abafise amakenga kuri uru rubanza bafatiye ku kungene rwihutishijwe, bakibaza ko ubutungane butakoze neza.

headline: Kardinali Pell avuga ko ivyiyumviro vyiwe vy'uguharanira imico ya Ekleziya vyatumye yankwa
text: George Pell, umukardinali wo muri Australia yari yaciriwe gupfungwa kubera ivyaha vyo gushurashuza abana ariko aza kwezwa n'ubutungane muri uyu mwaka, avuga ko ivyiyumviro vyiwe vyo guharanira iyubahirizwa ry'imico ya gikristu vyatumye abantu bamwanka. Uyu mukardinali w'imyaka 79 yabwiye BBC ko ata nkeka ko ukuvuga atarya umunwa hamwe n'ivyiyumviro vyiwe  ku bibazo bitari bike, nk'ibijanye no gukorora inda, biri mu vyatumye haduka icuka kibi. Uyu mu kardinali yahoze ari umunyabigega ku cicaro ca Papa i Vaticano avuga ko ibi vyiyumviro vyiwe vyerekana aho ahagaze adashobora kubisabira imbabazi. Urubanza rwiwe rwarahungabanije Ekleziya Gatolika. Uyu mu kardinali, yahoze ari umwe mu bahanuzi bakomeye ba Papa kandi akaba yagumye avuga ko ataco yiyagiriza, yagiye kuva i Vaticano mu 2017 asubira mu ntara yiwe y'amavuko ya Victoria kugira abandanya urubanza rwiwe mu butungane. Mu kiganiro ca mbere ciwe cacishijwe mu binyamakuru mu Bwongereza, Kardinali Pell avuga ko adashobora gusaba imbabazi ku vyiyumviro vyiwe vyerekana aho ahagaze ku mico ya Ekleziya, ariko akaba yarasavye imbabazi "incuro nyinshi" ku vyaha vy'ugushurashuza abana vyakozwe n'abarongoye Ekleziya. Yabwiye Radio 4 ya BBC ati: "Nibaza ko ikibabaje abantu benshi ari uko mvuga ntarya umunwa iyo ndiko ndarwanira inyigisho za Ekleziya". "Ku bijanye n'aho mpagaze bishingiye ku kwemera kwanje, sinshobora kubisabira imbabazi". Abajijwe ku bana bakorewe aya mabi n'ico yibaza ku ngaruka bishobora kubagirako mu buzima, Kardinali Pell avuga ko azi "neza umubabaro barimwo". Avuga ko n'aho yababajwe n'ivyabaye muri Ekleziya, nta mutima wigeze usimba ngo arare adasinziriye. Ati: "Ndababajwe n'umubabaro uri mu bantu benshi, ariko kandi ndishimiye utwigoro twagize muri Australia mu myaka irenga 25 - n'aho tudahagije nk'uko twategerezwa kungana". Kardinali Pell agereranya ibihe yamaze mw'ibohero n'ivyo yamaze mw'iseminari, aho iyi myimenyerezo y'ukwitegurira ubupatiri yarangwamwo n'ibihe bigoye vy'agacerere n'ukwitandukanya n'abandi. Uyu mutegetsi muri Ekleziya Gatorika wo muri Australia, yaramenyekanye cane nk'uwuharanira imico ya Ekleziya Gatorika, akenshi akarwanya impinduka kandi agaharanira ubwerentegerwa bw'abapatiri; Yatumweko i Roma mu 2014 kugira ngo atunganye ikigega ca Vaticano, akaba yafatwa nk'umutegetsi wa Ekleziya agira gatatu. Yakuwe muri ayo mabanga mu 2017 kugira ngo yisigure ku vyaha vy'uko yafashe ku nguvu abaririmvyi babiri b'abahungu igihe yari Musenyeri mukuru wa Melbourne. Mu kw'icumi na kabiri 2018, yaragiriwe n'ibi vyaha vyo gusambanya aba baririmvyi babiri b'abahungu bari bafise imyaka 13 mu myaka ya1990. Niwe mutegetsi wa mbere wo ku rwego rwo hejuru muri Ekleziya Gatorika yari yagiriwe n'iki caha. Sentare yumvirije umugabo umwe yavuga ko ari we yari akiri muzima mu bakorewe ayo mabi. Hari ibindi vyabona bitari bike vyagiye bitanga ivyemezo. Kardinali Pell yarunguruje urubanza muri sentare y'iyungururizo ya Victoria mu mwaka uheze, ariko abacamanza baranse kwisubirako. Sentare nkuru ya Australia yarasambuye urwo rubanza mu kwa kane uno mwaka, ihagarika umunyororo w'imyaka itandatu yari yaciriwe. Igihe yungururiza muri iyo sentare nkuru, uyu mutegetsi muri Ekleziya yavuze ko abacamanza bisunze ahanini ibirego vy'umwe mu bakorewe ivyo vyaha akiri muzima. Abamuburanira ntibashatse kubeshuza ivyo birego, ariko bakavuga ko bategerezwa kwiga n'ivyo bindi vyemezo . Iyo sentare igizwe n'abantu indwi yahavuye imweza, mu ngingo yayo ikaba yavuze ko hari "ibindi vyemezo vyerekana ko uwagirizwa ashobora kuba atavyo yakoze". Ico gihe, Kardinali Pell yavuze ko akarenganyo "gatorewe umuti" kandi ko ata nzigo afitiye uwamwagirije. Yabonanye na Papa Francis mu kw'icumi, bukaba bwari bwo bwa mbere abonanye nawe kuva sentare imukuyeko ico caha.

headline: Chelsea: Roman Abramovich avuga ko agiye kugurisha uyu murwi
text: Nyene umurwi wa Chelsea Roman Abramovich avuga ko ategura kuwugurisha. Mw'itangazo ryacishijwe ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi rwa Premier League (ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza), uyu mugwizatunga Abramovich avuga ko vyabaye ngombwa ko afata "iyi ngingo itoroshe" kandi ko imubabaje. Uyu Murusiya ntazorondera gusubizwa "ingurane izo ari zo zose yahaye uyu murwi" akavuga kandi ko ibizova mw'iri gurishwa bizofashishwa abazoba bagizweko ingaruka n'intambara. Ku wa gatandatu, Abramovich yari yatangaje ko yagomba ashire mu minwe y'abajejwe ubugiraneza "uburongozi bw'uyu murwi" inyuma y'igitero Uburusiya bwakoze kuri Ukraine. Ibi vyatumye haba abenshi babona ko Abramovich - yari yaguranye uyu murwi amafaranga y'Ubwongereza (Pound/£) arenga imiriyoni 1.5 - yashobora kugurisha uyu murwi, umutunzi ruhebwa Hansjorg Wyss akaba yabwiye ikinyamakuru Blick co mu Buswisi ejo ku wa gatatu ko ari mu bahawe amahirwe yo kugura uyu murwi. Wyss avuga ko Abramovich ashaka "kwikurako Chelsea vuba bwango" inyuma y'aho bamwe mu nama nshingamateka y'Ubwongereza basabiye ko yofatirwa ibihano. Abramovich w'imyaka 55 avugwa ko ari incuti ya hafi cane na Perezida Vladimir Putin, ivyo wewe ahakana. BBC Sport yamenye ko Abramovich amaze kuronka abamwegera bamusaba kugura Chelsea kandi ko ashira uyu murwi ku kiguzi c'imiriyaridi zirenga zitatu z'ama-pound. Mw'itangazo ryiwe, Abramovich avuga ati: "Namye mfata ingingo mfise ku mutima ineza y'uyu murwi. "Muri iki gihe, nafashe rero ingingo yo kugurisha uyu murwi, kuko nibaza ko iyi ari yo neza nyamukuru y'umurwi, y'abafana, y'abakozi, hamwe kandi n'abasanzwe bayifata mu mugongo. "Igurishwa ry'uyu murwi ntirizokwihutishwa, ariko rizokurikiza amategeko. Sinzohava nsaba ngo bansubize ingurane. "Nategetse abantu banje gushiraho ishirahamwe ry'ubutabazi rizocishwamwo ibizova muri iri gurishwa kugira bifashishwe abo bizoba bigenewe. Iri shirahamwe rizofasha abagizweko ingaruka n'intambara yo muri Ukraine". BBC Sport yamenye ko abajejwe ibikorwa vy'ubugiraneza muri uyo murwi batari bwemere kuwufata mu minwe, kandi ko batazohava basabwa kwakira aya mabanga. Abramovich yaraneguwe kubera mw'itangazo rya mbere ryo ku wa gatandatu atigeze ashiramwo ibijanye n'igitero c'Uburusiya muri Ukraine. Abakinyi ba Chelsea ntibamenyeshejwe imbere y'igihe ibijanye n'iri tangazo rishasha rya nyene umurwi, ryasohowe hasigaye ikiringo kiri musi y'isaha ngo uyu murwi uhure na Luton Town mu rukino rw'igice ca gatanu gishira ica nyuma mw'ihiganwa ry'igikombe ca FA. N'aho mu ntango wabanje guterwa ibitsindo, uyu murwi wa Premier League warivyukiranije maze utahukana intsinzi ya 3-2 yawuhaye uburenganzira bwo kwinjira mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma. Abramovich yaguze Chelsea mu  2003 ku miriyoni 140 z'ama-pound, mw'itangazo ryiwe akavuga ko atari yayiguze "ku nyungu z'urudandazwa canke z'amafaranga, ariko kubera ugukunda umukino n'umurwi". Hari abandi batunzi b'Abarusiya bamaze gufatirwa ibihano n'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya aho amatungo yabo yafatiriwe. Muri bo harimwo umutunzi ruhebwa Alisher Usmanov asanzwe afitaniye amasezerano y'ubucuruzi na Everton. Reta y'Ubwongereza ntirafatira ibihano Abramovich canke Usmanov, ariko umushingamateka wo mu mugambwe w'Abakozi  Chris Bryant yabwiye inama nshingamateka ku wa kabiri ko Abramovich yari afise "ubwoba bwinshi cane ko yahava afatirwa ibihano ari naco gituma agiye kugurisha inzu yiwe abamwo ejo [ku wa gatatu], co kimwe n'iyindi nzu yiwe". Ejo ku wa gatatu, mu bibazo vyariko bibazwa umushikirangani wa mbere, umukuru w'umugambwe w'Abakozi Keir Starmer yabajije igituma Abramovich atari bwafatirwe ibihano, Boris Johnson akaba yishuye ko "atari vyiza kuvuga ku muntu uwo ari we wese muri uno mwanya". Umuvugizi w'uwo mutunzi arahakana ibivugwa n'umukuru w'uyu mugambwe, akavuga ko Abramovich ata caha na kimwe yakoze cotuma ahanwa. Wyss avuga kandi ati: "Abramovich ariko aragerageza kugurisha amazu yiwe yose mu Bwongereza, be no kwikurako Chelsea vuba bwango. "Jewe n'abandi batatu twarahawe uburenganzira ku wa kabiri bwo kugurira Abramovich uyu murwi wa Chelsea". Umuvugizi wa  Abramovich yanse kugira ico ashikirije kuri ibi bivugwa.

headline: Diego Maradona: Umukenguzamateka wa Argentina asaba ko inoti nshasha ijako Maradona
text: Umukenguzamateka wa Argentine yasavye ko isanamu y'uwahoze ari rurangiranwa mu mupira w'amaguru Diego Maradona yoshirwa ku noti nshasha. Maradona, uyu mukinyi yari kizigenza w'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Argentine igihe itsindira igikombe c'isi yose mu 1986, yasandavye afise imyaka 60 mu ndwi zibiri ziheze. Ejo ku wa mbere, umukenguzamateka Norma Durango yashikirije integuro y'iri tegeko inama nshingamateka ayisaba ko isanamu y'uyu mukinyi yoshirwa ku noti y'igihumbi c'amapeso (amahera akoreshwa muri Argentine), ikaba ari yo noti nini mu gihugu. Avuga ko uruhande rumwe rw'iyi noti rwokwerekana isura ya Maaradona, urundi ruhande narwo rukerekana kimwe mu bitsindo vyiwe vyabaye karuhariwe. Ikinyamakuru La Nación candika ko iyi nteguro y'iri tegeko ivuga ko izi noti "zoba ziriko isanamu ya Diego Armando Maradona ku ruhande rumwe, ku rundi naho hakajako isanamu y'igihe yinjiza Ubwongereza igitsindo ca kabiri, muri Mexico ku wa 22 z'ukwa gatandatu 1986". Uyu mukenguzamateka kandi asaba ko isanamu yiwe yoshirwa ku ma timbres. Umupfasoni Durango ati: "Iki ciyumviro nticerekeye ukwibuka gusa iki gihangange cacu, ariko kandi twiyumvire no ku butunzi. Twumva ko ingenzi zogendera igihugu cacu, uko vyogenda kwose, zoshima kugenda zitwaye 'Maradona' iwabo". Ibitsindo bibiri bikomeye gusumba ibindi vya Maradona yavyinjije Ubwongereza mu rukino rw'igice ca kane gishira icanyuma mw'ihiganrwa ry'igikombe c'isi yose. Uyu mukinyi niwe yari kizigenza w'umurwi igihe Argentine itsindira iri higanwa. Yibukirwa ku gitsindo ca mbere yinjije "n'Ukuboko kw'Imana" acinjiza Ubwongereza, akaza mbere n'ukwiyongera ikindi kigira kabiri. Muri ino nteguro rero, ni uko iki gitsindo kigira kabiri ari co cokwerekanwa ku noti. Umupfasoni Durango avuga ko ingingo ya nyuma izofatwa n'abashingamateka, biteze kwiga iki ciyumviro ciwe mu ntango z'umwaka uza. Uyu yahoze ari umukinyi rurangiranwa yahitanywe n'indwara y'umutima ari muhira iwe ku myaka 60 mu mpera z'ukwezi guheze. Mu ntango z'ukwezi kwa cumi na rimwe, Maradona  yari yabazwe mu bwonko, akaba yategerezwa kuvurwa indwara zaturutse ku nzoga nyinshi. Mu nkino 91 yakiniye Argentine, yinjije ibitsindo 34, akaba yayikiniye mu mahiganwa ane yose y'igikombe c'isi yose.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru i Bulaya 17.07.2019: Rose, Ceballos, Fernandes, Eriksen, Soares, Saliba
text: Umukinyi wo hagati wa Real Madrid, Dani Ceballos w'imyaka 22 ari hafi gushira igikumu ku masezerano na Arsenal. (Mundo Deportivo) Umukinyi wa Tottenham na Danemark, Christian Eriksen w'imyaka 27, ni umwe mu bakinyi baronderwa na Atletico Madrid isanzwe iriko irondera umukinyi ashobora gukina hagati. (Evening Standard) Umukinyi w'inyuma ku ruhande rw'ibubamfu wa Tottenham n'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubwongereza, Danny Rose w'imyaka 29, ntazojana n'umurwi wiwe muri Singapour, mu gihe bivugwa ko ashobora kugurishwa. (Telegraph) Manchester United yatanze amahera menshi kugira ngo ishobore kuronka umukinyi wo hagati Bruno Fernandes w'imyaka 24  wa Sporting Lisbon. (Mirror) Barcelona iripfuza kugura umukinyi w'inyuma ku ruhande rw'i bubamfu, Junior Firpo w'imyaka 22 wa Real Betis, kugira ngo asubirire Jordi Alba. (Marca) Arsenal yarungitse umuganga wayo muri Brezili kugira yihweze amagara y'umusatirizi Everton Soares w'imyaka 23 asanzwe akina mu murwi Gremio, bikaba bivugwa ko yoba iri hafi gushika ku mwumvikano n'uyo murwi kugira ishobore kumugura.  (Fox Sports via Metro) Umukinyi w'inyuma, William Saliba w'imyaka 18 aripfuza kwimukira muri Arsenal ariko umurwi wiwe, Saint-Etienne wipfuza kumugurisha mu bakeba bayo, Tottenham, batanze amahera menshi. (The sun) Cardiff City isa n'iyateye intambwe mu biganiro n'umurwi wa Bordeaux wo mu Bufaransa ku mukinyi Younousse Sankhare w'imyaka 29, akomoka muri Senegali, uyo mukinyi akaba atajanye na bagenziwe muri Amerika mu nkino z'ukwitegurira ihiganwa ryimirije.  (Wales Online) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Atalanta mu Butaliyano, Gianluca Mancini w'imyaka 23 ariko yitegura kwimukira mu murwi wa Roma wo muri ico gihugu ku mafaranga arenga imiliyoni 23 z'amapawundi. (Gazzetta dello Sport ) Liverpool yashize ku rutonde Andy Linergan w'imyaka 35 mu nkino z'imyiteguro muri Amerika y'Uburaruko, kubera ubukene bw'abanyegori. (Daily Mail) Ayavugwa ejo ku wa kabiri Leicester yemereye umukinyi w'inyuma wayo Harry Maguire w'imyaka 26 ko ashobora kwigira mu gihe hagati ya Manchester United na Manchester City hogira uwutanga amahera menshi gusumba ayo Liverpool yatanze ku Munyaholande Virgil van Dijk (imiliyoni 75 z'amapawundi). (Telegraph) Umusatirizi wa Paris St-Germain Neymar w'imyaka 27 yashimangiye icipfuzo ciwe c'ukuva muri uwo murwi mu mubonano yagiranye n'uwujejwe ukwinonora imitsi, Leonardo . (ESPN) Mu kiringo kitarenze indwi zitatu ziri imbere, Manchester United iriteguye gutanga amahera ku murwi Sporting Lisbon kugira ngo irabe ko yoronka umukinyi wawo wo hagati Bruno Fernandes w'imyaka 24 (Independent). Arsenal iracari mu biganiro n'umurwi Celtic kugira ngo ishobore kugura umukinyi w'inyuma ku ruhande rw'ibubamfu, Kieran Tierney, inyuma y'aho uwo murwi wankiye igiciro kigira kabiri c'imiliyoni 25 z'amapawundi yari yatanze. (Evening Standard) Arsenal kandi ntizoshobora kuronka umukinyi wo hagati w'umurwi Lyon akomoka mu Burafansa, Nabil Fekir w'imyaka 25, kubera vyanse ko igurisha Mesut Ozil afise imyaka 30. (L'Equipe, via Sun)

headline: Lionel Messi: Kizigenza wa Barcelone yipfuza kuzokina muri US
text: Kizigenza wa Barcelone, Lionel Messi avuga ko yipfuza ko umusi umwe yokina muri Amerika ariko ko azomenya kazoza kiwe amasezerano afitaniye n'uwo mugwi arangiye mu kwezi kwa gatandatu. Uwo munye Argentine w'imyaka 33, ashobora gutangura ibiganiro n'iyindi migwi mu kwezi kwa mbere. Ibihuha kuri kazoza kiwe ni vyinshi kuva igihe asabiye kuva muri uwo mugwi mu kwezi kw'umunani. Messi yabwiye imboneshakure yo muri Espagne ya Sexta ati:"Ubu sindamenya ico ngiye gukora." "Ngiye kurindira gushika uwu mwaka uhere. Nari nipfuza gukina muri Amerika, mpindure ubuzima nje no mu rindi higanwa rya hariya, ariko ngaruke I Barcelone ndabishoboye. "Ubu ikintu gihambaye cane n'ukwitaho umugwi, duheze uyu mwaka neza, n'ugushira inguvu mu kugerageza gutwara ibikombe, tukareka gusamazwa n'ibindi bintu." Umugwi wa Barcelone utatwaye n'igikombe na kimwe mu mwaka uheze, ugira uwa gatanu mw'ihiganwa ryo muri Espagne, inyuma yo gutangura nabi ihiganwa mu myaka 33. Kuva agiye muri uwo mugwi afise imyaka 13, Messi ni we amaze gutsindira ibitego vyinshi uwo mugwi, atwara ibikombe 10 vy'ihiganwa ryo muri Espagne, bine vy'imigwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo ku mugabane wa buraya, hamwe n'umupira w'inzahabu - uhabwa umukinyi wa mbere mwiza kw'isi - incuro 6. Ugusaba kwiwe kuva muri uwo mugwi wa Barcelone mw'ici riheze, kutabonwa kumwe na bose, kwatumye haba uguterana amajambo n'uwatwara uwo mugwi ico gihe, Josep Maria Bartomeu, yatanze imihoho mu kwezi kw'icumi. Messi yavuze ko intwaro ya Bartomeu cari "ikiza". Yongeyeko ati:"N'ibihe bigoye ku mugwi, ku muntu uwo ari we wese, ariko abari hagati mu mugwi barazi ko ari igihe kigoye cane, ibintu vyifashe nabi kandi bizogorana kugarukana umugwi aho wahora."

headline: Aho Chelsea itsindiye Champions League, Mason Mount ati 'turi umurwi wa mbere ukomeye kw'isi'
text: Mason Mount arashimagiza Chelsea aho avuga ko ari wo "murwi wa mbere ukomeye kw'isi" inyuma y'aho aba Blues bakubitiye Manchester City mu rukino rwa nyuma rwa Champions League. Umukinyi w'imbere w'umudagi Kai Havertz niwe yinjije igitsindo kimwe rudende c'urwo rukino rwa nyuma rwakiniwe i Porto muri Portugal cahaye itsinzi igira kabiri aba Blues (izina rihabwa umurwi wa Chelsea) muri iryo higanwa yatsindiye ku ncuro ya mbere mu 2012. Mu ntango z'uyu mwaka w'inkino urangiye,  City yatanguye gukina irondera gutwara ibikombe bine vyose mu mwaka umwe, ariko rero Chelsea ikaba yabanje kuyihumira mu gikombe c'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Bwongereza (FA Cup). Mount ati: "Turi muri finale kandi twayitsindiye. Ni iteka ridasanzwe". Uyu mukinyi Mount wo hagati, ari nawe yatanze umupira wavuyemwo iki gitsindo, yabwiye ikinyamakuru c'inkino BT Sport ati: "Si mbona amajambo nokoresha. Sindavyumva. Narakinye inkino zibiri za nyuma za Chelsea zose turazitsindwa. Iki nico kintu narondera, Gutsindira igikombe muri Chelsea". "Mu rugendo rwose rwa Champions League twagiye dukina inkino zigoye cane. Ubu muri kino gihe, turi umurwi wa mbere ukomeye kw'isi. aho nta n'umwe ashobora kutwaka iri teka". Mount yarashizwe ku rutonde mfatakibanza rw'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubwongereza mw'ihiganwa ry'igikombe ca Buraya mu ci (European Championship), kandi uko vyogenda kwose azokina iryo higanwa, kumwe n'abandi bakinyi bagenziwe bakinanye muri uru rukino rwa nyuma. Yongerako ati: "Bamwe muri aba bahungu ba City tuzoba turi kumwe kandi ndazi ko kizoba ari ikintu kitoroshe. Naraganiriye na bo, bari babikwiriye gushika hano". "Ntivyoroshe kuri bo ariko ndizeye ko mu mwaka w'inkino uza, tuzokora uko dushoboye kugiradushike ku kintu muri Premier League naho nyene." Kizigenza Cesar Azpilicueta arishimira "umusi udasanzwe, udasanzwe na gato" akaba yabwiye BT Sport ati: "[Kai Havertz] ntiyahahamutse. Si n'ico gusa. Afise umuvuduko udasanzwe. Nico gituma yashitse kuri ibi". "Nashitse hano mu 2012 inyuma y'irya ntsinzi yo muri Champions League. Naripfuza gusubira kuronka intsinzi nk'irya. Ni ibintu biryoshe cane. Umuryango wanje uri hano. Ni umusi udasanzwe, udasanzwe na gato". Kuva ashitse i Stamford Bridge avuye muri Bayer Leverkusen mu ci riheze,  Havertz ntiyorohewe, yagumye arwana kugira ashobore gushika ku rugero rwiza ariko kandi arondera kwiyubaka inyuma y'aho yanduriye Covid-19. Inyuma y'iyi ntsinzi yavuze ati: "Narihanganye imyaka 15 yose kugira nshike hano, ico narondera ngiye ndagishikako". Umukinyi wo ku ruhande rw'ibubamfu w'Umwongereza Ben Chilwell ni uwundi mukinyi yaguzwe n'uwahoze amenyereza uyu murwi Frank Lampard mu ci riheze. Uyu mukinyi yahoze akinira Leicester yaracitse intege mu rukino rwa nyuma rw'igikombe ca FA rwagiye gutsindwa n'uyo murwi yahoze akinira, aho yinjije igitsindo muri wa mwanya w'agasunuzo ariko kigafutwa, maze aba Foxes (umurwi wa Leicester) uterura igikombe. Chilwell ati: "Uno musi twarwanye urugamba rutoroshe. Twari tuzi neza ko ari urukino rukomeye. Mu gice ca kabiri twakinye nk'abita kugira dushike muri uyu mwanya, tugire uyu munezero. Iki ni co canzanye muri Chelsea. Ni indoto yagiye mu ngiro". "Ica ngombwa kwari ukwitanga. Hageze igihe ndumva ko ndushe ariko iyo uriko ukina uzi ko utegerezwa gutsindira Champions League, ntavyo kuruha". "Buri muntu yarwanira ubuzima bwiwe. Twatsindiye igikombe ca Champions League, rero ikindaje ishinga si ingene twakinye". Thomas Tuchel yarashoboye guhindura Chelsea inyuma y'aho asubiriye Lampard nk'umumenyereza, akaba atsindiye ihiganwa ry'imirwi rya mbere i Buraya mu nkino ziwe 30 zonyene muri uyo murwi. Iyi ntsinzi ije haciye umwaka ashikanye Paris St-Germain mu rukino rwa nyuma nyene rwa Champions League, aho yatsinzwe na Bayern Munich. Yabwiye BT Sport ati: "Ni ukuri ni ibintu biryoshe. Twatsinze. Wow. Sinzi ingene nobivuga". "Ni umunezero kuri jewe kubona nshitse ubwa kabiri muri finale. Numva ndi uwundi muntu". "Abakinyi bari biyemeje ko bategerezwa gutsinda uru rukino. twashaka kubabera ifuri ry'igiti. Twabandanije dutera intege bose, bahagarare rugabo kugira berekane ubutwari bwabo, bongere basatire". "Rwari urukino rutoroshe, rw'inguvu nyinshi. Twategerezwa gufatana mu nda". Uyu mudagi Tuchel yari yahawe amasezerano y'amezi 18 yonyene igihe ashika muri uyu murwi mu kwa mbere, kandi akaba yagiye kubonana ubwa mbere na nyene umurwi Roman Abramovich amaso mu yandi ejo urukino ruheze. Ati: "Kumbure ngiye guhabwa ayandi masezerano kubera iyi ntsinzi. Mpejeje kuvugana na Roman ubu nyene kandi kari akanyamuneza kubona tubonanye ubwa mbere, cari igihe ciza,  ariko nta wubizi kumbure cari igihe kibi, nta wuzi ko ibintu bitagiye kuba bibi gusumba". Uwahoze ari umusatirizi wa  Chelsea Chris Sutton kuri BBC Radio 5 Live ati: "I Porto vyari bimeze neza cane, biteye ubwoba, bazibiye neza, neza cane. Chelsea yari iteye ubwoba. Ni ukuri iyi ntsinzi bari bayikwiye, iyo hoho Werner ashobora gutera ikindi, vyari kuba ibinti bintu". "Kai Havertz nta bintu birengeje yerekanye muri uno mwaka, ariko yashoboye gutsinda igitsindo gikomeye. Barateguwe neza bakaba bashoboye gukora ico bajejwe. Ni ikintu kidasanzwe kuri Chelsea na Thomas Tuchel. "Umuntu yaribaza iyo azoshobora gushikana uyu murwi none raba yawushikanye ku ntsinzi ya Champions League. Iki nico gikombe Pep Guardiola yarondera ariko urabona ko atashoboye gukora uko yategerezwa muri iri joro". Uwahoze ari umukinyi w'inyuma wa Manchester United Rio Ferdinand kuri BT Sport: "Gukora nk'ivyo akoze ushitse mu murwi hagati mu mwaka ntaho bitandukaniye n'ukuba umumago (magician/magicien)". "Bagumye bashize hamwe, yaba umurwi  canke abakinyi ku giti cabo, twagumye tubafiseko amakenga ariko uno musi bari bariye amavubi". "Yaraje muri kino gihugu ahura na Pep Guardiola incuro zitatu zose muri uno mwaka kandi zose yarazitsinze". Joe Cole na we yahoze akina muri Chelsea kuri BT Sport ati: "Jewe nari niyicariye mubafana, kuva kuri  Edouard Mendy [umunyegori] gushika ku wa nyuma muri uyo murwi, bose ni incungu. "Rwari urukino rudasanzwe na gato. Kuri jewe, aba bahungu bose ni intwari".

headline: Ibivugwa mu mupira w'amaguru i Buraya ku wa gatatu 03.02.2021: Messi, Neymar, Mbappe, Sancho, Alli, Hakimi
text: Umumenyereza wa Barcelone Ronald Koeman avuga ko "afise ukwizera ariko  atazi neza" ko umukinyi w'imbere wa Argentine, Lionel Messi w'imyaka 33, azoguma muri uwo mugwi muri uyu mwaka.  (Athletic - subscription required) Amasezerano ya Messi ya miriyoni 492£ (£:pound) bari bafitaniye na Barcelone azorangirana n'uyu mwaka, hakaba harimwo agace kamurekurira kuva muri uwo mugwi ata nzitizi mu gihe intara ya Catalogne yoronka ubwigenge. (El Mundo, via Mail) Umukinyi w'imbere wa Brezil, Neymar, w'imyaka 28, azoshira umukono ku masezerano mashasha y'imyaka ine n'umugwi uza mu kibanza ca mbere mu Bufaransa, Paris St - Geramain.  (Goal) PSG yarerekanye ko ifise umugambi wo gusubira guhuza Neymar n'uwo bahoze bakinana mu mugwi Barcelone, Messi, ku kibuga ca Parc des Princes. (Metro) Ariko rero, uwo mukinyi w'imbere w'Ubufaransa, Kylian Mbappe w'imyaka 22, vyitezwe ko amasezerano bafitaniye na PSG arangira mu 2022, ntarafata ingingo kuri kazoza kiwe. (ESPN) Manchester United ishobora kuba yipfuza umukinyi w'imbere wa Borussia Dortmund ava mu Bwongereza Jadon Sancho, w'imyaka 20, inyuma yo gushima umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Cote d'Ivoire, Amad Diallo, kuva aje ava mu mugwi wa Atalanta. Umukinyi w'imbere wa Dortmund wo muri Norvege Erling Braut Haaland, w'imyaka 20, hamwe n'umunyezamu wa Sevilla wo mu Bufaransa Jules Kounde, w'imyaka 22, ni bo uwo mugwi wipfuza cane. (Express) Icipfuzo ca Arsenal co kugura umunyezamu Junior Firpo wo muri Espagne w'imyaka 24, caramiriwe kure na Barcelone. (RAC1, via Metro) Uwurongoye umugwi wa Tottenham Daniel Levy yankiye umugwi wa PSG gutwara umukinyi wo hagati wo mu Bwongereza Dele Alli, w'imyaka 24, kubera igikomere afise gituma atamera neza.  (Telegraph) Arsenal, Chelsea na Manchester City bose barashaka umukinyi w'inyuma i buryo wa Inter Milan, wo mu gihugu ca Maroc, Achraf Hakimi,w'imyaka 22,  uyu mwaka. (Calciomercato - in Italian) Umukinyi w'imbere akiri muto wo mu gihugu ca Ireland, Sinclair Armstrong w'imyaka 17, vyavuzwe ko ashobora kuja muri Manchester City, Celtic na Crystal Palace, vyitezwe ko ashira umukono ku masezerano mashasha n'umugwi wa Queens Park Rangers. (TalkSport) Real Madrid iriteguye kugurisha umukinyi w'imbere wo muri Brezil Vinicius Junior, w'imyaka 20, uyu mwaka. (AS - in Spanish) Umukinyi w'imbere wa Arsenal wo mu Bwongereza Folarin Balogun, w'imyaka 19, ashobora kuva muri uwo mugwi akaja gukina ahandi atagisabwe gushika mu mpera z'uyu mwaka. (Express) Umumenyereza wa Leicester City Brendan Rodgers agiye kuguma acunze ko isoko ry'abakinyi risubira kwugururwa kandi. (Independent) Uwahoze akinira umugwi wa Liverpool n'Ubwongereza Daniel Sturridge, w'imyaka 31, ariko araronderwa cane n'imigwi ya MLS ariko wewe ariko arondera gusubira mu Bwongereza. (Mail) Ukinyi w'inyuma wa Marseille wo muri Croatia Duje Caleta - Car, w'imyaka 24, afise agahinda kenshi inyuma y'aho ikiringo co guhanahana abakinyi kirangiriye adashoboye kwimukira mu mugwi wa Liverpool. (Mail, via Mirror) Umugwi wa Fulham wagurishije umukinyi wawo, Aboubakar Kamara, w'imyaka 25, kw'ideni na Dijon ku musi wa nyuma wo guhanahana abakinyi, inyuma y'aho uwo mufaransa yankiye kuja mu myimenyerezo.  (Mail)

headline: FIFA yahagaritse Prezida wa CAF Ahmad imyaka itanu
text: Ahmad, umukuru w'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru muri Afrika (CAF), yahagaritswe imyaka itanu na FIFA kubera kurenga ku mategeko atandukanye ajanye n'inyifato nziza. Uwo mugabo asanzwe ari icegera c'umukuru w'urwego nshingwantwaro rwa FIFA, w'imyaka 60, yahamwe n'icaha co kurenga ku mategeko ajanye no kwizigirwa ku kazi, gutanga no kwakira utuganuke, gukoresha nabi ikibanza arimwo hamwe no gukoresha nabi ubutunzi bw'iryo shirahamwe. Itangazo ryashikirijwe na FIFA rigira riti: "Amatohoza yakozwe ku nyifato ya Ahmad … kuva mu 2017 gushika mu 2019 yerekeye ibintu vyinshi bijanye n'intwaro muri Caf, harimwo itegurwa n'irihwa ry'urugendo rweranda yagize i Maka [Mecca], uruhara yagize mw'ikorana rya Caf n'ishirahamwe ridandaza ibikoresho vyo kwinonora imitsi, Tactical Steel, hamwe n'ibindi bikorwa." Mu kwezi guheze, igisata ca BBC Sport Africa cari camenyesheje ko ihagarikwa ryiwe rishobora kuba igihe ico ari co cose. Yaciwe kandi amande y'amadolari ya Amerika 200.000. Yaramaze guhakana ko ata tegeko yarenze. Ashobora kwunguruza muri sentare ijejwe kwihweza ingorane zadutse muri 'Sport', Court of Arbitration for Sport (CAS), igihe azoba amaze kumenya neza ivyo bafatiyeko mu gufata iyo ngingo, bikaba bishobora gufata ikiringo c'imisi 60. Mu kwezi guheze, uwo yahoze arongoye ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru muri Madagascar, yaramenyesheje ko ashaka kwitoreza ikiringo ca kabiri  mu gihe amatora ya CAF ategekanijwe mu kwezi kwa gatatu. Aha hari amadidane kuri Ahmad yatorewe kurongora CAF mu 2017, kuko ategerejwe kubanza gutorera inyishu ikibazo c'isubira gutorwa, kugira abandanye amabanga yiwe mu kanama karongoye FIFA. Kugira asubire gutorwa ntibizovana gusa n'uko yatsinze urubanza mw'iyungururizo muri CAS, ahubwo n'ukuraba ko urwo rubanza rwoburanishwa hakiri kare kugira aje ku rutonde rw'abazohiganwa. Ahmad yabaye arakinjura mu mabanga yo kurongora CAF, avuga ko abitewe n''ibibazo vy'amagara' mu gihe yaheruka kugwara coronavirus, asiga icegera ciwe ca mbere, Constant Omari, ari we aramutswa iryo shirahamwe.

headline: Iran Vs US: Kubera iki Iran yahaye amashurwe abakinyi ba Amerika mu 1998?
text: N﻿a Bernd Debusmann Jr BBC News, Washington Mu gihe harangwa icuka kibi, kw’isi ibintu bimeze nabi, urukino rwaheruka hagati ya Irani na Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu 1998 rwatangujwe n’ikimenyetso kidasanzwe – amashurwe yera. Aya mashurwe, nk’uko umumenyereza wa Irani ico gihe yabivuze, cari ikimenyetso c’amahoro imbere y’urukino rwahuje ibi bihugu mu Bufaransa. Imyaka 20 inyuma y’aha, icuka kibi carasubiye kurenga urugero imbere y’urukino rwa nijoro hagati ya Iran na Amerika muri Qatar. Hagati aho, uru rukino rwabaye ata kimentetso na kimwe c’ubugenzi. Urukino rw’imbere y’aha rwabereye muri Lyon, rwabaye inyuma y’imyaka 20 imigenderanire hagati y’ibi bihugu bibiri yarabaye nabi cane nk’inkurikizi z’iturirwa ry’ibiro vy’ubuserukizi bwa Amerika i Tehran mu 1979. Ryakurikiwe n’ikibazo catewe n’abanyeshure, bahagarikiwe n’ubutegetsi bwa Ayatollah Khomeini, bafashe bugwati abakozi bo muri ubwo buserukizi mu kiringo c’imisi 444. Ico gihe, ukwezi kumwe gusa imbere y’urwo rukino, ubushikiranganji bw’imigenderanire bwa Amerika bwise Irani ko ari co gihugu ca mbere kw’isi cafata mu mugongo iterabwoba, mu gihe abategetsi batari bake ba Irani batahengeshanya gushikiriza amajambo arwanya Amerika. N’aho icuka kibi ari co carangwa ku cicaro c’ishirahamwe ONU no mu kigobe c’Abarabu, abakinyi ba Irani - barongowe n’umumenyereza yari asanzwe aba muri California Jalal Talebi – bafashe ingingo yo gutangura uru rukino n’ikimenyetso cerekana ko ihiganwa yonyene hagati yavyo ryari iribera mu kibuga. Talebi yasubiwemwo n’imboneshakure ESPN avuga ati:  "Twafashe ingingo yo gukora ikintu kidasanzwe. "Reka tugende mu kibuga tubahe amashurwe aryoheye ijisho kugira ngo twerekane ko turi hano kubw’amahoro. Ntituri ng’aha ngo turwane canke dukore ikindi kintu ico ari co cose”. Mu kubasubiriza mu ndumane, abakinyi ba Amerika babahaye utudarapo tw’ishirahamwe rya Amerika rijejwe umupira w’amagugu  (US Soccer Federation, USSF). Abakinyi b’iyi mirwi yompi bari kumwe bifotoreje hamwe mw’ifoto rusangi bamwenyura imbere y’uru rukino rwari rukomeye. Muri iyo nkuru ya ESPN, Cobi Jones  yakina hagati mu murwi wa Amerika avuga ati: "Nibaza ko kirya cari ikintu gikomeye. "Kwari nk’ukwerekana ko inkino ziri hejuru ya poritike n’ivyo bindi vyose. Cari ikintu gikomeye, hanyuma no kwifotoreza hamwe navyo biza birushirizaho”. Imisi mikeya imbere y’uru rukino rundi rwo mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi nijoro ku wa kabiri hagati y’iyi mirwi ibiri, hasubiye kwaduka ikindi cuka kibi, mu gihe Irani ihanganye n’imyiyerekano y’abiyamiriza reta, mu gihe kandi USSF yari ihejeje gukura ikimenyetso c’iki gihugu kigendera kw’idini rya Islam kw’ibendera, mu nkuru y’amasanamu yari yashize ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi. Aya masanamu yahavuye afutwa, umumenyereza wa Amerika nawe, Gregg Berhalter, aca asaba imbabazi , avuga ko “rimwe na rimwe hari ibintu bigoye gukontorora”, kandi ko we n’umurwi wa Amerika barajwe ishinga n’umupira w’amaguru. Amerika yinjiye mu kibuga yizeye ko idasubira gukubitwa nk’uko vyagenze mu  1998 rwarangiye itsinzwe na Irani 2-1, n’aho ibi bihugu vyompi bitashoboye kubandanya ihiganwa inyuma y’urwo rukino. Alexi Lalas, umunyamakuru wa Fox Sports yari mu murwi wakinye urwo rukino rwa 1998, yabwiye ikinyamakuru Associated Press ko umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Amerika wa kino gihe wategerezwa kuja mu kibuga wagabishijwe ko cazira kwirengagiza insiguro ya poritike y’uru rukino. Mu kwerekana igituma Amerika idategerezwa gufyinata mu kibuga, avuga ati: “Gutahura akamaro k’uru rukino, atari kuraba gusa ku ruhande rw’umupira w’amaguru bagafatira ahubwo ku muco, nibaza ko ari ikintu gikomeye kuri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika”. Urukino rwa nijoro hagati ya Amerika na Iran muri Qatar rwarangiye Amerika itsinze Irani 1-0 ku gitsindo ca Christian Pulisic ku munota wa 38.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru i Bulaya kuri uyu wa Mungu 16.06.2019: Salah, Pogba, Diop, Jesus, Maguire, Benteke, Kessie
text: Umusatirizi w'umurwi wa Liverpool n'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Misiri, Mohamed Salah w'imyaka 27, yanse igiciro c'imiliyoni 150 y'amafaranga y'abongereza (amapawundi) cari catanzwe n'imirwi ya Real Madrid na Juventus. (Mirror) Nayo umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester United umufaransa Paul Pogba w'imyaka26, avuga ko yiteguye guhagarika ibikorwa kugira ngo agondoze umurwi wiwe kumwemerera ko yokwigira muri  Real Madrid. (ABC - mu ki espanyole) Manchester United nayo ikaba yipfuza cane umukinyi w'inyuma w'umufaransa, Issa Diop w'imyaka 22, asanzwe akinira West Ham, ku giciro c'imiliyoni 45 z'amapawundi. (Sky Sports) Manchester United  kandi isanzwe imenyerezwa na Ole Gunnar Solskjaer biboneka ko amahirwe y'ukuronka umukinyi w'umufaransa, Antoine Griezmann w'imyaka 28, asanzwe akinira Atletico Madrid ari make cane mu gihe Barcelona yiteguye kumugura ku miliyoni 150 y'amapawundi. (Mirror) Umusatirizi Marcus Rashford w'imyaka 21, ashobora kwongezwa umushahara gushika ku ma pawundi 350,000 ku ndwi kugira ngo umurwi wiwe wa Man United umuhendahende ntawute ngo yigire muri Real Madrid na Barcelona zisanzwe zimwipfuza. (Sun) Umusatirizi wa Brezili, Gabriel Jesus w'imyaka 22, avuga ko "ari indoto" ko we n'umusatirizi wa Argentine Sergio Aguero w'imyaka 31, bava mu murwi Manchester City imbere y'uko ihiganwa ry'umwaka uza ritangura mu Bwongereza. (Mail) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Chelsea, Umufaransa Tiemoue Bakayoko w'imyaka 24, avuga ko yipfuza kubona umunsi umwe akiniye umurwi wa Paris St-Germain mu Bufaransa. (L'Equipe) Umumenyereza Rafa Benitez asigaje ikiringo c'indwi zibiri gusa ngo amasezerano afitaniye na Newcastle arangire kandi ntibarumvikana nimba yobandanya amenyereza uwo murwi. (Newcastle Chronicle) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Leicester n'Ubwongereza, Harry Maguire w'imyaka 26, yari yumvikanye n'uwahora ari nyene uwo murwi ariko yamaze kwitaba Imana, Vichai Srivaddhanaprabha, ko ashobora kuva muri uyo murwi ihiganwa riheruka rirangiye. (Mirror) Umurwi wa Juventus uriteguye kugura umukinyi w'inyuma ku ruhande rw'iburyo wa  Tottenham n'Ubwongerza, Kieran Trippier w'imyaka 25, ku giciro c'imiliyoni  45 z'amapawundi. (Times ) Umusatirizi w'Umubirigi, Christian Benteke w'imyaka 28, yipfuza kwigumira mu murwi wa Crystal Palace n'aho hari amakuru avuga ko ashobora kuja gukina mw'ihiganwa ryo mu Bushinwa. (Standard) Umumenyereza wa Liverpool Jurgen Klopp yabwiwe ko yokora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo arondere abasubirira abakinyi babiri bagiye kuva muri uyo murwi, umukinyi w'inyuma, Alberto Moreno w'imyaka 26, n'umusatirizi Daniel Sturridge w'imyaka 29. (Star) Umurwi wa Arsenal ugiye gusubira kugerageza ku ncuro ya gatatu kugura umukinyi w'umusatirizi w'umufaransa akinira Lorient, Alexis Claude-Maurice, w'imyaka 21, inyuma y'aho izo mpande zompi ( Arsenal na Alexis) zishikiye ku mwumvikano. Metro) AC Milan irashobora guha Arsenal umukinyi wo hagati wo muri Cote d'Ivoire, Franck Kessie w'imyaka 22, bakaguza n'umukinyi wo hagati w'umunya Uruguay,  Lucas Torreira w'imyaka 23. (Gazzetta dello Sport - in Italian)

headline: Dambe, umukino uriko uramamara kw'isi umezi nk'itera-makofe rya boxe
text: Dambe, umukino uriko uramamara kw'isi umezi nk'itera-makofe rya boxe ukinwa n'aba Hausa bo mu burengero bwa Afrika

headline: Ivangura mu mupira w’amaguru ni ikibazo ngorabahizi
text: Haraciye indwi zitari nke ibijanye n'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba bivugwa cane mu mupira w'amaguru. Abakinyi batari bake basanzwe bakina i Bulaya bariziziwe n'iryo vangura, riboneka ko ari ikibazo kimaze imyaka iharurwa muri mirongo n'iyindi. Abategetsi muvyo umupira w'amaguru bariko bagerageza kurwanya ubwo bukozi bw'ikibi, ariko kiboneka ko kikiri ingorabahizi. Ni ikibazo kimaze imyaka myinshi cane, aho abakinyi b'abanya Afrika aribo biziziwe gusumba, ugasanga batukwa canke bakazomerwa mu kibuga. Ubu rero bikaba vyimukiye ku mbuga hwaniro, aho abakinyi batari bake batukwa, bagatyozwa, eka bakandikwako ibitari bike, abarongoye ivyo umupira w'amaguru i Bulaya bakabura ico bafata n'ico bareka. Umunyamakuru wa BBC Stanley Kwenda agize iminsi aganira n'abakinyi be n'abahoze ari abakinyi rurangiranwa. Umwe muri abo bakinyi nawe nyene yahuye n'ico kibazo, ni umunya Côte d'Ivoire Yaya Touré. Yakinye mu bihugu vy'Ububirigi, Ukraine, Ubugiriki, Ubufaransa, Espanye hamwe n'Ubwongereza. Avuga ati: "Abantu babifata nk'ugufyinata, ntaco bibabwiye gutyoza abakinyi. Jewe namye ngwanya iyi ngeso ariko igitangaje ibandanya". Ishirahamwe Kick It Out ryishinze kurwanya amacakubiri nk'ayo, rivuga ko ikumira rishingiye ku rukoba  ryiyongereye cane mu myaka indwi iheze, aho mu mwaka w'inkino uheze gusa ryaduze gushika ku bice 50%. Mu bakinyi biziziwe cane harimwo umusatirizi wa Liverpool Mohamed Salah hamwe na Wilfred Zaha wa Crystal Palace. Lomana Lua Lua yahoze ari umusatirizi akomoka muri Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo, akaba yarigeze gukorana n'ishirahamwe Kivck It Out. Avuga ati: "Si nibaza ko bizokwigera bihagarara. None ko bitazokwigera bihagarara, hokorwa iki? Guta umwanya wose ugerageza kubirwanya? Ivyo ntaco bimaze. Abatama ntaco bibabwiye, ni intumva! Igikenewe ni uko abakiri bato ari bo bokorerwako bakigishwa". Arthur Masuaku ni umukinyi nawe nyene akomoka muri RD Congo muri kino gihe akaba akina muri West Ham mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza. Avuga ati:  "Jewe vyarambayeko, aho ikijuju kimwe c'umufana cancirako amate, kimbwira ngo 'subira iwanyu', jewe naritwengeye. Kuri jewe ni ibintu bibabaje, ariko simbona ico nokora". Ikibazo c'ivangura kiri hose i Bulaya, ariko bigasumbana bivanye n'igihugu, nk'uko bivugwa n'umunya Afrika y'Epfo, Benni McCarthy, yigeze gukina mu bihugu bine bikomeye mu mupira w'amaguru. Ati: "Mu Buholande narahuye n'ico kibazo, ariko nababajwe cane ndi muri Espanye, aho nabwiye ibijambo bibi cane rwose gushika aho numva umengo sinosubira gukina kuko ntashobora kuvyihanganira". "Muri Portugal, baragukunda iyo ukina mu murwi wabo, ariko ukina ahandi, ni ibindi bintu, uramererwa nabi, baragutuka, bakakwita inkobe/inguge" "Nagiye kugira agahengwe ndi mu Bwongereza kuko nico gihugu cubaha gusumba ibindi. Mu Bwongereza ntushobora kwumva indirimbo za hooo hooo (indirimbo zisigura inguge)". Umurwi wa Crystal Palace  ufise abakinyi batari bake b'abirabure, usanzwe ukinamwo Wilfred Zaha aherutse gutyozwa kubera ari umwirabure. Roy Hodgson, umumenyereza wayo avuga ati: "Ico ni ikibazo c'imibereho muri rusangi, si mu mupira w'amaguru gusa. Ni ikibazo ibihugu vyose, cane cane Ubwongereza,  biriko bigerageza gutorera umuti" . Abakinyi bamwe baragabisha ko bashobora kuza barivumbura bakava mu kibuga mu gihe bobandanya biziziwe n'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba. Hagati aho, umunya Senegal El Hadji Diouf umusatirizi yahoze akina muri Liverpool afise impanuro itandukanye. Abwira abandi bakinyi ati: "Ndazi ko jewe El Hadji Diouf  abantu batankunda, ariko sinigera ndabaha akaryo ko kunyifatira mu gahanga, kandi mvuga nti ivyo bizokwama bishikira abakinyi bose b'abanya Afrika". "Ntibazigera babaha ikibanza nk'ico baha ab'iwabo. Ico nobahanura ni ukwigumya, ugakinana umutima wawe wose, kandi ubinezererewe kugira ngo mubereke ko turi abakinyi bakomeye". Ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba ni ikibazo ngorabahizi mu mupira w'amaguru. Yaya Toure avuga ko umupira w'amaguru ari urukino  ruhuza abantu bose b'imice itandukanye, aho rero ububi bw'abantu kanaka buca bwibonekeza. Kuri we icoba ciza ni uko imirwi n'abakunzi bayo bofatirwa ibihano ruhasha. Muri kino gihe, hari ubwoba ko mu gihe ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba ryobandanya  rishobora gutuma urwaruka rwinshi rushobora guheba gukunda urwo rukino ruryoheye ijisho.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru kuri uyu wa gatandatu: Sancho, Varane, Salah, Konate, Haaland, Andersen
text: Abegereye umukinyi w'imbere wa Borussia Dortmund Jadon Sancho w'imyaka 21 bafise icizere kinini ko uyu mukinyi mpuzamakungu w'Ubwongereza azoshobora kwimukira muri Manchester United mu ci riza. Uyu murwi wa Premier League witeze gutangura kumusaba ku giciro kiri hagati ya miriyoni 91 na 105 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. (Eurosport) Manchester United ishobora kwifashisha umukinyi w'imbere, umwongereza Jesse Lingard w'imyaka 28 kugira ngo ironke amafaranga yo kugura Sancho. (Sun) Ku rutonde rw'abakinyi bashobora gusubirira umusatirizi wa Paris Saint-Germain, umufaransa Kylian Mbappe w'imyaka 22 harimwo umusatirizi wa  Liverpool, umunyamisiri Mohamed Salah w'imyaka 28. (ESPN) Manchester United iri mu biganiro n'umukinyi w'inyuma wa  Real Madrid, umufaransa Raphael Varane w'imyaka 28.  (Manchester Evening News) Manchester United iriteguye gutanga imiriyoni zirenga 56 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika kugira igure Varane muri rino ci.  (Mirror) Umumenyereza wa RB Leipzig, Oliver Mintzlaff yemeje ko amasezerano uyu murwi ufitaniye n'umukinyi w'inyuma, umufaransa Ibrahima Konate w'imyaka 21, asanzwe ari mu baronderwa na Liverpool, afise ingingo imwemerera gushobora kugenda. Uyu murongo uvuga ko umurwi womurondera wotegerezwa gutanga imiroyini hafi 487 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. (Liverpool Echo) Manchester City yatanguye kuvugana n'umurwi Sporting Lisbon kugira ngo ishobore kuronka umukinyi w'inyuma, umunya Portugal Nuno Mendes w'imyaka 18. (Mail) Umumenyereza wa Chelsea Thomas Tuchel yahitishijwemwo kugura umusatorizi wa Borussia Dortmund, umunya Norvege Erling Braut Haaland w'imyaka 20 canke umukinyi w'imbere wa Inter Milan,  umubirigi Romelu Lukaku w'imyaka 28. (Express) Barcelona iriteguye gukora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo igure Haaland mu ci riza mu kurindira ko itangura kugerageza kugumya umusatirizi wa Argentine Lionel Messi w'imyaka 33. (Sun) Umukinyi w'imbere wa Chelsea, umunyamerika Christian Pulisic w'imyaka 22 ariyamiriza amakuru avuga ko ashobora kuva muri Chelsea mu ci riza.  (ESPN) Umuserukizi wa Christiano Ronaldo umusatirizi wa  Juventus avuga ko uyu mukinyi w'umunya Portugal w'imyaka 36 ata mugambi afise wo gusubira muri  Sporting Lisbon mu ci riza.  (Record - in Portuguese) Mu ci riza, Southampton itegura gusaba umurwi Chelsea ko woyiha umukinyi wo hagati, umwongereza Ruben Loftus-Cheek w'imyaka 25 ubu asanzwe akina muri Fulham aho yatijijwe, ku miriyoni 28 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika.  (Express) Leicester iri hafi yo guheraheza amasezerano yo kugura umukinyi wo hagati w'umufaransa Boubakary Soumare w'imyaka 22 akina mu murwi Lille ku miriyoni hafi 28 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. (Italian journalist Fabrizio Romano, on Twitter) Umumenyereza wa Crystal Palace yiteze gusezera uyo murwi mu ci riza igihe amasezerano afitaniye nayo azoba arangiye, ariko Frank Lampard yahoze amenyereza Chelsea ntari mu bariko barondera kuzomusubirira. (Times - subscription required) Arsenal nta nteguro ifise yo kugiriranira ayandi masezerano y'intizo n'umukinyi wo hagati wa Real Madrid umunya Espagne Dani Ceballos w'imyaka 24. (Independent) Arsenal yitezwe kugura n'imiburiburi abakinyi batanu mu gihe c'igura n'igurisha ry'abakinyi mu ci riza.
