Bamwe mu bo irondera harimwo umukinyi wo hagati wa Brighton umunya Mali Yves Bissouma w'imyaka 24, hamwe n'umukinyi wo hagati wa Sheffield United, umunya Norvege Sander Berge w'imyaka 23, na bo nyene bashaka kuva muri iyi mirwi. (Football.London) Icizere ca Tottenham co kugura umukinyi w'inyuma wa  Lion, umunya  Danmark, Joachim Andersen, yariu amaze umwaka akinira Fulham iyo yari yatijijwe, congerekanye kubera uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 24 avuga ko yipfuza kuguma muri Premier League.(Standard) Tottenham iripfuza kugura Andersen afise agaciro k'imiriyoni zirenga 28 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. (Sky Sports) Barcelona ishobora kurungika abakinyi bashika 14 mu mpera z'ihiganwa ry'uno mwaka harimwo umukinyi w'inyuma, umufaransa Samuel Umtiti w'imyaka 27, hamwe n'umukinyi w'imbere, umunya Bresil Philippe Coutinho w'imyaka 28. (Mundo Deportivo) Umusatirizi wa Manchester City, umunya Argentine Sergio Aguero w'imyaka 32 ari hafi yo kwinjira muri Barcelona ataco aguzwe mu ci riza  - ariko agategerezwa kwemera gukatwa igice kitari gito c'umushahara asanzwe ahembwa. (Sun) Umunyegori wa Aston Villa, umwongereza Tom Heaton w'imyaka 35, yanse ayandi masezerano, akaba yemeye mu majambo gusa kwinjira muri Manchester United. (Football Insider)

headline: Umunonotsi wa BBC w'umwaka muri Afrika: Faith Kipyegon
text: Faith Kipyegon ari mu bahiganirwa agashimwe ka BBC k'umunonotsi w'umunye-Afrika yenuriye abandi mu 2021 Ushaka gutora tugusavye kuja ngaha https://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/africa/59089895 aho unasanga amategeko ajanye n'ubuzima bwite. Gutora bizohera kuwa Mungu itariki 19/12/2021 saa 23:59 GMT.

headline: Tottenham: Nuno Espirito Santo yirukanywe mu mabanga y'umumenyereza inyuma y'amezi ane
text: Umugwi wa Tottenham Hotspur yirukanye umumenyereza Nuno Espirito Santo inyuma y'amezi ane agenywe muri ayo mabanga. Tottenham imaze gutsindwa inkino zitanu kuri ndwi ziheze mw'ihiganwa ryo mu Bwongereza, harimwo n'urukino rwabahuje na Manchester United kuri uyu wa gatandatu. Iri mu kibanza ca 8 mw'ihiganwa ryo mu Bwongereza ikaba iri inyuma amanota 10 ku mugwi wa mbere Chelsea. Uwurongoye uwo mugwi Fabio Paratici yavuze ati:"Ndazi uko Nuno n'abamufasha bagerageje kugira bagire ico bashitseko, nkaba ntanejerejwe no kuba twatinze dufata iyo ngingo." Uwo munye Portugal w'imyaka 47, yari yagenywe mu mabanga yo kumenyereza uwo mugwi mu kiringo c'imyaka ibiri mu kwezi kwa gatandatu inyuma y'imyaka ine yari amaze muri Wolves. Paratici yagize ati:"Nuno n'umugabo w'abagabo kandi arahawe ikaze ngaha igihe ico ari co cose. Dukwiye kumushimira co kimwe n'abamufasha mu kazi kiwe, tunabipfurize n'ivyiza mu bihe biri imbere." Tottenham yavuze ko ingingo yo kumenya uwuzosubirira Nuno " Ni yo igiye gukurikira". Tottenham yazomerewe cane inyuma yo gutsindwa ibitego 3-0 na United, yatanguranye inguvu, hanyuma inyuma yo gutsinda inkino zitatu, Nuno yabaye umumenyereza wa mbere mwiza w'ukwezi kw'umunani. Hagati aho, umwimbu wagiye umanuka. N'aho bari batsinze Aston Villa na Newcastle mu kwezi kwa cumi, baratsinzwe na Chelsea, Arsenal, West Ham na Crystal Palace udashizemwo gutsindwa mu nkino za Europa League.

headline: Football - Ayavugwa kuri uno wa kane: Osimhen, Bellingham, Endrick, Gakpo, Neves, Gomez, Zaha
text: Chelsea iriko irarondera ingene yogura umusatirizi mu ci riza, umunya-Nigeria akina muri Napoli   Victor Osimhen  w’imyaka 23 niwe ahabwa amahirwe mu gihe bakironderera n’ahandi. (90 Min) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Borussia Dortmund umwongereza Jude Bellingham w’imyaka 19, yabonetse nk’uwundi ashobora kuronderwa cane na Chelsea, mu gihe umwongereza mugenziwe akina hagati muri  West Ham Declan Rice w’imyaka 23 nawe nyene ashimwa na bamwe mu barongoye aba ba Blues.  (Evening Standard) Arsenal ishobora guhiganwa na Barcelona be na Real Madrid mu rugamba rwo kurondera umusatirizi wa  Palmeiras Endrick w’imyaka 16, afatwa nka “Pele w’igihe kiri imbere”. (Four Four Two) Umumenyereza wa Manchester United Erik ten Hag ariko adindiza gufata ingingo ku masezerano yerekeye kazoza k’umunyegori wayo umunya-Espagne David de Gea w’imyaka 31, hamwe n’umusatirizi wayo, umwongereza Marcus Rashford  w’imyaka 24. (Guardian) Umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa PSV Eindhoven Cody Gakpo w’imyaka  23 avuga ko hahatswe gato ngo yimukira muri Manchester United mu ci riheze, mu gihe Leeds United na Southampton nayo nyene yarondeye uyu munya-Hollande, imbere y’uko afata ingingo yo kuguma mu murwi wiwe. (Times) Barcelona iriko irakurikiranira hagufi umukinyi w’inyuma wa Manchester United umunya-Portugal Diogo Dalot w’imyaka 23, mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye n’uyu murwi azorangira mu ci riza, ariko akaba ashobora kwongerezwa ikindi kiringo c’umwaka. (Mundo Deportivo – mu ki-Espagnol) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Wolves umunya-Portugal Ruben Neves w’imyaka 25 yemerewe kuja muri Barcelona. (Mundo Deportivo – mu ki-Espagnol) Umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Wolves Adama Traore w’imyaka 26, avuga ko yizeye ko umusi umwe azosubira gukina mu gihugu ciwe c’amavukiro ca Espagne. (AS – mu ki -Espagnol) Umumenyereza w’umurwi nserukiragihugu w’Ubwongereza Gareth Southgate agiye gukurikiranira hagufi umukinyi w’inyuma wa Liverpool Joe Gomez w’imyaka 25 imbere y’uko atanga urutonde rw’abo azokinisha mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose mu mupira w’amaguru mu kw’icumi na rimwe. (Times) Umumenyereza wa Crystal Palace Patrick Vieira avuga ko bari mu biganiro kugira ngo bongereze amasezerano y’umusatirizi wayo, umunya- Côte d'Ivoire Wilfried Zaha w’imyaka 29, mu gihe imirwi ya Arsenal na Chelsea imurondera, amasezerano afitaniye n’umurwi wiwe akazorangira mu ci riza. (Metro) Uyu musatirizi Zaha  wa Palace avugwa ko yipfuza kwimukira muri Liverpool, ariko hari iyindi mirwi myinshi imushaka. (Talksport) Umukuru w’igisata kijejwe umupira w’amaguru muri Manchester United John Murtough avuga ko ata cizere c’uko bashobora kugura abakinyi mu kadirisha k’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi ko mu kwa mbere, agashimangira ko barindiriye ca gihe c’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi mu ci riza. (Telegraph ) Umumenyereza wa Manchester United Erik Ten Hag agiye gusaba ashimitse ko bogura umukinyi wo hagati wa Barcelona umunya-Hollande Frenkie de Jong mu kwa mbere. Uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 25 bishobora kuba ngombwa ko arindira gushika mu ci riza imbere y’uko asezera uyu murwi wo muri Espagne, aho n’imirwi ya Chelsea na Bayern Munich nayo ishobora kumurondera. (Sport - mu ki Espagnol) Umumenyereza wa Chelsea Graham Potter ntarafata ingingo kuri kazoza k’umuswisi Denis Zakaria w’imyaka 25, asanzwe yaratijijwe muri uyu murwi w’Ubwongereza avuye muri Juventus. (90min) Everton iriko irerekana ko yipfuza umusatirizi wa Lille,  umunya-Canada Jonathan David w’imyaka 22, ni mu gihe umumenyereza wayo Frank Lampard ariko ararondera ingene yokomeza igisata c’imbere. (Liverpool Echo) Tottenham ishobora kuronka imiriyoni 26 z’amapawundi ku mufaransa akina hagati Tanguy Ndombele w’myaka 25, mu gihe Napoli asanzwe yaratijijwemwo yofata ingingo yo kumugumana burundu. (Express)

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w’amaguru i Bulaya 01/10/2019: Wenger, Sancho, Vertonghen, Mandzukic, Alderweireld
text: Umukuru wa Borussia Dortmund aremeza ko ata cizere afise c'uko umukinyi w'imbere w'umwongereza Jadon Sancho w'imyaka 19 yarondewe na Manchester United mu ci riheze ashobora kubandanya akinira uyo murwi igihe kire kire. (Kicker, via Mail) Umusatirizi wa ChelseaTammy Abraham w'imyaka  21 ariteguye guheba gukinira igihugu ciwe ca Nigeria agakinira Ubwongereza mu gihe umumenyereza Gareth Southgate yomutumako mw'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi nserukirabihugu vy'Uburayi, Euro 2020 mu gihe Ubwongereza buzohura na République tchèque na Bulgaria. (Telegraph) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Tottenham, Jan Vertonghen w'imyaka 32, avuga ko ashobora kugiriranira ayandi masezerano n'uyo murwi. Ni mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye nyo azorangira mu mpera z'uno mwaka w'inkino. (London Evening Standard) Uyo murwi watanguye ibiganiro na Vertonghen kugira ngo barabe ko ayo masezerano yokwongerezwa. (Mail) Umusatirizi wa Juventus, Mario Mandzukic w'imyaka 33 asanzwe aronderwa na Manchester United, ariko kandi aronderwa n'umurwi Los Angeles FC mw'ihiganwa ry'umupira w'amaguru muri Amerika, MLS. (Calciomercato) Manchester United iriko irarondera ko yoronka umukinyi w'inyuma wa Tottenham, umubirigi Toby Alderweireld w'imyaka 30, mu gihe c'igura n'igurishwa ry'abakinyi mu kwezi kwa mbere kuza. (Tuttosport, via Inside Futbol) Arsène Wenger yahoze amenyereza Arsenal ari ku rutonde rw'abashobora gusubirira Marco Giampaolo nk'umumentyereza wa AC Milan. (Gazzetta dello Sport) Arsenal itegura gukurikiranira hafi umukinyi wa Hongrie Dominik Szoboszlai w'imyaka 18 mu gihe umurwi wiwe Red Bull Salzburg  uzoba uramutse uhura na Liverpool muri ino ndwi, Arsenal itegura kumurondera mu kwezi kwa mbere kuza. (Football Insider) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Barcelona, Gerard Piqué, ariko yitegura kubonana n'umukuru w'uyo murwi, Josep Maria Bartomeu, mu gihe icuka kibandanya kiba kibi hagati y'abakinyi n'abarongoye uyo murwi. (ESPN) Juventus na Inter Milan bashobora kuba bariko bitegurira kurwanira umukinyi wo hagati wa Barcelona, umunya Croatia Ivan Rakitic w'imyaka 31. (Calciomercato, via Caught Offside) Umumenyereza wa Porto, Vitor Matos, ari mu biganiro na Liverpool kandi bigeze kure, kugira ngo ashobore gukorana na Jurgen Klopp mu murwi w'abamenyereza b'uyo murwi. (Liverpool Echo) Ingorane z'ivi z'umunya Côte d'Ivoire Eric Bailly, umukinyi w'inyuma wa Manchester United, zishobora kumutuma adasubira gukina gushika mu mwaka w'inkino uza. Uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 25 yavunitse mu rukino rwa kivandimwe na Tottenhm imbere y'uko ihiganwa ritangura. (Sun) Roma iriko ikurikiranira hafi umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Wolves, umunya Espanye Adama Traoré w'imyaka 23.  (Calciomercato) Umukuru w'umurwi wa Tottenham, Daniel Levy, ni we yakoze ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo umukinyi wo hagati w'Umufaransa Moussa Sissoko w'imyaka 30 aronke ayandi masezerano y'imyaka ine. (Football Insider) Uwahoze ari umumenyereza wa Everton, David Moyes, avuga ko "bihenze" kubona batasubiyemwo ikibuga cabo ca Goodison Park. (Liverpool Echo) Vyabaye ngombwa ko abakinyi ba Arsenal bafata urugendo ejo ku wa mbere baja mu gisagara ca Manchester gukina na Manchester United ku mugoroba, kubera amahoteri yose makuru makuru yari yafashwe kubera inama y'umugambwe w'aba Conservateurs.  (Sun) Umumenyereza wa Newcastle United, Steve Bruce, nta bwoba afise ko ashobora kubogozwa, n'aho umurwi wiwe ugira kabiri uvuye inyuma muri Premier League, inyuma y'aho unyagiriwe na Leicester City ibitsindo 5-0. (Times) Uwigeze kuba umuhagarikizi muri Premier League, Mark Clattenburg, avuga ko kari kuba "akaga" iyo VAR itemera igitsindo ca Arsenal catsinzwe na Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang, gituma urukino rurangira Manchester United inganya na Arsenal 1-1 ejo ku wa mbere. (Mail)

headline: Umunonotsi Caster Semenya wa Afrika y'Epfo yatumiwe guhiganwa muri Diamond League ku metero 800 muri Maroc
text: Abajejwe ihiganwa rya Diamond League mu gihugu ca Maroc bamenyesha ko umunonotsi w'umwigeme wo muri Afrika y'Epfo, Caster Semenya, yatumiwe guhiganwa ku metero 800 ejo ku munsi wa Mungu mw'iryo higanwa. Ku munsi wa kabiri w'iyi ndwi, sentare nkuru y'igihugu c'Ubuswisi yarahagaritse vy'agateganyo ingingo nshasha yari iherutse gufatwa  n'ikigo mpuzamakungu kijejwe ukwinonora imitsi, IAAF, categeka ko abanonotsi b'igitsinagore bafise ibinyabugabo birenze (testosterones) bitegerezwa kugabanywa. Ku munsi wa kane, Semenya yari yamenyesheje ko atari bwemererwe kwitaba iryo higanwa ryo muri Maroc, n'aho iyo ngingo yari yahagaritswe. Ariko ku munsi wa gatanu, Alain Blondel yari arongoye inama itegura iryo higanwa yavuze ko afise "umunezero w'ukumenyesha" ko Semenya yatumiwe muri iryo higanwa. Semenya asanzwe yarunguruje urubanza ku ngingo y'ikigo IAAF y'ukugabanya ivyo binyabugabo, ingingo afata ko ari akarenganyo ku banonotsi b'igitsinagore nka we. Amahiganwa ya Diamond League ntategurwa n'ico kigo IAAF, bisigura ko abategura amahiganwa nk'ayo bafise uburenganzira bwo gutumira abo bashatse. N'aho imanza zikibandanya, Semenya amaze gutsinda amahiganwa ya Olempiki abiri yikurikiranya ku metero 800, ari ku rutonde mfatakibanza rw'abazoserukira Afrika y'Epfo mu nkino mpuzamakungu zizobera mu gihugu ca Qatar mu mpera z'uno mwaka wa 2019.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Kane, Sanches, Asensio, Haaland, Trippier, Coutinho
text: Manchester City iriteguye gutanga imiriyoni 205 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika kugira ironke umusatirizi w'umwongereza Harry Kane w'imyaka  28, hakaba hari amakuru avuga ko Tottenham yoba yiteguye kwemera ico giciro kandi ko n'umukuru wayo Daniel Levy agiye gutangura ibiganiro. (Independent) Mu gihe vyokwanka ko Manchester City ironka Kane muri rino ci, uwu murwi watahukanye igikombe ca Premier League uvugwa ko woca uvuvudikira umusatirizi wa Fiorentina umunya Serbia Dusan Vlahovic w'imyaka 21, ikaba ivugwa ko yoba yinjiye mu rugamba rwo kurondera uyu musatirizi ku miriyoni 80 z'ama euros. (Firenze Viola - in Italian) Wolves yiteze ko Tottenham iyegera kugira ngo irabe ko yoyigurira umusatirizi w'umunya Espagne Adama Traore w'imyaka 25 mu gihe Kane yoramuka aguzwe na City muri rino ci.  (Mail) Liverpool yahuye n'inzitizi mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Lille umunya Portugal Renato Sanches w'imyaka 24, inyuma y'aho uyu mukinyi yanduriye imvune izomutuma ataboneka mu kibuga mu kiringo c'indwi zitandatu. (Mirror) Umurwi watsindiye ihiganwa Premier League ry'Ubwongereza  Manchester City uri mu biganiro n'umukinyi wayo w'inyuma umumya Portugal Ruben Dias w'imyaka 24 kugira imwongere ayandi masezerano mashasha. (Sun) Arsenal ishobora kuba yiteguye gutanga imiriyoni  zababa 46.5 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika ku mukinyi wo hagati wa Real Madrid umunya Espagne Marco Asensio w'imyaka 25. (Fichajes - in Spanish) Tottenham yongereje akariro mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi w'inyuma wa Fiorentina , umunya Serbia Nikola Milenkovic w'imyaka 23, inyuma y'aho West Ham ifatiye ingingo yo gukuramwo akarenge.  (The Times - subscription required) Watford iri hafi yo gushika ku masezerano n'umukinyi wo hagati wa Fenerbahce, umunya Turukiya Ozan Tufan w'imyaka 26. (Athletic) Newcastle yashize igiciro c'imiriyoni hafi 13,7 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika ku mukinyi wo hagati umwongereza Sean Longstaff w'imyaka 23, mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye nayo azorangira mu ci riza, umumenyereza wa Everton Rafa Benitez akavugwa ko yipfuza kumuzana i  Goodison Park. (Mail) Arsenal na Manchester United basabwe kwibagira ivyo kurondera umukinyi w'inyuma wa Atletico Madrid umwongereza Kieran Trippier w'imyaka 30. (AS) Umusatirizi w'umunyamisiri Mohamed Salah w'imyaka 29 ashobora kuba yiteguye kuganira na Liverpool ku bijanye n'amasezerano ashobora kumutuma amara igihe kirekire akinira uwo murwi. (Times, subscription required) Everton ishobora kuronka umusatirizi wa Schalke umunyamerika Matthew Hoppe ku giciro kiri musi y'imiriyoni cumi kubera ikibazo c'amafaranga gihanze uwu murwi wo mu Budagi. Aba Toffees (Everton) ni umwe mu mirwi yipfuza uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 20 bakaba bategura gutanga imiriyoni zababa 5.4 z'amadorari.  (Bild - in German) Liverpool iri imbere mu rugamba rwo kurondera umusatirizi wa  Borussia Dortmund umunya Norvège Erling Braut Haaland w'imyaka 21. (Sport1, via Mirror) Crystal Palace yari yatanze imiriyoni zababa indwi ku mukinyi wo hagati, umwongereza Will Hughes w'imyaka 26 ariko uumrwi wiwe Watford waranse kuyakira. (Sun) Umusatirizi w'umunya Pays de Galles/Wales Gareth Bale w'imyaka 32 yasubiye kwizerwa muri Real Madrid inyuma y'aho uwu murwi utanguriye kumenyerezwa na Carlo Ancelotti, ibintu bikaba bitari bimeze neza kuri uyu mukinyi igihe uwu murwi wamenyerezwa na Zinedine Zidane.  (Marca - in Spanish) Juventus yakubise hasi Liverpool na Tottenham mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinri rurangiranwa wa  Santos, umunya Brésil Kaio Jorge w'imyaka 19. (Goal) Manchester United iracarondera ingene yoronka uwundi mukinyi wo hagati. Ariko, ibi vyosaba ko ibanza kugurisha abakinyi inyuma y'aho umufaransa akina inyuma  Raphael Varane w'imyaka 28, hamwe n'umwongereza akina ku ruhande Jadon Sancho w'imyaka 21 binjiriye muri uwu murwi.  (Manchester Evening News) Barcelona yiteze kwegeranya imiriyoni zindi 200 z'ama euros kugira ngo irabe ko yogabanya ideni ifise, ikaba yiteze kugurisha umukinyi w'inyuma umufaransa Samuel Umtiti w'imyaka 27, umukinyi wo hagati, umunye Brésil Philippe Coutinho w'imyaka 29 hamwe n'umunya Bosnia akina hagati Miralem Pjanic w'imyaka 31.  (Goal) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester United umunya Brésil Andreas Pereira w'imyaka 25 yiteze gutizwa umurwi Flamengo.  (Fabrizio Romano) Umukinyi wo hagati w'umwongereza Joe Willock w'imyaka 21 yizeye gusumvya Alan Shearer yamaze incuro zibiri zose yikurikiranya mu gutsinda ibitsindo vyinshi muri Newcastle, akaba yiteze guca umuhigo kuri uno mwaka wa kabiri atanguye muri uyu murwi mu rukino ruzowuhuza na Aston Villa mu mpera z'iyi ndwi. (Mirror)

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Suarez, Sancho, Bale, Hazard, Alli, Lingard, Ramsey
text: Borussia Dortmund yabwiye umukinyi wo ku ruhande, umwongereza Jadon Sancho w'imyaka 21, ko afise uburenganzira bwo kuva muri uyu murwi mu ci riza. (Bild - in German) Umumenyereza wa Manchester United Ole Gunnar Solskjaer ashira imbere kugura Sancho mu ci riza, n'aho bamwe mu bakinyi biwe bariko bakora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo umurwi wabo ugure umukinyi wo hagati wa  Aston Villa, umwongereza Jack Grealish w'imyaka 25. (Telegraph) Hari bamwe mu barongoye Tottenham babona ko bakwiye kugerageza kugarukana Mauricio Pochettino ngo asubire amenyereze uyu murwi. Pochettino, ubu asanzwe amenyereza Paris St-Germain, ashobora kuba yiteguye kugaruka muri uyo murwi wo mu Bwongereza. (Independent) Real Madrid iriteguye kwumviriza abashaka kugura umunya Pays de Galles (Wales) Gareth Bale w'imyaka 31 akina imbere ku ruhande, hamwe n'umuburigi Eden Hazard w'imyaka 30 akina hagati, mu ci riza.  (Sky Sports) Hazard aripfuza gusubira muri Chelsea, umurwi yari yavuyemwo mu 2019 aja muri Real. (El Chiringuito - in Spanish) Tottenham irategura kugurisha umukinyi wo hagati, umwongereza Dele Alli w'imyaka 25. (Football Insider) Luis Suarez avuga ko azoguma mu murwi  Atletico Madrid uherutse kwegukana igikombe c'ihiganwa La Liga ryo muri Espagne n'aho hari amakuru avugwa ko uyu mukinyi w'umunya Uruguay ashobora gusubira muri Liverpool. (Liverpool Echo) West Ham ifise ubwoba ko Manchester United ishobora kuyankira ko igura umukinyi wo hagati, umwongereza Jesse Lingard, akaguma muri uyo murwi burundu. Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 28 yarakoze birashimwa muri uno mwaka yamaze akinira West Ham nk'intizo. (Sun) Juventus iriteguye kugurisha umukinyi wo hagati, umunya Pays de Galles Aaron Ramsey w'imyaka 30.  (Calciomercato - in Italian) Barcelona iriko irategura kugiriranira ibiganiro n'umukinyi w'imbere, umufaransa Ousmane Dembélé w'imyaka 24 kugira ishobore kugiriranira ayandi masezerano na we. Vyitezwe ko amasezerano asanzwe afitaniye n'uyu murwi  azorangira mu ci ry'umwaka uza wa 2022.  (Mundo Deportivo - in Spanish) Barcelona na Bayern Munich buri yompi iriko iragerageza kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Liverpool, umunya Hollande Georginio Wijnaldum w'imyaka 30.  (Sky Sports) Leeds United iri mu biganiro kugira ngo ishobore kugura umukinyi wo ku ruhande, umunya Hollande  Noa Lang w'imyaka 21, yafashije umurwi Club Bruges wo mu Bubirigi gutahukana igikombe c'ihiganwa ry'iki gihugu muri uno mwaka w'inkino, akaba yakina muri uyo murwi yari yatijijwemwo na Ajax. (Mail) Wolverhampton Wanderers iri mu biganiro na Bruno Lage kugira ngo ayibere umumenyereza mushasha. Lage nta kazi afise kuva avuye muri  Benfica mu mwaka uheze. (Telegraph) Umumenyereza wa Newcastle Steve Bruce amenyesha ko azosaba amafaranga kugira ngo ashobore kugura abakinyi mu kiringo c'igura n'igurisha ry'abakinyi mu ci riza, aho ashira imbere ya vyose ukugura umukinyi wo hagati wa Arsenal,umwongereza Joe Willock w'imyaka 21. (Chronicle) Newcastle ishobora kandi no gusubira kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Celtic, umufaransa Olivier Ntcham w'imyaka 25 asanzwe yatijijwe muri Marseille. (Football Insider) Umunyegori w'umunya Australia Mat Ryan w'imyaka 29, avuga ko ashobora kubandanya ari muri Arsenal iyo yatijijwe avuye muri Brighton ikiringo kikaba carangiye.  (Mail) AC Milan iri hafi yo kugura umunyegori w'umufaransa Mike Maignan w'imyaka 25 asanzwe asamira Lille, ibishobora gutuma umunyegori w'umutaliyano Gianluigi Donnarumma w'imyaka 22 agenda, na rirya amasezerano afitaniye n'uyu murwi wo mw'ihiganwa Serie A azorangira mu ci riza.  (Sky Italia, via Mail)

headline: Igikombe c'isi (World Cup/Coupe du Monde) 2022: Ghana ivuga ko itegerezwa 'kwihora' Uruguay
text: Ghana iriteguye "kwihora" Uruguay inyuma y'itombora rya nijoro ryashize ibi bihugu mu murwi umwe mw'ihiganwa ry'igikombe c'isi mu 2022 mu mupira w'amaguru. Urukino hagati y'ibi bihugu mu murwi H, aho umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Ghana, Black Stars, uzohura kandi na Portugal hamwe na Korea y'Epfo, ruzokwibutsa urwabihuje mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma mw'ihiganwa ry'igikombe c'isi ryo mu 2010. Ghana yakuwe mw'ihiganwa na Uruguay ku ma penalties 4-2 muri iryo higanwa ryariko ribera muri Afrika y'Epfo, aho umusatirizi Asamoah Gyan yahushije penalty bari baronse ku munota wa nyuma wo muri ya minota y'agasunuzo (temps supplémentaire/extra-time) , inyuma y'aho Luis Suarez asamiye n'amaboko umupira wari ugiye kwinjira agaca ahabwa ikarata itukura. Umukuru w'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru rya Ghana, Kurt Okraku yabwiye BBC Sport Africa ati: "Twizeye ko kazoba ari akaryo ko kwihora". "Twari twamaze kwizera ko twari dutsinze urwo rukino rutari rusanzwe iyo bitaba birya bintu vyakozwe na Suarez. Rero biraryoshe kubona dusubiye guhura, bitwibutsa vyinshi ubu. "Ni ngombwa ko twerekana ukuri aho kuri". Umusatirizi Suarez, ubu afise imyaka 35 akaba ari umusatirizi wa Atletico Madrid inyuma y'imyaka yamaze muri Liverpool na Barcelona, aracakinira umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Uruguay imaze gutahukana iki gikombe incuro zibiri, mu gihe Ghana yoyo ata gihamana kinini co kuba igifise umukinyi wayo n'umwe yayikiniye mu 2010, haraciye imyaka 12. Ico gihe, urwo rukino rwabaye umubabaro kuri Afrika yose no kuri Ghana yari yiteze kuba igihugu ca mbere muri Afrika cari kuba gishitse mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma muri iri higanwa ry'igikombe c'isi yose. Mu bindi bihugu vya Afrika, Tunisia iri mu murwi umwe n'Ubufaransa busanzwe ari bwo bufise iki gikombe bwatahukanye mu 2018, nayo Cameroun ikaba iri kumwe na Brésil imaze gutsindira iki gikombe incuro zitanu zose. Sénégal iherutse gutsindira ihiganwa ry'igikombe ca Afrika iri mu murwi umwe na Qatar izokwakira iri higanwa, nayo Maroc ikaba iri kumwe n'Ububirigi buza ubugira kabiri ku rutonde rw'isi mu mupira w'amaguru. Iri higanwa rya FIFA ry'igikombe c'isi yose mu mupira w'amaguru ryitezwe gutangura ku wa 21 z'ukwa cumi na rimwe rirangire ku wa 18 z'ukwa cumi na kabiri uno mwaka. Raba hano: ingene imirwi itunganijwe mw'ihiganwa ry'uno mwaka rizobera muri Qatar Muri Afrika, ibihugu bitatu vyonyene nivyo bimaze gushika mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma (Quarts de finale); Cameroun mu 1990, Sénégal mu 2002 hamwe rero na Ghana mu 2010, aho yari yiteze gushika mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma iyo Suarez adakora iri kosa ry'agahomerabunwa.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Aguero, Pogba, Salah, Ramos, Van de Beek, Bissouma,Abraham
text: Everton yahambije Chelsea, Leeds United, Tottenham, Barcelona na Inter Milan mu rugamba rwo kurondera umusatirizi wa Argentina Sergio Aguero, ni mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye na Manchester City azorangira mu ci riza akazoshobora kuja aho ashatse atagisabwe. (Star on Sunday) Manchester United iriteguye kugurisha umukinyi wo hagati, Umufaransa Paul Pogba mu ci riza mu gihe uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 28 atoshaka kugiriranira ayandi masezerano n'uyu murwi. (Sun on Sunday) Umusatirizi wa Misiri, Mohamed Salah, avuga ko gushika ubu Liverpool ataco iravuga ko bijanye n'uko yohabwa ayandi masezerano kugira abandanye akinira uyu murwi, ni mu gihe amasezerano uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 28 asanzwe  afitaniye nawo azorangira mu ci rya 2023. (Sky Sports) Manchester United irarahira ikarengwa ko idashobora kwemera kugurisha mu ci riza umukinyi wayo wo hagati, umunya Hollande Donny van de Beek w'imyaka 24. (Sun on Sunday) Arsenal irizeye ko ishobora kuronka umukinyi wo hagati wa Brighton umunya Mali Yves Bissouma w'imyaka 24 ku miriyoni zababa 40 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. (Star on Sunday) AC Milan iriko irakurikiranira hagufi umusatirizi wa Chelsea, Umwongereza Tammy Abraham w'imyaka 23 asanzwe kandi ariko araronderwa na West Ham. (Standard) Umumenyereza w'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ububirigi Roberto Martinez ashobora kuba yiteguye gusubira  kurangurira amabanga yiwe mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza  Premier League  - kandi rero Tottenham ubu isanzwe idafise umumenyereza iriko iramukurikiranira hagufi. (Sun on Sunday) Umumenyereza wa Fulham Scott Parker na we nyene ariko araboneka nk'umuntu ashobora guhiganira gusubirira Jose Mourinho aherutse kwirukanwa na Tottenham, umurwi Parker yamazemwo imyaka ibiri nk'umukinyi. (Football Insider) Umumenyereza wa Bayern Munich Hansi Flick, ubu asanzwe ari mu nzira agenda, aripfuza kumenyereza umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubudagi mu gihe Joachim Low yogenda inyuma y'ihiganwa rya Buraya, kandi nta mugambi afise wo kuja kumenyereza Tottenham. (Sport1 - in German) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Real Madrid, umunya Espagne Sergio Ramos ubu afise imyaka 35 arizeye ko ashobora kubandanya akinira uyo murwi mu kiringo c'iyindi myaka ibiri iri imbere, ni mu gihe Real imaze kumwemerera uwundi mwaka umwe inyuma y'aho amasezerano afitaniye nayo azorangirira mu ci riza. (Marca) Amasezerano umunyegori w'Umutaliyano Gianluigi Donnarumma afitaniye na AC Milan azorangira mu ci riza, umuhagarikizi wiwe Mino Raiola akaba ari mu biganiro na Juventus kugira ngo uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 22 ashobore guca asimbirayo. (Calciomercato - in Italian) Umumenyereza wa Juventus Andrea Pirlo yagize ico avuga ku bihuha bimaze igihe ku bijanye na kazoza kiwe, akavuga ko amaze kuvugana na bene uyu murwi kandi ko ata mpungenge afise ku bijanye n'akazi kiwe..  (Goal) Umumenyereza wa Arsenal  Mikel Arteta ashobora kuba yipfuza guha akaryo umukinyi wo hagati, umwongereza Joe Willock w'imyaka 21 ubu asanzwe akina muri Newcastle United iyo yatijijwe, kugira ngo yerekane ubuhinga bwiwe muri uyu murwi . (Shields Gazzette) Arteta avuga kandi ko Arsenal "igiye kwihweza ico kibazo" mu gihe izoba iriko yihweza ingene yogiriranira ayandi masezerano n'uwundi mwongereza, Emile Smith Rowe w'imyaka 20. (Sky Sports) Aston Villa iriko iritegura kugura umukinyi w'inyuma wa Manchester United, Umwongereza Axel Tuanzebe w'imyaka 23. (Football Insider) Umuhagarikizi w'umukinyi w'inyuma Eric Garcia wa Espagne asanzwe akina muri Manchester City, ari hafi yo gushika ku masezerano ashobora gutuma uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 20 aja gukinira  Barcelona ata kirinze gusabwa, ni mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye na city azoba arangiye mu ci riza.  (Mundo Deportivo)

headline: Adama Traore akinira Wolves ategerezwa guhitamwo hagati ya Espagne na Mali
text: Umukinyi w'imbere ku ruhande rw'iburyo muri Wolverhampton Wanderers, Adama Traoré, yaratumweko ku munsi wa gatanu n'umumenyereza w'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Espagne, Luis Enrique, aho rero ni mu gihe hari haciye iminsi itatu Mali nayo imutumyeko. Traore, uyu mukinyi yavukiye i Barcelone muri Espagne ku bavyeyi bakomoka muri Mali, ariko araronderwa n'imirwi nserukirabihugu y'ibi bihugu vyompi kuva mu mezi 18 arangiye. Ku myaka 24, afise uburenganzira bwo guhitamwo igihugu yipfuza hagati y'ibi bibiri, kubera atarigera akinira umurwi n'umwe w'abakuze ku rwego mpuzamakungu. Aramaze gutumwako incuro zibiri Espagne, ariko biba ngombwa ko avamwo mu mwaka uheze kubera imvune, hanyuma no mu kw'icenda uno mwaka kubera yari yanduye Covid-19. Abajijwe ku kibazo ca Traore, umumenyereza Enrique yishuye ati:  "Ubu rero arashobora gukina kuko ni incuro igira gatatu atumweko". "Ndipfuza cane kumubona mu murwi nserukiragihugu wa Espagne. Nayo ku vyerekeye ko yatumweko na Mali, ni ah'iwe gufata ingingo". "Ariko ku vyo nzi, aripfuza gukina iwacu, ariko ni ingingo yiwe ubwiwe kandi turubahiriza ingingo ziba zifashwe n'abakinyi ku bibazo nk'ibi". Gushika ubu, Traore ntaragira ico ashikirije ku bijanye no guhamagarwa n'imirwi ibiri, n'aho abihweza ibintu n'ibindi mu bijanye n'umupira w'amaguru babona ko amahirwe menshi ari uko ahitamwo Espagne. Mu gihe Traore yokinira Espagne mu rukino rumwe gusa mu nkino zimirije mw'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi nserukirabihugu ya Bulaya, aho Espanye izohura n'Ubuswisi ku wa 10 z'uku, hanyuma na Ukraine haciye iminsi itatu, aho bizoba birangiye, ntazoshobora guhindura umurwi. Mali irarindiriye kandi ingingo izofatwa n'uwahoze ari umukinyi mpuzamakungu w'Ubufaransa, Abdoulaye Doucoure aherutse kwinjira muri Everton muri kano karuhuko k'inkino mpuzamakungu. Ariko rero hagize umwe mu bakinyi akinira Mali, aho arafise uburenganzira bwo guhindura, kuko kino gihugu ca Afrika citeze gukina urukino rwa kivandimwe. Nk'uko amategeko ya FIFA abivuga, abakinyi barengeje imyaka 21 barinze bakinira igihugu kanaka mw'ihiganwa ryo ku rwego mpuzamakungu mu bakuze, ntibashobora gukinira ikindi gihugu. Hagati aho, iyi ngingo iherutse guhindurwa mu nama ya FIFA mu kwezi guheze isanzwe iba buri mwaka, bafatiye ku ciyumviro cari catanzwe n'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru rya Maroc. Rero kuva ubu, abakinyi batararenza imyaka 21 barashobora guhindura igihugu bakinira iyo batarashobora gukina inkino zirenga zitatu. Hanyuma kandi, iyo umukinyi arinze akinira igihugu mu nkino za nyuma z'igikombe c'isi canke ku rwego rw'umugabane, nk'akarorero, igikombe c'imirwi nserukirabihugu ca Afrika, ntashobora guhindura igihugu. Ariko iyi ngingo ntikora iyo amaze gukina gusa mu nkino zo kurondera uburenganzira bwo kuja muri ayo mahiganwa mpuzamakungu.

headline: France: Karim Benzema yagarutse mu mugwi nserukiragihugu inyuma y'imyaka itanu
text: Umukinyi w'imbere wa Real Madrid, Karim Benzema ari ku rutonde rw'abakinyi 26 bahamagawe n'Ubufaransa mu nkino z'igikombe ca Buraya co muri iri ci inyuma y'imyaka yababa itandatu. Ntiyari bwakinire igihugu ciwe kuva mu 2015 kuva yagirijwe gushaka gucafuza mugenzi we bakinana mu mugwi w'Ubufaransa. Benzema w'imyaka 33 ntiyagiye mu nkino za Buraya zabereye mu Bufaransa mu 2016 hamwe n'igikombe c'isi yose catahukanywe n'ico gihugu mu 2018 kubera ivyo yagirizwa. Mu kwezi kwa mbere mu 2021, umushingwamanza w'umufaransa yamenyesheje ko Benzema ashobora gushikirizwa ubutungane. Yagirizwa kuriha abantu kugira bibe amahera ku ruyeri umukinyi wo hagati w'Ubufaransa, Mathieu Valbuena w'imyaka 36, mu kumutera ubwoba ko bashira ahabona amafoto yiwe y'ibiterasoni, ariko we akavugako ari umupolisi yamukoresheje mu buryo bumaramaje mu kugira akore ivyo. Inyuma yo kwemezwa ko Benzema yahamagawe mu mugwi, umumenyereza w'Ubufaransa Didier Deschamps yavuze ati: "Igikomeye cane ni uyu musi n'ejo. "Harabaye intambwe zihambaye. Twarabonanye. Twaraganiriye cane. Narifumviriye cane kugira mfate iyi ngingo. Nta co nshobora kuvuga kuvyo twaganiriye biraba twebwe gusa. Nari ndabikeneye, na we yarabikeneye." Hugo Lloris na Moussa Sissoko bo muri Tottenham Hotspur, umukinyi w'inyuma wa Everton Lucas Digne, umukinyi wa Chelsea Kurt Zouma, Olivier Giroud na N'Golo Kante hamwe na Paul Pogba ba Manchester United  bose bari kuri urwo rutonde

headline: Benjamin Mendy wa Man City basanze yera ku caha co gufata ku nguvu
text: Umucamanza yejeje umukinyi wa Manchester City, Benjamin Mendy, ku caha kimwe co gufata ku nguvu yagirizwa. Mendy w’imyaka 28 yambitswe izera kuri sentare Chester Crown Court ku caha yagirizwa co gufata ku nguvu umugore w’imyaka 19 muhira iwe i Prestbury, Cheshire, ku wa 24 Mukakaro (7) umwaka uheze. Uwo bagirizwa hamwe Louis Saha Matturie (atandukanye na Louis Laurent Saha yakinira Man U) w’imyaka 41 nawe nyene yejejwe ku vyaha bibiri yagirizwa vyo gufata ku nguvu uyo mugore nyene. Hagati aho, baracaburanywa ku bindi vyaha bishingiye ku gitsina, ariko bompi bakaba bavyiyamiriza. Matturie w’i Eccles, Salford, yejejwe kandi ikindi caha kimwe c’ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina yagirizwa ko yakoreye uyo mugore nyene. Ejo ku wa kabiri, umucamanza Stephen Everett yategetse umurwi w’abacamanza bariko barababuranya ko babeza kuri ivyo vyaha inyuma y’aho ubushikirizamanza bunaniwe no kwerekana ivyemezo, mbere ivyemezo vy’uko ata vyaba bagirizwa bikaba vyari vyaratanzwe. Yari yagabishije abacamanza ko batokwiteza utunyoni barondera impamvu ubushikirizamanza bwafashe ingingo yo kutabandanya barondera kubashirako ivyaha, kandi ko bobandanya bababuranisha “badahengamye” ku vyaha bitari bike bagikurikiranwako. Imbere y’aho, igihe avuga ko yafashwe ku nguvu, abacamanza babwiwe ko hari videwo y’umugore yariko “ararangura amabanga y’abubatse” yaryohewe cane na Matturie. Urubanza rwaciye rwunguruzwa hanyuma abacamanza basubiye gusasa, abashikirizamanza babwiye sentare ko ata vyemezo bakirondera ku vyaha bagirizwa bifatiye ku gitsina harimwo ivy’umugore w’imyaka 19. Icaha co gufata ku nguvu Mendy yagirizwa gifitaniye isano n’ivyabaye kuri Matturie igihe umugore yavuze ko yikanguye asanga uyu mukinyi w’umupira ariko aramusambanya ku nguvu. Mendy aracaburaywa ku vyaha bindi indwi kimwe co kugerageza gufata ku nguvu, hamwe n’ikindi kimwe c’ikubagura rishingiye ku gitsina yagirizwa ko yakoreye abagore batandatu. Abashikirizamanza bavuga ko Mendy yari “ikiryanyi cagize ubuhizi ukwiruka inyuma y’abagore kugira kibasambaye”. Matturie, umugenzi w’uyu mukinyi akaba ari na we amufasha, yagirizwa ko yahawe akazi ko kumuronderera abagore asambanya. Arahakana ivyaha bitandatu vyo gufata ku nguvu yagirizwa hamwe n’ibindi bitatu vy’ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina yagirizwa ko yakoreye abagore indwi. Aba bagabo bompi bavuga ko nimba harabaye ivyo guhuza ibitsina n’abo bagore canke abakobwa vyabaye ku mwumvikano. Urubanza rurabandanya.

headline: Real Madrid 3-1 Liverpool: Jurgen Klopp ati 'Twaborohereje cane'
text: Umumenyereza wa Liverpool Jurgen Klopp avuga ko uyu murwi "worohereje cane" Real Madrid bituma utsindwa muri runo rukino rwa mbere rw'igice ca kane gishira ica nyuma. Hagati aho, avuga ko igitsindo ca Mohamed Salah giha agahengwe Liverpool mu rukino rwo gusubiriza rutegekanijwe mu ndwi iza kuri Anfield, ikibuga ca Liverpool. N'aho itari ifise umukinyi wayo w'inyuma, Sergio Ramos, Real Madrid yaravyifashemwo neza cane kubera ubuhinga bw'abasatirizi bayo. Igice ca mbere c'uru rukino ni co cabaye inkorabara kuri Liverpool, igihe Vinicius Junior yinjirije igitsindo ku mupira yahawe na Tony Kroos awutereye kure cane, Marco Asensio nawe akinjiza ica kabiri kw'ikosa ryakozwe n'umukinyi w'inyuma Trent Alexander-Arnold. Liverpool yarinanase mu gice ca kabiri, maze Mohamed Salah atsinda igitsindo kimwe rudende cagaruye icizere. Hagati aho, hasigaye iminota 25 ngo urukino rurangire, wa wundi nyene yinjiza ica mbere, Vinicius, yateye ica kabiri, ibizotuma ibintu bitoroha mu rukino rwo ku wa 14 z'uku kwa kane ku kibuga ca Anfield, ruzokinwa ata bafana bari mu kibuga ngo batere intege Liverpool. Mu kiganiro na televiziyo BT Sport yo mu Bwongereza, Klopp yavuze ati: "Ushaka gukina igice ca kabiri [demi-finale], utegerezwa kurondera uburenganzira bwo gushikayo. Twananiwe, cane cane mu gice ca mbere c'urukino". "Ntitwakinye neza nk'uko twategerezwa kugira ngo dusatire Real Madrid. Twaborohereje cane". "Ikintu kimwe conyene novuga, turetse igitsindo twaronse, ni uko uru rukino ari igice ca mbere. Nta kintu kinini twari twiteze ariko kirya gitsindo kiraduha icizere". Ku wa gatandatu w'indwi iheze, mu mukino wa Premier League, Liverpool yaranyagiye umurwi wa Arsenal 3-0, mu rukino bamwe babona ko ari icemezo ko yasubiranye itoto inyuma y'igihe ibintu bitameze neza. Ariko urukino rwa nijoro, rwarerekanye ko ataho irashika kuko yarushijwe bimwe biboneka, aho vyabonetse ko batakaza umupira cane basatiriwe na Real. Igitsindo ca Salah catanze umwizero ko kumbure Liverpool yashobora kuronka n'ibindi, igatsinda urukino canke ikanganya, ariko vyaranse. Igitsindo ca gatatu ca Real caravyumyuye, kuko caciye intege Liverpool itegerezwa gukora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo ifate ibintu mu minwe mu rukino rwo mu ndwi iza. Kugira ngo izoshobore kubandanya mu gice ca kabiri, ni uko Liverpool izokwerekana inguvu zidasanzwe nk'izo yekeranye mu 2019, igihe yirahira Barcelona mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma, igakurayo ibitsindo bitatu vyose ku busa yari yatewe mu rukino rwa mbere, ikaninjiza ica kane, maze Barcelona iba irasezeye ihiganwa mu vyo itari yiteze. Ariko ni ibintu bitazoba vyoroshe na gato, na rirya Real Madrid itarigera itsindwa na rimwe kuva mu kwa mbere, ikaba ifise n'uyu mumenyereza Zinedine Zidane amenyereye cane iri higanwa rya Champions League, abatari bake bibuka ko hagati ya 2016 na 2018 yatsindiye iri higanwa incuro zitatu yikurikiranya. Kandi noneho Real yaraye yerekanye ko ari umurwi utoroshe n'aho abakinyi b'inyuma bayo babiri batarimwo, ari bo Sergio Ramos yavunitse, hamwe na Raphaël Varane aherutse kwandura ca kiza ca Covid-19, n'aho na Liverpool ibuze ivyugazo vyayo Virgil van Dijk na Joe Gomez.

headline: Dikembe Mutombo: Icamamare muri NBA  ariko aravurwa ikivyimba mu bwonko
text: Dikembe Mutombo yatwaye agashimwe ka All-Star muri NBA incuro umunani ariko aravurwa ikivyimba co mu bwonko. Uwo mukinyi  w’imyaka 56 yavukiye muri Repuburika ye Demolrasi ya Congo (RDC) yamaze imyaka 18 akina mw'ihiganwa rya basketball rya NBA, mu migwi ya Denver Nuggets, Atlanta Hawks na Houston Rockets. Muri Hawks uwo mukinyi yambara nomero 55 yafashe ikiruhuko c’iza bukuru mu 2015 – uwo mwaka nyene aca yinjizwa muri Hall of Fame [inzu ndangabuzima y‘ivyamamare muri uwo mukino] – mu nyuma Nuggets nabo baca barakurikira. Itangazo rya NBA rivuga ko "ariko aritabwaho mu buryo bwose bushoboka n’umugwi ufashanya w’abaganga b’abahinga i Atlanta kandi akaba yerekana ko afise ireme ubwo yatanguye kuvurwa." "Dikembe n‘umuryango wiwe basaba kurekerwa ubuzima bwabo bwite kugira baronke umwanya wo kumwitaho. Barashima cane ibisabisho vyanyu n’ivyifuzo vyiza." Mutombo wa 2,18m z’uburebure yabonywe igihe yariko ariga kuri kaminuza ya Georgetown. Ku buhinga bwiwe bwo kuzibira imipira [y’abashaka kwinjiza], yabaye umukinyi wa mbere mu kuzibira imipira muri NBA mu biringo bitanu bikurikirana vy’inkino n’imipira izibiwe mu rukino rumwe mu biringo bitatu bikurikirana. Yarakinye kandi muri Philadelphia 76ers, New Jersey Nets na New York Knicks hanyuma aza ubugira kabiri ku rutonde rw’abazibiye imipira cane muri NBA mu nkino z’umwuga igihe yafata ikuruhuko c’izabukuru mu 2011. Hamwe no kuba intumwa (ambassadeur) ya NBA kw’isi, Mutombo yaranakoze ibikorwa vy’ugufasha kuva ahagaritse gukina nk’umwuga. Mu vyo yakoze harimwo guha uburyo ibitaro i Kinshasa, umurwa mukuru wa RDC.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Trippier, Koulibaly, Barella, Areola, Griezmann, Bellerin, Tielemans
text: Umukinyi w'inyuma w'Ubwongereza na Atletico Madrid  Kieran Trippier w'imyaka 30 aripfuza gusubira muri Premier League ubu akaba arindiriye kwimukira muri Manchester United. (Telegraph - subscription needed) Everton yatanguye kuvugana n'umukinyi w'inyuma wa Napoli umunya Senegal Kalidou Koulibaly w'imyaka 30, akaba avugwa ko ari umwe mu baronderwa cane n'umumenyereza mushasha Rafa Benitez . (Calciomercato) Liverpool ivugwa ko iriko irategura igifovya c'amadorari hafi 83 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika kugira ngo ishobore kugura umukinyi wo hagati wa Inter Milan n'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubutaliyano uherutse gutahukana Euro 2020 , Nicolo Barella w'imyaka 24.  (La Repubblica) Liverpool ishobora gutanga Divock Origi canke Xherdan Shaqiri kugira ngo ishobore kuronka Saul Niguez akina muri Atletico Madrid. (Daily Express) Chelsea irashaka guha Borussia Dortmund  umusatirizi w'umwongereza Tammy Abraham w'imyaka  23 mu masezerano yoyishoboza kugura umusatirizi wa Norvege Erling Braut Haaland w'imyaka 20.   (Mirror) West Ham iri hafi yo gushika ku masezerano y'intizo, ariko igashobora no kuzogura umunyegori wa Paris St-Germain umufaransa Alphonse Areola w'imyaka 28. (Evening Standard) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Arsenal umunya Espagne Hector Bellerin ntarashobora kwumvikana na  Inter Milan n'aho ari wo murwi uhabwa amahirwe menshi yo gutahukakana uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 26. (Football.london) Hagati aho, umukinyi wo hagati w'aba ba Gunners  Joe Willock w'imyaka 21 avugwa ko yoba yabwiye uwu murwi wiwe ko yipfuza gusubira muri Newcastle nk'intizo mu kiringo w'uwundi mwaka w'inkino buca utangura.  (Daily Express) Ariko, umumenyereza wa Arsenal Mikel Arteta avuga ko Emile Smith Rowe adashobora kugurishwa muri rino ci n'aho Aston Villa ivugwa ko imushaka cane. (HITC) Leicester City yagiriraniye amasezerano mashasha y'igihe kirekire n'umubirigi Youri Tielemans w'imyaka 24, kandi ifise icizere ko uyu mukinyi wo hagati azoguma muri uyu murwi n'aho Liverpool imwipfuza. (Telegraph - subscription needed) Hagati aho, umunyegori wa Liverpool Alisson ari hafi yo gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha n'uyu murwi. (HITC via Here We Go Podcast) Barcelona isa n'iyamaze gushika ku masezerano yo kurungika umusatirizi wayo w'umufaransa Antoine Griezmann w'imyaka 30 mu murwi wa Atletico Madrid yahoze akinira, maze nawo ukayiha umukinyi wo hagati, umunnya Espagne Saul Niguez w'imyaka 26. (Mail) Tottenham ni umwe mu mirwi ine ya Premier League yipfuza kugura umusatirizi wa Schalke, umunyamerika Matthew Hoppe w'imyaka 20 yashoboye kwinjiza ibitsindo bitandatu muri uyu murwi wo mw'ihiganwa Bundesliga  ry'Ubudagi mu mwaka w'inkino urangiye. (The Boot Room) Umukinyi w'inyuma Brandon Williams w'imyaka 20, bishobora kunanirana ko atizwa mu murwi Southampton kubera amafaranga asabwa n'umurwi wiwe wa  Manchester United. (talkSPORT) Umumenyereza wa Roma  Jose Mourinho ashobora kwerekeza amaso i Old Trafford mu ntumbero yo gukomeza umurwi wiwe, uyu yahoze amenyereza Man United akaba ariko araraba ingene yoronka umukinyi w'inyuma ku ruhande rw'ibubamfi, umunya Brésil Alex Telles w'imyaka 28, kugira ngo ashobore gusubirira Leonardo Spinazzola aherutse kuvunika. (Daily Star) Arsenal iboneka ko idashobora kuronka umusatirizi wa  PSV Eindhoven, umunya Hollande Donyell Malen w'imyaka 22, inyuma y'aho yemereye ko ashobora kwimukira muri Borussia Dortmund kugira ngo asubirire Jadon Sancho.  (Just Arsenal via Sports Bild) Tottenham iri hafi yo kugura umukinyi w'inyuma wa Bologna, umuyapani Takehiro Tomiyasu w'imyaka 22 ku giciro gishobora kwababa imiriyoni 20 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika hariko n'utundi turusho.  (The Athletic - subscription needed) Umukinyi wo hagati aronderwa na Newcastle umufaransa Boubacar Kamara w'imyaka 21 yanse gutera igikumu ku yandi masezerano n'umurwi wiwe wa Marseille. Aba Magpies bashobora kuba bariko bararondera kuzana uyu mukinyi ku miriyoni yababa 20 y'amadorari y'abanyamerika.  (HITC via Alfredo Pedulla) Leeds United ihanganye n'umurwi utavuzwe izina wa Premier League, hamwe n'uwundi wo muri La Liga muri Espagne, mu rugamba rwo kurondera umunyegori wa Norvège Kristoffer Klaesson w'imyaka 20 asanzwe asamira Valerenga wo muri Norvège. (Mirror)

headline: CECAFA: Uganda yatsinze u Burundi mu guhiganira ikibanza ca 3
text: Umurwi nserukiragihugu w'u Burundi w'abigeme uyu munsi watsinzwe n'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Uganda mu rukino rw'uguhiganirwa ikibanza ca gatatu mw'ihiganwa rya CECAFA y'abigeme  ryabera muri Tanzania. Urukino rwarangiye Uganda itsinze ibitsindo bibiri ku busa bw'u Burundi. Umumenyereza w'umurwi w'u Burundi avuga ko ashima ingene abakinyi biwe bitanze batiziganya n'aho batsinze. Kuri uyu wa mbere niho haba inkino za nyuma z'ihiganwa CECAFA rihuza imirwi nserukirabihugu y'abigeme i Dar es Salaam. Igitsindo ca mbere ca Uganda cagiye kuboneka ku munota wa 61 cinjijwe na Aminah Nababi , ica kabiri kiboneka ku munota wa 81 gitewe na Shamirah Nalujja. Daniella Nibimenya asanzwe amenyereza abakinyi b'u Burundi ati: "Twari twiteze ko dushobora gutahana ikibanza ca gatatu, ariko ntivyakunze. Hagati aho, abakinyi banje bakinye neza kuvyo ntari niteze". Ku ruhande rw'umurwi wa Uganda, ni umunezero ku mumenyereza w'umurwi wayo, Faridah Bulega, avuga ko hagati aho batarondera ikibanza ca gatatu. Ati: "Umuntu arategura ivyiwe, Imana nayo igategura ivyayo. Twebwe twari twiteguriye guheza turi aba mbere, ariko Imana nayo yashimye ko turangiza turi aba gatatu". Muri iryo higanwa ryatanguye ku wa 16 z'uku kwezi kw'icumi na rimwe, Uburundi bwari mu murwi B kumwe na Tanzania, Sudani y'Epfo, na Zanzibar. U Burundi bukaba bwarashoboye gutsinda ibihugu vya Zanzibar na Sudani y'Epfo. Umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Kenya niwo utahukanenye igikombe c'iryo higanwa inyuma y'ugutsinda umurwi wa Tanzania ibitsindo 2-0 mu rukino rwari rwatanguye isaha cumi mu masaha ya Dar es Salaam.

headline: Marcus Rashford wa Man U yaraye atyojwe ku mbuga hwaniro kubera ibara y'urukoba rwiwe
text: Umusatirizi wa Manchester United Marcus Rashford avuga ko yaraye ahuye n'ikibazo c'ihohotera rishingiye ku rukoba mw'ijoro ry'ejo ku wa gatandatu. Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 22 aherutse kuronswa agashimwe ku gikorwa yakoze co kurwanya ubukene bw'imfungurwa mu bana, yaronse ubutumwa bwinshi bw'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba bumutuka ku rubuga rwa Instagram ejo k uwa gatandatu. Ubu butumwa yaburungikiwe inyuma y'urukino rwahuje umurwi wiwe na Arsenal rukarangira ari 0-0. Aciye kuri Twitter yanditse ati: "Ndi umwirabure kandi imisi yose nama ndavyishimira". "Nta n'umwe, canke amajambo ayo ari yo yose yovuga, ashobora kuntuma niyumva ukundi. Nimba washaka kwumva amajambo akomeye hano, wihangane, hano nta na kimwe unyumvako". "Nta mashusho y'ubu butumwa (screenshots) ndakwereka. Gukora ibi kwoba ari ukwisuzuguza kandi nk'uko ubizi nta gishasha kirimwo". "Mfise abana beza b'amabara atandukanye bankurikira kandi ibi ntavyo bakeneye gusoma. Amabara meza akeneye guhimbazwa". Mu kiganiro c'umwihwezo w'urukino rw'umusi (Match of the Day), Ian Wright yahoze ari umusatirizi wa Arsenal n'Ubwongereza, yavuze ko abategetsi n'amakompanyi y'imbuga hwaniro bakwiye gukora ibishoboka kugira bamenye abakoze ivyo. Avuga ati: "Umengo ni ibisanzwe ko mu gihe umwirabure akinye nabi - canke bakaba ariko bavyibaza  - baca batangura kuvuga aya muhe. Hariho uburyo bwo gufata abantu. Ntibari maso bihagije, nta na gato". "Ni ikintu bategerezwa gukorana  [abategetsi n'imbuga hwaniro]. Ariko rero wibaza ko bavyitaho"? Jermaine Jenas yahoze akina hagati mu mirwi ya Tottenham, Newcastle n'Ubwongereza, yongerako ati: "Izi mbuga, jewe nkeneye ko zinyereka aba bantu kandi zikatubwira ico ziriko zirakora kugira zirengutse aba bantu imbere y'ubutungane. Kuri abo babaza igituma tubandanya dupfukama, ngira barabibonye". Ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Bwongereza rishimangira ko ryiyemeje kurwanya ivangura iryo ari ryo ryose. Itangazo ryasohoye rigira riti: "Twese mu mupira w'amaguru dufatanye mu nda mu kwiyamiriza ivangura iryo ari ryo ryose. Ibi ntawushobora kuvyihanganira aho ari ho hose mu gihugu cacu". "Tuzobandanya dukorana n'abo bose babifisemwo uruhara, reta n'imbuga ntangamakuru kugira turwanye ivangura  - eka n'ibindi vyose vyorikomokako - mu rukino rwacu". Ejo ku wa gatandatu nyene, umugabo umwe yarahagaritswe inyuma y'ubutumwa bw'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba yarungikiye umukinyi wo hagati wa West Bromwich Albion, Romaine Sawyers. Ku wa gatanu naho, Chelsea yavuze ko "yababaye cane" inyuma y'aho umukinyi w'inyuma ku ruhande rw'i buryo Reece James, atyogerejwe ku mbuga hwaniro kubera ari umwirabure. Ku wa gatatu, abandi bakinyi basanzwe bakinana na Rashford, ari bo Axel Tuanzebe na Anthony Martial baratyogejwe ku mbuga hwaniro nyene kubera ibara ry'urukoba rwabo, inyuma y'aho umurwi wabo Man U utsindiwe na Sheffield United. Ku wa mbere w'iyi ndwi, reta y'Ubwongereza yaragiriraniye ibiganiro n'abahoze ari abakinyi, co kimwe n'abakiri abakinyi, ku kungene ivangura n'ihohotera rishingiye ku rukora vyotuzwa.

headline: Uefa Euro 2020 itangura uno munsi: Ibi ni ivyankenerwa womenya kuri iri higanwa ribaye ritevye
text: Ihiganwa ry'umupira w'amagaru Euro 2020 riratangura kuri uno wa Gatanu - mu gihe n'ubundi ryobaye ihiganwa ridasanzwe, rizokwitandukanya n'ayandi ku mpamvu nyinshi. Iri higanwa ryagumanye izina ryaryo naho ryigijwe inyuma umwaka umwe kubera ikiza ca Covid-19. Ubu rizoba kuva itariki 11 z'ukwa gatandatu gushika 11 z'ukw'indwi, ribere mu bihugu 11, bitandukanijwe n'ibirometero 4.766. Ni ihiganwa rya mbere rikomeye mu rwego rw'abagabo ku gihugu ca Scotland kuva mu 1998, mu gihe Ubwongereza bushora kwungukira mu gukiniria muhira hafi y'inkino zabwo zose, nayo Wales ikaba igiye muri Euros ubugira kabiri yikurikiranya. Ubwongereza na Scotland, biri mu mugwi umwe, ni bibiri mu bihugu vyakiriye izi nkino zo ku rwego rwa Buraya, za mbere zibereye hirya no hino kuri uyu mugabane. Ni ihiganwa rya mbere rikomeye ku rwego rw'abagabo ribereye ku butaka bw'Ubwongereza kuva igihe ca Euro 1996. Ihiganwa riratanguzwa n'urukino hagati y'Ubutaliyano na Turkiya rubera i Roma kuri uyu wa gatanu itariki 11 z'ukwa gatandatu (19:00 ku saha mpuzamakungu), rizoheraherezwe i Wembley mu muji wa London kuwa Mungu itariki 11 z'ukw'indwi. Iyindi miji izokwakira izi nkino ni Glasgow, Amsterdam, Baku, Bucharest, Budapest, Copenhagen, St Petersburg, Munich, Rome na Seville. Haritezwe abarorerezi mu nkino zose 51. Inkino zobereye i Dublin zimuriwe i St Petersburg hamwe na Longon, imiji isanzwe izokwakira inkino z'iri higanwa, nayo izobereye i Bilbao zajanywe i Seville - kuko ata n'umwe muri iyo miji yari kwizeza yuko izokwemerera abarorerezi kwinjira mu bibuba. Abarorerezi benshi kurusha ahandi bitezwe ku kibuga ca Puskas Arena i Budapest - gisanzwe cakira abarorerezi 68.000 - gitegekanya kuzokwakira 100% vy'abarorerezi gishobora kwakira. Ibibuga vya Wembley Stadium na Hampden Park bitegekanya kwakira 25% vy'abo bishobora kwakira - ni kuvuga abantu 25.000 na 12.000 nk'uko bikurikirana. Wembley izokwakira inkino z'ica kabiri gishira icanyuma hamwe n'inkino zanyuma, ishobora kuzokwongera igitigiri c'abarorerezi uko inkino zizoja ziraba. Kwuzuza ibibanza vyayo vyose 90.000 ni ibintu bishobora kuzoshika ku rukino rwa nyuma, mu gihe ingingo zo kwirinda Covid zose zokurwako ku tariki 21 z'ukwa gatandatu. Ahandi, i St Petersburg na Baku, bazokwakira 50% vy'abashobora kwinjira bose, nayo iyindi miji - Amsterdam, Bucharest, Copenhagen, Munich, Rome na Seville - yakire hagati ya 22% na 45%. Ingingo ku gitigiri c'abarorerezi bashobora kwinjira yafashwe n'uturere/intara ukwavyo, si ingingo yafashwe na Uefa. Ibihumbi vy'abarorerezi bari baraguze amatike mu 2019 - amatike yabo yahinduwe impfagusa banasubizwa amafaranga kubera abantu bake ibibuga bizoshobora kwakira. Ariko abagize amahirwe yo kugumana amatike yabo bazoba bafise izindi ntambamyi nkeyi zo gukura mu nzira imbere y'uko baja kuraba inkino. Buri muji ufise amategeko yawo - ariko abafana bazotegerezwa kwambara udupfukamunwa mu nkino zose (kiretse bafise urupapuro rwa Muganga rubemerera kutatwambara). Hazoba kandi hari imiti yo gukaraba intoke hose ku kibuga kandi abarorerezi bazosabwa kuguma mu bibanza vyabo uko bishoboka kwose kugira birinde kwegerana cane. Glasgow, Munich na Baku ntibaremeza niba bizokenerwa kwipimisha imbere yo kwinjira mu kibuga - ariko ivyo birashobora guhinduka. Kuva i Seville mu burengero bw'umugabane wa Buraya gushika i Baku iri mu buseruko ku birometero 4.766, ni urugendo rurerure ruzokenera gufata indege kenshi muri iri higanwa rya Euro 2020 - yaba ku bakinyi canke ku bihumbi vy'abarorerezi bazoba bashaka gushigikira amakipe yabo. Kubera ingingo zo gukumira Covid bisigura yuko indege zizoba ari nkeyi cane ugereranije n'uko vyari vyitezwe aho haharurwa ingendo z'indege imiriyoni zibiri z'inyongera kubera iri higanwa, ariko naho nyene zizoba ari nyinshi. Abarorerezi b'Ubusuwisi bashobora kuzokora urugenro rw'ibirometero 20.000 - harimwo ingendo zitatu i Baku zirimwo kugenda no kugaruka hagati canke mu burengero bwa Buraya. Hari kandi no kwibaza niba koko ari nkenerwa guhimiriza abarorerezi b'ibihugu 24 kugendera ibihugu vyoshika nka bitanu mu kiringo c'ukwezi kumwe kandi hasanzwe hari ikiza ca Covid.

headline: Erik ten Hag: Manchester United yagenye uwahora amenyereza Ajax nk'umumenyereza mushasha
text: Manchester United yagenye uwahora amenyereza Ajax, Erik Ten Hag nk'umumenyereza mushasha. Uwo muholande w'imyaka 52, agiye gusubirira umumenyereza mfatakibanza Ralf Rangnick mu mpera ry'iri higanwa, mu kiringo c'imyaka itatu, ashobora kwongerwako uwundi mwaka. Rangnick, yari yasubiriye Ole Gunnar Solskjaer yirukanywe mu kwezi kwa cumi na rimwe, bitegekanijwe ko aja mu kibanza c'umujenama. Ten Hag azoba abaye umumenyereza wa Man Utd agira gatanu inyuma y'aho Sir Alex Ferguson afatiye akaruhuko k'iza bukuru mu 2013. Ten Hag yagize ati: "Ni iteka rikomeye kuri jewe kugenwa kuba umumenyereza wa Manchester United  kandi nkaba niteguriye n'ibikorwa biri imbere bindindiriye. "Ndazi kahise k'uyu mugwi w'igihangange n'inyota y'abafana, nkaba rero niteguriye cane guteza imbere uyu mugwi  kugira ushike ku ntambwe ukwiriye." Umugwi wa United uri mu kibanza ca gatandatu  mw'ihiganwa rya 'Premier League' mu gihe hasigaye inkino zitanu muri uyu mwaka, amanota atatu inyuma ya Tottenham, uri mu kibanza ca kane. Ajax iri mu kibanza ca mbere mw'ihiganwa ryo muri Hollande - ikaba irusha amanota ane PSV Eindhoven - ikaba inasigaje gukina inkino zitanu, n'aho batsinzwe n'abakeba babo mu rukino rw'igikombe c'ico gihugu. Ten Hag, yamenyereje Ajax kuva mu kwezi kwa cumi na kabiri 2017, yarabashikanye mu nkino z'igikombe c'ibihugu vya Buraya, atwara n'ibikombe bibiri mu 2018-19 hamwe na 2020-21. Bashitse mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma c'igikombe ca Buraya mu 2018-19, habura gato ngo baje mu nkino za nyuma, bivuye kuri Tottenham yaciye igombora. Itorwa rya Ten Hag ryahora rinuganugwa co kimwe n'umumenyereza wa Paris St-Germain Mauricio Pochettino, inyuma y'ayo n'uwa Seville Julen Lopetegui ashiriwe mu majwi. Vyitezwe ko Ten Hag azana uwahoze ari umumenyereza canke umukinyi wa United kumufasha, na cane cane ko uwari asigaye afitaniye isano na Solskjaer, Mike Phelan, ashobora kutaguma muri uwo mugwi. Solskjaer yirukanywe bivuye ku rukino Manchester United yatsinzwemwo na Watford 4-1 rwatumye uwo mugwi umanuka mu kibanza c'indwi. Kuva Rangnick ashikiriye uwo mugwi itariki 3 z'ukwezi kwa cumi na kabiri, United yari imaze gutsinda incuro icenda, inganya incuro zitandatu, itsindwa incuro 19.

headline: Chelsea: Romelu Lukaku yasavye imbabazi akaba yagarutse mu bandi bakinyi, bivugwa na Thomas Tuchel
text: Romelu Lukaku yasavye imbabazi akaba aza kugarukanwa ku rutonde rw'abakinyi ba Chelsea mu rukino rwa mbere rw'igice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma ca Carabao Cup ruhuza Chelsea na Tottenham kuri uyu wa gatatu, nk'uko bivugwa n'umumenyereza Thomas Tuchel. Lukaku yashizwe ku ruhande mu rukino rwo ku wa Mungu rwa Premier League  rwahuje Chelsea na Liverpool rugahera ari 2-2, ni inyuma y'amajambo yavuze mu kiganiro yagiranye n'umunyamakuru, haraciye indwi zitatu. Lukaku na Tuchel baraganiriye bashira hamwe ku wa mbere ku bijanye n'ingene uyu musatirizi yogarukanwa ku rutonde rw'abandi. Kuva ico gihe, Lukaku avuga ati "ndasavye imbabazi ku wo noba naratirimukije". Lukaku yabwiye ikinyamakuru ca Chelsea gikorera ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi ati: "Nategerezwa gusobanura neza ivyo navuze". "Iki kiganiro cari cerekeye ingene yasezeye abafana ba Inter [Milan] , nticari cerekeye kwifatira mu gahanga abafana [ba Chelsea], abakinyi bagenzanje, umurwi n'umumenyereza. "Bagize utwigoro twinshi kugira bangarukane hano kandi naripfuza kugaruka, Nari mu butumwa kuva ngiye, rero ndatahura agashavu k'abafana, ariko ubu ni ah'iwanje gukora uko nshoboye kwose nkerekana ko nitayeho igikorwa canje ijana kw'ijana". Muri ico kiganiro cafashwe amajwi mu kwa cumi na kabiri, uyu mukinyi wa Chelsea yaguzwe imiriyoni zababa 132 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika, yavuze ko "atari agononokewe" n'ikibanza afise kuri Tuchel, kandi ko yipfuza gusubira muri Inter Milan atari kera. Ariko Lukaku, mu butumwa yahaye abafana b'uyu murwi, yongeyeko ati: "Ndasavye imbabazi ku wo noba naratirimukije. Ni mwe muzi ubucuti mfitaniye n'uyu murwi kandi ndatahura cane kubona mwarashavuye". "Nticari co gihe kandi ndipfuza ko ntera nja imbere kugira ndabe ko twotangura gutsinda inkino". Mu kiganiro yagiranye n'abanyamakuru ejo ku wa kabiri, umumenyereza Tuchel yavuze ati: "Yasavye imbabazi kandi yagarutse hamwe n'abandi bakinyi mu myimenyerezo y'uno musi. "Twarihaye umwanya kugira ngo tubitorere umuti. Kuri jewe, igikenewe gusumba ni ugutahura - kandi gutahura neza - ko ata gushaka kwarimwo. Ntiyabikoze n'ibigirankana kugira ngo haduke induru imbere y'urukino rukomeye". Imbere y'uko uru rukino rwo ku wa Mungu ruba rukaza kurangira iyi mirwi yompi inganya 2-2, Tuchel yavuze ko yashize ku ruhande uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 28 kugira ngo "imyimenyerezo igende neza". Tuchel  yongeyeko ati: "N'imbere y'aha, igihe kuri we yabona ko yari yiteguye gukina inyuma y'imvune yari yanduye kuva mu ntango ariko twebwe tukabona ko vyari vyiza kumuha akanya kugira ngo yitegure neza, ntiyigeze yerekana inyifato mbi na ntoya ku murwi. "Rero bwari bwo bwa mbere yiyumvira uku. Ni ngombwa gutekana mu mutima no kumenya ko ibintu bitayangaye nk'uko abantu bipfuza ko biba". Lukaku amaze kwinjiza ibitsindo indwi mu nkino 18 amaze gukina kuva agarutse muri Chelsea avuye muri Inter Milan mu Butaliyano mu kwa munani. Yagiye ahura n'imvune hamwe n'indwara kuva asubiye i Stamford Bridge, rimwe rimwe akaba yagiye ashirwa ku ruhande n'aho ata ngorane yaba afise. Uyu mumenyereza w'aba Blues avuga ko Lukaku "azi ivyo yakoze", kandi ko uyu musatirizi "yumva neza ko ari ngombwa kuri we gusubiza ibintu mu buryo". Tuchel ati: "Aracari umukinyi wacu, kandi dufise impamvu nziza, zifadika zo kumukinisha no kumwumvisha ko ategerezwa gukora cane".

headline: CECAFA: U Burundi bwaraye busezeye ihiganwa ry'igikombe ry'imrwi nserukirabihugu y'abagabo
text: U Burundi bwaraye busezeye ihiganwa ry'igikombe ca CECAFA rihuza imirwi nserukirabihugu y'abakuze ku ruhande rw'abagabo ririko ribera mu gihugu ca Uganda, inyuma y'ugutsindwa mu nkino zine zose. Mu nkino z'imbere y'aho, Intamba zari zatsinzwe na Uganda mu rukino rwa mbere rwabaye ku wa 07/12, zitsindwa na Eritrea mu rukino rwo ku wa mbere 09/12, zitsindwa kandi na Djibuti ku wa 11/12 . N'aho ku ruhande rw'abigeme batarenza imyaka 17, u Burundi bwarirahiye Djibuti, ivyabahaye umwizero mu rukino rw'ejo ku wa Mungu. Mu rukino rw'ejo, umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Somalia watsinze Intamba mu Rugamba z'u Burundi igitsindo kimwe ku busa, catsinzwe n'umukinyi Abdulahi Omar. Muri urwo rukino , Intamba baragerageje gusatira ariko biranka, urukino rukaba rwagiye kurangira mbere basigaye ari cumi inyuma y'aho Landry Ndikumana aronkeye ikarata zibiri z'umuhondo agaca asohorwa. Mu gice ca mbere, umunyegori wa Somalia yakoze ibintu bikomeye cane aho yatewe imipira itari mike ariko arayikurayo. U Burundi nta nota na rimwe bufise, abatari bake bakabona ko umumenyereza Alain Olivier Niyungeko batazira Mutombola atagifise ubushobozi bwo kumenyereza uyo murwi, nk'uko bagiye babishikiriza ku mbuga hwaniro. Iryo higanwa ryatanguye ku wa 07 z'ukukw'icumi ka kabiri rikazorangira kw'igenekerezo rya 19 uku kwezi nyene. Ku rundi ruhande, mw'ihiganwa ry'imirwi nserukirabihugu y'abagore ku batarenza imyaka 17 naryo nyene ririko ribera muri ico gihugu ca Uganda, umugwi nserukira gihugu w'abigeme, w'u Burundi waraye wihaye iteka mu gutsinda umurwi wa Djibuti ibitsindo 8-0. Lydia Karenzo yatsinze ibitsindo bitatu, Bora Ineza nawe atera bine, ikindi kikaba cagiye kwinjizwa na Neema Nzohabonayo Ni inyuma y'aho mu rukino rwa mbere, uwo murwi wari watsinzwe n'umurwi wa Uganda, ibitsindo 4-0, naho urukino rwayihuje na Tanzania ku wa gatatu rukaba rwagiye kurangira ata n'umwe usumbije uwundi. Kuri uyu wa Mungu, uyo murwi Intamba mu Rugamba w'abatarenza imyaka 17 ku ruhande rw'abagore uza gutana mu mitwe na Kenya.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru kuri uyu wa gatanu itariki 25.06.2021: White, Malen, Grealish, Xhaka, Braithwaite, McGinn, Saliba
text: Aston Villa baracizeye kugumana umukinyi wabo wo hagati Jack Grealish,25, aronderwa cane na Manchester City, Chelsea na Manchester United. (Athletic, subscription required) Abaserukira Grealish, na bo basaba ko ava muri uwo mugwi wa Villa, kugira ashobore kuza arahembwa pawundi imiliyoni 100 agiye mu mugwi wa Manchester City. (Sun) Arsenal iteye ku ntambwe ishimishije mu biganiro na Brighton vyo kuzana umunyegoli wo mu Bwongereza Ben White, 23, ashobora kugurwa amapawundi arenga imiliyoni 50. (Sky Sports) Uwo mugwi kandi wa Dean Smith nta mugambi ufise wo kugurisha umukinyi wo hagati wa Ecosse John McGinn, 26, muri uyu mwaka, mu gihe Liverpool iriko yiyumvira ingene yomuzana muri uwo mugwi. (Express and Star) Liverpool iri mu biganiro na PSV Eindhoven ku masezerano w'umukinyi w'imbere wa Hollande, Donyell Malen, 22, vyitezwe ko agurwa hafi imiliyoni 34 z'amapawundi. (Sky Sport Germany, via Express) Imigwi Brighton, Burnley, West Ham na Norwich City iherutse gukoroka mu misi iheze, iranuganugwa ko irondera umukinyi w'imbere wa Barcelone na Danmark Martin Braithwaite, 30. (Sport - in Spanish) Umukinyi wo hagati w'Ubufaransa William Saliba, 20 wa Aesenal aracaronderwa n'imigwi myinshi y'i Buraya, harimwo Nice yahora akinira kw'igeni mu mwaka uheze.  Newcastle United, Southampton, n'imigwi yo mu Bufaransa ya Rennes, Marseille, Lille, na  Bayer Leverkusen yo mu Budagi na yo iramusha. (Footmercato - in French) Umugwi wa West Ham utegura amapawundi imiliyoni 17 yo kugura umunyegoli wa Fiorentina w'imyaka 23, Nikola Milenkovic, ariko ayo mahera ari musi cane y'ayo uwo mugwi wa Serie A, kugira barekure uwo mukinyi w'umu Serbe. (Calciomercato - in Italian) Umugwi wa Burnley uriteguriye kwegeranya amahera yo kugura umunyegoli  wa Werder Bremen n'igihugu ca Czech, Jiri Pavlenka w'imyaka 29. (Bild - in German) Crystal Palace barashaka kugura uwahoze amenyereza Borussia Dortmund, Lucien Favre nk'umumenyereza w'uwo mugwi mushasha. (90min)

headline: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: Ronaldo, Messi, Kounde, Torres, Werner, Depay
text: Umukuru wa Barcelona Joan Laporta avuga ko ivya Lionel Messi bitararangira muri Barcelona – inyuma y’amezi 11 uyu musatirizi wa Argentina w’imyaka 35 arangirije urugendo rw’imyaka 21 muri uyu murwi akimukira muri Paris St-Germain. (ESPN) Umusatirizi wa Portugal Cristiano Ronaldo w’imyaka 37, yasubiye mu Bwongereza akaba yiteze kugiriranira ibiganiro na Manchester United kuri kazoza kiwe muri uyo murwi. (Athletic) Ariko vyitezwe ko Ronaldo abwira  Manchester United ko ashaka kwigira, akaba ashobora kutemera ayandi masezerano. (Sun) Urugamba rwa Chelsea rwo kurondera umukinyi w’inyuma wa Sevilla Jules Kounde rushobora gupfa, mu gihe Barcelona ifise icizere cinshi co kuronka uyu mufaransa w’imyaka 23. (Guardian) Mu gihe vyokwanka ko Kounde yimukira muri Chelsea, ifise guca ihindukirira umukinyi wa Villarreal umunya- Espagne Pau Torres w’imyaka 25, umunya-Slovakia akina inyuma muri Inter Milan Milan Skriniar w’imyaka 27, hamwe n’umunya-Croatia Josko Gvardiol w’imyaka 20 akinira RB Leipzig. Abafaransa Dayot Upamecano w’imyaka 23 be na Benjamin Pavard w’imyaka 26 bompi bakinira Bayern Munich, nabo nyene ni abakinyi b’inyuma Chelsea ishobora kurondera. (90 Min) Chelsea yemeye guha RB Leipzig umusatirizi w’umudagi Timo Werner w’imyaka 26 kugira irabe ko yokubita hasi Paris St-Germain mu rugamba rwo kurondera umufaransa akina inyuma Nordi Mukiele w’imyaka 24 muri uyo murwi wo mw’ihiganwa ry’Ubudagi, Bundesliga. (Foot Mercato, iciye kuri Metro) Chelsea iriko irazibira Barcelona mu rugamba rwo kurondera abanya-Espagne bakina inyuma Marcos Alonso w’imyaka 31, na Cesar Azpilicueta w’imyaka 32 kubera uyu murwi wa Espagne uriko urayigora kuri Kounde. (Sport – mu ki Espangol) Umukinyi w’inyuma wa Sevilla umufaransa Jules Kounde w’imyaka 23 ashobora kuba yiteguye kugiriranira amasezerano na Barcelona. (Fabrizio Romano) West Ham yumvikanye n’umusatirizi w’umutaliyano Gianluca Scamacca w’imyaka 23, bikaba vyitezwe ko afatwa ibipimo kwa muganga kuri uyu wa kabiri kugira ngo ashobore kwimukira muri uyo murwi wa Premier League ku giciro c’imiriyoni 35,5 z’amapawundi avuye muri Sassuolo. (Guardian) AC Milan iriko iraraba ko yokwongereza amafaranga ishaka gutanga ku mukinyi wo hagati wa Club Bruges, Charles de Ketelaere asanzwe aronderwa na Leeds United, mu ntumbero yo kuraba ko yoronka uyu Mubirigi w’imyaka 23. (Calciomercato – mu gitaliyano) Umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Chelsea  Hakim Ziyech nawe nyene araronderwa na AC Milan kandi uyu munya-Maroc w’imyaka 29 akaba nawe nyene yipfuza kwimukira muri uyo murwi wo mw’ihiganwa ry’Ubutaliyano Serie A. (Calciomercato) Lyon ivuga ko ifise ishaka ryo kwakira abipfuza umunya-Brezili akina hagati Lucas Paqueta w’imyaka 24 asanzwe aronderwa na Arsenal. (Metro) Red Bull Salzburg yishuye ku mbuga hwaniro umunya-Slovenia akina imbere Benjamin Sesko w’imyaka 19 ariko araronderwa na Manchester United mu kumubwira ko, nimba uyu murwi wa Premier League umukeneye, utegerezwa gutanga “imiriyoni zirenga 300 gushirako na Bruno". Uyu munya-Portugal Bruno Fernandes w’imyaka 27 akina hagati, ni umwe mu bakinyi ngirakamaro cane muri Old Trafford. (RB Salzburg kuri Twitter) Liverpool iriko iraraba ko yokwemera igiciro c’imiriyoni 23 z’amapawundi gitangwa na Juventus ku musatirizi wa Brezili, Roberto Firmino w’imyaka 30. (Tuttomercato – mu gitaliyano) Umumenyereza wa Barcelona  Xavi yabwiye umusatirizi w’umunya-Hollande Memphis Depay w’imyaka 28 ko yorondera uwundi murwi inyuma y’aho ironkeye umusatirizi wa Pologne  Robert Lewandowski w’imyaka 33 be n’umunya-Brezili akina ku ruhande Raphinha w’imyaka 25. (AS - mu ki espagnol) Barcelona ntiremerera umurwi n’umwe urondera umukinyi wo hagati Frenkie de Jong, mu gihe Manchester United irondera cane uyu mukinyi w’umunya-Hollande w’imyaka 25. (ESPN) Ariko United iriko iraraba ko yorondera umunya-Serbia akina hagati muri Lazio  Sergej Milinkovic-Savic w’imyaka 27, mu kibanza ca de Jong. (Calciomercato - mu gitaliyano) Tottenham iripfuza kugurisha umufaransa akina hagati Tanguy Ndombele w’imyaka 25 ku giciro co nyaco, mu gihe Galatasaray imurondera. (Media Foot – mu gifaransa) Juventus yashize umusatirizi w’umufaransa Anthony Martial w’imyaka 26 ku rutonde rw’abakinyi ishaka kurondera, ariko Manchester United ntishaka kumugurisha. (Mirror)

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w’amaguru kuri uyu wa kabiri: Kane, Ronaldo, Messi, Asensio, Mbappe, Silva
text: Tottenham irashaka amasezerano mashasha n’umusatirizi wayo umwongereza Harry Kane mu ntango z’umwaka uza kandi barizeye neza ko uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 29 azotera igikumu ku yandi masezerano y’igihe kirekire n’uyu murwi. (90min) Umukuru w’igisata kijejwe kwinonora imitsi muri Bayern Munich Hasan Salihamidzic avuga ko uyu murwi wo muri Bundesliga wari usanzwe urondera Kane ata mukinyi uzogura mu kadirisha (igihe) k’igura n’igurisha ry’abakinyi ko mu kwa mbere. (Bild, iciye muri Christian Falk) Umumenyereza wa Manchester United Erik ten Hag aripfuza kugumana umusatirizi wa Portugal Cristiano Ronaldo gushika mu mpera z’uwu mwaka w’inkino, ariko mu gihe uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 37 atokwemera gukinishwa gake, nta kundi azohabwa uburenganzira bwo kurondera uwundi murwi. (Athletic) Umusatirizi wa Bayer Leverkusen Patrik Schick wo muri Republique Tcheque afise imyaka  26, umunya Canada Jonathan David w’imyaka 22 akinira Lille hamwe n’umufaransa Moussa Dembele w’imyaka 26 kinira Lyon, nibo Ten Hag yipfuza ko bosubirira Ronaldo. (Mirror) Ronaldo ariteguriye gusubira mu Butaliyano, aho Napoli gushika ubu ikimwipfuza inyuma y’aho mu ci imenyeshereje ko imukeneye. (Sun) Chelsea ibona ko yopfuma irondera umusatirizi wa AC Milan umunya- Portugal Rafael Leao w’imyaka 23 hakurondera kugura Ronaldo. (CBS, iciye kuri Mirror) Paris St-Germain ifise impungenge ko ishobora kubandanya iriha umushahara umufaransa Kylian Mbappe. Mu masezerano ifitaniye n’uyu musatirizi w’imyaka 23, itegerezwa kumuriha imiriyoni 549 z’amapawundi mu myaka itatu – ica kane c’amafaranga yose uyu murwi ukoresha. (Sport – mu ki Espagnol, iciye kuri Le Parisien) PSG irahakana ko ibi biharuro atari vyo. (Fabrizio Romano) Chelsea iriko yiyumvira ingene yotiza umunyegori wayo, umunyamerika Gabriel Slonina w’imyaka 18 yaguze mu ci riheze ku miriyoni 12 z’amapawundi. (Evening Standard) Aba ba Blues baracipfuza kugura umurusiya akina hagati Arsen Zakharyan w’imyaka 19 asanzwe akinira Dynamo Moscow. (Sport Express, iciye kuri Metro) Antonio Conte abona ko azokenera ibiringo bitatu vy’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi kugira ngo anagure umurwi wa Tottenham. (Times) Real Madrid iriteguye kwongera amasezerano yandi meza umusatirizi wayo umunya-Espagne Marco Asensio w’imyaka 26, yigeze kuronderwa na Arsenal, Liverpool be na Tottenham,  inyuma y’aho yankiye aya mbere bashaka kumuha. (Ser Deportivos iciye muri AS – mu ki Espagnol) Umukuru wa Celtic  Ange Postecoglou arahakana ibivugwa ko ashobora kwimukira mw’ihiganwa ry’Ubwongereza Premier League, ni mu gihe hari amakuru avugwa ko ashobora kuronderwa na Brighton hamwe na Leicester City. (Mail) Paris St-Germain iripfuza kugumana umusatirizi wa Argentina Lionel Messi ubu ikaba iriko irategura amasezerano mashasha.(Le Parisien – mu gifaransa) Liverpool igiye guhangana na Manchester United mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi w’inyuma wa Benfica, umunya-Portugal Antonio Silva w’imyaka 18. (O Jogo, iciye kuri Team Talk) Chelsea iriteguye kugena umukuru w’igisata kijejwe ubuhinga wa Monaco Laurence Stewart w’imyaka 36, mu mugambi wo kunagura igisata c’abakorana n’umumenyereza. (The Athletic)

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Koundé, Rudiger, Ake, Modric, Ndombele, Vlahovic, Bergwijn
text: Liverpool muri uku kwezi iriteguye gukorera ku ngingo iri mu masezerano umukinyi w'inyuma w'umufaransa Jules Koundé, w'imyaka 23, afitaniye na Sevilla, ingingo imwemerera kuva muri uyu murwi ku miriyoni zirenga 100 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika, ni mu gihe  Chelsea na Real Madrid nayo nyene imwipfuza. (El Nacional via Teamtalk) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Chelsea, umudagi Antonio Rudiger w'imyaka 28, azorangiza amasezerano afitaniye n'uyu murwi mu ci riza kandi akaba ataratera igikumu ku yandi mashasha, avugwa ko yipfuza kwimukira muri Real Madrid aho kuja muri Paris St-Germain mu gihe yoramuka avuye i Stamford Bridge. (Football London) PSG ivugwa ko yoba yemereye Rudiger umushahara w'ama euro imiriyoni indwi ata makori ariko, ayasumba ayo yemerewe n'uyo murwi wo muri Espagne. (Footmercato - in French) Umusatirizi w'umunya Uruguay Edinson Cavani, afise imyaka 34, yiyemeje kuguma muri Manchester United mu kiringo gisigaye c'ihiganwa ry'uno mwaka, ni inyuma y'ibiganiro yagiranye n'umumenyereza Ralf Rangnick. (Mirror) AC Milan iriko iraraba ingene yoronka umukinyi w'inyuma wa Manchester City, umunya Hollande Nathan Ake w'imyaka 26, ni inyuma y'aho uyo murwi wo mu Butaliyano utakarije umunya Danemark Simon Kjaer, w'imyaka 32, mu kiringo cose gisigaye c'ihiganwa ry'uno mwaka kubera imvune yo mw'ivi. (Sun) Manchester City ishobora kurondera kizigenza wa Croatia Luka Modric, w'imyaka 36, na rirya atishimiye amasezerano mashasha yemerewe na Real Madrid. Amasezerano asanzwe afitaniye n'uyu murwi wo muri Espagne azorangira mu mpera z'iri higanwa. (El Nacional, via Mail) Arsenal irafise ishaka ryo kurekura amafaranga menshi muri uku kwa mbere kugira ngo ironke umusatirizi w'umunya Serbia Dusan Vlahovic, w'imyaka 21, asanzwe akina muri Fiorentina. (Mirror) Newcastle yumvikanye ivuga ko ishaka gutanga imiriyoni zababa 68 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika kugira ironke umusatirizi wa Bayer Leverkusen, umunya République tchèque Patrik Schick, w'imyaka 25, mu gihe iriko irondera hasi hejuru umusatirizi. (Sky Sports) Paris St-Germain, AC Milan, Roma, Lyon, Barcelona na Newcastle United iri mu mirwi ishobora kuba iriko irondera umukinyi wo hagati w'umufaransa Tanguy Ndombele, w'imyaka 25, mu gihe kazoza kiwe muri Tottenham kadatomoye inyuma y'aho azomerewe n'abafana ba Spurs igihe agomborewe ku wa Mungu mu rukino rw'igice ca gatatu gishira ica nyuma c'igikombe ca FA aho uyu murwi watsinze Morecambe. (Star) Newcastle ishobora guhangana na Ajax mu rugamba rwo kurondera umunya Hollande Steven Bergwijn, w'imyaka 24, akina ku ruhande muri  Tottenham, mu gihe abaserukizi biwe bariko barondera ko yopfuma atizwa mu wundi murwi. (90min) Ajax yamaze kwemera ko yotanga imiriyoni zababa 20 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika kugira ironke Bergwijn kandi ikaba yipfuza ko yoba yamuronse imbere y'uko ihura na Utrecht ku wa Mungu. (Telegraaf - in Dutch) Ibiganiro Newcastle irimwo bigeze kure kugira irabe ko yoronka umusatirizi wa Reims, umufaransa Hugo Ekitike w'imyaka 19, ku giciro kiri musi y'imiriyoni 40 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. (90min) Icizere ca Newcastle co kuronka umukinyi w'inyuma Sven Botman, w'imyaka 21, muri uku kwa mbere gisa n'icarangiye, kubera uyu munya Hollande adashaka kwiyumvira ivyo kuva mu murwi wiwe wa  Lille. Umunya Brésil Diego Carlos w'imyaka 28 akina muri Sevilla hamwe n'umufaransa Benoît Badiashile, w'imyaka 20, akina muri Monaco, baracari mu bo Newcastle ishobora kurondera muri kuno kwezi.  (Athletic, subscription required) Newcastle ishobora guhindukirira umukinyi w'inyuma wa Everton, umwongereza Mason Holgate, w'imyaka 25, kugira ikomeze uruhande rw'inyuma.  (Give Me Sport) Tottenham izokwihweza ibizotangwa n'abazoba barondera umwongereza akina hagati Dele Alli, w'imyaka 25, hamwe n'umunya Irlande akina inyuma Matt Doherty, w'imyaka 29, muri kuno kwa mbere. (Sky Sports) Tottenham ifata iya mbere mu ruhigi rwo kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa AC Milan, umunya Côte d'Ivoire Franck Kessié, w'imyaka 25, azorangiza amasezerano yiwe mu ci riza. (Rudy Galetti on Twitter) Abarongoye Manchester United bavuganye ibijanye no kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Borussia Monchengladbach, umuswisi Denis Zakaria, w'imyaka 25, muri kuno kwezi, ariko ntibaramenyesha amafaranga bipfuza gutanga. (Fabrizio Romano) Chelsea iri mu biganiro na Lyon kugira ngo igarukane umukinyi w'inyuma wayo, umutaliyano Emerson Palmieri, w'imyaka 27, yatijijwe muri uyo murwi wo mu Bufaransa, kugira ngo ashobore gusubirira Ben Chilwell aherutse kuvunika. (Mail) West Ham iriko iraraba ingene yotira umunya Sénégal Abdou Diallo, w'imyaka 25, akina inyuma muri Paris St-Germain. (RMC Sport - in French) Umusatirizi wa Queens Park Rangers Lyndon Dykes yateye amero imirwi itari mike yo mw'ihiganwa rya Premier League, harimwo Newcastle, Burnley, Crystal Palace na Norwich City. Umurwi Rangers watsindiye ihiganwa rya Ecosse/Scotland, hamwe na Bournemouth isanzwe iri imbere mw'ihiganwa ryo mu cicaro ca kabiri mu Bwongereza (Championship), nayo nyene ivugwa ko yipfuza uyu munya-Ecosse w'imyaka 26 yavukiye muri Australia.

headline: Abajejwe ikipe y’Intamba mu Rugamba bavuga ko kwirukana Selemani Ndikumana ata ngorane vyateye
text: Robert Patrick Misigaro, BBC. Selemani Ndikumana, yigeze kuba kizigenza w'Intamba mu Rugamba, akaba ari n'umwe mu bakinyi bakuze kurusha abandi muri iyo kipe, mu ntango z'ino ndwi yarakuwe muri 23 baserukiye u Burundi mu gikombe ca Afrika 2019 mu Misiri. Selemani yaciye yurizwa indege imusubiza i Bujumbura, akaba agiye adateye umupira na rimwe ku nshuro ya mbere yari ashitse mu gikombe ca Afrika. Iyirukanwa ryiwe ryavuzweko vyinshi, bamwe bakavuga ko ryavuye ku kutumvikana kuri mw'ikipe yose, abandi bakavuga ko ikipe imaze gucikamwo imigwi ibiri, uwushigikiye Selemani n'uwutamushigikiye. BBC Gahuzamiryango yagerageje kumenya  uko vyifashe ica yegera uwujejwe kumenyesha amakuru mw'ikipe Intamba mu Rugamba, Kibuga Ramadhani, aho ari kumwe n'Intamba mu muji wa Alexandria, atubwira ko ivyo bivugwa vyose ata kuri kurimwo. Ku kibazo c'uko umwuka woba utari mwiza mw'ikipe, Bwana Ramadhani yagize ati: ''Oya. Umwuka...ambiance imeze neza cane. Yari ingorane y'umumenyereza [Olivier Niyungeko] na Selemani, si ingorane y'akagwi n'umumenyereza. ''Kandi abo twokwita aba cadres ba ekipe bari bagerageje kumuhanura [Selemani] ntivyakunda. Rero morale ni yose mu bakinyi.'' Intamba mu Rugamba kuri uyu wa gatandatu zirahura n'ikipe ya Nigeria iri mu zihabwa amahirwe muri iri higanwa, bikaba rero bitoba ari vyiza mu gihe Intamba zoba zifise akabazo. Ikipe yose mw'ihiganwa igenda ijanye abakinyi 23, bisigura yuko ubu Intamba zisigaranye abakinyi 22, hakibaza nimba bishoboka ko Selemani yosubirizwa. Kuri ico, uwujejwe kumenyesha amakuru muri iyo kipe yabandanije abwira BBC ati: ''Ntibikunda gusubirizwa. Kuko umukinyi asubirizwa iyo afise ibibazo vy'amagara naho nyene bikemezwa na CAF. ''Selemani yagize ikibazo ca discipline. Kandi umwanya wo gusubirizwa waheze. [Uwo mwanya ni amasaha...] 24 imbere y'urukino rwawe rwa mbere.'' Bwana Ramadhani yabandanije avuga ko gukurwa kwa Selemani mw'ikipe ata nkurikizi bishobora kugira ngo kuko n'ubundi ntiyari muri 11 bari gutangura mu kibuga. Ngo urukino rwa nyuma yakiniye Intamba rwari i Juba mu kwezi kwa 11 mu 2018, akaba atari mu bakinyi nyamukuru. Abajejwe ikipe nserukiragihugu y'u Burundi muri rusangi bemeza ko abakinyi bafatanye mu mugombo, uwujejwe kumenyesha amakuru, Bwana Ramadhani, akaba yabandanije avuga ko biboneka no ku jisho. Yagize ati: ''Imigenderanire ni myiza. Nta kibazo, ikipe iri hamwe. Biraboneka neza mu myimenyerezo mbere n'umubano wa minsi yose.'' Uno munsi itariki 22/06/2019, ikipe y'u Burundi Intamba mu Rugamba iraza kwandika amateka mu mupira w'amaguru muri ico gihugu, aho iza gukina ku nshuro ya mbere mw'ihiganwa ry'igikombe ca Afrika, ihura na Nigeria. Ni urukino rutangura saa moya z'umugoroba ku masaha yo mu Misiri, rukaza kubera ku kibuga ca Alexandria Stadium mu muji wa Alexandira. U Burundi buri mu mugwi B aho buri kumwe n'amakipe ya Nigeria, Madagascar na Guinea. Urundi rukino rwo mu mugwi B ruraza guhuza Madagascar na Guinea, rube saa yine z'ijoro ku kibuga ca Alexandria Stadium nyene. Ushaka kumenya uko amakipe atsindana muri iri higanwa ry'igikombe ca Afrika 2019, amanota afise hamwe n'uko ahagaze, urashobora kuja ngaha

headline: Igikombe c'isi 2022: Kuki abakinyi ba Iran banse kuririmba ururirimbo rw’igihugu
text: Abakinyi ba Irani banse kuririmba ururirimbo rw’igihugu imbere y’urukino rwabahuje n’Ubwongereza mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi, mu bisa n’ukwifatanya n’abari mu myiyerekano yiyamiriza reta mu gihugu cabo. Bamwe mu bafana bavugije induru abandi bazomera mu gihe ururirimbo rw’igihugu rwariko rurasamirana, abandi nabo bafise ivyapa vyanditseko ngo “Umugore, Ubuzima, Ubwigenge”. Imboneshakure ya Iran yaciye ibikata, ihagarika kwerekana ururirimbo rw’igihugu ruriko ruraririmbwa, maze ica yerekana amashusho arambuye y’ikibuga. Mu mezi aheze, iyo myiyerekano yaratujijwe bikomeye. Yavuye ku rupfu rwa Mahsa Amini, umugore w’imyaka 22 yapfiriye mu gasho mu kw’icenda, inyuma yo guhagarikwa n’igipolisi kijejwe inyitafo yagirizwa ko yahonyanze amategeko ruhasha ajanye no kwitwikira. Abaharanira agateka ka zina muntu bavuga ko abari mu myiyerekano barenga 400 bishwe abandi 16.000 barahagarikwa n’abajejwe umutekano bariko batuza iyo myiyerekano. Abategetsi ba Iran bavuga ko iyi myiyerekano ari “imigumuko” ikokezwa n’abansi b’igihugu bari mu mahanga. Abafana ba Irani bumviswe kandi baririmba "Ali Karimi" mu gice ca mbere, bashaka kwibutsa uwahoze ari umukinyi, akaba yari umwe mu bantu banegura cane intwaro ya ki-Islam, akongera kandi akaba n’umwe mu bantu bari bazwi cane mu rugamba rwo kwiyamiriza ubutegetsi. Abafana kandi bumviswe baririmba "Be-Sharaf", bisigura gusuzugura mu rurimi rw’igiperse. Iri ni ijambo abari mu myiyerekano bakoresha mu guhangana n’abajejwe umutekano muri Irani. Abenshi mu barwanya ubutegetsi bwa ki-Islam baranegura umurwi nserukiragihugu w’umupira w’amaguru kubera utashigikiye ku mugaragaro imyiyerekano, no kwemera kubonana na Perezida Ebrahim Raisi  mu ndwi iheze. Mw’ijambo yashikirije imbere y’urukino, kizigenza w’umurwi wa Irani Ehsan Hajsafi yavuze ko abakinyi “bashigikiye” abamaze gusandaba.
