Umumenyereza Carlos Queiroz avuga ko abakinyi biwe bari “bafise uburenganzira bwo kugira imyiyerekano” ku vyerekeye agateka k’abagore mu gihugu cabo mu gihe cose “bidateye kubiri n’amabwirizwa ngenderwako y’igikombe c’isi yose kandi biri mu marangamutima y’urukino”. Abakinyi ba Irani kandi barapfutse ikimenyetso c’umurwi nserukiragihugu wabo igihe bakina inkino zibiri za kivandimwe mu kw’icenda. Inyuma y’urukino rwa nijoro ku wa mbere batsinzwe n’Ubwongereza 6 - 2 mw’itsinda B, Queiroz yavuze ko indyane za poritike mu gihugu zagize ingaruka mbi ku murwi wiwe. Uyu mumenyereza w’umunya-Portugal yavuze ati: "Kuri abo bose baza guhungabanya umurwi n’ibibazo ataho bihuriye n’umupira w’amaguru, nta kibanza bafise kubera aba bahungu bacu, ni abakinyi b’umupira w’amaguru gusa. "Reka abana bikinire umupira. Kubera iki nico bishakira. Bashaka guserukira igihugu, guserukira abanyagihugu, co kimwe n’iyindi mirwi nserukiragihugu iri ng’aha. No mu yindi mirwi nserukiragihugu yose, iwabo hariyo ibibazo”. Uyu yahoze ari icegera c’umumenyereza wa Manchester United yongerako ati: "Si vyiza kuza muri rino higanwa ry’igikombe c’isi ugaca ubasaba gukora ivyo batajejwe. Bashaka gutera iteka n’umunezero abanyagihugu. "Ntushobora no kwiyumvira ivyo aba bana babayemwo mu buzima bwabo mu misi mike iheze, kubera gusa bashaka kwibera abakinyi b’umupira”. Avuga kuri ivyo vyari bihejeje kuba inyuma y’igice ca mbere, umunyamakuru wa BBC Gary Lineker ashikiriza amakuru y’inkino, yavuze ati: "Cari ikimenyetso gikomeye, gikomeye cane koko. "Umupira w’amaguru uriko uragerageza gukoresha inguvu zawo ku neza”.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Mbappe, Sancho, Coutinho, James, Daka, Firpo
text: Liverpool iriko irabaza nimba umusatirizi wa  Paris St-Germain umufaransa Kylian Mbappe w'imyaka 22 ashobora kugurishwa, ni mu gihe asanzwe ariko araronderwa na Real Madrid. Amasezerano ya Mbappe mu murwi PSG yitezwe kurangira mu 2022. (Marca) Umusatirizi wa Inter Milan umubirigi Romelu Lukaku w'imyaka 28 amenyesha ko atarota asubira mw'ihiganwa ryo mu Bwongereza Premier League, ahubwo akaba abonwa ko ashobora gusubirira Robert Lewandowski muri Bayern Munich. (Mirror Online) Tottenham iri mu biganiro vyo kurondera kugura umukinyi w'inyuma w'umuyapani akehiro Tomiyasu w'imyaka 22 asanzwe akina muri  Bologna, akaba ashobora kugurwa imiriyoni zababa 20 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika.  (Mail on Sunday) Real Madrid yashize umukinyi w'inyuma wa Leicester City umufaransa Wesley Fofana w'imyaka 20 ku rutonde rw'abo ishobora kurondera, ni mu gihe mugenziwe w'umufaransa Raphael Varane w'imyaka 28 avugwa ko ari hafi yo kwimukira muri  Manchester United. (Fichajes, via Star Online) Mu gihe yoramuka aguzwe n'umurwi Manchester United, umwongereza Jadon Sancho w'imyaka 21 yohembwa ibihumbi hafi 347 vy'amadorari y'abanyamerika, incuro zibiri zirenga ku mushahara asanzwe ahembwa muri  Borussia Dortmund. (Star Sunday) Icizere c'uko Manchester City yokwumvisha umukinyi w'imbere w'umwongereza Raheem Sterling w'imyaka 26 kugira no atere igikumu ku yandi masezerano cakwamishijwe n'ingingo y'uyu murwi yo gushaka kumutanga kugira ngo yongereze uburyo bwo kugura umusatirizi wa Tottenham Harry Kane w'imyaka 27. (Sunday Mirror) Manchester United iriko iraraba ingene yoronka umukinyi wo hagati, umufaransa Eduardo Camavinga w'imyaka 18 akina muri Rennes, asanzwe ariko arakurikiranwa kandi na Arsenal, Real Madrid na Paris St-Germain. (Mail on Sunday) Dortmund ibona ko uwuza ubwa mbere mu boshobora gusubirira Sancho ari umunya Hollande Donyell Malen w'imyaka 22 asanzwe akina muri PSV Eindhoven. (Sunday Mirror) Manchester City yashize ku rutonde rw'abakinyi yipfuza umukinyi w'inyuma ku ruhande muri Chelsea umwongereza Reece James w'imyaka 21 avugwa ko asanzwe akundwa cane n'umumenyereza Pep Guardiola. (The Athletic - subscription required) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Barcelona Philippe Coutinho w'imyaka 29 afise indoto zo gusubira muri Liverpool, ariko uyu murwi w'Ubwongereza nta mugambi n'umwe ufise wo kugarukana uyu munya Brésil.  Iyindi mirwi Coutinho yipfuza kwimukiramwo ni  Inter Milan canke Leicester isanzwe imenyerezwa n'uwahoze ari umumenyereza wa Liverpool Brendan Rodgers, ariko uyu murwi umwipfuza nk'intizo mu kiringo c'umwaka umwe gusa.  (Sport - in Spanish) Aston Villa iriteguye kugerageza Chelsea ku musatirizi wayo Tammy Abraham, ikaba itegura gutanga imiriyoni 55.5 z'amadorari kugira irabe ko yoronka uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 23 yatsinze ibitsindo 26 mu nkino 40 yakinye igihe yari yatijijwe muri uyo murwi mu mwaka w'inkino wa 2018-19. (Sunday Mirror) Umusatirizi wa Red Bull Salzburg umunya Zambia Patson Daka, w'imyaka 22 avuga ko yafashe ingingo yo kwimukira muri Leicester City inyuma y'aho yinjirije ibitsindo 34 mu nkino zose yakinye mu mwaka w'inkino urangiye wa 2020-21. (Krone - in German) Ajax iripfuza umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Tottenham Hotspur umunya Hollande Steven Bergwijn w'imyaka 23 ariko rero uyu murwi wo muri Premier League ntushaka kurekura uyu mukinyi yaguze mu kwa mbere 2020 avuye muri  PSV Eindhoven. (Mail Online) Umumenyereza wa Real Madrid Carlo Ancelotti arashaka ko uyu murwi wo muri Espagne ugura umukinyi w'inyuma wa Manchester United umunya Portugal Diogo Dalot w'imyaka 2 yari amaze umwaka wose wa 2020-21 akina muri AC Milan iyo yari yatijijwe. (Correio de Manha via Sport Witness) AC Milan iripfuza abakinyi batatu ba  Chelsea umunya Maroc akina ku ruhande Hakim Ziyech w'imyaka 28, hamwe n'abafaransa babiri Olivier Giroud w'imyaka 34 na Tiemoue Bakayoko w'imyaka 26. Bakayoko yaramaze umwaka wose wa 2018-19 akina muri uyo murwi aho yari yaratijijwe.  (Gianluca di Marzio via Sempre Milan) Leeds United, West Ham na Southampton yose iravugwa ko yipfuza umukinyi w'inyuma wa Barcelona umunya Espagne Junior Firpo w'imyaka 24 yipfuza kuva muri uyu murwi muri rino ci. (Mundo Deportivo - in Spanish) Barcelona nayo ifise umugambi wo kurondera umukinyi w'inyuma ku ruhande wa  Chelsea Marcos Alonso w'imyaka 30 mu gihe Firpo yoramuka agiye, n'aho Inter Milan nayo nyene ibanze amatwi ikurikirana ingene ibintu bigenda kuri uyu mukinyi i Stamford Bridge. (Mundo Deportivo - in Spanish) Burnley iriteguye kwakira uwo wese azorondera umukinyi w'inyuma, umwongereza James Tarkowski w'imyaka  28 asanzwe ariko araronderwa na West Ham. (Football Insider)

headline: Football: Menya abamenyereza 10 batunze cane kw'isi mu mupira w'amaguru.
text: Mu gihe abamenyereza benshi batamenyekana cane ubagereranije n'abakinyi babo, abamenyereza n'agahara mu rugandanda ntibacure ku kibuga. Abamenyereza bafise akazi ko kugerageza, ni bo bigisha abakinyi bakabashikana ku rugero rwo hejuru. Bafise akazi ko akazi ko kwihweza abakeba, no kuraba ingene aronka intsinzi. Kugira ishike ku rugero rwo hejuru rw'umukino, imigwi yo mu rwego rwo hejuru irondera abamenyereza beza. Ariko abo bamenyereza beza, imigwi bagiyemwo ibariha amahera menshi. Mu myaka 20 iheze, bamwe mu bamenyereza baratanguye guhembwa amahera menshi kurusha abakinyi babo. Tutiriwe turarandira, reka turabire hamwe abamenyereza 10 batunze cane gusumba abandi kw'isi mu 2021. 10. Rafael Benítez -  Buri mwaka ahembwa €13M Rafael Benítez Uwo mumenyereza yahoze muri Real Madrid na Livepool ari mu kibanza ca 10 ku rutonde rw'abamenyereza batunze cane kw'isi. Ubu amenyereza umugwi wa Dalian Proffessionnals. Akaba afise umushahara w'imiliyoni 13 z'ama Euro. Benitez yagenywe kuba umumenyereza wa Newcastle mu 2016, aho bariko baragerageza kudakoroka mu cicaro ca kabiri. Vyaramunaniye iruhira gukoroka, ariko yongera kuyifasha kuduga mu cicaro ca mbere mw'ihiganwa ryo mu Bwongereza gushika mu 2019. Rafael Benitez yamenyekanye cane igihe umugwi wiwe wa Liverpool aho yatsinda AC Milan mu rukino rwa nyuma rw'igikombe c'imigwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo ku mugabe wa Buraya mu 2005. 9. Massimiliano Allegri - Buri mwaka ahembwa €13.5M Allegri n'umwe mu bamenyereza batunze cane kw'isi. Massimiliano "Max" Allegri  yakiniye Ubutaliyano, aheruka kumenyereza ari mu mugwi wa Juventus. Allegri ari mu kibanza c'icenda. Uwo mumenyereza w'umutaliyano yatwaye ibikombe bine vwo mw'ihiganwa ryo mu Butaliyano amenyereza umugwi wa Juve. Yarashitse kandi mu nkino za nyuma kabiri kose muri iryo higanwa amenyereza Juventus nyene, ariko aratsindwa. Igihe Allegri yamenyereza uwo mugwi, yarashoboye kuronka intsinzi ku bice 70%, bikaba vyabaye ibiharuro biri hejuru cane muri kahise k'uyo mugwi. Allegri n'umukinyi wo hagati yakiniye imigwi myinshi mu gihugu c'butaliyano. Mu gihe afise ubutunzi bwa miliyoni 13.5 z'ama euro, n'agaciro ka miliyoni 5 z'amadolari, Massimiliano Allegri ari ku rutonde rw'abamenyereza cumi beza kw'isi. 8. Fabio Cannavaro - Buri mwaka ahembwa €14m Fabio Cannavaro n'umwe mu bamenyereza batunze cane kw'isi. Cannavaro ni umukinyi wa kera w'Ubutaliyano, akaba ubu amenyereza umugwi wa Guangzhou Evergrande. Agikina, Cannavaro yari umukinyi w'inyuma mu migwi itandukanye mu Butaliyano. Ni we agifise umuhigo wo kuba umukinyi w'inyuma wenyene amaze gutwara igikombe c'inzahabu. Mu gihe afise ubutunzi bungana na miliyoni 45, Cannavaro n'umwe mu bamenyereza batunze cane kw'isi. Amasezerano afise ubu atuma ahembwa miliyoni 12 z'ama euro buri mwaka. Umugwi amenyereza warashoboye gutwara ibikombe vyo mu Bushinwa FA 2018 hamwe n'ico ihiganwa ryo muri ico gihugu 2019. 7. Ernesto Valverde - Buri mwaka ahembwa €19M Ernesto Valverde Ernesto Valverde Tejedor yahoze akinira umugwi nserukiragihugu wa Espagne mu kibanza c'imbere, ubu akaba ari umumenyereza. Nk'umukinyi, Valverde yinjije ibitego 68 mu nkino 264 mw'ihiganwa ryo muri Espagne. Inyuma yo gusezera gukina, yabandanije akazi katoroshe k'ubumenyereza. Ernesto yatwaye ibikombe bibiri vy'amahiganwa y'ibihugu, Olympiacos 2008-09 na 2011-12 na Barcelone 2017-18. Valverde yirukanywe muri uyu mugwi uyu mwaka inyuma yo gutsindwa na Bayern Munich ibitego 8-2. 6. Zinedine Zidane -Buri mwaka ahembwa€23M Zidane n'umwe mu bamenyereza 10 batunze cane kw'isi. Uwo mugabo azwi ku ritazirano Zizou, yahoze akinira umugwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubufaransa. Nk'umumenyereza yahora ahembwa imiliyoni 23 ku mwaka, akaba afise ubutunzi bungana n'imiliyoni 62 z'ama euro, ubutunzi butuma aba ku rutonde rw'abamenyereza batunze cane kw'isi. Ni we yahora amenyereza umugwi wa Real Madrid gushika ubu vuba aho atangiye imihoho. Uwo yahoze ari umukinyi wo hagati ari mu bakinyi bake batwaye igikombe c'imigwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo ku mugabane wa Buraya nk'umukinyi n'umumenyereza. Ni we kandi afise umuhigo wo gutsindira ibikombe bitatu vy'imigwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo ku mugabane wa Buraya nk'umumenyereza. 5. José Mourinho - Buri mwaka ahembwa €23M Jose Mourinho  n'umwe mu bamenyereza beza kw'isi batunze. José Mário dos Santos Mourinho Félix  ni umunye Portugal yahora amenyereza umugwi wa Tottenham Hotspurs. Azwi nk'umumenyereza rurangiranwa afise akazina k'ubuhizi ka 'Special One'. Inyuma yo kwirukanwa muri Manchester United mu kwezi kwa 12 mu 2018, Jose Mourinho yamaze umwaka wose ata wundi mugwi arajamwo, aho yanse kwitaba akamo k'imigwi myinshi yamurondera imbere yo kwerekeza muri Tottenham Hotspurs mu kwezi kwa 11 mu 2019. Jose Mourinho yatahukanye intsinzi nyinshi cane, aho yatsindiye ibikombe 6 mu myaka ibiri. Uwo mumeneyereza wo muri Portugal yahembwa imiliyoni 23 z'ama euro, akaba afise ubutunzi bwose hamwe buri hagati ya miliyoni 50 -100 z'amadolari. Ubutunzi butuma aba umwe mu bamenyereza batunze cane kw'isi. 4. Jürgen Klopp - Buri mwaka ahembwa €24M Jurgen Klopp Jürgen Norbert Klopp n'umudagi akaba yahoze ari n'umukinyi ubu akaba amenyereza umugwi wa Liverpool. Abonwa na benshi nk'umumenyereza wa mbere kw'isi. Akunda cane umukenyuro wa Gegenpressing, aho igihe umugwi uba utakaje umupira, wita kurutare mu kuwurondera no kuwusubirana, hagusubira inyuma kuwurindirirayo. Jurgen Klopp yashitse ku bintu bikomeye nk'umumenyereza, aho yatwaye igikombe c'imigwi yabaye iya mbere ku mugabane wa Buraya amenyereza Loverpool FC. Jurgen Klopp yoba afise ubutunzi bungana imiliyoni 50 z'amadolari, ari na co gituma ari ku rutonde rw'abamenyereza batunze cane kw'isi. 3. Pep Guardiola - Buri mwaka ahembwa€27M Guardiola ni we mumenyereza wa mbere atunze mu gihugu c'Ubwongereza. Josep ''pep'' Guardiola Sala wo muri Espagne, yahoze ari umukinyi, ni we ubuamenyereza umugwi wa Manchester City. Azwi nk'umumenyereza yashitse ku bintu bikomeye cane kw'isi. Nk'umukinyi, Pep yamaze umwanya munini mu mugwi wa Barcelone. Nk'umumenyereza, Pep yatsindiye ibikombe vyinshi cane mu migwi itandukanye. Guardiola akunda cane umukenyuro wo guhererekanya umupira, umukenyuro wo muri Espagne aho bahanahana imipira mito mito bagenda bigira imbere. Inyuma yo gukora ibikora inka amenyereza imigwi ya Barcelone na Bayern Munich, Pep Guardiola yagenywe kumenyereza Manchester City mu 2016. Afata umushahara w'imiliyoni 27 z'ama euro buri mwaka mk'umumenyereza wa Manchester City, akaba afise ubutunzi buri hagati y'imiliyoni 40-60 z'amadolari, bikaba ari vyo bituma aba ku rutonde rw'abamenyereza batunze cane kw'isi. 2. Antonio Conte - Buri mwaka ahembwa: €30M Antonio Conte Antonio Conte amenyereza mu Butaliyano akaba yanahoze ari umukinyi. Ni we mumenyereza wa Inter Milan. Nk'umukinyi wo hagati, Conte yatanguriye gukina umupira mu mugwi wa U.S Lecce, mu nyuma aza kuba rurangiranwa ari mu mugwi wa Juventus. Antonio Conte yaratwaye igikombe c'ihiganwa ryo mu Bwongereza agishika mu mugwi wa Chelsea. Mu mwaka wakurikiye uwo mugwi waciye umwirukana ariko aca ahabwa akazi na Inter Milan. Azwi cane mu gukoresha umukenyuro wa 3-5-2 igihe aba ariko aramenyereza. Yarafashije umugwi wa Inter Milan gushika mu rukono rwa nyuma rw'igikombe ca Europa League, mu mwaka wa mbere akihashika, aho uwo mugwi wiwe watsinzwe na Seville. Conte ahembwa imiliyoni 30 z'ama euro buri mwaka, ubutunzi bwiwe bukaba bushobora kuba buri hagati y'imiliyoni 50-60 z'amadolari. 1. Diego Simeone - Buri mwaka ahembwa €40.5m Diego Simeone ni we mumenyereza wa mbere atunze cane kw'isi. Afata umushahara w'imiliyoni 40.5 z'ama euro buri mwaka. N'umwe kandi mu bamenyereza bahembwa amahera menshi kw'isi mu 2021. Uwo munye Argentine yamenyereje imigwi myinshi, ariko yashitse ku bintu bikomeye ari mu mugwi wa Atletico Madrid, aho yayifasije gutwara igikombe c'ihiganwa ryo muri Espagne, igikombe citiriwe umwami, ibikombe bibiri vya Europa League, ibikombe bibiri vya UEFA Supercup araja no mu rukino rwa nyuma rw'imigwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo ku mugabane wa Buraya. Bivugwa ko ubutunzi bwa Diego Simeone bwoba bushika ku miliyoni 130 z'amadolari nk'uko vyandikwa n'urubuga hwaniro rwa Celebrity net Worth, bigaruma rero aba ari we mumenyereza wa mbere atunze kw'isi.

headline: Messi yatowe nk’umukinyi wa mbere wa 2019 ku ncuro ya gatandatu
text: Lionel Messi, umusatirizi wa Barcelona niwe yatahukanye agashimwe k'umukinyi wa mbere wa FIFA mu mwaka wa 2019, imbere ya Christiano Ronaldo wa Juventus na Virgil van Dijk wa Liverpool. Igize incuro ya gatandatu Messi atwaye ako gashimwe, inyuma y'aho agatahukaniye mu myaka ya 2009, 2010, 2011, 2012 na 2015. Uyo mukinyi akomoka muri Argentine yafashije umurwi wiwe gutsindira ihiganwa rya Espanye, La Liga, wongera ushika mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma c'ihiganwa rya Uefa Champions League. Ku ruhande rw'abagore naho, Megan Rapinoe wo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika niwe yatahukanye agashimwe k'umukinyi mwiza ku ruhande rw'abagore. Ku ruhande rw'abamenyereza naho, Jurgen Klopp, umumenyereza wa wa Liverpool niwe yatwaye agashimwe k'umumenyereza wa mbere. Liverpool yahejeje ari iya kabiri mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza Premier League n'amanota 97, ni mu gihe wari watahukanye igikombe ca Champions League  utsinze Tottenham mu rukino rwa nyuma ku bitsindo 2-0. Klopp  yasumbije bagenziwe muri Premier League, Pep Guardiola wa Manchester City  hamwe na Mauricio Pochettino wa Tottenham. Klopp ati: "Ni ibintu bidasanzwe, mu myaka 20, 10, itanu canke ine iheze, nta muntu yiyumvira ko nshobora kuba mpagaze ng'aha uno munsi". "Twese turazi igikorwa wewe [Mauricio Pochettino] wakoze n'ico Pep yakoze. Ndashimira bidasanzwe cane umurwi wa Liverpool". Umurwi wa Liverpool umaze gutsinda inkino zose zitandatu umaze gukira kuva rino higanwa rya 2019-2020 ritanguye. Liverpool yahawe kandi irindi teka ry'ukubona umunyegori wayo, umunya Brezili  Alisson Ramses Becker atahukanye agashimwe k'umunyegori wa mbere kw'isi. Yasumbije abanyegori Ederson Santana de Moraes  wa Manchester City na Marc-André ter Stegen  wa Barcelona. Muri ivyo birori vyaraye bibereye mu gisagara ca Milan, FIFA yanatangaje n'urutonde rw'abakinyi cumi n'umwe b'umurwi wa FIFA. Abo nabo ni: Umunyegori - Alisson (Liverpool/Brezili) Abakinyi b'inyuma: - Matthijs de Ligt (Ajax na Juventus/Netherlands), Sergio Ramos (Real Madrid/Espanye), Virgil van Dijk (Liverpool/Ubuholande), Marcelo (Real Madrid/Brezili). Abakinyi bo hagati - Luka Modric (Real Madrid/Croatia), Frenkie de Jong (Ajax na Barcelona/ Ubuholande), Eden Hazard (Chelsea na Real Madrid/Ububirigi) Abasatirizi - Kylian Mbappe (Paris St-Germain/Ubufaransa), Cristiano Ronaldo (Juventus/Portugal), Lionel Messi (Barcelona/Argentina)

headline: Brittney Griner: Rurangiranwa muri Basketball yaciriwe gupfungwa imyaka 9 azira gufatanwa ibiyayuramutwe
text: Sentare yo mu Burusiya yaciriye urubanza umukinyi rurangiranwa wa Basketball wo muri Amerika Brittney Griner gupfungwa imyaka umunani yagirizwa ibiyayuramutwe. Yategetswe kandi kuriha amande y'umuliyoni w'ama roubles angana n'amadolari 16.300. Griner yemeye icaha co gufatanwa ivyo biyayuramutwe ariko agahakana ko yabikoze yabigambiriye. Uwo mwigeme w'imyaka 31 amaze gutwara umudali wa Olempike yapfunzwe mu kwezi kwa kabiri ku kibuga c'indege i Moscou aho bamufatana amavuta arimwo cannabis mu bintu yari afise. Cannabis ntirekuwe mu Burusiya. Umugwi w'ababuranira Griner wavuze ko bashobora kwunguruza kuri ico cemezo cafashwe kuri uyu wa kane na sentare ya Khimiki iri irunde ya Moscou. Prezida wa Amerika Joe Biden yavuze mw'itangazo ko Uburusiya bupfunze bidakurikije amategeko Griner aca abuhamagarira kumurekura ubwo nyene. Ntibiramenyekana umwanya azomara apfunzwe, mu gihe Amerika n'Uburusiya bumaze imisi buganira kw'ihanahana ry'impfungwa rishobora kujamwo uwo mukinyi  wa Basketball nk'uko bivugwa n'umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC mu rurimi rw'ikirusiya, Steve Rosenberg. Inkuru zitangwa n'ibinyamakuru vyo muri Amerika zivuga ko umurusiya adandaza ibigwanisho bidaciye mu mategeko Viktor Bout - azwi kw'izina rya  Merchant of Death (Umudandaza w'urupfu) - ashobora kurungikwa mu Burusiya muri uwo mugambi.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amakuru 30.06.2019:Zaha, Pogba, Mbappe, Rabiot, Eriksen, Ndombele, Adams, Morata
text: Arsenal itegerezwa kuriha Crystal Palace amapawundi imiliyoni 100 kugira ngo ishobore kuronka umusatirizi wa Côte d'Ivoire Wilfred Zaha w'imyaka 26. (Mail on Sunday) Ariko umukuru wa  wa Eagles, Steve Parish afise ubwoba ko mu gihe yogurisha Zaha ko vyogira ingaruka mbi ku mugambi w'ukurondera abandi boshingwa uwo murwi . (Sun) Umusatirizi wa Borussia Dortmund Jacob Bruun Larsen aripfuzwa cane n'imirwi ya Liverpool, Manchester United na Arsenal.(Mail) Umukuru w'umurwi wa Tottenham Daniel Levy yahamagaye abajejwe Real Madrid kuri terefone kugira abahe umukinyi Christian Eriksen yanse gusinya ayandi masezerano muri Tottenham ihiganwa rya 2019/2020 rirangiye. (Marca) Umusatirizi w'Ubufaransa Kylian Mbappe  w'imyaka 20, asigaje imyaka itatu mu masezerano afitaniye na Paris St-Germain kandi nta mugambi afise wo kwongereza amasezerano ngo abandanye akinira uwo murwi. (Marca) Icegera c'umukuru wa Manchester United Ed Woodward yabwiye abakozi biwe ko uwo murwi ufise umugambi wo kwongereza abandi bakinyi "bakomeye" uno mwaka inyuma y'aho azaniye umukinyi Aaron Wan-Bissaka. (Sunday Telegraph) Paul Pogba azobonana n'umumenyereza Ole Gunnar Solskjae mu ndwi iza ku mugambi wiwe wo kuva muri uwo murwi. (Sun) Umusatirizi wa Birmingham City n'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubwongereza Che Adams yasezeye bagenziwe imbere y'uko yimukira mu murwi wa Southampton. (Mail on Sunday) Southampton yemeye kugurisha umukinyi w'inyuma ku ruhande rw'i buryo, Matt Targett kwa Aston Villa ku ma pawundi imiliyoni 14. (Sunday Telegraph) Liverpool na Tottenham yahevye umugambi w'ukurondera umukinyi Bruno Fernandes, akaryo kuri uwo mukinyi wo hagati w'umurwi wa Sporting Lisbon ko gushobora kuja muri Manchester Unted. (Sunday Express) Umumenyereza wa Tottenham Mauricio Pochettino avuga ko adafise ijambo rya nyuma ku vyerekeye abakinyi baronderwa.  (Independent on Sunday) Tottenham kandi yiteze guheraheza amasezerano y'ukugura umukinyi wo hagati wa Lyon Tanguy Ndombele w'imyaka 22 ku ma pawundi imiliyoni 60. (Standard) Chelsea iragabisha Atletico Madrid ko izohagarika amasezerano ku musatirizi Alvaro Morata, mu gihe Atletico Madrid itotanga amapawundi imiliyoni 50 ngo imugure burundu. (Sunday Telegraph) Inter Milan ikeneye kwegeranya amapawundi imiliyoni 75 kugira ngo ishobore kuronka umusatirizi w'Ububirigi Romelu Lukaku  w'imyaka 26 asanzwe akinira Manchester United, ayo mahera agashobora kuboneka ugurishije umukinyi wo hagati Joao Mario  w'imyaka 26 be n'uwundi w'inyuma Dalbert  w'imyaka 25. (Sun on Sunday) Umrwi wabaye uwa mbere mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubutaliyano Juventus bashitse ku mwumvikano n'umukinyi wa Paris St-Germain, Adrien Rabiot  w'imyaka 24. (Sky Italy, Sky Sports) Umunyegori wa  Ajax akomoka muri Kameruni Andre Onana  w'imyaka 23 avuga ko yipfuza kuguma muri uwo murwi wo mu Buholande n'aho Manchester United iboneka ko imwipfuza. (Voetbal International, via Metro) Watford yashitse ku masezerano yo kugura umukinyi w'inyuma w'umwongereza w'umurwi West Brom Craig Dawson  w'imyaka 29 ku ma pawundi imiliyoni 5 n'igice. (Sky Sports) Millwall na Bristol City yo mu cicaro ca kabiri bariko barwanira umusatirizi wa Barnsley Kieffer More.(Mail on Sunday) Leeds United wanakaribia kumnasa winga wa Wolves, Helder Costa 25.(Birmingham Mail)

headline: Pochettino yoba agiye kwirukanwa inyuma yo gutsindwa kwa PSG muri Champions League?
text: Mauricio Pochettino avuga ko "indwi nkeya ziri imbere zitagiye kworoha" inyuma y'aho Paris St-Germain yiwe iviriye mw'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo (Champions League) kandi yari ifise ibitsindo 2 uteranije, ariko Real Madrid ikaza kuyivyukiranya maze iyikura mw'ihiganwa. Mu kiringo c'isaha yose c'uru rukino rwo gusubiza, PSG yari iramutse yakirwa na Real Madrid yariganziye umupira inyuma y'igitsindo ca Kylian Mbappe cari kigize kabiri muri izi nkino zibiri hagati y'iyi mirwi. Ariko basigaye biyumvira ibibabayeko inyuma y'ibitsindo bitatu vyose vya Karim Benzema mu minota 17 gusa vyatumye basezera n'umubabaro utagira urugero iri higanwa bamaze igihe kirekire barondera gutsindira. Pochettino ati: "Igitsindo ca mbere [Benzema] cahinduye rwose urukino". "Mu kiringo c'isaha, twakinye neza gusumba Real Madrid. Ibintu vyahavuye bihinduka mu kibuga. Inyuma y'aho twarakoze amakosa amwe amwe, ntitwovuga ko atayo twakoze. Ikibabaje gusumba ibindi vyose ni uko ari twebwe twari dufise ibintu mu minwe bikaza kutuyangarana mu minota cumi. "Paris St-Germain imaze imyaka itari mike irondera Champions League. "Ni ukuri ndababaye cane, ndumiwe - ariko ibi ni ibintu bishobora gushika. Indwi nkeya ziri imbere ntizigiye kworoha". Kuva iguzwe n'abanya - Qatar mu 2011, PSG yagiye igura abakinyi b'ibihangange. Ariko indoto zayo zo gutahukana iri higanwa rikuru rihuza imirwi y'umupira w'amaguru ya Bulaya zagiye zipfa incuro nyinshi kandi yari mu mahirwe menshi yo gutsinda, harimwo igihe ikubitwa ibitsindo 6-1 na Bacerlona mu 2017 be n'igihe ivanwa mw'ihiganwa na Manchester United mu gice c'umunani gishira ica nyuma mu mu 2019. Umunyamakuru w'umupira w'amaguru mu Bufaransa, Julien Laurens, yabwiye BBC Radio 5 Live ati: "Ni kenshi PSG imaze gushika ng'aha. Kenshi cane. Ugutakaza uru rukino ni ikintu kibabaje cane. Amakosa menshi ari ku bakinyi mu kibuga kuko ntushobora gukora amakosa nk'aya. "Pochettino ntashobora kuba ari ng'aha mu mwaka uza, ivyo novyemeza - kiretse vyanse ko bazana [Zinedine] Zidane. Ariko na we nyene sinzi ko yipfuza kuza ng'aha; ashaka kwigira mu Bwongereza. "Umuryango wiwe uri i Londres mu gihe wewe amaze umwaka mw'ihoteri i Paris, kumbure iki ni kimwe mu ngorane. Ntushobora kureka ngo umurwi wawe ugwe mu manga nk'uko vyagenze muri iri joro ukaguma ureze amaboko. Yasamaye cane". Laurens aranegura kandi ingene Pochettino agenda ahindagura abanyegori biwe babiri, Gianluigi Donnarumma na Keylor Navas, akibaza kandi niba koko abakinyi bari bafise intumbero yo nyayo yo gutsinda muri uru rukino rwo hanze - mu gihe kuva umwaka utangura bamaze gutsinda urukino rumwe gusa mu nkino bakiniye hanze mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubufaransa Ligue 1. Laurens ati: "Uruhande rw'abanyegori ni ibara. Ntiyigera abategura kugira bakine neza. Ntushobora kumenya ni nde azokina urukino rukurikira. "Mu nkino zo hanze ntibavyifatamwo neza - kandi si muri Champions League gusa. Barafise ingorane iyo bagiye gukinira hanze kubera usanga ata shaka bafise. Iyo basatiriwe ntibashobora kuronka intsinzi. "Ubu bufyinasi jewe nibwo bumbabaza - iyumvire ubonye ko umaze gutakaza inkino wari ufise mu minwe nk'urw'uno musi ariko ukaguma uyayata nk'uko vyagenze muri iri joro. Iyi ni Champions League, raba ingene vyasubiye kubagendera". Umwongereza Steve McManaman yahoze akina hagati, akaba yatsindiye incuro zibiri Champions League igiye yakinira Real Madrid, arasigura amakosa ya PSG yatumye isubira gutsindwa muri iri higanwa. Mu mahiganwa yayo atandatu muri Champions League, uyu murwi ufise ikibanza ca mbere muri Ligue 1 washitse mu rukino rwa nyuma be no mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma mu myaka ibiri ikurikirana, ariko kandi ikaba imaze gutsindwa mu nkino z'igice c'umunani gishira ica nyuma  incuro zine zose. McManaman kuri BT Sport ati: "Ni ibintu twari twiteze ko PSG itembagara. Bakoze ivyo bama bakora, iyo basugerejwe, barayonga. "Bakora mu kajagari, ntawubayobora. Abakinyi barakomeye cane. Iyo ibintu bibakomeranye, ntaco bibabwira. Bakina uko bishakiye. "Ni ibintu bitumvikana ingene ushobora kubona [abakinyi] bane canke batanu bariko bayayata kandi ibintu biriko birayangara. "PSG yamye ikora amakosa igihe cose mu gice ca kabiri c'urukino. Ni ngombwa gukeza Real kuko n'aho boba bamaze gutsindwa, babandana bakina n'inguvu zabo zose. "Tumaze kubona abamenyereza baza bagenda ariko vyaranse ko batorera umuti iki kibazo. Baraza, muri Champions League  bagatsindwa hanyuma bakirukanwa, ubuzima bukabandanya". Eka na Rio Ferdinand yahoze akina inyuma muri Manchester United avuga nk'ivyo, akongerako ati: "Niko vyamye bimeze kandi kumbure ngira ni umugenzo muri uyu murwi. "Ibi si bishasha muri uyo murwi. Bafise abakinyi beza cane, ariko n'aho ibintu bitoba bimeze neza kuri uwo musi, ni ngombwa ko ubandanya urukino n'inguvu zawe zose. Ivyo nta vyo bakoze. Ni kimwe mu bigize umugenzo washinze imizi muri PSG".

headline: Man United: Ighalo yasivye imiyimenyerezo kubera ubwoba bwa corona
text: Umusatirizi wa Manchester United Odion Ighalo ntazoja mu myimenyerezo y'uwo murwi muri Espanye ku gutinya ko ashobora kwankirwa gusubira mu Bwongereza kubera ubwoba bwa coronavirus. Uyo mukinyi w'umunya Nijeriya w'imyaka 30  yashitse mu gisagara ca Manchester mu mpera z'indwi iheze avuye mu Bushinwa inyuma y'ugushira umukono ku masezerano avuye mu murwi Shanghai Shenhua. Ole Gunnar Solskjaer, umumenyereza wa Man United yabwiye televiziyo MUTV ati: "Vyari vyiza ko nawe yari kujana n'abandi bakinyi kugira ngo ashobore kumenyerana nabo". "Ariko kubera amategeko akomeye y'uruja n'uruza ku mipaka, ntidushaka kwigerezako". Hagati aho, abakinyi Scott McTominay wo hagati na Axel Tuanzebe w'inyuma bamaze igihe batinjira mu kibuga kubera imvune, bazojana n'abandi. Man U ntizoba iri mu gihugu gushika ku wa gatanu mu kwitegura guhangana na Chelsea ku kibuga cayo Stamford Bridge ku wa mbere 17 z'ukwa kabiri, hazoba ari isaha zine z'ijoro mu masaha y'u Burundi n'u Rwanda

headline: I﻿gikombe c'isi 2022: Intambara itoroshe ya FIFA ku nzoga
text: Avuga ku ngingo yo kubuza kunywa inzoga ku bibuga biberamwo inkino z'igikombe c'isi, igihe yaratashe avuye kuraba urukino rw'umugwi wiwe, Jose, umufana wa Equateur yavuze ko "﻿Birababaje". Y﻿agize ati:"Ndonse iyi ifise urugero rw'umwambiro rw'ubusa, ariko basi ndapfa kwumva icanga ry'inzoga." E﻿milio yongeyeko ati:"100%. Hari abantu bashaka ibiyeri". I﻿ngingo yo ku munota wa nyuma yo kubuza kudandaza ibiyerimu bibuga vya Qatar yavuye ku rugamba rurerure yagwanye na Qatar ku vyerekeye inzoga. I﻿ntambara ku batanga uburyo muri FIFA, imaze kuba mu myaka itari mike uko habaye inkino z'igikombe c'isi, vyatumye iryo shirahamwe ryagirizwa ubukoloni, ko rishira imbere amahera gusumba amagara y'abantu. N﻿'aho izo ngorane z'ubu za FIFA zitewe n'inzoga zijanye n'uko yariko iragerageza kugondoza ibihugu vyakiriye ihiganwa gutanga inzoga ku bibuga, iryo shirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru kw'isi ryahora ritegeka ko hadatangwa inzoga ku bibuga. G﻿ushika mu 2004, amategeko agenga ibirori bikomeye yari akivuga ko abakiriye amahiganwa badafise uruhusha rwo kudandaza inzoga ku bibuga ahariko harabera inkino, kandi ko umuntu wese aborewe yirukanwa ku kibuga. A﻿riko ingingo y'urwo rwego rurongoye umupira w'amaguru kw'isi yo kwisubirako kuri iyo politike no guhimiriza kugira inzoga zigurishwe igihe hariko haraba inkino z'igikombe c'isi yararucanishijemwo n'ibihugu bizakira. G﻿uha ububasha Brezil gutunganya inkino z'igikombe c'isi co mu 2014 vy'asa n'ingingo nziza. I﻿co gihugu co mu bumanuko bwa Amerika, kizwi cane mu mupira w'amaguru, kimaze gutwara igikombe c'isi incuro zitanu kandi kandi hari umuco wo gukunda inzoga. A﻿riko co kimwe no mu bindi bihugu, urukundo abafana bakunda uwo mukino rutuma barenza rimwe na rimwe mbere hakazamwo n'imishamirano. N﻿i co gituma inzoga zabujijwe mu nkino z'umupira w'amaguru muri Brezil mu 2003, mu ntumbero yo kubaza imishamirano hagati y'imigwi itarabana ryiza. A﻿riko Budweiser, basanzwe bakorana na FIFA haraciye igihe kirekire, ari na ryo shirahamwe ritanga uburyo muri iryo higanwa, ryarasaavye ata guca hirya no hino ko hahindurwa amategeko abuza kugurisha inzoga aho abarorerezi bicaye. U﻿wari umunyamabanga w'ishirahamwe FIFA ico gihe, Jérôme Valcke yagize ati:"Inzoga ziri mw'ihiganwa ry'igikombe c'isi, n'ukuvuga rero ko tuzozinywa. Murantunga nimwaba mubona ko nsa n'uwuvugishije amanyama, ariko n'ikintu tutazoganirako." Y﻿ongeyeko ati:"Kugira uburenganzira bwo kugurisha inzoga bitegerezwa kuja mu mategeko." U﻿mushikiranganji wa Brezil ajejwe amagara y'abantu yaranse iyo mpinduka. Marco Aurelio Garcia, umuhanuzi adasanzwe wa prezida w'ico gihugu, yavuze ko Valcke "atarezwe". "umukoloni" kandi "apfa kuvuga atiyumviriye". A﻿riko n'aho bavyiyamirije, abateguye inkino zo mu 2014 baruhiye kugondozwa barahindura itegeko kugira barekure igurishwa ry'inzoga mu gihe hariko haraba inkino z'igikombe c'isi. M﻿u gihe hariko haraba inkino z'igikombe c'isi harabaye imishamirano myinshi hagati y'abafaba barabana ryiza, nk'igihe haba urukino ruhuza Colombia na Uruguay i Rio de Janeiro, aho vyabaye ko igipolisi kija hagati y'iyo migwi ibiri yari ishamiranye. M﻿u kwishura kuri ivyo vayabaye, Jérôme Valcke  yavugiye ku mboneshakure ya Brezil Sport TV ati:"Naratangajwe n'igitigiri c'abantubari baborewe." A﻿bajijwe nimba bishoboka ko FIFA ishobora guhindura itegeko muri kazoza, yongeyeko ati:"Nitwabona ko bikenewe ko tugenzura igurishwa ry'inzoga, tuzobikora." A﻿riko inkino zakurikiye mu Burusiya mu 2018, nta cahindutse kinini ku vyerekeye amategeko ya FIFA agenga igurishwa ry'inzoga. C﻿o kimwe na Brezil, kubuza igurishwa ry'inzoga igihe hariko haraba inkino zitandukanye n'ibintu vyo kuva kera. M﻿u 2005, reta yarabujije igurishwa no kwamamaza inzoga ku bibuga. Nta shirahamwe na rimwe rikora inzoga rikomeye ryatanze amahera yo gutegura inkino za Olempike zo mu gihe c'imbeho zo mu 2014 i Sotchi, hanyuma mu 2012 Uburusiya bwaratoye itegeko ribuza gose kwamamaza inzoga ku mboneshakure, ku mbuga hwaniro no mu binyamakuru vyandika. A﻿riko mu mwaka wakurikiye, prezidaa Vladimir Putin yarashize umukono kw'itegeko rishasha rirekura kugurisha inzoga mu gihe c'inkino z'igikombe c'isi, aranorosha vy'aagateganyo amategeko mashasha yabuza kwamamaza inzoga. A﻿karere ka Rostov karagerageje kubuza igurishwa ry'inzogamu bibuga vyako, kavuga ko "ari ahantu hakoranira abantu benshi" ariko karuhiye kwisubirako kamenyeshejwe ko gashobora gukurikiranwa mu butungane. I﻿bibazo bijanye n'inzoga hamwe n'umupira w'amaguru mu mahiganwa akomakomeye ntibiraba gusa FIFA, n'ibihugu bitegura izo nkino. M﻿u nkino za Euro 2022, harabaye ikibazo hagati ya UEFA na bamwe mu bakinyi banse kuja mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru, ku meza hateretse amacupa y'inzoga ya rimwe mw'ishirahamwe ryari ryatanze amahera yo guterera iryo higanwa, Heineken. U﻿mukinyi w'imbere w'Ubufaransa Pual Pogba, umu Islam yarakuye ku meza icupa rya Heineken imbere yo kwishura ibibazo inyuma y'urukino. M﻿ugenzi we Karim Benzema na we nyene w'umu Islam, co kimwe na Pogba na we nyene yishuye abamenyeshamakuru ata cupa na rimwe riri ku meza. N﻿'aho ico gihe cose, inzoga zari zazanywe n'iryo shirahamwe zari iza Heineken ariko ziromwo urugero rw'umwambiro wa 0,0%, abo bakinyi bibashatse ko baberekana bafise amacupa y'inzoga imbere yabo. M﻿u nyuma UEFA yaremeye kuza irabaza abamenyereza n'abakinyi ko bemeye ko bazana amacupa ya Heineken ku meza aho bagirira ikiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru, ariko imigwi yaragabishijwe ko ashobora guhanwa mu gihe yosubira kwinuba ayandi mashirahamwe atanga amahera muri iryo higanwa rikiriko riraba. U﻿bu, mu gihe hariko haraba igikombe c'isi ca 2022, ukwiyamiriza inzoga gufatiye ku kwemera kw'igihugu cakiriye izo nkino, gitegeka kubuza kugurisha inzoga mu gihugu cose, kwatumye FIFA yemera iyo ngingo yo kutagurisha inzoga ku bafana ku bibuga ku munota wa nyuma. A﻿bafise amatike yo mu kibanza c'iteka (VIP) bo barashobora kubandanya kugura inzoga aho ziri, imbere n'igihe inkino ziriko ziraba eka mbere n'inyuma y'aho. H﻿asigaye kumenya ingene iyo ngingo izogira ingaruka mbi ku migenderanire FIFA ifitaniye n'ishirahamwe rikora inzoga rya Budweiser AB InBev. I﻿shirahamwe rikomeye ritanga amahera yo gutunganya amahiganwa kuva mu myaka ya 1988, ryoba ririha FIFA imiliyoni 75 z'amadolari igihe cose habaye inkino z'igikombe c'isi. A﻿riko kuba Reta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, aho iryo shirahamwe rya Budweiser AB InBev riri, ari kimwe mu bihugu bitatu bizotunganya inkino zo mu 2026, AB InBev rishobora kwizera amahirwe menshi yo kugurisha inzoga muri iryo higanwa ryimirije.

headline: Babuzwa guhiganwa mu bandi kubera uko bavutse
text: Bivuye ku kuntu bavukanye imisemburo ya kigabo myinshi mu mubiri, aba banonotsi babujijwe guhiganwa mu bandi bagore kiretse bahinduye imetero biruka canke bagafata imiti igabanya iyo misemburo.

headline: Champions League: Ivyabaye 2018 hagati ya Liverpool na Real Madrid bihava bisubira?
text: Kuri uyu wa kabiri 06/04/2021, inkino za mbere z'igice ca kane gishira ica nyuma mw'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere (Champions League) ku mugabane wa Buraya niho ziza gutangura zikazobandanya ejo, inkino ziboneka ko ziza kuba zikomeye. Imirwi iva mu bihugu bitanu gusa ni yo yiziziye iki gice, ni ukuvuga imirwi yo mu Bwongereza (Liverpool, Manchester City na Chelsea), Espanye (Real Madrid), Ubudagi (Bayern Munich, Dortmund), Uburafansa (Paris Saint-Germain), hamwe na Portugal (FC Porto). Inkino zigira kabiri zizokinwa mu ndwi iza. Mu gihe Real Madrid igiye guhura na Liverpool ubwa mbere kuva mu 2018 kuva iyi mirwi ihuriye mu rukino rwa nyuma rwagiye gutsindwa na Real Madrid, hari ikintu kimwe ntibagirwa cagumye mu mitwe y'abakunzi ba Liverpool. N'aho umwaka wakurikiye wa 2019 Liverpool yatsindiye iri higanwa, umwaka ukurikira 2020 nawo igatsindira ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza (Premier League), hari agashavu katarigera kava mu mitwe y'abafana ba Liverpool bibutse ingene urukino rwa nyuma rwa Champions League 2018 na Real Madrid rwagenze. Mu mpera z'umwaka wa mbere yari amaze akinira Liverpool aho yerekanye ubuhinga budasanzwe, Mohamed Salah yakinye iminota itarenga 30 yonyene aca ava mu kibuga akorora amosozi inyuma yo kuvunika ku rutugu ariko arwanira umupira na Sergio Ramos. Abakunzi ba Liverpool barababaye cane kuko babona ko bari gushobora gutsinda urwo rukino maze bagatahukana igikombe. Urukino rwagiye kurangira Real itsinze 3-1 ibifashijwemwo n'amakosa abiri y'umunyegori Loris Karius, Gareth Bale atsinda bibiri ikindi kimwe cinjizwa na Karim Benzema. Ica Liverpool cinjizwa na Sadio Mané. Kuva iyo mirwi ihuriye muri uru rukino rwagenze uko rwagenze, Liverpool na Real Madrid ntiyahindutse cane kuko abakinyi icenda muri buri murwi bakinye urwo rukino bakiri muri yo. Gusa, batatu mu bakinyi bakomeye si ho baza kuba bari mu rukino rwo kuri uyu wa kabiri. Ramos si ho aza kuba ari ngo yongere avune Salah, Bale si ho aza kuba ari ngo asubire atsinde ibindi bitsindo bibiri, eka na Karius si ho aza kuba ari ngo asubire yihende ahereze umupira Benzema ngo amwinjize igitsindo. Ramos yaravunitse, abo babiri nabo bakina mu yindi mirwi batijijwemwo. None biragenda gute? Ni kuva isaha zitatu z'ijoro mu masaha yo mu Burundi no mu Rwanda. Urundi rukino rutegekanijwe ni uruza guhuza Manchester City yo mu Bwongereza na Borussia Dortmund yo mu Budagi. Ejo ku wa gatatu, Bayern Munich izohura na Paris St-Germain,nayo FC Porto ihure na Chelsea.

headline: Ian Wright yahoze ari umusatirizi w'Ubwongereza ati: Ihiganwa CAN/AFCON ririko 'rirasuzugurwa'
text: Ian Wright yahoze ari umusatirizi w'Ubwongereza avuga ko ihiganwa ry'igikombe c'umupira w'amaguru rya Afrika ririko "rirasuzugurwa" n'ibinyamakuru bimwe bimwe bifise intumbero mbi. Iri higanwa rihuza imirwi 24 ryitezwe gutangura icese ku wa 09 z'ukwa mbere kuza kandi rikazohuriramwo n'abakinyi b'ibihangange bo mu mirwi itandukanye ikomakomeye yo ku mugabane wa Bulaya. Umumenyereza wa Crystal Palace Patrick Vieira na we nyene ari mu basaba ko iri higanwa rihabwa icubahiro cose. Aciye ku rubuga rwa Instagram, Wright yavuze ati: "Ubwo hoba hari ihiganwa rindi ryoba risuzugurwa nk'ihiganwa ry'igikombe c'umupira w'amaguru rya Afrika?" Avuga ku kungene ibinyamakuru bivuga iri higanwa rya CAN/AFCON, agira ati: "Nta teka na rimwe rindi risumba guserukira igihugu cawe. Ivyandikwa n'ibinyamakuru kuri iri higanwa vyuzuyemwo ivanguramoko. "Twarakinye ihiganwa ry'igikombe c'umupira w'amaguru ca Bulaya turikinira mu bihugu 10 kubera ikiza, kandi nta ngorane vyateye. Ariko kubona Cameroun ari yo yonyene yakiriye iri higanwa, ni ikibazo. "Hari abakinyi bama babazwa nimba bazokwitabira imirwi nserukirabihugu yabo. Iyumvire iyaba yari umukinyi w'Ubwongereza yategerezwa guserukira umurwi nserukiragihugu. Urazi umunezero uba uhari?". Umusatirizi wa Côte d'Ivoire akinira Ajax Sebastien Haller avuga ko kubona hari abashaka ko umukinyi aheba gukinira igihugu ciwe kugira abandanye akinira umurwi wiwe "vyerekana agasuzuguro bafise kuri Afrika". Yabwiye ikinyamakuru co mu Buholande De Telegraaf ati: "Hari umukinyi w'umunya Bulaya yari kubazwa iki kibazo iyaba ryari ihiganwa rya Bulaya?" "Neza cane, nzotegerezwa guserukira Côte d'Ivoire. Iri ni ryo teka risumba ibindi vyose". Hagati aho, uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 27 avuga ko gutakaza inkino zo mu murwi wiwe "bibabaje cane". Haller yongerako ati: "Ntibingwa neza iyo ngeze aho mpitamwo gukinira igihugu canje canke umurwi wanje". N'aho imirwi itari mike izotakaza abakinyi bayo bakomakomeye mu kwa mbere kuza - harimwo na  Crystal Palace yiteze gutakaza Cheikhou Kouyate, Wilfried Zaha na Jordan Ayew - umumenyereza wayo Vieira agaruka ku ciyumviro ca Haller. Vieira, yatsindiye igikombe c'isi yose hamwe n'ica Bulaya igihe yakinira Ubufaransa, avuga ati: "Ndubaha kandi ndatahura igishika n'akamaro ku bakinyi kuja guserukira ibihugu vyabo, rero sinshobora kuzibira umukinyi n'umwe ngo ndamubuze kuja gukinira ihiganwa ry'igikombe ca Afrika". "Ndemera ko iri higanwa ritegerezwa gusonerwa - kuko iri higanwa ni nkenerwa nk'uko ayandi mahiganwa ya Bulaya ari nkenerwa". Liverpool, umwe mu mirwi iriko irarwanira bikomeye ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza, izogira uruhombo rudasanzwe kuko izobura umusatirizi wayo karuhariwe, Mohamed Salah, umusatirizi mugenziwe Sadio Mane hamwe n'umukinyi wo hagati Naby Keita bose biteze kwitabira iri higanwa rya Afrika. Manchester City iri imbere mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza, izotakaza Riyad Mahrez, mu gihe umurwi ugira kabiri Chelsea nawo uzotakaza umunyegori wawo Edouard Mendy nayo West Ham itakaze Said Benrahma azoja guserukira Algeria. Leeds United, Newcastle United, Norwich City na Tottenham niyo mirwi yonyene itazotakaza umukinyi n'umwe kubera iri higanwa rya Afrika. Abakinyi bemerewe gukinira imirwi yabo gushika ku wa 03 z'ukwa mbere hanyuma bace baja guserukira ibihugu vyabo muri iri higanwa ry'igikombe ca Afrika, ni inyuma y'aho FIFA ihinduriye ingingo "ku mvo z'ubugwaneza", yategeka iyi mirwi kurekura abakinyi bitarenze ku wa 27 z'uku kwa cumi na kabiri. Wright ati: "Muri iki gihe, abakinyi beza beza i Bulaya ni abanyafrika". "Nimba tubakunda bari mu mirwi y'iwacu kubera iki tudashobora kubakunda bari mu mirwi nserukirabihugu yabo nka bagenzi babo b'ahandi kw'isi yose? Kubera iki abantu bagenda banebagura iri higanwa?" "Ndashimira cane abakinyi nka Sebastien Haller biyamiriza amajambo mabi y'ibinyamakuru bimwe bimwe, hamwe na Patrick Vieira yavuye mu gacerere agashira ahabona ibi bintu. "Niyo mpamvu ari ngombwa kugira umumenyereza w'umwirabure ashobora kwumvisha abantu amamuko yiwe n'akamaro iri higanwa rifitiye Abanyafrika. "Nipfurije imigisha myinshi Cameroun kubona yemeye kwakira iri higanwa, hamwe n'abakinyi bose n'abakunzi b'umupira w'amaguru".

headline: George Weah ati: 'Imirwi myinshi izozimangana' kubera coronavirus
text: Uwahoze ari umukinyi mpuzamakungu, George Weah, ubu akaba ari umukuru w'igihugu ca Liberia, avuga ko hari igipfungu kuri kazoza k'inkino muri Afrika inyuma ya coronavirus, bikanaboneka ko ata n'icemezo c'uko zizosubira gutohoka. Ku mugabane wa Afrika, inkino zarahagaritswe nk'uko vyagenze mu bundi burere bwo kw'isi, kubera ikiza ca covid-19. No mu bihugu bimwe bimwe izo nkino zabandanije, ziba mu kanywababu canke hari abarorerezi bari ku rushi. Mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru categuwe n'ishirahamwe Africa Sports Ventures Group, uyo yahoze ari umukinyi rurangiranwa kw'isi, Georges Weah, avuga ko ico kiza ari akaga gakomeye, haba ku mirwi yo nyene ubwayo, canke no mu mahiganwa iyo mirwi isanzwe ikinamwo. Weah ati: "Inkino zibeshwaho cane cane n'abafatabuguzi hamwe n'abishingizi - aho rero ivyo bitari, imirwi myinshi izozimangana, eka n'amahiganwa atari make azohagarara burundu". Kubw'iwe, iyi coronavirus, ifatanye n'igabanuka rishobora kwibonekeza ry'abishingizi mu gihe amakompanyi ariko agerageza kugabanya amahera akoresha kubera uruhombo rutewe na coronavirus, ni ikibazo gikomeye ku mupira w'amaguru. Yongerako ati: "Eka naje ndemera ko kazoza k'inkino muri Afrika inyuma ya Covid-19 karimwo igipfungu kandi nta cemezo gihari ko zizosubira kuvyuka. Ikizoba cihutirwa ni uko umupira w'amaguru usubira kunagurwa, co kimwe n'izindi nkino". Kubw'iwe, ni vyo ko ikizoba ari nkenerwa cane gusumba ibindi  ari "ukuvyura ubutunzi, ariko ni nkenerwa ko abarondera amafaranga babona akamaro k'inkino mu buzima bw'abantu".

headline: Salima Mukansanga azohagarikira inkino z'igikombe c'isi muri Qatar mu 2022
text: Umunyarwandakazi Salima Mukansanga yagenywe kuba mu bazohagarikira inkino za nyuma (finales)  z’igikombe c’isi mu mupira w’amaguru kizokinirwa Qatar uyu mwaka wa 2022. Nta mugore yari bwabe umuhagarikizi mu nkino z'umupira w'amaguru mu rwego rw'abagabo, buzoba bubaye ubwa mbere muri iryo higanwa rizoba mu kwezi kwa Munyonyo (11).

headline: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: Lewandowski, Nunez, Mane, Pogba, Nkunku n’abandi
text: Manchester United igiye kwinjira mu rugamba rwo kurondera umusatirizi wa Pologne Robert Lewandowski w’imyaka 33 mu gihe icipfuzo ciwe co kwimukira muri Barcelona cokwanka, ni mu gihe uyu murwi wo muri Espagne uriko urarondera kwikurako bamwe mu bakinyi bayo bahembwa menshi. (Sun) Paris St-Germain nayo nyene iripfuza Lewandowski mu gihe asigaje umwaka umwe mu masezerano afitaniye na Bayern Munich. (L'Equipe) Chelsea nayo nyene iriko kandi irategura kwinjira mu rugamba rwo kurondera Lewandowski, ariko nta ngingo ishobora gufata gushika agurishije umusatirizi wayo umubirigi Romelu Lukaku  w’imyaka 29 yaguzwe imiriyoni 97.5 z’ama pawundi. (Star) Liverpool yageze ku masezerano yok u munwa kugira ngo igure umusatirizi w’umunya Uruguay Darwin Nunez w’imyaka 22 asanzwe akina muri  Benfica ikaba iriko irategura urwandiko mu ntumbero yo guheraheza amasezerano azoyitwara imiriyoni 85 z’amapawundi. (Guardian) Aya masezerano asigura ko umusatirizi wa Senegal  Sadio Mane w’imyak  30,ari hafi yo kuva muri Liverpool akaja muri Bayern Munich. (Telegraph ) Tottenham iri mu biganiro bigeze kure kugira irabe ko yoshobora kugura umusatirizi wa Everton umunya Brezili Richarlison w’imyaka 25, ku miriyoni 51 z’amapawundi. (UOL Esport) Manchester City izosaba imiriyoni 80 z’amapawundi ku munya Portugal akina hagati Bernardo Silva mu gihe Barcelona yogerageza kugura uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 27. (Sunday Mirror) Chelsea yahawe icizere inyuma y’aho Barcelona yemereje ko umukinyi wo ku ruhande umufaransa Ousmane Dembele w’imyaka 25 ataratera amasezeranomashasha yemerewe. (Sun) Umukuru wa Barcelona Joan Laporta avuga ko uyu murwi uri hafi yo gushika ku masezerano mashasha n’umukinyi wo hagati w’umunya Espagne Gavi  w’imyaka 17, mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye nayo asigaje umwaka umwe. (Marca) Umusatirizi w’umufaransa Christopher Nkunku w’imyaka 24 ariteguye kuguma muri  RB Leipzig agatera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha n’aho imirwi ya Manchester United na Chelsea imurondera. (Leipziger Volkszeitung) Arsenal ni umwe mu mirwi itari mike iriko irakurikiranira hagufi ingene ivya  Marco Asensio bigenda muri Real Madrid  mu gihe kazoza k’uyu mukinyi wo hagati wa Espagne afise imyaka 26 kitezwe kumenyekana mu ndwi iza. (Mirror) Umukinyi wo hagati umufaransa Paul Pogba w’imyaka 29, agiye gusubira muri Juventus mu masezerano y’imyaka ine afise agaciro k’imiriyoni 68 z’amapawundi, ni inyuma y’aho asezereye muri Manchester United. (Gazzetta dello Sport) Arsenal iri mu biganiro vyo kugurisha umunyegori, umudagi Bernd Leno w’imyaka 30 kuri Fulham mu gihe c’igura n’igurisha ry’abakinyi muri rino ci. (Sun) Fulham kandi irizeye ko ishobora kuronka abakinyi babiri na Liverpool umunya Pays de Galles akina inyuma Neco Williams w’imyaka 21, hamwe n’umusatirizi w’umuyapani Takumi Minamino w’imyaka 27. (90min) Umukinyi wo hagati w’umuswisi Granit Xhaka w’imyaka 29 yabonetse ko aronderwa n’umurwi   Bayer Leverkusen mu Arsenal yakenyeye mu rugamba rwo kurondera umubirigi akina hagati Youri Tielemans w’imyaka 25 akina muri Leicester. (Mirror) Umunya Serbia akina hagati Nemanja Matic mu ndwi iza azofatwa ibipimo vyo kwa muganga muri Roma mu gihe uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 33 ari hafi yo kwinjira muri uno murwi wo mu Butaliyano kuri gusa, inyuma y’aho amasezerano afitaniye na Manchester United azorangirira mu mpera z’uku kwa gatandatu. (Il Corriere dello Sport) Liverpool iriko irihweza ingene yorekura umukinyi w’inyuma w’umwongereza Nat Phillips w’imyaka 25 ko yosubira muri Bournemouth ku ntizo mu mwaka w’inkino uza. (Mirror) Luis Suarez nta ngingo ntabanduka arafata ku bijanye na kazoza kiwe ariko Aston Villa iracari mu rugamba rwo kurondera uyu musatirizi w’umunya Uruguaa afise myaka 35 ubu. (Mundo Deportivo) Juventus iriko iratera intambwe mu biganiro iriko igiriranira na Atletico Madrid kugira irabe ko yoronka burundu umusatirizi w’umunya Espagne Alvaro Morata  w’imyaka 29 yahoze akinira Chelsea. (TuttoSport)

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Mbappe, Ronaldo, Haaland, Saul, Richarlison, Trippier, Van de Beek, Zouma
text: Paris St Germain ishobora kurondera umusatirizi wa Everton umunya Brésil Richarlison, 24, nk'uwushobora gusubirira umufaransa Kylian Mbappe, 22,  ariko araronderwa hasi hejuru na Real Madrid(Eurosport) Umusatirizi wa Juventus umunya-Portugal Cristiano Ronaldo, 36, ariko akora uko ashoboye kwose ngo arabe ko yokwimukira muri Manchester City -  umugwi watahukanye ihiganwa Premier League ryo mu Bwongereza - muri ino ndwi ya nyuma y'igihe c'igura n'igurishwa ry'abakinyi, ni mu gihe uyu mukinyi yahoze akinira Manchester United kandi yari akunzwe cane atanarajwe ishinga n'umwaka usigaye mu masezerano afitaniye n'umugwi wiwe mu Butaliyano. (L'Equipe - in French) Ronaldo aramaze kuvugana ivyerekeye ivyo kwimukira muri City  na bagenziwe b'abanye Portugal ari bo Bernardo Silva, Ruben Dias, 24, hamwe n'umukinyi w'inyuma Joao Cancelo, 27. Umukinyi wo hagati Silva canke umukinyi w'inyuma Aymeric Laporte ba City bompi bafise imyaka 27, bashobora kuba mu boguzwa na we. City irafise ishaka ryo guha Ronaldo umushahara yipfuza, ariko ntiyiteguye gutanga igiciro gisabwa.  (L'Equipe - in French) Manchester United iri kw'isonga mu rugamba rwo kurondera wa musatirizi wa Borussia Dortmund umunya-Norvege Erling Braut Haaland mu ci riza.  Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 21 yarihaye ikibanza gikomeye nk'umwe mu bakinyi  bakomeye bari kw'isoko, inyuma yo kwinjiza ibitsindo 62 vyose mu mikino 63 gusa muri uwo mugwi wo mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubudagi Bundesliga. (Bild - in German) Chelsea ishobora guhangana na Manchester United mu gihe yokwongereza agacanwa mu kurondera ko Atletico Madrid yoyitiza umukinyi wo hagati umunya-Espagne Saul Niguez, 26. (Guardian) Atletico Madrid yamaze kubona uwo yoca irondera, uyu na we akaba ari umunya-Espagne akina hagati Pablo Sarabia w'imyaka 29 akina muri Paris St-Germain mu gihe Saul yoramuka agiye. (Marca) Arsenal yatanguye ibiganiro na Atletico Madrid kugira ngo irabe ko yoyiha umukinyi w'umwongereza akina inyuma ku ruhande rw'i buryo Kieran Trippier, n'aho uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 30 wewe yipfuza kwigira muri Manchester United muri gihe yoramuka avuye muri uyo mugwi wo ku mugwa mukuru wa Espagne. Ariko gusa, aba Gunners ntibiteguye gutanga amafaranga yababa imiriyoni 47 asabwa kuri uyu mukinyi yahoze akina inyuma muri Tottenham. (Eurosport) Tottenham yatanguye kuvugana na Lyon ku bijanye n'umukinyi wo hatati Houssem Aouar, 23. (Sky Sports) Abakinyi batari bake: umunya Bresil akina ku ruhande, Willian Borges da Silva, akunzwe kwitwa Willian, 33, umwongereza akina inyuma ku ruhande rw'i buryo, Ainsley Maitland-Niles, 23, umusatirizi w'umwongereza Eddie Nketiah , 22,  umunya Espagne akina inyuma Hector Bellerin, 26, umunya -Uruguay akina hagati Lucas Torreira, 25,  umwongereza akina ku ruhande Reiss Nelson, 21 hamwe n'umunya Bosnia  akina inyuma ku ruhande rw'ibubamfu  Sead Kolasinac, 28, abo bose bashobora kuba muri Arsenal mu ndwi iza. (Standard) West Ham iriko iritegura kugura umusatirizi w'umufaransa Gaetan Laborde, 27 akina muri Montpellier , ariko rero uyu mugwi wo muri Ligue 1 ushobora kuba umuronderako n'imiburiburi imiriyoni 17 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika.  (Le 10 Sport - in French) Aba Hammers bafise icizere cinshi co kuronka umufaransa akina inyuma Kurt Zouma muri Chelsea bakaba bamaze gutera intambwe muri uru rugamba rwo kurondera uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 26.  (Telegraph - subscription required) West Ham iriko irihweza nimba ikwiye kurondera umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa CSKA Moscow umunya-Croatia Nikola Vlasic w'imyaka 23, ari nka hamwe vyokwanka ko ironka umusatirizi wa  Manchester United umwongereza Jesse Lingard, 28, aboneka ko ashobora kwigumira i Old Trafford. (Telegraph - subscription required) Abaserukizi b'umunya-Hollande  Donny van de Beek, 24, ntibakeneye kwumva abarondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester United, mu gihe yiteguriye urugamba rwo kurondera ikibanza ca mbere muri uyu mugwi. (Times - subscription required) Umukinyi w'inyuma ku ruhande rw'i buryo wa Liverpool umunya Pays de Galles Neco Williams, 20,  ashobora kubandanya akinira uwu murwi mu gihe abariko bamurondera basa n'abakuyemwo akarenge muri zino ndwi za nyuma.  (Liverpool Echo) Uwujejwe ubuhinga muri Arsenal Edu asa n'uwutorohewe, mu gihe Mark Overmars aboneka ko ashobora kumusubirira.  (Express) Inter Milan iri hafi yo kuronka umusatirizi wa Lazio umunya-Argentine Joaquin Correa, 27, ku miriyoni 30 z'ama euros (Fabrizio Romano) Lyon  yemeye igiciro c'imiriyoni 20.5 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika gitangwa na Burnley ku mukinyi w'inyuma ku ruhande rw'i bubamfu w'umunya-Côte d'Ivoire Maxwel Cornet ubu umupira ukaba usigaye mu maboko yiwe, nimba azokwemera kuja muri uyu murwi. (Sky Sports) Abakinyi babiri ba Barcelona bakina inyuma Sergi Roberto, 29, hamwe na Sergio Busquets, 33 akina hagati, bompi abanya-Espagne, bari hafi yo kwemera gukatwa umushahara muri uno murwi wa La Liga. (Marca)

headline: Africa Cup of Nations: Abafana bazotegerezwa kwicandagisha no kwerekana ibipimo vya Covid
text: Abariko barategura inkino z'igikombe ca Afrika muri Cameroun bavuga ko abafana bonyene  bamaze kuronka incanco zose za Covid-19 n'ibipimo vyerekana ko badafise uwo mugera ari bo bazemererwa kuraba izo nkino. Mw'itangazo ry'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru muri Cameroun (Fecafoot) n'iryo umupira w'amaguru muri Afrika (Caf), basubiye kwemeza ko iryo higanwa rizoba hagati y'itariki 9 z'ukwezi kwa mbere n'itariki 6 z'ukwezi kwa kabiri. Imigwi 24, imwe muri iyo ikaba ikinamwo abakinyi rurangiranwa bo mw'ihiganwa ryo mu Bwongereza nka Mohamed Salah wo mu Misri, Sadio Mane wo muri Senegal na Riyad Mahrez wo muri Algeria izoba iri muri iryo higanwa. Iryo tangazo rigira riti:"Reta yarateguye amategeko adasanzwe yo guhangana n'ikiza Covid mu gihe c'izo nkino. "Abafana bashobora kuzinjira ku kibuga ahabera ihiganwa igihe gusa bazoba bacandazwe bakanerekana ibipimo vya Covid vyerekana ko badafise uwo mugera mu masaha 72. "Abategetsi muvyo amagara y'abantu bazofata ingingo zose zikenewe zo gufasha mu gucanca abantu no gupima Covid ahantu hose igihe hazoba hariko haraba iryo higanwa." Gushika ubu abantu 2% b'abanye Cameroun baramaze gucandagwa, nk'uko biri mu biharuro bitangwa na Our World in Data. Inkino z'igikombe ca Afrika, zagiye zirunguruzwa kubera Covid, zizokinirwa ku bibuga bitanu muri Cameroun, harimwo n'umugwa mukuru Yaounde. Mu misi cumi n'itanu iheze, ishirahamwe ry'imigwi y'umupira w'amaguru ku mugabane wa Buraya, urwego rwigenga, rwarerekanye "amakenga"rufise ku magara y'abakinyi kubera ikibazo c'ubundi bwoko bwa coronavirus bwitwa Omicron hamwe "n'ingene ivyerekeye amagara y'abantu bimeze nabi cane". Hari ibihuha vyakwiragijwe muri uku kwezi ko iryo higanwa rishobora kwungururizwa ku rindi sango canke mu kindi kibanza, ariko Caf yarabihakanye igihe yavugana na BBC Sport Africa mu ndwi iheze. Ku musi wa gatatu, uwujejwe gutumatumanako amakuru Lux September yaranebaguye ububeshi bw'ibimenyeshamakuru mu kwishura kuri kimwe cavuga ko izo nkino zishobora guhagarikwa, hanyuma mw'itangazo ryo ku musi wa kane rinemeza ko iryo higanwa rizoba uko ryateguwe. Iryo tangazo rigira riti:"N'aho hari ibindi bibazo vyiyongereye biturutse kuri iki kiza, iri higanwa ritegerezwa kuba. "Ikiza Covid na Omicron vyatumye hafatwa ingingo ruhasha zogutuma uwo mugera udakwirakwizwa, kuko ugeramiye ibintu vyinshi. "Uko biri kose, ubuzima butegerezwa kubandanya kandi dutegerezwa kubana n'uwo mugera."

headline: Igikombe c'isi 2022: DR Congo irarondera itike ya Coupe du Monde iherukamwo mu 1974
text: Urugendo rurerure rwo gushika mu gikombe c'isi ca 2022 ruzorangira mu minsi itanu iri imbere hamenyekanye abazoja mu bibanza bitanu vyo muri Qatar Ibihugu cumi nivyo biri mu nkino zo gukuranamwo zizohuza imigwi ibiri ibiri, urutonde rw'ingene bizokina rukaba ruhuza bimwe mu bihangange. Ata n'amezi indwi aheze batanye mu mitwe mu rukino rwa nyuma rw'igikombe ca Afrika, Misiri na Senegal vyongeye gusekana - ubu naho bigwanira ikibanza ca Qatar. Sadio Mane yaratwaye mugenziwe bakinana muri Liverpool Mohamed Salah igikombe ca Afrika, none umwe muri abo basatirizi ntazoshika mw'ihiganwa rikomeye ry'isi mu mpera z'uyu mwaka. Inkino za mbere  ziba kuri uyu wa gatanu itariki 25 Ntwarante/Werurwe, izo gusubiza nazo inyuma y'iminsi ine. Ku ncuro ya mbere, izo nkino za Afrika z'igikombe c'isi zizoba zirimwo bwa buhinga bwo guhagarikira urukino hakoreshejwe video (Video Assistant Referee) Ivyo bihugu vyompi  vyari mu gikombe c'isi giheruka mu Burusiya ariko nta na kimwe cashoboye kurengana igice ca mbere. Senegal irondera kuja ubwa gatatu muri ico gikombe mu gihe Misiri ishitseyo bwoba bubaye ubwa kane, bukaba ni ubwa kabiri igiye yikurikiranya. Aliou Cisse yagumanye benshi mu bakinyi bafashije Senegal gutahana igikombe ca Afrika ubwa mbere mu gihe Intambwe za Teranga zirondera gushika mu gikombe c'isi inyuma y'imyaka 16 zidashikayo kuko baherukayo ubwa nyuma mu 2018. Umumenyereza w'aba-Pharaons  Carlos Queiroz avuga ko "ata kibanza c'imbabazi canke zo kuvuga ngo hanyuma' kuri twitter. Misiri niyo izokwakira urukino rwa mbere, Senegal nayo ikazokwakira urwa kabiri ku kibuga cayo gishasha ku wa kabiri. Bibiri mu bihugu bikomeye cane vyo muri Afrika y'uburengero bigiye guhura bigwanira ikibanza co muri Qatar, uguhura gushobora kuzomara igihe kwibukwa kubera ubukeba buri hagati y'ivyo bihugu. Nigeria, yafashe ingingo yo kugumana  Augustine Eguavoen inyuma y'igikombe ca Afrika, iriko irarondera kuja ubugira kane yikurikiranya mu gikombe c'isi, mu gihe Ghana irondera gusubirayo inyuma yo kunanirwa gushika mu Burusiya mu 2018. Otto Addo, yagenywe kuba umumenyereza w'imfatakibanza inyuma yahoo  Black Stars barangije ari aba nyuma mu mugwi wabo w'igikombe ca Afrika, aho uwahoze ari umumenyereza muri Premier League Chris Hughton aca agenwa kuba umuyobozi w'ubuhinga, inyuma y'aho Milovan Rajevac yirukaniwe. Ghana cabaye igihugu ca gatatu co muri Afrika cashitse mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma mu gikombe c'isi co mu 2010, aho yatsinzwe na Uruguay ku ma penalty, ubu ikaba irondera  gushika mu gikombe c'isi ku ncuro ya kane. Ivyo bihugu vyompi ntibirasubira mu gikombe c'isi  kuva ku cabereye muri Brezil mu 2014 ubu bikaba birondera kwivyukiranya inyuna y'igikombe ca Afrika. Cameroun, n'umumenyereza wayo mushaha Rigobert Song, yatahukanye ikibanza ca gatatu kandi iriko ikinira i muhira ubu ikaba irondera gushika ku ncuro y'umunani mu gikombe c'isi- zikaba arizo ncuro nyinhsi  ku gihugu co muri Afrika gushika ubu. Algeria ntiyakije mu kugwamira igikombe ca Afrika yari yatsindiye mu 2019, aba-Fennec bakaba binjije igitsindo kimwe gusa aho bahejeje ata ntsinzi n'imwe baronse kandi bagaheza ari aba nyuma mu mugwi barimwo. Umumenyereza Djamel Belmadi, yari yafashe uwo mugwi kuva mu kwezi kwa munani mu 2018, yari yamaze inkino 35 adatsinzwe na rimwe ariko mu  buryo bwatangaje cane aza gutsindwa na Guinee Equatoriale. Mali niyo ynyene muri iyo migwi itarigera ishika mu gikombe c'isi, Inkona zizokina na Tunisia mu gihe zitarenze igice ca 16 mu gikombe ca Afrika giheruka. Ivyo bihugu vyarahuye mu gice c'imigwi muri Cameroun, Mali itsinda 1-0, ariko urwo rukino rwaratobwe n'umuhagarikizi w'umunya-Zambia Janny Sikazwe yavugije ifirimbi y'uko urukino ruheze hataragera inyuma yo gutekerwa n'ubushuhe. Tunisia yaciye yirukana umumenyereza  Mondher Kebaier inyuma yo kuviramwo mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma, uwamwunganira  Jalel Kadri aca ashingwa uwo mugwi muri izi nkino zibiri. Ico gihugu co muri Afrika ya ruguru kirondera gusubira mu gikombe c'isi cikurikiranya, mu giheruka mu mu Burusiya caviriyemwo mu gice ca mbere. Inyuma yo kuviramwo mu gice ca mbere mu gikombe co mu 2018, harimwo gutsindwa na Iran na Portugal hamwe no kunganya na Espagne, Maroc bakeneye gusubira mu gikombe c'isi bakomereze ku ntambwe bateye mu Burusiya. Tuniia irondera kuronka itike ya gatandatu yo gushika mu gikombe c'isi, aho yacitaba mu 2018 ikaba yari imaze imyaka 20 idahonyozayo ikirenge. Intare zo muri Atlas zavanywe mu gikombe ca Afrika mu gice ca 16 na Misiri, ariko abo bagiye guhura mu kugwanira ikibanza co muri Qatar bo ntibanashitse muri Cameroun. Repurika ya Demokrasi ya Congo imaze  gushika mu gikombe c'isi rimwe gusa, ico gihee yari ikitwa Zaire mu 1974 igihe yatsindwa inkino zose zitatu zo mu migwi. Umugwi nserukiragihugu wa DR Congo (Les Leopards) niwo wanyuma ku rutonde rw'isi mu zizokwitaba izo nkino zo gukuranamwo, ufise ikibanza ca 66 kw'isi, ukaba ukina urukino rwa mbere i Kinshasa kuri uyu wa gatanu.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Griezmann, Ings, Neves, Varane, Locatelli, Romero, Donnarumma, Grealish
text: Chelsea iri mu migambi yo kurondera ko Barcelona yoyitiza umusatirizi w'umufaransa Antoine Griezmann w'imyaka 30. (Daily Express) Ariko  Chelsea yabwiwe ko iriko irata wakuba, mu gihe iriko yongereza akariro mu kurondera kugura umusatirizi wa Borussia Dortmund umunya Norvege Erling Braut Haaland w'imyaka 20 muri rino ci. (Sky Sports) Manchester United iri hafi yo kwumvikana n'umukinyi w'inyuma wa Real Madrid umufaransa Raphael Varane w'imyaka 28. (Manchester Evening News) Tottenham iriko irarondera, imbere y'ibindi vyose, umusatirizi wa  Southampton umwongereza Danny Ings w'imyaka 28, ikaba yemeza idakekeranya ko ashobora gukinana na Harry Kane, ishaka kugumana uko vyogenda kwose, ku ruhande rw'ubusatirizi. (Telegraph) Arsenal iripfuza kugura umukinyi wo hagati wa  Wolves umunya Portugal Ruben Neves  ku miriyoni zirenga 48 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. (Sun) Aba Gunners kandi bariko bararondera umutaliyano akina hagati Manuel Locatelli w'imyaka 23 asanzwe akina muri Sassuolo mbere akaba akinira umurwi nserukiragihugu uherutse gutahukana Euro 2020, ariko kandi na Juventus imuraba ryiza. (AS) Spurs na Manchester United ziriko irarondera umukinyi w'inyuma, umunya Argentina Cristian Romero w'imyaka  23 asanzwe akina muri  Atalanta yatijijwemwo avuye muri Juventus. (Calciomercato) Arsenal yanse guha Aston Villa umwongereza akina hagati Emile Smith Rowe w'imyaka 20, ubwa mbere ikaba yari yatanze imiriyoni 34.6 y'amadorari Arsenal irayanka, ubu naho ikaba yasubiye kwanka izindi miriyoni 41.5 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika.  (Mail) Paris St-Germain iri hafi yo gutangaza ko yaguze umunyegori wa AC Milan umutaliyano Gianluigi Donnarumma w'imyaka 22 asanzwe anasamira umurwi nserukiragihugu utahukanye Euro 2020. (Daily Express) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Aston Villa umwongereza Jack Grealish w'imyaka 25 yagabishijwe ku bivugwa ko yoba ariko arondera kwimukira mu murwi  Manchester City uherutse gutahukana ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza Premier League. (Daily Mirror) Southampton iri mu biganiro na Newcastle United kugira irabe ko yoronka umwongereza akina hagati Isaac Hayden w'imyaka 26, mu gihe iyi mirwi yoshika ku masezerano umunya Gabon Mario Lemina w'imyaka 27 ashobora guca aja gukinira Newcastle United . (Mail) Umwongereza akina ku ruhande Andros Townsend w'imyaka 29 ariko ararondera uwundi murwi yoja gukinira inyuma y'aho yemereye ko hari amahirwe make cane ko Crystal Palace imwongera ayandi masezerano. (Evening Standard) Arsenal irashaka kugumana umwongereza akina hagati Joe Willock w'imyaka 21 muri rino ci, n'aho Newcastle United yipfuza kugumana uyu mukinyi yavyifashemwo neza igihe yatizwa muri uno murwi mu 2020-21. (Newcastle Chronicle) Brentford yahambije West Brom mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Chelsea umunya Sierra Leone Trevoh Chalobah. Umurwi wo mu Bufaransa Lorient na wo nyene uripfuza uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 22. (Express & Star) Umunya Bresil Felipe Anderson w'imyaka 28 asanzwe akina hagati muri West Ham ari mu Butalirano aho yagiye gutera igikumu ku masezerano yo gusubira mu murwi Lazio - imyaka itatu inyuma y'aho aviriye muri uyu murwi wa Serie A agiye muri West Ham. (Evening Standard)

headline: Novak Djokovic: Australia yongeye gufuta visa y'ico camamare muri tennis
text: Novak Djokovic yimirije gupfungwa ku wa gatandatu inyuma y'aho Australia ifutiye  visa yiwe ubugira kabiri mu mpari z'uko aguma mu gihugu atacandazwe. Iyo ngingo yafashwe ku mvo "z'amagara n'ukwubahiriza umutekano" isigura ko ashobora kwirukanwa kandi agaca abuzwa gusubira guhabwa uruhusha rwo kwinjira muri ico gihugu ikiringo c'imyaka itatu. Abashingwamanza ba Djokovic bavuze ko iyo ngingo "bigaragara ko itumvikana" kandi baja kwunguruza. Uwo nomero ya mbere muri tennis y'abagabo yari ategekanijwe gukina mw'ihiganwa rya Australian Open  rizotangura ku wa mbere. Umushikiranganji wa Austrilia ajejwe abasohoka n'abinjira  Alex Hawke yavuze mw'itangazo ati: "Uyu munsi nakoresheje ububasha bwanje… kugira mfute visa yari ifiswe na Novak Djokovic ku mvo z'amagara no kwubahiriza umutekano,  kuko kubikora vyari mu  nyungu z'abanyagihugu". Umushikiranganji wa mbere Scott Morrison yavuze ko iyo ngingo yafashwe "vyihwejwe neza". Mw'itangazo yavuze ati: "Abanya-Australia bahevye vyinshi cane muri iki kiza, gutyo birumvikana ko  bitega ko ivyavuye muri uko kwiheba  bikingirwa." Mu ntahe yihuta ya sentare ijoro ryitereye inyuma y'aho ingingo itangarijwe ku wa gatanu, umucamanza Anthony Kelly yafashe ingingo y'uko Djokovic adashobora kwirukanwa mu gihe hakibandanya ivyo kwunguruza urwo rubanza. Intahe y'urubanza rwo kwunguruza yitezwe ku wa mungu. Umucamanza yavuze ko reta ishobora kupfunga  Djokovic ahejeje kubonana n'abategetsi bajejwe abinjira n'abasohoka i Melbourne ku wa gatandatu mu gitondo. Ariko azoba yemerewe kuja mu biro vy'abamwunganira mu  mategeko  kugira bategure intahe yo ku wa mungu. Abunganira Djokovic mu mategeko bavuze ko ingingo y'umushikiranganji yo gufuta visa yiwe ''bigaragara ko itumvikana". Umushingwamanza wa Djokovic , Nicholas Wood yavuze ko ingingo yafashe atari ukubera ko ashobora kugeramira abanyagihugu, ahubwo ari ukubera ko "azokabura agatima ko kurwanya incanco". N'ubwo Djokovic atiteje urucanco, nta ruhara rweruye yaguze bikorwa yagize vyo  gutere intege amakuru atari yo y'abagwanya incanco. Wood yongeye ko umushikiranganji yahisemwo ''kuvana umuntu w'igihagararo ciza" muri Australia no ''kwonona" kazoza kiwe k'inkino kubera amajambo agwanya incanco Djokovic yavuze mu 2020. Uwo mukinyi amaze gutsinda Australian Open incuro icenda yari yizigiye  kurwanira ikibanza ciwe ku ndwi iza, hamwe yari gutsinda, akaba yociye aba uwa mbere aronse intsinzi nyinshi muri kahise k'urwo rukino mu ruhande rw'abagabo ku ntsinzi 21 za Grand Slam. Gushika ubu Djokovic aracari muri iryo higanwa  aho vyitezwe ko azohura n'umuvukagihugu wiwe  Miomir Kecmanovic ku ndwi iza. Hamwe yokwirukanwa, ikibanza ciwe gishobora guca kijamwo umurusiya Andrey Rublev. Visa ya Djokovic yari yafuswe ubwa mbere agishika i Melbourne   itariki 6 ukwezi kwa mbere, inyuma y'aho abategetsi b'imbibe muri Australia bavugiye ko "yananiwe no kwerekana icemezo kibereye" c'uko  yarekuriwe kutiteza urucanco. Kuva bikimeyeshwa  ko azoja gukina muri Australian Open, abanya-Australia,  babaye mu bihe birebire kandi vy'ingingo zikaze za guma mu rugo,  bamwe bamwe  vyari vyababaje kuko bitagaragara niba azokwubahiriza amategeko akaze cane yo kwinjira muri ico gihugu. Agishika yaciye apfungirwa amasaha makeya ku kibuga c'indege ca Melbourne, mu nyuma  amara iminsi mw'ihoteri y'inzego zijejwe abasohoka n'abinjira. Haheze iminsi umucamanza yaciye asesa ingingo yo gufuta visa yiwe aca ategeka ko arekurwa avuga ko ababijejwe batari bakurikije ingingo nyazo igihe yashika. Ariko ku wa gatanu ku mugoroba umushikiranganji  Hawke yongeye gufuta visa yiwe yitwaje ubundi bubasha bwo mw'itegeko  rya Australia rigenga abimukira. Rimuha ububasha bwo kwirukana uwo wese abona ko ashobora kubanganira amagara, umutekano canke iyubahirizwa ry'amategeko muri Australia", ariko Djokovic ashobora kwunguruza. Bishitse mu gihe Djokovic yemeye ko uwumufasha mu ngendo yihenze mu kwuzuza urupapuro rw'ingenzi. Djokovic yemeye kandi ko yabonanye n'umumenyeshamakuru yongera arifotoza kandi yari yatowe ko yanduye Covid-19.

headline: Umunonotsi wa BBC w'umwaka muri Afrika: Christine Mboma
text: Christine Mboma ari mu bahiganirwa agashimwe ka BBC k'umunonotsi w'umunye-Afrika yenuriye abandi mu 2021. Ushaka gutora tugusavye kuja ngaha https://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/africa/59089895 aho unasanga amategeko ajanye n'ubuzima bwite. Gutora bizohera kuwa Mungu itariki 19/12/2021 saa 23:59 GMT.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru : Varane, Sancho, Gerrard, Messi, Martial, Kounde, Benitez, Torreira
text: Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Real Madrid Raphael Varane aripfuza cane kwimukira muri Manchester United muri rino ci, ariko ikibazo nyamukuru kuyi uyu mufaransa w'imyaka 28 gishobora kuba gihagaze ku mushahara uharurwa mu bihumbi 555. 400 vy'amadorari y'abanyamerika (mu marundi ni 1.1 02.4 69.000 FBU) ku ndwi. (Independent) Tottenham ishobora kuvuvudikira umumenyereza wa Rangers Steven Gerrard mu gihe vyonanirana ko ironka uwahoze amenyereza Wolves Nuno Espirito Santo. (Evening Standard) Crystal Palace ishobora kurodera umumenyereza wa Swansea Steve Cooper inyuma y'aho vyankiye ko izana uwahoze amenyereza Borussia Dortmund Lucien Favre kugira ngo asubirire Roy Hodgson. (Sun) Manchester United iri hafi yo kuronka umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Borussia Dortmund umwongereza Jadon Sancho w'imyaka 21 - bikaba vyitezwe ko iyi mirwi yompi ishika ku masezerano mu ndwi zibiri ziri imbere. . (Manchester Evening News) Ibiganiro hagati ya wa musatirizi rurangiranwa wa Argentina Lionel Messi n'umurwi wiwe Barcelona bigeze kure mu ntumbero yo kugiriranira ayandi masezerano na we, ariko hari ivya nkenerwa bitarumvikanwako mu gihe amasezerano uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 34 ubu afitaniye nayo yitezwe kurangira mu ndwi iza.  (Sky Sports) Umuhagarikizi wa Timo Werner arashimangira ko uyu musatirizi w'umudagi w'imyaka 25 azoguma mu murwi Chelsea, n'aho hari amakuru avuga ko Real Madrid yoba iriko iramurondera. (Sport1, via Sun) Manchester United ishobora kwumviriza abarondera umusatirizi w'umufaransa Anthony Martial w'imyaka 25, hamwe n'umukinyi wo hagati w'Ubuholande Donny van de Beek  w'imyaka 24, ni mu ntumbero yo kuduza uburyo bwoyituma yiyubaka gushasha muri rino ci.  (ESPN) Everton irarondera umukinyi w'inyuma wa Roma umwongereza Chris Smalling w'imyaka 31 ariko wewe ntiyipfuza kwimukira i Goodison Park. (Mail) Tottenham iriko irarondera umukinyi w'inyuma muri rino ci, umufaransa Jules Kounde w'imyaka 22 akina inyuma muri Sevilla , hamwe na Joachim Andersen w'imyaka 25, umunya Danemark akina muri  Lyon bakaba bari imbere mu baronderwa. (Guardian) Rafael Benitez ararondera cane kuja kumenyereza Everton n'aho vyitezwe ko bamwe mu bakunzi b'uyu murwi biyamiriza igenwa ry'uyu yahoze amenyereza Liverpool . (Football Insider) Bitegekanijwe ko muri iyi ndwi Benitez agiriranira ibindi biganiro n'abategetsi b'uyu murwi waba Toffees, igenwa ryiwe rigashobora kwemezwa mu ntango z'indwi iza.  (Mail) Everton iri mu biganiro n'umunyegori wa Argentine Sergio Romero w'imyaka 34 yahoze akina Manchester United, kugira aje gusamira uyu murwi ata mahera urinze kumutangako, ariko ikaba imurwanira na Juventus hamwe na Celta Vigo. (Athletic) Arsenal iriko irakurikiranira hagufi umukinyi wo hagati wa  Lille Umunya Portugal Renato Sanches w'imyaka 23 asanzwe ariko aravyifatamwo neza mw'ihiganwa rihuza ibihugu vya Buraya, Euro 2020. (90Min) Umiunya Uruguay Lucas Torreira w'imyaka 25 asanzwe akina hagati muri Arsenal aripfuza gusubira mu Butariyano muri rino ci, nk'uko vyemezwa n'umuhagarikizi wiwe.  (TuttoMercatoWeb) Aston Villa iriko irihweza ingene yosubira kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Arsenal, umwongereza Emile Smith Rowe w'imyaka 20, inyuma y'aho igiciro c'imiriyoni  zababa 35 camiriwe kure. (Express and Star, Wolverhampton) West Ham na Tottenham zompi ziriko zirarondera umunyegori wa Fiorentina, umunya Pologne Bartlomiej Dragowski w'imyaka 23. (La Nazione - via Teamtalk) Leeds United nta mahirwe ifise yo kuronka umusatirizi wa Blackburn umunya Chili Ben Brereton w'imyaka 22 ariko aravyifatamwo neza mw'ihiganwa ry'igikombe ca Amerika, Copa America. (Lancs Live) Ahubwo, Leeds iriko iragerageza kurondera umusatirizi wa Brésil Matheus Cunha w'imyaka 22 asanzwe akina mu murwi Hertha Berlin wo mu Budagi. (UOL)

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w’amaguru kuri uyu wa 11.07.2019: Malcom, Maguire, Costa, Kean, Alderweireld, Ozil
text: Arsenal iripfuza kugura umukinyi akina ku ruhande w'umurwi Barcelona, Malcom w'imyaka 22, ni mu gihe na Everton yoyo imaze gutegura imiliyoni 31.5 z'amapawundi kugira igure uyo mukinyi w'umunya Brezili. (Sun) Uwahoze ari umusatirizi wa Liverpool, Dean Saunders , arizigiye ko Ole Gunnar Solskjaer "atazoshobora kurangiza ihiganwa" akiri umumenyereza wa Manchester United.  (talkSPORT) Solskjaer afise icizere ko azoshobora gutsinda ababanyi bayo ba Manchester City ku giciro kingana n'imiliyoni 75  z'amapawundi igashobora kugura umukinyi w'inyuma wa Leicester City, Harry Maguire w'imyaka 26. (Mail) Diego Costa w'imyaka 30 yahoze ari umusatirizi wa Chelsea ariteguye kuvugana na Everton gutyo agasubira muri Premier League mu gihe ariko yiyumvira ko yova mu murwi Atletico Madrid. (Sun) West Ham yarasavye umurwi Juventus ko bogirana amasezerano kugira ngo ushobore kuyitiza umusatirizi Gonzalo Higuain w'imyaka 31. Uyo mukinyi akomoka muri Argentine yamaze igice c'ihiganwa giheruka mu murwi Chelsea aho yari yatijijwe. (Sky Sports Italia, via Mail) Tottenham na Atletico Madrid  ziriko rirarwanira umukinyi wo hagati Dani Olmo w'imyaka 21 akomoka muri Espanye, akaba asanzwe akinira umurwi Dinamo Zagreb umushakako imiliyoni 27 z'amapawundi (AS, via Star) Juventus yamiriye kure igiciro c'imiliyoni 30 z'ama euro yatanzwe na Everton irondera kugura umusatirizi Moise Kean. (Tuttosport, via Sport Witness) Roma iripfuza umukinyi w'inyuma wa Tottenham, Toby Alderweireld, w'imyaka 30 akomoka mu Bubiligi, amasezerano akavuga ko uwumukeneye ategerezwa gutanga imiliyoni 25 z'amapawundi. Umukinyi Mario Lemina wa Southampton afise imyaka 25 akaba asanzwe ariko aronderwa na Manchester United, Arsenal hamwe na Leicester avuga ko atipfuza kubandanya akinira uwo murwi mw'ihiganwa ryimirije. (France Football, via Daily Echo) Tottenham iriko yongereza umurindi mu kurondera ko yotizwa umukinyi wo hagati wa Real Madrid, Dani Ceballos w'imyaka  22. (Mirror) Ariko rero, Arsenal ishobora kunesha abo bakeba bayo bagasinyisha amasezerano na Ceballos. (Marca, via Express) Arsenal iriteguye kugurisha abakinyi b'inyuma Calum Chambers, Carl Jenkinson, canke Mohamed Elneny akina hagati, kugira ngo ishobore kuronka umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Crystal Palace, Wilfried Zaha. Arsenal yari imaze gutanga imiliyoni 40 z'amapawundi kuri uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 26 akomoka muri Cote d'Ivoire, ariko Palace yarayanse. (Mirror) Manchester City "iripfuza cane kugumana" umukinyi wo hagati, Fabian Delph w'umwongereza, n'aho hari ibihuha ko uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 29 yipfuza kuva muri uwo murwi. Aston Villa, Brighton, Bournemouth na Wolves, zose ziripfuza umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Liverpool, Harry Wilson w'imyaka 22, yamaze ihiganwa riheruka muri Derby iyo yari yatijijwe. (Birmingham Mail) Umukinyi Juan Mata wa Manchester United yaranse umushahara w'amapawundi angana 550,000 ku ndwi yari yamerewe n'umurwi Shanghai SIPG wo mu Bushinwa, aca asinya ayandi masezerano na Man United. (90Min) Uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 31 y'amavuko yasinyiye ayandi masezerano muri uwo murwi kubera ari umwe mu "mirwi itatu canke ine ikomeye" kw'isi. (MUTV) David Luiz arizeye ko kubona Frank Lampard asubira I Stamford Bridge  bizotuma umurwi Chelsea usubirana iteka ryawo. (Standard) Umurwi Fenerbahce uvuga ko ata bushobozi ufise bwo  kugura umukinyi wo hagati Mezut Ozil wa Arsenal. Ni mu gihe amakuru yavuga ko uyo mukinyi yahoze akinira umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubudagi, ariko amamuko yiwe akaba ari muri Turukiya yashobora kuja gukina mw'ihiganwa Super Lig ryo muri ico gihugu. (RMC Sport )

headline: Tottenham ironse umumenyereza mushasha: Antonio Conte
text: Antonio Conte ahejeje kugenwa ngo abe umumenyereza mushasha wa Tottenham. Uyu Mutaliyano yahoze amenyereza Chelsea asubiriye Nuno Espirito Santo yirukanywe ejo ku wa mbere. Tottenham imaze igihe itavyifatamwo neza mw'ihiganwa ry'umupira ryo mu Bwongereza Premier League, aho mu rukino ruheruka yakubitiwe muhira na Manchester United, yayiteye bitatu ku busa. Avugana n'urubuga ngurukanabumenyi rwa Tottenham, Antonio Conte yagize ati: "Mfise umunezero mwinshi cane kubona ngarutse ku rubuga rw'abamenyereza, kandi nkaba ngiye kumenyereza umurwi wa Premier League ufise ishaka ryo guhangana n'ibindi bihangange. "Tottenham irafise ubushobozi bwose bwo kuba umwe mu mirwi rurangiranwa kw'isi. "Ndarindiranye igishika cinshi gutangura ibikorwa kugira ngo nereke umurwi n'abakunzi bawo inguvu n'ishaka vyamye bindanga, nk'umukinyi n'umumenyereza". Antonio Conte yiyongereye ku rutonde rw'abamenyereza b'ibihangange bakorera muri Premier League. Ati: "Mu mwaka w'inkino uheze, vyaranse ko ninjira muri uyu murwi kubera amasezerano nari mfitaniye na Inter yari akiri mashasha kandi nkaba nari mfise ishaka ryinshi ryo kurangiza ihiganwa, rero numva ko hatari bwagere ko ngaruka. "Ariko Daniel Levy yagumye afise inyota nyinshi cane yo kunzeza aya mabanga. "Ubu rero ko akaryo kabonetse, nahisemwo kugafata n'umutima wanje wose". Antonio Conte agiye kumenyereza uyu murwi gushika mu 2023, amezi hafi 20, akaba ahabwa amahirwe yo kwongererezwa iki kiringo mu gihe impande zompi zoramuka zivyumvikanyeko. Vyitezwe ko inkino zizomuhuza na Pep Guardiola, Jurgen Klopp hamwe na Thomas Tuchel zizoba ari akaroruhore. Muri Premier League urugamba azorutangurira kuri Everton ku wa Mungu - ariko imbere y'ao, Tottenham irafise urukino ku rwego rw'umugabane aho ku wa kane izohura n'umurwi Vitesse wo mu gihugu ca mw'ihiganwa European Conference League. Tottenham ubu iri mu kibanza c'icenda n'amanota 15 gusa mu nkino cumi imaze gukina mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza Premier League.

headline: I﻿gikombe c'isi 2022: Ihiganwa muri Qatar rigira ritangure
text: By Shamoon Hafez BBC Sport in Doha, Qatar I﻿nyuma y'imyaka 12 y'ibibazo no kunebagurwa, inkino z'igikombe c'isi mu mupira w'amaguru muri Qatar ziratangura kuri uyu w'Imana. I﻿myiteguro y'iryo higana rya mbere ribereye mu gihugu c'aba Islam co mu burasirazuba bwo hagati, ntiryavuzwe cane nk'ivyo barivugako. A﻿riko Fifa yasavye imigwi y'ibihugu 32 izitaba iryo higanwa "gushira inguvu gusa ku rukino", abakiriye iryo higanwa muri Qatar bakaza gutana mu mitwe na Equateur ku kibuga ca Al Bayt (16h00 GMT). K﻿u musi ukurikira hazokina Ubwongereza na Iran (13:00) imbere y'uko Reta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zihura na Wales (19:00). Q﻿atar 2022 kizoguma ari kimwe mu bikombe vy'isi vyateye impari n'umwumvikano muke muri kahise k'inkino. I﻿co gihugu co mu kigobe catsinze ibihugu vya Korea y'Epfo, Ubuyapani, Australia na Amerika vyashaka gutunganya izo nkino, ariko hakaba haravuzwe ko hatanzwe ibiturire kugira Qatar ihabwe ayo mahirwe, ivyo ico gihugu kiguma gihakana. M﻿u kwezi kwa kabiri 2021, ikinyamakuru The Guardian canditse ko abakozi b'abimukira 6.500 bava mu bihugu vy'Ubuhindi, Nepal, Bangladesh na Sri Lanka bapfiriye muri Qatar kuva ico gihugu gitsindiye gutunganya inkino z'igikombe c'isi. I﻿vyo biharuro vyegeranijwe hisunzwe ivyo abaserukira ibihugu vyabo muri Qatar. A﻿riko Qatar ivuga ko ivyo biharuro atari vyo kubera ko abapfuye bose batari abakozi bo mu nyubakwa zo kwitegurira igikombe c'isi. R﻿eta ivuga ko ibiharuro ifise ari impanuka zahitanye abantu 37 mu bakozi bubaka ibibuga bikokinirwako igikombe c'isi hagati ya 2014 na 2020, batatu gusa akaba ari bo "bazize akazi bakora". A﻿riko ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ry'abakozi, International Labour Organisation (ILO) rivuga ko bagabanije ico gitigiri cane. H﻿ari ubwoba ku bakunzi b'umupira w'amaguru bahuza ibitsina babisangiye ku kungene bazofatwa ufatiye ko ico gihugu kigendera kw'itegeko rya 'Shari', guhiza ibitsina rero mu bisangiye bikaba bitemewe muri ico Qatar. Amashirahamwe akorana na Fifa mu gutegura iryo higanwa yavuze ko "ibiganiro vyagiye buhoro buhoro" kandi ko " ibintu biteye umutima uhagaze" bikiriho. K﻿u musi umwe imbere y'uko iryo higanwa ritangura, prezida wa Fifa Gianni Infantino yagirije ibihugu vya Buraya "ubwiyorobetsi" mu vyo bagiye baravuga ku bijanye n'agateka ka zina muntu muri Qatar.
