A﻿mezi atatu imbere y'uko iryo higanwa riba, akana ka Fifa karemeye ivyasabwa n'imigwi yo mw'ishirahamwe rya Amerika y'epfo, Conmebol, vyo kwungururiza intango y'iryo higanwa ku musi umwe imbere y'aho ryotanguriye. H﻿anyuma, imisi ibiri imbere y'uko ihiganwa ritangura, abariteguye bamenyesheje abafana ko badashobora kugura no kunwera inzoga ku bibuga vyose ko ari umunani,  no mu micungararo yavyo. K﻿u misi 29 gusa iryo higanwa rizomara, kuva ihiganwa ritanguye gushika rihere (kuva itariki 20 z'ukwezi kwa Munyonyo [11] gushika itariki 18 z'ukwezi kwa Kigarama[12]), ni ryo higanwa ry'igikombe c'isi rigufi kuva kuryabere muri Argentine mu 1978. I﻿bi bisigura ko abateguye iri higanwa bagiye bategekanya inkino zine zine imisi yose mw'ijonjora, kandi nta mwanya ucamwo hagati y'inkino z'injonjora n'izo gukuranamwo ubwo nyene, ku buryo imigwi 16 izoba isigaye izotangura gukina bukeye haraye haheze inkino z'ijonjora.

headline: Qatar 2022: Abagore bonyene bagiye guhagarikira inkino z’igikombe c’isi c’abagabo, ubwa mbere mu mateka
text: Stephanie Frappart azoba abaye umugore wa mbere ahagarikiye urukino rw’igikombe c’isi c’abagabo. Uyu mufaransakazi yabaye umugore wa mbere ashizwe kuri rwo rwego muri aya mahiganwa igihe yashirwa mu kibanza c’umuhagarikizi wo ku ruhande agira kane mu rukino rwahuje Mexique na Pologne kuwa kabiri uheze. Frappart yabwiye BBC imbere yo gutangura urukino ati: "Turazi ko bitoroshe," Ariko yavuze ko "ivyo bidatuma bahinduka", ati "ni kwitonda, kwirinda gusamara, no kutitwararika cane itangazamakuru n’ibindi vyose, ahubwo bakagumiza ijisho ku rubuga". Frappart afadikanya na Neuza Back wo muri Brezil, n’umunye-Mexique Diaz Medina mu kibuga ca Al Bayt kuri uyu wa kane. Ku kibazo c’uko yoba yarigeze yumva amajambo amuvugwako kubera ari umugore aturutse mu bakinyi, abakuru b’imigwi canke abafana, Frappart yavuze ko "kuva atangura yamye ashigikiwe n’imigwi, amakipe n’abakinyi". Ati: “Namye nakirwa mu kibuga, rero niyumva nk’uwundi musifuzi uwo ariwe wese mu kibuga. Namye mpabwa ikaze, kandi nizigiye ko n'ubu ariko biza kugenda.” Frappart yabaye umusifuzi wa mbere w’umugore ahagarikiye urukino rw’abagabo mu mahinganwa y’imigwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo, ‘champions league’ 2020 Uyu mugore w’imyaka 38 ni nawe yabaye uwa mbere guhagarikira urukino rw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’ishirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru hagati y’imigwi yo ku mugabane wa Bulaya UEFA igihe Liverpool yahura na Chelsea muri European Super Cup 2019. Abagore batatu - Umufaransakazi Frappart, umunyarwandakazi Salima Mukansanga n’Umuyapanikazi Yoshimi Yamashita – bari mu basifuzi 36 batoranijwe guhagarikira inkino z’igikombe c’isi zibera muri Qatar.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru ku wa kane itariki 03.06.2021: Mbappe, Lukaku, Wijnaldum, Trippier, Wood, Firpo
text: Real Madrid izogiriranira amasezerano n'umukinyi w'imbere w'Ubufaransa Kylian Mbappe w'imyaka 22 ubu akinira umugwi wa Paris St-Germain, hanyuma uwo mugwi na wo uzane umunye Portugal Christiano Ronaldo  w'imyaka 36, mu gihe umunye Argentine na we Mauro Icardi w'imyaka 28 azova muri PSG aje muri Juventus. (La Gazzetta dello Sport,via Mail) Jose Mourinho yaravuganye na Real Madrid mu ndwi iheze, imbere y'uko uwo mugwi ugena Carlo Ancelotti mu mabanga y'umumenyereza wayo, n'aho uwo yahoze amenyereza imigwi ya Real na Tottenham yari yemeye kuba umumenyereza w'umugwi wa Roma mu kwezi guheze. (Telegraph) Icizere ca Chelsea co kugiriranira amasezerano na Romelu Lukaku caheze inyuma y'aho uwo mukinyi w'imyaka 28 w'umubiligi avugiye ko azoguma muri Inter Milan. (Football Italia) Barcelone iracari mu biganiro n'umukinyi w'imbere wo mu Buholande Memphis Depay w'imyaka 27 kugira akinire uwo mugwi ata n'urumeya rutanzwe avuye mu mugwi wa Lyon, mu gihe mugenzi we Georginio Wijnaldum w'imyaka 30 vyamaze kumenyekana ko azokwimukira muri uwo mugwi ata gisabwe. (Fabrizio Romano,Twitter) Manchester United yasubiye kurondera umukinyi w'inyuma mu ruhande rw'iburyo Kieran Trippier w'imyaka 30, akinira umugwi wa Atletico Madrid. (Manchester Evening News). Aston Villa ni umwe mu migwi 12 yo mw'ihiganwa ryo mu Bwongereza yipfuza umukinyi w'imbere Chris Wood wa Burnley ikaba ishaka ama pawundi imiliyoni 30 kuri uwo mukinyi w'imyaka 29. West Ham na New York City bamenyesheje ko barondera, ata mahera barinze gutanga, umukinyi w'imbere w'Ubufaransa Olivier Giroud w'imyaka 34 ariko aritegurira kuva mu mugwi wa Chelsea. (Calciomercato) Umumenyereza wa Real Madrid Carlos Ancelotti avuga ko umukinyi wa Ecosse Gareth Bale w'imyaka 31 hamwe n'umukinyi w'umubiligi Eden Hazard w'imyaka 30, bashobora kuguma muri uwo mugwi. (Guardian) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Borussia Monchenglabach, Florian Neuhaus w'imyaka 24, amaze imisi anuganugwa ko ashaka kuja muri Liverpool, arahakana inkuru zivuga ko yagiriraniye amasezerano na Bayern Munich.  (Tageszeitung-in German) Arsenal, Manchester United na Totteham bose barashaka umukinyi w'inyuma ku ruhande rw'iburyo akinira umugwi wa Lille, umunya Turukiya Zeki Celik,24. (Standard). West Ham na Southampton bariko barahiganirwa gutwara umunyegori wa Barcelona Junior Firpo,24. (Sport-via The Boot Room) West Ham iteye kure mu biganiro vyo kugiriranira amasezerano na Alex Kral w'imyaka 23, akinira umugwi wa Spartak Moscow ku mapaundi iliyoni 20. (Football Insider) Umukinyi w'imbere wa Argentine Sergio Aguero  w'imyaka 33, yaranse icipfuzo ca Juventus co kuja muri uwo mugwi, ahubwo ahitamwo kuja muri Barcelone ata gisabwe avuye muri Manchester City. (Mundo Deportivo-in Spanish) Seville yipfuza umukinyi w'umunya Chili Alexis Sanchez w'imyaka 32 akinira Inter Milan. (Sport-in Spanish) Leeds United irashaka kugura umukinyi w'inyuma ku ruhande rw'ibubamfu wa Espagne akinira umugwi wa Huesca, Javi Galan w'imyaka 26, agaciro kiwe kamaze kugabanuka gushika ku mapawundi imiliyoni 3.5. (Football Insider) West Brom iriko iritegurira kurondera umumenyereza mushasha inyuma y'ibiganiro bagiriraniye n'uwahoze amenyereza Sheffield United Chris Wilder w'imyaka 53. (Football Insider)

headline: Abagabo babiri bagirizwa ubugizi bwa nabi ku muhana wa Ozil
text: Igipolisi c'Ubwongereza kivuga ko abagabo babiri bagiriwe n'icaha c'ubugizi bwa nabi ku muhana w'umukinyi wa Arsenal. Ferhat Ercan na Salaman Ekinci bahagaritswe ku munsi wa kane hanze y'uburaro bw'umukinyi Mesut Ozil  mu buraruko bw'igisagara ca Londres. Amakuru avuga ko abo bagabo babiri bahagaritswe mu gihe bagerageza guhangana n'abajejwe umutekano ku muhana w'uyo mukinyi ku munsi wa kane igenekerezo rya 08 z'uku kwezi kw'umunani. Ercan na Ekinci bompi b'imyaka 27 bitezwe kurenguka imbere y'ubutungane muri sentare y'i Highbury ku wa 6z'ukwezi kw'icenda. Igipolisi kibagiriza icaha c'uguhungabanya umutekano w'abanyagihugu. Ku munsi wa gatanu, Arsenal yamenyesheje ko Ozil na Sead Kolasinac batashizwe ku rutonde rw'abakina uno munsi ku wa Mungu kubera "ibibazo vy'umutekano biriko birakorwako amatohoza n'igipolisi". Imbere y'aho kandi, abo bakinyi ntibajanye n'abandi mu rukino rwa kivandimwe rwahuje Arsenal na Lyon rwabaye ku wa 28 z'ukwezi kw'indwi, inyuma y'aho akarwi k'inkozi z'ikibi kageragereje kunyuruza amamodokari yabo mu kwezi kw'indwi ahitwa Golders Green i Londres. Mu kwezi kw'indwi guheze, abo bakinyi bompi baratewe n'akarwi k'inkozi z'ikibi kashatse kunyuruza imodoka. Arsenal ivuga iti:  "Umutekano w'abakinyi n'imiryango yabo, nico gikorwa kiza imbere ya vyose, kandi twafashe iyi ngingo inyuma y'aho tuvuganiye nabo hamwe n'ababaserukira".

headline: Hassan Karera yabwiye BBC ko amacakubiri yakorewe abakinyi b'Ubwongereza yamubayeho kenshi
text: Abakinyi b'ikipe y'Ubwongereza b'abirabura bakorewe amacakubiri mabi cane aho bakina n'ikipe ya Bulgaria, ariko Hassan Karera yakinye kera mu Bubirigi, avuga ko atari bishasha. Mu rukino rwo ku munsi wa mbere aho ikipe nserukira gihugu y'Ubwongere mu mupira w'amaguru yahura n'iya Bulgaria, abarorerezi ba Bulgaria batutse abakinyi birabura b'Ubwongereza bifatiye ku rukoba rwabo. Urwo rukino Ubwongereza bwatsinzemwo Bulgaria 6-0, rwahagaritswe inshuro zibiri ariko ivyo bitutsi ntivyahagarara. Vyarimwo kugira indamutso zo kurambura ikiganza nk'uko vyagirwa n'aba Nazi ba Hitler mu Budage mu myaka 1940, bakaririmba indirimbo z'ibitutsi hamwe no kwigana urusaku rw'inkende. Ariko naho vyari uko, abakinyi b'Ubwongereza baranse kuva mu kibuga, urukino ruhera batsinze Bulgaria 6-0 mu guhiganirwa itike yo kuja mu gikomba ca Buraya 2020. Naho bimeze uko ariko, abakinye umupira kera bobo bavuga ko muri kino gihe amacakubiri nk'ayo yagabanutse ugereranije na kera. Hassan Karera, umukinyi wa kera w'Umunyarwanda yakiniye ikipe za Kiyovu Sport yo mu Rwanda na Vitalo yo mu Burundi mu myaka 1980, yabwiye BBC ko akija gukina i Buraya kari akamaramaza. Karera agira ati: "Mu gihe cacu vyari bikomeye kurusha ubu kuko abakinyi bava Afrika (abirabura) bamaze kuba benshi. "Kera baradutuka ibitutsi vyinshi, bakigana insaku z'inkende, ivyo vyose narabibayemwo." Ivyo Hassan Karera vyamubayeho aho yava muri Vitalo akaja gukina mw'ikipe zo mu Bubirigi zitwa  K F C. VERBROEDERING  GEEL. hamwe na   WESTERLOO FC, hagati y'imyaka 1988 n'2008. Abandanya agira ati: "Muri gukora entrainements (imyimenyerezo) canke kwishusha abantu baraza bakakwita 'negre' (igitutsi kigayitse gitukwa abirabura). "Vyaratubabaza ariko abatoza n'abandi bakinyi (b'abazungu) ntibavyumve kuko bo babona ari ibisanzwe." Karera aremera ko ubu hari icahindutse kuko ibintu nk'ivyo ubu ari gake biba ku mugaragaro ariko akavuga ko mu mitwe y'abantu bikirimwo. Yagize ati: "Ubu n'aho batavyerekana, uracabona ko mu mitwe yabo bibaza ko umwirabura ari hasi yabo." Ishirahamwe rijejwe umipira w'amaguru kw'isi, FIFA, rirategekanya ibihano ku makipe abafana bayo bitwaye nabi muri ubwo buryo, nko kuyaca amafaranga canke gukina ata bafana bari ku kibuga. Ariko naho biri uko, ikibazo c'amacakubiri afatiye ku rukoba mu mupira w'amaguru, naho hari utwigoro twinshi two kubirwanya, kiracariho.

headline: Ethiopia: Umunonotsi yemerewe imodoka ntarayihabwa kubera ubukene bw'amafaranga y'agaciro
text: Umunya-Ethiopia yatahanye umudari w'inzahabu, Solomon Baregaa, avuga ko gushika ubu atararonka imodoka yemerewe n'abategetsi inyuma yo gutahukana umudari rudende (rukumbi) Ethiopia yakuye mu nkino za olympic za Tokyo 2020 zabaye mu ci rya 2021. Solomon yanyarutse kurusha uwari asanganywe umuhigo w'isi Joshua Cheptegei mw'isiganwa rya 10.000m aca aritsinda  ku mwanya ungana na 27'43"22 (imonota 27, amasekunda 43 n'ibice 22). Umushikiranganji ajejwe inkino muri reta, Mesfin Cherinet, yabwiye BBC ko imodoka yemerewe atarayihabwa kubera ubukene bw'amafaranga y'agaciro. Uwo munonotsi yatahanye umudari w'inzahabu mu kwezi kw'umunani yagaragaye mu mafoto ariko arahabwa urufunguruzo rw'imodoka na prezida wa Ethiopia  Sahle-Work Zewde. Ariko umushikiranganji yavuze ko "imodoka yerekanywe mu birori yari iyo yemerewe ariko itari iyo yari gushikirizwa". Ingwano mu buraruko  yarashegeshe ubutunzi bw'igihugu, ubu ikaba yatumye abantu baharugwa mu bihumbi bugarijwe no kwicwa n'inzara. Solomon  yavuze ko atahura ingorane reta ifise hamwe n'inzira ndende bifata kugira ngo iyo modoka iboneke. Avuga ati: "Bica mu nzira ndende. N'abandi banonotsi b'imbere yanje vyarabashikiye. N'ubwo jewe isa n'iyatevye gusumba, sinidoze." Abategetsi bemeye kumuha amafarang angana n'ikiguzi c'iyo modoka mu mafaranga yo muri Ethiopia, ni ukuvuga hafi miriyoni 2.8 z'ama-birr (amadorari 54.000; arenga miriyoni 108 mu mafaranga y'Uburundi). Bemeye kandi ko bazomufasha kugura iyo  modoka hanze akayinjiza adatanze amakori ( ata mafaranga ya douane atanze).

headline: Umwana w'imyaka 12 yatawe muri yompi yagirizwa ivanguramoko kuri Wilfried Zaha
text: Umwana w'umuhungu w'imyaka 12 yahagaritswe n'igipolisi mu matohoza ku majambo y'ivanguramoko yarungikiye Wilfried Zaha, umusatirizi wa Crystal Palace ayacishije ku mbuga hwaniro. Zaha yamenyesheje ko yarungikiwe amajambo atari make yo kumutyoza acishijwe ku mbuga hwaniro imbere y'urukino rwahuje umurwi wiwe na Aston Villa ejo ku wa Mungu, urukino Crystal Palace yatsinzwe ibitsindo bibiri ku busa. Umumenyereza wiwe Roy Hodgson avuga ko ivyo bitutsi ari "ubukozi bw'ikibi kandi bibabaje cane". Abarongoye ihiganwa ry'umupira mu Bwongereza, Premier League, bamenyesha ko ityozwa ry'uyu mukinyi akomoka muri Cote d'Ivoire ari ikintu "kidashobora kwihanganirwa na gato". Igipolisi co mu karere ka West Midlands cari candikiye Zaha ku rubuga rwa Twitter ko cariko gitegura gukora amatohoza kuri iryo tyozwa, haciye amasaha makeya kimenyesha ko cahagaritse uyo mwana. Ico gipolisi canditse ubutumwa kuri twitter kiti: "Twaronse ubutumwa butari buke uno munsi butumenyesha ko uyu mukinyi yarungikiwe amajambo amutyoza kandi tumaze kuyihweza neza, twaciye duhagarika umwana w'umuhungu". "Uyo muhungu w'imyaka 12 yaciye yinjizwa agasho. Turashimiye abo bose berekanye iryo bara. Ivangura ntirishobora kwihanganirwa". Avugaka n'ikinyamakuru c'inkino Sky Sports imbere y'uko uyo mwana ahagarikwa, Hodgson yongeyeko ati: " "Ivyo ari vyo vyose, iri sekeza rya Black Lives Matter ririko riravyerekana neza kandi bose bariko bihatira kurandurana n'imizi iyo ngeso". "Ni ibintu bibabaje kubona, ku munsi w'urukino nyene, umukinyi avyukira ku bitutsi vy'ububegito kandi bibabaje cane vy'ivanguramoko. Ni vyiza kubona Wilf yabishize ahabona kandi sinibaza ko iki ari ikintu co kwigumizamwo". "Yashatse kubuza umwe mu bakinyi beza cane gukina neza, ariko inzira yabicishijemwo ntishobora kwihanganirwa". Premier League ivuga iti: "Iyi ngeso ntishobora kwihanganirwa na gato kandi Premier League yifatanije na Wilfried Zaha mu kuyiyamiriza, co kimwe n'amacakubiri ayo ari yo yose". "Tuzobandanya dufata mu mugongo abakinyi, abamenyereza hamwe n'imiryango yabo iramutse ironse amajambo y'ibitutsi acishijwe ku mbuga hwaniro". Kuva ihiganwa rya Premier League risubiye gutangura mu kwa gatandatu guheze, abakinyi mu Bwongereza barapfukama imbere y'ugutangura urukino mu ntumbero yo kwifatanya n'isi yose mu rugamba rwo kurwanya ivanguramoko rikorerwa abirabure rwiswe Black Lives Matter (Ubuzima bw'abirabure ni kirumara).

headline: Igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi kuri uyu wa gatanu: Jesus ari mu kwinjira muri Arsenal - ni bimwe mu bivugwa
text: Arsenal iri hafi yo gushika ku masezerano n’umusatirizi wa Manchester City umunya-Brezili Gabriel Jesus w’imyaka 25. (Times) Tottenham iriko itegura imiriyoni 90 z’ama euro kugira irabe ko yoronka umusatirizi wa Inter Milan  Lautaro Martinez ariko uyu munya Argentina yipfuza kuguma muri uyu murwi wa Serie A, kandi nawo nta mugambi ufise wo kumugurisha. (Alfredo Pedulla) Newcastle United iriko ikurikiranira hagufi umunyegori wa Burnley umwongereza Nick Pope w’imyaka 30. (Mail) Liverpool iracarondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Borussia Dortmund, umwongereza Jude Bellingham  w’imyaka 18. (Mirror) AC Milan niyo ihabwa amahirwe gusumba Newcastle mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi w’inyuma wa Lille umunya-Hollande Sven Botman akina mu batarenza imyaka 21. (Football Insider) Manchester City iriko iregeranya amafaranga mu ntumbero yo kurondera umukinyi w’inyuma ku ruhande rw’ibubamfu wa Brighton umunya Espagne Marc Cucurella w’imyaka 23. (Guardian) Umumenyereza wa Nottingham Forest  Steve Cooper yatumye uyu murwi ushika mu cicaro ca mbere c‘ihiganwa ry’Ubwongereza Premier League mu mwaka w’inkino uheze ari hafi yo gushika ku masezerano mashasha n’uyo murwi. (Telegraph) Forest  kandi iri mu biganiro kugira ngo irabe ko yoronka umukinyi w’inyuma, umufaransa Moussa Niakhate w’imyaka 26 asanzwe akina mu murwi Mainz wo mu Budagi. (Mail) Leeds United na Southampton iripfuza umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester City Umubirigi Romeo Lavia w’imyaka 18. (Athletic) Southampton yiteze gutangaza ko yaguze umunyegori akomoka muri Irlande Gavin Bazunu w’imyaka  20 wo muri Manchester City mu masezerano afise agaciro k’imiriyoni 15 z’amapawundi. (Telegraph) Fulham na Wolves yompi iripfuza kugura umukinyi wo hagati wa Sporting Lisbon umunya-Portugal Joao Palhinha w’imyaka 26. (90min) Umukuru wa Real Madrid  Florentino Perez avuga ko umusatirizi mushasha wa Manchester City umunya Norvège Erling Haaland w’imyaka 21 atari gutanguzwa iyo uyu musatirizi yari kuba yarimukiye muri uyo murwi wo muri Espagne. (Mirror) Umukinyi w’inyuma w’umwongereza James Tarkowski w’imyaka 29 yemeye kwimukira muri Everton igihe amasezerano afitaniye na Burnley azoba arangiye muri rino ci. (Sky Sports) Juventus yahinduye ivyo yemereye umukinyi wo ku ruhande w’umunya-Argentina Angel di Maria w’imyaka 34 kubera iriko iramurwanira na Barcelona, ubu akaba yirebanga, afise uburenganzira bwo kwinjira mu murwi uwo ari wo wose yishakiye inyuma y’aho aviriye muri Paris St-Germain. (Gianluca di Marzio) Umukinyi wo hagati Umufaransa Aurelien Tchouameni yimukiye muri Real Madrid avuye muri Monaco inyuma yo kwanka igifovya c’amafaranga yemerewe nk’umushahara muri PSG. (Marca)

headline: Lauren Etame Mayer yigeze gukinira Arsenal yizeye ko Mikel Arteta azosubiza iteka uyo murwi
text: Umunya Cameroun Lauren Etame Mayer, umwe mu bahoze ari abakinyi b'inyuma ba Arsenal kuva mu mwaka wa 2000 gushika 2007,  avuga ko Arteta afise amateka akomeye muri uyo murwi, akibaza ko ashobora kuwushikana kure. Arsenal yagenye uwigeze kuba kizigenza w'uwo murwi Mikel Arteta kiba umumenyereza wayo mu kiringo c'imyaka itatu n'igice iri imbere. Uyo mumenyereza w'imyaka 37 yatsindiye ibikombe bibiri vya FA, mu kiringo c'imyaka itanu yamaze akinira uwo murwi wo mu gisagara ca Londres. Mu kiringo c'imyaka itatu, Arteta yahora ari icegera c'umumenyereza wa Manchester City, Pep Guardiola. Avugana n'abamenyeshamakuru, Arteta yavuze ati: "Ndubaha cane uyu murwi, iyaba ntumva ko nshoboye kandi niteguriye iki gikorwa, sinari kwicara kuri ino ntebe". "Ico dukeneye ubu, ni kwihutira guhindura ibintu, tugatsinda inkino, kandi abakinyi bagasubira kugira ishaka". Arteta amaze gusezera, Arsenal yaratwaye igikombe ca FA, ariko mw'ihiganwa rya 2016-17, Arsenal yisanze irangije ihiganwa itari mu mirwi ine ya mbere muri premier league, ibitari bwigere bishika kuva mu mwaka wa 1996. Uwahoze akinira uyo murwi, Lauren Etame Mayer, yakiniye n'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Cameroun, abona ko Arteta azoshobora gushikana uyo murwi kure. Mu kiganiro yagiranye na BBC, Arteta ahejeje kugenwa, Lauren yavuze ati: "Arteta yaragize uruhara runini muri Arsenal. Yari kizigenza. Yaradukiniye umukino mwiza cane kandi ndamwipfurije kuroranirwa. "Yarabaye umukinyi wo ku rwego rwo hejuru kandi ndizeye ko azokoresha ubumenyi bwiwe bwose maze mu minsi iri imbere tugasubira kubona Arsenal nk'umurwi w'igihangange mu Bwongereza". "Ndamwipfuriza amahirwe, we n'umurwi wose". Arteta afise igikorwa gihambaye c'ukuvyura Arsenal, ubu iri mu kibanza ca cumi mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza Premier League, aho mu nkino cumi, yashoboye gutsinda zibiri zonyene.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w’amaguru i Bulayi 21/09/2019: Alonso, Gomes, Wenger, Moutinho, Meunier
text: Uwurongoye umurwi Real Madrid, Florentino Perez, ariko arihweza ingene Xabi Alonso w'imyaka 37 yahoze akinira Liverpool n'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Espanye  yosubirira Zinedine Zidane nk'umumenyereza. (Mundo Deportivo) Jose Mourinho yahoze amenyereza Manchester United na Massimiliano Allegri yahoze amenyereza Juventus nabo nyene bari ku rutonde rw'abashobora kuronderwa kugira basubirire Zidane, mu gihe uyo mu faransa yokwirukanwa. (Marca) Ibiganiro hagati y'umurwi Wolverhampton  wo mu Bwongereza n'umukinyi wo hagati Joao Moutinho w'imyaka 33 akomoka muri Portugal bigeze kure kugira ngo bagiriranire ayandi masezerano y'imyaka ibiri. (Telegraph) Watford ifise icizere ko ishobora gutsinda Hull City mu rugamba rwo kurondera umusatirizi w'umunyasuwede, Kevin Harletun, w'imyaka 19  akinira Malmo, amasezerano akaba azorangira mu kwezi kwa 11 kw'uno mwaka.  (Sun) Liverpool ibandanya ishinze ijisho umusatirizi w'umunya Hollande, Donyell Malen w'imyaka 20, amaze gutsinda ibitsindo 10 mu nkino 12 z'umurwi PSV Eindhoven  muri uno mwaka w'inkino. (Calciomercato) Manchester United yatanguye ibiganiro n'umukinyi wo hagati Angel Gomes w'imyaka 19 asanzwe akinira umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubwongereza w'abatarenza imyaka 20 kugira bamwongere amasezerano. (Manchester Evening News) Umukuru w'umurwi Tottenham, Daniel Levy, ashimangira ko ideni ry'imiliyoni 637 z'amapawundi bafashe bubaka ikibuga gishasha ata nkurikizi mbi rizogira ku bikorwa vy'uwo murwi vy'ukugura abakinyi. (Standard) Umukinyi w'inyuma w'umubirigi Thomas Meunier avuga ko atishimiye ko ataronka umwanya w'ugukina mu murwi wiwe wa Paris Saint-Germain. Uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 28 yararondewe n'imirwi ya Arsenal na Manchester United mu gihe c'igura n'igurishwa ry'abakingi giheruka. (RMC Sport) Umukuru wa Everton, Marco Silva, avuga ko uyo murwi uriko wihweza ingene wogura umukinyi w'inyuma mu kwezi kwa mbere. (Liverpool Echo) Arsene Wenger yahoze amenyereza Arsenal agiye guhabwa akazi mw'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru kw'isi, FIFA, mu gisata c'ubuhinga mu ndwi ziri imbere,  n'aho we agifise icipfuzo c'ukuba umumenyereza. (ESPN) Aston Villa yateguye amahera angana n'imiliyoni 20 z'amapawundi z'ukurondera umusatirizi mushasha, ni inyuma y'aho utwigoro tw'ukumurondera mu gihe c'igura n'igurishwa ry'abakingi giheruka ataco dushitseko. (Football Insider) Umumenyereza wa Manchester City, Pep Guardiola, yiteze ko icegera ciwe yahoze akinira Everton, Mikel Arteta, amusubirira mu gihe yoramuka asezeye uyo murwi. (Evening Standard) Umukinyi wo ku ruhande rw'imbere wa Crystal Palace, Wilfried Zaha w'imyaka 26 asaba abakinyi bagenziwe kwitanga uko bashoboye kugira ngo uwo murwi usubirane itoto. (Sun) Icigwa gishasha ku mirwi yatsindiye amahiganwa iwabo canke mu burere catoye ikibuga c'umurwi wa Manchester City, Etihad Stadium, nk'ikibuga ca mbere ciza kw'isi, gkiza imbere y'ibibuga vya Nou Camp ca Barcelona na Allianz Arena ca Bayern Munich. (Mail)

headline: Italy: Amatohoza kuri Cristiano Ronaldo ku kurenga ku mategeko yo kwirinda Corona
text: Umukinyi w'imbere wa Juventus Cristiano Ronaldoariko aragirwako amatohoza n'igipolisi c'Ubutaliyano ku rugendo yagize aja guhimbaza umusi w'amavuka w'umukunzi wiwe. Yagirizwa kurenga ku mategeko yo kwirinda Covid -19, mu kugira urugendo hagati y'intara ya Piedmont na Valle d'Aosta. Amafoto yabonetse ariko mu nyuma aza gufutwa ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi, zerekana aba bantu babiri bari mw'ihoteli imwe umusi Georgina Rodriguez yahimbaza imyaka 27 iheze avutse. Abantu benshi baramaze gupfa mu Butaliyano  abandi benshi barandukirwa n'iyo ngwara buri musi. Ico gihugu carasinzikaye cane ico kiza kigitera mu mwaka uheze, ubu na ho kikaba kiri mu ndyane za politike inyuma yo kunanirwa kugabanya igitigiri c'abandura iyo ngwara mu musumirano w'ubundi bwoko bwa Corona. Abapolisi b'i Valle d'Aosta bavuga ko bariko baragira amatohoza kura abo bantu bakundana ko ari babiri ku vyerekeye urugendo  bagize i Courmayeur ski. Amategeko ngenderwako yo mu Butaliyano, ingendo mu turere durimwo corona nyinshi zirabujijwe kiretse ingendo z'akazi canke utashe muhira. Inkuru zivugwa ngaho mu Butaliyano zemeza ko Cristiano Ronaldo n'umukunzi wiwe bafashe urugendo ku musi wa kabiri baca baguma muri iyo hoteli imbere yo kuja Turin, ahabarizwa umugwi wa Juventus ku musi wa gatatu. Rodriguez, umunyamideli, mu nyuma yarashizeko ifoto yiwe na Ronaldo bari mu musi mukuru ku muhana wabo. Mu gihe vyogaragara ko barenze ku mategeko, bashobora bose kurihishwa ihadabu. Ivyo bishitse inyuma y'amezi atari make aheze Cristiano Ronaldo yandukijwe corona. Ico gihe yaranebaguwe n'umushikiranganji w'inkino w'Ubutariyano kuba yaragiye muri Portugal gukina urukino mpuzamakungu imbere gato y'uko yandura iyo ngwara. Vincenzo Spadafora yavuze ko Cristiano Ronaldo ari umuntu 'inzigo' kandi 'atisonera'  anamwagiriza kurenga ku mategeko yo kwirinda corona, aho yavuye mw'ihoteli umugwi wiwe warimwo aca afata urugendo inyuma yo kumenyekana ko yanduye. Ariko uwo mukinyi aguma ahakana ko ata kosa yakoze.

headline: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: Ronaldo, Sterling, Martinez, Depay
text: Chelsea iriko irihweza ko yozana umusatirizi wa Manchester United Cristiano Ronaldo, ni mu gihe yamaze kubwira uyu murwi w’aba Red Devils ko ashaka kugenda muri rino ci. (Athletic ) Ronaldo w’imyaka  37 ashobora kuba yipfuza kwinjira muri Chelsea, ariko aba ba Blues ntibarafata ingingo yo kurondera ku mugaragaro uyu munya-Portugal. (ESPN) Umukuru wa Barcelona Joan Laporta hamwe n’umuserukizi Jorge Mendes bariko na bo nyene baravugana barabira hamwe nimba uyu mukinyi yahoze ari umukinyi rurangiranwa wa Real Madrid ashobora kugaruka mw’ihiganwa La Liga. (AS – mu ki Espagnol) Ronaldo kandi aremera ko ashobora kwemera kugabanirizwa umushahara wiwe w’amapawundi 500.000 ku ndwi muri Manchester United. (Independent) Ibiganiro bigeze kure hagati ya Chelsea n’umurwi Manchester City ku musatirizi w’Umwongereza Raheem Sterling w’imyaka  27, uyu murwi watahukanye ihiganwa ry’Ubwongereza Premier League ukaba umushakako imiriyoni 50 z’amapawundi. (Sky Sports) AC Milan iriko irakora uko ishoboye kugira ngo irabe ko Chelsea  yoyitiza umunya-Maroc akina ku ruhande Hakim Ziyech w’imyaka 29. (Athletic) Abarongoye Manchester United barabonanye na bagenzi babo bo muri Ajax mu mpera z’indwi iheze kugira ngo bavugane ku mukinyi w’inyuma w’umunya-Argentina Lisandro Martinez w’imyaka 24, aba-Red Devils bakaba bemera kumutangako imiriyoni 39.6 z’amapawundi. (Mirror) Tottenham iriko irashaka kumenya ivyerekeye umusatirizi wa Barcelona, umunya-Hollande Memphis Depay w’imyaka 28, akaba ashobora kuva i Camp Nou ku miriyoni 17 z’amapawundi. (Sport - mu ki Espagnol) Tottenham kandi iri hafi yo gushika ku masezerano na Barcelona kugira uyu murwi wa La Liga uyitize umukinyi w’inyuma wayo, umufaransa Clement Lenglet w’imyaka 27. (Fabrizio Romano) Umukinyi w’inyuma wa Villarreal umunya-Espagne Pau Torres w’imyaka  25, aracaronderwa na Tottenham n’aho Lenglet ashobora kuba ari hafi yo kuza. (Mirror) West Ham yiteze gukubita hasi Everton mu rugamba rwo kurwanira umusatirizi w’umwongereza Jesse Lingard w’imyaka 29 kuri gusa. (Mail) Umusatirizi wa Tottenham Steven Bergwijn w’imyaka 24 yateye akagere Everton na Manchester United yompi yariko imurondera, akaba ashima kwimukira muri Ajax.  (De Telegraaf) Everton na West Ham  yompi irashaka kugura umunya-Albania Armando Broja w’imyaka 20 asanzwe akina muri Chelsea, uyu musatirizi akaba ari ku giciro c’imiriyoni 30 z’amapawundi 30. (Mail) Newcastle iracarondera umukinyi wo ku ruhande, umufaransa Moussa Diaby w’imyaka 22 asanzwe akina muri Bayer Leverkusen. (Sky Sports) Leeds United iri mu biganiro kugira urabe ko yoronka umukinyi wo ku ruhande, umunya-Colombia Luis Sinisterra w’imyaka 23 asanzwe akinira Feyenoord. (Express) Leeds iri hafi yo gushika ku masezerano y’imiriyoni 20 z’amapawundi hamwe n’uturusho ku mukinyi wa RB Leipzig  umunyamerika Tyler Adams w’imyaka 23, ni mu ntumbero yo gusubiriza Kalvin Phillips inyuma y’aho uyu mwongereza yimukiye muri Manchester City. (ESPN) Leeds  kandi iri mu biganiro na Club Bruges kugira irabe ko yoronka umubirigi akina imbere Charles de Ketelaere w’imyaka 21. (Mail) Brighton iripfuza umunya-Argentina akina inyuma ku ruhande rw’ibubamfu Nicolas Tagliafico w’imyaka 29, akaba ashobora kuva muri Ajax ku miriyoni 3.3 zonyene z’amapawundi. (Sussex Live) West Ham yatewe akagere n’umurwi wo mu Bufaransa Lille ku miriyoni 20 z’amapawundi yatanze ku mubirigi akina hagati Amadou Onana w’imyaka 20. (Athletic) Crystal Palace, Southampton na Nottingham Forest yose irashaka Morgan Gibbs-White w’imyaka 22 asanzwe akina muri Wolves. (Talksport)

headline: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: Felix, Fernandez, Bellingham, Tielemans, Moukoko
text: Arsenal yahawe amahirwe menshi yo gutahukana umusatirizi wa Portugal, Joao Felix w’imyaka 23, akina muri Atletico Madrid mu kwa mbere, ikaba icye imbere Paris St-Germain, Manchester United na Aston Villa. (Marca - in Spanish) Hari “amahirwe menshi” ko Arsenal izoshobora kugura umukinyi wa Ukraine akina ku ruhande Mykhaylo Mudryk mu kwa mbere ku giciro kiri musi y’imiriyoni 86 z’amapawundi yasabwa na Shakhtar Donetsk kuri uno mukinyi w’imyaka 21. (Athletic) Liverpool yashitse ku masezerano yo ku munwa na Benfica yo kugura umukinyi wo hagati wa Argentina Enzo Fernandez w’imyaka 21. (La Capital - in Spanish) Fernandez ashobora kuronderwa na Real Madrid mu gihe vyokwanka ko igura umwongereza isanzwe irondera cane, Jude Bellingham w’imyaka 19, asanzwe akina muri Borussia Dortmund mu ci riza. (Sport) Ishirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru ry’Ubwongereza, Football Association (FA), rishaka ko Gareth Southgate yobandanya amenyereza umurwi nserukiragihugu wabwo, n’aho imbere y’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose bwerekanye ko bwashaka uwahoze amenyereza Chelsea Thomas Tuchel. (Bild) FA izokwumviriza abanyamahanga bazoshaka kumenyereza umurwi nserukiragihugu w’Ubwongereza mu gihe Southgate yoramuka atanze imihoho muri ico kibanza. (Telegraph) FA ibona ko umumenyereza wa Leicester City, umunya-Irlande du Nord Brendan Rodgers ari we ari imbere mu bashobora gusubirira Southgate –si Frank Lampard canke Steven Gerrard. (Star) Brazil irashaka ko Carlo Ancelotti asubirira Tite nk’umumenyereza w’umurwi nserukiragihugu wayo inyuma y’aho uviriye mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi, mu kw’icumi ikaba yaravuganye mu mpisho n’uyu mumenyereza wa Real Madrid. (UOL Esporte) Leicester City iriteguye ko Arsenal isubira ikagerageza kurondera Youri Tielemans mu kwezi kuza imbere y’uko uyu Mubirigi w’imyaka 25 akina hagati yirebanga mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye n’uyo murwi arangira mu ci riza. (Mirror) Chelsea yatanguye ibiganiro vyo kurondera umusatirizi w’Umudagi Youssoufa Moukoko w’imyaka 18, kugira yimukire muri uyo murwi ataco urinze gutanga avuye muri Borussia Dortmund mu kw’indwi. (Nicolo Schira) Paris St-Germain iripfuza kugura Umufaransa akina ku ruhande Ousmane Dembele w’imyaka 25 akinira Barcelona. (El Nacional) AC Milan iri mu biganiro vyo kwongereza amasezerano  n’umukinyi Rafael Leao asanzwe aronderwa na Chelsea hamwe na Manchester United, kandi “iratuje” mu cizere ko uyu musatirizi wa Portugal w’imyaka  23 azoshobora gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha. (Gazzetta dello Sport, iciye kuri Goal) Manchester United igiye kunagura amasezerano y’uwahoze ari umunyegori wa Espagne David de Gea w’imyaka 32, umwongereza akina inyuma ku ruhande rw’ibubamfu Luke Shaw w’imyaka 27, hamwe n’umunya-Brezili akina hagati Fred w’imyaka 29, be kandi n’umusatirizi w’umwongereza Marcus Rashford w’imyaka 25, n’umunya-Portugal akina inyuma ku ruhande rw’I buryo Diogo Dalot w’imyaka 23. (Manchester Evening News) Leeds United iriko iraraba ingene mu kwa mbere yoronka umudagi akina inyuma ku ruhande rw’ibubamfu  muri PSV Eindhoven , Philipp Max w’imyaka 29. (Football Insider) Wilfried Zaha w’imyaka 30 aboneka ko ashobora kuva muri Crystal Palace atakirinze gusabwa mu gihe uyu munya- Côte d'Ivoire azoba arangije amasezerano yiwe mu ci riza. (Fabrizio Romano iciye kuri CaughtOffside) Sevilla irashaka ko Isco w’imyaka 30 mu kwa mbere agenda,  inyuma y’amezi atanu gusa yinjiye muri uyu murwi avuye muri Real Madrid. (Marca) Bayern Munich iri hafi yo kuronka umukinyi wo hagati wa Autriche Konrad Laimer w’imyaka 25 asanzwe akina muri RB Leipzig, ataco irinze gutanga kuko azoba yirebanga mu ci riza. (Fabrizio Romano) Tottenham Hotspur iriteguye kugiriranira ibiganiro n’umumenyereza Antonio Conte muri ino ndwi mu ntumbero yo guha uno mutaliyano amasezerano mashasha y’igihe kirekire. (Athletic) Uwahoze ari umumenyereza wa Barcelona na Roma Luis Enrique aripfuza gusubira mu kazi ko mu mirwi (clubs) inyuma y’aho atakarije akazi kiwe ko kumenyereza umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Espagne. (Sport) Mauricio Pochettino yahoze amenyereza Tottenham na Paris St-Germain yabwiye abagenzi ko yipfuza ko igihe kimwe yoja kumenyereza Chelsea, mu gihe ikibanza coboneka. (Football Insider) Amazon ni yo kompanyi yindi ivugwa ko yipfuza kugura Manchester United – ariko abahinga babona ko igiciro gisabwa n’aba Glazers c’imiriyaridi indwi z’amapawundi, ni ukuvuga imiriyaridi 9.8 z’amadorari y’abanyamerika, kireneye urugero. (Mail) Aston Villa umumenyereza wa Unai Emery aripfuza kuzana muri Villa Park  umukinyi w’Ubuholande akina ku ruhande Arnaut Danjuma w’imyaka 25, hamwe n’umunya-Senegal akina hagati Nicolas Jackson w’imyaka  21, basanzwe bakina mu murwi wa Villarreal yahoze amenyereza. (Mirror)

headline: Edouard Mendy aridoga kubona isanamu yiwe ikoreshwa mu nkuru zerekeye Benjamin Mendy
text: Umunyegori wa Chelsea Edouard Mendy yidogeye ibinyamakuru vyihenze mu gukoresha isanamu yiwe  mu nkuru zerekeye umukinyi wa Manchester City Benjamin Mendy. Uwo mukinyi w'inyuma muri  City n'Ubufaransa Benjamin Mendy yagirijwe ivyaha bitandatu birimwo gusambanya ku nguvu no guhohotera bishingiye ku gitsina, kandi n'ubu akaba akiri mu minwe y'igiporisi. Amafoto ya Edouard Mendy na muvyarawe akinira Real Madrid, Ferland Mendy, yarakoreshejwe mu nkuru zerekeye Benjamin. Edouard Mendy avuga ko kuzikoresha ari "ikimenyetso gikomeye cane". Uwo akinira n'igihugu ciwe ca Senegal yanditse kuri Instagram ati: "Birababaje kubona mu 2021, mu Bufaransa co kimwe no mu Bwogereza, kuri bamwe bamwe, abirabure bafatwa nk'abantu batagira amazina canke badashobora gutandukanywa uko basa. "Uko 'kwihenda' ku mafoto bisa n'uko ata kintu kinini bivuze, ariko mu vy'ukuri siko biri, n'ikimenyetso gikomeye. "Nta na kimwe kigoye mu gutandukanya amasura y'abantu babiri, na cane cane ko udupira bambara dufasha cane [kuko twanditseko amazina yabo]!" Muri Myandagaro/Kanama (ukwezi kw'umunani), Benjamin Mendy yagirijwe ivyaha bine vyo gusambanya ku nguvu n'ikindi co guhohotera bishingiye ku gitsina. Ivyo vyaha yagirizwa bijanye n'ibivugwa ko yoba yarahohoteye abagore batatu bafise hejuru y'imyaka 16 i muhira iwe hagati y'ukwezi kwa Gitugutu/Ukwakira (kw'icumi) n'ukwezi kwa Myandagaro mu 2021. Ku wa gatatu, uwo mukinyi w'imyaka 27 yararengutse muri sentare kugira abazwe ku bindi vyaha bibiri bijanye no guhohotera i Macclesfield muri Mukakaro/Nyakanga na Myandagaro/Kanama. Yaciye ahagarikwa na City amaze kwagirizwa n'igiporisi mu gihe hariko harakorwa amatohoza.

headline: Odion Ighalo: Rutahizamu wa Manchester United yashitse ku ndoto yiwe n'igitsindo ca mbere
text: Ukwimukira mu murwi Manchester United kwa Odion Ighalo kwabaye imwe mu nkuru zaranze abakunzi b'umupira w'amaguru ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi, bitumwe n'uko bidansanzwe. Kuva kuwa kane, yaravuzwe cane - kandi ubu hoho, bifise ishingiro. Richard Arnold arongoye umurwi Manchester United, niwe yatanguye yishimira ko amasezerano umurwi wiwe wagiranye na Ighalo yatumye iba inkuru ya mbere mw'isi ku bakoresha urubuga rwa 'Twitter'. Ivyo vyashitse umunsi umwe wa 'Brexit' n'urubanza rw'ugukura canke kugumiza icizere kuri Perezida Trump. Ariko, abadakunda umurwi wa Manchester United bo babona atari ngombwa ko iba inkuru nziza kur'uwo murwi. Umukinyi Ighalo w'imyaka 30 aturuka muri Nigeria yahagaritse gukinira umurwi wo mu Bushinwa - Shanghai Shenhua - ngo aje gukomeza umurwi w'Abongereza inyuma y'aho Marcus Rashford akomerekeye. Iyimuka rya Ighalo ritangaje kuko ata vyinshi Ubwongereza bumuziko uretse ko yatsindiye ibitsindo 6 umurwi Watford yakiniye, mu mwaka wiwe wa nyuma. Inyuma y'ukugaragara incuro zitatu nk'umukinyi w'umusubirizi w'umurwi Manchester United, yatanguranye neza n'uwo murwi kuwa 27 z'ukwa kabiri, asubirira Anthony Martial. Yasubiriye kuvurwa ku mvo zitandukanye. Abakunzi ba Manchester United, banemera Ighalo, bamuririmba igihe ari mu batsindiye umurwi wiwe, uhura na Bruges, 5-0. Hari  mu nkino zihuza imirwi ya Bulaya, urukino rwabereye mu gisagara ca Manchester, kuri kimwe mu bibuga vya kera ca Old Traffod, cubatswe mu 1909. Ighalo yariyemeye anikeza avuga ati "Ni ibihe bidasanzwe kuri jewe, nari ndindiriye kuva kera". Yongeye ati, "Ni urukino rutari rworoshe, ariko rwampaye amahirwe y'ugutangurana na Manchester United ku gitsindo. Ni n'iteka kuri jewe gutangurana uko n'umurwi nkunda kuva nkiri umwana." Ijoro ntibagiranwa rya Ighalo Uretse ko rwari urukino rwa kane Ighalo akiniye Manchester United, bwabaye n'ubwa mbere atsinda mu nkino z'amahiganwa y'imirwi ya Bulaya. Ubuhinga bwa Ighalo bwasize umurwi wa Bruges mu 'kantu'. Igihe cose yakoze ku mupira, vyatera akoba abakinyi b'inyuma b'umurwi wa Bruges. Ighalo yatanguye yerekana ko agiye kubangamira umurwi wa Bruges kuva mu masekonda 60 ya mbere, ahawe umupira na mugenziwe Juan Mata. Igitsindo ciwe cavuye ku mupira ahawe na Bruno Fernandes, ku metero 5 z'igori. N'ica kabiri yari agiye kukironka iyo adahura na Simon Mignolet w'umurwi w'Ababirigi ba Bruges. Kabaye akaryo ko kwibuka mushikiwe, mu gushira ahabona agapira yari yambariyeko, gacapuyeko ifoto yiwe. Mushikiwe Mary Atole yapfiriye muri Canada afise imyaka 42, indwi 7 imbere y'uko musazawe yirangurira indoto ziwe. "Mushikanje nkunda yitavye Imana, yari umukunzi ruhebwa w'umurwi Manchester United." Ighalo yabibwiye imboneshakure MUTV. "Twarakunda kuganira ivy'iyi ndoto yanje. Ikibabaje n'uko ibi binshikiye atakiriho. Nico kimbabaje. Niyemeje ko igitsindo cose nzokwama ndakimwitirira. Iyo ari mw'ijuru, arabona ivyiza ndimwo na Manchester United." 'Biraboneka ko ari igitsindo c'akamwemwe kavanze n'amarira' Ole Gunnar Solskjaer, umutunganyabikorwa wa Manchester United - azwi ko yatsindiye uwo murwi incuro 126, agikina - yakeje Ighalo ko yishize ku rutonde rw'abatsindiye uwo murwi. Solskjaer yavuze ati, "Ighalo yaronse ico yakoreye". Yongeye ati, "Ashinzwe ijisho na benshi". "Nk'uwabaye umukinyi w'umusatirizi, ndazi uko umuntu yiyumva ku gitsindo ca mbere. Yagerageje kenshi. Yari yamotewe n'igitsindo ciwe." "Igitsindo ciwe cerekanye uko mumutwe yari yiteguye. Kuva Juan agifise umupira, Ighalo yar'azi aho abwirizwa kuba ari. Ni igitsindo cari gitunganije neza." Ighalo yatanganje abahinga Ighalo yanatangaje abagabo babiri bahoze bakinira Manchester United, bariko bakorera inganda z'ibinyamakuru z'inkino. Paul Scholes, umukinyi wo hagati we yavuze ati,  "Yakoze neza cane, mu kwerekana ubukerebutsi bwiwe. Yaje muri uyu murwi hageze, nk'uko vyagenze kuri Bruno Fernandes. Hamwe Manchester United yoharura kuri we, ntagisivya azoshimisha umurwi n'abakunzi." Owen Hargreaves, uwundi yahoze ari umukinyi rurangiranwa wo hagati, yongeye ati: "Nakunze ingene Ighalo yagabiye igitsindo c'akarorero Manchester United. "Ni umugabo aboneka ko akomeye hageze nko gutsinda. Aratandukanye na Martial canke Rashford. Kandi nibaza ko agiye gutsindira n'ibindi bitsindo Manchester United, kuva ubu gushika mu mpera y'izi nkino z'imirwi ya Bulaya."

headline: Burundi - Olympics: Francine Niyonsaba yaronse 'minima' zo kuja mu nkino za Tokyo
text: Umunonotsi rurangiranwa w'umurundukazi Francine Niyonsaba yaronse uburenganzira bwo kuja mu nkino za Olempike za Tokyo inyuma yo kwiruka imetero 5,000 mu minota 14:54.38 mw'ihiganwa rya Meeting international de Montreuil 2021. Kugira uje mw'ihiganwa rya Olempike ku metero 5,000 utegerezwa kugira umwanya uri musi ya 15:10.00. Uwo munonotsi kandi yaciye umuhigo ku bigeme biruka izo metero mu Burundi, akaba ari na wo mwanya wiwe mwiza agize kuri izo metero. Bwari bubaye ubwa kabiri yiruka imetero ibihumbi bitanu, ubwa mbere akaba atari yashoboye kuronka umwanya ukenewe igihe yiruka izo meteromu minota 15 n'amasekunda 12.08 mw'ihiganwa ryabereye muri meeting yabereye muri mu kwezi guheze. Francine Niyonsaba riko yari asanzwe azwi cane mu kwiruka imetero 800, aho yigeze gutahukana umudari w'inzahabu mw'ihiganwa ryabereye mu Bwongereza mu 2018. Uwabaye uwa mbere muri iyo meeting ya Montreuil n'umunya-Kenya Beatrice Chebet, yaciye akagozi ku masekunda abiri arenga gato imbere ya Niyonsaba. Niyonsaba w'imyaka 28 yahisemwo guhindura aja ku metero ibihumbi bitanu aho kwemera gufata imiti yo kugabanya inkabuzo/imisemburo ya testosterone. Ku mategeko mashasha y'urwego ruraba inkino zo kunonora imitsi, Niyonsaba ashirwa mu bafise icitwa 'Difference of Sexual Development' canke DSD - gutyo akaba atemerewe kwiruka imetero ziri hagati ya  400 na mile imwe (1.6km) adafashe imiti igabanya imisemburo ya kigabo bita testosterone. Ku wa gatanu, umunya-Afrika y'Epfo Caster Semenya, umukeba wa Niyonsaba ku metero 800 n'uwundi munonotsi nawe ashirwa mu ba DSD, bahejeje ku mwanya utabaha kwitaba inkino za olempike ku metero 5.000. Semenya w'imyaka 30 yahejeje izo metero ku 15'32".15 muri meeting ya Durban - aho akaba yarengeje amasekunda 22.15 ku mwanya usabwa. Semenya bwari ubwa kabiri ageregeza kurondera itike yo kwitaba inkini za Tokyo. Itariki ntarengwa y'abashaka kuzitaba kugira babe baronse umwanya usabwa ni 29 ukwezi kwa gatandatu, nk'uko vyashinzwe na Comite International Olympique, CIO. Mu nkino za Olempike za Rio, Francine Niyonsaba yari yatahukanye ikibanza ca kabiri, aronka umudari w'ifeza. Francine Niyonsaba yabwiye BBC ko anezerejwe n'iyo ntsinzi kuko ngo bitamworoheye. Avuga ati: "Ndaryohewe cane kuko vyaransavye kwirinda kubabara, ndihanganira ingorane nyinshi, ndagerageza guhindura ndeka kwiruka imetero 800 nja kwiruka imetero nyinshi." Niyonsaba yaheruka kwandika ku rubuga rwa Twitter asaba abategetsi b'Uburundi kworohereza abanonotsi gukora imyimenyerezo neza, aho yari yashikiye mw'ihoteli ategerezwa kumaramwo imisi ine mu kwubahiriza amabwirizwa yo kwirinda Covid-19. Ico gihe yavuga ko abandi banonotsi boroherezwa mu bihugu vyabo. Avuga ko akamo kiwe bakumvise, uwo musi nyene bakaba baciye bamurekura arataha kubandanya kwitegura. Mu 2019, Francine Niyonsaba, yahiganwa mu gusiganwa imetero 800, yabwiye BBC ko ata n'umwe ashobora kumubuza kubandanya ahiganwa. Avugana na BBC mu gihe ikinyamakuru Forbes giheruka kumushira ku rutonde rw'abagore 30 bahambaye muri Afrika, Francine yari yavuze ko azobandanya ahiganwa mu kunonora imitsi, uko vyogenda kwose. Yavuze ko iyo ngingo yo gushaka kubakumira irimwo akarenganyo.

headline: Casillas yahoze ari umunyegori wa Real Madrid na Espagne arasezeye mu mupira w'amaguru
text: Iker Casillas Fernández yahoze ari umunyezgori wa Real Madrid n'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Espagne yasezeye mu mupira w'amaguru afise imyaka 39. Casillas yakinye inkino 725 muri Real Madrid mu kiringo cose c'imyaka 16 yakiniye uyo murwi, atsindira ibikombe bitatu vya Champions League hamwe na bitanu vy'ihiganwa La Liga ryo muri ico gihugu. Yafashije kandi Espagne gutwara igikombe c'isi ca 2010 hamwe n'amahiganwa abiri y'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi nserukirabihugu ya Bulaya mu 2008 na 2012. Casillas yinjiye muri Porto mu 2015 ariko kuva mu kwa kane 2019 akaba atashoboye gusubira gukina kubera indwara y'umutima yamufashe ari mu myimenyerezo. Amaze gukira yahawe igikorwa co kuba mu bamenyereza b'uyo murwi mu kw'indwi 2019. Atangaza ikukuruka ryiwe ku rubuga rwa Twitter, Casillas yanditse ati: "Ikintu nyamukuru ni urugendo ufata hamwe n'abantu baguherekeza, ntabwo ari iyo uja. "Nibaza ko nshobora kuvuga ntakekeranya ko ari yo nzira kandi ishikana kw'ihangiro". Real Madrid yavuze ko Casillas yinjiye muri ivyo bihangange vya Espagne afise imyaka icenda, yabaye umunyegori rurangiranwa mu mateka y'uyu murwi mu myaka 118 umaze. Ku rubuga rwayo, Real Madrid yanditse iti: "Real Madrid irashaka kwerekana ko ishimira, ko yishimiye kandi ko ikunda umwe mu bihangange vy'umurwi wacu ndetse n'umupira w'amaguru kw' isi". "Iker Casillas ni inkoramutima kuri Real Madrid kandi bizokwama uko imyaka n'imyaka ".

headline: Premier League 'ntiraganira ku vyo guhagarika ihiganwa' n'aho abanduye Covid biyongereye
text: Premier League, ihiganwa rikuru ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Bwongereza, ivuga ko ata mugambi wo guhagarika ihiganwa ry'uno mwaka n'aho ibiharuro vy'abandue coronavirus vyaduze. Ku wa kabiri w'iyi ndwi, abakinyi 18 ni bo bapimwe bagasanga baranduye uwo mugera. Urukino rwari rutegekanijwe nijoro ku wa gatatu hagati ya Fulham na Tottenham vyabaye ngombwa ko rusiba kubera hari abakinyi ba Fulham bari banduye. Umumenyereza wa West Brom, Sam Allardyce, yari yasavye ko inkino "zohagarikwa gato" ariko Premier league ivuga ko "ata vyo guhagarika iri higanwa" biraganirwako. Premier league ivuga iti: "Turizeye ko ingingo zacu zijanye na Covid-19 zitwemerera kubandanya ihiganwa uko ikirangamisi categuwe, kandi reta iracazemera". "Dushira imbere anagara y'abakinyi n'abakozi, ariko kandi turashigikiye ingene imirwi ishira mu ngiro izi ngingo n'amategeko ngenderwako". Ku wa mbere, urukino rwari guhuza Everton na Manchester City rwarasivye hasigaye amasaha ane ngo rutangure kubera abakinyi bari banduye. Mu bipimo biheruka gufatwa ku bakinyi, Sheffield United imenyesha ko "abakinyi batari bake basanze baranduye". N'aho ihiganwa rya Premier League ribandanya ukuri kwamye, abakinyi bagiye gusubira kubuzwa kwinjira mu kibuga kubera uburere butari buke bw'Ubwongereza buriko bushirwa ku mategeko ruhasha yo kuzibira coronavirus kuva isaha zitandatu z'ijoro ryakeye. Igisagara ca Liverpool kigiye gushirwa ku rugero rwa gatatu muri izi ngingo za reta, ibi bigasigura ko abafana batazosubira kwemererwa kwinjira mu kibuga ca Liverpool, Anfield, canke Goodison Park ca Everton. Ibi bibuga bibiri nivyo bibuga vyonyene mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza vyari vyemerewe kwakira abafana bashika ku 2000 mu ngingo zahahora zari zizwi ko ari izo ku rugero rwa kabiri. Hari ubundi burere butari buke bw'Ubwongereza, harimwo uturere two mu buraruko bushira uburengero, uburaruko bushira ubuseruko hamwe n'ubwo hagati, bwashizwe mu mategeko yo ku rugero rugira kane kuva isaha zitandatu z'ijoro ryakeye.

headline: Aubameyang wa Gabon yasezeye gukinira igihugu
text: Kapiteni wa Gabon akaba n'umukinyi w'imbere wa Barcelona Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang yasezeye gukinira igihugu mu gihe himirije ihiganirwa  ryo gushika mu nkino za nyuma z'igikombe ca Afrika Can 2023. Uwo mukinyi w'imyaka 32 yakiniye Les Pantheres incuro 68 yinjiza ibitsindo 29, bituma gushika ubu aba ari we mukinyi amaze kwinjiiriza ibitsindo vyinshi ico gihugu. Mw'itangazo,  urwego rw'igihugu rujejwe umupira w'amaguru muri Gabon (Fegafoot) rwamenyesheje ko rwaronse ikete rya Aubameyang arumenyesha ingingo yiwe. Yarwandikiye ati: " Inyuma y'imyaka 13  nserukira igihugu canje  , nashaka kubamenyesha ko mpagaritse gukinira igihugu." "Nashaka gushimira abanya-Gabon bose n'abandi bose banshingikiye mu bihe vyiza na bibi. "Nzokwama  nibuka ibihe bikomeye nk'igihe nakinira igihugu ubwa mbere, canke igihe nataha mvuye muri Nigeria ntahukanye agashimwe k'umukinyi w'umunya-Afrika w'umwaka. Kugasangira n'abandi bose n'igihe ntibagirwa. "Nshaka gushimira data we yashatse ko nomera nka we   kandi nizigiye ko namushimishije mu kwambara umwambaro w'igijhugu cacu." Mu kumwishura, Fegafoot yemeye  "akazi keza yakoze" no kuba umukinyi "yari azi ingene ateza imbere, kubera ubunyamwuga bwiwe, ishusho ya Gabon mu makungu". "Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang azokwama ari intangarugero ku bariko bararuka," nk'uko Fegafoot yongeyeko. "Umuryango wagutse w'umupira w'amaguru uzoguma uzeye vyinshi ku buhinga bwiwe muri kazoza." Aubameyang  yavukiye mu Bufaransa hanyuma akinira ico gihugu mu rugero rw'abafise munsi y'imyaka 21 ariko aca arahindura akinira Gabon kugira agendere mu makanda ya se, yabaye kapiteni igihe Gabon yashika ubwa mbere mu nkino za nyuma z'igikombe ca Afrika mu 1994. Ntiyamye afitaniye imigenderanire myiza na Fagafoot, aho nko mu 2018 yanegura urwo rwego igihe rwatangaza ko se wiwe yari agiye kuba umumenyereza mushasha w'umugwi nserukiragihugu mu gihe amasezerano yavyo atari bwaherahezwe. Aubameyang  yatanguye gukinira Gabon  mu rukino batsinzemwo Maroc mu 2009, hanyuma akinira igihugu ciwe mu nkino zine za nyuma z'igikombe ca Afrika. Uwo mukinyi w'imbere yari ku rutonde rw'abakiniye Gabon mw'ihiganwa c'igikombe ca Afrika ca 2021 ariko cakiniwe gitevye ariko nta rukino na rumwe yakinye inyuma y'aho mu ntango yanduriye Covid-19 mu nyuma akarwara icavuzwe ico gihe ko twari 'udukomere ku mutima'. Les Pantheres bazotangura inkino zo gukuranamwo z'igikombe ca Afrika ca 2023 muri Cote d'Ivoire aho bazokina na Repuburika ya Demokrasi ya Congo itariki zine za Ruheshi (6)  hanyuma ikine urukino rwa kabiri rwo mu mirwi na Mauritania ku wa 8 Ruheshi.

headline: Rukinzo FC yaraye isezerewe na Triangle United wa Zimbabwe muri CAF Confederation Cup
text: Umurwi w'umupira w'amaguru w'igipolisi c'Uburundi Rukinzo Fc waraye usezerewe n'umurwi Triangle United wo mu gihugu ca Zimbabwe mu rukino rwo gusubiriza mw'ihiganwa rya CAF Confederation Cup rwabereye i Bujumbura ejo ku wa gatandatu. Urwo rukino rwabereye ku kibuga citiriwe Intwari (Cahoze citiriwe Umuganwa Rudoviko Rwagasore) rwagiye kurangira ata murwi n'umwe uronse igitsindo. Mu rukino rwa mbere rwabereye muri Zimabwe ku wa 11 z'uku kwa munani, Triangle United yari yirahiye Rukinzo FC ibitsindo bitanu vyose ku busa. Imirwi y'umupira w'amaguru y'Uburundi yatanguye kwinjira muri iryo higanwa mu mwaka wa 2007 mu gihe ryari ryatanguye mu mwaka wa 2004. Mu mirwi yose  y'Uburundi imaze kuja muri iryo higanwa, nta murwi n'umwe urashobora gushika mu nkino z'igice ca nyuma kuko yose iviramwo mu nkino z'ukurondera uburenganzira (eliminatoires). Umurwi umaze gushika kure ni Lydia Ludic Burundi Academic FC (Lydia Ludic canke LLB Academie) mu mwaka wa 2013 aho waviriyemwo mu nkino z'igice ca kane c'ikuranamwo (Playoffs) ikurwamwo n'umurwi Stade Malien wo muri Mali ku bitsindo 6-0 mu nkizo zompi. Imirwi ya Atletico Olympic FC, Messager Ngozi, Olympic Star ntiyashoboye kurengana igice ca kabiri c'inkino z'ukurondera uburenganzira, mu gihe imirwi Prince Louis, Inter Star,  Vital'o, Academie Tchite na Rukinzo itashoboye kurengana igice ca mbere c'inkino  z'ukurondera uburenganzira.

headline: Ikibumbano ca Kobe Bryant cashizwe aho kajugujugu yagiriye isanganya
text: Umuhinga mu gukora ibibumbano Dan Medina yajanye ikibumbano c'icamamare cakinira umugwi wa basketball Los Angeles Lakers Kobe Bryant n'umukobwa wiwe Gianna ku kibanza c'aho kajugujugu barimwo yagiriye isanganya bakarirwamwo haraheze imyaka ibiri. Ico kibumbano gipima 73kg ni ic'imfatakibanza ariko Medina yizeye ko hazoba igihoraho kizoshirwa mu kibanza kiboneka cane  muri Los Angeles. Medina yavuze ati: "Ibi nabikoze ku gatwe kanje, nta n'umwe yansavye kubikora." "Kuri uyu munsi, kw'isabukuru igira kabiri y'iryo sanganya, nafashe ingingo yo kukizana ngaha kuva mu gitondo gushika rirenge kugira mfashe aba fana biwe gukira buke buke umubabaro iryo sanganya ryabateye. "Uyu munsi wari umunsi udasanzwe kuko vyinshi naravyiboneye. Abantu baraja kuza hanyuma batahe bumva ko hari ikibashimishije." Amazina y'abantu icenda baguye muri iryo sanganya yanditswe ku ntebe y'ico kibumbano, hananditseko kandi amajambo azwi cane ya Bryant: "Intwari ziraza hanyuma zikagenda, ariko 'ba harabaye' bahoraho". Uwari utwaye Kobe Bryant 'yataye ibyerekezo kubera ibihu'
